[03] aya.m pana dabbatthero mallara.t.the anupiyanagare ekassa mallara~n~no gehe pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi. tassa maataa upavija~n~naa kaalamakaasi, matasariira.m susaana.m netvaa daarucitaka.m aaropetvaa aggi.m ada.msu. tassaa aggivegasantatta.m udarapa.tala.m dvedhaa ahosi. daarako attano pu~n~nabalena uppatitvaa ekasmi.m dabbatthambhe nipati. ta.m daaraka.m gahetvaa ayyikaaya ada.msu. saa tassa naama.m ga.nhantii dabbatthambhe patitvaa laddhajiivitattaa ``dabbo''tissa naama.m akaasi. tassa ca sattavassikakaale satthaa bhikkhusa"nghaparivaaro mallara.t.the caarika.m caramaano anupiyambavane viharati. dabbakumaaro satthaara.m disvaa dassaneneva ^a^M1.0050^ea^ pasiiditvaa pabbajitukaamo hutvaa ``aha.m dasabalassa santike pabbajissaamii''ti ayyika.m aapucchi. saa ``saadhu, taataa''ti dabbakumaara.m aadaaya satthu santika.m gantvaa, ``bhante, ima.m kumaara.m pabbaajethaa''ti aaha. satthaa a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno sa~n~na.m adaasi -- ``bhikkhu ima.m daaraka.m pabbaajehii''ti. so thero satthu vacana.m sutvaa ^a^V1.0041^ea^ dabbakumaara.m pabbaajento tacapa~ncakakamma.t.thaana.m aacikkhi. pubbahetusampanno kataabhiniihaaro satto pa.thamakesava.t.tiyaa voropanakkha.ne sotaapattiphale pati.t.thahi, dutiyaaya kesava.t.tiyaa oropiyamaanaaya sakadaagaamiphale, tatiyaaya anaagaamiphale, sabbakesaana.m pana oropana~nca arahattaphalasacchikiriyaa ca apacchaa apure ahosi. satthaa mallara.t.the yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa ^a^P1.0044^ea^ raajagaha.m gantvaa ve.luvane vaasa.m kappesi.

[03] tatraayasmaa dabbo mallaputto rahogato attano kiccanipphatti.m oloketvaa sa"nghassa veyyaavaccakara.ne kaaya.m yojetukaamo cintesi -- ``ya.mnuunaaha.m sa"nghassa senaasana~nca pa~n~naapeyya.m bhattaani ca uddiseyya''nti. so satthu santika.m gantvaa attano parivitakka.m aarocesi. satthaa tassa saadhukaara.m datvaa senaasanapa~n~naapakatta~nca bhattuddesakatta~nca sampa.ticchi. atha na.m ``aya.m dabbo daharova samaano mahante .thaane .thito''ti sattavassikakaaleyeva upasampaadesi. thero upasampannakaalato pa.t.thaaya raajagaha.m upanissaaya viharantaana.m sabbabhikkhuuna.m senaasanaani ca pa~n~naapeti, bhikkha~nca uddisati. tassa senaasanapa~n~naapakabhaavo sabbadisaasu paaka.to ahosi -- ``dabbo kira mallaputto sabhaagasabhaagaana.m bhikkhuuna.m eka.t.thaane senaasanaani pa~n~naapeti, aasannepi duurepi senaasana.m pa~n~naapeti, gantu.m asakkonte iddhiyaa netii''ti.

[01] atha na.m bhikkhuu kaalepi vikaalepi -- ``amhaaka.m, aavuso, jiivakambavane senaasana.m pa~n~naapehi, amhaaka.m maddakucchismi.m migadaaye''ti eva.m senaasana.m uddisaapetvaa tassa iddhi.m passantaa gacchanti. sopi iddhiyaa manomaye kaaye abhisa"nkharitvaa ekekassa therassa ekeka.m attanaa sadisa.m bhikkhu.m datvaa a"nguliyaa jalamaanaaya purato gantvaa ``aya.m ma~nco ida.m pii.tha''ntiaadiini vatvaa senaasana.m pa~n~naapetvaa puna attano vasana.t.thaanameva aagacchati ^a^M1.0051^ea^. ayamettha sa"nkhepo, vitthaarato panida.m vatthu paa.liya.m aagatameva. satthaa idameva kaara.na.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa aparabhaage ariyaga.namajjhe nisinno thera.m senaasanapa~n~naapakaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesi -- ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m senaasanapa~n~naapakaana.m yadida.m dabbo mallaputto''ti (a0 ni0 1.209; 214). vuttampi ceta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.54, 108-149) --
[22] taavataa ti.t.thamaano so, taaresi janata.m bahu.m..
[22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
[22] sabbattha sukhito aasi.m, tassa kammassa vaahasaa..
[22] kassapo naama gottena, uppajji vadata.m varo..
[22] na su.nissaama saddhamma.m, aho no appapu~n~nataa..
[22] saagaro ca sasokova, vinadii karu.na.m gira.m..
[22] sadhuumaa jaalava.t.taa ca, ravi.msu karu.na.m migaa..
[22] sa.mviggaa bhikkhavo satta, cintayimha maya.m tadaa..
[22] tasmaa payogo kattabbo, yaava .thaati mune mata.m..
[22] aha~nca pakkusaati ca, sabhiyo baahiyo tathaa..
[22] maataa mataa citaaru.lhaa, tato nippatito aha.m..
[22] jino tasmi.m gu.ne tu.t.tho, etadagge .thapesi ma.m..
[22] tisso vijjaa anuppattaa, kata.m buddhassa saasana.m..

[03] eva.mbhuuta.m ^a^P1.0045^ea^ pana ta.m yena pubbe ekassa khii.naasavattherassa anuddha.msanavasena katena paapakammena bahuuni vassasatasahassaani niraye pacci, taaya eva kammapilotikaaya codiyamaanaa mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu ``iminaa maya.m kalyaa.nabhattikassa gahapatino antare paribheditaa''ti duggahitagaahino amuulakena paaraajikena dhammena anuddha.msesu.m. tasmi~nca adhikara.ne sa"nghena sativinayena vuupasamite aya.m thero lokaanukampaaya attano gu.ne vibhaavento ^b^``yo duddamiyo''^eb^ti ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^yo^eb^ti aniyamitaniddeso, tassa ``so''ti iminaa niyamatta.m da.t.thabba.m. ubhayenapi a~n~na.m viya katvaa attaanameva vadati. ^b^duddamiyo^eb^ti duddamo, dametu.m asakku.neyyo. ida~nca attano puthujjanakaale di.t.thigataana.m visuukaayikaana.m kilesaana.m madaalepacittassa vipphandita.m indriyaana.m avuupasamana~nca cintetvaa vadati. ^b^damenaa^eb^ti uttamena aggamaggadamena, tena hi danto puna dametabbataabhaavato ``danto''ti vattabbata.m arahati, na a~n~nena. atha vaa ^b^damenaa^eb^ti damakena purisadammasaarathinaa damito ^a^M1.0055^ea^. ^b^dabbo^eb^ti drabyo, bhabboti attho. tenaaha bhagavaa imameva thera.m sandhaaya -- ``na kho, dabba, dabbaa eva.m nibbe.thentii''ti (paaraa0 384; cuu.lava0 193) ^a^V1.0045^ea^. ^b^santusito^eb^ti yathaaladdhapaccayasantosena jhaanasamaapattisantosena maggaphalasantosena ca santu.t.tho. ^b^viti.n.naka"nkho^eb^ti so.lasavatthukaaya a.t.thavatthukaaya ca ka"nkhaaya pa.thamamaggeneva samugghaa.titattaa vigataka"nkho. ^b^vijitaavii^eb^ti purisaajaaniiyena vijetabbassa sabbassapi sa.mkilesapakkhassa vijitattaa vidhamitattaa vijitaavii. ^b^apetabheravo^eb^ti pa~ncaviisatiyaa bhayaana.m sabbaso apetattaa apagatabheravo abhayuuparato ^a^P1.0046^ea^. puna ^b^dabbo^eb^ti naamakittana.m. ^b^parinibbuto^eb^ti dve parinibbaanaani kilesaparinibbaana~nca, yaa saupaadisesanibbaanadhaatu, khandhaparinibbaana~nca, yaa anupaadisesanibbaanadhaatu. tesu idha kilesaparinibbaana.m adhippeta.m, tasmaa pahaatabbadhammaana.m maggena sabbaso pahiinattaa kilesaparinibbaanena parinibbutoti attho. ^b^.thitatto^eb^ti .thitasabhaavo acalo i.t.thaadiisu taadibhaavappattiyaa lokadhammehi akampaniiyo. ^b^hii^eb^ti ca hetuatthe nipaato, tena yo pubbe duddamo hutvaa .thito yasmaa dabbattaa satthaaraa uttamena damena damito santusito viti.n.naka"nkho vijitaavii apetabheravo, tasmaa so dabbo parinibbuto tatoyeva ca .thitatto, eva.mbhuute ca tasmi.m cittapasaadova kaatabbo, na pasaada~n~nathattanti paraneyyabuddhike satte anukampanto thero a~n~na.m byaakaasi.

[03] ^b^yo siitavana^eb^nti aayasmato sambhuutattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ito kira a.t.thaarasaadhikassa kappasatassa matthake atthadassii naama sambuddho loke uppajjitvaa sadevaka.m loka.m sa.msaaramahoghato taarento ekadivasa.m mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m ga"ngaatiira.m upagacchi. tasmi.m kaale aya.m gahapatikule nibbatto tattha bhagavanta.m passitvaa pasannamaanaso upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa ``ki.m, bhante, paara.m gantukaamatthaa''ti pucchi. bhagavaa ``gamissaamaa''ti avoca. so taavadeva naavaasa"nghaa.ta.m ^a^M1.0056^ea^ yojetvaa upanesi. satthaa ta.m anukampanto saha bhikkhusa"nghena naava.m abhiruhi. so sayampi abhiruyha sukheneva paratiira.m sampaapetvaa bhagavanta.m bhikkhusa"ngha~nca dutiyadivase mahaadaana.m pavattetvaa anugantvaa pasannacitto vanditvaa nivatti. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaritvaa ito ^a^P1.0047^ea^ terasaadhikakappasatassa matthake khattiyakule nibbattitvaa raajaa ahosi cakkavattii dhammiko dhammaraajaa. so satte sugatimagge pati.t.thaapetvaa tato cuto ekanavutikappe vipassissa bhagavato saasane pabbajitvaa dhutadhamme samaadaaya susaane vasanto sama.nadhamma.m akaasi. puna kassapassa bhagavato kaalepi tassa saasane tiihi sahaayehi saddhi.m ^a^V1.0046^ea^ pabbajitvaa viisativassasahassaani sama.nadhamma.m katvaa eka.m buddhantara.m devamanussesu sa.msaritvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe braahma.namahaasaalassa putto hutvaa nibbatti. tassa ``sambhuuto''ti naama.m aka.msu. so vayappatto braahma.nasippesu nipphatti.m gato. bhuumijo jeyyaseno abhiraadhanoti tiihi sahaayehi saddhi.m bhagavato santika.m gato dhammadesana.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbaji. ye sandhaaya vutta.m --

[03] atha sambhuuto bhagavato santike kaayagataasatikamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa nibaddha.m siitavane vasati. tenevaayasmaa ``siitavaniyo''ti pa~n~naayittha. tena ca samayena vessava.no mahaaraajaa kenacideva kara.niiyena jambudiipe dakkhi.nadisaabhaaga.m uddissa aakaasena gacchanto thera.m abbhokaase nisiiditvaa kamma.t.thaana.m manasikaronta.m disvaa vimaanato oruyha thera.m vanditvaa, ``yadaa thero samaadhito vu.t.thahissati, tadaa mama aagamana.m aarocetha, aarakkha~ncassa karothaa''ti dve yakkhe aa.naapetvaa pakkaami. te therassa samiipe .thatvaa manasikaara.m pa.tisa.mharitvaa nisinnakaale aarocesu.m. ta.m sutvaa thero ``tumhe mama vacanena vessava.namahaaraajassa kathetha, bhagavataa attano saasane .thitaana.m satiaarakkhaa naama .thapitaa atthi, saayeva maadise rakkhati, tva.m tattha appossukko hohi, bhagavato ovaade .thitaana.m edisaaya aarakkhaaya ^a^M1.0057^ea^ kara.niiya.m natthii''ti te vissajjetvaa taavadeva vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa vijjaattaya.m sacchaakaasi. tato vessava.no nivattamaano therassa ^a^P1.0048^ea^ samiipa.m patvaa mukhaakaarasallakkha.nenevassa katakiccabhaava.m ~natvaa saavatthi.m gantvaa bhagavato aarocetvaa satthu sammukhaa thera.m abhitthavanto --
[25] imaaya gaathaaya therassa gu.ne va.n.nesi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.21.15-20) --
[21] ``pacchime ca bhave asmi.m, jaatoha.m braahma.ne kule.
[22] saddhi.m tiihi sahaayehi, pabbaji.m satthu saasane..

[03] athaayasmaa sambhuuto bhagavanta.m dassanaaya gacchante bhikkhuu disvaa ``aavuso, mama vacanena bhagavato paade sirasaa vandatha, eva~nca vadethaa''ti vatvaa dhammaadhikara.na.m attano satthu avihe.thitabhaava.m pakaasento ^b^``yo siitavana''^eb^nti gaathamaaha. te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa sambhuutattherassa saasana.m sampavedentaa, ``aayasmaa, bhante, sambhuuto bhagavato paade sirasaa vandati, eva~nca vadatii''ti vatvaa ta.m gaatha.m aarocesu.m, ta.m sutvaa bhagavaa ``pa.n.dito, bhikkhave, sambhuuto ^a^M1.0058^ea^ bhikkhu paccapaadi dhammassaanudhamma.m, na ca ma.m dhammaadhikara.na.m vihe.theti. vessava.nena tassattho mayha.m aarocitaa''ti aaha.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ya.m pana te bhikkhuu sambhuutattherena vutta.m ^b^``yo siitavana''^eb^nti gaatha.m satthu nivedesu.m. tattha ^b^siitavana^eb^nti eva.mnaamaka.m raajagahasamiipe mahanta.m bheravasusaanavana.m. ^b^upagaa^eb^ti nivaasanavasena upagacchi. etena bhagavataa anu~n~naata.m pabbajitaanuruupa.m nivaasana.t.thaana.m dasseti. ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti sa.msaarabhayassa ikkhanato bhinnakilesataaya ca bhikkhu. ^b^eko^eb^ti adutiyo, etena kaayaviveka.m dasseti. ^b^santusito^eb^ti santu.t.tho. etena catupaccayasantosalakkha.na.m ariyava.msa.m dasseti. ^b^samaahitatto^eb^ti upacaarappanaabhedena samaadhinaa samaahitacitto, etena cittavivekabhaavanaamukhena bhaavanaaraama.m ^a^P1.0049^ea^ ariyava.msa.m dasseti. ^b^vijitaavii^eb^ti saasane sammaapa.tipajjantena vijetabba.m kilesaga.na.m vijitvaa .thito, etena upadhiviveka.m dasseti. bhayahetuuna.m kilesaana.m apagatattaa ^b^apetalomaha.mso,^eb^ etena sammaapa.tipattiyaa phala.m dasseti. ^b^rakkha^eb^nti rakkhanto. ^b^kaayagataasati^eb^nti kaayaaramma.na.m sati.m, kaayagataasatikamma.t.thaana.m paribruuhanavasena avissajjento. ^b^dhitimaa^eb^ti dhiiro, samaahitatta.m vijitaavibhaavata.m vaa upaadaaya pa.tipattidassanameta.m. aya~nhettha sa"nkhepattho -- so bhikkhu vivekasukhaanupekkhaaya eko siitavana.m upaagami, upaagato ca lolabhaavaabhaavato santu.t.tho dhitimaa kaayagataasatikamma.t.thaana.m bhaavento tathaadhigata.m jhaana.m paadaka.m katvaa aaraddhavipassana.m ^a^V1.0048^ea^ ussukkaapetvaa adhigatena aggamaggena samaahito vijitaavii ca hutvaa katakiccataaya bhayahetuuna.m sabbaso apagatattaa apetalomaha.mso jaatoti.

[03] ^b^yopaanudii^eb^ti ^a^M1.0059^ea^ aayasmato bhalliyattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira ito ekati.mse kappe anuppanne buddhe sumanassa naama paccekabuddhassa pasannacitto phalaaphala.m datvaa sugatiisu eva sa.msaranto sikhissa sammaasambuddhassa kaale aru.navatiinagare braahma.nakule nibbatto ``sikhissa bhagavato pa.thamaabhisambuddhassa ujita, ojitaa naama dve satthavaahaputtaa pa.thamaahaara.m ada.msuu''ti sutvaa attano sahaayakena saddhi.m bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa svaatanaaya nimantetvaa mahaadaana.m pavattetvaa patthana.m aka.msu -- ``ubhopi maya.m, bhante, anaagate tumhaadisassa buddhassa pa.thamaahaaradaayakaa bhaveyyaamaa''ti. te ^a^P1.0050^ea^ tattha tattha bhave pu~n~nakamma.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msarantaa kassapassa bhagavato kaale gopaalakase.t.thissa puttaa bhaataro hutvaa nibbattaa. bahuuni vassaani bhikkhusa"ngha.m khiirabhojanena upa.t.thahi.msu. amhaaka.m pana bhagavato kaale pokkharavatiinagare satthavaahassa puttaa bhaataro hutvaa nibbattaa. tesu je.t.tho taphusso naama, kani.t.tho bhalliyo naama, te pa~ncamattaani saka.tasataani bha.n.dassa puuretvaa vaa.nijjaaya gacchantaa bhagavati pa.thamaabhisambuddhe sattasattaaha.m vimuttisukhadhammapaccavekkha.naahi viitinaametvaa a.t.thame sattaahe raajaayatanamuule viharante raajaayatanassa aviduure mahaamaggena atikkamanti, tesa.m tasmi.m samaye samepi bhuumibhaage akaddamodake saka.taani nappavatti.msu, ``ki.m nu, kho, kaara.na''nti ca cintentaana.m poraa.nasaalohitaa devataa rukkhavi.tapantare attaana.m dassentii aaha -- ``maadisaa, aya.m bhagavaa aciraabhisambuddho sattasattaaha.m anaahaaro vimuttisukhaapa.tisa.mvedii idaani raajaayatanamuule nisinno, ta.m aahaarena pa.timaanetha, yadassa tumhaaka.m diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti. ta.m sutvaa te u.laara.m piitisomanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedentaa, ``aahaarasampaadana.m papa~nca''nti ma~n~namaanaa mantha~nca madhupi.n.dika~nca bhagavato datvaa dvevaacikasara.na.m gantvaa kesadhaatuyo labhitvaa agama.msu. te hi pa.thama.m upaasakaa ahesu.m. atha bhagavati baaraa.nasi.m gantvaa dhammacakka.m pavattetvaa anupubbena raajagahe viharante taphussabhalliyaa raajagaha.m upagataa ^a^M1.0060^ea^ bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. tesa.m bhagavaa dhamma.m desesi. tesu taphusso ^a^V1.0049^ea^ sotaapattiphale pati.t.thaaya upaasakova ahosi. bhalliyo pana pabbajitvaa cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.48.66-70) --
[21] ``ekati.mse ito kappe, ya.m phala.m adadi.m tadaa.
[03] athekadivasa.m maaro bhalliyattherassa bhi.msaapanattha.m bhayaanaka.m ruupa.m dassesi. so attano sabbabhayaatikkama.m pakaasento ^b^``yopaanudii''^eb^ti gaathamabhaasi.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^yopaanudii^eb^ti yo apaanudi khipi pajahi viddha.msesi. ^b^maccuraajassaa^eb^ti ^b^maccu^eb^ naama mara.na.m khandhaana.m bhedo, so eva ca sattaana.m attano vase anuvattaapanato issara.t.thena ^b^raajaa^eb^ti maccuraajaa, tassa. ^b^sena^eb^nti jaraarogaadi.m, saa hissa vasavattane a"ngabhaavato senaa naama, tena hesa mahataa naanaavidhena vipulena ``mahaaseno''ti vuccati. yathaaha -- ``na hi no sa"ngara.m tena, mahaasenena maccunaa''ti (ma0 ni0 1.272; jaa0 2.22.121; netti0 103). atha vaa gu.namaara.na.t.thena ``maccuu''ti idha devaputtamaaro adhippeto, tassa ca sahaayabhaavuupagamanato kaamaadayo senaa. tathaa caaha --
[21] ``kaamaa te pa.thamaa senaa, dutiyaa arati vuccati.
[22] tatiyaa khuppipaasaa te, catutthii ta.nhaa pavuccati..
[22] sattamii vicikicchaa te, maano makkho ca a.t.thamii''ti.. (su0 ni0 438-439; mahaani0 28;cuu.lani0 nandamaa.navapucchaaniddesa 47).

[03] ^b^na.lasetu.mva^eb^ ^a^M1.0061^ea^ ^b^sudubbala.m mahogho^eb^ti saaravirahitato na.lasetusadisa.m ativiya abalabhaavato su.t.thu dubbala.m sa.mkilesasena.m navalokuttaradhammaana.m mahaabalavabhaavato mahoghasadisena aggamaggena yo apaanudi ^a^V1.0050^ea^ vijitaavii apetabheravo danto, so parinibbuto .thitattoti yojanaa. ta.m sutvaa maaro ``jaanaati ma.m sama.no''ti tatthevantaradhaayiiti.

[03] ^b^yo^eb^ ^a^P1.0052^ea^ ^b^duddamiyo^eb^ti aayasmato viirattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira ito ekanavute kappe vipassissa bhagavato vasanaaavaasa.m pa.tijaggi. ekadivasa~nca sindhuvaarapupphasadisaani niggu.n.thipupphaani gahetvaa bhagavanta.m puujesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto ito pa~ncati.mse kappe khattiyakule nibbattitvaa mahaapataapo naama raajaa ahosi cakkavattii. so dhammena samena rajja.m kaarento satte saggamagge pati.t.thaapesi. puna imasmi.m kappe kassapassa bhagavato kaale mahaavibhavo se.t.thi hutvaa kapa.naddhikaadiina.m daana.m dento sa"nghassa khiirabhatta.m adaasi. eva.m tattha tattha daanamaya.m pu~n~nasambhaara.m karonto itara~nca nibbaanattha.m sambharanto devamanussesu sa.msaritvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthinagare ra~n~no pasenadissa amaccakule nibbatti, ``viiro''tissa naama.m aka.msu. so vayappatto naamaanugatehi pattabalajavaadigu.nehi samannaagato sa"ngaamasuuro hutvaa maataapituuhi nibandhavasena kaarite daarapariggahe eka.myeva putta.m labhitvaa pubbahetunaa codiyamaano kaamesu sa.msaare ca aadiinava.m disvaa sa.mvegajaato pabbajitvaa gha.tento vaayamanto nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.21.21-24) --

[03] eva.m pana arahatta.m patvaa phalasamaapattisukhena viitinaamenta.m thera.m puraa.nadutiyikaa uppabbaajetukaamaa ^a^V1.0051^ea^ antarantaraa naanaanayehi palobhetu.m parakkamantii ekadivasa.m divaavihaara.t.thaana.m gantvaa itthikuttaadiini dassetu.m aarabhi. athaayasmaa viiro ``ma.m palobhetukaamaa sineru.m makasapakkhavaatena caaletukaamaa viya yaava baalaa vataaya.m ^a^P1.0053^ea^ itthii''ti tassaa kiriyaaya niratthakabhaava.m diipento ^b^``yo duddamiyo''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^yo duddamiyo^eb^tiaadiina.m padaana.m attho he.t.thaa vuttoyeva. ida.m panettha yojanaamatta.m ^b^yo^eb^ pubbe adanta kilesataaya paccatthikehi vaa sa"ngamasiise dametu.m jetu.m asakku.neyyataaya^b^duddamiyo,^eb^ idaani pana uttamena damena danto catubbidhasammappamadhaanaviiriyasampattiyaa ^b^viiro,^eb^ vuttanayeneva santusito viti.n.naka"nkho vijitaavii apetalomaha.mso ^b^viiro^eb^ viiranaamako anavasesato kilesaparinibbaanena ^b^parinibbuto,^eb^ tato eva .thitasabhaavo, na taadisaana.m satenapi sahassenapi caalaniiyoti. ta.m sutvaa saa itthii -- ``mayha.m saamike eva.m pa.tipanne ko mayha.m gharaavaasena attho''ti sa.mvegajaataa bhikkhuniisu pabbajitvaa nacirasseva tevijjaa ahosiiti.

[03] ^b^svaagata^eb^nti ^a^M1.0063^ea^ aayasmato pilindavacchattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiinagare mahaabhogakule nibbatto he.t.thaa vuttanayeneva satthu santike dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m devataana.m piyamanaapabhaavena agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthetvaa yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa tato cuto devamanussesu sa.msaranto sumedhassa bhagavato kaale manussaloke nibbattitvaa bhagavati parinibbute satthu thuupassa puuja.m katvaa sa"nghe ca mahaadaana.m pavattetvaa tato cuto devamanussesu eva sa.msaranto anuppanne buddhe cakkavattii raajaa hutvaa mahaajana.m pa~ncasu siilesu pati.t.thaapetvaa saggaparaaya.na.m akaasi. so anuppanneyeva amhaaka.m bhagavati saavatthiya.m braahma.nagehe nibbatti. ``pilindo''tissa naama.m aka.msu. vacchoti pana gotta.m ^a^P1.0054^ea^. tena so aparabhaage ``pilindavaccho''ti pa~n~naayittha. sa.msaare pana sa.mvegabahulataaya paribbaajakapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa cuu.lagandhaara.m naama vijja.m saadhetvaa taaya vijjaaya aakaasacaarii paracittaviduu ca hutvaa raajagahe laabhaggayasaggappatto pa.tivasati.

[03] atha ^a^V1.0052^ea^ yadaa amhaaka.m bhagavaa abhisambuddho hutvaa anukkamena raajagaha.m upagato, tato pa.t.thaaya buddhaanubhaavena tassa saa vijjaa na sampajjati, attano kicca.m na saadheti. so cintesi -- ``suta.m kho pana meta.m aacariyapaacariyaana.m bhaasamaanaana.m `yattha mahaagandhaaravijjaa dharati, tattha cuu.lagandhaaravijjaa na sampajjatii'ti, sama.nassa pana gotamassa aagatakaalato pa.t.thaaya naaya.m mama vijjaa sampajjati, nissa.msaya.m sama.no gotamo mahaagandhaaravijja.m jaanaati, ya.mnuunaaha.m ta.m payirupaasitvaa tassa santike ta.m vijja.m pariyaapu.neyya''nti. so bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa etadavoca -- ``aha.m, mahaasama.na, tava santike eka.m vijja.m pariyaapu.nitukaamo, okaasa.m me karohii''ti. bhagavaa ``tena hi pabbajaa''ti aaha. so ``vijjaaya parikamma.m pabbajjaa''ti ma~n~namaano pabbaji. tassa bhagavaa dhamma.m kathetvaa caritaanukuula.m kamma.t.thaana.m adaasi. so upanissayasampannataaya nacirasseva vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. yaa pana purimajaatiya.m ^a^M1.0064^ea^ tassovaade .thatvaa sagge nibbattaa devataa, ta.m kata~n~nuta.m nissaaya sa~njaatabahumaanaa saaya.m paata.m thera.m payirupaasitvaa gacchanti. tasmaa thero devataana.m piyamanaapataaya aggata.m patto. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.2.55-67) --
[22] sumedho naama naamena, anumodittha so tadaa..
[21] ``na te biija.m pavappanti, napi niiyanti na"ngalaa.
[21] ``na ma.m mittaa amittaa vaa, hi.msanti sabbapaa.nino.

[03] tathaa devataahi ativiya piyaayitabbabhaavato ima.m thera.m bhagavaa devataana.m piyamanaapabhaavena agga.t.thaane .thapesi -- ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m devataana.m piyamanaapaana.m yadida.m pilindavaccho''ti (a0 ni0 1.209, 215) so ^a^P1.0055^ea^ ekadivasa.m bhikkhusa"nghamajjhe nisinno attano gu.ne paccavekkhitvaa tesa.m kaara.nabhuuta.m vijjaanimitta.m bhagavato santike aagamana.m pasa.msanto ^b^``svaagata.m naapagata''^eb^nti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^svaagata^eb^nti sundara.m aagamana.m, ida.m mamaati sambandho. atha vaa ^b^svaagata^eb^nti su.t.thu aagata.m, mayaati vibhatti vipari.naametabbaa. ^b^naapagata^eb^nti na apagata.m hitaabhivuddhito na apeta.m. ^b^nayida.m dumantita.m mamaa^eb^ti ida.m mama du.t.thu kathita.m, du.t.thu vaa viima.msita.m na hoti. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- ya.m bhagavato santike mamaagamana.m, ya.m vaa mayaa tattha aagata.m, ta.m svaagata.m, svaagatattaayeva na duraagata.m. ya.m ``bhagavato santike dhamma.m sutvaa pabbajissaamii''ti mama mantita.m gadita.m kathita.m, cittena vaa viima.msita.m idampi na dummantinti. idaani tattha kaara.na.m dassento ^b^``sa.mvibhattesuu''^eb^tiaadimaaha. ^b^sa.mvibhattesuu^eb^ti pakaarato vibhattesu. ^b^dhammesuu^eb^ti ~neyyadhammesu samathadhammesu vaa, naanaatitthiyehi pakatiaadivasena, sammaasambuddhehi dukkhaadivasena sa.mvibhajitvaa vuttadhammesu. ^b^ya.m se.t.tha.m tadupaagami^eb^nti ya.m tattha se.t.tha.m, ta.m catusaccadhamma.m, tassa vaa bodhaka.m saasanadhamma.m upaagami.m, ``aya.m dhammo aya.m vinayo''ti upagacchi.m. sammaasambuddhehi eva vaa kusalaadivasena khandhaadivasena yathaasabhaavato sa.mvibhattesu sabhaavadhammesu ya.m tattha se.t.tha.m uttama.m pavara.m, ta.m maggaphalanibbaanadhamma.m upaagami.m, attapaccakkhato upagacchi.m sacchaakaasi.m, tasmaa svaagata.m mama na apagata.m sumantita.m na dummantitanti yojanaa.

[03] ^b^vihari^eb^ ^a^M1.0066^ea^ ^a^V1.0054^ea^ ^a^P1.0056^ea^ ^b^apekkha^eb^nti aayasmato pu.n.namaasattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? so kira vipassissa bhagavato kaale cakkavaakayoniya.m nibbatto bhagavanta.m gacchanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso attano mukhatu.n.dakena saalapuppha.m gahetvaa puuja.m akaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto ito sattarase kappe a.t.thakkhattu.m cakkavattii raajaa ahosi. imasmi.m pana kappe kassapassa bhagavato saasane osakkamaane ku.tumbiyakule nibbattitvaa pabbajitvaa sama.nadhamma.m katvaa tato cuto devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthinagare samiddhissa naama braahma.nassa putto hutvaa nibbatti. tassa jaatadivase tasmi.m gehe sabbaa rittakumbhiyo suva.n.namaasaana.m pu.n.naa ahesu.m. tenassa ^b^pu.n.namaaso^eb^ti naama.m aka.msu. so vayappatto braahma.navijjaasu nipphatti.m patvaa vivaahakamma.m katvaa eka.m putta.m labhitvaa upanissayasampannataaya gharaavaasa.m jigucchanto bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa laddhuupasampado pubbakiccasampanno catusaccakamma.t.thaane yuttappayutto vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.7.13-19) --
[22] tena cittappasaadena, duggati.m so na gacchati..

[03] athassa puraa.nadutiyikaa ta.m palobhetukaamaa ala"nkatapa.tiyattaa puttena saddhi.m upagantvaa piyaalaapabhaavaadikehi ^a^V1.0055^ea^ bhaavavivara.nakamma.m naama kaatu.m aarabhi. thero tassaa kaara.na.m disvaa attano katthacipi alaggabhaava.m pakaasento ^b^``vihari apekkha''^eb^nti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^viharii^eb^ti visesato hari apahari apanesi. ^b^apekkha^eb^nti ta.nha.m. ^b^idhaa^eb^ti imasmi.m loke attabhaave vaa. ^b^hura^eb^nti aparasmi.m anaagate attabhaave vaa. ^b^idhaa^eb^ti vaa ajjhattikesu aayatanesu. ^b^hura^eb^nti baahiresu ^a^P1.0057^ea^. ^b^vaa^eb^-saddo samuccayattho ``apadaa vaa dvipadaa vaa''tiaadiisu (itivu0 90; a0 ni0 4.34; 5.32) viya. ^b^yo^eb^ti attaanameva para.m viya dasseti. ^b^vedaguu^eb^ti vedena gato magga~naa.nena nibbaana.m gato adhigato, cattaari vaa saccaani pari~n~naapahaanasacchikiriyaabhaavanaabhisamayavasena abhisamecca .thito. ^b^yatatto^eb^ti maggasa.mvarena sa.myatasabhaavo, sammaavaayaamena vaa sa.myatasabhaavo. ^b^sabbesu dhammesu anuupalitto^eb^ti sabbesu aaramma.nesu dhammesu ta.nhaadi.t.thilepavasena na upalitto, tena laabhaadilokadhamme samatikkama.m dasseti. ^b^lokassaa^eb^ti upaadaanakkhandhapa~ncakassa. ta~nhi lujjanapalujjana.t.thena loko. ^b^ja~n~naa^eb^ti jaanitvaa. ^b^udayabbaya~ncaa^eb^ti uppaada~nceva vaya~nca, etena yathaavuttagu.naana.m pubbabhaagapa.tipada.m dasseti. aya.m panettha attho -- yo sakalassa khandhaadilokassa samapa~n~naasaaya aakaarehi udayabbaya.m jaanitvaa vedaguu yatatto katthaci anupalitto, so sabbattha apekkha.m vineyya santusito taadisaana.m vippakaaraana.m na ki~nci ma~n~nati, tasmaa tva.m andhabaale yathaagatamaggeneva gacchaati. atha saa itthii ``aya.m sama.no mayi putte ca nirapekkho, na sakkaa ima.m palobhetu''nti pakkaami.

[03] ^b^paamojjabahulo^eb^ti ^a^M1.0068^ea^ ^a^V1.0056^ea^ aayasmato cuu.lavacchattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? so kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale daliddakule nibbattitvaa paresa.m bhatiyaa jiivika.m kappento bhagavato saavaka.m sujaata.m naama thera.m pa.msukuula.m pariyesanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso upasa"nkamitvaa vattha.m datvaa pa~ncapati.t.thitena vandi. so tena pu~n~nakammena tetti.msakkhattu.m devarajja.m kaaresi. sattasattatikkhattu.m cakkavattii raajaa ^a^P1.0058^ea^ ahosi. anekavaara.m padesaraajaa. eva.m devamanussesu sa.msaranto kassapassa bhagavato saasane osakkamaane pabbajitvaa sama.nadhamma.m katvaa eka.m buddhantara.m devamanussagatiisu aparaapara.m parivattanto amhaaka.m bhagavato kaale kosambiya.m braahma.nakule nibbatti. ^b^cuu.lavaccho^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vayappatto braahma.nasippesu nipphatti.m gato buddhagu.ne sutvaa pasannamaanaso bhagavanta.m upasa"nkami, tassa bhagavaa dhamma.m kathesi. so pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa laddhuupasampado katapubbakicco caritaanukuula.m kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa bhaavento vihari. tena ca samayena kosambikaa bhikkhuu bha.n.danajaataa ahesu.m. tadaa cuu.lavacchatthero ubhayesa.m bhikkhuuna.m laddhi.m anaadaaya bhagavataa dinnovaade .thatvaa vipassana.m bruuhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.50.31-40) --

[03] atha cuu.lavacchatthero arahatta.m patvaa tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m kalahaabhiratiyaa sakatthavinaasa.m disvaa dhammasa.mvegappatto, attano ca pattavisesa.m paccavekkhitvaa piitisomanassavasena ^b^``paamojjabahulo''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^paamojjabahulo^eb^ti suparisuddhasiilataaya vippa.tisaaraabhaavato adhikusalesu dhammesu abhirativasena pamodabahulo. tenevaaha ^b^``dhamme buddhappavedite''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^dhamme^eb^ti. sattati.msaaya bodhipakkhiyadhamme navavidhe vaa lokuttaradhamme. so hi sabba~n~nubuddhena saamukka.msikaaya desanaaya pakaasitattaa saatisaya.m buddhappavedito naama. tassa pana adhigamuupaayabhaavato desanaadhammopi idha labbhateva. ^b^pada.m santa^eb^nti nibbaana.m sandhaaya vadati. evaruupo hi bhikkhu santa.m pada.m santa.m ko.t.thaasa.m sabbasa"nkhaaraana.m upasamabhaavato ^b^sa"nkhaaruupasama.m^eb^ paramasukhataaya ^b^sukha.m^eb^ nibbaana.m adhigacchati vindatiyeva. parisuddhasiilo hi bhikkhu vippa.tisaaraabhaavena paamojjabahulo saddhamme yuttappayutto vimuttipariyosaanaa sabbasampattiyo paapu.naati. yathaaha -- ``avippa.tisaaratthaani kho ^a^P1.0059^ea^, aananda, kusalaani siilaani, avippa.tisaaro paamojjatthaayaa''tiaadi (a0 ni0 10.1). atha vaa ^b^paamojjabahulo^eb^ti sammaasambuddho bhagavaa, svaakkhaato dhammo, suppa.tipanno sa"nghoti ratanattaya.m sandhaaya pamodabahulo. tattha pana so pamodabahulo ki.m vaa karotiiti aaha ``dhamme buddhappavedite''tiaadi. saddhaasampannassa hi sappurisasa.msevanasaddhammassavanayonisomanasikaaradhammaanudhammapa.tipattiina.m sukheneva sambhavato sampattiyo hatthagataa ^a^M1.0070^ea^ eva honti, yathaaha -- ``saddhaajaato upasa"nkamati, upasa"nkamanto payirupaasatii''tiaadi (ma0 ni0 2.183).

[03] ^b^pa~n~naabalii^eb^ti ^a^V1.0058^ea^ aayasmato mahaavacchattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarassa bhagavato bhikkhusa"nghassa ca paaniiyadaanamadaasi. puna sikhissa bhagavato kaale upaasako hutvaa viva.t.tuupanissaya.m bahu.m pu~n~nakamma.m akaasi, so tehi pu~n~nakammehi tattha tattha sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade magadhara.t.the naa.lakagaame samiddhissa naama braahma.nassa putto hutvaa nibbatti. tassa ^b^mahaavaccho^eb^ti naama.m ahosi. so vayappatto aayasmato saariputtassa bhagavato saavakabhaava.m sutvaa ``sopi naama mahaapa~n~no. yassa saavakatta.m upaagato, so eva ma~n~ne imasmi.m loke aggapuggalo''ti bhagavati saddha.m uppaadetvaa satthu santike pabbajitvaa kamma.t.thaana.m anuyu~njanto nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.50.51-56) --
[03] eva.m ^a^P1.0060^ea^ pana arahatta.m patvaa vimuttisukha.m anubhavanto saasanassa niyyaanikabhaavavibhaavanena sabrahmacaariina.m ussaahajananattha.m ^b^``pa~n~naabalii''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M1.0071^ea^ ^b^pa~n~naabalii^eb^ti paarihaariyapa~n~naaya vipassanaapa~n~naaya ca vasena abhi.nhaso saatisayena pa~n~naabalena samannaagato. ^b^siilavatuupapanno^eb^ti ukka.msagatena catupaarisuddhisiilena, dhutadhammasa"nkhaatehi vatehi ca upapanno samannaagato. ^b^samaahito^eb^ti upacaarappanaabhedena samaadhinaa samaahito. ^b^jhaanarato^eb^ti tato eva aaramma.nuupanijjhaane lakkha.nuupanijjhaane ca rato satataabhiyutto. sabbakaala.m satiyaa avippavaasavasena ^b^satimaa. yadatthiya^eb^nti atthato anapeta.m atthiya.m, yena atthiya.m yadatthiya.m. yathaa paccaye paribhu~njantassa paribhu~njana.m atthiya.m hoti, tathaa ^a^V1.0059^ea^ ^b^bhojana.m bhu~njamaano^eb^. saamiparibhogena hi ta.m atthiya.m hoti daayajjaparibhogena vaa, na a~n~nathaa bhojananti ca nidassanamatta.m da.t.thabba.m. bhu~njiyati paribhu~njiyatiiti vaa bhojana.m, cattaaro paccayaa. ``yadatthika''nti vaa paa.tho. yadattha.m yassatthaaya satthaaraa paccayaa anu~n~naataa, tadattha.m kaayassa .thitiaadiattha.m, ta~nca anupaadisesanibbaanattha.m. tasmaa anupaadaaparinibbaanattha.m bhojanapaccaye bhu~njamaano tato eva ^b^ka"nkhetha kaala.m^eb^ attano anupaadaaparinibbaanakaala.m aagameyya. ^b^idha^eb^ imasmi.m saasane ^b^viitaraago^eb^. baahirakassa pana kaamesu viitaraagassa ida.m natthiiti adhippaayo.

[03] ^b^niilabbhava.n.naa^eb^ti aayasmato vanavacchattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? so kira atthadassino bhagavato kaale kacchapayoniya.m nibbatto vinataaya naama nadiyaa vasati. tassa khuddakanaavappamaa.no attabhaavo ahosi. so kira ekadivasa.m bhagavanta.m ^a^P1.0061^ea^ nadiyaa tiire .thita.m disvaa, ``paara.m gantukaamo ma~n~ne bhagavaa''ti attano pi.t.thiya.m aaropetvaa netukaamo paadamuule nipajji. bhagavaa tassa ajjhaasaya.m ~natvaa ta.m anukampanto aaruhi. so piitisomanassajaato sota.m chindanto jiyaaya vegena khittasaro viya taavadeva paratiira.m paapesi. bhagavaa tassa pu~n~nassa phala.m etarahi nibbattanakasampatti~nca byaakaritvaa pakkaami. so ^a^M1.0072^ea^ tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto anekasatakkhattu.m taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa ara~n~navaasiiyeva ahosi. puna kassapabuddhakaale kapotayoniya.m nibbattitvaa ara~n~ne viharanta.m mettaavihaari.m eka.m bhikkhu.m disvaa citta.m pasaadesi.

[03] tato pana cuto baaraa.nasiya.m kulagehe nibbattitvaa vayappatto sa.mvegajaato pabbajitvaa viva.t.tuupanissaya.m bahu.m pu~n~nakamma.m upacini. eva.m tattha tattha devamanussesu sa.msaritvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade kapilavatthunagare vacchagottassa naama braahma.nassa gehe pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi. tassa maataa paripakkagabbhaa ara~n~na.m dassanatthaaya sa~njaatadoha.laa ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa vicarati, taavadevassaa kammajavaataa cali.msu, tirokara.ni.m parikkhipitvaa ada.msu. saa dha~n~napu~n~nalakkha.na.m putta.m vijaayi. so bodhisattena saha pa.msukii.likasahaayo ahosi. ``vaccho''tissa naama~nca ahosi. vanaabhiratiyaa vasena ^b^vanavaccho^eb^ti pa~n~naayittha. aparabhaage mahaasatte mahaabhinikkhamana.m nikkhamitvaa ^a^V1.0060^ea^ mahaapadhaana.m padahante, ``ahampi siddhatthakumaarena saha ara~n~ne viharissaamii''ti nikkhamitvaa taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa himavante vasanto abhisambuddhabhaava.m sutvaa bhagavato santika.m upagantvaa pabbajitvaa kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa ara~n~ne vasamaano nacirasseva vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m sacchaakaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.49-148-163) --
[22] sukha.m me taadisa.m natthi, phu.t.the paadatale yathaa..
[22] aya~nca kacchapo raajaa, taaresi mama pa~n~navaa..

[03] eva.m ^a^V1.0061^ea^ pana ^a^P1.0062^ea^ arahatta.m patvaa bhagavati kapilavatthusmi.m viharante tattha gantvaa satthaara.m vanditvaa bhikkhuuhi samaagato pa.tisanthaaravasena ``ki.m, aavuso, ara~n~ne phaasuvihaaro laddho''ti pu.t.tho ``rama.niiyaa, aavuso, ara~n~ne pabbataa''ti attanaa vu.t.thapabbate va.n.nento ^b^``niilabbhava.n.naa''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^niilabbhava.n.naa^eb^ti niilavalaahakanibhaa niilavalaahakasa.n.thaanaa ca. ^b^ruciraa^eb^ti ruciyaa sakira.naa pabhassaraa ca. ^b^siitavaarii^eb^ti siitalasalilaa. ^b^sucindharaa^eb^ti sucisuddhabhuumibhaagataaya suddhacittaana.m vaa ariyaana.m ^a^M1.0074^ea^ nivaasana.t.thaanataaya sucindharaa. gaathaasukhattha~nhi saanunaasika.m katvaa niddeso. ``siitavaarisucindharaa''tipi paa.tho, siitasucivaaridharaa siitalavimalasalilaasayavantoti attho. ^b^indagopakasa~nchannaa^eb^ti indagopakanaamakehi pavaa.lava.n.nehi rattakimiihi sa~nchaaditaa paavussakaalavasena evamaaha. keci pana ``indagopakanaamaani rattati.naanii''ti vadanti. apare ``ka.nikaararukkhaa''ti. ^b^selaa^eb^ti silaamayaa pabbataa, na pa.msupabbataati attho. tenaaha -- ``yathaapi pabbato selo''ti (udaa0 24). ^b^ramayanti ma^eb^nti ma.m ramaapenti, mayha.m vivekaabhiratti.m paribruuhenti. eva.m thero attano cirakaalaparibhaavita.m ara~n~naabhirati.m pavedento tividha.m vivekaabhiratimeva diipeti. tattha upadhivivekena a~n~naabyaakara.na.m diipitameva hotiiti.

[03] upajjhaayoti ^a^P1.0063^ea^ sivakassa saama.nerassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? so kira ito ekati.mse kappe vessabhussa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbatto ekadivasa.m kenacideva kara.niiyena ara~n~na.m pavi.t.tho tattha pabbatantare nisinna.m vessabhu.m bhagavanta.m disvaa pasannacitto upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa a~njali.m paggayha a.t.thaasi. puna tattha manoharaani kaasumaarikaphalaani disvaa taani gahetvaa bhagavato upanesi, pa.tiggahesi bhagavaa anukampa.m upaadaaya. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto kassapassa bhagavato saasane maatule pabbajante tena saddhi.m pabbajitvaa bahu.m viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinitvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade vanavacchattherassa bhaagineyyo hutvaa nibbatto, ^b^sivako^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. tassa maataa attano je.t.thabhaatike vanavacche saasane pabbajitvaa pabbajitakicca.m matthaka.m paapetvaa ara~n~ne viharante ta.m pavatti.m sutvaa putta.m aaha -- ``taata ^a^V1.0062^ea^ sivaka, therassa santike pabbajitvaa thera.m upa.t.thaha, mahallako daani thero''ti. so maatu ^a^M1.0075^ea^ ekavacaneneva ca pubbe kataadhikaarataaya ca maatulattherassa santika.m gantvaa pabbajitvaa ta.m upa.t.thahanto ara~n~ne vasati.

[03] tassa ekadivasa.m kenacideva kara.niiyena gaamanta.m gatassa kharo aabaadho uppajji. manussesu bhesajja.m karontesupi na pa.tippassambhi. tasmi.m ciraayante thero ``saama.nero ciraayati, ki.m nu kho kaara.na''nti tattha gantvaa ta.m gilaana.m disvaa tassa ta.m ta.m kattabbayuttaka.m karonto divasabhaaga.m viitinaametvaa rattibhaage balavapaccuusavelaaya.m aaha -- ``sivaka, na mayaa pabbajitakaalato pa.t.thaaya gaame vasitapubba.m, ito ara~n~nameva gacchaamaa''ti. ta.m sutvaa sivako ``yadipi me, bhante, idaani kaayo gaamante .thito, citta.m pana ara~n~ne, tasmaa sayaanopi ara~n~nameva gamissaamii''ti, ta.m sutvaa thero ta.m baahaaya.m gahetvaa ara~n~nameva netvaa ovaada.m adaasi. so therassa ovaade .thatvaa vipassitvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.38.53-58) --
[21] ``ekati.mse ito kappe, ya.m phala.m adadi.m tadaa.
[03] so arahatta.m patvaa upajjhaayena attanaa ca vuttamattha.m sa.msanditvaa attano vivekaabhiratikata.m katakiccata~nca pavedento ^b^``upajjhaayo ma.m avacaa''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^upajjhaayo^eb^ti vajjaavajja.m upanijjhaayati hitesita.m paccupa.t.thapetvaa ~naa.nacakkhunaa pekkhatiiti upajjhaayo. ^b^ma^eb^nti attaana.m vadati. ^b^avacaa^eb^ti abhaasi. ^b^ito gacchaama siivakaa^eb^ti vuttaakaaradassana.m, sivaka, ito gaamantato ara~n~na.t.thaanameva ehi gacchaama, tadeva amhaaka.m vasanayogganti ^a^M1.0076^ea^ adhippaayo. eva.m pana upajjhaayena vutto sivako bhadro assaajaaniiyo viya kasaabhihato sa~njaatasa.mvego hutvaa ara~n~nameva gantukaamata.m pavedento --
[21] ``gaame ^a^V1.0063^ea^ me vasati kaayo, ara~n~na.m me gata.m mano.

[03] tassattho -- yasmaa idaani yadipi me ida.m sariira.m gaamante .thita.m, ajjhaasayo pana ara~n~nameva gato, tasmaa semaanakopi gacchaami gela~n~nena .thaananisajjaagamanesu asamatthataaya sayaanopi iminaa sayitaakaarena sariisapo viya sariisapanto, etha, bhante, ara~n~nameva gacchaama, kasmaa? ^b^natthi sa"ngo vijaanata^eb^nti, yasmaa dhammasabhaavaa kaamesu sa.msaare ca aadiinava.m, nekkhamme nibbaane ca aanisa.msa.m yaathaavato jaanantassa na katthaci sa"ngo, tasmaa ekapadeneva upajjhaayassa aa.naa anu.thitaati, tadapadesena a~n~na.m byaakaasi.

[03] ^b^pa~nca^eb^ ^a^P1.0065^ea^ ^b^chinde pa~nca jahe^eb^ti aayasmato ku.n.dadhaanattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? so kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe uppanno vayappatto he.t.thaa vuttanayeneva bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa dhamma.m su.nanto satthaaraa eka.m bhikkhu.m pa.thama.m salaaka.m ga.nhantaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapiyamaana.m disvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthetvaa tadanuruupa.m pu~n~na.m karonto vicari. so ekadivasa.m padumuttarassa bhagavato nirodhasamaapattito vu.t.thaaya nisinnassa manosilaacu.n.napi~njara.m mahanta.m kadaliphalaka.n.nika.m upanesi, ta.m bhagavaa pa.tiggahetvaa paribhu~nji. so tena pu~n~nakammena ekaadasakkhattu.m devesu devarajja.m kaaresi. catuviisativaare raajaa ahosi cakkavattii. eva.m so punappuna.m pu~n~naani katvaa aparaapara.m devamanussesu sa.msaranto kassapabuddhakaale bhummadevataa hutvaa nibbatti. diighaayukabuddhaana~nca ^a^M1.0077^ea^ naama na anvaddhamaasiko uposatho hoti. tathaa hi vipassissa bhagavato chabbassantare chabbassantare uposatho ahosi. kassapadasabalo pana cha.t.the cha.t.the maase paatimokkha.m osaaresi. tassa paatimokkhassa osaara.nakaale disaavaasikaa dve sahaayakaa bhikkhuu ``uposatha.m karissaamaa''ti gacchanti.

[03] aya.m bhummadevataa cintesi -- ``imesa.m dvinna.m bhikkhuuna.m metti ativiya da.lhaa, ki.m nu kho, bhedake sati bhijjeyya, na bhijjeyyaa''ti, saa tesa.m okaasa.m olokayamaanaa tesa.m aviduureneva gacchati. atheko thero ekassa hatthe pattaciivara.m datvaa sariirava.la~njanattha.m udakaphaasuka.t.thaana.m ^a^V1.0064^ea^ gantvaa dhotahatthapaado hutvaa gumbasamiipato nikkhamati bhummadevataa tassa therassa pacchato uttamaruupaa itthii hutvaa kese vidhunitvaa sa.mvidhaaya sambandhantii viya ^a^P1.0066^ea^ pi.t.thiya.m pa.msu.m pu~nchamaanaa viya saa.taka.m sa.mvidhaaya nivaasayamaanaa viya ca hutvaa therassa padaanupadikaa hutvaa gumbato nikkhantaa. ekamante .thito sahaayakatthero ta.m kaara.na.m disvaava domanassajaato ``na.t.tho daani me iminaa bhikkhunaa saddhi.m diigharattaanugato sineho, sacaaha.m eva.mvidhabhaava.m jaaneyya.m, ettaka.m addhaana.m iminaa saddhi.m vissaasa.m na kareyya''nti cintetvaa aagacchantassevassa, ``handaavuso, tuyha.m pattaciivara.m, taadisena paapena saddhi.m ekamagga.m naagacchaamii''ti aaha. ta.m katha.m sutvaa tassa lajjibhikkhuno hadaya.m tikhi.nasatti.m gahetvaa viddha.m viya ahosi. tato na.m aaha -- ``aavuso, ki.m naameta.m vadasi, aha.m ettaka.m kaala.m dukka.tamattampi aapatti.m na jaanaami. tva.m pana ma.m ajja `paapo'ti vadasi, ki.m te di.t.tha''nti. ``ki.m a~n~nena di.t.thena, ki.m tva.m eva.mvidhena ala"nkatapa.tiyattena maatugaamena saddhi.m eka.t.thaane hutvaa nikkhanto''ti. ``nattheta.m, aavuso, mayha.m, naaha.m evaruupa.m maatugaama.m passaamii''ti. tassa yaavatatiya.m kathentassaapi itaro thero katha.m asaddahitvaa attanaa di.t.thakaara.na.myeva bhuutatta.m katvaa ga.nhanto tena saddhi.m ekamaggena agantvaa a~n~nena ^a^M1.0078^ea^ maggena satthu santika.m gato. itaropi bhikkhu a~n~nena maggena satthu santika.myeva gato.

[01] tato bhikkhusa"nghassa uposathaagaara.m pavisanavelaaya so bhikkhu ta.m bhikkhu.m uposathagge sa~njaanitvaa, ``imasmi.m uposathagge evaruupo naama paapabhikkhu atthi, naaha.m tena saddhi.m uposatha.m karissaamii''ti nikkhamitvaa bahi a.t.thaasi. atha bhummadevataa ``bhaariya.m mayaa kamma.m kata''nti mahallakaupaasakava.n.nena tassa santika.m gantvaa ``kasmaa, bhante, ayyo imasmi.m .thaane .thito''ti aaha. ``upaasaka, ima.m uposathagga.m eko paapabhikkhu pavi.t.tho, `naaha.m ^a^P1.0067^ea^ tena saddhi.m uposatha.m karomii'ti bahi .thitomhii''ti. ``bhante, maa eva.m ga.nhatha, parisuddhasiilo esa bhikkhu. tumhehi di.t.thamaatugaamo naama aha.m, mayaa tumhaaka.m viima.msanatthaaya `da.lhaa nu kho imesa.m theraana.m metti, no da.lhaa'ti bhijjanaabhijjanabhaava.m olokentena ta.m kamma.m kata''nti. ``ko pana, tva.m sappurisaa''ti? ``aha.m ekaa bhummadevataa, bhante''ti devaputto kathento dibbaanubhaavena .thatvaa therassa paadesu nipatitvaa ``mayha.m, bhante, khamatha, eta.m dosa.m thero na jaanaati, uposatha.m karothaa''ti thera.m yaacitvaa uposathagga.m pavesesi. so thero uposatha.m taava eka.t.thaane akaasi, mittasanthavavasena pana puna tena saddhi.m na eka.t.thaane ahosiiti. imassa therassa kamma.m na kathiiyati, cuditakatthero pana aparaapara.m vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto arahatta.m paapu.ni.

[03] bhummadevataa ^a^V1.0065^ea^ tassa kammassa nissandena eka.m buddhantara.m apaayabhayato na muccittha. sace pana kismi~nci kaale manussatta.m aagacchati, a~n~nena yena kenaci kato doso tasseva upari patati. so amhaaka.m bhagavato kaale saavatthiya.m braahma.nakule nibbatti. ``dhaanamaa.navo''tissa naama.m aka.msu. so vayappatto tayo vede ugga.nhitvaa mahallakakaale satthu dhammadesana.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbaji, tassa upasampannadivasato pa.t.thaaya ekaa ala"nkatapa.tiyattaa itthii tasmi.m gaama.m ^a^M1.0079^ea^ pavisante saddhi.myeva gaama.m pavisati, nikkhamante nikkhamati. vihaara.m pavisantepi saddhi.m pavisati, ti.t.thantepi ti.t.thatiiti eva.m niccaanubandhaa pa~n~naayati. thero ta.m na passati. tassa puna purimakammanissandena saa a~n~nesa.m upa.t.thaati. gaame yaagu.m bhikkha~nca dadamaanaa itthiyo ``bhante, aya.m eko yaaguu.lu"nko tumhaaka.m, eko imissaa amhaaka.m sahaayikaayaa''ti parihaasa.m karonti. therassa mahatii vihesaa hoti. vihaaragatampi na.m saama.neraa ceva daharaa bhikkhuu ca parivaaretvaa ``dhaano ko.n.do jaato''ti parihaasa.m karonti. athassa teneva ^a^P1.0068^ea^ kaara.nena ^b^ku.n.dadhaanatthero^eb^ti naama.m jaata.m. so u.t.thaaya samu.t.thaaya tehi kariyamaana.m ke.li.m sahitu.m asakkonto ummaada.m gahetvaa ``tumhe ko.n.daa, tumhaaka.m upajjhaayo ko.n.do, aacariyo ko.n.do''ti vadati. atha na.m satthu aarocesu.m ``ku.n.dadhaano, bhante, daharasaama.nerehi saddhi.m eva.m pharusavaaca.m vadatii''ti. satthaa ta.m pakkosaapetvaa ``sacca.m kira tva.m, dhaana, saama.nerehi saddhi.m pharusavaaca.m vadasii''ti vatvaa tena ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti vutte ``kasmaa eva.m vadesii''ti aaha. ``bhante, nibaddha.m vihesa.m asahanto eva.m kathemii''ti. ``tva.m pubbe katakamma.m yaavajjadivasaa jiiraapetu.m na sakkosi, puna evaruupa.m pharusa.m maavadii bhikkhuu''ti vatvaa aaha --
[22] dukkhaa hi saarambhakathaa, pa.tida.n.daa phuseyyu ta.m..
[22] esa pattosi nibbaana.m, saarambho te na vijjatii''ti.. (dha0 pa0 133-134).

[03] ima~nca pana tassa therassa maatugaamena saddhi.m vicara.nabhaava.m kosalara~n~nopi kathayi.msu. raajaa ``gacchatha, bha.ne, viima.msathaa''ti pesetvaa sayampi mandeneva parivaarena therassa vasana.t.thaana.m gantvaa ekamante olokento a.t.thaasi. tasmi.m kha.ne thero suucikamma.m karonto nisinno hoti, saapi itthii aviduure .thaane .thitaa viya pa~n~naayati. raajaa disvaa ``atthida.m kaara.na''nti tassaa ^a^V1.0066^ea^ .thita.t.thaana.m agamaasi. saa tasmi.m aagacchante therassa vasanapa.n.nasaala.m pavi.t.thaa viya ahosi. raajaapi taaya saddhi.m tameva pa.n.nasaala.m pavisitvaa sabbattha olokento adisvaa ^a^M1.0080^ea^ ``naaya.m maatugaamo, therassa eko kammavipaako''ti sa~n~na.m katvaa pa.thama.m therassa samiipena gacchantopi thera.m avanditvaa tassa kaara.nassa abhuutabhaava.m ~natvaa aagamma thera.m vanditvaa ekamanta.m nisinno ``kacci, bhante, pi.n.dakena na kilamathaa''ti pucchi. thero ``va.t.tati, mahaaraajaa''ti aaha. ``jaanaamaha.m, bhante, ayyassa katha.m, evaruupena parikkilesena saddhi.m carantaana.m tumhaaka.m ke naama pasiidissanti, ito pa.t.thaaya vo katthaci gamanakicca.m natthi, aha.m ^a^P1.0069^ea^ catuuhi paccayehi tumhe upa.t.thahissaami, tumhe yoniso manasikaare maa pamajjitthaa''ti nibaddhabhikkha.m pa.t.thapesi. thero raajaana.m upatthambhaka.m labhitvaa bhojanasappaayena ekaggacitto hutvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tato pa.t.thaaya saa itthii antaradhaayi.

[03] tadaa mahaasubhaddaa ugganagare micchaadi.t.thikakule vasamaanaa ``satthaa ma.m anukampatuu''ti uposatha.m adhi.t.thaaya niraamagandhaa hutvaa uparipaasaadatale .thitaa ``imaani pupphaani antare a.t.thatvaa dasabalassa matthake vitaana.m hutvaa ti.t.thantu, dasabalo imaaya sa~n~naaya sve pa~ncahi bhikkhusatehi saddhi.m mayha.m bhikkha.m ga.nhatuu''ti saccakiriya.m katvaa a.t.tha sumanapupphamu.t.thiyo vissajjesi. pupphaani gantvaa dhammadesanaavelaaya satthu matthake vitaana.m hutvaa a.t.tha.msu. satthaa ta.m sumanapupphavitaana.m disvaa citteneva subhaddaaya bhikkha.m adhivaasetvaa punadivase aru.ne u.t.thite aanandatthera.m aaha -- ``aananda, maya.m ajja duura.m bhikkhaacaara.m gamissaama, puthujjanaana.m adatvaa ariyaana.myeva salaaka.m dehii''ti. thero bhikkhuuna.m aarocesi -- ``aavuso, satthaa ajja duura.m bhikkhaacaara.m gamissati, puthujjanaa maa ga.nhantu, ariyaava salaaka.m ga.nhantuu''ti. ku.n.dadhaanatthero ``aahara, aavuso salaaka''nti pa.thama.myeva hattha.m pasaaresi. aanando ``satthaa taadisaana.m bhikkhuuna.m salaaka.m na daapeti, ariyaana.myeva daapetii''ti vitakka.m uppaadetvaa gantvaa satthu aarocesi. satthaa ``aaharaapentassa salaaka.m dehii''ti aaha. thero cintesi -- ``sace ku.n.dadhaanassa salaakaa daatu.m na yuttaa, atha satthaa pa.tibaaheyya, bhavissati ettha kaara.na''nti ``ku.n.dadhaanassa salaaka.m dassaamii''ti ^a^M1.0081^ea^ gamana.m abhiniihari. ku.n.dadhaano tassa pure aagamanaa eva abhi~n~naapaadaka.m catutthajjhaana.m samaapajjitvaa iddhiyaa aakaase .thatvaa ``aaharaavuso, aananda, satthaa ma.m jaanaati, maadisa.m bhikkhu.m pa.thama.m salaaka.m ga.nhanta.m na satthaa nivaaretii''ti hattha.m pasaaretvaa salaaka.m ga.nhi. satthaa ta.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa thera.m imasmi.m saasane pa.thama.m salaaka.m ga.nhantaana.m ^a^P1.0070^ea^ agga.t.thaane .thapesi. yasmaa aya.m thero raajaana.m upatthambhaka.m labhitvaa sappaayaahaaralaabhena ^a^V1.0067^ea^ samaahitacitto vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto upanissayasampannataaya cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.4.1-16) --
[21] ``ye ca santi samitaaro, yakkhaa imamhi pabbate.
[22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..

[03] eva.mbhuutassapi imassa therassa gu.ne ajaanantaa ye puthujjanaa bhikkhuu tadaa pa.thama.m salaakaggaha.ne ``ki.m nu kho eta''nti samacintesu.m. tesa.m vimatividhamanattha.m thero aakaasa.m abbhuggantvaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m dassetvaa a~n~naapadesena a~n~na.m byaakaronto ^b^``pa~nca chinde''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^pa~nca chinde^eb^ti apaayuupapattinibbattanakaani pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani paade bandhanarajjuka.m viya puriso satthena he.t.thimamaggattayena chindeyya pajaheyya. ^b^pa~nca jahe^eb^ti uparidevalokuupapattihetubhuutaani pa~ncuddhambhaagiyasa.myojanaani puriso giivaaya bandhanarajjuka.m viya arahattamaggena jaheyya, chindeyya vaati attho. ^b^pa~nca cuttari bhaavaye^eb^ti tesa.myeva uddhambhaagiyasa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya saddhaadiini pa~ncindriyaani uttari anaagaamimaggaadhigamato upari bhaaveyya aggamaggaadhigamavasena va.d.dheyya. ^b^pa~ncasa"ngaatigo^eb^ti eva.mbhuuto pana pa~ncanna.m raagadosamohamaanadi.t.thisa"ngaana.m atikkamanena pahaanena pa~ncasa"ngaatigo hutvaa. ^b^bhikkhu^eb^ ^a^M1.0083^ea^ ^b^oghati.n.noti vuccatii^eb^ti sabbathaa bhinnakilesataaya bhikkhuuti, kaamabhavadi.t.thiavijjoghe taritvaa tesa.m paarabhuute nibbaane .thitoti ca vuccatiiti attho.

[03] ^b^yathaapi^eb^ ^a^P1.0071^ea^ ^b^bhaddo aaja~n~no^eb^ti aayasmato bela.t.thasiisattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? so kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbatto bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa sama.nadhamma.m karonto upanissayasampattiyaa abhaavena visesa.m nibbattetu.m naasakkhi. viva.t.tuupanissaya.m pana bahu.m kusala.m upacinitvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto ito ekati.mse kappe vessabhu.m bhagavanta.m passitvaa pasannacitto maatulu"ngaphala.m adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devesu nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m pu~n~naani katvaa sugatito sugati.m upagacchanto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m braahma.nakule nibbatto bhagavato abhisambodhiyaa puretarameva uruvelakassapassa ^a^V1.0069^ea^ santike taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa aggi.m paricaranto uruvelakassapadamane ^b^aadittapariyaayadesanaaya^eb^ (mahaava0 54; sa.m0 ni0 4.28) puraa.naja.tilasahassena saddhi.m arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.51.68-73) --
[21] ``ekati.mse ito kappe, ya.m phala.m adadi.m tadaa.

[03] eva.m ^a^M1.0084^ea^ adhigataarahatto aayasmato dhammabha.n.daagaarikassa upajjhaayo aya.m thero ekadivasa.m phalasamaapattito u.t.thaaya ta.m santa.m pa.niita.m niraamisa.m sukha.m attano pubbayoga~nca paccavekkhitvaa piitivegavasena ^b^``yathaapi bhaddo aaja~n~no''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^yathaapii^eb^ti opammapa.tipaadanatthe nipaato. ^b^bhaddo^eb^ti sundaro thaamabalasamatthajavaparakkamaadisampanno. ^b^aaja~n~no^eb^ti aajaaniiyo jaatimaa kaara.naakaara.naana.m aajaananako. so tividho usabhaaja~n~no assaaja~n~no hatthaaja~n~noti. tesu usabhaaja~n~no idhaadhippeto. so ca kho chekakasanakicce niyutto, tenaaha ^b^``na"ngalaavattanii''^eb^ti. na"ngalassa phaalassa aavattanako, na"ngala.m ito cito ca aavattetvaa khette kasanakoti attho. na"ngala.m vaa aavattayati etthaati na"ngalaavatta.m ^a^P1.0072^ea^, khette na"ngalapatho, tasmi.m na"ngalaavattani. gaathaasukhattha~nhettha ``vattanii''ti diigha.m katvaa vutta.m. ^b^sikhii^eb^ti matthake ava.t.thaanato sikhaasadisataaya sikhaa, si"nga.m. tadassa atthiiti sikhii. apare pana ``kakudha.m idha `sikhaa'ti adhippeta''nti vadanti, ubhayathaapi padhaana"ngakittanameta.m ``sikhii''ti. ^b^appakasirenaa^eb^ti appakilamathena. ^b^rattindivaa^eb^ti rattiyo divaa ca, eva.m mama.m appakasirena gacchantiiti yojanaa. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- yathaa ``bhaddo usabhaajaaniiyo kasane niyutto ghanati.namuulaadikepi na"ngalapathe ta.m aga.nento appakasirena ito cito ca parivattento gacchati, yaava kasanati.naana.m parissama.m dasseti, eva.m mama.m rattindivaapi appakasireneva gacchanti atikkamantii''ti. tattha kaara.namaaha ^b^``sukhe laddhe niraamise''^eb^ti. yasmaa kaamaamisalokaamisava.t.taamisehi ^a^V1.0070^ea^ asammissa.m santa.m pa.niita.m phalasamaapattisukha.m laddha.m, tasmaati attho. paccatte ceta.m bhummavacana.m yathaa ``vanappagumbe'' (khu0 paa0 6.13; su0 ni0 236) ``tena vata re vattabbe''ti (kathaa0 1) ca. atha vaa tato pabhuti rattindivaa appakasirena gacchantiiti vicaara.naaya aaha -- ``sukhe laddhe niraamise''ti, niraamise sukhe laddhe sati tassa laddhakaalato pa.t.thaayaati attho.

[03] ^b^middhii^eb^ ^a^M1.0085^ea^ ^b^yadaa^eb^ti aayasmato daasakattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? so kira ito ekanavute kappe anuppanne tathaagate ajitassa naama paccekabuddhassa gandhamaadanato manussapatha.m otaritvaa a~n~natarasmi.m gaame pi.n.daaya carantassa manoramaani ambaphalaani adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto kassapassa bhagavato kaale saasane pabbajitvaa viva.t.tuupanissaya.m bahu.m pu~n~na.m akaasi. eva.m kusalakammappasuto hutvaa sugatito ^a^P1.0073^ea^ sugati.m upagacchanto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m kulagehe nibbatti. ^b^daasako^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so anaathapi.n.dikena gahapatinaa vihaarapa.tijagganakamme .thapito sakkacca.m vihaara.m pa.tijagganto abhi.nha.m buddhadassanena dhammassavanena ca pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbaji. keci pana bha.nanti -- ``aya.m kassapassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vayappatto a~n~natara.m khii.naasavatthera.m upa.t.thahanto ki~nci kamma.m kaaraapetukaamo thera.m aa.naapesi. so tena kammena amhaaka.m bhagavato kaale saavatthiya.m anaathapi.n.dikassa daasiyaa kucchimhi nibbatto vayappatto se.t.thinaa vihaarapa.tijaggane .thapito vuttanayeneva pa.tiladdhasaddho ahosi. mahaase.t.thi tassa siilaacaara.m ajjhaasaya~nca ~natvaa bhujissa.m katvaa `yathaasukha.m pabbajaa'ti aaha. ta.m bhikkhuu pabbaajesu''nti. so pabbajitakaalato pa.t.thaaya kusiito hiinaviiriyo hutvaa na ki~nci vattapa.tivatta.m karoti, kuto sama.nadhamma.m, kevala.m yaavadattha.m bhu~njitvaa niddaabahulo viharati. dhammassavanakaalepi eka.m ko.na.m pavisitvaa parisapariyante nisinno ghurughurupassaasii niddaayateva. athassa bhagavaa pubbuupanissaya.m oloketvaa sa.mvegajananattha.m ^b^``middhii yadaa hoti mahagghaso caa''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^middhii^eb^ti thinamiddhaabhibhuuto, ya~nhi middha.m abhibhavati, ta.m thinampi abhibhavateva. ^b^yadaa^eb^ti yasmi.m kaale. ^b^mahagghaso^eb^ti mahaabhojano, aaharahatthakaala.msaa.takatatthava.t.takakaakamaasakabhuttavamitakaana.m ^a^V1.0071^ea^ a~n~nataro viya. ^b^niddaayitaa^eb^ti supanasiilo. ^b^samparivattasaayii^eb^ti samparivattaka.m samparivattaka.m nipajjitvaa ubhayenapi seyyasukha.m passasukha.m middhasukha.m ^a^M1.0086^ea^ anuyuttoti dasseti. ^b^nivaapapu.t.tho^eb^ti ku.n.dakaadinaa suukarabhattena pu.t.tho bharito. gharasuukaro hi baalakaalato pa.t.thaaya posiyamaano thuulasariirakaale gehaa bahi nikkhamitu.m alabhanto he.t.thaama~ncaadiisu ^a^P1.0074^ea^ samparivattetvaa samparivattetvaa sayateva. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- yadaa puriso middhii ca hoti mahagghaso ca nivaapapu.t.tho mahaavaraaho viya a~n~nena iriyaapathena yaapetu.m asakkonto niddaayanasiilo samparivattasaayii, tadaa so ``anicca.m dukkha.m anattaa''ti tii.ni lakkha.naani manasikaatu.m na sakkoti. tesa.m amanasikaaraa mandapa~n~no punappuna.m gabbha.m upeti, gabbhaavaasato na parimuccatevaati. ta.m sutvaa daasakatthero sa.mvegajaato vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m sacchaakaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.51.74, 80-84) --
[21] ``ekanavute ito kappe, ya.m phala.m adadi.m tadaa.

[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa thero imaaya gaathaaya ma.m bhagavaa ovadi, ``aya.m gaathaa mayha.m a"nkusabhuutaa''ti tameva gaatha.m paccudaahaasi. tayida.m therassa parivattaahaaranayena a~n~naabyaakara.na.m jaata.m.

[03] ^b^ahu buddhassa daayaado^eb^ti si"ngaalakapituttherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? so kira ito catunavute kappe satara.msi.m naama paccekasambuddha.m pi.n.daaya caranta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso vanditvaa attano hatthagata.m taalaphala.m adaasi. tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbatto aparaapara.m ^a^M1.0087^ea^ pu~n~naani katvaa ^a^V1.0072^ea^ sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto kassapassa bhagavato kaale manussayoniya.m nibbatto saasane pa.tiladdhasaddho hutvaa pabbajitvaa a.t.thikasa~n~na.m bhaavesi. puna imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m kulagehe nibbattitvaa vayappatto daarapariggaha.m katvaa eka.m putta.m labhitvaa tassa ``si"ngaalako''ti naama.m akaasi. tena ^a^P1.0075^ea^ na.m ^b^si"ngaalakapitaa^eb^ti voharanti. so aparabhaage gharabandhana.m pahaaya saasane pabbaji. tassa bhagavaa ajjhaasaya.m olokento a.t.thikasa~n~naakamma.t.thaana.m adaasi. so ta.m gahetvaa bhaggesu viharati susumaaragire bhesaka.laavane, athassa tasmi.m vane adhivatthaa devataa ussaahajananattha.m ``bhaavanaaphala.m nacirasseva hatthagata.m karissatii''ti imamattha.m a~n~naapadesena vibhaaventii ^b^``ahu buddhassa daayaado''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^ahuu^eb^ti hoti, vattamaanatthe hi ida.m atiitakaalavacana.m. ^b^buddhassaa^eb^ti sabba~n~nubuddhassa. ^b^daayaado^eb^ti dhammadaayaado navavidhassa lokuttaradhammadaayassa attano sammaapa.tipattiyaa aadaayako ga.nhanako. atha vaa ^b^ahuu^eb^ti ahosi. eva.mnaamassa buddhassa daayaadabhaave koci vibandho idaaneva bhavissatiiti adhippaayo. tenaaha ^b^``ma~n~neha.m kaamaraaga.m so, khippameva vahissatii''^eb^ti. ^b^bhesaka.laavane^eb^ti bhesakena naama yakkhena labhitattaa pariggahitattaa, bhesaka.laana.m vaa ka.t.thaadiina.m bahulataaya ``bhesaka.laavana''nti laddhanaame ara~n~ne. tassa bhikkhuno buddhassa daayaadabhaave kaara.na.m vadanto ^b^``kevala.m a.t.thisa~n~naaya, apharii pathavi.m ima''^eb^nti aaha. tattha ^b^kevala^eb^nti sakala.m anavasesa.m. ^b^a.t.thisa~n~naayaa^eb^ti a.t.thikabhaavanaaya. ^b^apharii^eb^ti ``a.t.thii''ti adhimuccanavasena patthari. ^b^pathavi^eb^nti attabhaavapathavi.m. attabhaavo hi idha ``pathavii''ti vutto ``ko ima.m pathavi.m viccessatii''tiaadiisu viya. ^b^ma~n~neha^eb^nti ma~n~ne aha.m. ``ma~n~naaha''ntipi paa.tho. ^b^so^eb^ti so bhikkhu. ^b^khippameva^eb^ nacirasseva kaamaraaga.m pahissati pajahissatiiti ma~n~ne. kasmaa? a.t.thikasa~n~naaya kaamaraagassa ujupa.tipakkhabhaavato. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- yo ekasmi.m padese laddhaaya atthikasa~n~naaya sakala.m attano sabbesa.m vaa attabhaava.m ^a^M1.0088^ea^ ``a.t.thii''tveva pharitvaa .thito, so bhikkhu ta.m a.t.thikajhaana.m paadaka.m katvaa vipassanto nacireneva anaagaamimaggena kaamaraaga.m ^a^P1.0076^ea^, sabba.m vaa kaamana.t.thena ``kaamo'', ra~njana.t.thena ``raago''ti ca laddhanaama.m ta.nha.m aggamaggena pajahissatiiti. ima.m gaatha.m sutvaa so thero ``aya.m devataa mayha.m ussaahajananattha.m evamaahaa''ti appa.tivaanaviiriya.m adhi.t.thaaya vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.51.85-90) --
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa taaya devataaya vuttavacana.m patimaanento tameva gaatha.m udaanavasena abhaasi. tadevassa therassa a~n~naabyaakara.na.m ahosiiti.

[01] ^b^udaka~nhi nayantii^eb^ti aayasmato kulattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira thero pubbepi viva.t.tuupanissaya.m bahu.m kusala.m upacinitvaa adhikaarasampanno vipassi.m bhagavanta.m aakaase gacchanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso naa.likeraphala.m daatukaamo a.t.thaasi. satthaa tassa citta.m ~natvaa otaritvaa pa.tigga.nhi. so ativiya pasannacitto hutvaa teneva saddhaapa.tilaabhena satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa pabbajja.m yaaci, satthaa a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m ^a^M1.0089^ea^ aa.naapesi -- ``ima.m purisa.m pabbaajehii''ti. so pabbajitvaa laddhuupasampado sama.nadhamma.m katvaa tato cuto chapi buddhantaraani devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m braahma.nakule nibbatti. ^b^kulo^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vayappatto saasane laddhappasaado bhagavato santike pabbajitvaa vikkhepabahulataaya visesa.m nibbattetu.m naasakkhi. athekadivasa.m gaama.m pi.n.daaya pavisanto antaraamagge bhuumi.m kha.nitvaa ^a^P1.0077^ea^ udakavaahaka.m katvaa icchiticchita.t.thaane udaka.m nente purise disvaa ta.m sallakkhetvaa gaama.m pavi.t.tho a~n~natara.m usukaara.m usuda.n.daka.m usuyante pakkhipitvaa akkhiko.tiyaa oloketvaa uju.m karonta.m disvaa tampi sallakkhetvaa gacchanto purato gantvaa araneminaabhiaadike rathacakkaavayave tacchante tacchake disvaa tampi sallakkhetvaa vihaara.m pavisitvaa katabhattakicco pattaciivara.m pa.tisaametvaa divaavihaare nisinno attanaa di.t.thanimittaani upamaabhaavena gahetvaa attano cittadamane upanento ``acetana.m udakampi manussaa icchikicchita.t.thaana.m nayanti tathaa acetana.m va"nkampi sarada.n.da.m upaayena namento uju.m karonti ^a^V1.0074^ea^, tathaa acetana.m ka.t.thaka.li"ngaraadi.m tacchakaa nemiaadivasena va"nka.m uju~nca karonti. atha kasmaa aha.m sakacitta.m uju.m na karissaamii''ti cintetvaa vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa gha.tento vaayamanto nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.51.91-99) --

[03] eva.m yaani nimittaani a"nkuse katvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni, tehi saddhi.m attano cittadamana.m sa.msanditvaa a~n~na.m byaakaronto ^b^``udaka~nhi nayanti nettikaa''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^udaka.m hii^eb^ti ^b^hi^eb^-saddo nipaatamatta.m. ^b^nayantii^eb^ti pathaviyaa ta.m ta.m thala.t.thaana.m kha.nitvaa ninna.t.thaana.m puuretvaa maatika.m vaa katvaa rukkhado.ni.m vaa .thapetvaa attano icchiticchita.t.thaana.m nenti. tathaa te nentiiti ^b^nettikaa. tejana^eb^nti ka.n.da.m. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- nettikaa attano ruciyaa icchiticchita.t.thaana.m udaka.m ^b^nayanti, usukaaraa^eb^pi taapetvaa tejana.m ^b^namayanti^eb^ uju.m karonti. namanavasena ^b^tacchakaa^eb^ nemiaadiina.m atthaaya tacchantaa ^b^daaru.m namayanti^eb^ attano ruciyaa uju.m vaa va"nka.m vaa karonti. eva.m ettaka.m aaramma.na.m ^a^P1.0078^ea^ katvaa ^b^subbataa^eb^ yathaasamaadinnena ^a^V1.0075^ea^ siilaadinaa sundaravataa dhiiraa sotaapattimaggaadiina.m uppaadentaa ^b^attaana.m damenti,^eb^ arahatta.m pana pattesu ekantadantaa naama hontiiti.

[03] ^b^mara.ne me bhaya.m natthii^eb^ti aayasmato ajitattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? so kira ekanavute kappe vipassi.m bhagavanta.m passitvaa pasannacitto kapitthaphala.m adaasi. tato parampi ta.m ta.m pu~n~na.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m kappe anuppanne eva amhaaka.m satthari saavatthiya.m mahaakosalara~n~no aggaasaniyassa braahma.nassa putto hutvaa nibbatti. tassa ^b^ajito^eb^ti naama.m ahosi. tasmi~nca samaye ^a^M1.0091^ea^ saavatthivaasii baavarii naama braahma.no tiihi mahaapurisalakkha.nehi samannaagato ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu saavatthito nikkhamitvaa taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa godhaavariitiire kapitthaaraame vasati. atha ajito tassa santike pabbajito atthakaamaaya devataaya coditena baavarinaa satthu santika.m pesito tissametteyyaadiihi saddhi.m bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa manasaava pa~nhe pucchitvaa tesu vissajjitesu pasannacitto satthu santike pabbajitvaa kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.52.7-11) --
[03] arahatta.m pana patto siihanaada.m nadanto ^b^``mara.ne me bhaya.m natthii''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^mara.ne^eb^ti mara.nanimitta.m mara.nahetu. ^b^me^eb^ti mayha.m, bhaya.m natthi ucchinnabhavamuulataaya parikkhii.najaatikattaa ^a^P1.0079^ea^. anucchinnabhavamuulaana~nhi ``kiidisii nu kho mayha.m aayati.m uppattii''ti mara.nato bhaya.m bhaveyya. ^b^nikantii^eb^ti apekkhaa ta.nhaa, saa natthi jiivite suparimadditasa"nkhaarataaya ^a^V1.0076^ea^ upaadaanakkhandhaana.m dukkhaasaarakaadibhaavena su.t.thu upa.t.thahanato. eva.mbhuuto caaha.m ^b^sandeha.m^eb^ sariira.m, saka.m vaa deha.m dehasa"nkhaata.m dukkhabhaara.m ^b^nikkhipissaami^eb^ cha.d.dessaami, nikkhipanto ca ```iminaa sariirakena saadhetabba.m saadhita.m, idaani ta.m eka.msena cha.d.daniiyamevaa'ti pa~n~naavepullappattiyaa ^b^sampajaano^eb^ sativepullappattiyaa ^b^pa.tissato^eb^ nikkhipissaamii''ti. ima.m pana gaatha.m vatvaa thero jhaana.m samaapajjitvaa tadanantara.m parinibbaayiiti.

[03] ^b^naaha.m^eb^ ^a^M1.0092^ea^ ^a^V1.0077^ea^ ^b^bhayassa bhaayaamii^eb^ti aayasmato nigrodhattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira ito a.t.thaarase kappasate braahma.namahaasaalakule nibbattitvaa vayappatto kaamesu aadiinava.m nekkhamme ca aanisa.msa.m disvaa gharabandhana.m pahaaya ara~n~naayatana.m pavisitvaa a~n~natarasmi.m saalavane pa.n.nasaala.m katvaa taapasapabbaja.m pabbajitvaa vanamuulaphalaahaaro vasati. tena samayena piyadassii naama sammaasambuddho loke uppajjitvaa sadevakassa lokassa dhammaamatavassena kilesasantaapa.m nibbaapento ekadivasa.m taapase anukampaaya ta.m saalavana.m pavisitvaa nirodhasamaapatti.m samaapanno. taapaso vanamuulaphalatthaaya gacchanto bhagavanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso pupphitasaalada.n.dasaakhaayo gahetvaa saalama.n.dapa.m katvaa ta.m sabbatthakameva saalapupphehi sa~nchaadetvaa bhagavanta.m vanditvaa piitisomanassavaseneva aahaaratthaayapi agantvaa namassamaano a.t.thaasi. satthaa nirodhato vu.t.thaaya tassa anukampaaya ``bhikkhusa"ngho aagacchatuu''ti cintesi, ``bhikkhusa"nghepi ^a^P1.0080^ea^ citta.m pasaadessatii''ti. taavadeva bhikkhusa"ngho aagato. so bhikkhusa"nghampi disvaa pasannamaanaso vanditvaa a~njali.m paggayha a.t.thaasi. satthaa sitassa paatukara.naapadesena tassa bhaavini.m sampatti.m pakaasento dhamma.m kathetvaa pakkaami saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesuyeva sa.msaranto viva.t.tuupanissaya.m bahu.m kusala.m upacinitvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m braahma.namahaasaalakule nibbatti, ^b^nigrodho^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so jetavanapa.tiggaha.nadivase buddhaanubhaavadassanena sa~njaatappasaado pabbajitvaa vipassana.m aarabhitvaa nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.49.190-220) --
[21] ``ko nu kho bhagavaa hetu, sitakammassa satthuno.
[22] tassa kamma.m saritvaana, sita.m paatukari.m aha.m..
[22] devaloke manusse vaa, okaasova na sammati..
[22] gotamo naama naamena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
[22] tisso vijjaa anuppattaa, kata.m buddhassa saasana.m..
[03] eva.m pana cha.labhi~n~no hutvaa phalasukhena viitinaamento saasanassa niyyaanikabhaavavibhaavanattha.m a~n~naabyaakara.navasena ^b^``naaha.m bhayassa bhaayaamii''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ tattha bhaayanti etasmaati ^b^bhaya.m,^eb^ jaatijaraadi. ^b^bhayassaa^eb^ti nissakke saamivacana.m, bhayato bhaayitabbanimitta.m jaatijaraamara.naadinaa hetunaa naaha.m bhaayaamiiti attho. tattha kaara.namaaha ^a^V1.0080^ea^ ^b^``satthaa no amatassa kovido''^eb^ti. amhaaka.m satthaa amate kusalo veneyyaana.m amatadaane cheko. ^b^yattha bhaya.m naavati.t.thatii^eb^ti yasmi.m nibbaane yathaavutta.m bhaya.m na ti.t.thati okaasa.m na labhati. ^b^tenaa^eb^ti tato nibbaanato. ^b^vajantii^eb^ti abhaya.t.thaanameva gacchanti. nibbaana~nhi abhaya.t.thaana.m naama. kena pana vajantiiti aaha ^b^``maggena vajanti bhikkhavo''^eb^ti, a.t.tha"ngikena ariyamaggena satthu ovaadakara.naa bhikkhuu sa.msaare bhayassa ikkhanakaati attho. ^b^yatthaa^eb^ti vaa ya.m nimitta.m yassa ariyamaggassa ^a^P1.0081^ea^ adhigamahetu attaanuvaadaadika.m pa~ncaviisatividhampi bhaya.m naavati.t.thati pati.t.tha.m na labhati, tena ariyena maggena vajanti abhaya.t.thaana.m satthu saasane bhikkhuu, tena maggena ahampi gato, tasmaa naaha.m bhayassa bhaayaamiiti thero a~n~na.m byaakaasi.

[03] ^b^niilaasugiivaa^eb^ti ^a^M1.0096^ea^ aayasmato cittakattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? so kira padumuttarabuddhakaalato pa.t.thaaya viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m aacinanto ito ekanavute kappe manussayoniya.m nibbattitvaa vi~n~nutta.m patto vipassi.m bhagavanta.m passitvaa pasannamaanaso pupphehi puuja.m katvaa vanditvaa ``santadhammena naama ettha bhavitabba''nti satthari nibbaane ca adhimucci. so tena pu~n~nakammena tato cuto taavati.msabhavane nibbatto aparaapara.m pu~n~naani katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe vibhavasampannassa braahma.nassa putto hutvaa nibbatti ^b^cittako^eb^ naama naamena. so bhagavati raajagaha.m gantvaa ve.luvane viharante satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa cariyaanukuula.m kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa ara~n~naayatana.m pavisitvaa bhaavanaanuyutto jhaana.m nibbattetvaa jhaanapaadaka.m vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa nacireneva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.50.1-7) --

[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa satthaara.m vanditu.m raajagaha.m upagato tattha bhikkhuuhi ``ki.m, aavuso, ara~n~ne appamatto vihaasii''ti pu.t.tho attano appamaadavihaaranivedanena a~n~na.m byaakaronto ^b^``niilaasugiivaa''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M1.0097^ea^ ^b^niilaasugiivaa^eb^ti niilasugiivaa, gaathaasukhattha~nhettha diigho ^a^P1.0082^ea^ kato, raajivantataaya sundaraaya giivaaya samannaagatoti attho. te yebhuyyena ca niilava.n.nataaya ^b^niilaa^eb^. sobhanaka.n.thataaya ^b^sugiivaa. sikhino^eb^ti matthake jaataaya sikhaaya sassirikabhaavena ^b^sikhino. moraa^eb^ti mayuuraa. ^b^kaarambhiya^eb^nti kaarambarukkhe. ^b^kaarambhiya^eb^nti vaa tassa vanassa naama.m. tasmaa kaarambhiyanti kaarambhanaamake vaneti attho. ^b^abhinadantii^eb^ti paavussakaale meghagajjita.m sutvaa kekaasadda.m karontaa utusampadaasiddhena sarena ha.msaadike abhibhavantaa viya nadanti. ^b^te^eb^ti te moraa. ^b^siitavaatakii.litaa^eb^ti siitena meghavaatena sa~njaatakii.litaa madhuravassita.m vassantaa. ^b^sutta^eb^nti bhattasammadavinodanattha.m sayita.m, kaayakilamathapa.tipassambhanaaya vaa anu~n~naatavelaaya.m supanta.m. ^b^jhaaya^eb^nti samathavipassanaajhaanehi jhaayanasiila.m bhaavanaanuyutta.m. ^b^nibodhentii^eb^ti pabodhenti. ``imepi naama nidda.m anupagantvaa jaagarantaa attanaa kattabba.m karonti, kima"nga.m panaaha''nti eva.m sampaja~n~nuppaadanena sayanato vu.t.thaapentiiti adhippaayo.

[03] ^b^aha.m kho ve.lugumbasmi^eb^nti aayasmato gosaalattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? sopi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m aacinanto ito ekanavute kappe a~n~natarasmi.m pabbate rukkhasaakhaaya.m olambamaana.m paccekabuddhassa pa.msukuulaciivara.m disvaa ``arahaddhajo vataaya''nti pasannacitto pupphehi puujehi. so tena pu~n~nakammena ^a^P1.0083^ea^ taavati.msabhavane nibbatto ^a^V1.0082^ea^. tato pa.t.thaaya devamanussesuyeva sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade magadhara.t.the ibbhakule nibbatto ^b^gosaalo^eb^ naama naamena. so.nena pana ko.tika.n.nena kataparicayattaa tassa pabbajitabhaava.m sutvaa ``sopi naama mahaavibhavo pabbajissati ^a^M1.0098^ea^, kima"nga.m panaaha''nti sa~njaatasa.mvego bhagavato santike pabbajitvaa cariyaanukuula.m kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa sappaaya.m vasana.t.thaana.m gavesanto attano jaatagaamassa aviduure ekasmi.m saanupabbate vihaasi. tassa maataa divase divase bhikkha.m deti. athekadivasa.m gaama.m pi.n.daaya pavi.t.thassa maataa madhusakkharaabhisa"nkhata.m paayaasa.m adaasi. so ta.m gahetvaa tassa pabbatassa chaayaaya.m a~n~natarassa ve.lugumbassa muule nisiiditvaa paribhu~njitvaa dhovitapattapaa.nii vipassana.m aarabhi. bhojanasappaayalaabhena kaayacittaana.m kallataaya samaahito udayabbaya~naa.naadike tikkhe suure vahante appakasireneva vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa maggapa.tipaa.tiyaa bhaavana.m matthaka.m paapento saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m sacchaakaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.50.8-14) --
[03] arahatta.m pana adhigantvaa di.t.thadhammasukhavihaarattha.m pabbatasaanumeva gantukaamo attano pa.tipatti.m pavedento ^b^``aha.m kho ve.lugumbasmi''^eb^nti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^ve.lugumbasmi^eb^nti ve.lugacchassa samiipe, tassa chaayaaya.m. ^b^bhutvaana madhupaayasa^eb^nti madhupasittapaayaasa.m bhu~njitvaa. ^b^padakkhi.na^eb^nti padakkhi.naggaahena, satthu ovaadassa sammaa sampa.ticchanenaati attho. ^b^sammasanto khandhaana.m^eb^ ^a^P1.0084^ea^ ^b^udayabbaya^eb^nti pa~ncanna.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m udayabbaya~nca vipassanto, yadipi idaani ^a^M1.0099^ea^ katakicco, phalasamaapatti.m pana samaapajjitu.m vipassana.m pa.t.thapentoti adhippaayo. ^b^saanu.m pa.tigamissaamii^eb^ti pubbe mayaa vutthapabbatasaanumeva uddissa ^a^V1.0083^ea^ gacchissaami. ^b^vivekamanubruuhaya^eb^nti pa.tipassaddhiviveka.m phalasamaapattikaayaviveka~nca paribruuhayanto, tassa vaa paribruuhanahetu gamissaamiiti. eva.m pana vatvaa thero tattheva gato, ayameva ca imassa therassa a~n~naabyaakara.nagaathaa ahosi.

[03] ^b^anuvassiko pabbajito^eb^ti aayasmato sugandhattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? so kira ito dvaanavute kappe tissassa naama sammaasambuddhassa kaale manussayoniya.m nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto migabyadhanena ara~n~ne vicarati. satthaa tassa anukampaaya padava.la~nja.m dassetvaa gato. so satthu padacetiyaani disvaa purimabuddhesu kataadhikaarataaya ``sadevake loke aggapuggalassa imaani padaanii''ti piitisomanassajaato kora.n.dakapupphaani gahetvaa puuja.m katvaa citta.m pasaadesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbattitvaa tato cuto aparaapara.m pu~n~naani katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto kassapassa bhagavato kaale ku.tumbiko hutvaa satthu bhikkhusa"nghassa ca mahaadaana.m pavattetvaa gandhaku.ti.m mahagghagositacandana.m pisitvaa tena paribha.n.da.m katvaa patthana.m pa.t.thapesi -- ``nibbattanibbatta.t.thaane mayha.m sariira.m eva.msugandha.m hotuu''ti. eva.m a~n~naanipi tattha tattha bhave bahuuni pu~n~nakammaani katvaa sugatiisu eva parivattamaano imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m vibhavasampannassa braahma.nassa gehe nibbatti. nibbattassa ca tassa maatukucchigatakaalato pa.t.thaaya maatu sariira.m sakalampi geha.m surabhigandha.m vaayati. jaatadivase pana visesato paramasugandha.m saamantagehesupi vaayateva. tassa maataapitaro ``amhaaka.m putto attanaava ^a^P1.0085^ea^ attano naama.m gahetvaa aagato''ti ^b^sugandho^eb^tveva naama.m aka.msu. so anupubbena vayappatto ^a^M1.0100^ea^ mahaaselatthera.m disvaa tassa santike dhamma.m sutvaa pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto sattaahabbhantare eva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.50.15-24) --
[22] pasumaarena jiivaami, kusala.m me na vijjati..
[22] ha.t.tho ha.t.thena cittena, pade citta.m pasaadayi.m..
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa a~n~na.m byaakaronto ^b^``anuvassiko pabbajito''^eb^ti ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^anuvassiko^eb^ti anugato upagato vassa.m anuvasso, anuvassova anuvassiko. ^b^pabbajito^eb^ti pabbajja.m upagato, pabbajito hutvaa upagatavassamatto ekavassikoti attho. atha vaa anugata.m pacchaagata.m apagata.m vassa.m anuvassa.m, ta.m assa atthiiti anuvassiko. yassa pabbajitassa vassa.m aparipu.n.nataaya na ga.nanuupagata.m, so eva.m vutto, tasmaa ^a^M1.0101^ea^ avassikoti vutta.m hoti. ^b^passa dhammasudhammata^eb^nti tava satthu dhammassa sudhammabhaava.m svaakkhaatata.m ekantaniyyaanikata.m passa, yattha anuvassiko tuva.m pabbajito. pubbenivaasa~naa.na.m dibbacakkhu~naa.na.m aasavakkhaya~naa.nanti ^b^tisso vijjaa^eb^ tayaa ^b^anuppattaa^eb^ sacchikataa, tato eva ^b^kata.m buddhassa saasana.m^eb^ sammaasambuddhassa saasana.m anusi.t.thi ovaado anusikkhitoti katakiccata.m nissaaya piitisomanassajaato thero attaana.m para.m viya katvaa vadatiiti.

[01] ^b^obhaasajaata^eb^nti ^a^P1.0086^ea^ aayasmato nandiyattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? so kira padumuttarassa bhagavato ^a^V1.0085^ea^ kaale satthari parinibbute cetiye candanasaarena vedika.m kaaretvaa u.laara.m puujaasakkaara.m pavattesi. tato pa.t.thaaya ajjhaasayasampanno hutvaa tattha tattha viva.t.tuupanissaya.m bahu.m pu~n~nakamma.m aacinitvaa devesu ca manussesu ca sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kapilavatthusmi.m sakyaraajakule nibbatti. tassa maataapitaro nandi.m janento jaatoti ^b^nandiyo^eb^ti naama.m aka.msu. so vayappatto anuruddhaadiisu satthu santike pabbajantesu sayampi pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto kataadhikaarataaya nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.15.15-20) --
[22] omatta.m me na passaami, pubbakammassida.m phala.m..

[01] arahatta.m pana patvaa anuruddhattheraadiihi saddhi.m paaciinava.msamigadaaye viharante imasmi.m there ekadivasa.m maaro paapimaa bhi.msaapetukaamo tassa bheravaruupa.m dasseti. thero ta.m ``maaro aya''nti ~natvaa ``paapima, ye maaradheyya.m viitivattaa, tesa.m tava kiriyaa ki.m karissati, tatonidaana.m pana tva.m eva vighaata.m anattha.m paapu.nissasii''ti dassento ^b^``obhaasajaata.m phalaga''^eb^nti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^obhaasajaata^eb^nti ~naa.nobhaasena jaatobhaasa.m aggamagga~naa.nassa adhigatattaa. tena anavasesato kilesandhakaarassa vihataviddha.msitabhaavato ativiya pabhassaranti attho. ^b^phalaga^eb^nti phala.m gata.m upagata.m, aggaphala~naa.nasahitanti adhippaayo. ^b^citta^eb^nti khii.naasavassa citta.m saama~n~nena vadati. tenaaha ^b^``abhi.nhaso''^eb^ti. ta~nhi nirodhaninnataaya khii.naasavaana.m niccakappa.m arahattaphalasamaapattisamaapajjanato ``phalena sahita''nti vattabbata.m arahati. ^b^taadisa^eb^nti tathaaruupa.m, arahantanti ^a^V1.0086^ea^ attho. ^b^aasajjaa^eb^ti visodhetvaa paribhuyya. ^b^ka.nhaa^eb^ti maara.m aalapati, so hi ka.nhakammattaa ka.nhaabhijaatitaaya ^a^P1.0087^ea^ ca ``ka.nho''ti vuccati. ^b^dukkha.m nigacchasii^eb^ti idha kucchianuppavesaadinaa niratthaka.m kaayaparissama.m dukkha.m, samparaaye ca appatikaara.m apaayadukkha.m upagamissasi paapu.nissasi. ta.m sutvaa maaro ``jaanaati ma.m sama.no''ti tatthevantaradhaayiiti.

[03] ^b^sutvaa^eb^ ^a^M1.0103^ea^ ^b^subhaasita.m vaaca^eb^nti aayasmato abhayattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? so kira padumuttarassa bhagavato saasane pabbajitvaa dhammakathiko hutvaa dhammakathanakaale pa.thama.m catuuhi gaathaahi bhagavanta.m abhitthavitvaa pacchaa dhamma.m kathesi. tenassa pu~n~nakammabalena kappaana.m satasahassa.m apaayapa.tisandhi naama naahosi. tathaa hi vutta.m --
[22] na gacchi kappaani apaayabhuumi.m, satasahassaani u.laarasaddho''ti.. (apa0 thera 2.55.221)

[01] khettasampattiyaadiihi tassa ca pubbapacchimasanni.t.thaanacetanaana.m ativiya u.laarabhaavena so aparimeyyo pu~n~naabhisando kusalaabhisando taadiso ahosi. ``acintiye pasannaana.m, vipaako hoti acintiyo''ti (apa0 thera 1.1.82) hi vutta.m. tattha tattha hi bhave upacita.m pu~n~na.m tassa upatthambhakamahosi. tathaa hi so vipassissa bhagavato ketakapupphehi puujamakaasi. eva.m u.laarehi pu~n~navisesehi sugatiisu eva sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade ra~n~no bimbisaarassa putto ^a^P1.0088^ea^ hutvaa nibbatti. ^b^abhayo^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. tassa uppatti parato aavi bhavissati. so niga.n.thena naa.taputtena ubhatoko.tika.m pa~nha.m sikkhaapetvaa ``ima.m pa~nha.m pucchitvaa sama.nassa gotamassa vaada.m aaropehii''ti vissajjito bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m pa~nha.m pucchitvaa tassa pa~nhassa aneka.msabyaakara.nabhaave bhagavataa kathite niga.n.thaana.m paraajaya.m, satthu ca sammaasambuddhabhaava.m viditvaa upaasakatta.m pa.tivedesi. tato ra~n~ne bimbisaare kaala"nkate sa~njaatasa.mvego saasane pabbajitvaa taalacchigga.luupamasuttadesanaaya sotaapanno hutvaa puna vipassana.m aarabhitvaa arahatta.m sacchaakaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.52.17-22) --
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa attano pa.tipattikittanena a~n~na.m byaakaronto ^b^``sutvaa subhaasita.m vaaca''^eb^nti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^sutvaa^eb^ti sota.m odahitvaa, sotadvaaraanusaarena upadhaaretvaa. ^b^subhaasita^eb^nti su.t.thu bhaasita.m, sammadeva bhaasita.m, sammaasambuddhabhaavato mahaakaaru.nikataaya ca ki~nci avisa.mvaadetvaa yathaadhippetassa atthassa ekantato saadhanavasena bhaasita.m catusaccavibhaavaniiyadhammakatha.m. na hi saccavinimuttaa bhagavato dhammadesanaa atthi. ^b^buddhassaa^eb^ti sabba~n~nubuddhassa. ^b^aadiccabandhuno^eb^ti aadiccava.mse sambhuutattaa aadicco bandhu etassaati aadiccabandhu, bhagavaa. tassa aadiccabandhuno. aadiccassa vaa bandhuuti aadiccabandhu, bhagavaa. tassa bhagavato orasaputtabhaavato. tenaaha bhagavaa --
[21] ``yo andhakaare tamasii pabha"nkaro, verocano ma.n.dalii uggatejo.
[22] maa raahu gilii caramantalikkhe, paja.m mama.m raahu pamu~nca suuriya''nti.. (sa.m0 ni0 1.91).
