[03] ^b^paccabyadhi^eb^nti ^a^P1.0089^ea^ pa.tivijjhi.m. ^b^hii^eb^-ti nipaatamatta.m. ^b^nipu.na^eb^nti sa.nha.m paramasukhuma.m, nirodhasacca.m, catusaccameva vaa. ^b^hii^eb^-ti vaa hetuatthe nipaato. yasmaa paccabyadhi.m nipu.na.m catusacca.m, tasmaa na daani ki~nci pa.tivijjhitabba.m atthiiti attho. yathaa ki.m pa.tivijjhiiti aaha ^b^``vaalagga.m usunaa yathaa''^eb^ti. yathaa sattadhaa bhinnassa vaalassa ko.ti.m susikkhito kusalo issaaso usunaa ka.n.dena avirajjhanto vijjheyya, eva.m paccabyadhi.m nipu.na.m ariyasaccanti yojanaa.

[03] ^b^dabba.m^eb^ ^a^M1.0105^ea^ ^a^V1.0088^ea^ ^b^kusa^eb^nti aayasmato lomasaka"ngiyattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? so kira ito ekanavute kappe vipassi.m bhagavanta.m passitvaa pasannamaanaso naanaapupphehi puujetvaa tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbatto puna aparaapara.m pu~n~naani katvaa sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto kassapassa bhagavato saasane pabbajitvaa sama.nadhamma.m karoti. tena ca samayena satthaaraa bhaddekarattapa.tipadaaya kathitaaya a~n~nataro bhikkhu bhaddekarattasuttavasena tena saakaccha.m karoti. so ta.m na sampaayaasi. asampaayanto ``aha.m anaagate tuyha.m bhaddekaratta.m kathetu.m samattho bhaveyya''nti pa.nidhaana.m akaasi, itaro ``puccheyya''nti. etesu pa.thamo eka.m buddhantara.m devamanussesu sa.msaritvaa amhaaka.m bhagavato kaale kapilavatthusmi.m saakiyaraajakule nibbatti. tassa sukhumaalabhaavena so.nassa viya paadatalesu lomaani jaataani, tenassa ^b^lomasaka"ngiyo^eb^ti naama.m ahosi. itaro devaloke nibbattitvaa ^b^candano^eb^ti pa~n~naayittha. lomasaka"ngiyo anuruddhaadiisu sakyakumaaresu pabbajantesu pabbajitu.m na icchi. atha na.m sa.mvejetu.m candano devaputto upasa"nkamitvaa bhaddekaratta.m pucchi. itaro ``na jaanaamii''ti. puna devaputto ``atha kasmaa tayaa `bhaddekaratta.m katheyya'nti ^a^P1.0090^ea^ sa"ngaro kato, idaani pana naamamattampi na jaanaasii''ti codesi. itaro tena saddhi.m bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa, ``mayaa kira, bhante, pubbe `imassa bhaddekaratta.m kathessaamii'ti sa"ngaro kato''ti pucchi. bhagavaa ``aama, kulaputta, kassapassa bhagavato kaale tayaa eva.m kata''nti aaha. svaayamattho uparipa.n.naasake aagatanayena vitthaarato veditabbo. atha lomasaka"ngiyo ``tena hi, bhante, pabbaajetha ma''nti aaha. bhagavaa ``na, kho, tathaagataa maataapituuhi ananu~n~naata.m putta.m pabbaajentii''ti pa.tikkhipi. so maatu santika.m gantvaa ``anujaanaahi ma.m, amma, pabbajitu.m, pabbajissaamaha''nti vatvaa, maataraa ``taata, sukhumaalo tva.m katha.m pabbajissasii''ti vutte, ``attano parissayasahanabhaava.m pakaasento ^b^``dabba.m kusa.m po.takila''^eb^nti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M1.0106^ea^ ^b^dabba^eb^nti dabbati.namaaha, ya.m ``saddulo''tipi vuccati. ^b^kusa^eb^nti kusati.na.m, yo ``kaaso''ti vuccati. ^b^po.takila^eb^nti saka.n.taka.m aka.n.taka~nca gaccha.m. idha pana saka.n.takameva adhippeta.m. usiiraadiini suvi~n~neyyaani. dabbaadiini ti.naani biira.nati.naani paadehi akkantassaapi dukkhajanakaani gamanantaraayakaraani ca, taani ca panaaha.m ^b^urasaa panudissaami^eb^ urasaapi apanessaami. eva.m apanento ta.m nimitta.m dukkha.m sahanto ara~n~naayatane gumbantara.m pavisitvaa sama.nadhamma.m kaatu.m sakkhissaami. ko pana vaado paadehi akkamaneti dasseti. ^b^vivekamanubruuhaya^eb^nti ^a^V1.0089^ea^ kaayaviveka.m cittaviveka.m upadhiviveka~nca anubruuhayanto. ga.nasa"nga.nika~nhi pahaaya kaayaviveka.m anubruuhayantasseva a.t.thati.msaaya aaramma.nesu yattha katthaci citta.m samaadahantassa cittaviveko, na sa"nga.nikaaratassa. samaahitasseva vipassanaaya kamma.m karontassa samathavipassana~nca yuganaddha.m karontassa kilesaana.m khepanena upadhivivekaadhigamo, na asamaahitassa. tena vutta.m ``vivekamanubruuhayanti kaayaviveka.m cittaviveka.m upadhiviveka~nca anubruuhayanto''ti. eva.m pana puttena vutte maataa ``tena hi, taata, pabbajaa''ti anujaani. so bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa pabbajja.m yaaci. ta.m ^a^P1.0091^ea^ satthaa pabbaajesi. ta.m pabbajitvaa katapubbakicca.m kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa ara~n~na.m pavisanta.m bhikkhuu aaha.msu -- ``aavuso, tva.m sukhumaalo ki.m sakkhissasi ara~n~ne vasitu''nti. so tesampi tameva gaatha.m vatvaa ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa bhaavana.m anuyu~njanto nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.52.23-27) --
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa thero a~n~na.m byaakaronto ta.myeva gaatha.m abhaasiiti.

[03] ^b^kacci^eb^ ^a^M1.0107^ea^ ^b^no vatthapasuto^eb^ti aayasmato jambugaamiyaputtattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? so kira purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro hutvaa tattha tattha viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m aacinanto ito ekati.mse kappe vessabhussa bhagavato kaale ekadivasa.m ki.msukaani pupphaani disvaa taani pupphaani gahetvaa buddhagu.ne anussaranto bhagavanta.m uddissa aakaase khipanto puujesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena taavati.msesu nibbatto. tato para.m pu~n~naani katvaa aparaapara.m devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade campaaya.m jambugaamiyassa naama upaasakassa putto hutvaa nibbatti. tena ^a^V1.0090^ea^ pu~n~nakammena taavati.msesu nibbatto. tato para.m pu~n~naani katvaa aparaapara.m devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade campaaya.m jambugaamiyassa naama upaasakassa putvaa nibbatti. tenassa ^b^jambugaamiyaputto^eb^tveva sama~n~naa ahosi. so vayappatto bhagavato santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasa.mvego pabbajitvaa katapubbakicco kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa saakete a~njanavane vasati. athassa pitaa ``ki.m nu kho mama putto saasane abhirato viharati, udaahu no''ti viima.msanattha.m ^b^``kacci no vatthapasuto''^eb^ti gaatha.m likhitvaa pesesi. so ta.m vaacetvaa, ``pitaa me pamaadavihaara.m aasa"nkati, aha~nca ajjaapi puthujjanabhuumi.m naativatto''ti sa.mvegajaato gha.tento vaayamanto nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.50.25-30) --

[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa ~naatiina.m vasananagara.m gantvaa saasanassa niyyaanikabhaava.m pakaasento iddhipaa.tihaariya.m dassesi. ta.m disvaa ~naatakaa pasannamaanasaa bahuu sa"nghaaraame kaaresu.m. theropi sakapitaraa pesita.m ^a^M1.0108^ea^ gaatha.m a"nkusa.m katvaa gha.tento vaayamanto arahatta.m sacchaakaasi. a~n~na.m byaakarontopi pitupuujanattha.m ^b^``kacci no vatthapasuto''^eb^ti tameva gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^kaccii^eb^ti pucchaaya.m nipaato. ^b^no^eb^ti pa.tisedhe. ^b^vatthapasuto^eb^ti vatthe pasuto vatthapasuto, ciivarama.n.danaabhirato. nidassanamatta~nceta.m pattama.n.danaadicaapallapa.tikkhepassaapi adhippetattaa. ``kacci na vatthapasuto''tipi paa.tho, so evattho. ^b^bhuusanaarato^eb^ti attabhaavavibhuusanaaya rato abhirato, yathekacce pabbajitvaapi capalaa kaayada.lhibahulaa ciivaraadiparikkhaarassa attano sariirassa ca ma.n.danavibhuusana.t.thaanaaya yuttaa honti. kimeva parikkhaarapasuto bhuusanaarato ca naahosiiti ayamettha padadvayassaapi attho. ^b^siilamaya.m gandha^eb^nti akha.n.daadibhaavaapaadanena suparisuddhassa catubbidhassapi siilassa vasena yvaaya.m ``yo ca siilavata.m pajaati ^a^V1.0091^ea^ na itaraa dussiilapajaa, dussiilattaayeva dussilyamaya.m duggandha.m vaayati, eva.m tva.m duggandha.m avaayitvaa kacci siilamaya.m gandha.m vaayasiiti ^a^P1.0093^ea^ attho. atha vaa ^b^netaraa pajaa^eb^ti na itaraa dussiilapajaa, ta.m kacci na hoti, yato siilamaya.m gandha.m vaayasiiti byatirekena siilagandhavaayanameva vibhaaveti.

[03] ^b^samunnamayamattaana^eb^nti aayasmato haaritattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? so kira purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro hutvaa tattha tattha viva.t.tuupanissaya.m pu~n~nasambhaara.m upacinanto ito ekati.mse kappe sudassana.m ^a^M1.0109^ea^ naama paccekasambuddha.m disvaa pasannamaanaso ku.tajapupphehi puuja.m katvaa tena pu~n~nakammena sugatiisuyeva parivattento imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthinagare braahma.namahaasaalakule nibbatti. ^b^haarito^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. tassa vayappattassa maataapitaro kularuupaadiihi anucchavika.m kumaarika.m braahma.nadhiitara.m aanesu.m. so taaya saddhi.m bhogasukha.m anubhavanto ekadivasa.m attano tassaa ca ruupasampatti.m oloketvaa dhammataaya codiyamaano ``iidisa.m naama ruupa.m nacirasseva jaraaya maccunaa ca abhippamaddiiyatii''ti sa.mvega.m pa.tilabhi. katipayadivasaatikkameneva cassa bhariya.m ka.nhasappo .da.msitvaa maaresi. so tena bhiyyosomattaaya sa~njaatasa.mvego satthu santika.m gantvaa dhamma.m sutvaa gharabandhane chinditvaa pabbaji. tassa ca cariyaanukuula.m kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa viharantassa kamma.t.thaana.m na sampajjati, citta.m ujugata.m na hoti. so gaama.m pi.n.daaya pavi.t.tho a~n~natara.m usukaara.m usuda.n.da.m yante pakkhipitvaa uju.m karonta.m disvaa ``ime acetanampi naama uju.m karonti, kasmaa aha.m citta.m uju.m na karissaamii''ti cintetvaa tatova pa.tinivattitvaa divaa.t.thaane nisinno vipassana.m aarabhi. athassa bhagavaa upari aakaase nisiiditvaa ovaada.m dento ^b^``samunnamayamattaana''^eb^nti gaatha.m abhaasi. ayameva thero attaana.m para.m viya ovadanto abhaasiiti ca vadanti.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^samunnamaya^eb^nti sammaa unnamento, samaapattivasena kosajjapakkhe ^a^P1.0094^ea^ patitu.m adatvaa tato uddharanto viiriyasamata.m yojentoti attho. ^b^attaana^eb^nti citta.m, atha vaa ^b^samunnamayaa^eb^ti kosajjapakkhato samunnamehi. ^b^ma^eb^-kaaro padasandhikaro. hiinaviiriyataaya tava citta.m kamma.t.thaanaviithi.m nappa.tipajjati ce, ta.m viiriyaarambhavasena sammaa unnamehi, anonata.m anapanata.m karohiiti ^a^V1.0092^ea^ adhippaayo. eva.m pana karonto ^b^usukaarova tejana.m. citta.m uju.m karitvaana, avijja.m bhinda haaritaa^eb^ti. yathaa naama usukaaro ka.n.da.m iisakampi onata.m apanata~nca vijjhanto lakkha.m bhindanattha.m uju.m karoti, eva.m kosajjapaatato arakkha.nena onata.m uddhaccapaatato arakkha.nena apanata.m vijjhanto appanaapattiyaa citta.m uju.m ^a^M1.0110^ea^ karitvaana samaahitacitto vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa siigha.m aggamagga~naa.nena avijja.m bhinda padaalehiiti. ta.m sutvaa thero vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa nacireneva arahaa ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.35.39-43) --
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa a~n~na.m byaakarontopi tameva gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] ^b^aabaadhe me samuppanne^eb^ti aayasmato uttiyattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? so kira purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha viva.t.tuupanissaya.m pu~n~na.m upacinanto ito catunavute kappe siddhatthassa bhagavato kaale candabhaagaaya nadiyaa mahaaruupo ^a^P1.0095^ea^ susumaaro hutvaa nibbatto. so paara.m gantu.m nadiyaa tiira.m upagata.m bhagavanta.m disvaa pasannacitto paara.m netukaamo tiirasamiipe nipajji. bhagavaa tassa anukampaaya pi.t.thiya.m paade .thapesi. so ha.t.tho udaggo piitivegena digu.nussaaho hutvaa sota.m chindanto siighena javena bhagavanta.m paratiira.m nesi. bhagavaa tassa cittappasaada.m ^a^V1.0093^ea^ oloketvaa ``aya.m ito cuto devaloke ^a^M1.0111^ea^ nibbattitvaa tato pa.t.thaaya sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto ito catunavute kappe amata.m paapu.nissatii''ti byaakaritvaa pakkaami.

[03] so tathaa sugatiisuyeva paribbhamanto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m a~n~natarassa braahma.nassa putto hutvaa nibbatti ^b^uttiyo^eb^ naama naamena. so vayappatto ``amata.m pariyesissaamii''ti paribbaajako hutvaa vicaranto ekadivasa.m bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa dhamma.m sutvaa saasane pabbajitvaapi siilaadiina.m avisodhitattaa visesa.m nibbattetu.m asakkonto a~n~ne bhikkhuu visesa.m nibbattetvaa a~n~na.m byaakaronte disvaa satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa sa"nkhepeneva ovaada.m yaaci. satthaapi tassa ``tasmaatiha tva.m, uttiya, aadimeva visodhehii''tiaadinaa (sa.m0 ni0 5.369) sa"nkhepeneva ovaada.m adaasi. so tassa ovaade .thatvaa vipassana.m aarabhi. tassa aaraddhavipassanassa aabaadho uppajji. uppanne pana aabaadhe sa~njaatasa.mvego viiriyaarambhavatthu.m katvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.3.169-179) --
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa attano sammaa pa.tipattiyaa paripu.n.naakaaravibhaavanamukhena a~n~na.m byaakaronto ^b^``aabaadhe me samuppanne''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^aabaadhe me samuppanne^eb^ti sariirassa aabaadhanato ``aabaadho''ti laddhanaame visabhaagadhaatukkhobhahetuke roge mayha.m sa~njaate. ^b^sati me udapajjathaa^eb^ti ``uppanno kho me aabaadho, .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati, yadida.m aabaadho va.d.dheyya. yaava panaaya.m aabaadho na va.d.dhati, handaaha.m ^a^P1.0096^ea^ viiriya.m aarabhaami `appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaayaa'''ti viiriyaarambhavatthubhuutaa sati tasseva aabaadhassa vasena dukkhaaya vedanaaya pii.liyamaanassa mayha.m udapaadi. tenaaha ^b^``aabodho me samuppanno, kaalo me nappamajjitu''^eb^nti. eva.m uppanna~nhi sati.m a"nkusa.m katvaa aya.m thero arahatta.m pattoti.

[01] ^b^phu.t.tho^eb^ ^a^M1.0113^ea^ ^a^V1.0095^ea^ ^b^.da.msehii^eb^ti aayasmato gahvaratiiriyattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? so kira purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro ito ekati.mse kappe sikhissa bhagavato kaale migaluddo hutvaa ara~n~ne vicaranto addasa sikhi.m bhagavanta.m a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule devanaagayakkhaana.m dhamma.m desenta.m, disvaa pana pasannamaanaso ``dhammo esa vuccatii''ti sare nimitta.m aggahesi. so tena cittappasaadena devaloke uppanno puna aparaapara.m sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ``aggidatto''ti laddhanaamo vayappatto bhagavato yamakapaa.tihaariya.m disvaa sa~njaatappasaado saasane pabbajitvaa kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa gahvaratiire naama ara~n~na.t.thaane vasati. tenassa ^b^gahvaratiirayo^eb^ti sama~n~naa ahosi. so vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.52.44-50) --
[22] tattha citta.m pasaadetvaa, uttari.m duttara.m bhava.m..

[03] arahatta.m ^a^P1.0097^ea^ pana patvaa bhagavanta.m vanditvaa saavatthiya.m agamaasi. tassa aagatabhaava.m sutvaa ~naatakaa upagantvaa mahaadaana.m pavattesu.m. so katipayadivase vasitvaa ara~n~nameva gantukaamo ahosi. ta.m ~naatakaa, ``bhante, ara~n~na.m naama .da.msamakasaadivasena bahuparissaya.m, idheva vasathaa''ti ^a^M1.0114^ea^ ^a^V1.0096^ea^ aaha.msu. ta.m sutvaa thero ``ara~n~navaasoyeva mayha.m ruccatii''ti vivekaabhiratikittanamukhena a~n~na.m byaakaronto ``phu.t.tho .da.msehii''ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^phu.t.tho .da.msehi makasehii^eb^ti .da.msanasiilataaya ``.da.msaa''ti laddhanaamaahi andhakamakkhikaahi, makasana~n~nitehi ca suucimukhapaa.nehi phussito da.t.thoti attho. ^b^ara~n~nasmi^eb^nti ``pa~ncadhanusatika.m pacchima''nti (paaraa0 654) vuttaara~n~nalakkha.nayogato ara~n~ne. ^b^brahaavane^eb^ti mahaarukkhagacchagahanataaya mahaavane ara~n~naaniya.m. ^b^naago sa"ngaamasiisevaa^eb^ti sa"ngaamaavacaro hatthinaago viya sa"ngaamamuddhani parasenaasampahaara.m. ``ara~n~navaaso naama buddhaadiihi va.n.nito thomito''ti ussaahajaato ^b^sato^eb^ satimaa hutvaa ^b^tatra^eb^ tasmi.m ara~n~ne, tasmi.m vaa .da.msaadisamphasse upa.t.thite ^b^adhivaasaye^eb^ adhivaaseyya saheyya, ``.da.msaadayo ma.m aabaadhentii''ti ara~n~navaasa.m na jaheyyaati attho.

[03] ^b^ajara.m jiiramaanenaa^eb^ti aayasmato suppiyattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? so kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa ara~n~naayatane vasanto tattha bhagavanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso phalaaphala.m adaasi, tathaa bhikkhusa"nghassa. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto kassapassa sammaasambuddhassa kaale khattiyakule nibbattitvaa anukkamena vi~n~nuta.m patto kalyaa.namittasannissayena laddhasa.mvego saasane pabbajitvaa bahussuto ahosi. jaatimadena sutamadena ca attaana.m ukka.msento pare ca vambhento vihaasi. so imasmi.m buddhuppaade tassa ^a^P1.0098^ea^ kammassa nissandena saavatthiya.m paribhuutaruupe susaanagopakakule nibbatti. ^b^suppiyo^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. atha vi~n~nuta.m patto attano sahaayabhuuta.m sopaakatthera.m ^a^M1.0115^ea^ upasa"nkamitvaa tassa santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasa.mvego pabbajitvaa sammaapa.tipatti.m puuretvaa ^b^``ajara.m jiiramaanenaa''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^ajara^eb^nti jaraarahita.m, nibbaana.m sandhaayaaha. ta~nhi ajaatattaa natthi ettha jaraa, etasmi.m vaa adhigate puggalassa saa natthiiti jaraabhaavahetutopi ajara.m naama. ^b^jiiramaanenaa^eb^ti jiirantena, kha.ne kha.ne jara.m paapu.nantena. ^b^tappamaanenaa^eb^ti santappamaanena, raagaadiihi ^a^V1.0097^ea^ ekaadasahi aggiihi dayhamaanena. ^b^nibbuti^eb^nti yathaavuttasantaapaabhaavato nibbutasabhaava.m nibbaana.m. ^b^nimiya^eb^nti parivatteyya.m cetaapeyya.m. ^b^parama.m santi^eb^nti anavasesakilesaabhisa"nkhaarapari.laahavuupasamadhammataaya uttama.m santi.m. catuuhi yogehi ananubandhattaa ^b^yogakkhema.m^eb^. attano uttaritarassa kassaci abhaavato ^b^anuttara.m^eb^. aya~nhettha sa"nkhepattho -- kha.ne kha.ne jaraaya abhibhuyyamaanattaa jiiramaanena, tathaa raagaggiaadiihi santappamaanena gato eva.m aniccena dukkhena asaarena sabbathaapi anupasantasabhaavena saupaddavena, tappa.tipakkhabhaavato ajara.m paramupasamabhuuta.m kenaci anupadduta.m anuttara.m nibbaana.m nimiya.m parivatteyya.m ``mahaa vata me laabho mahaa udayo hatthagato''ti. yathaa hi manussaa ya.m ki~nci bha.n.da.m parivattentaa nirapekkhaa gayhamaanena sambahumaanaa honti, evamaya.m thero pahitatto viharanto attano kaaye ca jiivite ca nirapekkhata.m, nibbaana.m pa.tipesitatta~nca pakaasento ``nimiya.m parama.m santi.m, yogakkhema.m anuttara''nti vatvaa tameva ^a^P1.0099^ea^ pa.tipatti.m paribruuhayanto vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.52.51-77) --
[22] paribhutte ca sa"nghamhi, pu~n~na.m tava bhavissati..
[22] bhoge me uunataa natthi, phaladaanassida.m phala.m..
[22] kumbha.n.daa garu.laa caapi, paaricariya.m upenti me..
[22] tepi ma.m sara.na.m yanti, phaladaanassida.m phala.m..
[22] sabbe ma.m sara.na.m yanti, phaladaanassida.m phala.m..
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaapi tameva gaatha.m a~n~naabyaakara.navasena abhaasi.

[03] ^b^yathaapi ekaputtasmi^eb^nti aayasmato sopaakattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? so kira purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro hutvaa tattha tattha viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinanto kakusandhassa bhagavato kaale a~n~natarassa ku.tumbikassa putto hutvaa nibbatto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m disvaa pasannacitto biijapuuraphalaani satthu upanesi. pa.tiggahesi bhagavaa anukampa.m upaadaaya ^a^M1.0118^ea^. so bhikkhusa"nghe ca abhippasanno salaakabhatta.m pa.t.thapetvaa sa"nghuddesavasena ti.n.na.m bhikkhuuna.m yaavataayuka.m khiirabhatta.m adaasi. so tehi pu~n~nakammehi aparaapara.m devamanussesu sampatti.m anubhavanto ekadaa manussayoniya.m nibbatto ekassa paccekabuddhassa khiirabhatta.m adaasi. eva.m tattha tattha pu~n~naani katvaa sugatiisu eva paribbhamanto imasmi.m buddhuppaade purimakammanissandena saavatthiya.m a~n~nataraaya duggatitthiyaa kucchimhi pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi. tassa maataa dasa maase kucchinaa pariharitvaa paripakke gabbhe vijaayanakaale vijaayitu.m asakkontii muccha.m aapajjitvaa bahuvela.m mataa viya nipajji. ta.m ~naatakaa ``mataa''ti sa~n~naaya susaana.m netvaa citaka.m aaropetvaa devataanubhaavena vaatavu.t.thiyaa u.t.thitaaya aggi.m adatvaa pakkami.msu. daarako ^a^P1.0100^ea^ pacchimabhaavikattaa devataanubhaavena maatukucchito arogo nikkhami. maataa pana kaalamakaasi. devataa ta.m gahetvaa manussaruupena susaanagopakassa gehe .thapetvaa katipayakaala.m patiruupena aahaarena posesi. tato para.m susaanagopako ca na.m attano putta.m katvaa va.d.dheti. so tathaa va.d.dhento tassa puttena supiyena naama daarakena saddhi.m kii.lanto vicarati. tassa susaane jaatasa.mva.d.dhabhaavato ^b^sopaako^eb^ti sama~n~naa ahosi.

[03] athekadivasa.m sattavassika.m ta.m bhagavaa paccuusavelaaya ~naa.najaala.m pattharitvaa veneyyabandhave oloketvaa ~naa.najalantogadha.m disvaa susaana.t.thaana.m agamaasi. daarako pubbahetunaa codiyamaano pasannamaanaso satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa a.t.thaasi. satthaa tassa dhamma.m kathesi. so dhamma.m sutvaa pabbajja.m yaacitvaa ``pitaraa anu~n~naatosii''ti vutto pitara.m satthu santika.m nesi. tassa ^a^V1.0100^ea^ pitaa satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa ``bhante, ima.m daaraka.m pabbaajethaa''ti anujaani. satthaa ta.m pabbaajetvaa mettaabhaavanaaya niyojesi. so mettaakamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa susaane viharanto ca cirasseva mettaajhaana.m nibbattetvaa jhaana.m paadaka.m katvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m sacchaakaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.45.1-7) --
[03] arahaa hutvaa pana a~n~nesa.m sosaanikabhikkhuuna.m mettaabhaavanaavidhi.m dassento ^b^``yathaapi ekaputtasmi''^eb^nti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^yathaa^eb^ti opammatthe nipaato. ^b^ekaputtasmi^eb^nti punaati ca kulava.msa.m taayati caati putto, atrajaadibhedo putto. eko putto ekaputto, tasmi.m ekaputtasmi.m. visaye ceta.m bhummavacana.m. ^b^piyasmi^eb^nti piyaayitabbataaya ceva ekaputtataaya ca ruupasiilaacaaraadiihi ca pemakara.na.t.thaanabhuute. ^b^kusalii^eb^ti kusala.m vuccati khema.m sotthibhaavo, ta.m labhitabba.m etassa atthiiti kusalii, sattaana.m hitesii ^a^P1.0101^ea^ mettajjhaasayo. ^b^sabbesu paa.nesuu^eb^ti sabbesu sattesu. ^b^sabbatthaa^eb^ti sabbaasu disaasu sabbesu vaa bhavaadiisu, sabbaasu vaa avatthaasu. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- yathaa ekaputtake piye manaape maataapitaa kusalii ekantahitesii bhaveyya, eva.m puratthimaadibhedaasu sabbaasu disaasu, kaamabhavaadibhedesu sabbesu bhavesu daharaadibhedaasu sabbaasu avatthaasu ca .thitesu sabbesu sattesu ekantahitesitaaya kusalii bhaveyya, ``mitto udaasiino pa~ncatthiko''ti siima.m akatvaa siimaasambhedavasena sabbattha ekarasa.m metta.m bhaaveyyaati. ima.m pana gaatha.m vatvaa ``sace tumhe aayasmanto eva.m mettaabhaavana.m ^a^M1.0120^ea^ anuyu~njeyyaatha, ye te bhagavataa `sukha.m supatii'tiaadinaa ^a^V1.0101^ea^ (a0 ni0 11.15) ekaadasa mettaanisa.msaa vuttaa, eka.msena tesa.m bhaagino bhavathaa''ti ovaadamadaasi.

[03] ^b^anaasannavaraa^eb^ti aayasmato posiyattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? so kira purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha viva.t.tuupanissaya.m bahu.m kusala.m upacinitvaa sugatiisu eva sa.msaranto ito dvenavute kappe tissassa bhagavato kaale migaluddo hutvaa ara~n~ne vicarati. atha bhagavaa tassa anuggaha.m kaatu.m ara~n~na.m gantvaa tassa cakkhupathe attaana.m dassesi. so bhagavanta.m disvaa pasannacitto aavudha.m nikkhipitvaa upasa"nkamitvaa a~njali.m paggayha a.t.thaasi. bhagavaa nisiiditukaamata.m dassesi. so taavadeva ti.namu.t.thiyo gahetvaa same bhuumibhaage sakkacca.m santharitvaa adaasi. nisiidi tattha bhagavaa anukampa.m upaadaaya. nisinne pana bhagavati anappaka.m piitisomanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedento bhagavanta.m vanditvaa sayampi ekamanta.m nisiidi. atha bhagavaa ``ettaka.m va.t.tati imassa kusalabiija''nti u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami. acirapakkante bhagavati ta.m siiho migaraajaa ghaatesi. so ^a^P1.0102^ea^ kaala"nkato devaloke nibbatti. ``so kira bhagavati anupagacchante siihena ghaatito niraye nibbattissatii''ti ta.m disvaa bhagavaa sugatiya.m nibbattanattha.m kusalabiijaropanattha~nca upasa"nkami.

[03] so tattha yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa tato devalokato cavitvaa sugatiisuyeva parivattento imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m a~n~natarassa mahaavibhavassa se.t.thino putto sa"ngaamajitattherassa kani.t.thabhaataa hutvaa nibbatti. ^b^posiyo^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vayappatto daarapariggaha.m katvaa eka.m putta.m labhitvaa antimabhavikataaya dhammataaya codiyamaano jaatiaadi.m pa.ticca uppannasa.mvego pabbajitvaa ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa vuupaka.t.tho hutvaa ^a^M1.0121^ea^ catusaccakamma.t.thaanabhaavana.m anuyu~njanto nacirasseva vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.53.1-12) --
[22] sohena pothito, santo tattha kaala"nkato aha.m..

[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa bhagavanta.m vanditu.m saavatthi.m aagato ~naati.m anukampaaya ~naatigeha.m agamaasi. tattha na.m puraa.nadutiyikaa vanditvaa aasanadaanaadinaa pa.thama.m upaasikaa viya vatta.m dassetvaa therassa ajjhaasaya.m ajaanantii pacchaa itthikuttaadiihi palobhetukaamaa ahosi ^a^M1.0122^ea^. thero ``aho andhabaalaa maadisepi naama eva.m pa.tipajjatii''ti cintetvaa ki~nci avatvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa ara~n~nameva gato. ta.m aara~n~nakaa bhikkhuu ``ki.m, aavuso, atilahu.m, nivattosi, ~naatakehi na di.t.thosii''ti pucchi.msu. thero tattha pavatti.m aacikkhanto ^b^``anaasannavaraa etaa''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^anaasannavaraa^eb^ti ^b^etaa^eb^ itthiyo na aasannaa anupagataa, duure eva vaa .thitaa hutvaa varaa purisassa se.t.thaa hitaavahaa, ta~nca kho ^b^niccameva^eb^ sabbakaalameva, na rattimeva, na divaapi, na rahovelaayapi. ^b^vijaanataa^eb^ti vijaanantena. ``anaasannaparaa''tipi paa.li, so evattho. aya~nhettha adhippaayo -- ca.n.dahatthiassamahi.msasiihabyagghayakkharakkhasapisaacaapi manussaana.m ^a^V1.0103^ea^ ^a^P1.0103^ea^ anupasa"nkamanto varaa se.t.thaa, na anatthaavahaa, te pana upasa"nkamantaa di.t.thadhammika.myeva anattha.m kareyyu.m. itthiyo pana upasa"nkamitvaa di.t.thadhammika.m samparaayika.m vimokkhanissitampi attha.m vinaasetvaa mahanta.m anattha.m aapaadenti, tasmaa anaasannavaraa etaa niccameva vijaanataati. idaani tamattha.m attuupanaayika.m katvaa dassento ^b^``gaamaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^gaamaa^eb^ti gaama.m. upayogatthe hi eta.m nissakkavacana.m. ^b^ara~n~namaagammaa^eb^ti ara~n~nato aagantvaa. ^b^ma^eb^-kaaro padasandhikaro, nissakke ceta.m upayogavacana.m. ^b^tato^eb^ti ma~ncakato. ^b^anaamantetvaa^eb^ti anaalapitvaa puraa.nadutiyika.m ``appamattaa hohii''ti ettakampi avatvaa. ^b^posiyo^eb^ti attaanameva para.m viya vadati. ye pana ``pakkaami''nti pa.thanti, tesa.m aha.m posiyo pakkaaminti yojanaa. ye pana ``saa itthii thera.m ghara.m upagata.m bhojetvaa palobhetukaamaa jaataa, ta.m disvaa thero taavadeva gehato nikkhamitvaa vihaara.m gantvaa attano vasana.t.thaane ma~ncake nisiidi. saapi kho itthii pacchaabhatta.m ala"nkatapa.tiyattaa vihaare therassa vasana.t.thaana.m upasa"nkami. ta.m disvaa thero ki~nci avatvaa u.t.thaaya divaa.t.thaanameva gato''ti vadanti, tesa.m ``gaamaa ara~n~namaagammaa''ti gaathaapadassa attho yathaarutavaseneva niyyati. vihaaro hi idha ``ara~n~na''nti adhippeto.

[03] ^b^sukha.m^eb^ ^a^M1.0123^ea^ ^b^sukhattho^eb^ti aayasmato saama~n~nakaanittherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? so kira purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro hutvaa tattha tattha bhave kusala.m upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe vipassissa bhagavato kaale manussayoniya.m nibbatto vipassi.m bhagavanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso eka.m ma~nca.m adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade a~n~natarassa paribbaajakassa putto hutvaa ^a^P1.0104^ea^ nibbatti. ^b^saama~n~nakaanii^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vi~n~nuta.m patto satthu yamakapaa.tihaariya.m disvaa pasannamaanaso saasane pabbajitvaa cariyaanukuula.m kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa jhaana.m nibbattetvaa jhaana.m paadaka.m katvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.36.30-33) --
[22] eka.m ma~nca.m mayaa dinna.m, pasannena sapaa.ninaa..

[03] therassa pana gihisahaayako kaatiyaano naama paribbaajako buddhuppaadato pa.t.thaaya titthiyaana.m hatalaabhasakkaarataaya ghaasacchaadanamattampi alabhanto aajiivakaapakato thera.m upasa"nkamitvaa ``tumhe saakiyaputtiyaa naama mahaalaabhaggayasaggappattaa sukhena jiivatha, maya.m pana dukkhitaa kicchajiivikaa, katha.m nu kho pa.tipajjamaanassa di.t.thadhammika~nceva samparaayika~nca sukha.m sampajjatii''ti pucchi. athassa thero ``nippariyaayato sukha.m naama lokuttarasukhameva, ta~nca tadanuruupa.m pa.tipatti.m pa.tipajjantassevaa''ti attanaa tassa adhigatabhaava.m pariyaayena vibhaavento ^b^``sukha.m sukhattho labhate tadaacara''^eb^nti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M1.0124^ea^ ^b^sukha^eb^nti niraamisa.m sukha.m idhaadhippeta.m. ta~nca phalasamaapatti ceva nibbaana~nca. tathaa hi ``aya.m samaadhi paccuppannasukho ceva aayati~nca sukhavipaako'' (dii0 ni0 3.355; a0 ni0 5.27; vibha0 804) ``nibbaana.m parama.m sukha''nti (dha0 pa0 203-204) ca vutta.m. ^b^sukhattho^eb^ti sukhappayojano, yathaavuttena sukhena atthiko. ^b^labhate^eb^ti paapu.naati, atthikasseveda.m sukha.m, na itarassa. ko pana atthikoti aaha ^b^``tadaacara''^eb^nti tadattha.m aacaranto, yaaya pa.tipattiyaa ta.m pa.tipatti.m pa.tipajjantoti attho. na kevala.m tadaacara.m sukhameva labhate, atha kho ^b^kitti~nca pappoti^eb^ ``itipi siilavaa suparisuddhakaayavaciikammanto suparisuddhaajiivo jhaayii jhaanayutto''tiaadinaa kitti.m parammukhaa pattha.tayasata.m paapu.naati. ^b^yasassa va.d.dhatii^eb^ti ^a^P1.0105^ea^ sammukhe gu.naabhitthavasa"nkhaato parivaarasampadaasa"nkhaato ca yaso assa paribruuhati. idaani ``tadaacara''nti saama~n~nato vuttamattha.m saruupato dassento -- ^b^``yo ariyama.t.tha"ngikama~njasa.m uju.m, bhaaveti magga.m amatassa pattiyaa''^eb^ti aaha. tassattho ^b^yo^eb^ puggalo kilesehi aarakattaa parisuddha.t.thena pa.tipajjantaana.m ariyabhaavakara.na.t.thena ^b^ariya.m,^eb^ sammaadi.t.thiaadia.t.tha"ngasamudaayataaya ^b^a.t.tha"ngika.m,^eb^ antadvayarahitamajjhimapa.tipattibhaavato aku.tila.t.thena ^b^a~njasa.m,^eb^ kaayava"nkaadippahaanato ^b^uju.m,^eb^ nibbaanatthikehi magganiya.t.thena kilese maarento gamana.t.thena ca ^b^``magga''^eb^nti laddhanaama.m dukkhanirodhagaaminipa.tipada.m ^b^amatassa^eb^ asa"nkhataaya dhaatuyaa ^b^pattiyaa^eb^ adhigamaaya ^b^bhaaveti^eb^ attano santaane uppaadeti va.d.dheti ca, so nippariyaayena ``sukhattho tadaacara''nti ^a^V1.0105^ea^ vuccati, tasmaa yathaavutta.m sukha.m labhati. ta.m sutvaa paribbaajako pasannamaanaso pabbajitvaa sammaa pa.tipajjanto nacirasseva vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. idameva therassa a~n~naabyaakara.na.m ahosi.

[03] ^b^saadhu^eb^ ^a^M1.0125^ea^ ^b^suta^eb^nti aayasmato kumaaputtattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppati? so kira purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro ito ekanavute kappe ajinacammavasano taapaso hutvaa bandhumatiinagare raajuyyaane vasanto vipassi.m bhagavanta.m passitvaa pasannamaanaso paadabbha~njanatela.m adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbatto. tato pa.t.thaaya sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade avantira.t.the ve.luka.n.takanagare gahapatikule nibbatto. ``nando''tissa naama.m aka.msu. maataa panassa kumaa naama, tena ^b^kumaaputto^eb^ti pa~n~naayittha. so aayasmato saariputtassa santike dhamma.m sutvaa laddhappasaado pabbajitvaa katapubbakicco pariyantapabbatapasse sama.nadhamma.m karonto visesa.m nibbattetu.m asakkonto ^a^P1.0106^ea^ bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa dhamma.m sutvaa kamma.t.thaana.m sodhetvaa sappaaya.t.thaane vasanto vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m sacchaakaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.53.24-30) --
[22] padhaana.m pahitatta.m ta.m, jhaayi.m jhaanarata.m vasi.m..

[03] arahatta.m ^a^V1.0106^ea^ pana patvaa ara~n~ne kaayada.lhibahule bhikkhuu, disvaa te ovadanto saasanassa niyyaanikabhaava.m pakaasento ^b^``saadhu suta.m saadhu caritaka''^eb^nti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M1.0126^ea^ ^b^saadhuu^eb^ti sundara.m. ^b^suta^eb^nti savana.m. ta~nca kho viva.t.tuupanissita.m visesato appicchataadipa.tisa.myutta.m dasakathaavatthusavana.m idhaadhippeta.m. ^b^saadhu caritaka^eb^nti tadeva appicchataadicarita.m ci.n.na.m, saadhucaritameva hi ``caritaka''nti vutta.m. padadvayenaapi baahusacca.m tadanuruupa.m pa.tipatti~nca ``sundara''nti dasseti. ^b^sadaa^eb^ti sabbakaale navakamajjhimatherakaale, sabbesu vaa iriyaapathakkha.nesu. ^b^aniketavihaaro^eb^ti kilesaana.m nivaasana.t.thaana.t.thena pa~ncakaamagu.naa niketaa naama, lokiyaa vaa cha.laaramma.nadhammaa. yathaaha -- ``ruupanimittaniketavisaaravinibandhaa kho, gahapati, `niketasaarii'ti vuccatii''tiaadi (sa.m0 ni0 3.3). tesa.m niketaana.m pahaanatthaaya pa.tipadaa aniketavihaaro. ^b^atthapucchana^eb^nti ta.m aajaanitukaamassa kalyaa.namitta.m upasa"nkamitvaa di.t.thadhammikasamparaayikaparamatthapabhedassa pucchana.m, kusalaadibhedassa vaa atthassa sabhaavadhammassa ``ki.m, bhante, kusala.m, ki.m akusala.m, ki.m saavajja.m, ki.m anavajja''ntiaadinaa (ma0 ni0 3.296) pucchana.m atthapucchana.m. ^b^padakkhi.nakamma^eb^nti ta.m pana pucchitvaa padakkhi.naggaahibhaavena tassa ovaade adhi.t.thaana.m sammaapa.tipatti. idhaapi ``saadhuu''ti pada.m aanetvaa yojetabba.m. ^b^eta.m saama~n~na^eb^nti ``saadhu suta''ntiaadinaa vutta.m ya.m suta.m, ya~nca carita.m, yo ca aniketavihaaro ^a^P1.0107^ea^, ya~nca atthapucchana.m, ya~nca padakkhi.nakamma.m, eta.m saama~n~na.m eso sama.nabhaavo. yasmaa imaaya eva pa.tipadaaya sama.nabhaavo, na a~n~nathaa, tasmaa ``saama~n~na''nti nippariyaayato maggaphalassa adhivacana.m. tassa vaa pana aya.m apa.n.nakapa.tipadaa, ta.m paneta.m saama~n~na.m yaadisassa sambhavaati, ta.m dassetu.m ^b^``aki~ncanassaa''^eb^ti vutta.m. apariggaahakassa, khettavatthuhira~n~nasuva.n.nadaasidaasaadipariggahapa.tiggaha.narahitassaati attho.

[03] ^b^naanaajanapada.m^eb^ ^a^M1.0127^ea^ ^b^yantii^eb^ti aayasmato kumaaputtasahaayattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? so kira purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinanto ito catunavute kappe siddhatthassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa bahu.m rukkhada.n.da.m chinditvaa kattaraya.t.thi.m katvaa sa"nghassa adaasi. a~n~na~nca yathaavibhava.m pu~n~na.m katvaa devesu ^a^V1.0107^ea^ nibbattitvaa tato pa.t.thaaya sugatiisuyeva parivattento imasmi.m buddhuppaade ve.luka.n.takanagare iddhe kule nibbatti. ^b^sudanto^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. ``vaasulo''ti keci vadanti. so kumaaputtassa piyasahaayo hutvaa vicaranto ``kumaaputto pabbajito''ti sutvaa ``na hi nuuna so orako dhammavinayo, yattha kumaaputto pabbajito''ti tadanubandhena sayampi pabbajitukaamo hutvaa satthu santika.m upasa"nkami. tassa satthaa dhamma.m desesi. so bhiyyosomattaaya pabbajjaaya sa~njaatachando pabbajitvaa kumaaputteneva saddhi.m pariyantapabbate bhaavanaanuyutto viharati. tena ca samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu naanaajanapadesu janapadacaarika.m carantaapi gacchantaapi aagacchantaapi ta.m .thaana.m ^a^P1.0108^ea^ upagacchanti. tena tattha kolaahala.m hoti. ta.m disvaa sudantatthero ``ime bhikkhuu niyyaanikasaasane pabbajitvaa janapadavitakka.m anuvattentaa cittasamaadhi.m viraadhentii''ti sa.mvegajaato tameva sa.mvega.m attano cittadamanassa a"nkusa.m karonto ^b^``naanaajanapada.m yantii''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^naanaajanapada^eb^nti visu.m visu.m naanaavidha.m janapada.m, kaasikosalaadianekara.t.thanti attho. ^b^yantii^eb^ti gacchanti. ^b^vicarantaa^eb^ti ``asuko janapado subhikkho sulabhapi.n.do, asuko khemo arogo''tiaadivitakkavasena janapadacaarika.m carantaa. ^b^asa~n~nataa^eb^ti tasseva janapadavitakkassa appahiinataaya cittena asa.myataa. ^b^samaadhi~nca viraadhentii^eb^ti sabbassapi uttarimanussadhammassa muulabhuuta.m upacaarappanaabheda.m samaadhi~nca naama viraadhenti ^a^M1.0128^ea^. ^b^ca^eb^-saddo sambhaavane. desantaracara.nena jhaayitu.m okaasaabhaavena anadhigata.m samaadhi.m naadhigacchantaa, adhigata~nca vasiibhaavaanaapaadanena jiirantaa viiraadhenti naama. ^b^ki.msu ra.t.thacariyaa karissatii^eb^ti ^b^suu^eb^ti nipaatamatta.m. ``eva.mbhuutaana.m ra.t.thacariyaa janapadacaarikaa ki.m karissati, ki.m naama attha.m saadhessati, niratthakaavaa''ti garahanto vadati. ^b^tasmaa^eb^ti yasmaa iidisii desantaracariyaa bhikkhussa na atthaavahaa, api ca kho anatthaavahaa sampattiina.m viraadhanato, tasmaa. ^b^vineyya saarambha^eb^nti vasanapadese arativasena uppanna.m saarambha.m cittasa.mkilesa.m tadanuruupena pa.tisa"nkhaanena vinetvaa vuupasametvaa. ^b^jhaayeyyaa^eb^ti aaramma.nuupanijjhaanena lakkha.nuupanijjhaanena caati duvidhenapi jhaanena jhaayeyya. ^b^apurakkhato^eb^ti micchaavitakkehi ta.nhaadiihi vaa na purakkhatoti tesa.m vasa.m anupagacchanto kamma.t.thaanameva manasi kareyyaati attho. eva.m pana vatvaa thero tameva sa.mvega.m a"nkusa.m katvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.53.36-41) --

[03] ya.m panattha.m a"nkusa.m katvaa aya.m thero arahatta.m patto, tamevattha.m hadaye .thapetvaa arahatta.m pattopi ^b^``naanaajanapada.m yanti''^eb^ti idameva gaatha.m abhaasi. tasmaa tadevassa a~n~naabyaakara.na.m ahosiiti.

[03] ^b^yo^eb^ ^a^M1.0129^ea^ ^b^iddhiyaa sarabhu^eb^nti aayasmato gavampatittherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? so kira purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro ito ekati.mse kappe sikhi.m bhagavanta.m passitvaa pasannamaanaso pupphehi puuja.m akaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke uppanno aparaapara.m pu~n~naani karonto ko.naagamanassa bhagavato cetiye chatta~nca vedika~nca kaaresi. kassapassa pana bhagavato kaale a~n~natarasmi.m kulagehe nibbatto. tasmi~nca kule bahu.m goma.n.dala.m ahosi. ta.m gopaalakaa rakkhanti. aya.m tattha antarantaraa yuttappayutta.m vicaarento vicarati. so eka.m khii.naasavatthera.m gaame pi.n.daaya caritvaa bahigaame devasika.m ekasmi.m padese bhattakicca.m karonta.m disvaa ``ayyo suuriyaatapena kilamissatii''ti cintetvaa cattaaro siriisada.n.de ussaapetvaa tesa.m upari siriisasaakhaayo .thapetvaa saakhaama.n.dapa.m katvaa adaasi. ``ma.n.dapassa samiipe siriisarukkha.m ropesii''ti ca vadanti. tassa anukampaaya devasika.m thero tattha nisiidi. so tena pu~n~nakammena tato cavitvaa caatumahaaraajikesu nibbatti. tassa purimakammasa.msuucaka.m vimaanadvaare mahanta.m siriisavana.m nibbatti va.n.nagandhasampannehi a~n~nehi pupphehi sabbakaale upasobhayamaana.m, tena ta.m vimaana.m ``seriisaka''nti pa~n~naayittha. so devaputto eka.m buddhantara.m devesu ca manussesu ca sa.msaritvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade yasattherassa catuusu ^a^P1.0110^ea^ gihisahaayesu ^b^gavampati^eb^ naama hutvaa aayasmato yasassa pabbajitabhaava.m sutvaa attano sahaayehi saddhi.m bhagavato santika.m agamaasi ^a^V1.0109^ea^. satthaa tassa dhamma.m desesi. so desanaavasaane sahaayehi saddhi.m arahatte pati.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.53.42-47) --

[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa thero vimuttisukha.m pa.tisa.mvedento saakete viharati a~njanavane. tena ca samayena bhagavaa mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m saaketa.m gantvaa a~njanavane vihaasi. senaasana.m nappahosi. sambahulaa bhikkhuu vihaarasaamantaa sarabhuyaa nadiyaa vaalikaapu.line sayi.msu. atha a.d.dharattasamaye nadiyaa udakoghe aagacchante saama.neraadayo uccaasaddamahaasaddaa ahesu.m. bhagavaa ta.m ~natvaa aayasmanta.m gavampati.m aa.naapesi -- ``gaccha, gavampati, jalogha.m vikkhambhetvaa bhikkhuuna.m phaasuvihaara.m karohii''ti. thero ``saadhu, bhante''ti iddhibalena nadiisota.m vikkhambhi, ta.m duuratova pabbatakuu.ta.m viya a.t.thaasi. tato pa.t.thaaya therassa aanubhaavo loke paaka.to ahosi. athekadivasa.m satthaa mahatiyaa devaparisaaya majjhe nisiiditvaa dhamma.m desenta.m thera.m disvaa lokaanukampaaya tassa gu.naana.m vibhaavanattha.m ta.m pasa.msanto ^b^``yo iddhiyaa sarabhu''^eb^nti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^iddhiyaa^eb^ti adhi.t.thaaniddhiyaa. ^b^sarabhu^eb^nti eva.mnaamika.m nadi.m, ya.m loke ``sarabhu''nti vadanti. ^b^a.t.thapesii^eb^ti sanditu.m adento sota.m nivattetvaa pabbatakuu.ta.m viya mahanta.m jalaraasi.m katvaa .thapesi. ^b^asito^eb^ti nasito, ta.nhaadi.t.thinissayarahito, bandhanasa"nkhaataana.m vaa sabbasa.myojanaana.m samucchinnattaa kenacipi bandhanena abaddho, tato eva ejaana.m kilesaana.m abhaavato ^b^anejo so, gavampati, ta.m sabbasa"ngaatigata.m^eb^ taadisa.m sabbepi raagadosamohamaanadi.t.thisa"nge atikkamitvaa ^a^P1.0111^ea^ .thitattaa sabbasa"ngaatigata.m, asekkhamunibhaavato ^b^mahaamuni.m,^eb^ tato eva kaamakammabhavaadibhedassa sakalassapi bhavassa paara.m nibbaana.m gatattaa ^b^bhavassa paaragu.m. devaa namassantii^eb^ti devaapi imassanti, pageva itaraa pajaati.
[03] gaathaapariyosaane ^a^M1.0131^ea^ ^a^V1.0110^ea^ mahato janakaayassa dhammaabhisamayo ahosi. thero a~n~na.m byaakaronto ``satthaara.m puujessaamii''ti imameva gaatha.m abhaasiiti.

[03] ^b^sattiyaa viya oma.t.tho^eb^ti aayasmato tissattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppati? ayampi kira purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m pu~n~na.m upacinanto tissassa bhagavato bodhiyaa muule puraa.napa.n.naani niiharitvaa sodhesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kapilavatthunagare bhagavato pitucchaaputto hutvaa nibbatti ^b^tisso^eb^ naama naamena. so bhagavanta.m anupabbajitvaa upasampanno hutvaa ara~n~naayatane viharanto jaati.m pa.ticca maana.m karonto kodhuupaayaasabahulo ca ujjhaanabahulo ca hutvaa vicarati, sama.nadhamme ussukka.m na karoti. atha na.m satthaa ekadivasa.m divaa.t.thaane viva.tamukha.m niddaayanta.m dibbacakkhunaa olokento saavatthito aakaasena gantvaa tassa upari aakaaseyeva .thatvaa obhaasa.m pharitvaa tenobhaasena pa.tibuddhassa sati.m uppaadetvaa ovaada.m dento ^b^``sattiyaa viya oma.t.tho''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^sattiyaa^eb^ti desanaasiisameta.m, ekatodhaaraadinaa satthenaati attho. ^b^oma.t.tho^eb^ti pahato. cattaaro hi pahaaraa oma.t.tho umma.t.tho ma.t.tho vima.t.thoti. tattha upari .thatvaa adhomukha.m dinnapahaaro oma.t.tho naama, he.t.thaa .thatvaa uddhammukha.m dinnapahaaro umma.t.tho naama, agga.lasuuci ^a^P1.0112^ea^ viya vinivijjhitvaa gato ma.t.tho naama, seso sabbopi vima.t.tho naama. imasmi.m pana .thaane oma.t.tho gahito. so hi sabbadaaru.no duruddhara.nasallo duttikiccho antodoso antopubbalohitova hoti, pubbalohita.m anikkhamitvaa va.namukha.m pariyonandhitvaa ti.t.thati. pubbalohita.m niiharitukaamehi ma~ncena saddhi.m bandhitvaa adhosiro kaatabbo ^a^M1.0132^ea^ hoti, mara.na.m vaa mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m paapu.nanti. ^b^.dayhamaane^eb^ti agginaa jhaayamaane. ^b^matthake^eb^ti siise. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- yathaa sattiyaa oma.t.tho puriso sallubbaahanava.natikicchanaana.m atthaaya viiriya.m aarabhati taadisa.m payoga.m karoti parakkamati, yathaa ca .dayhamaane matthake aadittasiiso puriso tassa nibbaapanattha.m viiriya.m aarabhati taadisa.m payoga.m karoti, evameva.m, bhikkhu, kaamaraagappahaanaaya sato appamatto ativiya ussaahajaato hutvaa vihareyyaati.

[03] eva.m ^a^V1.0111^ea^ bhagavaa tassa therassa kodhuupaayaasavuupasamaaya ovaada.m dento tadeka.t.thataaya kaamaraagappahaanasiisena desana.m ni.t.thaapesi. thero ima.m gaatha.m sutvaa sa.mviggahadayo vipassanaaya yuttappayutto vihaasi. tassa ajjhaasaya.m ~natvaa satthaa sa.myuttake ^b^tissattherasutta.m^eb^ (sa.m0 ni0 3.84) desesi. so desanaapariyosaane arahatte pati.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.53.66-73) --
[22] avasaane ca nibbaana.m, siva.m patto anuttara.m..
[22] yo pu~n~na.m pasavii poso, tassa ki.m naama dullabha.m..
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa thero a~n~na.m byaakaronto satthaara.m puujetu.m tameva gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] ^b^sattiyaa^eb^ ^a^M1.0133^ea^ ^a^P1.0113^ea^ ^b^viya oma.t.tho^eb^ti aayasmato va.d.dhamaanattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi kira purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro ito dvenavute kappe tissassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto tissa.m bhagavanta.m pi.n.daaya caranta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso suparipakkaani va.n.tato muttaani ambaphalaani adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbatto aparaapara.m pu~n~nakammaani upacinanto imasmi.m buddhuppaade vesaaliya.m licchaviraajakule nibbatti, ^b^va.d.dhamaano^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vayappatto saddho pasanno daayako daanarato kaarako sa"nghupa.t.thaako hutvaa tathaaruupe aparaadhe satthaaraa pattanikkujjanakamme kaaraapite aggi.m akkanto viya sa"ngha.m khamaapetvaa kamma.m pa.tippassambhetvaa sa~njaatasa.mvego pabbaji, pabbajitvaa pana ^a^V1.0112^ea^ thinamiddhaabhibhuuto vihaasi. ta.m satthaa sa.mvejento ^b^``sattiyaa viya oma.t.tho''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^bhavaraagappahaanaayaa^eb^ti bhavaraagassa ruuparaagassa aruuparaagassa ca pajahanatthaaya. yadipi ajjhattasa.myojanaani appahaaya bahiddhasa.myojanaana.m pahaana.m naama natthi, naanantarikabhaavato pana uddhambhaagiyasa.myojanappahaanavacanena orambhaagiyasa.myojanappahaanampi vuttameva hoti. yasmaa vaa samucchinnorambhaagiyasa.myojanaanampi kesa~nci ariyaana.m uddhambhaagiyasa.myojanaani duppaheyyaani honti, tasmaa suppaheyyato duppaheyyameva dassento bhagavaa bhavaraagappahaanasiisena sabbassaapi uddhambhaagiyasa.myojanassa pahaanamaaha. therassa eva vaa ajjhaasayavaseneva.m vutta.m. sesa.m vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^vivaramanupatanti^eb^ ^a^M1.0134^ea^ ^a^V1.0113^ea^ ^a^P1.0114^ea^ ^b^vijjutaa^eb^ti aayasmato siriva.d.dhattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? sopi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe vipassissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto vipassi.m bhagavanta.m passitvaa ki"nka.nipupphehi puuja.m katvaa tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbatto aparaapara.m pu~n~naani katvaa sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe vibhavasampannassa braahma.nassa gehe nibbatti, ^b^siriva.d.dho^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vayappatto bimbisaarasamaagame satthari saddhamme ca uppannappasaado hetusampannataaya pabbaji. pabbajitvaa ca katapubbakicco vebhaarapa.n.davapabbataana.m aviduure a~n~natarasmi.m ara~n~naayatane pabbataguhaaya.m kamma.t.thaanamanuyutto viharati. tasmi~nca samaye mahaa akaalamegho u.t.thahi. vijjullataa pabbatavivara.m pavisantiyo viya vicaranti. therassa ghammapari.laahaabhibhuutassa saaragabbhehi meghavaatehi ghammapari.laaho vuupasami. utusappaayalaabhena citta.m ekagga.m ahosi. samaahitacitto vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.21.10-14) --
[03] arahatta.m ^a^M1.0135^ea^ ^a^V1.0114^ea^ pana patvaa a~n~naapadesena attasannissaya.m udaana.m udaanento ^b^``vivaramanupatanti vijjutaa''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^vivara^eb^nti antaraa vemajjha.m. ^b^anupatantii^eb^ti anulakkha.ne patanti pavattanti, vijjotantiiti attho. vijjotanameva hi vijjullataana.m pavatti naama. ^b^anu^eb^-saddayogena cettha upayogavacana.m, yathaa ``rukkhamanuvijjotantii''ti. ^b^vijjutaa^eb^ti ^a^P1.0115^ea^ saterataa. ^b^vebhaarassa ca pa.n.davassa caa^eb^ti vebhaarapabbatassa ca pa.n.davapabbatassa ca vivaramanupatantiiti yojanaa. ^b^nagavivaragato^eb^ti nagavivara.m pabbataguha.m upagato. ^b^jhaayatii^eb^ti aaramma.nuupanijjhaanena lakkha.nuupanijjhaanena ca jhaayati, samathavipassana.m ussukkaapento bhaaveti. ^b^putto appa.timassa taadino^eb^ti siilakkhandhaadidhammakaayasampattiyaa ruupakaayasampattiyaa ca anupamassa upamaarahitassa i.t.thaani.t.thaadiisu taadilakkha.nasampattiyaa taadino buddhassa bhagavato orasaputto. puttavacaneneva cettha therena satthu anujaatabhaavadiipanena a~n~naa byaakataati veditabba.m.

[03] ^b^caale upacaale^eb^ti aayasmato khadiravaniyarevatattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppati? aya.m kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare titthanaavikakule nibbattitvaa mahaaga"ngaaya payaagatitthe titthanaavaakamma.m karonto ekadivasa.m sasaavakasa"ngha.m bhagavanta.m ga"ngaatiira.m upagata.m disvaa pasannamaanaso naavaasa"nghaa.ta.m yojetvaa mahantena puujaasakkaarena paratiira.m paapetvaa a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m satthaaraa aara~n~nakaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapiyamaana.m disvaa tadattha.m patthana.m pa.t.thapetvaa bhagavato bhikkhusa"nghassa ca mahaadaana.m pavattesi. bhagavaa ca tassa patthanaaya avajjhabhaava.m byaakaasi. so tato pa.t.thaaya tattha tattha viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m katvaa ^a^M1.0136^ea^ devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade magadhara.t.the naalakagaame ruupasaariyaa braahma.niyaa kucchismi.m nibbatti. ta.m vayappatta.m maataapitaro gharabandhanena bandhitukaamaa jaataa. so ^a^P1.0116^ea^ saariputtattherassa pabbajitabhaava.m sutvaa ``mayha.m je.t.thabhaataa ayyo upatisso ima.m vibhava.m cha.d.detvaa pabbajito, tena vanta.m khe.lapi.n.da.m kathaaha.m pacchaa gilissaamii''ti jaatasa.mvego paasa.m anupagacchanakamigo viya ~naatake va~ncetvaa hetusampattiyaa codiyamaano bhikkhuuna.m santika.m gantvaa dhammasenaapatino kani.t.thabhaava.m nivedetvaa attano pabbajjaaya chanda.m aarocesi. bhikkhuu ta.m pabbaajetvaa paripu.n.naviisativassa.m upasampaadetvaa ^a^V1.0115^ea^ kamma.t.thaane niyojesu.m. so kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa khadiravana.m pavisitvaa, ``arahatta.m patvaa bhagavanta.m dhammasenaapati~nca passissaamii''ti gha.tento vaayamanto ~naa.nassa paripaakagatattaa nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.1.628-643) --
[22] kutitthe naaviko aasi.m, orime ca tari.m aha.m..
[22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
[21] ``satasahasse kata.m kamma.m, phala.m dassesi me idha.

[03] cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa thero satthaara.m dhammasenaapati~nca vanditu.m senaasana.m sa.msaametvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya anupubbena saavatthi.m patvaa jetavana.m pavisitvaa satthaara.m dhammasenaapati~nca vanditvaa katipaaha.m jetavane vihaasi ^a^P1.0117^ea^. atha na.m satthaa ariyaga.namajjhe nisinno aara~n~nakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m agga.t.thaane .thapesi -- ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m aara~n~nakaana.m yadida.m revato khadiravaniyo''ti (a0 ni0 1.198, 203). so aparabhaage attano jaatagaama.m gantvaa ``caalaa, upacaalaa, siisuupacaalaa''ti tissanna.m bhaginiina.m putte ``caalaa, upacaalaa, siisuupacaalaa''ti tayo bhaagineyye aanetvaa pabbaajetvaa kamma.t.thaane niyojesi. te kamma.t.thaana.m anuyuttaa viharanti. tasmi~nca samaye therassa kocideva aabaadho uppanno. ta.m ^a^M1.0138^ea^ sutvaa saariputtatthero revata.m ``gilaanapucchana.m adhigamapucchana~nca karissaamii''ti upagacchi. revatatthero dhammasenaapati.m duuratova aagacchanta.m disvaa tesa.m saama.neraana.m satuppaadanavasena ovadanto ^b^``caale upacaale''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^caale upacaale siisuupacaale^eb^ti tesa.m aalapana.m. ``caalaa, upacaalaa, siisuupacaalaa''ti hi itthili"ngavasena laddhanaamaa te tayo daarakaa pabbajitaapi tathaa vohariiyanti. ```caalii, upacaalii, siisuupacaalii'ti tesa.m naama''nti ca vadanti. yadattha.m ``caalaa''tiaadinaa aamantana.m kata.m, ta.m dassento ^b^``patissataa nu kho viharathaa''^eb^ti vatvaa tattha kaara.namaaha ^b^``aagato vo vaala.m viya vedhii''^eb^ti. ^b^patissataa^eb^ti patissatikaa. ^b^kho^eb^ti avadhaara.ne. ^b^aagato^eb^ti aagacchi. ^b^vo^eb^ti tumhaaka.m. ^b^vaala.m viya vedhii^eb^ti vaalavedhii viya, aya~nhettha sa"nkhepattho -- tikkhajavananibbedhikapa~n~nataaya vaalavedhiruupo satthukappo tumhaaka.m maatulatthero aagato, tasmaa sama.nasa~n~na.m upa.t.thapetvaa satisampaja~n~nayuttaa eva hutvaa viharatha, ``yathaadhigate vihaare appamattaa bhavathaa''ti.

[03] ta.m sutvaa te saama.neraa dhammasenaapatissa paccuggamanaadivatta.m katvaa ubhinna.m maatulattheraana.m pa.tisanthaaravelaaya.m naatiduure samaadhi.m samaapajjitvaa nisiidi.msu. dhammasenaapati revatattherena saddhi.m pa.tisanthaara.m katvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa te saama.nere upasa"nkami, te tathaakaalaparicchedassa katattaa there upasa"nkamante eva u.t.thahitvaa vanditvaa a.t.tha.msu. thero ``katarakataravihaarena viharathaa''ti pucchitvaa ^a^V1.0117^ea^ ^a^P1.0118^ea^ tehi ``imaaya imaayaa''ti vutte ``daarakepi naama eva.m vinento mayha.m bhaatiko paccapaadi vata dhammassa anudhamma''nti thera.m pasa.msanto pakkaami.

[03] ^b^sumuttiko^eb^ti ^a^M1.0139^ea^ aayasmato suma"ngalattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? sopi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m pu~n~na.m upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kaale rukkhadevataa hutvaa nibbatti. so ekadivasa.m satthaara.m nhaayitvaa ekaciivara.m .thita.m disvaa somanassappatto hutvaa appho.tesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiyaa aviduure a~n~natarasmi.m gaamake taadisena kammanissandena daliddakule nibbatti. tassa ^b^suma"ngalo^eb^ti naama.m ahosi. so vayappatto khujjakaasitana"ngalakuddaalaparikkhaaro hutvaa kasiyaa jiivati. so ekadivasa.m ra~n~naa pasenadikosalena bhagavato bhikkhusa"nghassa ca mahaadaane pavattiyamaane daanopakara.naani gahetvaa aagacchantehi manussehi saddhi.m dadhigha.ta.m gahetvaa aagato bhikkhuuna.m sakkaarasammaana.m disvaa ``ime sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa sukhumavatthasunivatthaa subhojanaani bhu~njitvaa nivaatesu senaasanesu viharanti, ya.mnuunaahampi pabbajeyya''nti cintetvaa, a~n~natara.m mahaathera.m upasa"nkamitvaa attano pabbajjaadhippaaya.m nivedesi. so ta.m karu.naayanto pabbaajetvaa kamma.t.thaana.m aacikkhi. so ara~n~ne viharanto ekavihaare nibbinno ukka.n.thito hutvaa, vibbhamitukaamo ~naatigaama.m gacchanto antaraamagge kaccha.m bandhitvaa khetta.m kasante kili.t.thavatthanivatthe samantato rajoki.n.nasariire vaataatapena phussante kassake disvaa, ``mahanta.m vatime sattaa jiivikanimitta.m dukkha.m paccanubhontii''ti ^a^P1.0119^ea^ sa.mvega.m pa.tilabhi. ~naa.nassa paripaaka.m gatattaa yathaagahita.m kamma.t.thaana.m upa.t.thaasi. so a~n~natara.m rukkhamuula.m upagantvaa viveka.m labhitvaa yoniso manasikaronto vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa maggapa.tipaa.tiyaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.12.11-19) --
[22] ha.t.tho ha.t.thena cittena, appho.tesi.m aha.m tadaa..
[22] sabbe satte abhibhomi, vipulo hoti me yaso..
[22] attaana.m tosayitvaana, pare tosesi tva.m muni..
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa sampatti.m attano dukkhavimutti~nca kittanavasena udaana.m udaanento ^b^``sumuttiko''^eb^tiaadimaaha.

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^sumuttiko^eb^ti sundaraa accantikataaya apunabbhavikaa mutti etassaati sumuttiko. tassa pana vimuttiyaa paasa.msiyataaya acchariyataaya ca appho.tento aaha ^b^``sumuttiko''^eb^ti. puna tattha vimuttiya.m attano pasaadassa da.lhabhaava.m dassento ^b^``saahu sumuttikomhii''^eb^ti aaha. ``saadhu su.t.thu muttiko vatamhii''ti attho. ``kuto panaaya.m sumuttikataa''ti? kaama~ncaaya.m thero sabbasmaapi va.t.tadukkhato suvimutto, attano pana taava upa.t.thita.m ativiya ani.t.thabhuuta.m dukkha.m dassento ^b^``tiihi khujjakehii''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^khujjakehii^eb^ti khujjasabhaavehi, khujjaakaarehi vaa. nissakkavacana~nceta.m muttasaddaapekkhaaya. kassako hi akhujjopi samaano tiisu .thaanesu attaana.m khujja.m katvaa dasseti laayane kasane kuddaalakamme ca. yo hi pana kassako laayanaadiini karoti ^a^M1.0141^ea^, taanipi asitaadiini ku.tilaakaarato khujjakaaniiti vutta.m ``tiihi khujjakehii''ti.

[03] idaani taani saruupato dassento ^b^``asitaasu mayaa, na"ngalaasu mayaa, khuddakuddaalaasu mayaa''^eb^ti aaha. tattha ^b^asitaasu mayaa^eb^ti lavittehi mayaa muttanti attho. nissakke ceta.m bhummavacana.m. sesesupi eseva nayo. apare pana ^b^``asitaasu mayaa^eb^ti lavittehi kara.nabhuutehi mayaa khujjita''nti vadanti. tesa.m matena kara.natthe hetumhi vaa bhummavacana.m. ^b^``na"ngalaasuu''^eb^ti li"ngavipallaasa.m ^a^V1.0119^ea^ katvaa vutta.m, na"ngalehi kasirehiiti attho. attanaa va.la~njitakuddaalassa sabhaavato va.la~njanena vaa appakataaya vutta.m ``khuddakuddaalaasuu''ti ``ku.n.thakuddaalaasuu''tipi ^a^P1.0120^ea^ paa.li. va.la~njaneneva atikhi.nakha.nittesuuti attho. ^b^idhamevaa^eb^ti ^b^ma^eb^-kaaro padasandhikaro. ^b^atha vaapii^eb^ti ^b^vaa^eb^-saddo nipaatamatta.m. gaamake .thitattaa taani asitaadiini ki~ncaapi idheva mama samiipeyeva, tathaapi alameva hotiiti attho. turitavasena ceta.m aame.ditavacana.m. ^b^jhaayaa^eb^ti phalasamaapattijjhaanavasena di.t.thadhammasukhavihaarattha.m dibbavihaaraadivasena ca jhaaya. ^b^suma"ngalaa^eb^ti attaana.m aalapati. jhaane pana aadaradassanattha.m aame.dita.m kata.m. ^b^appamatto viharaa^eb^ti satipa~n~naavepullappattiyaa sabbatthakameva appamattosi tva.m, tasmaa idaani sukha.m vihara, suma"ngala. keci pana ``arahatta.m appatvaa eva vipassanaaya viithipa.tipannaaya saasane sa~njaataabhiratiyaa yathaanubhuuta.m gharaavaasadukkha.m jigucchanto thero ima.m gaatha.m vatvaa pacchaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.nii''ti vadanti. tesa.m matena ``jhaaya appamatto viharaa''ti padaana.m attho vipassanaamaggavasenapi yujjati eva.

[03] ^b^mata.m^eb^ ^a^M1.0142^ea^ ^b^vaa amma rodantii^eb^ti aayasmato saanuttherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? sopi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m pu~n~na.m upacinanto ito catunavute kappe siddhatthassa bhagavato hatthapaadadhovanamukhavikkhaalanaana.m atthaaya udaka.m upanesi. satthaa hi bhojanakaale hatthapaade dhovitukaamo ahosi. so satthu aakaara.m sallakkhetvaa udaka.m upanesi. bhagavaa hatthapaade dhovitvaa bhu~njitvaa mukha.m vikkhaaletukaamo ahosi. so tampi ^a^P1.0121^ea^ ~natvaa mukhodaka.m upanesi. satthaa mukha.m vikkhaaletvaa mukhadhovanakicca.m ni.t.thaapesi. eva.m bhagavaa anukampa.m upaadaaya tena kariiyamaana.m veyyaavacca.m saadiyi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m pu~n~naani katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m a~n~natarassa upaasakassa gehe pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi. tasmi.m gabbhagateyeva pitaa pavaasa.m gato, upaasikaa dasamaasaccayena putta.m vijaayitvaa ^b^saanuu^eb^tissa naama.m akaasi. tasmi.m anukkamena va.d.dhante sattavassika.myeva na.m bhikkhuuna.m santike pabbaajesi, ``evamaya.m anantaraayo va.d.dhitvaa accantasukhabhaagii bhavissatii''ti. ``so saanusaama.nero''ti pa~n~naato pa~n~navaa vattasampanno bahussuto ^a^V1.0120^ea^ dhammakathiko sattesu mettajjhaasayo hutvaa devamanussaana.m piyo ahosi manaapoti sabba.m saanusutte aagatanayena veditabba.m.

[03] tassa atiitajaatiya.m maataa yakkhayoniya.m nibbatti. ta.m yakkhaa ``saanuttherassa aya.m maataa''ti garucittikaarabahulaa hutvaa maanenti. eva.m gacchante kaale puthujjanabhaavassa aadiinava.m vibhaaventa.m viya ekadivasa.m saanussa yoniso manasikaaraabhaavaa ayoniso ummujjantassa vibbhamitukaamataacitta.m uppajji. ta.m tassa yakkhinimaataa ~natvaa manussamaatuyaa aarocesi -- ``tava putto, saanu, `vibbhamissaamii'ti citta.m uppaadesi, tasmaa tva.m --
[22] maakaasi paapaka.m kamma.m, aavi vaa yadi vaa raho..
[21] ``sace ^a^M1.0143^ea^ tva.m paapaka.m kamma.m, karissasi karosi vaa.
[22] na te dukkhaa pamutyatthi, uppaccaapi palaayato''ti.. (sa.m0 ni0 1.239; dha0 pa0 a.t.tha0 2.325 saanusaama.neravatthu) --

[25] eva.m bha.naahii''ti. eva~nca pana vatvaa yakkhinimaataa tatthevantaradhaayi. manussamaataa pana ta.m sutvaa paridevasokasamaapannaa cetodukkhasamappitaa ahosi. atha saanusaama.nero pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa ^a^P1.0122^ea^ pattaciivaramaadaaya maatu santika.m upagato maatara.m rodamaana.m disvaa ``amma, ki.m nissaaya rodasii''ti vatvaa ``ta.m nissaayaa''ti ca vutto maatu ^b^``mata.m vaa, amma, rodanti, yo vaa jiiva.m na dissatii''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ tassattho -- ^b^``amma,^eb^ rodantaa naama ~naatakaa mittaa vaa attano ~naataka.m mitta.m vaa ^b^mata.m^eb^ uddissa ^b^rodanti^eb^ paraloka.m gatattaa, ^b^yo vaa^eb^ ~naatako mitto vaa ^b^jiiva.m^eb^ jiivanto desantara.m pakkantataaya ca ^b^na dissati,^eb^ ta.m vaa uddissa rodanti, ubhayampeta.m mayi na vijjati, eva.m sante ^b^jiivanta.m^eb^ dharamaana.m ^b^ma.m^eb^ purato .thita.m ^b^passantii; kasmaa, amma, rodasi?^eb^ma.m uddissa tava rodanassa kaara.nameva natthii''ti.
[03] ta.m sutvaa tassa maataa ``mara.na~nheta.m, bhikkhave, yo sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattatii''ti (ma0 ni0 3.63) suttapadaanusaarena uppabbajana.m ariyassa vinaye mara.nanti dassentii --
[21] ``mata.m ^a^V1.0121^ea^ vaa putta rodanti, yo vaa jiiva.m na dissati.
[22] yo ca kaame cajitvaana, punaraagacchate idha..
[21] ``ta.m vaapi putta rodanti, puna jiiva.m mato hi so.
[22] kukku.laa ubbhato taata, kukku.la.m patitumicchasii''ti.. (sa.m0 ni0 1.239; dha0 pa0 a.t.tha0 2.saanusaama.neravatthu) --

[03] tattha ^b^kaame cajitvaanaa^eb^ti nekkhammajjhaasayena vatthukaame pahaaya, ta~nca kilesakaamassa tada"ngappahaanavasena veditabba.m. pabbajjaa hettha kaamapariccaago adhippeto.^b^ punaraagacchate idhaa^eb^ti idha gehe punadeva aagacchati, hiinaayaavattana.m sandhaaya vadati. ^b^ta.m vaapii^eb^ti yo pabbajitvaa vibbhamati ^a^M1.0144^ea^, ta.m vaapi puggala.m mata.m viyamaadisiyo rodanti. kasmaati ce? ^b^puna jiiva.m mato hi so^eb^ti vibbhamanato pacchaa yo jiivanto, so gu.namara.nena atthato matoyeva. idaanissa savisesasa.mvega.m janetu.m ^b^``kukku.laa''^eb^tiaadi vutta.m. tassattho -- ``ahoratta.m aaditta.m viya hutvaa .dahana.t.thena kukku.lanirayasadisattaa ^b^kukku.laa^eb^ ^a^P1.0123^ea^ gihibhaavaa anukampantiyaa mayaa ^b^ubbhato^eb^ uddhato, ^b^taata^eb^ saanu, ^b^kukku.la.m patitu.m icchasi^eb^ patitukaamosii''ti.
[03] ta.m sutvaa saanusaama.nero sa.mvegajaato hutvaa vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.21.25-29) --
[03] arahatta.m ^a^V1.0122^ea^ pana patvaa thero imissaa gaathaaya vasena ``mayha.m vipassanaarambho arahattappatti ca jaataa''ti udaanavasena tameva gaatha.m paccudaahaasi.

[03] ^b^yathaapi^eb^ ^a^M1.0145^ea^ ^b^bhaddo aaja~n~no^eb^ti aayasmato rama.niiyavihaarittherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? sopi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha pu~n~naani upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe vipassi.m bhagavanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso pa~ncapati.t.thitena vanditvaa kora.n.dapupphehi puuja.m akaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devesu nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m pu~n~naani katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe a~n~natarassa se.t.thissa putto hutvaa nibbatto yobbanamadena kaamesu muccha.m aapanno viharati. so ekadivasa.m a~n~natara.m paaradaarika.m raajapurisehi vividhaa kammakaara.naa kariiyamaana.m disvaa sa.mvegajaato satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa pabbaji. pabbajito ca raagacaritataaya niccakaala.m susamma.t.tha.m parive.na.m suupa.t.thita.m paaniiyaparibhojaniiya.m supa~n~nata.m ma~ncapii.tha.m katvaa viharati. tena so ^b^rama.niiyavihaarii^eb^tveva pa~n~naayittha.

[03] so raagussannataaya ayoniso manasi karitvaa sa~ncetanika.m sukkavissa.t.thiaapatti.m aapajjitvaa, ``dhiratthu, ma.m eva.mbhuuto saddhaadeyya.m ^a^P1.0124^ea^ bhu~njeyya''nti vippa.tisaarii hutvaa ``vibbhamissaamii''ti gacchanto antaraamagge rukkhamuule nisiidi, tena ca maggena saka.tesu gacchantesu eko saka.tayutto go.no parissamanto visama.t.thaane khalitvaa pati, ta.m saaka.tikaa yugato mu~ncitvaa ti.nodaka.m datvaa parissama.m vinodetvaa punapi dhure yojetvaa agama.msu. thero ta.m disvaa -- ``yathaaya.m go.no saki.m khalitvaapi u.t.thaaya saki.m dhura.m vahati, eva.m mayaapi kilesavasena saki.m khalitenaapi vu.t.thaaya sama.nadhamma.m kaatu.m va.t.tatii''ti yoniso ummujjanto nivattitvaa upaalittherassa attano pavatti.m aacikkhitvaa tena vuttavidhinaa aapattito vu.t.thahitvaa siila.m paakatika.m katvaa vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.21.35-39) --

[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa vimuttisukha.m anubhavanto attano pubbabhaagapa.tipattiyaa saddhi.m ariyadhammaadhigamanadiipani.m ^b^``yathaapi bhaddo aaja~n~no, khalitvaa patiti.t.thatii''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^khalitvaa^eb^ti pakkhalitvaa. ^b^patiti.t.thatii^eb^ti pati.t.thahati, punadeva yathaa.thaane ti.t.thati. ^b^eva^eb^nti yathaa bhaddo usabhaajaaniiyo bhaara.m vahanto parissamappatto visama.t.thaana.m aagamma ekavaara.m pakkhalitvaa patito na tattakena dhura.m cha.d.deti, thaamajavaparakkamasampannataaya pana khalitvaapi patiti.t.thati, attano sabhaaveneva .thatvaa bhaara.m vahati, eva.m kilesaparissamappatto kiriyaaparaadhena khalitvaa ta.m khalita.m thaamaviiriyasampattitaaya pa.tipaakatika.m katvaa maggasammaadi.t.thiyaa ^b^dassanasampanna.m,^eb^ tato eva ^b^sammaasambuddhassa^eb^ savanante ariyaaya jaatiyaa jaatataaya ^b^saavaka.m,^eb^ tassa ure vaayaamajanitaabhijaatitaaya orasa.m ^a^P1.0125^ea^ putta.m bhaddaajaaniiyasadisakiccataaya aajaaniiyanti ca ma.m dhaaretha upadhaarethaati attho.

[03] ^b^saddhaayaaha.m^eb^ ^a^M1.0147^ea^ ^b^pabbajito^eb^ti aayasmato samiddhittherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kattaadhikaaro tattha tattha pu~n~naani upacinanto ito catunavute kappe siddhattha.m bhagavanta.m passitvaa pasannamaanaso sava.n.taani pupphaani ka.n.nikabaddhaani gahetvaa puujesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m pu~n~naani katvaa sugatiisuyeva parivattento imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe kulagehe nibbatti. tassa jaatakaalato pa.t.thaaya ta.m kula.m dhanadha~n~naadiihi va.d.dhi, attabhaavo cassa abhiruupo dassaniiyo gu.navaa iti vibhavasamiddhiyaa ca gu.nasamiddhiyaa ^a^V1.0124^ea^ ca ^b^samiddhii^eb^tveva pa~n~naayittha. so bimbisaarasamaagame buddhaanubhaava.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa bhaavanaaya yuttappayutto viharanto bhagavati tapodaaraame viharante ekadivasa.m eva.m cintesi -- ``laabhaa vata me satthaa araha.m sammaasambuddho, svaakkhaate caaha.m dhammavinaye pabbajito, sabrahmacaarii ca me siilavanto kalyaa.nadhammaa''ti. tasseva.m cintentassa u.laara.m piitisomanassa.m udapaadi. ta.m asahanto maaro paapimaa therassa aviduure mahanta.m bheravasaddamakaasi, pathaviyaa undriyanakaalo viya ahosi. thero bhagavato tamattha.m aarocesi. bhagavaa ``maaro tuyha.m vicakkhukammaaya ceteti, gaccha, bhikkhu tattha acintetvaa viharaahii''ti aaha. thero tattha gantvaa viharanto nacirasseva vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.21.30-34) --

[03] arahatta.m ^a^M1.0148^ea^ pana patvaa tattheva viharantassa therassa khii.naasavabhaava.m ajaananto purimanayeneva maaro mahanta.m bheravasadda.m akaasi. ta.m sutvaa thero abhiito acchambhii ``taadisaana.m maaraana.m satampi sahassampi mayha.m lomampi na kampetii''ti a~n~na.m byaakaronto ^b^``saddhaayaaha.m pabbajito''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^saddhaayaa^eb^ti dhammacchandasamu.t.thaanaaya kammaphalasaddhaaya ceva ratanattayasaddhaaya ca. ^b^aha^eb^nti attaana.m niddisati. ^b^pabbajito^eb^ti upagato. ^b^agaarasmaa^eb^ti gehato gharaavaasato vaa. ^b^anagaariya^eb^nti pabbajja.m, saa hi ya.mki~nci kasivaa.nijjaadikamma.m `agaarassa hita'nti agaariya.m naama, tadabhaavato ``anagaariyaa''ti vuccati. ^b^sati pa~n~naa ca me vu.d.dhaa^eb^ti sara.nalakkha.naa sati, pajaananalakkha.naa pa~n~naati ime dhammaa vipassanaakkha.nato pa.t.thaaya maggapa.tipaa.tiyaa ^a^V1.0125^ea^ yaava arahattaa me vu.d.dhaa va.d.dhitaa, na daani va.d.dhetabbaa atthi satipa~n~naa vepullappattaati dasseti. ^b^citta~nca susamaahita^eb^nti a.t.thasamaapattivasena ceva lokuttarasamaadhivasena ca citta.m me su.t.thu samaahita.m, na daani tassa samaadhaatabba.m atthi, samaadhi vepullappattoti dasseti. tasmaa ^b^kaama.m karassu ruupaanii^eb^ti paapima ma.m uddissa yaani kaanici vippakaaraani yathaaruci.m karohi, tehi pana ^b^neva ma.m byaadhayissasi^eb^ mama sariirakampanamattampi kaatu.m na sakkhissasi, kuto citta~n~nathatta.m? tasmaa tava kiriyaa appa.ticchitapahenaka.m viya na ki~nci attha.m sodheti, kevala.m tava cittavighaatamattaphalaati thero maara.m tajjesi. ta.m sutvaa maaro ``jaanaati ma.m sama.no''ti tatthevantaradhaayi.

[03] ^b^namo^eb^ ^a^P1.0127^ea^ ^b^te buddha viiratthuu^eb^ti aayasmato ujjayattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani karonto ito dvaanavute kappe tissa.m bhagavanta.m passitvaa pasannamaanaso ka.nikaarapupphehi puuja.m akaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke ^a^M1.0149^ea^ nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m pu~n~naani katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe a~n~natarassa sottiyabraahma.nassa putto hutvaa nibbatti, ^b^ujjayo^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vayappatto ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu hutvaa tattha saara.m apassanto upanissayasampattiyaa codiyamaano ve.luvana.m gantvaa satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa cariyaanukuula.m kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa ara~n~ne viharanto vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.21.1-4) --

[03] arahatta.m ^a^V1.0126^ea^ pana patvaa satthu santika.m gantvaa vanditvaa ekamanta.m nisiiditvaa bhagavato thomanaakaarena a~n~na.m byaakaronto ^b^``namo te buddha viiratthuu''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^namo^eb^ti pa.naamakittana.m. ^b^te^eb^ti pa.naamakiriyaaya sampadaanakittana.m, tuyhanti attho. ^b^buddha viiraa^eb^ti ca bhagavato aalapana.m. bhagavaa hi yathaa abhi~n~neyyaadibhedassa atthassa abhi~n~neyyaadibhedena sayambhuu~naa.nena anavasesato buddhattaa ``buddho''ti vuccati. eva.m pa~ncannampi maaraana.m abhippamaddanavasena padahantena mahataa viiriyena samannaagatattaa ``viiro''ti vuccati. ^b^atthuu^eb^ti hotu, tassa ``namo''ti iminaa sambandho. ^b^vippamuttosi sabbadhii^eb^ti sabbehi kilesehi sabbasmi~nca sa"nkhaaragate vippamutto visa.myutto asi bhavasi, na tayaa ki~nci avippamutta.m naama atthi, yatoha.m ^b^tuyhaapadaane vihara.m, viharaami anaasavo^eb^ti tuyha.m tava apadaane ovaade ^a^P1.0128^ea^ gatamagge pa.tipatticariyaaya vihara.m yathaasatti ^a^M1.0150^ea^ yathaabala.m pa.tipajjanto kaamaasavaadiina.m catunnampi aasavaana.m suppahiinattaa anaasavo viharaami, taadisassa namo te buddha-viiratthuuti.

[03] ^b^yato aha^eb^nti aayasmato sa~njayattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? sopi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha viva.t.tuupanissaya.m pu~n~na.m upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kaale mahati puuge sa.mkittivasena vatthu.m sa"ngharitvaa ratanattaya.m uddissa pu~n~na.m karonto saya.m daliddo hutvaa nesa.m ga.naadiina.m pu~n~nakiriyaaya byaava.to ahosi. kaalena kaala.m bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa pasannamaanaso bhikkhuuna~nca ta.m ta.m veyyaavacca.m akaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbatto aparaapara.m pu~n~naani katvaa sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe vibhavasampannassa braahma.nassa putto hutvaa nibbatti ^b^sa~njayo^eb^ naama naamena, so vayappatto brahmaayupokkharasaatiaadike abhi~n~naate braahma.ne saasane abhippasanne disvaa sa~njaatappasaado satthaara.m upasa"nkami. tassa satthaa dhamma.m desesi. so dhamma.m sutvaa sotaapanno ahosi. aparabhaage pabbaji. pabbajanto ca khuraggeyeva cha.labhi~n~no ahosii. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.10.51-55) --
[21] ``ito ^a^M1.0151^ea^ ca a.t.thame kappe, raajaa aasi.m sucintito.
[03] cha.labhi~n~no ^a^P1.0129^ea^ pana hutvaa a~n~na.m byaakaronto ^b^``yato aha.m pabbajito''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^yato aha.m pabbajito^eb^ti yato pabhuti yato pa.t.thaaya aha.m pabbajito. pabbajitakaalato pa.t.thaaya ^b^naabhijaanaami sa"nkappa.m, anariya.m dosasa.mhita^eb^nti raagaadidosasa.mhita.m tato eva anariya.m nihiina.m, ariyehi vaa anara.niiyataaya anariyehi ara.niiyataaya ca anariya.m paapaka.m aaramma.ne abhuutagu.naadisa"nkappanato ``sa"nkappo''ti laddhanaama.m kaamavitakkaadimicchaavitakka.m uppaadita.m naabhijaanaamiiti, ``khuraggeyeva mayaa arahatta.m patta''nti a~n~na.m byaakaasi.

[03] ^b^cihacihaabhinadite^eb^ti aayasmato raama.neyyakattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto bhagavanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso pupphehi puuja.m akaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbatto aparaapara.m pu~n~naani katvaa sugatiisu eva parivattento imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m ibbhakule nibbattitvaa vayappatto jetavanapa.tiggaha.ne sa~njaatappasaado pabbajitvaa cariyaanukuula.m kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa ara~n~ne viharati. tassa attano sampattiyaa pabbajitasaaruppaaya ca pa.tipattiyaa paasaadikabhaavato ^b^raama.neyyako^eb^tveva sama~n~naa ahosi ^a^V1.0128^ea^. athekadivasa.m maaro thera.m bhi.msaapetukaamo bheravasadda.m akaasi. ta.m sutvaa thero thirapakatitaaya ^a^M1.0152^ea^ tena asantasanto ``maaro aya''nti ~natvaa tattha anaadara.m dassento ^b^``cihacihaabhinadite''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^cihacihaabhinadite^eb^ti cihacihaati abhi.nha.m pavattasaddataaya ``cihacihaa''ti laddhanaamaana.m va.t.takaana.m abhinaadanimitta.m, viravahetuuti ^a^P1.0130^ea^ attho. ^b^sippikaabhirutehi caa^eb^ti sippikaa vuccanti devakaa paranaamakaa gela~n~nena chaatakisadaarakaakaaraa saakhaamigaa. ``mahaakalandakaa''ti keci, sippikaana.m abhirutehi mahaaviravehi, hetumhi ceta.m kara.navacana.m, ta.m hetuuti attho. ^b^na me ta.m phandati citta^eb^nti mama citta.m na phandati na cavati. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- imasmi.m ara~n~ne viravahetu sippikaabhirutahetu viya, paapima, tava vissarakara.nahetu mama citta.m kamma.t.thaanato na paripatatiiti. tattha kaara.namaaha ^b^``ekattanirata~nhi me''^eb^ti. ^b^hi^eb^-saddo hetu attho, yasmaa mama citta.m ga.nasa"nga.nika.m pahaaya ekatte ekiibhaave, bahiddhaa vaa vikkhepa.m pahaaya ekatte ekaggataaya, ekatte ekasabhaave vaa nibbaane nirata.m abhirata.m, tasmaa kamma.t.thaanato na phandati na cavatiiti, ima.m kira gaatha.m vadanto eva thero vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.21.5-9) --

[03] ^b^dhara.nii^eb^ ^a^M1.0153^ea^ ^a^V1.0129^ea^ ^b^ca si~ncati vaa^eb^ti aayasmato vimalattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? sopi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kaale sa"nkhadhamanakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto tasmi.m ^a^P1.0131^ea^ sippe nipphatti.m gato ekadivasa.m vipassi.m bhagavanta.m passitvaa pasannamaanaso sa"nkhadhamanena puuja.m katvaa tato pa.t.thaaya kaalena kaala.m satthu upa.t.thaana.m akaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m pu~n~naani katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto kassapassa bhagavato kaale ``anaagate me vimalo visuddho kaayo hotuu''ti bodhirukkha.m gandhodakehi nhaapesi, cetiya"nga.nabodhiya"nga.nesu aasanaani dhovaapesi, bhikkhuunampi kili.t.the sama.naparikkhaare dhovaapesi.

[03] so tato cavitvaa devesu ca manussesu ca parivattento imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe ibbhakule nibbatti. tassa maatukucchiya.m vasantassa nikkhamantassa ca kaayo pittasemhaadiihi asa.mkili.t.tho padumapalaase udakabindu viya alaggo pacchimabhavikabodhisattassa viya suvisuddho ahosi, tenassa ^b^vimalo^eb^tveva naama.m aka.msu. so vayappatto raajagahappavesane buddhaanubhaava.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa kosalara.t.the pabbataguhaaya.m viharati. athekadivasa.m caatuddiipikamahaamegho sakala.m cakkavaa.lagabbha.m pattharitvaa paavassi. viva.t.ta.t.thaayimhi buddhaana.m cakkavattiina~nca dharamaanakaale eva kira eva.m vassati. ghammapari.laahavuupasamato utusappaayalaabhena therassa citta.m samaahita.m ahosi ekagga.m. so samaahitacitto taavadeva vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa maggapa.tipaa.tiyaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.10.56-60) --
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa katakiccataaya tu.t.thamaanaso udaana.m udaanento ^b^``dhara.nii ca si~ncati vaati maaluto''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^dhara.nii^eb^ti pathavii, saa hi sakala.m dharaadhara.m dhaaretiiti ``dhara.nii''ti vuccati. ^b^si~ncatii^eb^ti samantato nabha.m puuretvaa abhippavassato mahaameghassa vu.t.thidhaaraahi si~ncati ^a^P1.0132^ea^. ^b^vaati maaluto^eb^ti udakaphusitasammissataaya siitalo vaato vaayati. ^b^vijjutaa carati nabhe^eb^ti tattha tattha gajjataa ga.laga.laayataa mahaameghato niccharantiyo saterataa aakaase ito cito ca vicaranti. ^b^upasamanti vitakkaa^eb^ti utusappaayasiddhena samathavipassanaadhigamena pubbabhaage tada"ngaadivasena vuupasantaa hutvaa kaamavitakkaadayo sabbepi nava mahaavitakkaa ariyamaggaadhigamena upasamanti. anavasesato samucchijjantiiti. vattamaanasamiipataaya ariyamaggakkha.na.m vattamaana.m katvaa vadati. atiitatthe vaa eta.m paccuppannavacana.m. ^b^citta.m susamaahita.m mamaa^eb^ti tato eva lokuttarasamaadhinaa mama citta.m su.t.thu samaahita.m, na daani tassa samaadhaane ki~nci kaatabba.m atthiiti thero a~n~na.m byaakaasi.

[03] ^b^vassati^eb^ ^a^M1.0155^ea^ ^a^V1.0131^ea^ ^b^devo^eb^tiaadikaa catasso -- godhiko, subaahu, valliyo, uttiyoti imesa.m catunna.m theraana.m gaathaa. kaa uppatti? imepi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaraa tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinantaa ito catunavute kappe siddhatthassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patvaa a~n~nama~n~na.m sahaayaa hutvaa vicari.msu. tesu eko siddhattha.m bhagavanta.m pi.n.daaya caranta.m disvaa ka.tacchubhikkha.m adaasi. dutiyo pasannacitto hutvaa pa~ncapati.t.thitena vanditvaa a~njali.m pagga.nhi. tatiyo pasannacitto ekena pupphahatthena bhagavanta.m puujesi. catuttho sumanapupphehi puujamakaasi. eva.m te satthari citta.m pasaadetvaa pasutena tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbattitvaa puna aparaapara.m pu~n~naani katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto kassapassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa sahaayakaa hutvaa saasane pabbajitvaa sama.nadhamma.m katvaa amhaaka.m bhagavato kaale paavaaya.m catunna.m mallaraajaana.m puttaa hutvaa nibbatti.msu. tesa.m ^a^P1.0133^ea^ ^b^godhiko, subaahu, valliyo, uttiyo^eb^ti naamaani aka.msu. a~n~nama~n~na.m piyasahaayaa ahesu.m. te kenacideva kara.niiyena kapilavatthu.m agama.msu. tasmi~nca samaye satthaa kapilavatthu.m gantvaa nigrodhaaraame vasanto yamakapaa.tihaariya.m dassetvaa suddhodanappamukhe sakyaraajaano damesi. tadaa tepi cattaaro mallaraajaputtaa paa.tihaariya.m disvaa laddhappasaadaa pabbajitvaa vipassanaakamma.m karontaa nacirasseva saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m paapu.ni.msu. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.11.1-23) --
[22] u.laaraa vitti me jaataa, buddhe aadiccabandhune..
[21] ``kilesaa jhaapitaa mayha.m...pe0... kata.m buddhassa saasana''nti.. (apa0 thera 1.11.1-23).

[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa ime cattaaropi theraa loke paaka.taa pa~n~naataa raajaraajamahaamattehi sakkataa garukataa hutvaa ara~n~ne ^a^P1.0134^ea^ saheva viharanti. athekadaa raajaa bimbisaaro te cattaaro there raajagaha.m upagate upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa temaasa.m vassaavaasatthaaya nimantetvaa tesa.m paa.tiyekka.m ku.tikaayo kaaretvaa satisammosena na chaadesi. theraa acchannaasu ku.tikaasu viharanti. vassakaale devo na vassati. raajaa ``ki.m nu kho kaara.na.m devo na vassatii''ti cintento, ta.m kaara.na.m ~natvaa, taa ku.tikaayo chaadaapetvaa, mattikaakamma.m cittakamma~nca kaaraapetvaa, ku.tikaamaha.m karonto mahato bhikkhusa"nghassa daana.m adaasi. theraa ra~n~no anukampaaya ku.tikaayo pavisitvaa mettaasamaapattiyo samaapajji.msu. athuttarapaaciinadisato mahaamegho u.t.thahitvaa ^a^M1.0158^ea^ theraana.m samaapattito vu.t.thaanakkha.neyeva vassitu.m aarabhi. tesu godhikatthero samaapattito vu.t.thaaya saha meghagajjitena --
[21] ``vassati devo yathaa sugiita.m, channaa me ku.tikaa sukhaa nivaataa.
[22] citta.m susamaahita~nca mayha.m, atha ce patthayasi pavassa devaa''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^vassatii^eb^ti si~ncati vu.t.thidhaara.m pavecchati. ^b^devo^eb^ti megho. ^b^yathaa sugiita^eb^nti sundaragiita.m viya gajjantoti adhippaayo. megho hi vassanakaale satapa.talasahassapa.talo u.t.thahitvaa thanayanto vijjutaa nicchaarentova sobhati, na kevalo. tasmaa siniddhamadhuragambhiiranigghoso vassati ^a^V1.0134^ea^ devoti dasseti. tena saddato anupapii.lita.m aaha ^b^``channaa me ku.tikaa sukhaa nivaataa''^eb^ti. yathaa na devo vassati, eva.m ti.naadiihi chaaditaa aya.m me ku.tikaa, tena vu.t.thivassena anupapii.lita.m aaha. paribhogasukhassa utusappaayautusukhassa ca sabbhaavato sukhaa. phusitagga.lapihitavaatapaanataahi vaataparissayarahitaa. ubhayenapi aavaasasappaayavasena anupapii.lita.m aaha. ^b^citta.m susamaahita~nca mayha^eb^nti citta~nca mama su.t.thu samaahita.m anuttarasamaadhinaa nibbaanaaramma.ne ^a^P1.0135^ea^ su.t.thu appita.m, etena abbhantaraparissayaabhaavato appossukkata.m dasseti. ^b^atha ce patthayasii^eb^ti atha idaani patthayasi ce, yadi icchasi. ^b^pavassaa^eb^ti si~nca udaka.m pagghara vu.t.thidhaara.m paveccha. ^b^devaa^eb^ti megha.m aalapati.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ itarehi vuttagaathaasu tatiyapade eva viseso. tattha subaahunaa vuttagaathaaya.m ^b^citta.m susamaahita~nca kaaye^eb^ti mama citta.m karajakaaye kaayagataasatibhaavanaavasena su.t.thu samaahita.m sammadeva appita.m. aya~nhi thero kaayagataasatibhaavanaavasena pa.tiladdhajhaana.m paadaka.m ^a^M1.0159^ea^ katvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. ta.m sandhaayaaha ``citta.m susamaahita~nca kaaye''ti.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ valliyattheragaathaaya.m ^b^tassa.m viharaami appamatto^eb^ti tassa.m ku.tikaaya.m appamaadapa.tipattiyaa matthaka.m paapitattaa appamatto ariyavihaaruupasa.mhitena dibbavihaaraadisa.mhitena ca iriyaapathavihaarena viharaami, attabhaava.m pavattemiiti vutta.m hoti.
[03] 54^b^.^eb^ uttiyattherena ^a^V1.0135^ea^ vuttagaathaaya.m ^b^adutiyo^eb^ti asahaayo, kilesasa"nga.nikaaya ga.nasa"nga.nikaaya ca virahitoti attho.
