[03] tattha ^a^M1.0276^ea^ ^b^na nuunaaya^eb^nti ^b^na^eb^-iti pa.tisedhe nipaato. ^b^nuunaa^eb^ti parivitakke. nuuna ayanti padacchedo. ^b^paramahitaanukampino^eb^ti parama.m ativiya, paramena vaa anuttarena hitena satte anukampanasiilassa bhagavato. ^b^rahogato^eb^ti rahasi gato, su~n~naagaaragato kaayavivekayuttoti attho. ^b^anuviga.netii^eb^ti ettha ``na nuunaa''ti padadvaya.m aanetvaa sambandhitabba.m ``naanuviga.neti nuunaa''ti, na cintesi ma~n~ne, ``naanuyu~njatii''ti takkemiiti attho. ^b^saasana^eb^nti pa.tipattisaasana.m, catusaccakamma.t.thaanabhaavananti adhippaayo ^a^P1.0231^ea^. ^b^tathaa hii^eb^ti teneva kaara.nena, satthu saasanassa ananuyu~njanato eva. ^b^aya^eb^nti aya.m bhikkhu. ^b^paakatindriyo^eb^ti manaccha.t.thaana.m indriyaana.m yathaasaka.m visayesu vissajjanato sabhaavabhuutaindriyo ^a^V1.0237^ea^, asa.mvutacakkhudvaaraadikoti attho. yassa ta.nhaasa"ngassa acchinnataaya so bhikkhu paakatindriyo viharati, tassa upama.m dassento ^b^``migii yathaa taru.najaatikaa vane''^eb^ti aaha. yathaa aya.m taru.nasabhaavaa migii puttasnehassa acchinnataaya vane dukkha.m anubhavati, na ta.m ativattati, evamayampi bhikkhu sa"ngassa acchinnataaya paakatindriyo viharanto va.t.tadukkha.m naativattatiiti adhippaayo. ``taru.navijaatikaa''ti vaa paa.tho. abhinavappasutaa baalavacchaati attho. ta.m sutvaa so bhikkhu sa~njaatasa.mvego vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni.

[03] ^b^nagaa nagaggesu susa.mviruu.lhaa^eb^ti aayasmato usabhattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppati? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani karonto ito ekati.mse kappe sikhissa bhagavato kaale devaputto hutvaa nibbatto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m disvaa pasannamaanaso dibbapupphehi puuja.m akaasi. saa pupphapuujaa sattaaha.m pupphama.n.dapaakaarena a.t.thaasi. devamanussaana.m mahaasamaagamo ahosi. so ^a^M1.0277^ea^ tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kosalara.t.the ibbhakule nibbatti, tassa ^b^usabho^eb^ti naama.m ahosi. so vi~n~nuta.m patto jetavanapa.tiggaha.ne satthari laddhappasaado pabbajitvaa katapubbakicco ara~n~ne pabbatapaade viharati. tena ca samayena paavusakaalameghe abhippavu.t.the pabbatasikharesu rukkhagacchalataaya ghanapa.n.nasa.n.dino honti ^a^P1.0232^ea^. athekadivasa.m thero le.nato nikkhamitvaa ta.m vanaraama.neyyaka.m pabbataraama.neyyaka~nca disvaa yonisomanasikaaravasena ``imepi naama rukkhaadayo acetanaa utusampattiyaa va.d.dhi.m paapu.nanti, atha kasmaa naaha.m utusappaaya.m labhitvaa gu.nehi va.d.dhi.m paapu.nissaamii''ti cintento --
[22] vivekakaamassa ara~n~nasa~n~nino, janeti bhiyyo usabhassa kalyata''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^nagaa^eb^ti rukkhaa, ``naagaa''ti keci vadanti, naagarukkhaati attho. ^b^nagaggesuu^eb^ti pabbatasikharesu. ^b^susa.mviruu.lhaa^eb^ti su.t.thu samantato viruu.lhamuulaa hutvaa parito upari ca sammadeva sa~njaatasaakhaggapallavappasaakhaati ^a^V1.0238^ea^ attho. ^b^udaggameghena navena sittaa^eb^ti pa.thamuppannena u.laarena mahataa paavusameghena abhippavu.t.thaa. ^b^vivekakaamassaa^eb^ti kilesavivitta.m cittaviveka.m icchantassa, ara~n~navaasena taava kaayaviveko laddho, idaani upadhivivekaadhigamassa nissayabhuuto cittaviveko laddhabboti ta.m patthayamaanassa, jaagariya.m anuyu~njantassaati attho, tenaaha ^b^``ara~n~nasa~n~nino''^eb^ti. ara~n~navaaso naama satthaaraa va.n.nito thomito. so ca kho yaavadeva samathavipassanaabhaavanaapaaripuuriyaa, tasmaa saa mayaa hatthagataa kaatabbaati eva.m ara~n~nagatasa~n~nino nekkhammasa"nkappabahulassaati attho. ^b^janetii^eb^ti uppaadenti, puthutte ^a^M1.0278^ea^ hi ida.m ekavacana.m. keci pana ``janentii''ti pa.thanti. ^b^bhiyyo^eb^ti uparuupari. ^b^usabhassaa^eb^ti attaanameva para.m viya vadati. ^b^kalyata^eb^nti kalyabhaava.m cittassa kamma~n~nata.m bhaavanaayogyata.m. svaayamattho he.t.thaa vuttoyeva. eva.m thero ima.m gaatha.m vadantoyeva vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.16.25-29) --

[01] ^b^duppabbajja.m^eb^ ^a^V1.0239^ea^ ^b^ve duradhivaasaa gehaa^eb^ti aayasmato jentattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kaale devaputto hutvaa nibbatti. so ekadivasa.m satthaara.m disvaa pasannacitto ki.mkiraatapupphehi puuja.m akaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto ^a^M1.0279^ea^ imasmi.m buddhuppaade magadhara.t.the jentagaame ekassa ma.n.dalikaraajassa putto hutvaa nibbatti, ^b^jento^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vi~n~nuta.m patto daharakaaleyeva hetusampattiyaa codiyamaano pabbajjaaninnamaanaso hutvaa puna cintesi -- ``pabbajjaa naama dukkaraa, gharaapi duraavaasaa, dhammo ca gambhiiro, bhogaa ca duradhigamaa, ki.m nu kho kattabba''nti eva.m pana cintaabahulo hutvaa vicaranto ekadivasa.m satthu santika.m gantvaa dhamma.m su.ni. sutakaalato pa.t.thaaya pabbajjaabhirato hutvaa satthu santike pabbajitvaa kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa sukhaaya pa.tipadaaya khippaabhi~n~naaya arahatta.m sacchaakaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.16.21-24) --
[21] ``ito ca navame kappe, raajaa sattuttamo ahu.m.

[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa attano pa.tipatti.m paccavekkhanto, ``asakkhi.m vataaha.m aadito mayha.m uppannavitakka.m chinditu''nti somanassajaato ^a^P1.0234^ea^ vitakkassa uppannaakaara.m tassa ca sammadeva chinnata.m dassento --
[21] ``duppabbajja.m ^a^V1.0240^ea^ ve duradhivaasaa gehaa, dhammo gambhiiro duradhigamaa bhogaa.
[22] kicchaa vutti no itariitareneva, yutta.m cintetu.m satatamaniccata''nti.. --

[01] tattha ^b^duppabbajja^eb^nti appa.m vaa mahanta.m vaa bhogakkhandha~nceva ~naatipariva.t.ta~nca pahaaya imasmi.m saasane ura.m datvaa pabbajanassa dukkarattaa dukkha.m pabbajana.m, dukkaraa pabbajjaati duppabbajja.m. ^b^ve^eb^ti nipaatamatta.m, da.lhattho vaa ``pabbajjaa dukkhaa''ti ^a^M1.0280^ea^. geha~nce aavaseyya.m, ^b^duradhivaasaa gehaa,^eb^ yasmaa geha.m adhivasantena ra~n~naa raajakicca.m, issarena issarakicca.m, gahapatinaa gahapatikicca.m kattabba.m hoti, parijano ceva sama.nabraahma.naa ca sa"ngahetabbaa, tasmi.m tasmi~nca kattabbe kariyamaanepi gharaavaaso chiddagha.to viya mahaasamuddo viya ca duppuuro, tasmaa gehaa naamete adhivasitu.m aavasitu.m dukkhaa dukkaraati katvaa duradhivaasaa duraavaasaati. pabbajja~nce anuti.t.theyya.m ^b^dhammo gambhiiro,^eb^ yadatthaa pabbajjaa, so pabbajitena adhigantabbo pa.tivedhasaddhammo gambhiiro, gambhiira~naa.nagocarattaa duddaso, duppa.tivijjho dhammassa gambhiirabhaavena duppa.tivijjhattaa. geha~nce aavaseyya.m, ^b^duradhigamaa bhogaa^eb^ yehi vinaa na sakkaa geha.m aavasitu.m, te bhogaa dukkhena kasirena adhigantabbataaya duradhigamaa. eva.m sante gharaavaasa.m pahaaya pabbajja.myeva anuti.t.theyya.m, evampi ^b^kicchaa vutti no itariitarena idha^eb^ imasmi.m buddhasaasane itariitarena yathaaladdhena paccayena amhaaka.m vutti jiivikaa kicchaa dukkhaa, gharaavaasaana.m duradhivaasataaya bhogaana~nca duradhigamataaya gehe itariitarena paccayena yaapetabbataaya kicchaa kasiraa vutti amhaaka.m, tattha ki.m kaatu.m va.t.tatiiti? ^b^yutta.m cintetu.m satatamaniccata.m^eb^ sakala.m divasa.m pubbarattaapararatta~nca tebhuumakadhammajaata.m aniccatanti, tato uppaadavayavantato aadiantavantato ^a^P1.0235^ea^ taavakaalikato ca na niccanti ``anicca''nti cintetu.m vipassitu.m yutta.m. aniccaanupassanaaya siddhaaya itaraanupassanaa sukheneva sijjhantiiti aniccaanupassanaava ettha vuttaa, aniccassa dukkhaanattataana.m abyabhicara.nato saasanikassa sukhaggaha.nato ca. tenaaha -- ``yadanicca.m ta.m dukkha.m, ya.m dukkha.m tadanattaa''ti (sa.m0 ni0 3.15), ``ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m, sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhamma.m'' (mahaava0 16; dii0 ni0 2.371; sa.m0 ni0 5.1081), ``vayadhammaa sa"nkhaaraa''ti (dii0 ni0 2.218) ca tadaminaa eva.m a~n~nama~n~na.m pa.tipakkhavasena aparaapara.m uppanne vitakke niggahetvaa aniccataamukhena vipassana.m aarabhitvaa idaani katakicco jaatoti dasseti. tena vutta.m ``attano pa.tipatti''ntiaadi. idameva therassa a~n~naabyaakara.na.m ahosi.

[03] ^b^tevijjoha.m^eb^ ^a^M1.0281^ea^ ^a^V1.0241^ea^ ^b^mahaajhaayii^eb^ti aayasmato vacchagottattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusalabiija.m ropento vipassissa bhagavato kaale bandhumatiinagare kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m ra~n~naa naagarehi ca saddhi.m buddhapuuja.m katvaa tato para.m devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe vibhavasampannassa braahma.nassa putto hutvaa nibbatti, tassa vacchagottataaya ^b^vacchagotto^eb^tveva sama~n~naa ahosi. so vi~n~nuta.m patvaa braahma.navijjaasu nipphatti.m gato vimutti.m gavesanto tattha saara.m adisvaa paribbaajakapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa vicaranto satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa pa~nha.m pucchitvaa tasmi.m vissajjite pasannamaanaso satthu santike pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.16.15-20) --
[03] cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa attano pa.tipatti.m paccavekkhitvaa somanassajaato udaanavasena --
[22] sadattho me anuppatto, kata.m buddhassa saasana''nti.. -- gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^a^V1.0242^ea^ ^b^tevijjoha^eb^nti yadipi ma.m pubbe ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paara.m gatattaa ``braahma.no tevijjo''ti sa~njaananti, ta.m pana sama~n~naamatta.m vedesu vijjaakiccassa abhaavato. idaani pana pubbenivaasa~naa.naadiina.m tissanna.m vijjaana.m adhigatattaa paramatthato tevijjo aha.m, mahantassa anavasesassa samudayapakkhiyassa kilesaga.nassa jhaapanato, mahantena maggaphalajhaanena mahantassa u.laarassa pa.niitassa nibbaanassa jhaayanato ca ^b^mahaajhaayii. cetosamathakovido^eb^ti cittasa"nkhobhakaraana.m sa.mkilesadhammaana.m vuupasamanena cetaso samaadahane kusalo. etena tevijjabhaavassa kaara.namaaha. samaadhikosallasahitena hi aasavakkhayena tevijjataa, na kevalena. ^b^sadattho^eb^ti sakattho ka-kaarassaaya.m da-kaaro kato ``anuppattasadattho''tiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 1.9; a0 ni0 3.38) viya. ``sadattho''ti ca arahatta.m veditabba.m. ta~nhi attapa.tibandha.t.thena attaana.m avijahana.t.thena attano paramattha.t.thena attano atthattaa ``sakattho''ti vuccati. svaaya.m sadattho ^b^me^eb^ mayaa ^b^anuppatto^eb^ adhigato. etena yathaavutta.m mahaajhaayibhaava.m sikhaapatta.m katvaa dasseti. sesa.m vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^acchodikaa puthusilaa^eb^ti aayasmato vanavacchattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusalabiija.m ropento vipassissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto parassa kamma.m ^a^P1.0237^ea^ katvaa jiivanto kassaci aparaadha.m katvaa mara.nabhayena tajjito palaayanto antaraamagge bodhirukkha.m ^a^M1.0283^ea^ disvaa pasannamaanaso tassa muula.m sammajjitvaa pi.n.dibandhehi asokapupphehi puuja.m katvaa vanditvaa bodhi.m abhimukho namassamaano palla"nkena nisinno maaretu.m aagate paccatthike disvaa tesu citta.m akopetvaa bodhi.m eva aavajjento sataporise papaate papati. so tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m pu~n~naani katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe vibhavasampannassa braahma.nassa putto hutvaa nibbatti, ``vaccho''tissa naama.m ahosi. so vayappatto bimbisaarasamaagame pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.16.7-14) --
[22] te ca disvaanaha.m tattha, aavajji.m bodhimuttama.m..
[21] ``ito ca tatiye kappe, raajaa susa~n~nato aha.m.

[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa vivekaabhiratiyaa vaneyeva vasi, tena ^b^vanavaccho^eb^ti sama~n~naa udapaadi. atha kadaaci thero ~naatijanaanuggahattha.m raajagaha.m ^a^M1.0284^ea^ gato tattha ~naatakehi upa.t.thiyamaano katipaaha.m vasitvaa gamanaakaara.m sandasseti. ta.m ~naatakaa, ``bhante, amhaaka.m anuggahattha.m dhuravihaare vasatha, maya.m upa.t.thahissaamaa''ti yaaci.msu. thero tesa.m pabbataraama.neyyakittanaapadesena vivekaabhirati.m nivedento --
[22] ambusevaalasa~nchannaa, te selaa ramayanti ma''nti.. -- gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^acchodikaa^eb^ti accha.m abahala.m sukhuma.m udaka.m etesuuti ``acchodakaa''ti vattabbe li"ngavipallaasena acchodikaa''ti vutta.m. etena tesa.m udakasampatti.m dasseti. ^b^puthusilaa^eb^ti puthulaa vitthataa mudusukhasamphassaa silaa etesuuti puthusilaa. etena nisajjana.t.thaanasampatti.m dasseti. gunna.m viya na"ngula.m na"ngu.t.tha.m etesanti ^b^gona"ngulaa,^eb^ kaa.lamakka.taa, ``pakatimakka.taa''tipi vadantiyeva ^a^P1.0238^ea^. gona"ngulehi ca pasadaadikehi migehi ca taha.m taha.m vicarantehi aayutaa missitaati ^b^gona"ngulamigaayutaa^eb^ ^a^V1.0244^ea^. etena tesa.m amanussuupacaaritaaya ara~n~nalakkha.nuupetata.m dasseti. ^b^ambusevaalasa~nchannaa^eb^ti pasavanato satata.m paggharamaanasalilataaya taha.m taha.m udakasevaalasa~nchaaditaa. ^b^te selaa ramayanti ma^eb^nti yatthaaha.m vasaami; te edisaa selaa pabbataa vivekaabhiratiyaa ma.m ramayanti, tasmaa tatthevaaha.m gacchaamiiti adhippaayo. idameva ca therassa a~n~naabyaakara.na.m ahosi.

[03] ^b^kaayadu.t.thullagaruno^eb^ti aayasmato adhimuttattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? so kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto braahma.navijjaasu nipphatti.m gato kaamesu aadiinava.m ^a^M1.0285^ea^ disvaa gharaavaasa.m pahaaya taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa ara~n~ne viharanto buddhuppaada.m sutvaa manussuupacaara.m upagantvaa satthaara.m bhikkhusa"nghaparivuta.m gacchanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso attano vaakaciira.m satthu paadamuule patthari. satthaa tassa ajjhaasaya.m ~natvaa tasmi.m a.t.thaasi. tattha .thita.m bhagavanta.m kaa.laanusaarena gandhena puujetvaa ``samuddharasima.m loka''ntiaadikaahi dasahi gaathaahi abhitthavi. ta.m satthaa ``anaagate ito satasahassakappamatthake gotamassa naama sammaasambuddhassa saasane pabbajitvaa cha.labhi~n~no bhavissatii''ti byaakaritvaa pakkaami. so tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbattitvaa tato yaavaaya.m buddhuppaado, taava devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^adhimutto^eb^ti laddhanaamo vi~n~nuta.m patto braahma.navijjaasu nipphatti.m gantvaa tattha saara.m apassanto pacchimabhavikattaa nissara.na.m gavesanto jetavanapa.tiggaha.ne buddhaanubhaava.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho satthu santike pabbajitvaa vipassana.m ^a^P1.0239^ea^ pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.40.304-332) --
[22] asamo susamo santo, vasii taadii jita~njayo..
[22] vanditvaa satthuno paade, tu.nhii a.t.thaasaha.m tadaa..
[22] tatheva tva.m mahaaviira, dhammena tappayii mama.m..
[21] ``aho nuuna sa bhagavaa, cira.m ti.t.theyya cakkhumaa.
[21] ``aya.m me pacchimaa jaati, bhavaa sabbe samuuhataa.
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa attanaa saha vasante kaayada.lhibahule bhikkhuu ovadanto --

[03] tattha ^b^kaayadu.t.thullagaruno^eb^ti du.t.thulla.m asubhayogyataa, kaayassa du.t.thulla.m kaayadu.t.thulla.m, kaayadu.t.thulla.m garu sambhaavita.m yassa so kaayadu.t.thullagaru, anissara.nappa~n~no hutvaa kaayaposanappasuto kaayada.lhibahuloti attho, tassa kaayadu.t.thullagaruno. ^b^hiyyamaanamhi jiivite^eb^ti kunnadiina.m udaka.m viya jiivitasa"nkhaare lahuso khiiyamaane. ^b^sariirasukhagiddhassaa^eb^ti pa.niitaahaaraadiihi attano kaayassa sukhena gedha.m aapannassa ^a^M1.0288^ea^. ^b^kuto sama.nasaadhutaa^eb^ti evaruupassa puggalassa sama.nabhaavena saadhutaa susama.nataa kuto kena kaara.nena siyaa, eka.msato pana kaaye jiivite ca nirapekkhassa itariitarasantosena santu.t.thassa aaraddhaviiriyasseva sama.nasaadhutaati adhippaayo.

[03] ^b^esaavahiyyase^eb^ ^a^V1.0247^ea^ ^b^pabbatenaa^eb^ti aayasmato mahaanaamattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato kaale braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa braahma.navijjaasu nipphatti.m gato gharaavaasa.m pahaaya a~n~nataraaya nadiyaa tiire assama.m kaaretvaa sambahule braahma.ne mante vaacento viharati. athekadivasa.m bhagavaa ta.m anugga.nhitu.m tassa asamapada.m upagacchi. so bhagavanta.m disvaa pasannacitto aasana.m pa~n~naapetvaa adaasi ^a^P1.0240^ea^. nisinne bhagavati sumadhura.m madhu.m upanaamesi. ta.m bhagavaa paribhu~njitvaa he.t.thaa adhimuttattheravatthumhi vuttanayena anaagata.m byaakaritvaa pakkaami. so tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m sugatiisuyeva parivattento imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^mahaanaamo^eb^ti laddhanaamo vi~n~nuta.m patto bhagavato santika.m upasa"nkamitvaa dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa nesaadake naama pabbate viharanto kilesapariyu.t.thaana.m vikkhambhetu.m asakkonto ``ki.m me iminaa sa.mkili.t.thacittassa jiivitenaa''ti attabhaava.m nibbindanto ucca.m pabbatasikhara.m abhiruhitvaa ``ito paatetvaa ta.m maaressaamii''ti attaana.m para.m viya niddisanto --
[22] nesaadakena girinaa, yasassinaa paricchadenaa''ti.. -- gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^a^M1.0289^ea^ ^b^esaavahiyyase^eb^ti eso tva.m mahaanaama avahiyyase parihaayasi. ^b^pabbatenaa^eb^ti nivaasa.t.thaanabhuutena iminaa pabbatena. ^b^bahuku.tajasallakikenaa^eb^ti bahuuhi ku.tajehi indasaalarukkhehi sallakiihi indasaalarukkhehi vaa samannaagatena. ^b^nesaadakenaa^eb^ti eva.mnaamakena. ^b^girinaa^eb^ti selena. selo hi sandhisa"nkhaatehi pabbehi .thitattaa ``pabbato''ti, pasavanaadivasena jalassa, saarabhuutaana.m bhesajjaadivatthuuna~nca gira.nato ``girii''ti vuccati. tadubhayatthasambhavato panettha ``pabbatenaa''ti vatvaa ``girinaa''ti ca vutta.m. ^b^yasassinaa^eb^ti sabbagu.nehi vissutena pakaasena. ^b^paricchadenaa^eb^ti naanaavidharukkhagacchalataahi samantato channena, vasana.t.thaanataaya vaa tuyha.m paricchadabhuutena. aya~nhettha adhippaayo -- mahaanaama, yadi kamma.t.thaana.m vissajjetvaa vitakkabahulo hosi, eva.m tva.m iminaa chaayuudakasampannena sappaayena ^a^P1.0241^ea^ nivaasana.t.thaanabhuutena nesaadakagirinaa parihaayasi, idaaniha.m ta.m ito paatetvaa maaressaami, tasmaa na labbhaa vitakkavasikena bhavitunti. eva.m thero ^a^V1.0248^ea^ attaana.m santajjentoyeva vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.40.333-352) --
[21] ``yo ^a^M1.0290^ea^ ta.m adaasi madhu.m me, pasanno sehi paa.nibhi.
[22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
[21] ``vu.t.thamhi ^a^V1.0249^ea^ deve catura"ngule ti.ne, sampupphite dhara.niiruhe sa~nchanne.
[22] su~n~ne ghare ma.n.daparukkhamuulake, vasaami nicca.m sukhito anaasavo..
[21] ``majjhe mahante hiine ca, bhave sabbe atikkami.m.
[22] ajja me aasavaa khii.naa, natthi daani punabbhavo..

[03] ^b^chaphassaayatane^eb^ ^a^M1.0291^ea^ ^b^hitvaa^eb^ti aayasmato paaraapariyattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto piyadassissa bhagavato kaale nesaadayoniya.m nibbattitvaa tassa vi~n~nuta.m pattassa vicara.na.t.thaane a~n~natarasmi.m vanasa.n.de piyadassii bhagavaa ta.m anugga.nhitu.m nirodhasamaapatti.m samaapajjitvaa nisiidi. so ca mige pariyesanto ta.m .thaana.m gato satthaara.m disvaa pasannamaanaso bhagavanta.m anto katvaa kata.m saakhaama.n.dapa.m padumapupphehi kuu.taagaaraakaarena sa~nchaadetvaa u.laara.m piitisomanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedento sattaaha.m namassamaano a.t.thaasi. divase divase ca milaatamilaataani apanetvaa abhinavehi chaadesi. satthaa sattaahassa accayena nirodhato vu.t.thahitvaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m anussari. taavadeva asiitisahassamattaa bhikkhuu satthaara.m parivaaresu.m. ``madhuradhammakatha.m su.nissaamaa''ti devataa sannipati.msu, mahaa samaagamo ahosi. satthaa anumodana.m karonto tassa devamanussesu bhaavini.m sampatti.m imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavakabodhi~nca byaakaritvaa pakkaami. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu hutvaa ^a^P1.0242^ea^ paraaparagottataaya ^b^paaraapariyo^eb^ti laddhasama~n~no bahuu braahma.ne mante vaacento satthu raajagahagamane buddhaanubhaava.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.40.353-385) --
[22] bhikkhusa"nghe ca sampatte, gaathaa pabyaaharii jino..
[21] ``ciivare pi.n.dapaate ca, cetanaa me na vijjati.
[22] tassa dhamma.m su.nitvaana, pattomhi acala.m pada.m..
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa attano pa.tipatti.m paccavekkhitvaa sa~njaatasomanasso udaanavasena --
[22] aghamuula.m vamitvaana, patto me aasavakkhayo''ti.. -- gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^chaphassaayatane hitvaa^eb^ti cakkhusamphassaadiina.m channa.m samphassaana.m uppatti.t.thaanataaya ``phassaayatanaanii''ti laddhanaamaani cakkhaadiini cha ajjhattikaayatanaani tappa.tibaddhasa.mkilesappahaanavasena pahaaya. ^b^guttadvaaro susa.mvuto^eb^ti tato eva cakkhudvaaraadiina.m guttattaa, tattha pavattanakaana.m abhijjhaadiina.m paapadhammaana.m pavesananivaara.nena satikavaa.tena su.t.tu pihitattaa guttadvaaro susa.mvuto. atha vaa manaccha.t.thaana.m channa.m dvaaraana.m vuttanayena rakkhitattaa guttadvaaro, kaayaadiihi su.t.thu sa~n~natattaa susa.mvutoti evamettha attho veditabbo. ^b^aghamuula.m vamitvaanaa^eb^ti aghassa va.t.tadukkhassa muulabhuuta.m avijjaabhavata.nhaasa"nkhaata.m dosa.m, sabba.m vaa kilesadosa.m ariyamaggasa"nkhaatavamanayogapaanena uggiritvaa santaanato bahi katvaa, bahikara.nahetu vaa. ^b^patto me aasavakkhayo^eb^ti kaamaasavaadayo aasavaa ettha khiiyanti, tesa.m vaa khayena pattabboti aasavakkhayo, nibbaana.m arahatta~nca. so aasavakkhayo patto adhigatoti udaanavasena a~n~na.m byaakaasi.

[03] ^b^suvilitto^eb^ ^a^M1.0295^ea^ ^a^P1.0243^ea^ ^b^suvasano^eb^ti aayasmato yasattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato kaale mahaanubhaavo naagaraajaa hutvaa buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m attano bhavana.m netvaa mahaadaana.m pavattesi. bhagavanta.m mahagghena ticiivarena acchaadesi, ekameka~nca bhikkhu.m mahaggheneva paccekadussayugena sabbena sama.naparikkhaarena acchaadesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto siddhatthassa bhagavato kaale se.t.thiputto hutvaa mahaabodhima.n.da.m sattahi ratanehi puujesi. kassapassa bhagavato kaale saasane pabbajitvaa sama.nadhamma.m akaasi. eva.m sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto imasmi.m amhaaka.m bhagavato kaale baaraa.nasiya.m mahaavibhavassa se.t.thino putto hutvaa nibbatti, ^b^yaso^eb^ naama naamena paramasukhumaalo. ``tassa tayo paasaadaa''ti sabba.m khandhake (mahaava0 25) aagatanayena veditabba.m.

[03] so ^a^V1.0253^ea^ pubbahetunaa codiyamaano rattibhaage niddaabhibhuutassa parijanassa vippakaara.m disvaa sa~njaatasa.mvego suva.n.napaadukaaruu.lhova gehato niggato devataaviva.tena nagaradvaarena nikkhamitvaa isipatanasamiipa.m gato ``upadduta.m vata, bho, upassa.t.tha.m vata, bho''ti aaha. tena samayena bhagavataa isipatane viharantena tasseva anugga.nhanattha.m abbhokaase ca"nkamantena ``ehi, yasa, ida.m anupadduta.m, ida.m anupassa.t.tha''nti vutto, ``anupadduta.m anupassa.t.tha.m kira atthii''ti somanassajaato suva.n.napaadukaa oruyha bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m nisinno satthaaraa anupubbikatha.m kathetvaa saccadesanaaya kataaya saccapariyosaane sotaapanno hutvaa gavesanattha.m aagatassa pitu bhagavataa saccadesanaaya kariyamaanaaya arahatta.m sacchaakaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.40.456-483) --
[22] nadii ca sandate tattha, supatitthaa manoramaa..
[21] ``laabhaa ^a^V1.0254^ea^ amha.m suladdha.m no, ye vasaama tavantike.
[21] ``yo me annena paanena, sabbe ime ca tappayi.m.
[22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
[22] ma.n.dape rukkhamuule vaa, santaapo me na vijjati..

[03] atha ^a^V1.0255^ea^ ^a^P1.0244^ea^ bhagavaa aayasmanta.m yasa.m dakkhi.na.m baahu.m pasaaretvaa ``ehi bhikkhuu''ti aaha. vacanasamanantarameva dva"ngulamattakesamassu a.t.thaparikkhaaradharo vassasa.t.thikatthero ^a^M1.0298^ea^ viya ahosi. so attano pa.tipatti.m paccavekkhitvaa udaanento ehibhikkhubhaavappattito purimaavatthavasena --
[22] tisso vijjaa ajjhagami.m, kata.m buddhassa saasana''nti.. -- gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^suvilitto^eb^ti sundarena ku"nkumacandanaanulepanena vilittagatto. ^b^suvasano^eb^ti su.t.thu mahagghakaasikavatthavasano. ^b^sabbaabhara.nabhuusito^eb^ti siisuupagaadiihi sabbehi aabhara.nehi ala"nkato. ^b^ajjhagami^eb^nti adhigacchi.m. sesa.m vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^abhisattova nipatatii^eb^ti aayasmato kimilattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani karonto kakusandhassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto parinibbute satthari tassa dhaatuyo uddissa sa.lalamaalaahi ma.n.dapaakaarena puuja.m akaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena taavati.mse nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kapilavatthunagare saakiyaraajakule nibbatti, ^b^kimilo^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vayappatto bhogasampattiyaa sampanno viharati. tassa ~naa.naparipaaka.m disvaa sa.mvegajananattha.m anupiyaaya.m viharanto satthaa pa.thamayobbane .thita.m dassaniiya.m itthiruupa.m abhinimminitvaa purato dassetvaa puna anukkamena yathaa jaraarogavipattiihi abhibhuutaa dissati, tathaa akaasi. ta.m disvaa kimilakumaaro ativiya sa.mvega.m pakaasento --
[21] ``abhisattova ^a^M1.0299^ea^ nipatati vayo, ruupa.m a~n~namiva tatheva santa.m.
[22] tasseva ^a^P1.0245^ea^ sato avippavasato, a~n~nasseva saraami attaana''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^abhisattovaa^eb^ti ``tva.m siigha.m gaccha maa ti.t.thaa''ti devehi anusi.t.tho aa.natto viya. ``abhisa.t.tho ^a^V1.0256^ea^ vaa''tipi paa.tho, ``tva.m lahu.m gacchaa''ti kenaci abhilaasaapito viyaati attho. ^b^nipatatii^eb^ti atipatati abhidhaavati na ti.t.thati, kha.ne kha.ne khayavaya.m paapu.naatiiti attho. ^b^vayo^eb^ti baalyayobbanaadiko sariirassa avatthaaviseso. idha panassa yobba~n~na.m adhippeta.m, ta.m hissa abhipatanta.m khiiyanta.m hutvaa upa.t.thita.m. ^b^ruupa^eb^nti ruupasampadaati vadati. ^b^ruupa^eb^nti pana sariira.m ``a.t.thi~nca pa.ticca nhaaru~nca pa.ticca ma.msa~nca pa.ticca aakaaso parivaarito ruupa.mtveva sa"nkha.m gacchatii''tiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 1.306) viya. ^b^a~n~namiva tatheva santa^eb^nti ida.m ruupa.m yaadisa.m, saya.m tatheva tenevaakaarena santa.m vijjamaana.m a~n~na.m viya mayha.m upa.t.thaatiiti adhippaayo. ``tadeva santa''nti ca keci pa.thanti. ^b^tasseva sato^eb^ti tasseva me ana~n~nassa sato samaanassa. ^b^avippavasato^eb^ti na vippavasantassa, ciravippavaasena hi sato ana~n~nampi a~n~na.m viya upa.t.thaati idampi idha natthiiti adhippaayo. ^b^a~n~nasseva saraami attaana^eb^nti ima.m mama attabhaava.m a~n~nassa sattassa viya saraami upadhaaremi sa~njaanaamiiti attho. tasseva.m aniccata.m manasi karontassa da.lhataro sa.mvego udapaadi, so sa.mvegajaato satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.56.42-48) --
[22] gahetvaa sa.lala.m maala.m, ma.n.dapa.m kaarayi.m aha.m..
[21] ``divaa ^a^M1.0300^ea^ vaa yadi vaa ratti.m, ca"nkamanto .thito caha.m.
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaapi thero attano purimuppanna.m aniccataamanasikaara.m vibhaavento tameva gaatha.m paccudaahaasi. teneta.m imassa therassa a~n~naabyaakara.nampi ahosi.

[03] ^b^rukkhamuulagahana.m^eb^ ^a^V1.0257^ea^ ^a^P1.0246^ea^ ^b^pasakkiyaa^eb^ti aayasmato vajjiputtattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m pu~n~na.m upacinanto ito catunavute kappe eka.m paccekasambuddha.m bhikkhaaya gacchanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso kadaliphalaani adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m pu~n~naani katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade vesaaliya.m licchaviraajaputto hutvaa nibbatti, vajjiraajaputtattaa ^b^vajjiputto^eb^tveva cassa sama~n~naa ahosi. so daharo hutvaa hatthisikkhaadisikkhanakaalepi hetusampannataaya nissara.najjhaasayova hutvaa vicaranto satthu dhammadesanaakaale vihaara.m gantvaa parisapariyante nisinno dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho satthu santike pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.51.57-62) --

[03] cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa aparabhaage aciraparinibbute satthari dhamma.m sa"ngaayitu.m sa"nketa.m katvaa mahaatheresu tattha tattha viharantesu ekadivasa.m aayasmanta.m aananda.m sekha.myeva samaana.m mahatiyaa parisaaya parivuta.m dhamma.m desenta.m disvaa tassa uparimaggaadhigamaaya ussaaha.m janento --
[22] jhaaya gotama maa ca pamaado, ki.m te bi.libi.likaa karissatii''ti.. --

[01] tattha ^b^rukkhamuulagahana^eb^nti rukkhamuulabhuuta.m gahana.m, gahana~nhi atthi, na ^a^P1.0247^ea^ rukkhamuula.m, rukkhamuula~nca ^a^V1.0258^ea^ atthi, na gahana.m, tesu rukkhamuulaggaha.nena .thaanassa chaayaasampannataaya vaataatapaparissayaabhaava.m dasseti. gahanaggaha.nena nivaatabhaavena vaataparissayaabhaava.m janasambaadhaabhaava~nca dasseti, tadubhayena ca bhaavanaayogyata.m. ^b^pasakkiyaa^eb^ti upagantvaa. ^b^nibbaana.m hadayasmi.m opiyaa^eb^ti ``eva.m mayaa pa.tipajjitvaa nibbaana.m adhigantabba''nti nibbuti.m hadaye .thapetvaa citte karitvaa. ^b^jhaayaa^eb^ti lakkha.nuupanijjhaanena jhaaya, vipassanaabhaavanaasahita.m maggabhaavana.m bhaavehi. ^b^gotamaa^eb^ti dhammabha.n.daagaarika.m gottena aalapati. ^b^maa ca pamaado^eb^ti adhikusalesu dhammesu maa pamaada.m aapajji. idaani yaadiso therassa pamaado, ta.m pa.tikkhepavasena dassento ^b^``ki.m te bi.libi.likaa karissatii''^eb^ti aaha. tattha ^b^bi.libi.likaa^eb^ti vi.livi.likiriyaa, bi.libi.liiti saddapavatti yathaa niratthakaa, eva.m bi.libi.likaasadisaa janapa~n~natti ^b^ki.m te karissati^eb^ kiidisa.m attha.m tuyha.m saadheti, tasmaa janapa~n~natti.m pahaaya sadatthapasuto hohiiti ovaada.m adaasi.

[01] ta.m ^a^M1.0302^ea^ sutvaa a~n~nehi vuttavisagandhavaayanavacanena sa.mvegajaato bahudeva ratti.m ca"nkamena viitinaamento vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa senaasana.m pavisitvaa ma~ncake nipannamattova arahatta.m paapu.ni.

[01] ^b^pa~ncakkhandhaa^eb^ ^a^P1.0248^ea^ ^b^pari~n~naataa^eb^ti aayasmato isidattattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m pu~n~na.m upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m bhagavanta.m rathiya.m gacchanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso madhura.m aamodaphala.m adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m pu~n~naani katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade avantira.t.the va.d.dhagaame a~n~natarassa satthavaahassa putto hutvaa nibbatti, ^b^isidatto^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vayappatto macchikaasa.n.de cittassa gahapatino adi.t.thasahaayo hutvaa tena buddhagu.ne likhitvaa pesitasaasana.m pa.tilabhitvaa saasane sa~njaatappasaado therassa mahaakaccaanassa santike pabbajitvaa vipassana.m aarabhitvaa nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.51.80-84) --

[03] cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa ``buddhupa.t.thaana.m gamissaamii''ti thera.m aapucchitvaa anukkamena majjhimadesa.m gantvaa satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa ekamanta.m nisinno ^a^M1.0303^ea^, ``kacci, bhikkhu, khamaniiya.m, kacci yaapaniiya''ntiaadinaa satthaaraa katapa.tisanthaaro pa.tivacanamukhena, ``bhagavaa tumhaaka.m saasana.m upagatakaalato pa.t.thaaya mayha.m sabbadukkha.m apagata.m, sabbo parissayo vuupasanto''ti pavedanavasena a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
[22] dukkhakkhayo anuppatto, patto me aasavakkhayo''ti.. -- gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^pa~ncakkhandhaa pari~n~naataa^eb^ti pa~ncapi me upaadaanakkhandhaa vipassanaapa~n~naasahitaaya maggapa~n~naaya ``ida.m dukkha.m, ettaka.m dukkha.m, na ito bhiyyo''ti sabbaso paricchijja ~naataa, na tesu ki~ncipi pari~n~naatabba.m atthiiti ^a^P1.0249^ea^ adhippaayo. ^b^ti.t.thanti chinnamuulakaa^eb^ti sabbaso pari~n~naatattaa eva tesa.m avijjaata.nhaadikassa muulassa samucchinnattaa ariyamaggena pahiinattaa yaavacarimacittanirodhaa te ti.t.thanti. ^b^dukkhakkhayo anuppatto^eb^ti chinnamuulakattaayeva ca nesa.m va.t.tadukkhassa khayo parikkhayo anuppatto, nibbaana.m adhigata.m. ^b^patto me aasavakkhayo^eb^ti kaamaasavaadiina.m sabbesa.m aasavaana.m khayante abhigantabbataaya ``aasavakkhayo''ti laddhanaama.m arahatta.m patta.m pa.tiladdhanti attho. keci pana antimaaya.m samussayo''ti pa.thanti. nibbaanassa adhigatattaayeva aya.m mama samussayo attabhaavo antimo sabbapacchimako, natthi daani punabbhavoti attho. ya.m pana tattha tattha avutta.m, ta.m he.t.thaa vuttanayattaa uttaana.myevaati.

[03] dukanipaate ^a^M1.0304^ea^ ^a^V1.0260^ea^ ^a^P2.0001^ea^ ^b^natthi koci bhavo nicco^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato uttarattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m pu~n~na.m upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato kaale vijjaadharo hutvaa aakaasena vicarati. tena ca samayena satthaa tassa anugga.nhanattha.m vanantare a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisiidi chabba.n.nabuddhara.msiyo vissajjento. so antalikkhena gacchanto bhagavanta.m disvaa pasannacitto aakaasato oruyha suvisuddhehi vipulehi ka.nikaarapupphehi bhagavanta.m puujesi, pupphaani buddhaanubhaavena satthu upari chattaakaarena a.t.tha.msu, so tena bhiyyosomattaaya pasannacitto hutvaa aparabhaage kaala.m katvaa taavati.mse nibbattitvaa u.laara.m dibbasampatti.m anubhavanto yaavataayuka.m tattha .thatvaa tato cuto devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe braahma.namahaasaalaputto hutvaa nibbatti, ^b^uttaro^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vi~n~nuta.m patto braahma.navijjaasu nipphatti.m gantvaa jaatiyaa ruupena vijjaaya vayena siilaacaarena ca lokassa sambhaavaniiyo jaato. tassa ta.m sampatti.m disvaa vassakaaro magadhamahaamatto attano dhiitara.m daatukaamo hutvaa attano adhippaaya.m pavedesi. so nissara.najjhaasayataaya ta.m pa.tikkhipitvaa kaalena kaala.m dhammasenaapati.m payirupaasanto tassa santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vattasampanno hutvaa thera.m upa.t.thahati.

[03] tena ca samayena therassa a~n~nataro aabaadho uppanno, tassa bhesajjatthaaya uttaro saama.nero paatova pattaciivaramaadaaya vihaarato nikkhanto antaraamagge ta.laakassa tiire patta.m .thapetvaa udakasamiipa.m gantvaa mukha.m dhovati. atha a~n~nataro uma"ngacoro aarakkhapurisehi ^a^M1.0305^ea^ anubaddho aggadvaareneva nagarato nikkhamitvaa palaayanto attanaa gahita.m ratanabha.n.dika.m saama.nerassa patte pakkhipitvaa palaayi. saama.nero pattasamiipa.m ^a^P2.0002^ea^ upagato. cora.m anubandhantaa raajapurisaa ^a^V1.0261^ea^ saama.nerassa patte bha.n.dika.m disvaa, ``aya.m coro, iminaa coriya.m kata''nti saama.nera.m pacchaabaaha.m bandhitvaa vassakaarassa braahma.nassa dassesu.m. vassakaaro ca tadaa ra~n~no vinicchaye niyutto hutvaa chejjabhejja.m anusaasati. so ``pubbe mama vacana.m naadiyi, suddhapaasa.n.diyesu pabbajii''ti ca baddhaaghaatattaa kamma.m asodhetvaava jiivantameva ta.m suule uttaasesi.

[03] athassa bhagavaa ~naa.naparipaaka.m oloketvaa ta.m .thaana.m gantvaa vipphurantahatthanakhama.nimayuukhasambhinnasitaabhataaya paggharantajaatihi"ngulakasuva.n.narasadhaara.m viya jaalaagu.n.thitamudutalunadiigha"ngulihattha.m uttarassa siise .thapetvaa, ``uttara, ida.m te purimakammassa phala.m uppanna.m, tattha tayaa paccavekkha.nabalena adhivaasanaa kaatabbaa''ti vatvaa ajjhaasayaanuruupa.m dhamma.m desesi. uttaro amataabhisekasadisena satthu hatthasamphassena sa~njaatappasaadasomanassataaya u.laara.m piitipaamojja.m pa.tilabhitvaa yathaaparicita.m vipassanaamagga.m samaaruu.lho ~naa.nassa paripaaka.m gatattaa satthu ca desanaavilaasena taavadeva maggapa.tipaa.tiyaa sabbakilese khepetvaa cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.56.55-92) --
[22] tisuula.m sugata.m gayha, gacchaami ambare tadaa..
[21] ``tattha bhutvaa pivitvaa ca, modaami tidase tadaa.
[22] bhoge me uunataa natthi, buddhapuujaayida.m phala.m..
[22] a~n~na.m gati.m na jaanaami, buddhapuujaayida.m phala.m..
[22] niice kule na jaanaami, buddhapuujaayida.m phala.m..
[21] ``ima.m khaada ima.m bhu~nja, imamhi sayane saya.
[21] ``siita.m u.nha.m na jaanaami, pari.laaho na vijjati.
[22] atho cetasika.m dukkha.m, hadaye me na vijjati..

[03] cha.labhi~n~no puna hutvaa suulato u.t.thahitvaa paraanuddayaaya aakaase .thatvaa paa.tihaariya.m dassesi. mahaajano acchariyabbhutacittajaato ahosi. taavadevassa va.no sa.mruu.lhi, so bhikkhuuhi, ``aavuso, taadisa.m dukkha.m anubhavanto katha.m tva.m vipassana.m anuyu~njitu.m asakkhii''ti pu.t.tho, ``pageva me, aavuso, sa.msaare aadiinavo, sa"nkhaaraana~nca sabhaavo sudi.t.tho, evaaha.m ^a^V1.0264^ea^ taadisa.m dukkha.m anubhavantopi asakkhi.m vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa visesa.m adhigantu''nti dassento --
[21] ``natthi koci bhavo nicco, sa"nkhaaraa vaapi sassataa.
[22] uppajjanti ca te khandhaa, cavanti aparaapara.m..

[03] tattha ^a^M1.0309^ea^ ^a^P2.0003^ea^ ^b^natthi koci bhavo nicco^eb^ti kammabhavo upapattibhavo kaamabhavo ruupabhavo aruupabhavo sa~n~niibhavo asa~n~niibhavo nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~niibhavo ekavokaarabhavo catuvokaarabhavo pa~ncavokaarabhavoti eva.mbhedo, tatthaapi hiino majjhimo ukka.t.tho diighaayuko sukhabahulo vomissasukhadukkhoti eva.mvibhaago yokoci nicco dhuvo thiro apalokiyadhammo natthi ta.m ta.m kaara.na.m pa.ticca samuppannattaa. yasmaa ca etadeva.m, tasmaa ^b^sa"nkhaaraa vaapi sassataa^eb^ natthiiti yojanaa. paccayehi sa"nkhatattaa ``sa"nkhaaraa''ti laddhanaame hi pa~ncakkhandhe upaadaaya bhavasama~n~naaya sa"nkhaaraava hutvaa sambhuutaa jaraamara.nena ca vipari.namantiiti asassataa vipari.naamadhammaa. tathaa hi te ``sa"nkhaaraa''ti vuccanti. tenaaha ^b^uppajjanti ca te khandhaa, cavanti aparaapara^eb^nti. te bhavapariyaayena sa"nkhaarapariyaayena ca vuttaa pa~ncakkhandhaa yathaapaccaya.m aparaapara.m uppajjanti, uppannaa ca jaraaya paripii.litaa hutvaa cavanti paribhijjantiiti attho. etena ``bhavo, sa"nkhaaraa''ti ca laddhavohaaraa pa~ncakkhandhaa udayabbayasabhaavaati dasseti. yasmaa tilakkha.na.m aaropetvaa sa"nkhaare sammasantassa tayopi bhavaa aaditta.m viya sa"nkhate ^b^aadiinava.m^eb^ dosa.m pageva vipassanaapa~n~naaya jaanitvaa aniccalakkha.nehi di.t.thaa sa"nkhaaraa dukkhaanattaa vibhuutataraa upa.t.thahanti, tenaaha bhagavaa -- ``yadanicca.m ta.m dukkha.m, ya.m dukkha.m tadanattaa''ti (sa.m0 ni0 3.15).

[03] yasmaa tilakkha.na.m aaropetvaa sa"nkhaare sammasantassa tayopi bhavaa aaditta.m viya agaara.m sappa.tibhayaa upa.t.thahanti, tasmaa aaha ^b^``bhavenamhi anatthiko''^eb^ti. eva.m pana sabbaso bhavehi vinivattiyamaanassa kaamesu apekkhaaya lesopi na sambhavatiyeva, tenaaha ^b^``nissa.to sabbakaamehii''^eb^ti, amhiiti yojanaa. maanusehi viya dibbehipi kaamehi nivattitacittosmiiti attho. ^b^patto me aasavakkhayo^eb^ti yasmaa eva.m suparimajjitasa"nkhaaro bhavesu suparidi.t.thaadiinavo kaamesu ^a^V1.0265^ea^ ca anaasattamaanaso tasmaa suulamatthake nisinnenaapi me mayaa patto adhigato ^a^M1.0310^ea^ aasavakkhayo nibbaana.m arahatta~ncaati. a~n~nehi ca sabrahmacaariihi appattamaanasehi tadadhigamaaya ussaaho kara.niiyoti bhikkhuuna.m ovaadamadaasi.

[03] ^b^nayida.m^eb^ ^a^P2.0004^ea^ ^b^anayenaa^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale siihayoniya.m nibbattitvaa pabbataguhaaya.m viharati. bhagavaa tassa anuggaha.m kaatu.m gocaraaya pakkantakaale sayanaguha.m pavisitvaa nirodha.m samaapajjitvaa nisiidi. siiho gocara.m gahetvaa nivatto guhaadvaare bhagavanta.m disvaa ha.t.thatu.t.tho jalajathalajapupphehi puuja.m katvaa citta.m pasaadento bhagavato aarakkhatthaaya ara~n~ne vaa.lamige apanetu.m tiisu velaasu siihanaada.m nadanto buddhagataaya satiyaa a.t.thaasi. yathaa pa.thamadivasa.m, eva.m sattaaha.m puujesi. bhagavaa sattaahaccayena nirodhaa vu.t.thahitvaa ``vattissati imassa ettako upanissayo''ti tassa passantasseva aakaasa.m pakkhanditvaa vihaarameva gato. siiho paalileyyakahatthii viya buddhaviyogadukkha.m adhivaasetu.m asakkonto kaala.m katvaa ha.msavatiinagare mahaabhogakule nibbattitvaa vayappatto nagaravaasiihi saddhi.m vihaara.m gato dhammadesana.m sutvaa sattaaha.m mahaadaana.m pavattetvaa yaavajiiva.m pu~n~naani katvaa aparaapara.m devamanussesu sa.msaranto amhaaka.m bhagavato kaale kosambiya.m ra~n~no utenassa purohitaputto hutvaa nibbatti ^b^bhaaradvaajo^eb^ naama naamena. so vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvaa pa~nca maa.navakasataani mante vaacento mahagghasabhaavena ananuruupaacaarattaa tehi pariccajjanto raajagaha.m gantvaa bhagavato bhikkhusa"nghassa ca laabhasakkaara.m disvaa saasane pabbajitvaa bhojane amatta~n~nuu hutvaa vicaranto satthaaraa upaayena ^a^M1.0311^ea^ matta~n~nutaaya pati.t.thaapito vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.50.104-109) --
[21] ``ekati.mse ^a^V1.0266^ea^ ito kappe, ya.m phala.m adadi.m tadaa.

[03] cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa ``bhagavato sammukhaa ya.m saavakehi pattabba.m, ta.m mayaa patta''nti, bhikkhusa"nghe ca ``yassa magge vaa phale vaa ka"nkhaa atthi, so ma.m pucchatuu''ti siihanaada.m nadi. tena ta.m bhagavaa, ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m siihanaadikaana.m yadida.m pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajo''ti (a0 ni0 1.188, 195) etadagge .thapesi. so ^a^P2.0005^ea^ ekadivasa.m attano santika.m upagata.m gihikaale sahaayabhuuta.m macchari.m micchaadi.t.thibraahma.na.m anukampamaano tassa daanakatha.m kathetvaa tena ca ``aya.m mama dhana.m vinaasetukaamo''ti bhaku.ti.m katvaapi ``tuyha.m ekabhatta.m demii''ti vutte, ``ta.m sa"nghassa dehi maa mayha''nti sa"nghassa pari.naamesi. puna braahma.nena ``aya.m ma.m bahuuna.m daapetukaamo''ti appaccaye pakaasite dutiyadivasa.m dhammasenaapatinaa sa"nghagataaya dakkhi.naaya mahapphalabhaavappakaasanena ta.m pasaadetvaa, ``aya.m braahma.no `aahaaragedhena ma.m daane niiyojesii'ti ma~n~nati, aahaarassa pana mayaa sabbaso pari~n~naatabhaava.m na jaanaati, handa na.m jaanaapemii''ti --
[22] aahaara.t.thitiko samussayo, iti disvaana caraami esana.m..
[21] ``pa"nkoti ^a^M1.0312^ea^ hi na.m avedayu.m, yaaya.m vandanapuujanaa kulesu.
[22] sukhuma.m salla.m durubbaha.m, sakkaaro kaapurisena dujjaho''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^nayida.m anayena jiivita^eb^nti ida.m mama jiivita.m anayena a~naayena ve.ludaanapupphadaanaadianesanaaya na hoti jiivitanikantiyaa abhaavato. ^b^naahaaro hadayassa santiko^eb^ti aahaaro ca aahariyamaano maggaphala~naa.na.m viya hadayassa cittassa santikaro na hoti, kevala.m pana sajjuka.m khudaapa.tighaatamatta.m karotiiti adhippaayo. atha vaa ^b^naahaaro hadayassa santiko^eb^ti aahaaro rasata.nhaavatthu me hadayassa santiko aasatto na hoti rasata.nhaaya eva abhaavato. ``santike''tipi pa.thanti. yo hi aahaaragiddho laabhasakkaarappasuto vicarati, tassa aahaaro hadayassa santike naama abhi.nha.m manasikaatabbato. yo pana pari~n~naataahaaro, so tattha pahiinacchandaraago, na tassaahaaro hadayassa ^a^V1.0267^ea^ santike naama -- ``katha.m nu kho labheyya''ntiaadimanasikara.nasseva abhaavato. yadi hi jiivitanikanti aahaararasata.nhaa ca natthi, atha kasmaa pi.n.daaya carasiiti anuyoga.m manasi katvaa aaha ^b^``aahaara.t.thitiko samussayo, iti disvaana caraami esana''^eb^nti. aahaaro bhojana.m .thiti .thaana.m paccayo etassaati aahaara.t.thitiko. ``aahaarapa.tibaddhavuttiko samussayo kaayo''iti disvaana eva.m ~natvaa imamattha.m buddhiya.m ^a^P2.0006^ea^ .thapetvaa caraami esana.m, bhikkhaapariyesana.m karomiiti attho.

[03] paccayanimitta.m kulaani upasa"nkamanto tattha vandanapuujanaahi laabhasakkaarehi ca bajjhatiiti eva.m maadisesu na cintetabbanti dassento ^b^``pa"nko''^eb^tigaatha.m abhaasi. tassattho -- ^b^yaa aya.m^eb^ paccayanimitta.m upagataana.m pabbajitaana.m ^b^kulesu^eb^ gehavaasiisu pavattissati gu.nasambhaavanaa ^b^puujanaa^eb^ ca, yasmaa ta.m abhaavitattaana.m osiidaapana.t.thena maliinabhaavakara.nena ca ^b^pa"nko^eb^ kaddamoti buddhaadayo ^b^avedayu.m^eb^ abbha~n~naasu.m pavedesu.m vaa, tasmaa saa sappurisaana.m ^a^M1.0313^ea^ bandhaaya na hoti sakkaaraasaaya pageva pahiinattaa. asappurisassa pana sakkaaraasaa duvi~n~neyyasabhaavataaya pii.laajananato anto tudanato uddharitu.m asakku.neyyato ca ^b^sukhuma.m salla.m durubbaha.m^eb^. tato eva tena ^b^sakkaaro kaapurisena dujjaho^eb^ durubbaheyyo tassa pahaanapa.tipattiyaa appa.tipajjanato, sakkaaraasaapahaanena pahiino hotiiti. ta.m sutvaa braahma.no there abhippasanno ahosi.

[03] ^b^makka.to pa~ncadvaaraaya^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato valliyattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto ito ekati.mse kappe kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m kenacideva kara.niiyena ara~n~na.m gato tattha naarada.m naama paccekasambuddha.m rukkhamuule vasanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso na.lehi saala.m katvaa ti.nehi chaadetvaa adaasi. ca"nkamana.t.thaana~ncassa sodhetvaa vaalukaa okiritvaa adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m braahma.namahaasaalassa putto hutvaa nibbatti, ^b^valliyo^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vayappatto yobbanamanuppatto indriyavasiko hutvaa vicaranto kalyaa.namittasa.msaggena bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa ^a^V1.0268^ea^ vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.50.93-103) --
[22] sayambhuu naarado naama, rukkhamuule vasii tadaa..
[03] arahatta.m ^a^P2.0007^ea^ pana patvaa puthujjanakaale attano cittassa ruupaadiaaramma.nesu yathaakaamappavattiyaa, idaani ariyamaggena niggahitabhaavassa ca vibhaavanena a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
[21] ``ti.t.tha makka.ta maa dhaavi, na hi te ta.m yathaa pure.
[22] niggahiitosi pa~n~naaya, neva duura.m gamissasii''ti.. -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^a^V1.0269^ea^ ^b^gha.t.tayanto^eb^ti attano lolabhaavena rukkhassa a~n~na.m saakha.m mu~ncitvaa a~n~nassa gaha.nena anekavaara.m tattha rukkha.m caalento phaluupabhogamakka.to viya tena tena cakkhaadidvaarena ruupaadiaaramma.nesu a~n~na.m mu~ncitvaa a~n~na.m ga.nhanto cittasantaanassa samaadaanavasena niccala.m .thaatu.m ^a^M1.0315^ea^ appadaanena abhikkha.na.m gha.t.tayanto caalento tasmi.myeva ruupaadiaaramma.ne anuparivattati yathaakaama.m vicarati. vattamaanasamiipataaya cettha vattamaanavacana.m. eva.m anupariyanto ca ^b^ti.t.tha, makka.ta, maa dhaavi^eb^ tva.m, cittamakka.ta, idaani ti.t.tha maa dhaavi, ito pa.t.thaaya te dhaavitu.m na sakkaa, tasmaa ^b^na hi te ta.m yathaa puure^eb^ yasmaa ta.m attabhaavageha.m pubbe viya na te sevita.m pihitadvaarabhaavato, ki~nca ^b^niggahiitosi pa~n~naaya^eb^ saya~nca idaani maggapa~n~naaya kilesaabhisa"nkhaarasa"nkhaataana.m paadaana.m chedanena accantika.m niggaha.m pattosi, tasmaa ^b^neva duura.m gamissasi^eb^ ito attabhaavato duura.m dutiyaadiattabhaava.m neva gamissasi yaavacarimakacitta.m eva te gamananti dasseti. ``neto duura''ntipi paa.tho, so evattho.

[03] ^b^ti.n.na.m me taalapattaana^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato ga"ngaatiiriyattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto saasane abhippasanno hutvaa bhikkhusa"nghassa paaniiyamadaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m pu~n~naani katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m a~n~natarassa gahapatissa putto hutvaa nibbatti, ``datto''tissa naama.m ahosi. so ^a^P2.0008^ea^ vayappatto gharaavaasa.m vasanto agamaniiya.t.thaanabhaava.m ajaanitvaa viitikkama.m katvaa puna agamaniiya.t.thaanabhaava.m ~natvaa sa.mvegajaato pabbajitvaa ta.m kamma.m jigucchitvaa luukhapa.tipatti.m anuti.t.thanto pa.msukuulaciivara.m chavasittasadisa.m mattikaapatta~nca gahetvaa ga"ngaatiire tiihi taalapattehi ku.tika.m katvaa vihaasi, tenevassa ^b^ga"ngaatiiriyo^eb^ti sama~n~naa ahosi. so ``arahatta.m appatvaa na kenaci sallapissaamii''ti citta.m adhi.t.thaaya pa.thama.m sa.mvacchara.m tu.nhiibhuuto vaciibheda.m akarontova vihaasi. dutiye sa.mvacchare gocaragaame a~n~nataraaya itthiyaa ``muugo nu kho no''ti viima.msitukaamaaya patte khiira.m aasi~ncantiyaa ^a^M1.0316^ea^ hatthavihaare katepi okirite, ``ala.m, bhaginii''ti vaaca.m nicchari. tatiye pana sa.mvacchare antaravasseva gha.tayanto vaayamanto arahatta.m paapu.ni, tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.50.51-56) --
[03] arahaa pana hutvaa attano pubbabhaagapa.tipattiyaa vibhaavanamukhena a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
[22] tatiye antaravassamhi, tamokhandho padaalito''ti.. -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^ti.n.na.m me taalapattaana.m, ga"ngaatiire ku.tii kataa^eb^ti taalarukkhato pahitehi tiihi taalapa.n.nehi mayha.m vassanaparihara.nattha.m ga"ngaaya nadiyaa tiire ku.tikaa kataa. tena attano senaasanasantosa.m dasseti. vutta~nhi dhammasenaapatinaa --
[22] ala.m phaasuvihaaraaya, pahitattassa bhikkhuno''ti.. (theragaa0 985; mi0 pa0 6.1.1).

[03] ``taalapattiina''ntipi paa.tho, so evattho. ^b^chavasittova me patto^eb^ti mayha.m patto chavasittasadiso, mataana.m khiirasecanaku.n.dasadisoti attho ^a^M1.0317^ea^. ^b^pa.msukuula~nca ciivara^eb^nti ciivara~nca me antaramaggasusaanaadiisu cha.d.ditanantakehi kata.m pa.msukuula.m. padadvayena parikkhaarasantosa.m dasseti.

[03] ^b^dvinna.m^eb^ ^a^P2.0009^ea^ ^b^antaravassaana^eb^nti dviisu antaravassesu pabbajitato arahattamappattasa.mvaccharesu. ^b^ekaa vaacaa me bhaasitaa^eb^ti ekaa, ``ala.m, bhaginii''ti khiirapa.tikkhepavaacaa eva mayaa vuttaa, a~n~no tattha vaciibhedo naahosi. tena ukka.msagata.m kaayavaciisa.myama.m dasseti. ^b^tatiye antaravassamhii^eb^ti ^a^V1.0271^ea^ tatiyassa sa.mvaccharassa abbhantare, tasmi.m aparipu.n.neyeva. ^b^tamokhandho padaalito^eb^ti aggamaggena tamokhandho bhinno, avijjaanusayo samucchinnoti attho. tena tadeka.t.thataaya sabbakilesaana.m anavasesappahaana.m vadati.

[03] ^b^api ce hoti tevijjo^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato ajinattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto buddhasu~n~ne loke kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto kenacideva kara.niiyena ara~n~na.m gato tattha sucintita.m naama paccekasambuddha.m aabaadhena pii.lita.m nisinna.m disvaa upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa bhesajjatthaaya pasannamaanaso ghatama.n.da.m adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m pu~n~naani katvaa sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m a~n~natarassa daliddabraahma.nassa gehe pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi. ta.m vijaayanakaale ajinacammena sampa.ticchi.msu. tenassa ^b^ajino^eb^tveva naama.m aka.msu. so bhogasa.mvattaniyassa kammassa akatattaa daliddakule nibbatto vayappattopi appannapaanabhojano hutvaa vicaranto jetavanapa.tiggaha.ne buddhaanubhaava.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.43.78-87) --
[22] katattaa aacitattaa ca, ga"ngaa bhaagiirathii aya.m..

[03] arahatta.m pana patvaapi purimakammanissandena appalaabhii appa~n~naatova ahosi. uddesabhattasalaakabhattaanipi laamakaaneva paapu.nanti. kammaphaleneva ca na.m puthujjanaa bhikkhuu saama.neraa ca ``appa~n~naato''ti avama~n~nanti. thero te bhikkhuu sa.mvejento --
[21] ``yo ^a^M1.0319^ea^ ^a^P2.0010^ea^ ca kho annapaanassa, laabhii hotiidha puggalo.
[22] paapadhammopi ce hoti, so nesa.m hoti sakkato''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^apii^eb^ti sambhaavane nipaato. ^b^ce^eb^ti parikappane. ^b^hotii^eb^ti bhavati. tisso vijjaa etassaati ^b^tevijjo^eb^. maccu.m pajahatiiti ^b^maccuhaayii^eb^. kaamaasavaadiina.m abhaavena ^b^anaasavo^eb^. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- dibbacakkhu~naa.na.m pubbenivaasa~naa.na.m aasavakkhaya~naa.nanti imaasa.m tissanna.m vijjaana.m adhigatattaa ^b^tevijjo^eb^ tato eva sabbaso kaamaasavaadiina.m parikkhii.nattaa ^b^anaasavo^eb^ aayati.m punabbhavassa aggaha.nato mara.naabhaavena ^b^maccuhaayii^eb^ yadipi hoti, eva.m santepi ^b^appa~n~naatoti na.m baalaa avajaananti^eb^ yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti, ta.m sadattha.m anupaapu.nitvaa .thitampi na.m uttama.m purisa.m ``dhutavaado bahussuto dhammakathiko''ti uppannalaabhassa abhaavato ``na pa~n~naato na paaka.to''ti baalaa dummedhapuggalaa avajaananti, kasmaa? ^b^ajaanataa^eb^ ajaananakaara.naa gu.naana.m ajaananameva tattha kaara.nanti dasseti.

[03] yathaa ca gu.naana.m ajaananato baalaa laabhagarutaaya sambhaavaniiyampi avajaananti, eva.m gu.naana.m ajaananato laabhagarutaaya eva.m avajaanitabbampi sambhaaventiiti dassento dutiya.m gaatha.m aaha. tattha ^b^yo^eb^ti aniyamavacana.m. ^b^ca^eb^-saddo byatireke, tena yathaavuttapuggalato imassa puggalassa vuccamaana.myeva visesa.m janeti. ^b^kho^eb^ti avadhaara.ne. ^b^annapaanassaa^eb^ti nidassanamatta.m. ^b^laabhii^eb^ti laabhavaa. ^b^idhaa^eb^ti imasmi.m loke. jaraamara.nehi tassa tassa sattaavaasassa puura.nato galanato ^a^V1.0273^ea^ ca ^b^puggalo. paapadhammo^eb^ti laamakadhammo. aya~nhettha attho -- yo pana puggalo ciivaraadipaccayamattasseva laabhii hoti, na jhaanaadiina.m, so paapicchataaya dussiilabhaavena hiinadhammopi samaano idha imasmi.m loke baalaana.m laabhagarutaaya sakkato garukato hotiiti.

[03] ^b^yadaaha.m^eb^ ^a^M1.0320^ea^ ^b^dhammamassosi^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato me.lajinattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m ^a^P2.0011^ea^ patto ekadivasa.m bhagavanta.m pi.n.daaya gacchanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso madhura.m aamodaphala.m adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade baaraa.nasiya.m khattiyakule nibbattitvaa ^b^me.lajino^eb^ti laddhanaamo vijjaasippesu nipphatti.m gato pa.n.dito byatto disaasu paaka.to ahosi. so bhagavati baaraa.nasiya.m isipatane viharante vihaara.m gantvaa satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa tadaheva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.51.57-62) --
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa aparabhaage bhikkhuuhi, ``aavuso, ki.m tayaa uttarimanussadhammo adhigato''ti pu.t.tho siihanaada.m nadanto --
[22] magge pa.tipadaaya.m vaa, ka"nkhaa mayha.m na vijjatii''ti.. -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^a^M1.0321^ea^ ^b^yadaa^eb^ti yasmi.m kaale. ^b^aha^eb^nti attaana.m niddisati. ^b^dhamma^eb^nti catusaccadhamma.m. ^b^assosi^eb^nti su.ni.m. ^b^satthuno^eb^ti di.t.thadhammikaadiatthehi veneyyaana.m saasana.t.thena satthuno. ^b^ka"nkha^eb^nti sa.msaya.m. sa"nkhatamasa"nkhata~nca anavasesato jaanana.t.thena ^b^sabba~n~nuu^eb^. kutocipi paraajitaa bhaavena ^b^aparaajite^eb^. veneyyasattaana.m sa.msaarakantaarato nibbaana.m pa.tivaahana.t.thena ^b^satthavaahe^eb^. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- yato pabhuti aha.m satthuno dhamma.m desentassa catusacca^b^dhamma.m assosi.m^eb^ sotadvaaraanusaarena upadhaaresi.m upalabhi.m, tato pa.t.thaaya anavasesasa"nkhataasa"nkhatasammutidhammaana.m sayambhuu~naa.nena jaananato ^b^sabba~n~nuu^eb^ anaavara.nadassaavimhi, pa~ncannampi maaraana.m abhibhavanato tehi aparaajitattaa sadevake loke appa.tihatadhammacakkattaa ca ^b^aparaajite,^eb^ veneyyasattaana.m lobhakantaaraadito vaahana.t.thena ^b^satthavaahe,^eb^ mahaavikkantataaya ^b^mahaaviire,^eb^ a~n~nehi duddamaana.m purisadammaana.m sara.nato accantikena damathena damanato ^b^saarathiina.m^eb^ pavarabhuute ^b^uttame^eb^ sammaasambuddhe ^a^P2.0012^ea^, ``buddho nu kho no nu kho''ti ^b^ka"nkha.m naabhijaanaami^eb^ aparappaccayabhaavato. tathaaruupe desite ariya^b^magge^eb^ tadupaadaayabhuutaaya ca siilaadi^b^pa.tipadaaya^eb^ ``niyyaaniko nu kho na nu kho''ti ^b^ka"nkhaa^eb^ vicikicchaa ^b^na vijjati^eb^ natthiiti. ettha ca ariyadhamme sa.msayaabhaavakathanena ariyasa"nghepi sa.msayaabhaavo kathitoyevaati da.t.thabba.m tattha pati.t.thitassa ana~n~nathaabhaavatoti.

[03] ^b^yathaa agaara.m ducchanna^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato raadhattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto vihaara.m gantvaa satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa ekamanta.m nisinno satthaaraa eka.m bhikkhu.m pa.tibhaaneyyakaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapiyamaana.m disvaa saya.m ta.m .thaanantara.m patthetvaa mahaadaana.m ^a^M1.0322^ea^ pavattesi. satthu u.laara~nca puuja.m akaasi. so eva.m katapa.nidhaano tato cuto tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m pi.n.daaya gacchanta.m ^a^V1.0275^ea^ disvaa pasannamaanaso madhuraani ambaphalaanii adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m pu~n~naani katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto amhaaka.m bhagavato kaale raajagahe braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^raadho^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto hutvaa gharaavaasa.m vasanto mahallakakaale puttadaarehi apasaadito, ``ki.m me gharaavaasena, pabbajissaamii''ti vihaara.m gantvaa there bhikkhuu upasa"nkamitvaa pabbajja.m yaacitvaa tehi ``aya.m braahma.no ji.n.no na sakkoti vattapa.tivatta.m puuretu''nti pa.tikkhitto satthu santika.m gantvaa attano ajjhaasaya.m pavedetvaa satthaaraa upanissayasampatti.m oloketvaa aa.nattena dhammasenaapatinaa pabbaajito vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.51.63-67) --

[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa satthu santikaavacaro hutvaa vicaranto satthu dhammadesanaapa.tibhaanassa paccayabhuutaana.m pa.tibhaanajaananakaana.m aggo jaato. therassa hi di.t.thisamudaacaara~nca aagamma dasabalassa ^a^P2.0013^ea^ navanavaa dhammadesanaa pa.tibhaati. tenaaha bhagavaa -- ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m pa.tibhaaneyyakaana.m yadida.m raadho''ti (a0 ni0 1.219, 233). so ekadivasa.m ``ime sattaa abhaavanaaya raagena abhibhuyyanti, bhaavanaaya sati ta.m natthii''ti bhaavana.m thomento ^b^``yathaa agaara''^eb^ntiaadinaa gaathaadvayamaaha.

[03] 133-4^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^agaara^eb^nti ya.mki~nci geha.m. ^b^ducchanna^eb^nti vira.lacchanna.m chiddaavachidda.m. ^b^samativijjhatii^eb^ti vassavu.t.thi vinivijjhati. ^b^abhaavita^eb^nti ta.m agaara.m vu.t.thi viya bhaavanaaya ^a^M1.0323^ea^ rahitattaa abhaavita.m citta.m. ^b^raago samativijjhatii^eb^ti na kevala.m raagova dosamohamaanaadayopi sabbakilesaa tathaaruupa.m citta.m ativijjhantiyeva. ^b^subhaavita^eb^nti samathavipassanaabhaavanaahi su.t.thu bhaavita.m, evaruupa.m citta.m succhanna.m geha.m vu.t.thi viya raagaadayo kilesaa ativijjhitu.m na sakkontiiti.

[01] ^b^khii.naa^eb^ ^a^V1.0276^ea^ ^b^hi mayha.m jaatii^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato suraadhattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m disvaa pasannamaanaso maatulu"ngaphala.m adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m pu~n~naani katvaa sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade anantara.m vuttassa raadhattherassa kani.t.tho hutvaa nibbatti, ^b^suraadho^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so je.t.thabhaatari raadhe pabbajite sayampi pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.51.68-72) --
[21] ``ekati.mse ito kappe, ya.m phala.m adadi.m tadaa.
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa saasanassa niyyaanikabhaavadassanattha.m a~n~na.m byaakaronto ^b^``khii.naa hii mayha''^eb^ntiaadinaa gaathaadvayamaaha.

[03] 135-6^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M1.0324^ea^ ^b^khii.naa^eb^ti khaya.m ^a^P2.0014^ea^ pariyosaana.m gataa. ^b^jaatii^eb^ti bhavo bhavanibbatti vaa. ^b^vusita.m jinasaasana^eb^nti jinassa sammaasambuddhassa saasana.m maggabrahmacariya.m vu.t.tha.m parivu.t.tha.m. ^b^pahiino jaalasa"nkhaato^eb^ti sattasantaanassa otthara.nato nissaritu.m appadaanato ca ``jaalasa"nkhaato''ti ca laddhanaamaa di.t.thi avijjaa ca pahiinaa maggena samucchinnaa. ^b^bhavanetti samuuhataa^eb^ti kaamabhavaadikassa bhavassa nayanato pavattanato bhavanettisa~n~nitaa ta.nhaa samugghaa.titaa. ^b^yassatthaaya pabbajito^eb^ti yassa atthaaya yadattha.m aha.m ^b^agaarasmaa^eb^ gehato ^b^anagaariya.m^eb^ pabbajja.m ^b^pabbajito^eb^ upagato. ^b^so^eb^ sabbesa.m orambhaagiyuddhambhaagiyappabhedaana.m sa.myojanaana.m bandhanaana.m khayabhuuto ^b^attho^eb^ nibbaanasa"nkhaato paramattho arahattasa"nkhaato sadattho ca mayaa ^b^anuppatto^eb^ adhigatoti attho.

[03] ^b^sukha.m^eb^ ^a^V1.0277^ea^ ^b^supantii^eb^ti aayasmato gotamattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m pu~n~na.m upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m bhagavanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso aamodaphalamadaasi. tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m pu~n~naani katvaa sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^gotamo^eb^ti laddhanaamo sattavassikakaale upanayana.m katvaa ratanabhikkha.m caritvaa sahassa.m labhitvaa ta.m taadise .thaane .thapetvaa vata.m caranto so.lasasattarasavassuddesikakaale akalyaa.namittehi kaamesu pariniiyamaano ekissaa ruupuupajiiviniyaa ta.m sahassabha.n.dika.m datvaa brahmacariyavinaasa.m patvaa taaya cassa brahmacaariruupa.m disvaa virattaakaare dassite ekarattivaaseneva nibbinnaruupo attano brahmacariyanivaasa.m dhanajaani~nca saritvaa ``ayutta.m mayaa kata''nti vippa.tisaarii ahosi. satthaa tassa hetusampatti.m cittaacaara~nca ~natvaa ^a^P2.0015^ea^ tassa aasanna.t.thaane ^a^M1.0325^ea^ attaana.m dassesi. so satthaara.m disvaa pasannamaanaso upasa"nkami, tassa bhagavaa dhamma.m desesi. so dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajanto khuraggeyeva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.51.80-84) --

[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa jhaanasukhena phalasukhena viitinaamenta.m eko gihisahaayo upagantvaa, ``aavuso, tayaa ratanabhikkhaaya laddha.m pabbajanto ki.m akaasii''ti pucchi. ta.m sutvaa thero ``ida.m naama kata''nti anaacikkhitvaa maatugaame dosa.m pakaasetvaa attano viitaraagabhaavena a~n~na.m byaakaronto ^b^``sukha.m supantii''^eb^tiaadinaa gaathaadvayamaaha.

[03] 137^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^sukha.m supanti munayo, ye itthiisu na bajjhare^eb^ti ye itthiisu visayabhuutaasu nimittabhuutaasu vaa raagabandhanena na bajjhanti, te munayo tapassino sa.myatindriyaa sukha.m supanti sukha.m viharanti, natthi tesa.m dukkhanti adhippaayo. ``supantii''ti hi nidassanamattameta.m. ^b^sadaa ve^eb^ ^a^V1.0278^ea^ ^b^rakkhitabbaasuu^eb^ti eka.msena sabbakaala.m rakkhitabbaasu. itthiyo hi sattabhuumike nippurise paasaade uparibhuumiya.m vasaapetvaapi, kucchiya.m pakkhipitvaapi na sakkaa rakkhitu.m, tasmaa taa ki.t.thaadigaaviyo viya sabbakaala.m rakkha.niiyaa honti. bahucittataaya vaa saamikena vatthaala"nkaaraanuppadaanaadinaa citta~n~nathattato sabbakaala.m rakkhitabbaa. sariirasabhaava.m vaa maalaagandhaadiihi pa.ticchaadanavasena rakkhitabbacittataaya rakkhitabbaati. ^b^yaasu sacca.m sudullabha^eb^nti yaasu saccavacana.m laddhu.m na sakkaa, itthiyo hi aggimpi pavisanti, visampi khaadanti, satthampi aaharanti, ubbandhitvaapi kaala.m karonti, na pana sacce .thaatu.m sakkonti. tasmaa evaruupaa itthiyo vajjetvaa .thitaa munayo sukhitaa vataati dasseti.

[03] 138^b^.^eb^ idaani ^a^M1.0326^ea^ yassa appahiinattaa evaruupaasu itthiisupi bajjhanti, tassa kaamassa attano suppahiinata.m accantani.t.thitata~nca dassento dutiya.m gaathamaaha. ^b^vadha.m carimha te kaamaa^eb^ti ambho kaama, ^a^P2.0016^ea^ tava vadha.m accantasamuccheda.m ariyamaggena carimha, ``vadha.m carimhase''tipi paa.tho, vadhaaya pahaanaaya maggabrahmacariya.m acarimhaati attho. ^b^ana.naa daani te maya^eb^nti idaani aggamaggapattito pa.t.thaaya i.nabhaavakaraaya pahiinattaa kaama te ana.naa maya.m, na tuyha.m i.na.m dhaarema. aviitaraago hi raagassa vase vattanato tassa i.na.m dhaarento viya hoti, viitaraago pana ta.m atikkamitvaa paramena cittissariyena samannaagato. ana.nattaa eva ^b^gacchaama daani nibbaana.m, yattha gantvaa na socati^eb^ yasmi.m nibbaane gamanahetu sabbaso sokahetuuna.m abhaavato na socati, ta.m anupaadisesanibbaanameva idaani gacchaama anupaapu.naamaati attho.

[03] ^b^pubbe hanati attaana^eb^nti aayasmato vasabhattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto buddhasu~n~ne loke braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa vayappatto braahma.naana.m vijjaasippesu nipphatti.m gantvaa nekkhammajjhaasayataaya gharaavaasa.m pahaaya taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa cuddasasahassataapasaparivaaro himavantassa aviduure samagge naama pabbate assama.m kaaretvaa vasanto jhaanaabhi~n~naayo nibbattetvaa taapasaana.m ovaadaanusaasaniyo dento ekadivasa.m eva.m cintesi -- ``aha.m kho daani imehi taapasehi sakkato garukato puujito viharaami, mayaa pana puujetabbo na upalabbhati, dukkho kho panaaya.m ^a^V1.0279^ea^ loke yadida.m agaruvaaso''ti. eva.m pana cintetvaa purimabuddhesu kataadhikaarataaya purimabuddhaana.m cetiye attanaa kata.m puujaasakkaara.m anussaritvaa ``ya.mnuunaaha.m purimabuddhe uddissa pulinacetiya.m katvaa puuja.m kareyya''nti ha.t.thatu.t.tho ^a^M1.0327^ea^ iddhiyaa pulinathuupa.m suva.n.namaya.m maapetvaa suva.n.namayaadiihi tisahassamattehi pupphehi devasika.m puuja.m karonto yaavataayuka.m pu~n~naani katvaa aparihiinajjhaano kaala.m katvaa brahmaloke nibbatto. tatthapi yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa tato cuto taavati.mse nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade vesaaliya.m licchaviraajakule nibbattitvaa ^b^vasabho^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto bhagavato vesaaligamane buddhaanubhaava.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa ^a^P2.0017^ea^ nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.50.57-92) --
[22] sabbo jano ma.m puujeti, naaha.m puujemi ki~ncana.m..
[21] ``na me ovaadako atthi, vattaa koci na vijjati.
[22] so me aacariyo natthi, vanavaaso niratthako..
[22] tesa.m etaadiso thuupo, ta.m nimitta.m karomaha.m..
[22] kilese sa.mvaseyyaasi, na yutta.m tava maarisa..
[21] ``saha aavajjite thuupe, gaarava.m hoti me tadaa.
[22] gatte sedaa na muccanti, suppabhaaso bhavaamaha.m..
[22] thuupa.m katvaana pulina.m, pattomhi acala.m pada.m..
[22] natthi khetta.m akhetta.m vaa, pa.tipattiiva saadhakaa..
[21] ``tatheva me kata.m kamma.m, paritta.m thokaka~nca ya.m.
[21] ``saddhaa maataa pitaa mayha.m, buddhassa sara.na.m gataa.

[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa daayakaanuggaha.m karonto tehi upaniite paccaye na pa.tikkhipati, yathaaladdheyeva paribhu~njati. ta.m puthujjanaa ``aya.m kaayada.lhibahulo arakkhitacitto''ti ma~n~namaanaa avama~n~nanti. thero ta.m ^a^M1.0330^ea^ aga.nentova viharati. tassa pana aviduure a~n~nataro kuhakabhikkhu paapiccho samaano appiccho viya santu.t.tho viya attaana.m dassento loka.m va~ncento viharati. mahaajano ta.m arahanta.m viya sambhaaveti. athassa sakko devaanamindo ta.m pavatti.m ~natvaa thera.m upasa"nkamitvaa, ``bhante, ki.m naama kuhako karotii''ti pucchi. thero paapiccha.m garahanto --
[21] ``pubbe hanati attaana.m, pacchaa hanati so pare.
[22] yasmi.m paapaani kammaani, sa ve ka.nho sujampatii''ti.. -- gaathaadvayamaaha.

[03] tattha ^b^pubbe hanati attaana^eb^nti kuhakapuggalo attano kuhakavuttiyaa loka.m va~ncento paapicchataadiihi paapadhammehi pa.thamameva attaana.m hanati, attano kusalako.t.thaasa.m vinaaseti. ^b^pacchaa hanati so pare^eb^ti so kuhako pa.thama.m taava vuttanayena attaana.m hantvaa pacchaa pare yehi ``aya.m ^a^V1.0282^ea^ bhikkhu pesalo ariyo''ti vaa sambhaaventehi kaaraa kataa, te hanati tesa.m kaaraani attani kataani amahapphalaani katvaa paccayavinaasanena vinaaseti. satipi kuhakassa ubhayahanane attahanane pana aya.m visesoti dassento aaha ^b^suhata.m hanti attaana^eb^nti. so kuhako attaana.m hananto suhata.m katvaa hanti vinaaseti, yathaa ki.m? ^b^viita.mseneva pakkhimaa^eb^ti, ^b^viita.mso^eb^ti diipakasaku.no, tena. ^b^pakkhimaa^eb^ti saaku.niko. yathaa tena viita.msasaku.nena a~n~ne saku.ne va~ncetvaa hananto attaana.m idha lokepi hanati vi~n~nugarahasaavajjasabhaavaadinaa, samparaaya.m pana duggatiparikkilesena hanatiyeva, na pana te saku.ne pacchaa hantu.m sakkoti, eva.m kuhakopi koha~n~nena loka.m va~ncetvaa idha lokepi ^a^P2.0018^ea^ attaana.m hanati vippa.tisaaravi~n~nugarahaadiihi, paralokepi duggatiparikkilesehi, na pana te paccayadaayake apaayadukkha.m paapeti. apica kuhako dakkhi.naaya amahapphalabhaavakara.neneva ^a^M1.0331^ea^ daayaka.m hanatiiti vutto, na nipphalabhaavakara.nena. vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa -- ``dussiilassa manussabhuutassa daana.m datvaa sahassagu.naa dakkhi.naa paa.tika"nkhitabbaa''ti (ma0 ni0 3.379). tenaaha ^b^``suhata.m hanti attaana''^eb^nti.

[03] eva.m baahiraparimajjanamatte .thitaa puggalaa suddhaa naama na honti, abbhantarasuddhiyaa eva pana suddhaa hontiiti dassento ^b^``na braahma.no''^eb^ti dutiya.m gaathamaaha. tassattho -- iriyaapathasa.n.thapanaadibahisampattimattena braahma.no na hoti. sampattiattho hi idha ^b^va.n.na^eb^-saddo. abbhantare pana siilaadisampattiyaa braahma.no hoti, ``baahitapaapo ^b^braahma.no''^eb^ti katvaa. tasmaa ^b^``yasmi.m paapaani^eb^ laamakaani ^b^kammaani^eb^ sa.mvijjanti, eka.msena so ^b^ka.nho^eb^ nihiinapuggalo''ti ^b^sujampati,^eb^ devaanaminda, jaanaahi. ta.m sutvaa sakko kuhakabhikkhu.m tajjetvaa ``dhamme vattaahii''ti ovaditvaa saka.t.thaanameva gato.

[03] ^b^sussuusaa^eb^ti ^a^V1.0283^ea^ aayasmato mahaacundattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kaale kumbhakaarakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto kumbhakaarakammena jiivanto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m disvaa pasannamaanaso eka.m mattikaapatta.m svaabhisa"nkhata.m katvaa bhagavato adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade magadhara.t.the naalakagaame ruupasaariyaa braahma.niyaa putto saariputtattherassa kani.t.thabhaataa hutvaa nibbatti, ^b^cundo^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vayappatto dhammasenaapati.m anupabbajitvaa ta.m nissaaya vipassana.m ^a^M1.0332^ea^ pa.t.thapetvaa gha.tento vaayamanto nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.51.39-50) --
[22] ruupimaye ca sova.n.ne, ta.t.tike ca ma.niimaye..
[21] ``yaavataa khettaa vijjanti, sa"nghaapi ca ga.naapi ca.
[03] cha.labhi~n~no ^a^P2.0019^ea^ pana hutvaa attanaa pa.tiladdhasampattiyaa kaara.nabhuuta.m garuupanissaya.m vivekavaasa~nca kittento --
[22] sace rati.m naadhigaccheyya tattha, sa"nghe vase rakkhitatto satiimaa''ti.. --

[01] tattha ^b^sussuusaa^eb^ti sotabbayuttassa sabbasutassa sotumicchaa, garusannivaasopi. di.t.thadhammikaadibheda~nhi attha.m sotumicchantena kalyaa.namitte upasa"nkamitvaa vattakara.nena payirupaasitvaa yadaa te payirupaasanaaya aaraadhitacittaa ka~nci upanisiiditukaamaa honti, atha ne upanisiiditvaa adhigataaya sotumicchaaya ohitasotena sotabba.m hotiiti garusannivaasopi sussuusaahetutaaya ``sussuusaa''ti vuccati. saa panaaya.m sussuusaa saccapa.ticcasamuppaadaadipa.tisa.myutta.m suta.m ta.msama"ngino puggalassa va.d.dheti bruuhetiiti ^b^sutavaddhanii,^eb^ baahusaccakaariiti attho. ^b^suta.m pa~n~naaya vaddhana^eb^nti ya.m ta.m ``sutadharo sutasannicayo''ti (ma0 ni0 1.339; a0 ni0 4.22) ``idhekaccassa bahuka.m suta.m hoti sutta.m geyya.m veyyaakara.na''nti (a0 ni0 4.6) ca evamaadinaa nayena vutta.m baahusacca.m, ta.m akusalappahaanakusalaadhigamanahetubhuuta.m pa~n~na.m vaddhetiiti suta.m pa~n~naaya vaddhana.m, vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa --
[02] ``sutaavudho kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako akusala.m pajahati, kusala.m bhaaveti, saavajja.m pajahati, anavajja.m bhaaveti, suddha.m attaana.m pariharatii''ti (a0 ni0 7.67).

[03] ^b^pa~n~naaya attha.m jaanaatii^eb^ti bahussuto sutamaya~naa.ne .thito ta.m pa.tipatti.m pa.tipajjanto sutaanusaarena atthuupaparikkhaaya dhammanijjhaanena bhaavanaaya ca lokiyalokuttarabheda.m di.t.thadhammaadivibhaaga.m ^a^V1.0285^ea^ dukkhaadivibhaaga~nca attha.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati ca pa.tivijjhati ca, tenaaha bhagavaa --
[02] ``sutassa yathaapariyattassa atthama~n~naaya dhammama~n~naaya dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno hotii''ti (a0 ni0 4.6).

[02] ``dhataana.m ^a^M1.0334^ea^ dhammaana.m attha.m upaparikkhati, attha.m upaparikkhato dhammaa nijjhaana.m khamanti, dhammanijjhaanakkhantiyaa sati chando jaayati, chandajaato ussahati, ussahitvaa tuleti, tulayitvaa padahati, pahitatto samaano ^a^P2.0020^ea^ kaayena ceva paramasacca.m sacchikaroti, pa~n~naaya ca na.m ativijjha passatii''ti (ma0 ni0 2.432) ca.
[03] ^b^~naato attho sukhaavaho^eb^ti yathaavutto di.t.thadhammikaadiattho ceva dukkhaadiattho ca yaathaavato ~naato adhigato lokiyalokuttarabheda.m sukha.m aavahati nipphaadetiiti attho.

[03] .thitaaya bhaavanaapa~n~naaya sutamatteneva na sijjhatiiti tassaa pa.tipajjanavidhi.m dassento ^b^``sevetha...pe0...vippamokkha''^eb^nti aaha. tattha ^b^sevetha pantaani senaasanaanii^eb^ti kaayavivekamaaha. tena sa.myojanappahaanassa ca vakkhamaanattaa vivekaarahasseva vivekavaasoti siilasa.mvaraadayo idha avuttasiddhaa veditabbaa. ^b^careyya sa.myojanavippamokkha^eb^nti yathaa sa.myojanehi citta.m vippamuccati, tathaa vipassanaabhaavana.m maggabhaavana~nca careyya pa.tipajjeyyaati attho. ^b^sace rati.m naadhigaccheyya tatthaa^eb^ti tesu pantasenaasanesu yathaaladdhesu adhikusaladhammesu ca rati.m pubbenaapara.m visesassa alaabhato abhirati.m na labheyya, ^b^sa"nghe^eb^ bhikkhusamuuhe ^b^rakkhitatto^eb^ kamma.t.thaanapariga.nhanato rakkhitacitto chasu dvaaresu satiaarakkhaaya upa.t.thapanena ^b^satimaa vaseyya^eb^ vihareyya, eva.m viharantassa ca api naama sa.myojanavippamokkho bhaveyyaati adhippaayo.

[03] ^b^ye kho te^eb^ti aayasmato jotidaasattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa ^a^V1.0286^ea^ vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m pi.n.daaya gacchanta.m disvaa pasannacitto kaasumaarikaphala.m adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m ^a^M1.0335^ea^ buddhuppaade paadiyatthajanapade vibhavasampannassa braahma.nassa putto hutvaa nibbatti, ^b^jotidaaso^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vi~n~nuta.m patvaa gharamaavasanto ekadivasa.m mahaakassapatthera.m attano gaame pi.n.daaya caranta.m disvaa pasannacitto bhojetvaa therassa santike dhamma.m sutvaa attano gaamasamiipe pabbate mahanta.m vihaara.m kaaretvaa thera.m tattha vaasetvaa catuuhi paccayehi upa.t.thahanto therassa dhammadesanaaya pa.tiladdhasa.mvego pabbajitvaa ^a^P2.0021^ea^ vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.51.51-56) --
[21] ``ekati.mse ito kappe, ya.m phala.m adadi.m tadaa.

[01] cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa tii.ni pi.takaani uggahetvaa visesato vinayapi.take sukusalabhaava.m patvaa dasavassiko parisupa.t.thaako ca hutvaa bahuuhi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m bhagavanta.m vanditu.m saavatthi.m gacchanto antaraamagge addhaanaparissamavinodanattha.m titthiyaana.m aaraama.m pavisitvaa ekamanta.m nisinno eka.m pa~ncatapa.m tapanta.m braahma.na.m disvaa, ``ki.m, braahma.na, a~n~nasmi.m tapaniiye a~n~na.m tapatii''ti aaha. ta.m sutvaa braahma.no kupito, ``bho, mu.n.daka, ki.m a~n~na.m tapaniiya''nti aaha. thero tassa --
[21] ``kopo ca issaa parahe.thanaa ca, maano ca saarambhamado pamaado.
[22] ta.nhaa avijjaa bhavasa"ngatii ca, te tappaniiyaa na hi ruupakhandho''ti.. --

[25] gaathaaya dhamma.m desesi. ta.m sutvaa so braahma.no tasmi.m titthiyaaraame sabbe a~n~natitthiyaa ca therassa santike pabbaji.msu. thero tehi ^a^M1.0336^ea^ saddhi.m saavatthi.m gantvaa bhagavanta.m vanditvaa katipaaha.m tattha vasitvaa attano jaatibhuumi.myeva gato dassanattha.m upagatesu ~naatakesu naanaaladdhike ya~n~nasuddhike ovadanto --
[21] ``ye ^a^V1.0287^ea^ kho te ve.thamissena, naanattena ca kammunaa.
[22] tepi tattheva kiiranti, na hi kamma.m panassati..
[21] ``ya.m karoti naro kamma.m, kalyaa.na.m yadi paapaka.m.
[22] tassa tasseva daayaado, ya.m ya.m kamma.m pakubbatii''ti.. -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^ye^eb^ti aniyamuddeso. ^b^te^eb^ti aniyamato eva pa.tiniddeso. padadvayassaapi ``janaa''ti iminaa sambandho. ^b^kho^eb^ti nipaatamatta.m. ^b^ve.thamissenaa^eb^ti varattakha.n.daadinaa siisaadiisu ve.thadaanena. ``vedhamissenaa''tipi paa.li, so evattho. ^b^naanattena ca kammunaa^eb^ti hananaghaatanahatthapaadaadicchedanena khuddakase.ladaanaadinaa ^a^P2.0022^ea^ ca naanaavidhena paruupaghaatakammena. ^b^manusse^eb^ti nidassanamatta.m, tasmaa ye keci satteti adhippaayo. ^b^uparundhantii^eb^ti vibaadhenti. ^b^pharusuupakkamaa^eb^ti daaru.napayogaa, kuruurakammantaati attho. ^b^janaa^eb^ti sattaa. ^b^tepi tattheva kiirantii^eb^ti te vuttappakaaraa puggalaa yaahi kammakaara.naahi a~n~ne baadhi.msu. ^b^tattheva^eb^ taasuyeva kaara.naasu sayampi kiiranti pakkhipiiyanti, tathaaruupa.myeva dukkha.m anubhavantiiti attho. ``tatheva kiirantii''ti ca paa.tho, yathaa saya.m a~n~nesa.m dukkha.m aka.msu, tatheva a~n~nehi kariiyanti, dukkha.m paapiiyantiiti attho, kasmaa? ^b^na hi kamma.m panassati^eb^ kamma~nhi ekanta.m upacita.m vipaaka.m adatvaa na vigacchati, avasesapaccayasamavaaye vipaccatevaati adhippaayo.

[03] idaani ``na hi kamma.m panassatii''ti sa"nkhepato vuttamattha.m vibhajitvaa sattaana.m kammassakata.m vibhaavetu.m ^b^``ya.m karotii''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi. tassattho ^b^ya.m kamma.m kalyaa.na.m^eb^ kusala.m, ^b^yadi^eb^ vaa ^b^paapaka.m^eb^ akusala.m satto ^a^M1.0337^ea^ ^b^karoti,^eb^ karonto ca tattha ^b^ya.m kamma.m^eb^ yathaa phaladaanasamattha.m hoti, tathaa ^b^pakubbati^eb^ upacinoti. ^b^tassa tasseva daayaado^eb^ti tassa tasseva kammaphalassa ga.nhanato tena tena kammena daatabbavipaakassa bhaagii hotiiti attho. tenaaha bhagavaa -- ``kammassakaa, maa.nava, sattaa kammadaayaadaa''tiaadi (ma0 ni0 3.289). imaa gaathaa sutvaa therassa ~naatakaa kammassakataaya.m pati.t.thahi.msuuti.

[03] ^b^accayanti^eb^ ^a^V1.0288^ea^ ^b^ahorattaa^eb^ti aayasmato hera~n~nakaanittherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto paresa.m bhatako hutvaa jiivanto ekadivasa.m sujaatassa naama satthusaavakassa pa.msukuula.m pariyesantassa upa.d.dhadussa.m pariccaji. so tena pu~n~nakammena taavati.msesu nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kosalara~n~no gaamabhojakassa coravosaasakassa putto hutvaa ^a^P2.0023^ea^ nibbatti, ^b^hera~n~nakaanii^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vayappatto pitu accayena ra~n~naa tasmi.myeva gaamabhojaka.t.thaane .thapito jetavanapa.tiggaha.ne buddhaanubhaava.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho attano kani.t.thassa ta.m .thaanantara.m daapetvaa raajaana.m aapucchitvaa pabbajitvaa vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.50.31-40) --
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa attano kani.t.thabhaatara.m tato kammato nivattetukaamo tasmi.myeva kamme abhirata.m disvaa ta.m codento --
[21] ``atha paapaani kammaani, kara.m baalo na bujjhati.
[22] pacchaassa ka.tuka.m hoti, vipaako hissa paapako''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^accayantii^eb^ti atikkamanti, lahu.m lahu.m apagacchantiiti attho. ^b^ahorattaa^eb^ti rattindivaa. ^b^jiivita.m uparujjhatii^eb^ti jiivitindriya~nca kha.nikanirodhavasena nirujjhati. vutta~nhi ``kha.ne kha.ne, tva.m bhikkhu, jaayasi ca jiyyasi ca miyyasi ca cavasi ca upapajjasi caa''ti. ^b^aayu khiiyati maccaana^eb^nti maritabbasabhaavattaa ^b^maccaa^eb^ti laddhanaamaana.m imesa.m sattaana.m ^b^aayu^eb^ ``yo cira.m jiivati, so vassasata.m appa.m vaa bhiyyo''ti (dii0 ni0 2.91; sa.m0 ni0 2.143; a0 ni0 7.74) eva.m paricchinnakaalaparamaayu ^b^khiiyati^eb^ khaya~nca sambheda~nca gacchati, yathaa ki.m? ^b^kunnadiina.mva odaka.m^eb^ yathaa naama kunnadiina.m pabbateyyaana.m khuddakanadiina.m udaka.m cira.m na ti.t.thati, lahutara.m khiiyati, aagatamatta.myeva vigacchati, eva.m sattaana.m aayu lahutara.m khiiyati khaya.m gacchati. ettha ca udakameva ``odaka''nti vutta.m, yathaa manoyeva maanasanti.
