[03] ^b^atha^eb^ ^a^M1.0339^ea^ ^b^paapaani kammaani, kara.m baalo na bujjhatii^eb^ti eva.m sa.msaare aniccepi samaane baalo lobhavasena vaa kodhavasena vaa paapaani kammaani karoti, karontopi na bujjhati, paapa.m karonto ca ``paapa.m karomii''ti abujjhanako naama natthi, ``imassa kammassa evaruupo dukkho vipaako''ti pana ajaananato ``na bujjhatii''ti vutta.m. ^b^pacchaassa ka.tuka.m hotii^eb^ti yadipi paapassa kammassa aayuuhanakkha.ne ``imassa kammassa evaruupo vipaako''ti na bujjhati, tato pacchaa pana nirayaadiisu nibbattassa ^a^P2.0024^ea^ assa baalassa ka.tuka.m ani.t.tha.m dukkhameva hoti. ^b^vipaako hissa paapako^eb^ yasmaa assa paapakammassa naama vipaako paapako nihiino ani.t.tho evaati. ima.m pana ovaada.m sutvaa therassa kani.t.thabhaataa raajaana.m aapucchitvaa pabbajitvaa nacirasseva sadattha.m nipphaadesi.

[01] ^b^paritta.m^eb^ ^a^V1.0290^ea^ ^b^daaru^eb^nti aayasmato somamittattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto buddhagu.ne sutvaa pasannamaanaso ekadivasa.m ki.msukarukkha.m pupphita.m disvaa pupphaani gahetvaa satthaara.m uddissa aakaase khipitvaa puujesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade baaraa.nasiya.m braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^somamitto^eb^ti laddhanaamo ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu hutvaa vimalena naama therena kataparicayattaa abhi.nha.m tassa santika.m gacchanto dhamma.m sutvaa saasane laddhappasaado pabbajitvaa laddhuupasampado vattapa.tivatta.m puurento vicarati. vimalatthero pana kusiito middhabahulo rattindiva.m viitinaameti. somamitto ``kusiita.m naama nissaaya ko gu.no''ti ta.m pahaaya mahaakassapatthera.m upasa"nkamitvaa tassa ovaade .thatvaa vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva arahatte pati.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.50.25-30) --
[21] ``svaagata.m vata me aasi, mama buddhassa santike.
[22] tisso vijjaa anuppattaa, kata.m buddhassa saasana''nti..
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa vimalatthera.m ovaadena tajjento --
[22] nicca.m aaraddhaviiriyehi, pa.n.ditehi sahaavase''ti.. -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^a^V1.0291^ea^ ^b^paritta.m daarumaaruyha, yathaa siide maha.n.nave^eb^ti pesalopi kulaputto kusiita.m alasapuggala.m nissaaya siidati sa.msaare patati, na tassa paara.m nibbaana.m gacchati. yasmaa ^a^P2.0025^ea^ etadeva.m, ^b^tasmaa ta.m^eb^ adhikusaladhammavasena siisa.m anukkhipitvaa kucchita.m siidanato ^b^kusiita.m^eb^ viiriyaarambhaabhaavato ^b^hiinaviiriya.m^eb^ puggala.m sabbathaa vajjeyya, na tassa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjeyyaati attho.

[03] eva.m puggalaadhi.t.thaanaaya gaathaaya kosajje aadiinava.m dassetvaa idaani viiriyaarambhe aanisa.mse dassetu.m ^b^``pavivittehii''^eb^tiaadi vutta.m. tassattho ^a^M1.0341^ea^ -- ye pana kaayavivekasambhavena ^b^pavivittaa,^eb^ tato eva kilesehi aarakattaa ^b^ariyaa,^eb^ nibbaana.m patipesitattataaya ^b^pahitattaa^eb^ aaramma.nuupanijjhaanavasena lakkha.nuupanijjhaanavasena ca ^b^jhaayino,^eb^ sabbakaala.m paggahitaviiriyataaya ^b^aaraddhaviiriyaa,^eb^ lokiyalokuttarabhedaaya pa~n~naaya samannaagatattaa ^b^pa.n.ditaa,^eb^ tehiyeva ^b^saha^eb^ aavaseyya sadattha.m nipphaadetukaamo sa.mvaseyyaati. ta.m sutvaa vimalatthero sa.mviggamaanaso vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa sadattha.m aaraadhesi. svaayamattho parato aagamissati.

[03] ^b^jano janamhi sambaddho^eb^ti aayasmato sabbamittattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto ito dvaanavute kappe tissassa bhagavato kaale nesaadakule nibbattitvaa vanacaariko hutvaa vane mige vadhitvaa ma.msa.m khaadanto jiivati. athassa bhagavaa anugga.nhanattha.m vasana.t.thaanasamiipe tii.ni padacetiyaani dassetvaa pakkaami. so atiitakaale sammaasambuddhesu kataparicayattaa cakka"nkitaani disvaa pasannamaanaso kora.n.dapupphehi puuja.m katvaa tena pu~n~nakammena taavati.msabhavane nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthinagare braahma.nakule nibbatti, ^b^sabbamitto^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vi~n~nuta.m patto jetavanapa.tiggaha.ne buddhaanubhaava.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa ara~n~ne viharanto vassa.m upagantvaa vu.t.thavasso bhagavanta.m vanditu.m saavatthi.m gacchanto antaraamagge maagavikehi o.d.dite paase migapotaka.m baddha.m addasa. maataa panassa migii paasa.m appavi.t.thaapi puttasinehena duura.m na gacchati, mara.nabhayena paasasamiipampi na upagacchati migapotako ca bhiito ito cito ca parivattento karu.na.m vilapati, ta.m disvaa thero ^a^V1.0292^ea^, ``aho sattaana.m snehahetuka.m dukkha''nti gacchanto tato para.m sambahule core eka.m ^a^M1.0342^ea^ purisa.m jiivagaaha.m gahetvaa ^a^P2.0026^ea^ palaalave.niyaa sariira.m ve.thetvaa jhaapente, ta~nca mahaavirava.m viravanta.m disvaa tadubhaya.m nissaaya sa~njaatasa.mvego tesa.m coraana.m su.nantaana.myeva --
[22] jano janena he.thiiyati, he.theti ca jano jana.m..
[21] ``ko hi tassa janenattho, janena janitena vaa.
[22] jana.m ohaaya gaccha.m ta.m, he.thayitvaa bahu.m jana''nti.. -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^jano^eb^ti andhabaalajano. ^b^janamhii^eb^ti a~n~ne jane. ^b^sambaddho^eb^ti ta.nhaabandhanena baddho. ``aya.m me putto, maataa''tiaadinaa pa.tibaddho. ayameva vaa paa.tho, ``ime ma.m posenti, aha.m ime nissaaya jiivaamii''ti pa.tibaddhacittoti attho. ^b^janamevassito jano^eb^ti ``aya.m me putto, dhiitaa''tiaadinaa a~n~nameva jana.m a~n~no jano assito ta.nhaaya alliino pariggayha .thito. ^b^jano janena he.thiiyati, he.theti ca jano jana^eb^nti kammassakataaya yathaabhuutaavabodhassa ca abhaavato ajjhupekkhana.m akatvaa lobhavasena yathaa jano jana.m assito, eva.m dosavasena jano janena he.thiiyati vibaadhiiyati. ``tayida.m mayha.mva upari he.thanaphalavasena paripatissatii''ti ajaananto he.theti ca jano jana.m.

[03] ^b^ko hi tassa janenattho^eb^ti tassa a~n~najanassa a~n~nena janena ta.nhaavasena assitena dosavasena he.thitena vaa ko attho. ^b^janena janitena vaa^eb^ti maataapitaa hutvaa tena a~n~nena janena janitena vaa ko attho. ^b^jana.m ohaaya gaccha.m ta.m, he.thayitvaa bahu.m jana^eb^nti yasmaa sa.msaare carato janassa ayamevaanuruupaa pa.tipatti, tasmaa ta.m jana.m, tassa ca baadhikaa yaa saa ta.nhaa ca, yo ca so doso eva bahu.m jana.m baadhayitvaa .thito, ta~nca ohaaya sabbaso pahaaya pariccajitvaa ^a^M1.0343^ea^ gaccha.m, tehi anupadduta.m .thaana.m gaccheyya.m paapu.neyyanti attho. eva.m ^a^P2.0027^ea^ pana vatvaa thero taavadeva vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahattamapaapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.50.15-24) --
[22] pasumaarena jiivaami, kusala.m me na vijjati..
[22] ha.t.tho ha.t.thena cittena, pade citta.m pasaadayi.m..
[03] te pana coraa therassa santike dhamma.m sutvaa sa.mvegajaataa pabbajitvaa dhammaanudhamma.m pa.tipajji.msuuti.

[03] ^b^kaa.lii^eb^ ^a^M1.0344^ea^ ^b^itthii^eb^ti aayasmato mahaakaa.lattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto kenacideva kara.niiyena ara~n~na.m gato tattha a~n~natarassa rukkhassa saakhaaya olambamaana.m pa.msukuulaciivara.m disvaa ``ariyaddhajo olambatii''ti pasannacitto ki"nka.nipupphaani gahetvaa pa.msukuula.m puujesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade setabyanagare satthavaahakule nibbattitvaa ^b^mahaakaa.lo^eb^ti laddhanaamo vi~n~nuta.m patvaa gharaavaasa.m vasanto pa~ncahi saka.tasatehi bha.n.da.m gahetvaa vaa.nijjavasena saavatthi.m gato ekamanta.m saka.tasattha.m nivesetvaa addhaanaparissama.m vinodetvaa attano parisaaya saddhi.m nisinno saayanhasamaya.m gandhamaalaadihatthe upaasake jetavana.m gacchante disvaa sayampi tehi saddhi.m vihaara.m gantvaa satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa sosaanika"nga.m adhi.t.thaaya susaane vasati. athekadivasa.m ^b^kaa.lii^eb^ naama ekaa itthii chava.daahikaa therassa kamma.t.thaanatthaaya aciramatasariira.m ubho satthii ^a^V1.0294^ea^ bhinditvaa ubho ca baahuu bhinditvaa siisa~nca dadhithaalaka.m viya bhinditvaa sabba.m a"ngapacca"nga.m sambandhameva katvaa therassa oloketu.m yogya.t.thaane .thapetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. thero ta.m disvaa attaana.m ovadanto --
[21] ``kaa.lii itthii brahatii dha"nkaruupaa, satthi~nca bhetvaa apara~nca satthi.m.
[27] baaha~nca bhetvaa apara~nca baaha.m, siisa~nca bhetvaa dadhithaalaka.mva.
[21] ``yo ^a^M1.0345^ea^ ^a^P2.0028^ea^ ve avidvaa upadhi.m karoti, punappuna.m dukkhamupeti mando.
[22] tasmaa pajaana.m upadhi.m na kayiraa, maaha.m puna bhinnasiro sayissa''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^kaa.lii^eb^ti tassaa naama.m, kaa.lava.n.nattaa vaa eva.m vutta.m. ^b^brahatii^eb^ti mahaasariiraa aarohapari.naahavatii. ^b^dha"nkaruupaa^eb^ti kaa.lava.n.nattaa eva kaakasadisaruupaa. ^b^satthi~nca bhetvaa^eb^ti matasariirassa satthi.m ja.n.nubhedanena bha~njitvaa. ^b^apara~nca satthi^eb^nti itara~nca satthi.m bha~njitvaa. ^b^baaha~nca bhetvaa^eb^ti baaha.t.thi~nca aggabaaha.t.thaaneyeva bha~njitvaa. ^b^siisa~nca bhetvaa dadhithaalaka.mvaa^eb^ti matasariirassa siisa.m bhinditvaa bhinnattaa eva le.d.duda.n.daadiihi paggharanta.m dadhithaalaka.m viya, paggharanta.m matthalu"nga.m katvaati attho. ^b^esaa nisinnaa abhisandahitvaa^eb^ti chinnabhinnaavayava.m matasariira.m te avayave yathaa.thaaneyeva .thapanena sandahitvaa sahita.m katvaa ma.msaapa.na.m pasaarentii viya esaa nisinnaa.

[03] ^b^yo ve avidvaa upadhi.m karotii^eb^ti yo imaaya upa.t.thaapita.m kamma.t.thaana.m disvaapi avidvaa akusalo kamma.t.thaana.m cha.d.detvaa ayonisomanasikaarena kilesuupadhi.m uppaadeti, so ^b^mando^eb^ mandapa~n~no sa.msaarassa anativattanato ^b^punappuna.m^eb^ aparaapara.m nirayaadiisu ^b^dukkha.m upeti^eb^. ^b^tasmaa pajaana.m upadhi.m na kayiraa^eb^ti ^b^tasmaa^eb^ti yasmaa cetadeva.m, tasmaa. ^b^pajaana.m upadhi^eb^nti ``idha ya.m dukkha.m sambhotii''ti pajaananto yoniso manasikaronto kilesuupadhi.m na kayiraa na uppaadeyya. kasmaa? ^b^maaha.m puna bhinnasiro sayissa^eb^nti yathayida.m matasariira.m bhinnasariira.m sayati, eva.m kilesuupadhiihi sa.msaare punappuna.m uppattiyaa ka.tasiva.d.dhako hutvaa bhinnasiro aha.m maa sayissanti. eva.m vadanto eva thero vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.50.8-14) --

[03] ^b^bahuu^eb^ ^a^P2.0029^ea^ ^b^sapatte labhatii^eb^ti aayasmato tissattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m pu~n~na.m upacinanto piyadassissa bhagavato kaale braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto sippesu nipphatti.m gantvaa kaamesu aadiinava.m disvaa gharaavaasa.m pahaaya taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa ara~n~naayatane saalavane assama.m kaaretvaa vasati. bhagavaa tassa anugga.nhanattha.m assamassa aviduure saalavane nirodha.m samaapajjitvaa nisiidi. so assamato nikkhamitvaa phalaaphalatthaaya gacchanto bhagavanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso cattaaro da.n.de .thapetvaa bhagavato upari pupphitaahi saalasaakhaahi saakhaama.n.dapa.m katvaa sattaaha.m navanavehi saalapupphehi bhagavanta.m puujento a.t.thaasi buddhaaramma.na.m piiti.m avijahanto. satthaa sattaahassa accayena nirodhato vu.t.thahitvaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m cintesi. taavadeva satasahassamattaa khii.naasavaa satthaara.m parivaaresu.m. bhagavaa tassa bhaavini.m sampatti.m vibhaavento anumodana.m vatvaa pakkaami. so tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade ^a^M1.0347^ea^ raajagahe braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^tisso^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu hutvaa pa~ncamattaani maa.navakasataani mante vaacento laabhaggayasaggappatto hutvaa satthu raajagahagamane buddhaanubhaava.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.49.190-220) --
[21] ``ko nu kho bhagavaa hetu, sitakammassa satthuno.
[22] tassa kamma.m saritvaana, sita.m paatukari.m aha.m..
[22] devaloke manusse vaa, okaasova na sammati..
[22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..

[03] so arahatta.m pana patvaa visesato laabhaggayasaggappatto ahosi. tattha keci puthujjanabhikkhuu therassa laabhasakkaara.m disvaa baalabhaavena asahanaakaara.m pavedesu.m. thero ta.m ~natvaa laabhasakkaare aadiinava.m tattha attano alaggabhaava~nca pakaasento --
[22] laabhii annassa paanassa, vatthassa sayanassa ca..

[03] tassattho ^a^P2.0030^ea^ -- sikhampi asesetvaa mu.n.ditakesataaya ^b^mu.n.do,^eb^ chinditvaa sa"nghaa.titakaasaavadhaaritaaya ^b^sa"nghaa.tipaaruto,^eb^ eva.m veva.n.niya.m ajjhupagato paraayattavuttiko pabbajito sace annapaanaadiina.m ^b^laabhii^eb^ hoti, sopi ^b^bahuu sapatte labhati,^eb^ tassa usuuyantaa bahuu sambhavanti. tasmaa ^b^eta.m^eb^ evaruupa.m laabha^b^sakkaaresu^eb^ ^b^mahabbhaya.m^eb^ vipulabhaya.m ^b^aadiinava.m^eb^ dosa.m viditvaa appicchata.m santosa~nca hadaye .thapetvaa anavajjuppaadassaapi uppannassa laabhassa parivajjanena ^b^appalaabho,^eb^ tato eva tattha ta.nhaavassutaabhaavena ^b^anavassuto,^eb^ sa.msaare bhayassa ikkhanato bhinnakilesataaya vaa ^b^bhikkhu^eb^ santu.t.thi.t.thaaniiyassa satisampaja~n~nassa ^a^M1.0350^ea^ vasena ^b^sato^eb^ hutvaa ^b^paribbaje^eb^ careyya vihareyyaati. ta.m sutvaa te bhikkhuu taavadeva thera.m khamaapesu.m.

[03] ^b^paaciinava.msadaayamhii^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato kimilattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? tassa pubbayogo sa.mveguppatti pabbajjaa ca ekakanipaate ``abhisatto''ti gaathaaya sa.mva.n.nanaaya.m vuttaayeva. taaya ca gaathaaya therena attano visesaadhigamassa kaara.na.m dassita.m. idha pana adhigatavisesassa attano aayasmataa ca anuruddhena aayasmataa ca nandiyena saha samaggavaaso dassitoti veditabba.m. samaggavaasa.m pana vasantaa te yathaa ca vasi.msu, ta.m dassento --
[22] ramanti dhammaratiyaa, hitvaana lokiya.m rati''nti.. -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^paaciinava.msadaayamhii^eb^ti paaciinava.msanaamake rakkhitagopite sahaparicchede vane. ta~nhi vana.m ^a^V1.0299^ea^ gaamassa paaciinadisaaya.m .thitattaa va.msagumbaparikkhittattaa ca ``paaciinava.msadaayo''ti vutto, va.msavanabhaavena vaati. ^b^sakyaputtaa^eb^ti ^a^P2.0031^ea^ anuruddhattheraadayo sakyaraajakumaaraa. ^b^sahaayakaa^eb^ti sa.mveguppattipabbajjaasama.nadhammakara.nasa.mvaasehi saha ayanato pavattanato sahaayakaa. ^b^pahaayaanappake bhoge^eb^ti u.laarena pu~n~naanubhaavena adhigate kulaparamparaagate ca mahante bhogakkhandhe cha.d.detvaa. ``sahaayaanappake''tipi paa.li. ^b^u~nche pattaagate rataa^eb^ti u~nchaacariyaaya aabhatattaa ^a^M1.0351^ea^ u~nche patte aagatattaa pattaagate pattapariyaapanne rataa abhirataa, sa"nghabhattaadiatirekalaabha.m pa.tikkhipitvaa ja"nghabala.m nissaaya bhikkhaacariyaaya laddhena missakabhatteneva santu.t.thaati attho.

[03] ^b^aaraddhaviiriyaa^eb^ti uttamatthassa adhigamaaya aaditova pageva sampaaditaviiriyaa. ^b^pahitattaa^eb^ti ninnapo.napabbhaarabhaavena kaalena kaala.m samaapajjanena ca nibbaana.m patipesitacittaa. ^b^nicca.m da.lhaparakkamaa^eb^ti vattapa.tipattiisu di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraanuyogena sabbakaala.m asithilaparakkamaa. ^b^ramanti dhammaratiyaa, hitvaana lokiya.m rati^eb^nti loke viditataaya lokapariyaapannataaya ca lokiya.m ruupaaramma.naadirati.m pahaaya maggapa~n~naaya pajahitvaa lokuttaradhammaratiyaa aggaphalanibbaanaabhiratiyaa ca ramanti abhiramantiiti.

[03] ^b^ayoniso manasikaaraa^eb^ti aayasmato nandattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto bhagavato santike dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m indriyesu guttadvaaraana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa sayampi ta.m .thaanantara.m patthento bhagavato bhikkhusa"nghassa ca puujaasakkaarabahula.m mahaadaana.m pavattetvaa, ``ahampi anaagate tumhaadisassa buddhassa evaruupo saavako bhaveyya''nti pa.nidhaana.m katvaa tato pa.t.thaaya devamanussesu sa.msaranto atthadassissa bhagavato kaale vinataaya naama nadiyaa mahanto kacchapo hutvaa nibbatto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m nadiyaa paara.m gantu.m tiire .thita.m disvaa saya.m bhagavanta.m taaretukaamo satthu paadamuule nipajji ^a^P2.0032^ea^. satthaa tassa ajjhaasaya.m oloketvaa pi.t.thi.m abhiruhi. so ha.t.thatu.t.tho vegena sota.m chindanto siighatara.m paratiirameva paapesi. bhagavaa tassa anumodana.m vadanto bhaavini.m sampatti.m kathetvaa pakkaami.

[03] so ^a^M1.0352^ea^ ^a^V1.0300^ea^ tena pu~n~nakammena sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kapilavatthusmi.m suddhodanamahaaraajassa putto hutvaa mahaapajaapatiyaa gotamiyaa kucchimhi nibbatti. tassa naamaggaha.nadivase ~naatisa"ngha.m nandento jaatoti ^b^nando^eb^tveva naama.m aka.msu. tassa vayappattakaale satthaa pavattavaradhammacakko lokaanuggaha.m karonto kapilavatthu.m gantvaa ~naatisamaagame pokkharavassa.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa ^b^vessantarajaataka.m^eb^ (jaa0 2.22.1655 aadayo) kathetvaa dutiyadivase pi.n.daaya pavi.t.tho ``utti.t.the nappamajjeyyaa''ti (dha0 pa0 168) gaathaaya pitara.m sotaapattiphale pati.t.thaapetvaa nivesana.m gantvaa ``dhamma.m care sucarita''nti (dha0 pa0 169) gaathaaya mahaapajaapati.m sotaapattiphale raajaana.m sakadaagaamiphale pati.t.thaapetvaa tatiye divase nandakumaarassa abhisekanivesanappavesanavivaahama"ngalesu vattamaanesu pi.n.daaya pavisitvaa nandakumaarassa hatthe patta.m datvaa ma"ngala.m vatvaa tassa hatthato patta.m agahetvaava vihaara.m gato ta.m pattahattha.m vihaara.m aagata.m anicchamaana.myeva pabbaajetvaa tathaa pabbajitattaayeva anabhiratiyaa pii.lita.m ~natvaa upaayena tassa ta.m anabhirati.m vinodesi. so yoniso pa.tisa"nkhaaya vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.49.148-163) --
[22] sukha.m me taadisa.m natthi, phu.t.the paadatale yathaa..
[22] aya~nca kacchapo raajaa, taaresi mama pa~n~navaa..

[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa vimuttisukha.m anubhavanto ``aho satthu upaayakosalla.m, yenaaha.m bhavapa"nkato uddharitvaa nibbaanathale pati.t.thaapito''ti attano pahiinasa.mkilesa.m pa.tiladdha~nca sukha.m paccavekkhitvaa sa~njaatasomanasso udaanavasena --
[22] yoniso pa.tipajjitvaa, bhave citta.m udabbahi''nti.. -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^a^P2.0033^ea^ ^b^ayoniso manasikaaraa^eb^ti anupaayamanasikaarato asubha.m kaaya.m subhato manasi karitvaa subhato manasikaarahetu, asubha.m ^a^M1.0354^ea^ kaaya.m subhasa~n~naayaati attho. ^b^ma.n.dana^eb^nti hatthuupagaadiaabhara.nehi ceva maalaagandhaadiihi ca attabhaavassa ala"nkara.na.m. ^b^anuyu~njisa^eb^nti anuyu~nji.m, sariirassa vibhuusanappasuto ahosinti attho. ^b^uddhato^eb^ti jaatigottaruupayobbanamadaadiihi uddhato avuupasantacitto. ^b^capalo^eb^ti vanamakka.to viya anava.t.thitacittataaya lolo, kaayama.n.danavatthama.n.danaadicaapalye yuttataaya vaa capalo ^b^ca. aasi^eb^nti ahosi.m. ^b^kaamaraagenaa^eb^ti vatthukaamesu chandaraagena ^b^a.t.tito^eb^ pii.lito vibaadhito aasinti yojanaa.

[03] ^b^upaayakusalenaa^eb^ti ^a^V1.0302^ea^ vineyyaana.m damanuupaayacchekena kovidena ^b^buddhena^eb^ bhagavataa hetubhuutena. hetuatthe hi eta.m kara.navacana.m. palu.t.thamakka.tiidevaccharaadassanena hi upakkitavaadacodanaaya attano kaamaraagaapanayana.m sandhaaya vadati. bhagavaa hi aayasmanta.m nandatthera.m pa.thama.m janapadakalyaa.ni.m upaadaaya ``yathaaya.m makka.tii, eva.m kaku.tapaadiniyo upaadaaya janapadakalyaa.nii''ti mahatiyaa aa.niyaa khuddaka.m aa.ni.m niiharanto cha.d.dako viya, sinehapaanena sariira.m kiledetvaa vamanavirecanehi dosa.m niiharanto bhisakko viya ca kaku.tapaadinidassanena janapadakalyaa.niya.m virattacitta.m kaaretvaa puna upakkitavaadena kaku.tapaadiniisupi citta.m viraajetvaa sammadeva samathavipassanaanuyogena ariyamagge pati.t.thaapesi. tena vutta.m ^b^``yoniso pa.tipajjitvaa, bhave citta.m udabbahi''^eb^nti. upaayena ~naayena sammadeva samathavipassanaaya visuddhipa.tipada.m pa.tipajjitvaa bhave sa.msaarapa"nke nimugga~nca me citta.m ariyamaggena hatthena uttaari.m, nibbaanathale pati.t.thaapesinti attho.

[03] ima.m udaana.m udaanetvaa thero punadivase bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa evamaaha -- ``ya.m me, bhante, bhagavaa paa.tibhogo pa~ncanna.m accharaasataana.m pa.tilaabhaaya kaku.tapaadaana.m, mu~ncaamaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m etasmaa pa.tissavaa''ti (udaa0 22). bhagavaapi, ``yadeva kho te, nanda, anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimutta.m, athaaha.m mutto etasmaa pa.tissavaa''ti (udaa0 22) aaha. athassa ^a^P2.0034^ea^ bhagavaa savisesa.m ^a^M1.0355^ea^ indriyesu guttadvaarata.m ~natvaa ta.m gu.na.m vibhaavento, ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m indriyesu guttadvaaraana.m yadida.m nando''ti (a0 ni0 1.219, 230) indriyesu guttadvaarabhaavena agga.t.thaane .thapesi. thero hi ``yamevaaha.m indriyaana.m asa.mvara.m nissaaya ima.m vippakaara.m patto, tamevaaha.m su.t.thu niggahessaamii''ti ussaahajaato balavahirottappo tattha ca kataadhikaarattaa indriyasa.mvare ukka.msapaarami.m agamaasiiti.

[03] ^b^pare ca na.m pasa.msantii^eb^ti aayasmato sirimattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato paaramiyo puuretvaa tusitabhavane .thitakaale braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ti.n.na.m vedaana.m ^a^V1.0303^ea^ paaraguu sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m sakkharappabhedaana.m itihaasapa~ncamaana.m padako veyyaakara.no lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu anavayo nekkhammajjhaasayataaya kaame pahaaya taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa caturaasiitisahassaparimaa.nena taapasaga.nena parivuto himavantappadese devataabhinimmite assame jhaanaabhi~n~naayo nibbattetvaa vasanto purimabuddhesu kataadhikaarataaya lakkha.namantesu aagataniyaamena ca buddhagu.ne anussaritvaa atiite buddhe uddissa a~n~natarasmi.m nadiinivattane pulinacetiya.m katvaa puujaasakkaaraabhirato ahosi. ta.m disvaa taapasaa, ``ka.m uddissa aya.m puujaasakkaaro kariiyatii''ti pucchi.msu. so tesa.m lakkha.namante aaharitvaa tattha aagataani mahaapurisalakkha.naani vibhajitvaa tadanusaarena attano bale .thatvaa buddhagu.ne kittesi. ta.m sutvaa tepi taapasaa pasannamaanasaa tato pa.t.thaaya sammaasambuddha.m uddissa thuupapuuja.m karontaa viharanti.

[03] tena ca samayena padumuttarabodhisatto tusitakaayaa cavitvaa maatukucchi.m okkanto hoti. carimabhave dvatti.msa pubbanimittaani paaturahesu.m ^a^M1.0356^ea^, sabbe ca acchariyabbhuutadhammaa. taapaso taani antevaasikaana.m dassetvaa bhiyyosomattaaya sammaasambuddhesu tesa.m pasaada.m va.d.dhetvaa kaala.m katvaa brahmaloke nibbattitvaa tehi attano sariirassa puujaaya kariiyamaanaaya dissamaanaruupo aagantvaa, ``aha.m tumhaaka.m aacariyo brahmaloke nibbatto, tumhe appamattaa pulinacetiyapuujamanuyu~njatha, bhaavanaaya ^a^P2.0035^ea^ ca yuttappayuttaa hothaa''ti vatvaa brahmalokameva gato.

[03] eva.m so devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m gahapatikule nibbatti, tassa jaatadivasato pa.t.thaaya tasmi.m kule sirisampattiyaa va.d.dhamaanattaa ^b^sirimaa^eb^tveva naama.m aka.msu. tassa padasaa gamanakaale kani.t.thabhaataa nibbatti, tassa ``aya.m siri.m va.d.dhento jaato''ti ^b^siriva.d.dho^eb^ti naama.m aka.msu. te ubhopi jetavanappa.tiggaha.ne buddhaanubhaava.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddhaa pabbaji.msu. tesu siriva.d.dho na taava uttarimanussadhammassa laabhii ahosi, catunna.m paccayaana.m laabhii, gaha.t.thapabbajitaana.m sakkato garukato, sirimatthero pana pabbajitakaalato pa.t.thaaya taadisena kammacchiddena appalaabhii ahosi bahujanaasambhaavito, samathavipassanaasu kamma.m karonto nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.49.111-147) --
[22] tattha me ca"nkamo aasi, amanussehi maapito..
[22] sabbe sissaa samaagantvaa, etamattha.m pucchi.msu ma.m..
[21] ``pulinena ^a^M1.0357^ea^ kato thuupo, ya.m tva.m deva namassasi.
[22] te kho aha.m namassaami, buddhase.t.the mahaayase..
[22] na tesa.m jaa.nu nadati, sandhisaddo na suyyati..
[22] pa.thama.m dakkhi.na.m paada.m, buddhaana.m esa dhammataa..
[22] nevukka.msenti attaana.m, no ca vambhenti paa.nina.m..
[22] sabbe sissaa samaagantvaa, aagacchu.m mama santike..
[21] ``bala~nca vata me khii.na.m, byaadhinaa paramena ta.m.
[22] aha.m aacariyo tumha.m, maa socittha sumedhasaa..
[22] maa vo pamattaa ahuttha, kha.no vo pa.tipaadito..

[03] cha.labhi~n~na~nhi samaana.m aayasmanta.m sirimatthera.m ``ariyo''ti ajaanantaa puthujjanaa bhikkhuu saama.neraa ca appalaabhitaaya lokassa anabhigatabhaavena asambhaaventaa ya.mki~nci kathetvaa garahanti. siriva.d.dhatthera.m pana paccayaana.m laabhibhaavena lokassa sakkatagarukatabhaavato sambhaaventaa pasa.msanti. thero ``ava.n.naarahassa naama va.n.nabha.nana.m, va.n.naarahassa ca ava.n.nabha.nana.m assa puthujjanabhaavassa doso''ti puthujjanabhaava~nca garahanto --
[21] ``pare ca na.m pasa.msanti, attaa ce asamaahito.
[22] mogha.m pare pasa.msanti, attaa hi asamaahito..
[21] ``pare ca na.m garahanti, attaa ce susamaahito.
[22] mogha.m pare garahanti, attaa hi susamaahito''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^pare^eb^ti attato a~n~ne pare naama, idha pana pa.n.ditehi a~n~ne baalaa pareti adhippetaa. tesa~nhi ajaanitvaa apariyogaahetvaa bhaasanato garahaa viya pasa.msaapi appamaa.nabhuutaa. ^b^na^eb^nti na.m puggala.m. ^b^pasa.msantii^eb^ti aviddasubhaavena ta.nhaavipannataaya vaa, atha vaa abhuuta.myeva ^a^P2.0036^ea^ puggala.m ``asuko bhikkhu jhaanalaabhii, ariyo''ti vaa abhuutagu.naropanena kittenti abhitthavanti. yo panettha ^b^ca^eb^-saddo, so ^a^M1.0360^ea^ attuupanayattho. tena pare na.m puggala.m pasa.msanti ca, ta~nca kho tesa.m pasa.msanamatta.m, na pana tasmi.m pasa.msaaya vatthu atthiiti imamattha.m dasseti. ^b^attaa ce asamaahito^eb^ti ya.m puggala.m pare pasa.msanti, so ce saya.m asamaahito maggasamaadhinaa phalasamaadhinaa upacaarappanaasamaadhimatteneva vaa na samaahito, samaadhaanassa pa.tipakkhabhuutaana.m kilesaana.m appahiinattaa vikkhitto vibbhantacitto hoti ceti attho. ``asamaahito''ti ca etena samaadhinimittaana.m gu.naana.m abhaava.m dasseti. ^b^mogha^eb^nti bhaavanapu.msakaniddeso ``visama.m candimasuuriyaa parivattantii''tiaadiisu viya. ^b^pare pasa.msantii^eb^ti ye ta.m asamaahita.m puggala.m pasa.msanti, te mogha.m mudhaa amuulaka.m pasa.msanti. kasmaa? ^b^attaa hi asamaahito^eb^ yasmaa tassa puggalassa citta.m asamaahita.m, tasmaati attho.

[03] dutiyagaathaaya.m ^b^garahantii^eb^ti attano aviddasubhaavena dosantaraaya vaa ariya.m jhaanalaabhi~nca samaana.m ^a^V1.0307^ea^ ``asuko bhikkhu jaagariya.m naanuyu~njati antamaso goduhanamattampi kaala.m kevala.m kaayada.lhibahulo niddaaraamo bhassaaraamo sa"nga.nikaaraamo viharatii''tiaadinaa appa.tipajjamaanataavibhaavanena vaa gu.naparidha.msanena vaa garahanti nindanti, upakkosanti vaati attho. sesa.m pa.thamagaathaaya vuttapariyaayena veditabba.m. eva.m therena imaahi gaathaahi attano nikkilesabhaave siriva.d.dhassa ca sakilesabhaave pakaasite ta.m sutvaa siriva.d.dho sa.mvegajaato vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva sadattha.m paripuuresi, garahakapuggalaa ca thera.m khamaapesu.m.

[03] ^b^khandhaa^eb^ ^a^M1.0361^ea^ ^a^V1.0308^ea^ ^b^mayaa pari~n~naataa^eb^ti aayasmato uttarattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinanto ito catunavute kappe siddhatthassa bhagavato ^a^P2.0037^ea^ kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto saasane laddhappasaado hutvaa upaasakatta.m pa.tivedesi. so satthari parinibbute attano ~naatake sannipaatetvaa bahu.m puujaasakkaara.m sambharitvaa dhaatupuuja.m akaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saakete braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^uttaro^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto kenacideva kara.niiyena saavatthi.m gato ka.n.dambamuule kata.m yamakapaa.tihaariya.m disvaa pasiiditvaa puna ^b^kaa.lakaaraamasutta^eb^desanaaya (a0 ni0 4.24) abhiva.d.dhamaanasaddho pabbajitvaa satthaaraa saddhi.m raajagaha.m gantvaa upasampajjitvaa tattheva vasanto vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.49.106-110) --

[03] cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa satthari saavatthiya.m viharante buddhupa.t.thaanattha.m raajagahato saavatthi.m upagato bhikkhuuhi ``ki.m, aavuso, pabbajjaakicca.m tayaa matthaka.m paapita''nti pu.t.tho a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
[22] bhaavitaa mama bojjha"ngaa, patto me aasavakkhayo..
[22] bhaavayitvaana bojjha"nge, nibbaayissa.m anaasavo''ti.. -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^khandhaa^eb^ti pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa. ^b^pari~n~naataa^eb^ti ``ida.m dukkha.m, na ito bhiyyo''ti paricchijja ~naataa bhaavitaa. tena dukkhassa ariyasaccassa pari~n~naabhisamayamaaha. ^b^ta.nhaa^eb^ti tasati paritasatiiti ta.nhaa. ^b^susamuuhataa^eb^ti samugghaa.titaa. etena samudayasaccassa pahaanaabhisamaya.m vadati. ^b^bhaavitaa mama bojjha"ngaa^eb^ti bodhisa"nkhaataaya satiaadidhammasaamaggiyaa, ta.msama"ngino vaa bodhisa"nkhaatassa ariyapuggalassa a"ngaati bojjha"ngaa. satidhammavicayaviiriyapiitipassaddhisamaadhiupekkhaasa"nkhaataa maggapariyaapannaa dhammaa mayaa bhaavitaa uppaaditaa va.d.dhitaa. bojjha"ngaggaha.neneva cettha ta.msahacaritataaya sabbe maggadhammaa, sabbe ca bodhipakkhiyadhammaa gahitaati da.t.thabbaa. eteneva maggasaccassa bhaavanaabhisamaya.m dasseti. ^b^patto me aasavakkhayo^eb^ti kaamaasavaadayo aasavaa khiiyanti etthaati aasavakkhayoti laddhanaamo asa"nkhatadhammo mayaa ^a^P2.0038^ea^ patto adhigato. etena nirodhasaccassa sacchikiriyaabhisamaya.m katheti. ettaavataa attano saupaadisesanibbaanasampatti.m dasseti.

[03] idaani pana anupaadisesanibbaanasampatti.m dassento ^b^``soha''^eb^ntiaadinaa dutiya.m gaathamaaha. tassattho -- soha.m eva.m vuttanayena ^b^khandhe pari~n~naaya^eb^ parijaanitvaa, tathaa parijaananto eva sakaattabhaavaparaattabhaavesu ajjhattikabaahiraayatanesu atiitaadibhedabhinnesu sa.msibbanaakaara.m punappuna.m pavattisa"nkhaata.m jaala.m etassa atthiiti ^b^jaalinii^eb^ti laddhanaama.m ta.nha.m ^b^abbahitvaana^eb^ mama cittasantaanato uddharitvaa, tathaa na.m uddharantoyeva vuttappabhede ^b^bojjha"nge bhaavayitvaana^eb^ te bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m paapetvaa tato eva ^b^anaasavo^eb^ hutvaa .thito idaani carimakacittanirodhena anupaadaano viya jaatavedo ^b^nibbaayissa.m^eb^ parinibbaayissaamiiti.

[03] ^b^panaado^eb^ ^a^M1.0363^ea^ ^b^naama so raajaa^eb^ti aayasmato bhaddajittherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto braahma.naana.m vijjaasippesu paara.m gantvaa kaame pahaaya taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa ara~n~naayatane assama.m kaaretvaa vasanto ekadivasa.m ^a^V1.0310^ea^ satthaara.m aakaasena gacchanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso a~njali.m paggayha a.t.thaasi. satthaa tassa ajjhaasaya.m ~natvaa aakaasato otari. oti.n.nassa pana bhagavato madhu~nca bhisamu.laala~nca sappi~nca khiira~nca upanaamesi, tassa ta.m bhagavaa anukampa.m upaadaaya pa.tiggahetvaa anumodana.m vatvaa pakkaami. so tena pu~n~nakammena tusite nibbatto tattha yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa tato aparaapara.m sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto vipassissa bhagavato kaale mahaddhano se.t.thi hutvaa a.t.thasa.t.thibhikkhusahassa.m bhojetvaa ticiivarena acchaadesi.

[03] eva.m bahu.m kusala.m katvaa devaloke nibbattitvaa tattha yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa tato cavitvaa manussesu uppanno buddhasu~n~ne loke pa~nca paccekabuddhasataani catuuhi paccayehi upa.t.thahitvaa tato cuto raajakule nibbattitvaa rajja.m anusaasanto putta.m paccekabodhi.m adhigantvaa .thita.m upa.t.thahitvaa tassa parinibbutassa dhaatuyo gahetvaa cetiya.m katvaa puujesi. eva.m tattha tattha taani pu~n~naani katvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade bhaddiyanagare asiitiko.tivibhavassa bhaddiyase.t.thissa ekaputtako hutvaa nibbatti, ^b^bhaddajii^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. tassa kira issariyabhogaparivaaraadisampatti carimabhave ^a^P2.0039^ea^ bodhisattassa viya ahosi.

[03] tadaa satthaa saavatthiya.m vassa.m vasitvaa bhaddajikumaara.m sa"nga.nhitu.m mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m bhaddiyanagara.m gantvaa jaatiyaavane vasi tassa ~naa.naparipaaka.m aagamayamaano. sopi upari paasaade nisinno siihapa~njara.m vivaritvaa olokento bhagavato santike dhamma.m sotu.m gacchanta.m mahaajana.m disvaa ``katthaaya.m mahaajano gacchatii''ti pucchitvaa ta.m kaara.na.m sutvaa sayampi mahataa parivaarena satthu santika.m gantvaa dhamma.m su.nanto ^a^M1.0364^ea^ sabbaabhara.napa.tima.n.ditova sabbakilese khepetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.56.98-116) --
[22] uddharaami bhisa.m tattha, ghaasahetu aha.m tadaa..
[22] madhu.m bhisehi sahita.m, khiira.m sappi.m mu.laalika.m..
[22] bhisa.m rukkhe laggetvaana, mama daana.m anussari.m..
[22] aakaaso abhinaadittha, asanii ca phalii tadaa..
[22] soha.m nisinnako santo, tattha kaala"nkato aha.m..
[22] bhoge me uunataa natthi, bhisadaanassida.m phala.m..

[03] arahatte pana tena adhigate satthaa bhaddiyase.t.thi.m aamantesi -- ``tava putto ala"nkatapa.tiyatto dhamma.m su.nanto arahatte pati.t.thaasi, tenassa idaaneva pabbajitu.m yutta.m, no ce pabbajati, parinibbaayissatii''ti. se.t.thi ``na mayha.m puttassa daharasseva sato parinibbaanena kicca.m atthi, pabbaajetha na''nti aaha. ta.m satthaa pabbaajetvaa upasampaadetvaa tattha sattaaha.m vasitvaa ko.tigaama.m paapu.ni, so ca gaamo ga"ngaatiire. ko.tigaamavaasino buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa mahaadaana.m pavattesu.m. bhaddajitthero satthaaraa anumodanaaya aaraddhamattaaya bahigaama.m gantvaa ^a^V1.0312^ea^ ``ga"ngaatiire maggasamiipe satthu aagatakaale vu.t.thahissaamii''ti samaapatti.m samaapajjitvaa nisiidi. mahaatheresu aagacchantesupi avu.t.thahitvaa satthu aagatakaaleyeva vu.t.thahi. puthujjanabhikkhuu, ``aya.m adhunaa pabbajito mahaatheresu aagacchantesu maanatthaddho hutvaa na vu.t.thaasii''ti ujjhaayi.msu. ko.tigaamavaasino satthu bhikkhusa"nghassa ca bahuu naavaasa"nghaa.te bandhi.msu, satthaa ``handassa aanubhaava.m pakaasemii''ti naavaasa"nghaa.te .thatvaa, ``kaha.m, bhaddajii''ti pucchi. bhaddajitthero ``esoha.m, bhante''ti satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa a~njali.m katvaa a.t.thaasi. satthaa, ``ehi, bhaddaji, amhehi saddhi.m ekanaava.m abhiruhaa''ti. so uppatitvaa satthu .thitanaavaaya.m a.t.thaasi. satthaa ga"ngaamajjha.m gatakaale, ``bhaddaji, tayaa mahaapanaadaraajakaale ajjhaavu.t.tharatanapaasaado kaha''nti aaha. ``imasmi.m .thaane nimuggo''ti. ``tena hi, bhaddaji, sabrahmacaariina.m ka"nkha.m chindaa''ti. tasmi.m kha.ne thero ^a^M1.0366^ea^ satthaara.m vanditvaa iddhibalena gantvaa paasaadathuupika.m paada"ngulantarena sannirumbhitvaa pa~ncaviisatiyojana.m paasaada.m ^a^P2.0040^ea^ gahetvaa aakaase uppati, uppatanto ca pa~n~naasa yojanaani paasaada.m udakato ukkhipi. athassa purimabhave ~naatakaa paasaadagatena lobhena macchakacchapama.n.duukaa hutvaa tasmi.m paasaade u.t.thahante parivattitvaa udake pati.msu. satthaa te patante disvaa ``~naatakaa te, bhaddaji, kilamantii''ti aaha. thero satthu vacanena paasaada.m vissajjesi. paasaado yathaa.thaane eva pati.t.thahi. satthaa paara"ngato bhikkhuuhi ``kadaa, bhante, bhaddajittherena aya.m paasaado ajjhaavu.t.tho''ti pu.t.tho ^b^mahaapanaadajaataka.m^eb^ (jaa0 1.3.40-41) kathetvaa mahaajana.m dhammaamata.m paayesi. thero pana attano ajjhaavu.t.thapubba.m suva.n.napaasaada.m dassetvaa --
[21] ``panaado naama so raajaa, yassa yuupo suva.n.nayo.
[22] anaccu.m tattha gandhabbaa, cha sahassaani sattadhaa''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^panaado naama so raajaa^eb^ti atiite panaado naama so raajaa ahosiiti attabhaavaantarahitataaya attaana.m para.m viya niddisati. so eva hi rajje .thitakaalato pa.t.thaaya sadaa ussaahasampattiaadinaa mahataa raajaanubhaavena mahataa ca kittisaddena samannaagatattaa ``raajaa mahaapanaado''ti pa~n~naayittha. ^b^yassa yuupo suva.n.nayo^eb^ti yassa ra~n~no aya.m yuupo paasaado suva.n.namayo. ^b^tiriya.m so.lasubbedho^eb^ti vitthaarato so.lasaka.n.dapaatappamaa.no. so pana a.d.dhayojanamatto ^a^V1.0313^ea^ hoti. ^b^ubbhaamaahu sahassadhaa^eb^ti ubbha.m ucca.m evamassa paasaadassa sahassadhaa sahassaka.n.dappamaa.namaahu. so pana ^a^M1.0367^ea^ yojanato pa~ncaviisatiyojanappamaa.no hoti. keci panettha gaathaasukhattha.m ``aahuu''ti diigha.m kata.m. aahu ahosiiti attha.m vadanti.

[03] ^b^sahassaka.n.do^eb^ti sahassabhuumiko. ^b^satage.n.duu^eb^ti anekasataniyyuuhako. ^b^dhajaaluu^eb^ti tattha tattha niyyuuhasikharaadiisu pati.t.thaapitehi ya.t.thidhajapa.taakadhajaadidhajehi sampanno. ^b^haritaamayo^eb^ti caamiikarasuva.n.namayo. keci pana ``haritajaatima.nisarikkhako''ti vadanti ^a^P2.0041^ea^. ^b^gandhabbaa^eb^ti na.taa. ^b^cha sahassaani sattadhaa^eb^ti chamattaani gandhabbasahassaani sattadhaa tassa paasaadassa sattasu .thaanesu ra~n~no abhiramaapanattha.m nacci.msuuti attho. te eva.m naccantaapi raajaana.m haasetu.m naasakkhi.msu. atha sakko devaraajaa devana.te pesetvaa samajja.m kaaresi, tadaa raajaa hasiiti.

[03] ^b^satimaa pa~n~navaa^eb^ti aayasmato sobhitattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe nibbattitvaa vayappatto satthu dhammadesana.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m pubbenivaasa~naa.nalaabhiina.m bhikkhuuna.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa sayampi ta.m .thaanantara.m uddissa patthana.m katvaa pu~n~naani katvaa sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto sumedhassa bhagavato kaale braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto braahma.naana.m vijjaasippesu nipphatti.m gantvaa nekkhammaadhimutto gharaavaasa.m pahaaya taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa himavantassa samiipe ara~n~naayatane assama.m kaaretvaa vanamuulaphalaaphalena yaapento buddhuppaada.m sutvaa sabbattha ekarattivaaseneva bhaddavatiinagare satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa pasannamaanaso ``tuva.m satthaa ca ketu caa''tiaadiihi chahi gaathaahi abhitthavi ^a^M1.0368^ea^, satthaa cassa bhaavini.m sampatti.m pakaasesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m braahma.nakule nibbatti. ^b^sobhito^eb^tissa naama.m aka.msu. so aparena samayena satthu dhammadesana.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. pubbenivaasa~naa.ne ci.n.navasii ca ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.49.46-74) --
[21] ``naaha.m su.nomi sambuddha.m, napi me koci sa.msati.
[22] uddharanto bahuu satte, deseti amata.m pada.m..
[21] ``tuva.m satthaa ca ketu ca, dhajo yuupo ca paa.nina.m.
[22] paraayano pati.t.thaa ca, diipo ca dvipaduttamo..
[22] na tveva tava sabba~n~nu, ~naa.na.m sakkaa pametave..
[22] natveva tava sabba~n~nu, siila.m sakkaa pametave..
[22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
[22] bhoge me uunataa natthi, phala.m ~naa.nassa thomane..

[03] so arahatta.m pana patvaa attano pubbenivaasa.m anupa.tipaa.tiyaa anussaranto yaava asa~n~nabhave acittakapa.tisandhi, taava addasa. tato pa~nca kappasataani cittappavatti.m adisvaa avasaaneva disvaa ``kimeta''nti ^a^P2.0042^ea^ aavajjento nayavasena ``asa~n~nabhavo bhavissatii''ti ni.t.tha.m agamaasi. tenaaha bhagavaa -- ``atthi, bhikkhave, asa~n~nasattaa naama diighaayukaa devaa, tato cuto sobhito idhuupapanno, so eta.m bhava.m jaanaati, sobhito anussaratii''ti (paaraa0 232 atthato samaana.m). eva.m nayavasena anussarantassa anussara.nakosalla.m disvaa satthaa thera.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarantaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesi. tato eva caaya.m aayasmaa savisesa.m attano pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.na.m ^a^V1.0316^ea^ tassa ca paccayabhuuta.m pa.tipatti.m paccavekkhitvaa somanassajaato tadatthadiipana.m udaana.m udaanento --
[22] pa~nca kappasataanaaha.m, ekaratti.m anussari''nti.. -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^satimaa^eb^ti saya.m samudaagamanasampannaaya satipa.t.thaanabhaavanaapaaripuuriyaa sativepullappattiyaa ca satimaa. ^b^pa~n~navaa^eb^ti cha.labhi~n~naapaaripuuriyaa pa~n~naavepullappattiyaa ca pa~n~navaa. bhinnakilesataaya ^b^bhikkhu^eb^. saddhaadibalaana~nceva ^a^M1.0371^ea^ catubbidhasammappadhaanaviiriyassa ca sa.msiddhipaaripuuriyaa ^b^aaraddhabalaviiriyo^eb^. saddhaadiina~nhettha balaggaha.nena gaha.na.m satipi satiaadiina.m balabhaave, yathaa ``gobalibaddhaa pu~n~na~naa.nasambhaaraa''ti. ^b^pa~nca kappasataanaaha.m, ekaratti.m anussari^eb^nti ekaratti.m viya anussari.m. viya-saddo hi idha luttaniddi.t.tho, etena pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.ne attano ~naa.navasiibhaava.m diipeti.

[03] idaani yaaya pa.tipattiyaa attano satimantaadibhaavo saatisaya.m pubbenivaasa~naa.na~nca siddha.m, ta.m dassetu.m ^b^``cattaaro''^eb^tiaadinaa dutiya.m gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^cattaaro satipa.t.thaane^eb^ti kaayaanupassanaadike attano visayabhedena catubbidhe lokiyalokuttaramissake satisa"nkhaate satipa.t.thaane. ^b^sattaa^eb^ti satta bojjha"nge. ^b^a.t.thaa^eb^ti a.t.tha magga"ngaani. satipa.t.thaanesu hi suppati.t.thitacittassa satta bojjha"ngaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gataa eva honti, tathaa ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo. tenaaha dhammasenaapati -- ``catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu suppati.t.thitacittaa satta bojjha"nge yathaabhuuta.m bhaavetvaa''tiaadiihi (dii0 ni0 3.143) sattako.t.thaasikesu sattati.msaaya ^a^P2.0043^ea^ bodhipakkhiyadhammesu ekasmi.m ko.t.thaase bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchante itare agacchantaa naama natthiiti. ^b^bhaavaya^eb^nti bhaavanaahetu. sesa.m vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^ya.m^eb^ ^a^V1.0317^ea^ ^b^kicca.m da.lhaviiriyenaa^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato valliyattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato kaale braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto vijjaasippesu nipphatti.m gato asiitiko.tivibhava.m pahaaya taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa pabbatapaade ara~n~naayatane ekissaa nadiyaa tiire assama.m kaaretvaa viharanto attano anugga.nhanattha.m upagata.m satthaara.m disvaa pasannamaanaso ajinacamma.m pattharitvaa adaasi ^a^M1.0372^ea^. tattha nisinna.m bhagavanta.m pupphehi ca candanena ca puujetvaa ambaphalaani datvaa pa~ncapati.t.thitena vandi. tassa bhagavaa nisinnaasanasampatti.m pakaasento anumodana.m vatvaa pakkaami. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade vesaaliya.m braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ``ka.nhamitto''ti laddhanaamo vayappatto satthu vesaaligamane buddhaanubhaava.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho mahaakaccaanattherassa santike pabbaji. so mandapa~n~no dandhaparakkamo ca hutvaa cira.m kaala.m vi~n~nu.m sabrahmacaari.m nissaayeva vasati. bhikkhuu ``yathaa naama valli rukkhaadiisu ki~nci anissaaya va.d.dhitu.m na sakkoti, evamayampi ka~nci pa.n.dita.m anissaaya va.d.dhitu.m na sakkotii''ti ^b^valliyo^eb^tveva samudaacari.msu. aparabhaage pana ve.nudattatthera.m upasa"nkamitvaa tassa ovaade .thatvaa sato sampajaano hutvaa viharanto ~naa.nassa paripaaka.m gatattaa pa.tipattikkama.m thera.m pucchanto --
[22] aha.m monena monissa.m, ga"ngaasotova saagara''nti.. -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^a^P2.0044^ea^ ^b^ya.m kicca.m da.lhaviiriyenaa^eb^ti da.lhena viiriyena thirena parakkamena, da.lhaviiriyena vaa purisadhorayhena ya.m kicca.m kaatabba.m pa.tipajjitabba.m. ^b^ya.m kicca.m boddhumicchataa^eb^ti cattaari ariyasaccaani nibbaanameva vaa boddhu.m bujjhitu.m icchantena pa.tivijjhitukaamena ya.m kicca.m kara.niiya.m. ^b^karissa.m naavarajjhissa^eb^nti tamaha.m daani karissa.m na viraadhessa.m, yathaanusi.t.tha.m pa.tipajjissaami. ^b^passa viiriya.m parakkama^eb^nti yathaa pa.tipajjamaane dhamme vidhinaa iira.nato ^b^``viiriya.m'',^eb^ para.m para.m .thaana.m akkamanato ^b^``parakkamo''^eb^ti ca laddhanaama.m sammaavaayaama.m passa na saddhamevaati attano kattukaamata.m dasseti.

[03] ^b^tva~ncaa^eb^ti ^a^M1.0373^ea^ ^a^V1.0318^ea^ kamma.t.thaanadaayaka.m kalyaa.namitta.m aalapati. ^b^me^eb^ti mayha.m. ^b^maggamakkhaahii^eb^ti ariyamagga.m kathehi, lokuttaramaggasampaapaka.m catusaccakamma.t.thaana.m kathehiiti attho. ^b^a~njasa^eb^nti ujuka.m majjhimapa.tipadaabhaavena antadvayassa anupagamanato. amate nibbaane sampaapakabhaavena pati.t.thitattaa ^b^amatogadha.m. monenaa^eb^ti ~naa.nena maggapa~n~naaya. ^b^monissa^eb^nti jaanissa.m nibbaana.m pa.tivijjhissa.m paapu.nissa.m. ^b^ga"ngaasotova saagara^eb^nti yathaa ga"ngaaya soto saagara.m samudda.m avirajjhanto eka.msato ogaahati, eva.m ``aha.m kamma.t.thaana.m anuyu~njanto magga~naa.nena nibbaana.m adhigamissaami, tasmaa ta.m kamma.t.thaana.m me aacikkhathaa''ti thera.m kamma.t.thaana.m yaaci.

[03] ta.m sutvaa ve.nudattatthero tassa kamma.t.thaana.m adaasi. sopi kamma.t.thaana.m anuyu~njanto nacirasseva vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.49.75-105) --
[21] ``ko vaa tva.m kassa vaa putto, mahaabrahmaa idhaagato.
[22] virocesi disaa sabbaa, udaya.m suuriyo yathaa..
[22] ko vaa tva.m kassa vaa putto, katha.m jaanemu ta.m maya.m..
[22] namhi devaa na gandhabbo, namhi sakko purindado..
[21] ``brahmabhaavo ca me natthi, etesa.m uttamo aha.m.
[22] mama kamma.m pakittesi, haasayanto mama.m tadaa..
[22] bhoge me uunataa natthi, yamhi gabbhe vasaamaha.m..
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa a~n~na.m byaakaronto thero imaayeva gaathaa abhaasiiti.

[03] ^b^kese me olikhissantii^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato viitasokattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kaale braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa braahma.naana.m ^a^P2.0045^ea^ vijjaasippesu nipphatti.m gato kaame pahaaya ^a^M1.0376^ea^ isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa mahataa isiga.nena parivuto ara~n~ne vasanto buddhuppaada.m sutvaa ha.t.thatu.t.tho ``udumbarapupphasadisaa dullabhadassanaa buddhaa bhagavanto, idaaneva upagantabbaa''ti mahatiyaa parisaaya saddhi.m satthaara.m da.t.thu.m gacchanto diya.d.dhayojane sese byaadhiko hutvaa buddhagataaya sa~n~naaya kaala"nkato devesu uppajjitvaa aparaapara.m devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade a.t.thaarasavassaadhikaana.m dvinna.m vassasataana.m matthake dhammaasokara~n~no kani.t.thabhaataa hutvaa nibbatti, tassa ^b^viitasoko^eb^ti naama ahosi. so vayappatto khattiyakumaarehi sikkhitabbavijjaasippesu nipphatti.m gato giridattatthera.m nissaaya gihibhuuto suttantapi.take abhidhammapi.take ca visaarado hutvaa ekadivasa.m massukammasamaye kappakassa hatthato aadaasa.m gahetvaa kaaya.m olokento valitapalitaadiini disvaa sa~njaatasa.mvego vipassanaaya citta.m otaaretvaa bhaavana.m ussukkaapetvaa tasmi.myeva aasane sotaapanno hutvaa giridattattherassa santike pabbajitvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.49.9-26) --
[21] ``mama a~n~nataro sisso, sissaana.m so kathesi me.
[22] sutvaana te etamattha.m, aarocesu.m mama.m tadaa..
[22] tassaanuvattati jano, laabho amha.m na vijjati..
[21] ``buddho loke samuppanno, cakkhu.m lacchaama no bhava.m.
[22] sabbe co.laa samucchinnaa, natthi daani punabbhavo''ti.. -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^a^M1.0378^ea^ ^b^kese me olikhissanti, kappako upasa"nkamii^eb^ti gihikaale massukammasamaye ``mama kese olikhissa.m kappemii''ti kesaadiina.m chedanaadivasena kappanato kappako nhaapito ma.m upagacchi. ^b^tato^eb^ti kappakato. ^b^sariira.m paccavekkhisa^eb^nti sabbakaayike aadaase palitavalitamukhanimittaadidassanamukhena ``abhibhuuto vata jaraaya me kaayo''ti jaraabhibhuuta.m attano sariira.m paccavekkhi.m. eva.m paccavekkhato ca ^b^tuccho kaayo adissittha^eb^ niccadhuvasukhasabhaavaadiihi ritto hutvaa me kaayo adissatha pa~n~naayi. kasmaa? ^b^andhakaare tamo byagaa^eb^ yena ayonisomanasikaarasa"nkhaatena ^a^P2.0046^ea^ tamasaa attano kaaye andhagataa vijjamaanampi asubhaadisabhaava.m apassantaa avijjamaana.m subhaadiaakaara.m ga.nhanti, tasmi.m andhakaare andhakara.na.t.thaane kaaye yonisomanasikaarasa"nkhaatena ~naa.naalokena avijjaatamo vigato, tato eva ^b^sabbe co.laa samucchinnaa^eb^ coraa viya kusalabha.n.dacchedanato, saadhuuhi alaatabbato asa"ngahetabbato sa"nkaarakuu.taadiisu cha.d.ditapilotikakha.n.da.m viya issarajanena ariyajanena jigucchitabbataaya co.laa viyaati vaa ``co.laa''ti laddhanaamaa kilesaa samucchinnaa. aggamaggena samugghaa.titattaa eva ca nesa.m ^b^natthi daani punabbhavo^eb^ aayati.m punabbhavaabhinibbatti natthiiti.

[03] ^b^pa~nca niivara.ne hitvaa^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato pu.n.namaasattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto tissassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthari ara~n~ne viharante pa.msukuulaciivara.m dumasaakhaaya laggetvaa gandhaku.ti.m pavi.t.the dhanuhattho gahana.m pavi.t.tho satthu pa.msukuula.m disvaa pasannamaanaso ^a^V1.0323^ea^ dhanu.m nikkhipitvaa buddhagu.ne anussaritvaa ^a^M1.0379^ea^ pa.msukuula.m vandi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m ku.tumbiyakule nibbatti. tassa kira jaatadivase tasmi.m gehe sabbabhaajanaani suva.n.naratanamayehi maasehi paripu.n.naaneva ahesu.m. tenassa ^b^pu.n.namaaso^eb^tveva naama.m aka.msu. so vayappatto daarapariggaha.m katvaa ekasmi.m putte uppanne gharaavaasa.m pahaaya pabbajitvaa gaamakaavaase vasanto gha.tento vaayamanto cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.49.1-8) --
[22] caapa.m tattheva nikkhippa, sire katvaana a~njali.m..

[03] cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa saavatthi.m upagantvaa satthaara.m vanditvaa susaane vasati, tassa ca aciraagatasseva sato putto kaalamakaasi. daarakamaataa therassa aagatabhaava.m sutvaa, ``maa ida.m aputtaka.m saapateyya.m raajaano hareyyu''nti ta.m uppabbaajetukaamaa mahataa parivaarena ^a^P2.0047^ea^ therassa santika.m gantvaa pa.tisanthaara.m katvaa palobhetu.m aarabhi. thero attano viitaraagabhaavajaanaapanattha.m aakaase .thatvaa attano pa.tipattikittanamukhena tassaa dhamma.m desento --
[22] ajjhatta~nca bahiddhaa ca, tuccho kaayo adissathaa''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^a^V1.0324^ea^ ^b^pa~nca niivara.ne hitvaa^eb^ti kaamacchandaadike pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya jhaanaadhigamena viddha.msetvaa. ^b^yogakkhemassa pattiyaa^eb^ti kaamayogaadiihi catuuhi yogehi khemassa anupaddutassa nibbaanassa adhigamaaya. ^b^dhammaadaasa^eb^nti dhammabhuuta.m aadaasa.m. yathaa hi aadaaso olokentassa ruupakaaye gu.naagu.na.m aada.mseti, eva.m vipassanaasa"nkhaato dhammaana.m saama~n~navisesaavabodhanato ~naa.nadassanabhuuto dhammaadaaso vipassantassa vodaanasa.mkilesadhammavibhaavanena tappahaanasaadhanena ca visesato naamakaaye gu.na.m aada.mseti. tenaaha --

[03] ima.m kaaya.m dhammasamuuha.m mama attabhaava.m ajjhattikabaahiraayatanabhaavato santarabaahira.m sabba.m anavasesa.m dhammaadaasa.m gahetvaa ``anicca''ntipi ``dukkha''ntipi ``anattaa''tipi patiavekkhi.m ~naa.nacakkhunaa passi.m. eva.m passataa ca mayaa ^b^ajjhatta~nca bahiddhaa caa^eb^ti attano santaane parasantaane ca ^b^tuccho kaayo adissatha^eb^ niccasaaraadivirahito tuccho khandhapa~ncakasa"nkhaato attabhaavakaayo ~naa.nacakkhunaa yaathaavato apassittha. sakalampi hi khandhapa~ncaka.m ``avijjaanivutassa, bhikkhave, baalassa ta.nhaasa.myuttassa evamaya.m kaayo samudaagato''tiaadiisu (sa.m0 ni0 2.19) ``kaayo''ti vuccati. ``adissathaa''ti ca iminaa yadeva kaaye da.t.thabba.m, ta.m di.t.tha.m, na daanissa ki~nci mayaa passitabba.m atthiiti katakiccata.m dassento a~n~na.m byaakaasi. eva.m thero imaahi gaathaahi puraa.nadutiyikaaya dhamma.m desetvaa ta.m sara.nesu ca siilesu ca sampati.t.thaapetvaa uyyojesi.

[03] ^b^yathaapi^eb^ ^a^M1.0381^ea^ ^b^bhaddo aaja~n~no^eb^ti aayasmato nandakattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani karonto sikhissa bhagavato kaale paccantadese uppajjitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ^a^P2.0048^ea^ vanacaariko hutvaa vicaranto ekadivasa.m satthu ca"nkamana.t.thaana.m disvaa pasannacitto vaalukaa okiri. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade campaaya.m gahapatikule nibbatti, tassa ^b^nandako^eb^ti naama.m aka.msu. je.t.thakabhaataa panassa bharato naama. tassa pubbayogo anantaravatthusmi.m aavibhavissati. te ubhopi ^a^V1.0325^ea^ vi~n~nuta.m patvaa aayasmanta.m so.na.m ko.livisa.m pabbajita.m sutvaa ``so.nopi naama tathaasukhumaalo pabbaji, kima"nga.m pana maya''nti pabbaji.msu. tesu bharato nacirasseva vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. nandako pana kilesaana.m balavabhaavena taava vipassana.m ussukkaapetu.m naasakkhi, vipassanaaya kamma.m karoti eva. athassa bharatatthero aasaya.m ~natvaa avassayo bhavitukaamo ta.m pacchaasama.na.m katvaa vihaarato nikkhamitvaa maggasamiipe nisinno vipassanaakatha.m kathesi.

[03] tena ca samayena saka.tasatthe gacchante eko saka.te yutto go.no cikkhalla.t.thaane saka.ta.m uddharitu.m asakkonto paripati. tato na.m satthavaaho saka.taa mocetvaa ti.na~nca paaniiya~nca datvaa parissama.m apanetvaa puna dhure yojesi. tato go.no vuupasantaparissamo laddhabalo ta.m saka.ta.m cikkhalla.t.thaanato uddharitvaa thale pati.t.thaapesi. atha bharatatthero nandakassa ``passasi no tva.m, aavuso nandaka, imassa kamma''nti ta.m nidassetvaa tena ``passaamii''ti vutte ``imamattha.m su.t.thu upadhaarehii''ti aaha. itaro ``yathaaya.m go.no vuupasantaparissamo pa"nka.t.thaanato bhaara.m ubbahati, eva.m mayaapi sa.msaarapa"nkato attaa uddharitabbo''ti tamevaaramma.na.m katvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.48.90-95) --
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa attano je.t.thabhaatikassa bharatattherassa santike a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
[22] bhiyyo laddhaana sa.mvega.m, adiino vahate dhura.m..
[22] aajaaniiya.m ma.m dhaaretha, putta.m buddhassa orasa''nti.. -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^a^V1.0326^ea^ ^a^P2.0049^ea^ ^b^bhiyyo laddhaana sa.mvega.m, adiino vahate dhura^eb^nti ``mayha.m jaatibalaviiriyaana.m ananucchavikameta.m yadida.m aagatassa bhaarassa avahana''nti sa.mvega.m labhitvaa adiino adiinamaanaso aliinacitto. ``aliino''ti vaa paa.tho, so eva attho. bhiyyo punappuna.m bhiyyosomattaaya attano dhura.m bhaara.m vahate ubbahati. sesa.m he.t.thaa rama.niiyavihaarittherassa gaathaava.n.nanaaya.m vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^ehi^eb^ ^a^M1.0383^ea^, ^b^nandaka, gacchaamaa^eb^ti aayasmato bharatattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira anomadassissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m manu~n~nadassana.m mudusukhasamphassa.m upaahanadvaya.m gahetvaa gacchanto satthaara.m ca"nkamanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso upaahanaa upanaametvaa, ``abhiruhatu bhagavaa upaahanaa, ya.m mama assa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti aaha. abhiruhi bhagavaa tassa anugga.nhanattha.m upaahanaa. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade campaanagare gahapatikule nibbatti, ^b^bharato^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vi~n~nuta.m patto so.nattherassa pabbajitabhaava.m sutvaa ``sopi naama pabbajii''ti sa~njaatasa.mvego pabbajitvaa katapubbakicco vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.48.71-89) --
[22] ito phala.m labhissaami, so me attho samijjhatu..
[21] ``yo ^a^V1.0327^ea^ paanadhi.m me adaasi, pasanno sehi paa.nibhi.
[22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
[22] datvaana paanadhi.m eka.m, pattomhi acala.m pada.m..

[03] cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa attano kani.t.thabhaatikena nandakattherena he.t.thaa vuttanayena a~n~naabyaakara.ne kate ``idaani nandakopi arahaa jaato, handa maya.m ubhopi satthu santika.m gantvaa vusitabrahmacariyata.m nivedessaamaati uppanna.m parivitakka.m nandakattherassa kathento --
[22] so no attho anuppatto, sabbasa.myojanakkhayo''ti.. -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^a^V1.0328^ea^ ^a^P2.0050^ea^ ^b^nandakaa^eb^ti aalapana.m. ^b^ehii^eb^ti tassa attano santikakara.na.m. ^b^gacchaamaa^eb^ti tena attanaa ca ekajjha.m kaatabbakiriyaavacana.m, ^b^upajjhaayassaa^eb^ti sammaasambuddhassa, sammaasambuddho hi samantacakkhunaa buddhacakkhunaa ca sattaana.m aasayaanusayacaritaadiina.m yathaabhuutavilokanena sadevakassa lokassa vajjaavajja.m upanijjhaayatiiti visesato upajjhaayoti vattabbata.m arahati. yadattha.m gamana.m, ta.m dassetu.m ^b^``siihanaada.m nadissaama, buddhase.t.thassa sammukhaa''^eb^ti aaha. yathaabhuccagu.naabhibyaahaarataaya abhiitanaadabhaavato siihanaada.m buddhassa sammaasambuddhassa tato eva sabbasattuttamataaya se.t.thassa, buddhaana.m vaa saavakabuddhaadiina.m se.t.thassa sammukhaa purato nadissaamaati attho.

[03] yathaa pana siihanaada.m naditukaamo, ta.m dassento ^b^``yaayaa''^eb^ti gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^yaayaa^eb^ti yadattha.m, yaaya yadatthaanuppattiyaati attho. ^b^no^eb^ti amhaaka.m. ^b^anukampaayaa^eb^ti anugga.nhanena amhe dvepi ^b^pabbaajayi^eb^ pabbaajesi. ^b^munii^eb^ti bhagavaa. ^b^so no attho anuppatto^eb^ti so attho sabbesa.m sa.myojanaana.m khayabhuuta.m arahattaphala.m no amhehi anuppatto, adhigatoti attho.

[03] ^b^nadanti eva.m sappa~n~naa^eb^ti aayasmato bhaaradvaajattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto ito ekati.mse kappe kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m sumana.m naama paccekabuddha.m pi.n.daaya caranta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso ^a^M1.0386^ea^ paripakka.m vallikaaraphala.m adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa gottanaamena ^b^bhaaradvaajo^eb^tveva pa~n~naayittha. so vayappatto gharaavaasa.m vasanto ekaputta.m labhi. tassa ``ka.nhadinno''ti naama.m akaasi. tassa vi~n~nuta.m pattakaale ``taata, asukassa naama aacariyassa santike sippa.m sikkhitvaa ehii''ti ta.m takkasila.m pesesi. so gacchanto antaraamagge satthu saavaka.m a~n~natara.m mahaathera.m kalyaa.namitta.m labhitvaa tassa santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa katapubbakicco vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.48.66-70) --
[21] ``ekati.mse ito kappe, ya.m phala.m adadi.m tadaa.

[03] athassa ^a^P2.0051^ea^ pitaa bhaaradvaajo ve.luvane viharanta.m bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa dhamma.m sutvaa pabbajitvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m sacchaakaasi. atha putto satthaara.m vanditu.m raajagaha.m aagato satthu santike nisinna.m pitara.m disvaa tu.t.thacitto ``pitaapi kho me pabbajito, ki.m nu kho tena pabbajjaakicca.m matthaka.m paapita''nti viima.msanto khii.naasavabhaava.m ~natvaa ta.m siihanaada.m nadaapetukaamo, ``saadhu, kho tumhehi kata.m pabbajantehi, pabbajjaakicca.m pana matthaka.m paapita''nti pucchi. bhaaradvaajo puttassa adhigama.m diipento --
[21] ``satthaa ca parici.n.no me, dhammo sa"ngho ca puujito.
[22] aha~nca vitto sumano, putta.m disvaa anaasava''nti.. -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^a^M1.0387^ea^ ^b^nadantii^eb^ti yathaabhuccagu.naabhibyaahaaravasena abhiitanaada.m nadanti gajjanti. ^b^eva^eb^nti idaani vattabbaakaaradassana.m. ^b^sappa~n~naa^eb^ti aggamaggapa~n~naadhigamena sabbapa~n~naadhigamena sabbapa~n~naavepullappattaa. ^b^viiraa^eb^ti catubbidhasammappadhaanaviiriyasampannataaya viiraa, tato eva anavasesasa.mkilesapakkhanimmathanena ^b^savaahana.m^eb^ kilesa^b^maara.m^eb^ abhisa"nkhaara^b^maara.m^eb^ devaputta^b^maara~nca jetvaa^eb^ sabbaso ^b^vijitasa"ngaamaa^eb^ nadanti sappa~n~naati sambandho.

[03] eva.m vijetabbavijayena siihanaada.m dassetvaa idaani aaraadhetabbasamaaraadhanena icchitabbasiddhiyaa ca ta.m dassetu.m, ^b^``satthaa ca parici.n.no me''^eb^ti dutiya.m gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^satthaa ca parici.n.no me^eb^ti mama satthaa sammaasambuddho yathaanusi.t.tha.m ovaadaanusaasaniikara.nena mayaa parici.n.no upaasito, na dhammaadhikara.na.m visositoti adhippaayo. ^b^dhammo sa"ngho ca puujito^eb^ti navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo, yathaapa.tipattiyaagatamaggaanuppattiyaa siiladi.t.thisaama~n~nagamanena ariyasa"ngho ca mayaa puujito maanito. ^b^aha~nca vitto sumano, putta.m disvaa anaasava^eb^nti mama putta.m ^a^V1.0330^ea^ anaasava.m sabbaso khii.naasava.m disvaa dassanahetu ahampi vitto niraamisaaya piitiyaa tu.t.tho, tatoyeva niraamisena somanassena sumano jaatoti attho.

[03] ^b^upaasitaa^eb^ ^a^P2.0052^ea^ ^b^sappurisaa^eb^ti aayasmato ka.nhadinnattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto ito catunavute kappe kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m sobhita.m naama paccekabuddha.m disvaa pasannacitto punnaagapupphehi puuja.m akaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^ka.nhadinno^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto upanissayasampattiyaa codiyamaano dhammasenaapati.m upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^M1.0388^ea^ dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.48.61-65) --
[21] ``bhavaraagahatassa me sato, bhavaraago puna me na vijjati.
[22] na caahu na ca me bhavissati, na ca me etarahi vijjatii''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^upaasitaa^eb^ti paricaritaa pa.tipattipayirupaasanaaya payirupaasitaa. ^b^sappurisaa^eb^ti santehi ^a^V1.0331^ea^ siilaadigu.nehi samannaagataa purisaa, ariyapuggalaa saariputtattheraadayo. etena purimacakkadvayasampattimattano dasseti. na hi patiruupadesavaasena vinaa sappurisuupanissayo sambhavati. ^b^sutaa dhammaa^eb^ti saccapa.ticcasamuppaadaadipa.tisa.myuttadhammaa sotadvaaraanusaarena upadhaaritaa. etena attano baahusacca.m dassento pacchimacakkadvayasampatti.m dasseti. ^b^abhi.nhaso^eb^ti bahuso na kaalena kaala.m. ida~nca pada.m ``upaasitaa sappurisaa''ti etthaapi yojetabba.m. ^b^sutvaana pa.tipajjissa.m, a~njasa.m amatogadha^eb^nti te dhamme sutvaa tattha vuttaruupaaruupadhamme salakkha.naadito pariggahetvaa anukkamena vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa amatogadha.m nibbaanapati.t.tha.m ta.msampaapaka.m a~njasa.m ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m pa.tipajji.m paapu.ni.m.

[03] ^b^bhavaraagahatassa^eb^ ^a^M1.0389^ea^ ^b^me sato^eb^ti bhavaraagena bhavata.nhaaya anaadimati ^a^P2.0053^ea^ sa.msaare hatassa upaddutassa mama sato samaanassa, aggamaggena vaa hatabhavaraagassa. ^b^bhavaraago puna me na vijjatii^eb^ti tato eva puna idaani bhavaraago me natthi. ^b^na caahu na me bhavissati, na ca me etarahi vijjatii^eb^ti yadipi pubbe puthujjanakaale sekkhakaale ca me bhavaraago ahosi, aggamaggappattito pana pa.t.thaaya na caahu na ca ahosi, aayatimpi na me bhavissati, etarahi adhunaapi na ca me vijjati na ca upalabbhati, pahiinoti attho. bhavaraagavacaneneva cettha tadeka.t.thataaya maanaadiinampi abhaavo vuttoti sabbaso parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojanata.m dasseti.

[01] ^b^yato^eb^ ^a^V1.0332^ea^ ^b^aha.m pabbajito^eb^ti aayasmato migasirattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto kassapassa bhagavato kaale braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m disvaa pasannacitto kusa.t.thaka.m adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kosalara.t.the braahma.nakule pa.tisandhi.m gahetvaa migasiranakkhattena jaatattaa ^b^migasiro^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto braahma.naana.m vijjaasippesu nipphatti.m gato chavasiisamanta.m naama sikkhi, ya.m parijappetvaa tivassamatthake mataanampi siisa.m nakhena aako.tetvaa ``aya.m satto asuka.t.thaane nibbatto''ti jaanaati.

[03] so gharaavaasa.m anicchanto paribbaajakapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa ta.m vijja.m nissaaya lokena sakkato garukato laabhii hutvaa vicaranto saavatthi.m upagato ^a^M1.0390^ea^ satthu santika.m gantvaa attano aanubhaava.m pakaasento -- ``aha.m, bho gotama, mataana.m nibbatta.t.thaana.m jaanaamii''ti vatvaa, ``katha.m pana tva.m jaanaasii''ti vutte, ``chavasiisaani aaharaapetvaa manta.m parijappetvaa nakhena siisa.m aako.tento nirayaadika.m tehi tehi nibbatta.t.thaana.m jaanaamii''ti kathesi. athassa bhagavaa parinibbutassa bhikkhuno siisakapaala.m aaharaapetvaa, ``kathehi taava tassa gati.m, yassida.m siisakapaala''nti aaha. so ta.m kapaala.m manta.m parijappetvaa nakhena aako.tetvaa neva anta.m na ko.ti.m passati. atha satthaaraa, ``na sakkosi paribbaajakaa''ti vutte ^a^P2.0054^ea^, ``upaparikkhissaami taavaa''ti vatvaa punappuna.m parivattentopi na passateva. baahirakamantena hi khii.naasavassa gati.m katha.m jaanissati, athassa matthakato kacchehi ca sedo mucci. so lajjitvaa tu.nhiibhuuto a.t.thaasi. satthaa ``kilamasi paribbaajakaa''ti aaha. so ``aama, kilamaami, na imassa gati.m jaanaami, tumhe pana jaanaathaa''ti. ``aha.m eta.m jaanaami, ito uttaritarampi jaanaamii''ti vatvaa ``nibbaana.m gato so''ti aaha. paribbaajako ``ima.m vijja.m mayha.m dethaa''ti aaha. ``tena hi pabbajaa''ti vatvaa ta.m pabbaajetvaa pa.thama.m samathakamma.t.thaane niyojetvaa ^a^V1.0333^ea^ jhaanaabhi~n~naasu pati.t.thitassa vipassanaaya kamma.m upadisi. so vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.48.56-60) --
[22] akuppaa me vimuttiiti, sabbasa.myojanakkhayaa''ti.. -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^yato aha.m pabbajito, sammaasambuddhasaasane^eb^ti yato pabhuti aha.m pabbajito buddhassa bhagavato saasane, pabbajitakaalato pa.t.thaaya. ^b^vimuccamaano uggacchi^eb^nti sa.mkilesapakkhato pa.thama.m taava samathavipassanaahi vimuccamaano vodaanadhammasavanena u.t.thahi.m. eva.m uggacchanto ^b^kaamadhaatu.m upaccaga.m^eb^ anaagaamimaggena accantameva kaamadhaatu.m atikkami.m.

[03] ^b^brahmuno pekkhamaanassa, tato citta.m vimucci me^eb^ti sadevakassa lokassa aggabhuutattaa se.t.tha.t.thena brahmuno buddhassa bhagavato mahaakaru.naayogena ``aya.m kulaputto mama saasane pabbajitvaa katha.m nu kho pa.tipajjatii''ti pekkhantassa tato anaagaamimaggaadhigamato pacchaa aggamaggaadhigamena mama citta.m sabbasa.mkilesato accantameva mucci. ^b^akuppaa^eb^ ^a^P2.0055^ea^ ^b^me vimuttiiti, sabbasa.myojanakkhayaa^eb^ti tathaavimuttacittattaa eva sabbesa.m sa.myojanaana.m khayaa parikkhayaa iti eva.m akuppaa me vimuttiiti a~n~na.m byaakaasi.

[01] ^b^aniccaani^eb^ ^a^V1.0334^ea^ ^b^gahakaanii^eb^ti aayasmato sivakattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m bhagavanta.m pi.n.daaya caranta.m passitvaa pasannamaanaso patta.m aadaaya kummaasassa puuretvaa adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe braahma.nakule nibbatti, ^b^sivako^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vayappatto vijjaasippesu nipphatti.m ^a^M1.0392^ea^ gato nekkhammajjhaasayataaya kaame pahaaya paribbaajakapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa vicaranto satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.56.117-121) --
[22] rittaka.m patta.m disvaana, kummaasa.m puurayi.m aha.m..
[27] sabbaa te phaasukaa bhaggaa, thuu.nikaa ca vidaalitaa.
[22] vimariyaadikata.m citta.m, idheva vidhamissatii''ti.. -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.

[01] tattha ^b^aniccaani gahakaani, tattha tattha punappuna^eb^nti tasmi.m tasmi.m bhave punappuna.m nibbattamaanaani gahakaani attabhaavagehaani na nibbaani anava.t.thitaani ittaraani parittakaalaani. ^b^gahakaara.m gavesanto^eb^ti imassa attabhaavagehassa kaaraka.m ta.nhaava.d.dhaki.m pariyesanto ettaka.m kaala.m anuvicarinti adhippaayo. ^b^dukkhaa jaati punappuna^eb^nti ida.m gahakaarakagavesanassa kaara.navacana.m ^a^P2.0056^ea^. yasmaa ^a^V1.0335^ea^ jaraabyaadhimara.namissataaya jaati naamesaa punappuna.m upagantu.m dukkhaa, na ca saa tasmi.m adi.t.the nivattati, tasmaa ta.m gavesanto vicarinti attho.

[03] ^b^gahakaaraka^eb^ ^a^M1.0393^ea^ ^b^di.t.thosii^eb^ti idaani pana yena so sakkaa da.t.thu.m, tena ariyamagga~naa.nacakkhunaa gahakaaraka di.t.tho asi. ^b^puna geha^eb^nti puna imasmi.m sa.msaarava.t.te attabhaavasa"nkhaata.m mama geha.m ^b^na kaahasi^eb^ na karissasi. ^b^sabbaa te phaasukaa bhaggaa^eb^ti tava sabbaa anavasesakilesaphaasukaa mayaa bhaggaa. ^b^thuu.nikaa ca vidaalitaa^eb^ti idaani tayaa kaatabbassa attabhaavagehassa avijjaasa"nkhaataa ka.n.nikaa ca bhinnaa. ^b^vimariyaadikata.m citta^eb^nti mama citta.m vigatanta.m kata.m, aayati.m anuppattidhammata.m aapaadita.m. tato eva ^b^idheva vidhamissati^eb^ imasmi.myeva bhave viddha.msissati, carimakacittanirodhena nirujjhissatiiti attho.

[03] ^b^araha.m sugato^eb^ti aayasmato upavaa.nattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale daliddakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto bhagavati parinibbute tassa dhaatu.m gahetvaa manussadevanaagagaru.lakumbha.n.dayakkhagandhabbehi sattaratanamaye sattayojanike thuupe kate tattha sudhota.m attano uttaraasa"nga.m ve.lagge aabandhitvaa dhaja.m katvaa puuja.m akaasi. ta.m gahetvaa abhisammatako naama yakkhasenaapati devehi cetiyapuujaarakkha.nattha.m .thapito adissamaanakaayo aakaase dhaarento cetiya.m tikkhattu.m padakkhi.na.m akaasi. so ta.m disvaa bhiyyosomattaaya pasannamaanaso ahosi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^upavaa.no^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto jetavanapa.tiggaha.ne buddhaanubhaava.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto arahatta.m patvaa cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.56.122-178) --
[22] manussaa ceva devaa ca, buddhathuupa.m aka.msu te..
[22] manussaa devanaagaa ca, buddhapuuja.m aka.msu te..
[21] ``sabba.m ma.nimaya.m thuupa.m, akaru.m te ca ka~ncuka.m.
[22] manussaa ceva devaa ca, naagaa ca garu.laa tathaa..
[22] maa no pamattaa assumha, appamattaa sadevakaa..
[22] manussaa devanaagaa ca, garu.laa ca kumbha.n.dakaa..
[22] maa no pamattaa assumha, appamattaa sadevakaa..
[22] manujaa devataa naagaa, kumbha.n.daa garu.laa tathaa..
[21] ``vediyo ^a^M1.0396^ea^ satta katvaana, dhaja.m chatta.m aka.msu te.
[21] ``tena kaalena ye keci, thuupa.m puujenti maanusaa.
[22] na te thuupa.m aaruhanti, ambare ukkhipanti te..
[22] dhaja.m vaa pupphadaama.m vaa, abhiropeti uttari.m..
[21] ``na te passanti ta.m yakkha.m, daama.m passanti gacchato.
[22] eva.m passitvaa gacchantaa, sabbe gacchanti suggati.m..
[21] ``viruddhaa ye paavacane, pasannaa ye ca saasane.
[22] aamodita.m jana.m disvaa, eva.m cintesaha.m tadaa..
[22] imaa ca janataa tu.t.thaa, kaara.m kubba.m na tappare..
[22] vaaterita.m dhaja.m disvaa, bhiyyo haasa.m janesaha.m..
[22] ta.m bhikkhu.m abhivaadetvaa, vipaaka.m pucchaha.m dhaje..
[22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
[21] ``satasahasse ^a^V1.0339^ea^ kata.m kamma.m, phala.m dassesi me idha.
[22] tii.ni yojanaani saamantaa, ussiiyanti dhajaa sadaa..

[01] athaayasmaa ^a^P2.0057^ea^ upavaa.no bhagavato upa.t.thaako ahosi. tena ca samayena bhagavato vaataabaadho uppajji. therassa ca gihisahaayo devahito naama braahma.no saavatthiya.m pa.tivasati. so thera.m catuuhi paccayehi pavedesi. athaayasmaa upavaa.no nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya tassa braahma.nassa nivesana.m upagacchi. braahma.no ``kenaci a~n~nena payojanena thero aagato''ti ~natvaa, ``vadeyyaatha, bhante, kenattho''ti aaha. thero tassa braahma.nassa payojana.m aacikkhanto --
[22] sace u.nhodaka.m atthi, munino dehi braahma.na..
[22] apacitopaceyyaana.m, tassa icchaami haatave''ti.. -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.

[03] tassattho -- yo imasmi.m ^b^loke puujaneyyaana.m^eb^ puujetabbehi sakkaadiihi devehi mahaabrahmaadiihi ca brahmehi ^b^puujito, sakkareyyaana.m^eb^ sakkaatabbehi bimbisaarakosalaraajaadiihi ^b^sakkato, apaceyyaana.m^eb^ apacaayitabbehi mahesiihi khii.naasavehi ^b^apacito,^eb^ kilesehi aarakattaadinaa ^b^araha.m,^eb^ sobhanagamanaadinaa ^b^sugato^eb^ sabba~n~nuu ^b^muni^eb^ mayha.m satthaa devadevo sakkaana.m atisakko brahmaana.m atibrahmaa, so daani ^b^vaatehi^eb^ vaatahetu vaatakkhobhanimitta.m ^b^aabaadhiko^eb^ jaato. ^b^sace, braahma.na, u.nhodaka.m atthi, tassa^eb^ vaataabaadhavuupasamanattha.m ta.m ^b^haatave^eb^ upanetu.m ^b^icchaamii^eb^ti. ta.m sutvaa braahma.no u.nhodaka.m tadanuruupa.m vaataaraha~nca ^a^M1.0399^ea^ bhesajja.m bhagavato upanaamesi. tena ca satthu rogo vuupasami. tassa bhagavaa anumodana.m akaasiiti.

[01] ^b^di.t.thaa^eb^ ^a^V1.0340^ea^ ^b^mayaa^eb^ti aayasmato isidinnattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani karonto vipassissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto biijani.m gahetvaa bodhiyaa puuja.m akaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade sunaaparantajanapade se.t.thikule nibbattitvaa ^b^isidinno^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto satthu candanamaa.lapa.tiggaha.ne paa.tihaariya.m disvaa pasannamaanaso satthaara.m ^a^P2.0058^ea^ upasa"nkamitvaa dhamma.m sutvaa sotaapanno hutvaa agaara.m ajjhaavasati. tassa hitaanukampinii devataa ta.m codentii --
[21] ``di.t.thaa mayaa dhammadharaa upaasakaa, kaamaa aniccaa iti bhaasamaanaa.
[22] saarattarattaa ma.niku.n.dalesu, puttesu daaresu ca te apekkhaa..
[21] ``addhaa na jaananti yatodha dhamma.m, kaamaa aniccaa iti caapi aahu.
[22] raaga~nca tesa.m na balatthi chettu.m, tasmaa sitaa puttadaara.m dhana~ncaa''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^di.t.thaa mayaa dhammadharaa upaasakaa, kaamaa aniccaa iti bhaasamaanaa^eb^ti idhekacce pariyattidhammadharaa upaasakaa mayaa di.t.thaa, pariyattidhammadharattaa ^a^M1.0400^ea^ eva ``kaamaa naamete aniccaa dukkhaa vipari.naamadhammaa''ti kaamesu aadiinavapa.tisa.myutta.m dhamma.m bhaasamaanaa, saya.m pana ^b^saarattarattaa ma.niku.n.dalesu, puttesu daaresu ca te apekkhaa^eb^ti saarattaa hutvaa bahalaraagarattaa ma.niisu ku.n.dalesu ca, ma.nicitesu vaa ku.n.dalesu, puttesu puttadhiitaasu daaresu ca adhigatasnehaa, a~n~na.m bha.nantaa a~n~na.m karontaa di.t.thaa mayaati attho.

[03] ^b^yato^eb^ti yasmaa te upaasakaa saarattarattaa ma.niku.n.dalesu puttesu daaresu ca apekkhavanto, tasmaa ^b^idha^eb^ imasmi.m buddhasaasane ^b^dhamma.m^eb^ yaathaavato ^b^addhaa^eb^ eka.msena ^b^na jaananti^eb^. eva.m bhuutaa ca ^b^``kaamaa aniccaa''iti caapi aahu^eb^ ahosi, sattapakati vicittasabhaavaati adhippaayo. ^b^raaga~nca tesa.m na balatthi chettu^eb^nti tesa.m upaasakaana.m yasmaa raaga.m chettu.m samucchinditu.m taadisa.m ~naa.nabala.m natthi, ^b^tasmaa^eb^ tena kaara.nena ^b^sitaa^eb^ ta.nhaavasena nissitaa ^b^puttadaara.m dhana~nca^eb^ alliinaa na vissajjentiiti sabbameta.m devataa ta.myeva upaasaka.m uddissa a~n~naapadesena kathesi. ta.m sutvaa upaasako sa.mvegajaato pabbajitvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.48.46-50) --
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa a~n~na.m byaakaronto imaa eva gaathaa abhaasiiti.

[03] ^b^devo^eb^ ^a^M1.0401^ea^ ^a^P2.0059^ea^ ^b^caa^eb^ti aayasmato sambulakaccaanattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani karonto ito catunavutikappamatthake kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satara.msi.m naama paccekabuddha.m nirodhaa vu.t.thahitvaa pi.n.daaya caranta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso taalaphala.m adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade magadhara.t.the gahapatikule nibbattitvaa ``sambulo''ti laddhanaamo kaccaanagottataaya ^b^sambulakaccaano^eb^ti pa~n~naayittha.

[03] so vayappatto satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa himavantasamiipe bheravaaya naama pabbataguhaaya.m vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto viharati. athekadivasa.m mahaa akaalamegho satapa.talasahassapa.talo thanento gajjanto vijjullataa nicchaarento ga.laga.laayanto u.t.thahitvaa vassitu.m aarabhi, asaniyo phali.msu. ta.m sadda.m sutvaa acchataracchuvanamahi.msahatthiaadayo bhiitatasitaa bhiitarava.m viravi.msu. thero pana aaraddhavipassanattaa kaaye jiivite ca nirapekkho vigatalomaha.mso ta.m acintento vipassanaayameva kamma.m karonto ghammaapagamena utusappaayalaabhena samaahitacitto taavadeva vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa saha abhi~n~naahi arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.51.85-90) --
[03] arahatta.m ^a^M1.0402^ea^ pana patvaa attano pa.tipatti.m paccavekkhitvaa somanassajaato udaanavasena a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
[26] tassa mayha.m ekakassa bherave bile viharato,
[22] natthi bhaya.m vaa chambhitatta.m vaa lomaha.mso vaa..
[21] ``dhammataa mamesaa yassa me, ekakassa bherave bile.
[22] viharato natthi bhaya.m vaa, chambhitatta.m vaa lomaha.mso vaa''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^a^P2.0060^ea^ ^b^devo ca vassati, devo ca ga.laga.laayatii^eb^ti devo megho vassati ca, ``ga.laga.laa''ti ca karonto gajjatiiti attho. gajjantassa hi anukara.nameta.m. ^b^ekako caaha.m bherave bile viharaamii^eb^ti aha~nca ekako asahaayo sappa.tibhayaaya.m pabbataguhaaya.m vasaami, ^b^tassa mayha.m^eb^ eva.mbhuutassa me sato ^b^natthi bhaya.m vaa chambhitatta.m vaa lomaha.mso vaa^eb^ti cittutraasasa~n~nita.m bhaya.m vaa ta.mnimittaka.m sariirassa chambhitatta.m vaa lomaha.msanamatta.m vaa natthi.

[03] kasmaati tattha kaara.namaaha ^b^``dhammataa mamesaa''^eb^ti. apari~n~naatavatthukassa hi tattha appahiinacchandaraagataaya bhayaadinaa bhavitabba.m, mayaa pana sabbaso tattha pari~n~naata.m, tattha ca chandaraago samucchinno, tasmaa bhayaadiina.m abhaavo ^b^dhammataa mamesaa^eb^ mama dhammasabhaavo esoti a~n~na.m byaakaasi.

[03] ^b^kassa^eb^ ^a^M1.0403^ea^ ^a^V1.0343^ea^ ^b^seluupama.m citta^eb^nti aayasmato nitakattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani karonto vipassissa bhagavato kaale bandhumatiinagare aaraamagopako hutvaa jiivanto ekadivasa.m bhagavanta.m aakaasena gacchanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso naa.likeraphala.m daatukaamo ahosi. satthaa ta.m anugga.nhanto aakaaseyeva .thatvaa pa.tigga.nhi. so ta.m datvaa u.laara.m piitisomanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kosalara.t.the braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^nitako^eb^ti laddhanaamo vi~n~nuta.m patto satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa ara~n~ne viharanto gha.tento arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.51.91-99) --

[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa there phalasukhena nibbaanasukhena viharante padhaanapariggaahako thero ta.m aara~n~naayatana.m gantvaa tattha vasantaana.m bhikkhuuna.m parigga.nhanattha.m ^b^``kassa seluupama''^eb^ntiaadinaa pa.thama.m gaathamaaha.

[03] 191^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M1.0404^ea^ ^a^V1.0344^ea^ ^a^P2.0061^ea^ ^b^kassa seluupama.m citta.m, .thita.m naanupakampatii^eb^ti imasmi.m ara~n~naayatane vasantesu kassa bhikkhuno citta.m aggaphalaadhigamena ekaghanasilaamayapabbatuupama.m sabbesa.m i~njanaana.m abhaavato vasiibhaavappattiyaa ca .thita.m sabbehipi lokadhammehi naanukampati na vedhati. idaanissa akampanaakaara.m saddhi.m kaara.nena dassetu.m ^b^``viratta''^eb^ntiaadi vutta.m. tattha ^b^viratta.m rajaniiyesuu^eb^ti viraagasa"nkhaatena ariyamaggena rajaniiyesu raaguppattihetubhuutesu tebhuumakadhammesu viratta.m, tattha sabbaso samucchinnaraaganti attho. ^b^kuppaniiye^eb^ti pa.tigha.t.thaaniiye, sabbasmimpi aaghaatavatthusmi.m. ^b^na kuppatii^eb^ti na dussati na vikaara.m aapajjati. ^b^yasseva.m bhaavita.m citta^eb^nti yassa ariyapuggalassa citta.m mano eva.m vuttanayena taadibhaavena bhaavita.m, ^b^kuto ta.m dukkhamessatii^eb^ti ta.m puggala.m kuto sattato sa"nkhaarato vaa dukkha.m upagamissati, na taadisassa dukkha.m atthiiti attho.

[03] 192^b^.^eb^ eva.m aniyamavasena pucchitamattha.m nitakatthero attuupanaayika.m katvaa vissajjento ^b^``mama seluupama.m citta''^eb^ntiaadinaa dutiyagaathaaya a~n~na.m byaakaasi. ta.m vuttatthameva.

[03] ^b^na taava supitu.m hotii^eb^ti aayasmato so.nassa po.tiriyaputtassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro sikhissa bhagavato kaale vanacaro hutvaa jiivanto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m disvaa pasannacitto kura~njiyaphala.m ^a^P2.0062^ea^ satthuno adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kapilavatthusmi.m po.tiriyassa naama gaamabhojakassa putto hutvaa nibbatti, ^b^so.no^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vayappatto bhaddiyassa saakiyara~n~no senaapati ahosi. atha bhaddiyaraaje he.t.thaa vuttanayena pabbajite, senaapati ^a^M1.0405^ea^ ``raajaapi naama pabbaji, ki.m mayha.m gharaavaasenaa''ti pabbaji? pabbajitvaa pana niddaaraamo viharati, na bhaavanamanuyu~njati. ta.m bhagavaa anupiyaaya.m ambavane viharanto attano obhaasa.m pharaapetvaa tenassa sati.m janetvaa imaaya gaathaaya ta.m ovadanto --
[22] sa"ngaame me mata.m seyyo, ya~nce jiive paraajito''ti.. -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.
