[03] tattha ^b^na taava supitu.m hoti, ratti nakkhattamaalinii^eb^ti a.t.thahi akkha.nehi vajjita.m navama.m kha.na.m labhitvaa .thitassa vi~n~nujaatikassa yaava na arahatta.m hatthagata.m hoti, taava aya.m nakkhattamaalinii ratti supitu.m niddaayitu.m na hoti, supanassa kaalo na hoti. apica kho ^b^pa.tijaggitumevesaa, ratti hoti vijaanataa^eb^ti esaa ratti naama manussaana.m migapakkhiina~nca nidduupagamanena visesato nissaddavelaabhuutaa pa.tipatti.m attani sa~njaggitu.m jaagariyaanuyogamanuyu~njitumeva vijaanataa vi~n~nunaa icchitaa hotiiti.

[03] ta.m sutvaa so.no sa.mviggataramaanaso hirottappa.m paccupa.t.thapetvaa abbhokaasika"nga.m adhi.t.thaaya vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto ^b^``hatthikkhandhova patita''^eb^nti dutiya.m gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^avapatita^eb^nti avamukha.m patita.m uddha.mpaada.m adhomukha.m patita.m. ^b^ku~njaro ce anukkame^eb^ti ku~njaro anukkameyya ce. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- yadaaha.m hatthimaaruhitvaa sa"ngaama.m pavi.t.tho hatthikkhandhato patito, tadaaha.m ^b^sa"ngaame^eb^ tena hatthinaa maddito mato ahosi.m ce, ta.m ^b^me^eb^ mara.na.m ^b^seyyo, ya~nce^eb^ idaani kilesehi ^b^paraajito^eb^ jiiveyya.m, ta.m na seyyoti. ima.m gaatha.m vadantoyeva vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.52.1-6) --
[21] ``ekati.mse ito kappe, ya.m phala.m adadi.m tadaa.
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa ``satthaaraa vutta.m, attanaa vutta''nti ubhaya~nhi gaatha.m ``hatthikkhandhaavapatita''ntiaadinaa paccudaahaasi. tena idameva a~n~naabyaakara.na.m ahosiiti.

[03] ^b^pa~nca^eb^ ^a^V1.0346^ea^ ^b^kaamagu.ne hitvaa^eb^ti aayasmato nisabhattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m pi.n.daaya caranta.m disvaa pasannacitto kapitthaphalamadaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade koliyajanapade kulagehe nibbattitvaa ^b^nisabho^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto saakiyakoliyaana.m sa"ngaame buddhaanubhaava.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa tadaheva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.52.7-11) --
[03] so ^a^M1.0407^ea^ arahatta.m pana patvaa attano sahaayabhikkhuu pamaadavihaarena kaala.m viitinaamente disvaa te ovadanto --

[03] tassattho -- baalaputhujjanassa piyaayitabbasabhaavataaya ^b^piyaruupe^eb^ manu~n~nasabhaavataaya ^b^manorame^eb^ ruupaadike ^b^pa~nca kaamagu.ne^eb^ kaamako.t.thaase ^b^hitvaa^eb^ pahaaya pariccajitvaa kammaphala^b^saddhaaya^eb^ ratanattaya^b^saddhaaya^eb^ ca vasena ^b^gharaa^eb^ gharabandhanato ^b^nikkhamma^eb^ nikkhamitvaa pabbajja.m upagato vi~n~nujaatiko pabbajitakaalato pa.t.thaaya gha.tento vaayamanto va.t.ta^b^dukkhassa antakaro bhave^eb^ bhaveyyaati. eva.m te bhikkhuu ovaditvaa ``aya.m pare eva sa~n~naapento viharati, ``saya.m ^a^P2.0064^ea^ pana akaarako'ti maa cintayitthaa''ti tesa.m attano pa.tipannabhaava.m pakaasento --

[25] dutiyagaathaaya a~n~na.m byaakaasi. tattha ^b^naabhinandaami mara.na^eb^nti mara.na.m na abhika"nkhaami. ^b^naabhinandaami jiivita^eb^nti ida.m pana tassa kaara.navacana.m, yasmaa naabhinandaami jiivita.m, tasmaa naabhinandaami mara.nanti. yo hi aayati.m jaatijaraamara.naaya kilesaabhisa"nkhaare aacinoti upacinoti, so punabbhavaabhinibbatti.m abhinandanto naantariyakataaya attano mara.nampi abhinandati naama kaara.nassa appahiinattaa, khii.naasavo pana sabbaso aacayagaamidhamme pahaaya apacayagaamidhamme pati.t.thito pari~n~naatavatthuko sabbaso jiivita.m anabhinandanto mara.nampi anabhinandati naama kaara.nassa eva suppahiinattaa. tenaaha -- ``naabhinandaami mara.na.m, naabhinandaami jiivita''nti. yadi eva.m khii.naasavassa parinibbaanaabhika"nkhaa, yaava parinibbaanaa ava.t.thaana~nca kathanti aaha ^b^``kaala~nca pa.tika"nkhaami, sampajaano patissato''^eb^ti, kilesaparinibbaane siddhe satipa~n~naavepullappattiyaa sato sampajaano kevala.m ^a^M1.0408^ea^ khandhaparinibbaanakaala.m pa.tika"nkhaami, ta.m udikkhamaano aagamayamaano viharaami, na pana me mara.ne jiivite vaa abhinandanaa atthi arahattamaggeneva tassa samugghaa.titattaati.

[03] ^b^ambapallavasa"nkaasa^eb^nti aayasmato usabhattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani karonto sikhissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m pi.n.daaya caranta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso kosambaphala.m adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kapilavatthusmi.m saakiyaraajakule nibbattitvaa ^b^usabho^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto satthu ~naatisamaagame buddhaanubhaava.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbaji. so pabbajitakaalato ^a^P2.0065^ea^ pa.t.thaaya sama.nadhamma.m akatvaa divaa sa"nga.nikaaraamo sakalaratti.m niddaayamaano viitinaameti. so ekadivasa.m mu.t.thassati asampajaano nidda.m okkanto supine kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa ambapallavava.n.na.m ciivara.m paarupitvaa hatthigiivaaya.m nisiiditvaa nagara.m pi.n.daaya pavi.t.tha.m tattheva manusse sampatte disvaa lajjaaya hatthikkhandhato oruyha attaana.m disvaa pa.tibuddho, ``iidisa.m naama supina.m mu.t.thassatinaa asampajaanena ^a^V1.0348^ea^ niddaayamaanena mayaa di.t.tha''nti uppannasa.mvego vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.52.12-16) --
[21] ``ekati.mse ito kappe, ya.m phala.m adadi.m tadaa.
[03] atha ^a^M1.0409^ea^ thero yathaadi.t.tha.m supina.m a"nkusa.m katvaa arahattassa adhigatattaa tasseva supinassa kittanavasena a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
[22] soha.m ditto tadaa santo, patto me aasavakkhayo''ti.. -- gaathaadvayamaaha.

[03] tattha ^b^ambapallavasa"nkaasa.m, a.mse katvaana ciivara^eb^nti ambapallavaakaara.m pavaa.lava.n.na.m ciivara.m khandhe karitvaa uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa. ^b^gaama^eb^nti attano raajadhaani.m hatthikkhandhe ^b^nisinno pi.n.daaya paavisi.m,^eb^ pavi.t.thamattova mahaajanena olokiyamaano ^b^hatthikkhandhato oruyha^eb^ .thito pa.tibujjhi.m, pabuddhova ^b^sa.mvega.m alabhi.m tadaa^eb^ ``mu.t.thassati asampajaano hutvaa niddaayokkamanena eta.m jaata''nti. apare pana ``raajaava hutvaa rattibhaage evaruupa.m supina.m disvaa vibhaataaya rattiyaa hatthikkhandha.m aaruyha nagaraviithiya.m caranto ta.m supina.m saritvaa hatthikkhandhato oruyha sa.mvega.m labhitvaa satthu santike pabbajitvaa arahatta.m patvaa udaana.m udaanento imaa gaathaa abhaasii''ti vadanti. ^b^ditto^eb^ti tasmi.m raajakaale jaatimadabhogamadaadiparidappito samaano sa.mvegamalabhinti yojanaa.

[03] ^b^ayamiti^eb^ ^a^V1.0349^ea^ ^a^P2.0066^ea^ ^b^kappa.to^eb^ti aayasmato kappa.takurattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m bhagavanta.m vinataaya naama nadiyaa tiire a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisinna.m disvaa pasannamaanaso ketakapupphehi puuja.m akaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade ^a^M1.0410^ea^ saavatthiya.m duggatakule nibbattitvaa yaava vayappatti, taava a~n~na.m upaaya.m ajaananto kappa.takha.n.danivaasano saraavahattho tattha tattha kura.m pariyesanto vicari, tena ^b^kappa.takuro^eb^tveva pa~n~naayittha. so vayappatto ti.na.m vikki.nitvaa jiivika.m kappento ekadivasa.m ti.nalaavanattha.m ara~n~na.m gato tattha a~n~natara.m khii.naasavatthera.m disvaa ta.m upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa nisiidi. tassa thero dhamma.m kathesi. so dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho ``ki.m me imaaya kicchajiivikaayaa''ti pabbajitvaa attano nivatthakappa.taco.la.m ekasmi.m .thaane nikkhipi. yadaa cassa anabhirati uppajjati, tadaa ta.m kappa.ta.m olokentassa anabhirati vigacchati, sa.mvega.m pa.tilabhi. eva.m karonto sattakkhattu.m uppabbaji. tassa ta.m kaara.na.m bhikkhuu bhagavato aarocesu.m. athekadivasa.m kappa.takuro bhikkhu dhammasabhaaya.m parisapariyante nisinno niddaayati, ta.m bhagavaa codento --
[21] ``maa kho tva.m kappa.ta pacaalesi, maa tva.m upaka.n.namhi taa.lessa.m.
[22] na hi tva.m kappa.ta mattama~n~naasi, sa"nghamajjhamhi pacalaayamaano''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^ayamiti kappa.to kappa.takuro^eb^ti kappa.takuro bhikkhu ``aya.m mama kappa.to, ima.m paridahitvaa yathaa tathaa jiivaamii''ti eva.m uppannamicchaavitakko ^b^acchaaya atibharitaaya amatagha.tikaaya.m^eb^ mama amatagha.te taha.m taha.m vassante ``amatamadhigata.m ahamanusaasaami, aha.m ^a^P2.0067^ea^ dhamma.m desemi'' (mahaava0 12; ma0 ni0 1.286; 2.342). ``andhiibhuutasmi.m lokasmi.m, aaha~ncha.m amatadundubhi''ntiaadinaa (mahaava0 11; ma0 ni0 1.285; 2.341) ghosetvaa ^a^M1.0411^ea^ mayaa dhammaamate pavassiyamaane ^b^katapada.m jhaanaani ocetu.m^eb^ lokiyalokuttarajjhaanaani upacetu.m bhaavetu.m katapada.m ka.tamaggavihitabhaavanaamagga.m ida.m mama saasana.m, tathaapi ^b^dhammaka.tamatto^eb^ mama saasanadhammato ^a^V1.0350^ea^ ukka.n.thacitto apagatamaanaso kappa.takuroti ta.m codetvaa punapissa saho.d.dha.m cora.m ga.nhanto viya pamaadavihaara.m dassento ^b^``maa kho tva.m, kappa.ta, pacaalesii''^eb^ti gaathamaaha.

[03] tattha ^b^maa kho tva.m, kappa.ta, pacaalesii^eb^ti tva.m, kappa.takura, ``mama dhamma.m su.nissaamii''ti nisiiditvaa maa kho pacaalesi maa pacalaahi maa nidda.m upagacchi. ^b^maa tva.m upaka.n.namhi taa.lessa^eb^nti ta.m niddaayamaana.m upaka.n.namhi ka.n.nasamiipe desanaahatthena aha.m maa pataa.lessa.m. yathaa ito para.m kilesappahaanaaya aha.m ta.m na ovadeyya.m, tathaa pa.tipajjaahiiti attho. ^b^na hi tva.m, kappa.ta, mattama~n~naasii^eb^ti tva.m, kappa.ta, ^b^sa"nghamajjhamhi pacalaayamaano^eb^ matta.m pamaa.na.m na vaa ma~n~nasi, ``ayamatidullabho kha.no pa.tiladdho, so maa upajjhagaa''ti ettakampi na jaanaasi, passa yaava ca te aparaddhanti codesi.

[03] eva.m bhagavataa dviihi gaathaahi gaa.lha.m ta.m niggayha codanaaya kataaya a.t.thivedhaviddho viya ca.n.dagajo magga.m otaranto viya ca sa~njaatasa.mvego vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.52.17-22) --
[03] arahatta.m ^a^M1.0412^ea^ pana patvaa satthaaraa vuttagaathaadvayameva attano arahattaadhigamanassa a"nkusabhuutanti paccudaahaasi. tenassa tadeva a~n~naabyaakara.na.m ahosiiti.

[03] ^b^aho^eb^ ^a^V1.0351^ea^ ^a^P2.0068^ea^ ^b^buddhaa aho dhammaa^eb^ti aayasmato kumaarakassapattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m paapu.ni. ``kulagehe''ti pana a"nguttara.t.thakathaaya.m (a0 ni0 a.t.tha0 1.1.217) vutta.m. so satthu santika.m gantvaa dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m cittakathikaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa sayampi ta.m .thaanantara.m aaka"nkhanto pa.nidhaana.m katvaa tadanuruupaani pu~n~naani karonto kassapassa bhagavato kaale sama.nadhamma.m katvaa sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe se.t.thidhiitaaya kucchimhi pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi. saa kira kumaarikaakaaleyeva pabbajitukaamaa hutvaa maataapitaro yaacitvaa pabbajja.m alabhamaanaa kulaghara.m gataapi gabbhasa.n.thitampi ajaanantii saamika.m aaraadhetvaa tena anu~n~naataa bhikkhuniisu pabbajitaa. tassaa gabbhinibhaava.m disvaa bhikkhuniyo devadatta.m pucchi.msu. so ``assama.nii''ti aaha. puna dasabala.m pucchi.msu. satthaa upaalitthera.m pa.ticchaapesi. thero saavatthinagaravaasiini kulaani visaakha~nca upaasika.m pakkosaapetvaa saraajikaaya parisaaya vinicchinanto ``pure laddho gabbho, pabbajjaa arogaa''ti aaha. satthaa ``suvinicchita.m adhikara.na''nti therassa saadhukaara.m adaasi.

[03] saa bhikkhunii suva.n.nabimbasadisa.m putta.m vijaayi. ta.m raajaa pasenadikosalo posesi. ``kassapo''ti cassa naama.m aka.msu. aparabhaage ^a^M1.0413^ea^ ala"nkaritvaa satthu santika.m netvaa pabbaajesi. kumaarakaale pabbajitattaa bhagavataa ``kassapa.m pakkosatha, ida.m phala.m vaa khaadaniiya.m vaa kassapassa dethaa''ti vutte ``katarakassapassaa''ti. ``kumaarakassapassaa''ti. eva.m gahitanaamattaa ra~n~no posaavanikaputtattaa ca vu.d.dhakaalepi ^b^kumaarakassapo^eb^tveva pa~n~naayittha.

[03] so pabbajitakaalato pa.t.thaaya vipassanaaya ceva kamma.m karoti, buddhavacana~nca ugga.nhaati. atha tena saddhi.m pabbatamatthake sama.nadhamma.m katvaa anaagaamii hutvaa suddhaavaase nibbatto ^a^V1.0352^ea^ mahaabrahmaa ``vipassanaaya mukha.m dassetvaa maggaphalappattiyaa upaaya.m karissaamii''ti pa~ncadasa pa~nhe abhisa"nkharitvaa andhavane vasantassa ^a^P2.0069^ea^ therassa ``ime pa~nhe satthaara.m puccheyyaasii''ti aacikkhitvaa gato. so te pa~nhe bhagavanta.m pucchi. bhagavaapissa byaakaasi. thero satthaaraa kathitaniyaameneva te ugga.nhitvaa vipassana.m gabbha.m ga.nhaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.54.150-177) --
[22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
[22] saakhena cattaa me maataa, nigrodha.m sara.na.m gataa..
[22] nigrodhasmi.m mata.m seyyo, ya~nce saakhamhi jiivita.m..
[21] ``tenaanusi.t.thaa migayuuthapena, aha~nca maataa ca tathetare ca.
[22] aagamma ramma.m tusitaadhivaasa.m, gataa pavaasa.m saghara.m yatheva..
[22] so avoca vinaasetha, paapika.m bhikkhuni.m ima.m..
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa cittakathikabhaavena satthaaraa etadagge .thapito attano pa.tipatti.m paccavekkhitvaa ratanattayagu.navibhaavanamukhena a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
[21] ``aho ^a^V1.0354^ea^ buddhaa aho dhammaa, aho no satthu sampadaa.
[22] jaatimara.nasa.msaaro, natthi daani punabbhavo''ti.. -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^aho^eb^ti acchariyatthe nipaato. ^b^buddhaa^eb^ti sabba~n~nubuddhaa, gaaravavasena bahuvacana.m, aho acchariyaa sambuddhaati attho. ^b^dhammaa^eb^ti pariyattidhammena saddhi.m nava lokuttaradhammaa. ^b^aho no satthu sampadaa^eb^ti amhaaka.m satthu dasabalassa aho sampattiyo. ^b^yatthaa^eb^ti yasmi.m satthari ^a^M1.0416^ea^ brahmacariyavaasena. ^b^etaadisa.m dhamma.m, saavako sacchikaahitii^eb^ti etaadisa.m evaruupa.m suvisuddhajjhaanaabhi~n~naaparivaara.m anavasesakilesakkhayaavaha.m santa.m pa.niita.m anuttara.m dhamma.m saavakopi naama sacchikarissati, tasmaa eva.mvidhagu.navisesaadhigamahetubhuutaa aho acchariyaa buddhaa bhagavanto, acchariyaa dhammagu.naa, acchariyaa amhaaka.m satthu sampattiyoti ratanattayassa gu.naadhimutti.m pavedesiiti. dhammasampattikittaneneva hi sa"nghasuppa.tipatti kittitaa hotiiti.

[03] eva.m saadhaara.navasena dassita.m dhammassa sacchikiriya.m idaani attupanaayika.m katvaa dassento ^b^``asa"nkheyyesuu''^eb^ti gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^asa"nkheyyesuu^eb^ti ga.nanapatha.m viitivattesu mahaakappesu. ^b^sakkaayaa^eb^ti pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa. te hi paramatthato vijjamaanadhammasamuuhataaya ``sakkaayaa''ti vuccanti. ^b^ahuu^eb^ti nivattanuupaayassa anadhigatattaa anapagataa ahesu.m. ^b^tesamaya.m pacchimako carimoya.m samussayo^eb^ti ^a^P2.0070^ea^ yasmaa aya.m sabbapacchimako, tato eva carimo, tasmaa ^b^jaatimara.na^eb^sahito khandhaadipa.tipaa.tisa~n~nito ^b^sa.msaaro^eb^ idaani aayati.m punabbhavaabhaavato ^b^punabbhavo natthi,^eb^ ayamantimaa jaatiiti attho.

[03] ^b^yo have daharo bhikkhuu^eb^ti aayasmato dhammapaalattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto atthadassissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto kenacideva kara.niiyena vananta.m upagato satthaara.m disvaa pasannamaanaso ^a^V1.0355^ea^ pilakkhaphalamadaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade satthari parinibbute avantira.t.the braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^dhammapaalo^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto takkasila.m gantvaa sippa.m uggahetvaa pa.tinivattento antaraamagge ekasmi.m vihaare a~n~natara.m thera.m disvaa tassa santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa ^a^M1.0417^ea^ vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.39.21-25) --

[03] cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa samaapattisukhena viitinaamento ekadivasa.m tasmi.m vihaare dve saama.nere rukkhagge pupphaani ocinante aaruu.lhasaakhaaya bhaggaaya patante disvaa thero iddhaanubhaavena hatthena gahetvaa arogeyeva bhuumiya.m .thapetvaa tesa.m saama.neraana.m dhamma.m desento --
[22] jaagaro sa hi suttesu, amogha.m tassa jiivita.m..
[22] anuyu~njetha medhaavii, sara.m buddhaana saasana''nti.. -- imaa dve gaathaa abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^yo^eb^ti aniyamavacana.m. ^b^have^eb^ti da.lhatthe nipaato. ^b^daharo^eb^ti taru.no. bhikkhatiiti ^b^bhikkhu. yu~njatii^eb^ti gha.tati vaayamati. ^b^jaagaro^eb^ti ^a^P2.0071^ea^ jaagara.nadhammasamannaagato. ^b^suttesuu^eb^ti supantesu. ida.m vutta.m hoti ^b^yo bhikkhu daharo^eb^va samaano taru.no ``tathaaha.m pacchaa vu.d.dhakaale jaanissaamii''ti acintetvaa buddhaana.m ^b^saasane^eb^ appamaadapa.tipattiya.m ^b^yu~njati^eb^ samathavipassanaabhaavanaaya yoga.m karoti, so ^b^suttesu^eb^ avijjaaniddaaya suttesu pamattesu saddhaadijaagaradhammasamannaagamena ^b^jaagaro,^eb^ tato eva attahitaparahitapaaripuuriyaa ^b^amogha.m^eb^ ava~njha.m ^b^tassa jiivita.m,^eb^ yasmaa ca etadeva.m, ^b^tasmaa saddha~nca^eb^ ``atthi kamma.m atthi kammavipaako''tiaadinayappavatta.m kammaphalasaddha~nca, saddhuupanibandhattaa siilassa tadupanissaya.m catupaarisuddhi^b^siila~nca^eb^ ^a^M1.0418^ea^, ``sammaasambuddho bhagavaa, svaakhaato dhammo, suppa.tipanno sa"ngho''ti eva.m pavattaratanattaya^b^ppasaada^eb^~nca ^a^V1.0356^ea^, vipassanaapa~n~naasahitaaya maggapa~n~naaya pari~n~naadivasena catusacca^b^dhammadassana^eb^~nca ^b^medhaavii^eb^ dhammojapa~n~naaya samannaagato bhikkhu ^b^buddhaana.m saasana.m^eb^ ovaada.m anusi.t.thi.m anussaranto aadittampi attano siisa.m ajjhupekkhitvaa ^b^anuyu~njetha,^eb^ tattha anuyoga.m aatappa.m kareyyaati attho.

[03] ^b^kassindriyaani samatha"ngataanii^eb^ti aayasmato brahmaalittherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m pi.n.daaya caranta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso vanditvaa paadaphala.m adaasi. satthaa anumodana.m vatvaa pakkaami. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kosalara.t.the braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^brahmaalii^eb^ti laddhanaamo vi~n~nuta.m patto hetusampattiyaa codiyamaano sa.msaare sa~njaatasa.mvego taadisena kalyaa.namittasannissayena buddhasaasane pabbajitvaa patiruupakamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa ara~n~ne viharanto ~naa.nassa paripaakagatattaa nacirasseva vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.51.63-67) --

[03] cha.labhi~n~no ^a^M1.0419^ea^ ^a^P2.0072^ea^ pana hutvaa maggasukhena phalasukhena viitinaamento ekadivasa.m padhaanapariggaahakena therena tasmi.m ara~n~naayatane bhikkhuu uddissa vutta.m padhaanaanuyoga.m parigga.nhanto --
[22] pahiinamaanassa anaasavassa, devaapi kassa pihayanti taadino..
[22] pahiinamaanassa anaasavassa, devaapi mayha.m pihayanti taadino''ti.. --

[03] tassattho -- imasmi.m ara~n~naayatane vasantesu bhikkhuusu ^b^kassa^eb^ bhikkhuno therassa vaa navassa vaa majjhimassa vaa chekena ^b^saarathinaa sudantaa assaa^eb^ viya manaccha.t.thaani ^b^indriyaani samatha.m^eb^ dantabhaava.m nibbisevanabhaava.m ^b^gataani^eb^. kassa navavidhampi maana.m pahaaya .thitattaa ^b^pahiinamaanassa^eb^ catunnampi aasavaana.m abhaavena ^b^anaasavassa^eb^ i.t.thaadiisu taadilakkha.nappattiyaa ^b^taadino devaapi pihayanti^eb^ manussaapi sammaapa.tipattidassanaadinaa ca aadarena patthentiiti.

[03] tattha ca gaathaaya.m purima.d.dhena anaagaamimaggaadhigamo pu.t.tho, anaagaaminopi hi indriyaani pahiinakaamaraagabyaapaadataaya samatha.m nibbisevanata.m gataani honti. itarena arahattamaggapa.tilaabho, arahaa hi ``pahiinamaano anaasavo taadii''ti ca vuccati.

[03] athaayasmaa brahmaali padhaanapariggaahakena vutta.m ^b^``kassindriyaanii''^eb^ti gaatha.m paccanubhaasi. tadattha.m attuupanaayikavasena vissajjento ^b^``mayhindriyaanii''^eb^tiaadikaaya dutiyagaathaaya a~n~na.m byaakaasi, tattha ^b^mayhindriyaanii^eb^ti mama cakkhaadiini indriyaani. sesa.m vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^chavipaapaka^eb^ ^a^M1.0420^ea^ ^b^cittabhaddakaa^eb^ti aayasmato mogharaajattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthu ^a^P2.0073^ea^ santike dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m luukhaciivaradharaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m aaka"nkhanto pa.nidhaana.m katvaa tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani karonto atthadassissa bhagavato kaale braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa braahma.naana.m vijjaasippesu nipphatti.m gato braahma.namaa.nave vijjaasippaani sikkhaapento ekadivasa.m atthadassi.m bhagavanta.m bhikkhusa"nghaparivuta.m gacchanta.m ^a^V1.0358^ea^ disvaa pasannamaanaso pa~ncapati.t.thitena vanditvaa sirasi a~njali.m katvaa ``yaavataa ruupino sattaa''tiaadinaa chahi gaathaahi abhitthavitvaa bhaajana.m puuretvaa madhu.m upanaamesi. satthaa madhu.m pa.tiggahetvaa anumodana.m akaasi.

[03] so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto kassapassa bhagavato kaale ka.t.thavaahanassa naama ra~n~no amacco hutvaa tena satthu aanayanattha.m purisasahassena pesito satthu santika.m gantvaa dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa viisativassasahassaani sama.nadhamma.m katvaa tato cuto eka.m buddhantara.m sugatiisuyeva parivattento imasmi.m buddhuppaade braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^mogharaajaa^eb^ti laddhanaamo baavariibraahma.nassa santike uggahitasippo sa.mvegajaato taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa taapasasahassaparivaaro ajitaadiihi saddhi.m satthu santika.m pesito tesa.m pannarasamo hutvaa pa~nhe pucchitvaa pa~nhavissajjanapariyosaane arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.4.64-83) --
[22] sabbe te tava ~naa.namhi, anto honti samogadhaa..
[22] ye keci udake paa.naa, antojaale bhavanti te..
[22] sabbe te tava ~naa.namhi, anto honti samogadhaa..
[22] tava dhamma.m su.nitvaana, ka"nkhaasota.m taranti te..
[22] mama citta.m pasaadento, imaa gaathaa abhaasatha..
[22] tena cittappasaadena, duggati.m so na gacchati..

[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa satthaluukha.m suttaluukha.m rajanaluukhanti visesena tividhenapi luukhena samannaagata.m pa.msukuula.m dhaaresi. tena na.m satthaa luukhaciivaradharaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesi. aparabhaage purimakammappaccayaa parihaarassa akara.nato therassa sariire daddupii.lakaadiini uppajjitvaa va.d.dhi.msu. so ``senaasana.m dussatii''ti hemantepi magadhakkhettesu palaalasanthaaraani attharitvaa seti. ta.m ekadivasa.m upa.t.thaana.m upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa ekamanta.m nisinna.m satthaa pa.tisanthaaravasena ^b^``chavipaapakaa''^eb^tiaadinaa ^a^P2.0074^ea^ pa.thamagaathaaya pucchi.

[03] 207^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^chavipaapakaa^eb^ti daddukacchupii.lakaahi bhinnacchavibhaavato hiinacchavika du.t.thacchavika ^a^V1.0360^ea^. ^b^cittabhaddakaa^eb^ti anavasesakilesappahaanena brahmavihaarasevanaaya ca bhaddacitta sundaracitta. ^b^mogharaajaa^eb^ti tassa aalapana.m. ^b^satata.m samaahito^eb^ti aggaphalasamaadhinaa niccakaala.m abhi.nha.m samaahitamaanaso. ^b^hemantikasiitakaalarattiyo^eb^ti hemantasamaye siitakaalarattiyo. accantasa.myoge ceta.m upayogavacana.m. ``hemantikaa siitakaalarattiyo''tipi paa.li. tattha ^b^hemantikaa^eb^ti hemantogadhaa hemantapariyaapannaati attho. ^b^bhikkhu tva.m sii^eb^ti bhikkhu ko tva.m asi, eva.mbhuuto paresu tava senaasana.m katvaa adentesu sa"nghika~nca senaasana.m apavisanto. ^b^katha.m karissasii^eb^ti yathaavutte siitakaale katha.m attabhaava.m pavattesiiti satthaa pucchi. eva.m pana pu.t.tho thero satthu tamattha.m kathento --

[03] tattha ^b^sampannasassaa^eb^ti nipphannasassaa. ^b^magadhaa^eb^ti magadhara.t.tha.m vadati. magadhaa naama jaanapadino raajakumaaraa, tesa.m nivaaso ekopi janapado ru.lhiivasena ``magadhaa''tveva bahuvacanena vuccati. ^b^kevalaa^eb^ti anavasesaa. ^b^iti me suta^eb^nti eva.m mayaa suta.m. tattha yo adi.t.tho padeso, tassa vasena sutanti vutta.m. tena edise kaale magadhesu yattha katthaci mayaa vasitu.m sakkaati dasseti. ^b^palaalacchannako seyya.m, yatha~n~ne sukhajiivino^eb^ti yathaa a~n~ne sukhajiivino bhikkhuu senaasanasappaaya.m laddhaa sundarehi atthara.napaavura.nehi sukhena sayanti, eva.m ahampi palaalasanthaarameva he.t.thaa santharitvaa upari tiriya~nca palaalacchadaneneva chaaditasariirataaya palaalacchannako seyya.m sayi.m, seyya.m kappesinti attano yathaalaabhasantosa.m vibhaaveti.

[03] ^b^na^eb^ ^a^P2.0075^ea^ ^b^ukkhipe no ca parikkhipe pare^eb^ti aayasmato visaakhassa pa~ncaalaputtassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m pu~n~na.m upacinanto ito cuddase kappe paccantagaame daliddakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m phalapariyesana.m carantehi tasmi.m gaame manussehi saddhi.m ara~n~na.m gato tattha eka.m paccekabuddha.m disvaa pasannamaanaso valliphala.m adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m ^a^V1.0361^ea^ buddhuppaade magadhara.t.the ma.n.dalikaraajakule nibbattitvaa ^b^visaakho^eb^ti laddhanaamo pa~ncaalaraajadhiituyaa puttabhaavato pacchaa ^b^pa~ncaalaputto^eb^ti pa~n~naayittha. so pitari mate rajja.m kaarento satthari attano gaamasamiipagate satthu santika.m gantvaa ^a^M1.0424^ea^ dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa satthaaraa saddhi.m saavatthi.m gato vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.39.31-36) --

[03] cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa thero ~naatiina.m anukampaaya jaatibhuumi.m agamaasi. tattha manussaa thera.m upasa"nkamitvaa kaalena kaala.m dhamma.m su.nantaa ekadivasa.m ``katihi nu kho, bhante, a"ngehi samannaagato dhammakathiko hotii''ti dhammakathikalakkha.na.m pucchi.msu. thero tesa.m dhammakathikalakkha.na.m kathento --
[21] ``na ukkhipe no ca parikkhipe pare, na okkhipe paaragata.m na eraye.
[22] na cattava.n.na.m parisaasu byaahare, anuddhato sammitabhaa.ni subbato..
[22] sa.msevitabuddhasiilinaa, nibbaana.m na hi tena dullabha''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^na ukkhipe^eb^ti attaana.m na ukkhipeyya, jaatiaadiihi baahusaccaadiihi ca attukka.msana.m na kareyya. ^b^no ca parikkhipe pare^eb^ti pare parapuggale teheva jaatiaadiihi no parikkhipe paricchinditvaa na ^a^P2.0076^ea^ khipeyya gu.naparidha.msanavasena ^a^M1.0425^ea^ vaa na khipeyya. na okkhipe pare icceva.m sambandho. pare ojjhaapanavasena ^b^na okkhipe^eb^ he.t.thato katvaa pare na olokaapeyya, na ojjhaapeyyaati attho. ``na ukkhipe''ti keci pa.thanti, so evattho. ^b^paaragata^eb^nti ^a^V1.0362^ea^ sa.msaarapaara.m viya vijjaaya paara.m gata.m khii.naasava.m tevijja.m cha.labhi~n~na.m vaa ^b^na eraye^eb^ na gha.t.taye na aasaadeyya. ^b^na cattava.n.na.m parisaasu byaahare^eb^ti attano va.n.na.m gu.na.m laabhasakkaarasiloka.m nikaamayamaano khattiyaparisaadiisu na bhaaseyya. ^b^anuddhato^eb^ti uddhaccarahito. uddhatassa hi vacana.m naadiyanti. ^b^sammitabhaa.nii^eb^ti sammadeva mitabhaa.nii, kaalena saapadesa.m pariyantavati.m atthasa~nhitameva vaaca.m bhaasanasiiloti attho. ito a~n~nathaa vadantassa vacana.m agaha.niiya.m hoti. ^b^subbato^eb^ti sundaravato siilasampanno. ``siyaa''ti kiriyaapada.m aanetvaa yojetabba.m.

[03] eva.m thero sa"nkhepeneva dhammakathikalakkha.na.m vatvaa tesa.m gu.naana.m attani labbhamaanata.m adhimuccitvaa bhiyyosomattaaya abhippasanna.m mahaajana.m ~natvaa ``eva.mvidhassa dhammakathikassa vimuttaayatanasannissitassa na nibbaana.m dullabha.m, atha kho sulabhamevaa''ti dassento ^b^``susukhumanipu.natthadassinaa''^eb^ti dutiyagaathamaaha. tassattho he.t.thaa vuttoyeva.

[03] ^b^nadanti moraa susikhaa supekhu.naa^eb^ti aayasmato cuu.lakattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinanto ito ekati.mse kappe sikhissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m disvaa pasannamaanaso chattapa.n.niphala.m adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^cuu.lako^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto dhanapaaladamane satthari ^a^M1.0426^ea^ laddhappasaado pabbajitvaa sama.nadhamma.m karonto indasaalaguhaaya.m vasati, so ekadivasa.m guhaadvaare nisinno magadhakkhetta.m olokesi. tasmi.m kha.ne paavusakaalamegho gambhiiramadhuranigghoso satapa.talasahassapa.talo a~njana ^a^P2.0077^ea^ sikharasannikaaso nabha.m puuretvaa pavassati, mayuurasa"nghaa ca meghagajjita.m sutvaa ha.t.thatu.t.thaa kekaasadda.m mu~ncitvaa tattha tattha padese naccantaa vicaranti. therassapi aavaasagabbhe meghavaataphassehi apagatadhammattaa passaddhakarajakaaye kallata.m patte utusappaayalaabhena citta.m ekagga.m ahosi, kamma.t.thaanaviithi.m otari, so ta.m ~natvaa kaalasampadaadikittanamukhena attaana.m bhaavanaaya ussaahento --
[21] ``nadanti ^a^V1.0363^ea^ moraa susikhaa supekhu.naa, suniilagiivaa sumukhaa sugajjino.
[22] susaddalaa caapi mahaamahii aya.m, subyaapitambu suvalaahaka.m nabha.m..
[22] susukkasukka.m nipu.na.m sududdasa.m, phusaahi ta.m uttamamaccuta.m pada''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^nadanti moraa susikhaa supekhu.naa, suniilagiivaa sumukhaa sugajjino^eb^ti ete matthake u.t.thitaahi sundaraahi sikhaahi samannaagatattaa ^b^susikhaa,^eb^ naanaava.n.nehi anekehi sobhanehi bhaddakapi~nchehi samannaagatattaa ^b^supekhu.naa,^eb^ raajiivava.n.nasa"nkaasaaya sundaraaya niilava.n.naaya giivaaya samannaagatattaa ^b^suniilagiivaa,^eb^ sundaramukhataaya ^b^sumukhaa,^eb^ manu~n~navaaditaaya ^b^sugajjino, moraa^eb^ sikha.n.dino chajjasa.mvaadii kekaasadda.m mu~ncantaa ^a^M1.0427^ea^ ^b^nadanti^eb^ ravanti. ^b^susaddalaa caapi mahaamahii aya^eb^nti aya~nca mahaapathavii susaddalaa sundaraharitati.naa. ^b^subyaapitambuu^eb^ti abhinavavu.t.thiyaa taha.m taha.m vissandamaanasalilataaya su.t.thu byaapitajalaa vitatajalaa. ``susukkatambuu''tipi paa.tho, suvisuddhajalaati attho. ^b^suvalaahaka.m nabha^eb^nti ida~nca nabha.m aakaasa.m niiluppaladalasannibhehi samantato puuretvaa .thitehi sundarehi valaahakehi meghehi suvalaahaka.m.

[03] ^b^sukallaruupo^eb^ ^a^P2.0078^ea^ ^b^sumanassa jhaayata^eb^nti idaani utusappaayalaabhena su.t.thu kallaruupo kammaniyasabhaavo tva.m, niivara.nehi anajjhaaruu.lhacittataaya sundaramanassa yogaavacarassa ya.m aaramma.nuupanijjhaanavasena lakkha.nuupanijjhaanavasena ca jhaayata.m. ^b^sunikkamo...pe0... accuta.m pada^eb^nti eva.m jhaayanto ca ^b^saadhu subuddhassa^eb^ sammaasambuddhassa ^b^saasane^eb^ sundaranikkamo hutvaa suparisuddhasiilataaya ^b^susukka.m,^eb^ visuddhasabhaavataaya sabbassapi sa.mkilesassa gocarabhaavaanupagamanato ^b^sukka.m,^eb^ nipu.na~naa.nagocarataaya ^b^nipu.na.m,^eb^ paramagambhiirataaya ^b^sududdasa.m,^eb^ pa.niitabhaavena se.t.thabhaavena ca ^b^uttama.m,^eb^ niccasabhaavataaya ^b^accuta.m pada.m ta.m^eb^ nibbaana.m ^b^phusaahi^eb^ attapaccakkhakara.nena sammaapa.tipattiyaa sacchikarohiiti.
[03] eva.m thero attaana.m ovadantova utusappaayalaabhena samaahitacitto vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.39.37-42) --

[03] arahatta.m ^a^M1.0428^ea^ pana patvaa thero attano pa.tipatti.m paccavekkhitvaa piitisomanassajaato ^b^``nadanti moraa''^eb^tiaadinaa taayeva gaathaa paccudaahaasi. tenassa idameva a~n~naabyaakara.na.m ahosiiti.

[03] ^b^nandamaanaagata.m cittaa^eb^ti aayasmato anuupamattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m pu~n~na.m upacinanto ito ekati.mse kappe kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m paduma.m naama paccekabuddha.m pi.n.daaya caranta.m rathiya.m disvaa pasannamaanaso a"nkolapupphehi puujesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kosalara.t.the ibbhakule nibbattitvaa ruupasampattiyaa ^b^anuupamo^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto upanissayasampannataaya kaame pahaaya pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto ara~n~ne viharati. tassa citta.m bahiddhaa ruupaadiaaramma.nesu vidhaavati. kamma.t.thaana.m pariva.t.tati. thero vidhaavanta.m citta.m nigga.nhanto --
[22] tena teneva vajasi, yena suula.m kali"ngara.m..
[22] satthaa te dullabho laddho, maanatthe ma.m niyojayii''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^nandamaanaagata.m cittaa^eb^ti nandamaana abhinandamaana citta abhinandamaana.m aagata.m uppanna.m ^a^V1.0365^ea^. ^b^suulamaaropamaanaka^eb^nti dukkhuppatti.t.thaanataaya suulasadisattaa suula.m ta.m ta.m bhava.m kammakilesehi ettaka.m kaala.m aaropiyamaana.m. ^b^tena teneva vajasi, yena suula.m kali"ngara^eb^nti yattha yattha suulasa"nkhaataa ^a^M1.0429^ea^ bhavaa kali"ngarasa"nkhaataa adhiku.t.tanakaa kaamagu.naa ca tena teneva, paapacitta, vajasi, ta.m tadeva .thaana.m upagacchasi, attano anattha.m na sallakkhesi.

[03] ^b^taaha.m cittakali.m bruumii^eb^ti ta.m tasmaa pamattabhaavato cittakali.m cittakaalaka.n.ni.m aha.m kathayaami. punapi ^b^ta.m bruumi^eb^ kathemi ^b^cittadubbhaka.m^eb^ cittasa"nkhaatassa attano bahuupakaarassa santaanassa anatthaavahanato cittadubbhi.m. ``cittadubbhagaa''tipi pa.thanti. cittasa"nkhaataalakkhikaappapu~n~naati attho. kinti bruuhiiti ce? aaha ^b^``satthaa te dullabho laddho, maanatthe ma.m niyojayii''^eb^ti. kappaana.m asa"nkhyeyyampi naama buddhasu~n~no loko hoti, satthari uppannepi manussattasaddhaapa.tilaabhaadayo dullabhaa eva, laddhesu ca tesu satthaapi dullabhoyeva hoti. eva.m dullabho satthaa idaani tayaa laddho, tasmi.m laddhe sampatipi anatthe ahite aayati~nca anatthaavahe dukkhaavahe akusale ma.m maa niyojesiiti. eva.m thero attano citta.m ovadanto eva vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.37.16-19) --
[22] disvaana ta.m aha.m buddha.m, sayambhu.m aparaajita.m..

[03] ^b^sa.msara.m^eb^ ^a^M1.0430^ea^ ^b^diighamaddhaana^eb^nti aayasmato vajjitattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto ito pa~ncasa.t.thime kappe ekasmi.m paccantagaame nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto vanacarako hutvaa vicaranto ekadivasa.m upasanta.m ^a^V1.0366^ea^ naama paccekabuddha.m pabbataguhaaya.m viharanta.m addasa. so tassa upasama.m disvaa pasannamaanaso campakapupphena puuja.m akaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kosalara.t.the ibbhakule nibbatto jaatadivasato pa.t.thaaya maatugaamahattha.m gato rodati. brahmalokato kira cavitvaa idhaagato yasmaa maatugaamasamphassa.m na sahati, tasmaa maatugaamasamphassavajjanato ^b^vajjito^eb^tveva naama.m jaata.m. so vayappatto satthu yamakapaa.tihaariya.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa tadaheva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.37.27-30) --
[03] cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa attano pubbenivaasa.m anussaritvaa dhammasa.mvegena --
[22] sabbaa gatii samucchinnaa, natthi daani punabbhavo''ti.. -- dve gaathaa abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^a^M1.0431^ea^ ^b^sa.msara^eb^nti sa.msaranto, tasmi.m tasmi.m bhave aadaananikkhepavasena aparaapara.m sandhaavanto. ^b^diighamaddhaana^eb^nti cirakaala.m anaadimati sa.msaare aparimaa.nakaala.m. ^b^gatiisuu^eb^ti sukatadukka.taana.m kammaana.m ^a^P2.0081^ea^ vasena sugatiduggatiisu. ^b^parivattisa^eb^nti gha.tiiyanta.m viya paribbhamanto cavanupapajjanavasena aparaapara.m parivatti.m. tassa pana parivattanassa kaara.namaaha ^b^``apassa.m ariyasaccaani, andhabhuuto puthujjano''^eb^ti. dukkhaadiini cattaari ariyasaccaani ~naa.nacakkhunaa apassanto appa.tivijjhanto, tato eva avijjandhataaya andhabhuuto puthuuna.m jananaadiihi kaara.nehi puthujjano honto gatiisu parivattisanti yojanaa, tenevaaha bhagavaa --

[02] ``catunna.m ^a^V1.0367^ea^, bhikkhave, ariyasaccaana.m ananubodhaa appa.tivedhaa evamida.m diighamaddhaana.m sandhaavita.m sa.msarita.m mama~nceva tumhaaka~ncaa''ti (mahaava0 287; dii0 ni0 2.155; sa.m0 ni0 5.1091; netti0 114).

[03] ^b^tassa^eb^ mayha.m vuttanayena pubbe puthujjanasseva sato idaani satthaaraa dinnanayena ^b^appamattassa^eb^ appamaadapa.tipattiyaa samathavipassanaabhaavana.m matthaka.m paapetvaa .thitassa. ^b^sa.msaaraa vina.liikataa^eb^ti sa.msaranti sattaa etehiiti ``sa.msaaraa''ti laddhanaamaa kammakilesaa aggamaggena samucchinnattaa vigatana.laa nimmuulaa kataa. ^b^sabbaa gatii samucchinnaa^eb^ti eva.m kammakilesava.t.taana.m vina.liikatattaa nirayaadikaa sabbaapi gatiyo sammadeva ucchinnaa viddha.msitaa, tato eva ^b^natthi daani^eb^ aayati.m ^b^punabbhavo^eb^ti idameva ca therassa a~n~naabyaakara.na.m ahosiiti.

[03] ^b^assatthe haritobhaase^eb^ti aayasmato sandhitattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto ito ekati.mse kappe sikhissa bhagavato kaale eko gopaalako ahosi. so satthari parinibbute a~n~natara.m thera.m upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^M1.0432^ea^ tassa santike buddhagu.napa.tisa.myutta.m dhamma.m sutvaa pasannamaanaso ``kuhi.m bhagavaa''ti pucchitvaa parinibbutabhaava.m sutvaa ``eva.m mahaanubhaavaa buddhaapi naama aniccataavasa.m gacchanti, aho sa"nkhaaraa addhuvaa''ti aniccasa~n~na.m pa.tilabhi. ta.m thero bodhipuujaaya ussaahesi. so kaalena kaala.m bodhirukkhasamiipa.m gantvaa ^a^P2.0082^ea^ vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa buddhagu.ne anussaranto bodhi.m vandati. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kosalara.t.the ibbhakule nibbattitvaa ^b^sandhito^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto aniccataapa.tisa.myutta.m dhammakatha.m sutvaa sa.mvegajaato pabbajitvaa vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa ~naa.nassa paripaaka.m gatattaa nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. so attano pubbenivaasa.m anussaranto sikhissa bhagavato kaale bodhivandana.m buddhaanussati.m aniccasa~n~naapa.tilaabha~nca anussaritvaa tadupanissayena attano visesaadhigama.m pakaasento --
[22] tassaa sa~n~naaya vaahasaa, patto me aasavakkhayo''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^assatthe^eb^ti assattha.t.thaaniiye, yvaaya.m etarahi amhaaka.m bhagavato bodhirukkho assattho, etassa .thaane tadaa sikhissa bhagavato bodhirukkho pu.n.dariiko .thitoti so assattha.t.thaaniiyataaya ``assatthe''ti vutta.m. sattaana.m assaasajananato vaa. apare pana ``assattharukkhamuule nisiiditvaa tadaa buddhaanussatiyaa bhaavitattaa thero `assatthe'ti avocaa''ti vadanti. ^b^haritobhaase^eb^ti haritehi saarama.niva.n.nehi obhaasamaane. ^b^sa.mviruu.lhamhii^eb^ti su.t.thu viruu.lhe suppati.t.thite, sughananicitapattapalaasapallavehi viruu.lhasa~nchanneti ca vadanti. ^b^paadape^eb^ti rukkhe. ^b^eka.m buddhagata.m sa~n~na.m, alabhittha.m patissato^eb^ti buddhaaramma.na.m ^a^M1.0433^ea^ aaramma.nassa ekajaatiyattaa eka.m ``itipi so bhagavaa''tiaadinayappavatta.m buddhaanussatisahagata.m sa~n~na.m buddhagu.naana.m patipatisara.nato patissato hutvaa alabhi.m.

[01] kadaa pana saa sa~n~naa laddhaa, kiivataaya siddhaati aaha ^b^``ekati.mse ito kappe''^eb^tiaadi. ito bhaddakappato uddha.m aarohanavasena ekati.mse kappe. ^b^ya.m sa~n~na^eb^nti ya.m buddhaanussatisahagata.m sa~n~na.m, ya.m vaa buddhaana.m aniccata.m disvaa tadanusaarena sabbaasa"nkhaaresu tadaa aniccasa~n~na.m alabhi.m. ^b^tassaa sa~n~naaya vaahasaa^eb^ti tassaa yathaavuttaaya sa~n~naaya kaara.nabhaavena ta.m upanissaya.m katvaa. ^b^patto me aasavakkhayo^eb^ti idaani ^a^P2.0083^ea^ mayaa aasavaana.m khayo nirodho adhigatoti imaayeva ca imassa therassa apadaanagaathaapi. yathaaha (apa0 thera 1.22.27-30) --

[03] tikanipaate ^a^M1.0434^ea^ ^a^V1.0369^ea^ ^b^ayoni suddhimanvesa^eb^nti aayasmato a"nga.nikabhaaradvaajattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m pu~n~na.m upacinanto ito ekati.mse kappe sikhissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m pi.n.daaya caranta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso pa~ncapati.t.thitena vanditvaa a~njali.m pagga.nhi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade himavantasamiipe ukka.t.the naama nagare vibhavasampannassa braahma.nassa gehe nibbattitvaa ^b^a"nga.nikabhaaradvaajo^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto vijjaasippesu nipphatti.m gato nekkhammajjhaasayataaya paribbaajakapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa amara.m tapa.m caranto tattha tattha vicaranto sammaasambuddha.m janapadacaarika.m caranta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa ta.m micchaatapa.m pahaaya saasane pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.23.48-51) --

[03] cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa vimuttisukhena viharanto ~naatiina.m anukampaaya attano jaatibhuumi.m gantvaa bahuu ~naatake sara.nesu ca siilesu ca pati.t.thaapetvaa tato nivattitvaa kurura.t.the ku.n.diyassa ^a^V1.0370^ea^ naama nigamassa aviduure ^a^M1.0435^ea^ ara~n~ne vasanto kenacideva kara.niiyena uggaaraama.m gato uttaraapathato aagatehi sandi.t.thehi braahma.nehi ^a^P2.0084^ea^ samaagato tehi, ``bho bhaaradvaaja, ki.m disvaa braahma.naana.m samaya.m pahaaya ima.m samaya.m ga.nhii''ti pucchito tesa.m ito buddhasaasanato bahiddhaa suddhi natthiiti dassento --
[22] suddhimagga.m ajaananto, akaasi.m amara.m tapa''nti.. -- pa.thama.m gaathamaaha.

[03] tattha ^b^ayonii^eb^ti ayoniso anupaayena. ^b^suddhi^eb^nti sa.msaarasuddhi.m bhavanissara.na.m. ^b^anvesa^eb^nti gavesanto. ^b^aggi.m paricari.m vane^eb^ti ``aya.m suddhimaggo''ti adhippaayena ara~n~naayatane aggihutasaalaaya.m agyaagaara.m katvaa aahuti.m pagga.nhanto aggideva.m paricari.m vede vuttavidhinaa puujesi.m. ^b^suddhimagga.m ajaananto, akaasi.m amara.m tapa^eb^nti suddhiyaa nibbaanassa magga.m ajaananto aggiparicara.na.m viya pa~ncatapatappanaadiattakilamathaanuyoga.m ``suddhimaggo''ti ma~n~naaya akaasi.m acari.m pa.tipajji.m.

[03] eva.m thero assamato assama.m gacchanto viya vede vuttavidhinaa aggiparicara.naadinaa anu.t.thaaya suddhiyaa appattabhaavena bahiddhaa suddhiyaa abhaava.m dassetvaa idaani imasmi.myeva saasane suddhi ca mayaa adhigataati dassento --
[22] tisso vijjaa anuppattaa, kata.m buddhassa saasana''nti.. -- dutiyagaathamaaha.

[03] tattha ^b^ta^eb^nti yassatthaaya suddhi.m anvesanto tassa magga.m ajaananto aggi.m paricari.m amara.m tapa.m acari.m, ta.m nibbaana^b^sukha.m sukhena^eb^ samathavipassanaaya sukhaaya pa.tipadaaya attakilamathaanuyoga.m anupagamma mayaa ^b^laddha.m^eb^ patta.m adhigata.m. ^b^passa dhammasudhammata^eb^nti satthu saasanadhammassa sudhammata.m avipariitaniyyaanikadhammasabhaava.m ^a^M1.0436^ea^ passa jaanaahiiti dhammaalapanavasena vadati, attaana.m vaa aalapati. tassa laddhabhaava.m pana dassento --
[25] aaha ^a^V1.0371^ea^, ta.m vuttatthameva. eva.m suddhiyaa adhigatattaa ``ito pa.t.thaayaaha.m paramatthato braahma.no''ti dassento --
[22] tevijjo nhaatakocamhi, sottiyo camhi vedaguu''ti.. -- tatiya.m gaathamaaha.

[03] tassattho -- ito pubbe jaatimattena braahma.nabhaavato braahma.naana.m sama~n~naaya ^b^brahmabandhu^eb^ naama ^b^aasi.m^eb^. baahitapaapattaa pana ^b^idaani kho^eb^ arahattaadhigamena paramatthato ^b^braahma.no ca amhi^eb^. ito pubbe bhavasa~ncayakaraana.m tissanna.m vedasa"nkhaataana.m vijjaana.m ajjhayanena sama~n~naamattena tevijjo naama hutvaa idaani bhavakkhayakaraaya vijjaaya vasena tissanna.m vijjaana.m adhigatattaa paramatthato ^b^tevijjo ca amhi^eb^. tathaa ito pubbe bhavassaadagadhitaaya nhaatakavatanipphattiyaa sama~n~naamattena nhaatako naama hutvaa idaani a.t.tha"ngikamaggajalena suvikkhaalitakilesamalataaya paramatthato ^b^nhaatako camhi^eb^. ito pubbe avimuttabhavassaadamantajjhaanena vohaaramattato sottiyo naama hutvaa idaani suvimuttabhavassaadadhammajjhaanena paramatthato ^b^sottiyo camhi^eb^. ito pubbe appa.tinissa.t.thapaapadhammaana.m vedaana.m gatamattena vedaguu naama hutvaa idaani vedasa"nkhaatena magga~naa.nena sa.msaaramahoghassa vedassa catusaccassa ca paara.m gatattaa adhigatattaa ~naatattaa paramatthato ^b^vedaguu^eb^ jaatoti. ta.m sutvaa braahma.naa saasane u.laara.m pasaada.m pavedesu.m.

[03] ^b^pa~ncaahaaha.m^eb^ ^a^M1.0437^ea^ ^b^pabbajito^eb^ti aayasmato paccayattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe vipassissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m vinataaya naama nadiyaa tiire gacchanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso manu~n~nadassanaani mahantaani udumbaraphalaani ocinitvaa upanaamesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto imasmi.m bhaddakappe kassape bhagavati loke uppajjitvaa pavattavaradhammacakke veneyyajanaanuggaha.m karonte tassa saasane pabbajitvaa vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa bhaavanamanuyu~njanto ekadivasa.m sa.msaaradukkha.m cintetvaa

[25] ativiya ^a^V1.0372^ea^ sa~njaatasa.mvego vihaare nisinno ``arahatta.m appatvaa ito na nikkhamissaamii''ti ^a^P2.0086^ea^ citta.m adhi.t.thaaya vaayamanto ~naa.nassa aparipakkattaa vipassana.m ussukkaapetu.m naasakkhi. so kaala"nkatvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade rohitanagare khattiyakule nibbattitvaa ^b^paccayo^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto pitu accayena rajje pati.t.thito ekadivasa.m mahaaraajabali.m kaatu.m aarabhi. tattha mahaajano sannipati. tasmi.m samaagame tassa pasaada~njananattha.m satthaa mahaajanassa pekkhantasseva aakaase vessava.nena nimmite ratanamayakuu.taagaare ratanamayasiihaasane nisiiditvaa dhamma.m desesi. mahato janakaayassa dhammaabhisamayo ahosi. ta.m dhamma.m sutvaa paccayaraajaapi rajja.m pahaaya purimahetusa~ncodito pabbaji. so yathaa kassapassa bhagavato kaale pa.ti~n~na.m akaasi, eva.m pa.ti~n~na.m katvaa vihaara.m pavisitvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhento ~naa.nassa paripaaka.m gatattaa taavadeva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.39.15-20) --
[22] na vihaaraa nikkhamissa.m, iti katvaana maanasa.m..
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa attano pa.tipattikittanamukhena a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
[22] vihaara.m me pavi.t.thassa, cetaso pa.nidhii ahu..
[22] tisso vijjaa anuppattaa, kata.m buddhassa saasana''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^pa~ncaahaaha.m pabbajito^eb^ti pa~ncaaho aha.m, pabbajito hutvaa pa~ncaaho, pabbajitadivasato pa~ncamo aho ni.t.thitoti attho. ^b^sekho appattamaanaso^eb^ti adhisiilasikkhaadiina.m sikkhanato sekho. anavasesato maana.m siyati samucchindatiiti maanaso, aggamaggo, ta.mnibbattito maanasato aagata.m maanasa.m, arahatta.m, ta.m, so vaa appatto ^a^M1.0439^ea^ etenaati appattamaanaso. ^b^vihaara.m me pavi.t.thassa, cetaso pa.nidhii ahuu^eb^ti eva.m sekhassa me vasanakavihaara.m ovaraka.m pavi.t.thassa sato evaruupo idaani vuccamaanaakaaro cetopa.nidhi ahosi, eva.m mayaa citta.m pa.nihitanti attho.

[03] ^b^naasissa^eb^ntiaadinaa ^a^P2.0087^ea^ cittapa.nidhi.m dasseti. tattha ^b^naasissa^eb^nti ya.mki~nci bhojana.m na bhu~njissa.m na bhu~njissaami ^b^ta.nhaasalle^eb^ mama hadayagate ^b^anuuhate^eb^ anuddhateti eva.m sabbapadesu yojetabba.m. ^b^na pivissaamii^eb^ti ya.mki~nci paatabba.m na pivissaami. ^b^vihaarato na nikkhame^eb^ti imasmaa idaani mayaa nisinnagabbhato na nikkhameyya.m. ^b^napi passa.m nipaatessa^eb^nti mama sariirassa dviisu passesu ekampi passa.m kaayakilamathavinodanattha.m na nipaatessa.m, ekapassenapi na nipajjissaamiiti attho.

[03] ^b^tassa meva.m viharato^eb^ti tassa me eva.m citta.m pa.nidhaaya da.lhaviiriyaadhi.t.thaana.m katvaa vipassanaanuyogavasena viharato. ^b^passa viiriyaparakkama^eb^nti vidhinaa iirayitabbato ``viiriya.m'' para.m .thaana.m akkamanato ``parakkamo''ti ca laddhanaama.m usso.lhiibhuuta.m vaayaama.m passa jaanaahi. yassa panaanubhaavena mayaa ^b^tisso vijjaa anuppattaa, kata.m buddhassa saasana^eb^nti vuttatthameva.

[03] ^b^yo^eb^ ^a^V1.0374^ea^ ^b^pubbe kara.niiyaanii^eb^ti aayasmato baakulattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi kira atiite ito kappasatasahassaadhikassa asa"nkhyeyyassa matthake anomadassissa bhagavato uppattito puretarameva braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvaa tattha saara.m apassanto ``samparaayikattha.m gavesissaamii''ti isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa pabbatapaade viharanto pa~ncaabhi~n~naaa.t.thasamaapattilaabhii hutvaa viharanto buddhuppaada.m sutvaa satthu santika.m gantvaa dhamma.m sutvaa sara.nesu ^a^M1.0440^ea^ pati.t.thito satthu udaraabaadhe uppanne ara~n~nato bhesajjaani aaharitvaa ta.m vuupasametvaa tattha pu~n~na.m aarogyatthaaya pari.naametvaa tato cuto brahmaloke nibbattitvaa eka.m asa"nkhyeyya.m devamanussesu sa.msaranto padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe nibbatto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m appaabaadhaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa saya.m ta.m .thaanantara.m aaka"nkhanto pa.nidhaana.m katvaa yaavajiiva.m kusala.m upacinitvaa sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto vipassissa bhagavato nibbattito puretarameva bandhumatiinagare braahma.nakule nibbatto purimanayeneva isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa jhaanaabhi~n~naalaabhii hutvaa pabbatapaade vasanto buddhuppaada.m sutvaa satthu santika.m gantvaa dhamma.m sutvaa sara.nesu ^a^P2.0088^ea^ pati.t.thito bhikkhuuna.m ti.napupphakaroge uppanne ta.m vuupasametvaa tattha yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa tato cuto brahmaloke nibbattitvaa ekanavutikappe devamanussesu sa.msaranto kassapassa bhagavato kaale baaraa.nasiya.m kulagehe nibbattitvaa gharaavaasa.m vasanto eka.m ji.n.na.m vinassamaana.m mahaavihaara.m disvaa tattha uposathaagaaraadika.m sabba.m aavasatha.m kaaretvaa tattha bhikkhusa"nghassa sabba.m bhesajja.m pa.tiyaadetvaa yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa eka.m buddhantara.m devamanussesu sa.msaranto amhaaka.m bhagavato uppattito puretarameva kosambiya.m se.t.thigehe nibbatti. so arogabhaavaaya mahaayamunaaya nhaapiyamaano dhaatiyaa hatthato macchena gilito macche keva.t.tahatthagate baaraa.nasise.t.thibhariyaaya vikki.nitvaa gahite phaaliyamaanepi pu~n~nabalena arogoyeva hutvaa taaya puttoti gahetvaa posiyamaano ta.m pavatti.m sutvaa janakehi maataapituuhi ``aya.m amhaaka.m putto, detha no putta''nti anuyoge kate ra~n~naa ``ubhayesampi saadhaara.no hotuu''ti dvinna.m kulaana.m daayaadabhaavena vinicchaya.m katvaa .thapitattaa ^b^baakulo^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto hutvaa mahati.m sampatti.m anubhavanto aasiitiko hutvaa satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa sattaahameva puthujjano ahosi, a.t.thame aru.ne saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.40.386-411) --
[22] kapitthaa ca bahuu tattha, pupphitaa jiivajiivakaa..
[22] phaarusakaa alaabuu ca, pu.n.dariikaa ca pupphitaa..
[22] mahaanaamaa bahuu tattha, ajjunaa ca piya"ngukaa..
[22] ediso assamo mayha.m, sasissoha.m tahi.m vasi.m..
[21] ``yo me paadaasi bhesajja.m, byaadhi~nca samayii mama.
[22] vaadite tuuriye tattha, modissati sadaa aya.m..
[22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
[22] baakulo naama naamena, hessati satthu saavako..
[22] khepetu.m neva sakkomi, tadaa hi sukata.m mama..
[21] ``laabhaa mama suladdha.m me, yoha.m addakkhi naayaka.m.

[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa ekadivasa.m satthaaraa attano saavake pa.tipaa.tiyaa .thaanantare .thapentena appaabaadhaana.m ^a^V1.0377^ea^ agga.t.thaane .thapito so parinibbaanasamaye sa"nghamajjhe bhikkhuuna.m ovaadamukhena a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
[22] sukhaa so dha.msate .thaanaa, pacchaa ca manutappati..
[21] ``ya~nhi kayiraa ta~nhi vade, ya.m na kayiraa na ta.m vade.
[22] asoka.m viraja.m khema.m, yattha dukkha.m nirujjhatii''ti.. -- gaathaattayamabhaasi.

[03] tattha ^a^P2.0089^ea^ ^b^yo pubbe kara.niiyaani, pacchaa so kaatumicchatii^eb^ti yo puggalo pubbe puretara.m jaraarogaadiihi anabhibhuutakaaleyeva kaatabbaani attano hitasukhaavahaani kammaani pamaadavasena akatvaa pacchaa so kaatabbakaala.m atikkamitvaa kaatu.m icchati. ^b^so^eb^ti ca nipaatamatta.m. tadaa pana jaraarogaadiihi abhibhuutattaa kaatu.m na sakkoti, asakkonto ca ^b^sukhaa so dha.msate .thaanaa, pacchaa ca manutappatii^eb^ti so puggalo sukhaa ^a^M1.0444^ea^ .thaanaa saggato nibbaanato ca tadupaayassa anuppaaditattaa parihaayanto ``akata.m me kalyaa.na''ntiaadinaa (ma0 ni0 3.248; netti0 120) pacchaa ca anutappati vippa.tisaara.m aapajjati. ^b^ma^eb^-kaaro padasandhikaro. aha.m pana kara.niiya.m katvaa eva tumhe eva.m vadaamiiti dassento ^b^``ya~nhi kayiraa''^eb^ti dutiya.m gaathamaaha.

[03] tattha ^b^parijaanantii^eb^ti ``ettako aya''nti paricchijja jaananti na bahu.m ma~n~nantiiti attho. sammaapa.tipattivasena hi yathaavaadii tathaakaarii eva sobhati, na tato a~n~nathaa. kara.niiyapariyaayena saadhaara.nato vuttamattha.m idaani saruupato dassetu.m ^b^``susukha.m vataa''^eb^tiaadinaa tatiya.m gaathamaaha. tassattho -- sammaa saama.m sabbadhammaana.m buddhattaa ^b^sammaasambuddhena^eb^ bhagavataa ^b^desita.m^eb^ sabbaso sokahetuuna.m abhaavato ^b^asoka.m^eb^ vigataraagaadirajattaa ^b^viraja.m^eb^ catuuhi yogehi anupaddutattaa ^b^khema.m^eb^ nibbaana.m su.t.thu ^b^sukha.m vata,^eb^ kasmaa? ^b^yattha^eb^ yasmi.m nibbaane sakala.m ^b^va.t.tadukkha.m nirujjhati^eb^ accantameva vuupasamatiiti.

[03] ^b^sukha~nce^eb^ ^a^V1.0378^ea^ ^b^jiivitu.m icche^eb^ti aayasmato dhaniyattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m disvaa pasannamaanaso na.lamaalaaya puuja.m akaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe kumbhakaarakule nibbattitvaa ^b^dhaniyo^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto kumbhakaarakammena jiivati. tena ca samayena satthaa dhaniyassa kumbhakaarassa saalaaya.m nisiiditvaa pukkusaatissa kulaputtassa ^b^chadhaatuvibha"ngasutta.m^eb^ (ma0 ni0 3.342 aadayo) desesi. so ta.m sutvaa katakicco ahosi. dhaniyo tassa parinibbutabhaava.m sutvaa ``niyyaanika.m vata buddhasaasana.m, yattha ekarattiparicayenaapi va.t.tadukkhato mu~ncitu.m sakkaa''ti pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa ^a^P2.0090^ea^ ku.tima.n.danaanuyutto ^a^M1.0445^ea^ viharanto ku.tikara.na.m pa.ticca bhagavataa garahito sa"nghike senaasane vasanto vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.48.1-7) --
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa ye bhikkhuu dhuta"ngasamaadhaanena attaana.m ukka.msetvaa sa"nghabhattaadi.m saadiyante a~n~ne bhikkhuu avajaananti, tesa.m ovaadadaanamukhena a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
[22] itariitarena tusseyya, ekadhamma~nca bhaavaye''ti.. -- tisso gaathaa abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^sukha~nce jiivitu.m icche, saama~n~nasmi.m apekkhavaa^eb^ti saama~n~nasmi.m sama.nabhaave apekkhavaa sikkhaaya tibbagaaravo hutvaa sukha.m jiivitu.m iccheyya ce, anesana.m pahaaya saama~n~nasukhena sace jiivitukaamoti attho ^a^M1.0446^ea^. ^b^sa"nghika.m naatima~n~neyya, ciivara.m paanabhojana^eb^nti sa"nghato aabhata.m ciivara.m aahaara.m na avama~n~neyya, sa"nghassa uppajjanakalaabho naama parisuddhuppaado hotiiti ta.m paribhu~njantassa aajiivapaarisuddhisambhavena saama~n~nasukha.m hatthagatamevaati adhippaayo. ^b^ahi muusikasobbha.mvaa^eb^ti ahi viya muusikaaya khatabila.m ^b^sevetha^eb^ seveyya senaasana.m. yathaa naama sappo sayamattano aasaya.m akatvaa muusikaaya a~n~nena vaa kate aasaye vasitvaa yena kaama.m pakkamati, evameva.m bhikkhu saya.m senaasanakara.naa sa.mkilesa.m anaapajjitvaa yattha katthaci vasitvaa pakkameyyaati attho.

[03] idaani vutte avutte ca paccaye yathaalaabhasantoseneva saama~n~nasukha.m hoti, na a~n~nathaati dassento aaha ^b^``itariitarena tusseyyaa''^eb^ti, yena kenaci hiinena vaa pa.niitena vaa yathaaladdhena paccayena santosa.m aapajjeyyaati attho. ^b^ekadhamma^eb^nti appamaadabhaava.m, ta~nhi anuyu~njantassa anavajja.m sabba.m lokiyasukha.m lokuttarasukha~nca hatthagatameva hoti. tenaaha bhagavaa -- ``appamatto hi jhaayanto, pappoti vipula.m sukha''nti (ma0 ni0 2.352; dha0 pa0 27).

[03] ^b^atisiita^eb^nti ^a^P2.0091^ea^ aayasmato maata"ngaputtattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale himavantasamiipe mahato jaatassarassa he.t.thaa mahati naagabhavane mahaanubhaavo naagaraajaa hutvaa nibbatto ekadivasa.m naagabhavanato nikkhamitvaa vicaranto satthaara.m aakaasena gacchanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso attano siisama.ninaa puuja.m akaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kosalara.t.the maata"ngassa naama ku.tumbikassa putto ^a^V1.0380^ea^ hutvaa nibbatto ^a^M1.0447^ea^ ^b^maata"ngaputto^eb^tveva pa~n~naayittha. so vi~n~nuta.m patto alasajaatiko hutvaa ki~nci kamma.m akaronto ~naatakehi a~n~nehi ca garahito ``sukhajiivino ime sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa''ti sukhajiivita.m aaka"nkhanto bhikkhuuhi kataparicayo hutvaa satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa a~n~ne bhikkhuu iddhimante disvaa iddhibala.m patthetvaa satthu santike kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa bhaavana.m anuyu~njanto cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.48.8-29) --
[22] tattha me bhavana.m aasi, pu~n~nakammena sa.myuta.m..
[22] saka.m citta.m pasaadetvaa, avandi.m satthuno aha.m..
[21] ``so te ijjhatu sa"nkappo, labhassu vipula.m sukha.m.
[22] bha.n.daa me sukataa honti, yadicchasi pi.landhanaa..
[22] divasa~nceva ratti~nca, aaloko hoti me sadaa..
[03] cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa puggalaadhi.t.thaanavasena kosajja.m garahanto attano ca viiriyaarambha.m kittento --
[21] ``yo ca siita~nca u.nha~nca, ti.naa bhiyyo na ma~n~nati.
[22] kara.m purisakiccaani, so sukhaa na vihaayati..

[01] tattha ^b^atisiita^eb^nti himapaatavaddalaadinaa ativiya siita.m, ^b^ida.m ahuu^eb^ti aanetvaa sambandho. ^b^atiu.nha^eb^nti dhammaparitaapaadinaa ativiya u.nha.m, ubhayenapi utuvasena kosajjavatthumaaha. ^b^atisaaya^eb^nti divasassa pari.natiyaa atisaaya.m, saayaggaha.neneva cettha paatopi sa"ngayhati ^a^P1.0092^ea^, tadubhayena kaalavasena kosajjavatthumaaha. ^b^itii^eb^ti iminaa pakaarena. etena ``idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa kamma.m kattabba.m hotii''tiaadinaa (a0 ni0 8.80; dii0 ni0 3.334) vutta.m kosajjavatthu.m ^a^V1.0382^ea^ sa"nga.nhaati. ^b^vissa.t.thakammante^eb^ti pariccattayogakammante. ^b^kha.naa^eb^ti buddhuppaadaadayo brahmacariyavaasassa okaasaa. ^b^accentii^eb^ti atikkamanti. ^b^maa.nave^eb^ti satte. ^b^ti.naa bhiyyo na ma~n~natii^eb^ti ti.nato upari na ma~n~nati, ti.na.m viya ma~n~nati, siitu.nhaani abhibhavitvaa attanaa kattabba.m karoti. ^b^kara^eb^nti karonto. ^b^purisakiccaanii^eb^ti viirapurisena kattabbaani attahitaparahitaani. ^b^sukhaa^eb^ti sukhato, nibbaanasukhatoti adhippaayo. tatiyagaathaaya attho he.t.thaa vuttoyeva.

[03] ^b^ye cittakathii bahussutaa^eb^ti aayasmato khujjasobhitattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m bhagavanta.m mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m gacchanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso dasahi gaathaahi abhitthavi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade paa.taliputtanagare braahma.nakule nibbatti, ``sobhito''tissa naama.m ^a^M1.0450^ea^ ahosi. thoka.m khujjadhaatukataaya pana ^b^khujjasobhito^eb^tveva pa~n~naayittha. so vayappatto satthari parinibbute aanandattherassa santike pabbajitvaa cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.47.49-58) --
[22] rathiya.m pa.tipajjanta.m, ko disvaa na pasiidati..
[22] uddharanta.m bahuu satte, ko disvaa na pasiidati..
[22] siihanaada.m vinadanta.m, ko disvaa na pasiidati..
[22] pucchanti nipu.ne pa~nhe, ko disvaa na pasiidati..
[22] tena pu~n~na.m anubhonti, ko disvaa na pasiidati..
[22] na vikampati ajjhi.t.tho, ko disvaa na pasiidati..
[22] vinadanti gajaa mattaa, ko disvaa na pasiidati..
[22] abbhunnataa samaa honti, ko disvaa na pasiidati..
[22] sabbe satte vi~n~naapeti, ko disvaa na pasiidati..

[01] cha.labhi~n~no ^a^M1.0451^ea^ pana hutvaa pa.thamamahaasa"ngiitikaale raajagahe sattapa.n.niguhaaya.m sannipatitena sa"nghena ``aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantehii''ti aa.natto pathaviya.m nimujjitvaa therassa purato u.t.thahitvaa sa"nghassa saasana.m aarocetvaa saya.m puretara.m aakaasena gantvaa sattapa.n.niguhaadvaara.m sampaapu.ni. tena ca samayena maarassa maarakaayikaana~nca pa.tisedhanattha.m devasa"nghena pesitaa a~n~nataraa devataa sattapa.n.niguhaadvaare .thitaa hoti, tassaa khujjasobhito thero attano aagamana.m kathento --
[22] tesa~n~nataroyamaayuvaa, dvaare ti.t.thati khujjasobhito''ti.. -- pa.thama.m gaathamaaha.

[03] tattha ^b^cittakathii^eb^ti vicittadhammakathikaa, sa"nkhipana.m, vitthaara.na.m gambhiirakara.na.m uttaaniikara.na.m ka"nkhaavinodana.m dhammapati.t.thaapananti evamaadiihi naanaanayehi paresa.m ajjhaasayaanuruupa.m dhammassa kathanasiilaati attho. ^b^bahussutaa^eb^ti pariyattipa.tivedhabaahusaccapaaripuuriyaa bahussutaa. sabbaso samitapaapataaya ^b^sama.naa. paa.taliputtavaasino, tesa~n~nataro^eb^ti paa.taliputtanagaravaasitaaya paa.taliputtavaasino, tesa.m a~n~nataro, ^b^aya.m aayuvaa^eb^ diighaayu aayasmaa. ^b^dvaare ti.t.thatii^eb^ti sattapa.n.niguhaaya dvaare ti.t.thati, sa"nghassa anumatiyaa pavisitunti attho. ta.m sutvaa saa devataa therassa aagamana.m sa"nghassa nivedentii --
[21] ``ye ^a^V1.0384^ea^ cittakathii...pe0... dvaare ti.t.thati maaluterito''ti.. -- dutiya.m gaathamaaha.
[03] tattha ^b^maaluterito^eb^ti iddhicittajanitena vaayunaa erito, iddhibalena aagatoti attho.
[03] eva.m ^a^M1.0452^ea^ taaya devataaya niveditena sa"nghena katokaaso thero sa"nghassa santika.m gacchanto --

[03] tattha ^b^suyuddhenaa^eb^ti pubbabhaage tada"ngavikkhambhanappahaanavasena kilesehi su.t.thu yujjhanena. ^b^suyi.t.thenaa^eb^ti antarantaraa kalyaa.namittehi dinnasappaayadhammadaanena. ^b^sa"ngaamavijayena caa^eb^ti samucchedappahaanavasena sabbaso kilesaabhisa"nkhaaranimmathanena laddhasa"ngaamavijayena ca. ^b^brahmacariyaanuci.n.nenaa^eb^ti anuci.n.nena aggamaggabrahmacariyena. ^b^evaaya.m sukhamedhatii^eb^ti eva.m vuttappakaarena aya.m khujjasobhito nibbaanasukha.m phalasamaapattisukha~nca edhati, anubhavatiiti attho.

[03] ^b^yodha koci manussesuu^eb^ti aayasmato vaara.nattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani karonto ito dvaanavute kappe tissassa bhagavato uppattito puretarameva ^a^P2.0094^ea^ braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa braahma.naana.m vijjaasippesu paaraguu hutvaa isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa catupa.n.naasasahassaana.m antevaasikaana.m mante vaacento vasati. tena ca samayena tissassa bhagavato bodhisattabhuutassa tusitaa kaayaa cavitvaa carimabhave maatukucchi.m okkamanena mahaapathavikampo ahosi. ta.m disvaa mahaajano bhiito sa.mviggo na.m isi.m upasa"nkamitvaa pathavikampanakaara.na.m pucchi. so ``mahaabodhisatto maatukucchi.m okkami, tenaaya.m pathavikampo, tasmaa maa bhaayathaa''ti buddhuppaadassa pubbanimittabhaava.m kathetvaa samassaasesi, buddhaaramma.na~nca piiti.m pa.tivedesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu ^a^M1.0453^ea^ sa.msaranto imasmi.m ^a^V1.0385^ea^ buddhuppaade kosalara.t.the braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^vaara.no^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto a~n~natarassa aara~n~nakassa therassa santike dhamma.m sutvaa laddhappasaado pabbajitvaa sama.nadhamma.m karoti. so ekadivasa.m buddhupa.t.thaana.m gacchanto antaraamagge ahinakule a~n~nama~n~na.m kalaha.m katvaa kaala"nkate disvaa ``ime sattaa a~n~nama~n~navirodhena jiivitakkhaya.m pattaa''ti sa.mviggamaanaso hutvaa bhagavato santika.m gato, tassa bhagavaa cittaacaara.m ~natvaa tadanuruupameva ovaada.m dento --
[22] asmaa lokaa paramhaa ca, ubhayaa dha.msate naro..
[22] bahu~nhi so pasavati, pu~n~na.m taadisako naro..
[22] ekaasanassa ca raho, cittavuupasamassaa caa''ti.. -- tisso gaathaa abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^yodha koci manussesuu^eb^ti idha manussesu yo koci khattiyo vaa braahma.no vaa vesso vaa suddo vaa gaha.t.tho vaa pabbajito vaa. manussaggaha.na~ncettha ukka.t.thasattanidassananti da.t.thabba.m. ^b^parapaa.naani hi.msatii^eb^ti parasatte maareti vibaadhati ca. ^b^asmaa lokaa^eb^ti idha lokato. ^b^paramhaa^eb^ti paralokato. ^b^ubhayaa dha.msate^eb^ti ubhayato dha.msati, ubhayalokapariyaapannahitasukhato parihaayatiiti attho. ^b^naro^eb^ti satto.

[03] eva.m parapii.laalakkha.na.m paapadhamma.m dassetvaa idaani parapii.laanivattilakkha.na.m kusala.m dhamma.m dassento ^b^``yo ca mettenaa''^eb^tiaadinaa dutiya.m gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^mettena cittenaa^eb^ti mettaasampayuttena cittena appanaapattena itariitarena vaa. ^b^sabbapaa.naanukampatii^eb^ti sabbe paa.ne attano orasaputte viya mettaayati. ^b^bahu~nhi so pasavati, pu~n~na.m taadisako naro^eb^ti ^a^P2.0095^ea^ so tathaaruupo mettaavihaarii puggalo bahu.m mahanta.m anappaka.m kusala.m pasavati pa.tilabhati adhigacchati.

[01] idaani ^a^M1.0454^ea^ ta.m sasambhaare samathavipassanaadhamme niyojento ^b^``subhaasitassaa''^eb^tiaadinaa tatiya.m gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^subhaasitassa sikkhethaa^eb^ti appicchakathaadibheda.m subhaasita.m pariyattidhamma.m savanadhaara.naparipucchaadivasena sikkheyya. ^b^sama.nuupaasanassa caa^eb^ti samitapaapaana.m sama.naana.m kalyaa.namittaana.m upaasakaana.m kaalena kaala.m upasa"nkamitvaa payirupaasana~nceva pa.tipattiyaa tesa.m samiipacariya~nca ^a^V1.0386^ea^ sikkheyya. ^b^ekaasanassa ca raho cittavuupasamassa caa^eb^ti ekassa asahaayassa kaayaviveka.m anubruuhantassa raho kamma.t.thaanaanuyogavasena aasana.m nisajja.m sikkheyya. eva.m kamma.t.thaana.m anuyu~njanto bhaavana~nca matthaka.m paapento samucchedavasena kilesaana.m cittassa vuupasama~nca sikkheyya. yaahi adhisiilasikkhaadiihi kilesaa accantameva vuupasantaa pahiinaa honti, taa maggaphalasikkhaa sikkhantassa accantameva citta.m vuupasanta.m naama hotiiti. gaathaapariyosaane vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.47.59-72) --
[21] ``avacaasi.m ^a^M1.0455^ea^ tadaa tesa.m, maa bhetha natthi vo bhaya.m.
[22] tathaa nimittaa dissanti, obhaaso vipulo mahaa..

[03] ^b^ekopi^eb^ ^a^V1.0387^ea^ ^b^saddho medhaavii^eb^ti aayasmato vassikattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani karonto atthadassissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m disvaa pasannacitto pilakkhaphalaani adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kosalara.t.the braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^vassiko^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto satthu yamakapaa.tihaariya.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa sama.nadhamma.m karonto aabaadhiko ahosi. atha na.m ~naatakaa vejjaparidi.t.thena bhesajjavidhinaa upa.t.thahitvaa arogamaka.msu. so tamhaa aabaadhaa vu.t.thito sa.mvegajaato bhaavana.m ussukkaapetvaa cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.47.40-44) --

[03] cha.labhi~n~no ^a^P2.0096^ea^ pana hutvaa aakaasena ~naatakaana.m santike gantvaa aakaase .thito dhamma.m desetvaa te sara.nesu siilesu ca pati.t.thaapesi. tesu keci kaala"nkataa sara.nesu siilesu ca pati.t.thitattaa sagge nibbatti.msu. atha na.m satthaa buddhupa.t.thaana.m upagata.m ``ki.m te, vassika, ~naatiina.m aarogya''nti pucchi. so ~naatiina.m attanaa kata.m upakaara.m satthu kathento --
[21] ``te abbhatiitaa kaala"nkataa, pattaa te tidiva.m sukha.m.
[22] bhaataro mayha.m maataa ca, modanti kaamakaamino''ti.. --

[03] tatthaaya.m ^a^V1.0388^ea^ pa.thamagaathaaya attho -- yo kammaphalasaddhaaya ca ratanattayasaddhaaya ca vasena ^b^saddho,^eb^ tato eva kammassakata~naa.naadiyogato ^b^medhaavii,^eb^ satthu ovaadadhamme navalokuttaradhamme ca .thitattaa ^b^dhamma.t.tho,^eb^ aacaarasiilassa maggasiilassa phalasiilassa ca vasena ^b^siilasampanno,^eb^ so ^b^ekopi^eb^ yathaavuttaaya saddhaaya abhaavena ^b^assaddhaana.m idha^eb^ imasmi.m loke ``amhaaka.m ime''ti ~naatabba.t.thena ^b^~naatiina.m,^eb^ tathaa pemabandhanena bandhana.t.thena ^b^``bandhuu''^eb^ti ca laddhanaamaana.m bandhavaana.m ^b^atthaaya^eb^ hitaaya ^b^hotii^eb^ti.

[03] eva.m ^a^M1.0457^ea^ saadhaara.nato vuttamattha.m attuupanaayika.m katvaa dassetu.m ^b^``niggayhaa''^eb^tiaadinaa itaragaathaa vuttaa. tattha ^b^niggayha anukampaaya, coditaa ~naatayo mayaa^eb^ti idaanipi duggataa kusala.m akatvaa aayati.m parikkilesa.m puna maanubhavitthaati niggahetvaa ~naatayo mayaa ovaditaa. ^b^~naatibandhavapemena^eb^ ``amhaaka.m aya.m bandhavo''ti eva.m pavattena pemena mama ovaada.m atikkamitu.m asakkontaa ^b^kaara.m katvaana bhikkhuusu^eb^ pasannacittaa hutvaa ciivaraadipaccayadaanena ceva upa.t.thaanena ca bhikkhuusu sakkaarasammaana.m katvaa ^b^te abbhatiitaa kaala"nkataa^eb^ hutvaa ima.m loka.m atikkantaa. puna ^b^te^eb^ti nipaatamatta.m. ^b^tidiva.m sukha^eb^nti devalokapariyaapannasukha.m, sukha.m vaa i.t.tha.m tidiva.m adhigataa. ``ke pana te''ti aaha. ``^b^bhaataro mayha.m maataa ca, modanti kaamakaamino''^eb^ti. attanaa yathaakaamitavatthukaamasama"ngino hutvaa abhiramantiiti attho.

[03] ^b^kaalapabba"ngasa"nkaaso^eb^ti ^a^P2.0097^ea^ aayasmato yasojattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kaale aaraamagopakakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m vipassi.m bhagavanta.m aakaasena gacchanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso labujaphala.m adaasi.

[03] so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthinagaradvaare keva.t.tagaame pa~ncakulasataje.t.thakassa keva.t.tassa putto hutvaa nibbatti, ^b^yasojo^eb^tissa naama.m aka.msu. so vayappatto attano sahaayehi keva.t.taputtehi saddhi.m macchagaha.nattha.m aciravatiya.m nadiya.m jaala.m khipi. tattheko suva.n.nava.n.no mahaamaccho antojaala.m paavisi. ta.m te ra~n~no pasenadissa dassesu.m ^a^V1.0389^ea^. raajaa ``imassa suva.n.nava.n.nassa macchassa va.n.nakaara.na.m bhagavaa jaanaatii''ti maccha.m gaahaapetvaa bhagavato ^a^M1.0458^ea^ dassesi. bhagavaa ``aya.m kassapassa sammaasambuddhassa saasane osakkamaane pabbajitvaa micchaa pa.tipajjanto saasana.m osakkaapetvaa niraye nibbatto eka.m buddhantara.m niraye paccitvaa tato cuto aciravatiya.m maccho hutvaa nibbatto''ti vatvaa tassa bhaginiina~nca niraye nibbattabhaava.m, tassa bhaatikattherassa parinibbutabhaava~nca teneva kathaapetvaa imissaa a.t.thuppattiyaa ^b^kapilasutta.m^eb^ desesi.

[03] satthu desana.m sutvaa yasojo sa.mvegajaato saddhi.m attano sahaayehi bhagavato santike pabbajitvaa patiruupe .thaane vasanto ekadivasa.m sapariso bhagavanta.m vanditu.m jetavana.m agamaasi. tassa aagamane senaasanapa~n~naapanaadinaa vihaare uccaasaddamahaasaddo ahosi. ta.m sutvaa ``bhagavaa saparisa.m yasoja.m pa.naamesii''ti (udaa0 23) sabba.m udaane aagatanayena veditabba.m. pa.naamito pana aayasmaa yasojo kasaabhihato bhaddo assaajaaniiyo viya sa.mviggamaanaso saddhi.m parisaaya vaggumudaaya nadiyaa tiire vasanto gha.tento vaayamanto vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa antovasseyeva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.47.32-39) --

[03] cha.labhi~n~na.m ^a^M1.0459^ea^ pana samaana.m saparisa.m aayasmanta.m yasoja.m satthaa pakkositvaa aane~njasamaapattinaa pa.tisanthaaramakaasi. so sabbepi ^a^P2.0098^ea^ dhuta"ngadhamme samaadaaya vattati. tenassa sariira.m kisa.m ahosi luukha.m dubba.n.na.m, ta.m bhagavaa paramappicchataaya pasa.msanto --
[22] matta~n~nuu annapaanamhi, adiinamaanaso naro''ti.. -- pa.thama.m gaathamaaha.

[03] tattha ^b^kaalapabba"ngasa"nkaaso^eb^ti ma.msuupacayavigamena kisadusa.n.thitasariiraavayavataaya dantilataapabbasadisa"ngo, tenaaha ^b^``kiso dhamanisanthato''^eb^ti. ^b^kiso^eb^ti moneyyapa.tipadaapuura.nena kisasariiro. ^b^dhamanisanthato^eb^ti dhamaniihi santhatagatto appama.msalohitataaya paaka.tiihi ka.n.darasiraahi vitatasariiro. ^b^matta~n~nuu^eb^ti pariyesanapa.tiggaha.naparibhogavissajjanesu pamaa.na~n~nuu. ^b^adiinamaanaso^eb^ti kosajjaadiihi anabhibhuutattaa aliinacitto akusiitavutti. ^b^naro^eb^ti puriso, porisassa dhurassa vahanato porisalakkha.nasampanno purisadhorayhoti adhippaayo.
[03] eva.m thero satthaaraa pasa.t.tho pasa.t.thabhaavaanuruupa.m attano adhivaasanakhantiviiriyaarambhavivekaabhiratikittanamukhena bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m kathento --
[21] ``yathaa brahmaa tathaa eko, yathaa devo tathaa duve.
[22] yathaa gaamo tathaa tayo, kolaahala.m tatuttari''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^naago sa"ngaamasiisevaa^eb^ti yathaa naama aajaaneyyo hatthinaago yuddhama.n.dale asisattitomaraadippahaare adhivaasetvaa parasena.m viddha.mseti, eva.m bhikkhu ^b^ara~n~nasmi.m brahaavane^eb^ ara~n~naaniya.m .da.msaadiparissaye ^b^sato^eb^ ^a^M1.0460^ea^ sampajaano adhivaaseyya, adhivaasetvaa ca bhaavanaabalena maarabala.m vidhameyya.

[01] ^b^yathaa brahmaa^eb^ti yathaa brahmaa ekako cittappakoparahito jhaanasukhena niccameva sukhito viharati ^b^tathaa eko^eb^ti bhikkhupi eko adutiyo vivekasukhamanubruuhento sukha.m viharati. ekassa saama~n~nasukha.m pa.niitanti hi vutta.m. etena ekavihaarii bhikkhu ``brahmasamo''ti ovaada.m deti. ^b^yathaa devo tathaa duve^eb^ti yathaa devaana.m antarantaraa ^a^P2.0099^ea^ cittappakopopi siyaa, tathaa dvinna.m bhikkhuuna.m sahavaase gha.t.tanaapi bhaveyyaati sadutiyavaasena bhikkhu ``devasamo''ti vutto. ^b^yathaa gaamo tathaa tayo^eb^ti asmimeva paa.the ti.n.na.m bhikkhuuna.m sahavaaso gaamavaasasadiso vivekavaaso na hotiiti adhippaayo ^a^V1.0391^ea^. ^b^kolaahala.m tatuttari^eb^nti tato tayato upari ca bahuuna.m sa.mvaaso kolaahala.m uccaasaddamahaasaddamahaajanasannipaatasadiso, tasmaa ekavihaarinaa bhavitabbanti adhippaayoti.

[03] ^b^ahu tuyha.m pure saddhaa^eb^ti aayasmato saa.timattiyattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m disvaa pasannamaanaso taalava.n.ta.m adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade magadhara.t.the braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^saa.timattiyo^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto hetusampannataaya aara~n~nakabhikkhuuna.m santike pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.38.43-47) --

[03] cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa bhikkhuu ovadati anusaasati bahuu ca satte dhamma.m kathetvaa sara.nesu ca siilesu ca pati.t.thaapesi. a~n~natara~nca kula.m assaddha.m appasanna.m saddha.m pasanna.m akaasi. tena tasmi.m kule manussaa there abhippasannaa ahesu.m. tatthekaa daarikaa abhiruupaa dassaniiyaa thera.m pi.n.daaya pavi.t.tha.m sakkacca.m bhojanena parivisati. athekadivasa.m maaro ``eva.m imassa ayaso va.d.dhissati, appati.t.tho bhavissatii''ti cintetvaa therassa ruupena gantvaa ta.m daarika.m hatthe aggahesi. daarikaa ``naaya.m manussasamphasso''ti ca a~n~naasi, hattha~nca mu~ncaapesi. ta.m disvaa gharajano there appasaada.m janesi. punadivase thero ta.m kaara.na.m anaavajjento ta.m ghara.m agamaasi. tattha manussaa anaadara.m aka.msu. thero ta.m kaara.na.m aavajjento maarassa kiriya.m disvaa ``tassa giivaaya.m kukkuraku.napa.m pa.timu~ncatuu''ti adhi.t.thahitvaa ^a^V1.0392^ea^ tassa mocanattha.m upagatena maarena atiitadivase katakiriya.m ^a^P2.0100^ea^ kathaapetvaa ta.m tajjetvaa vissajjesi. ta.m disvaa gharasaamiko ``khamatha, bhante, accaya''nti khamaapetvaa ``ajjatagge ahameva, bhante, tumhe upa.t.thahaamii''ti aaha. thero tassa dhamma.m kathento --
[21] ``ahu tuyha.m pure saddhaa, saa te ajja na vijjati.
[22] ya.m tuyha.m tuyhameveta.m, natthi duccarita.m mama..
[21] ``aniccaa hi calaa saddhaa, eva.m di.t.thaa hi saa mayaa.
[22] rajjantipi virajjanti, tattha ki.m jiyyate muni..
[21] ``paccati munino bhatta.m, thoka.m thoka.m kule kule.

[03] tattha ^a^M1.0462^ea^ ^b^ahu tuyha.m pure saddhaa, saa te ajja na vijjatii^eb^ti, upaasaka, ito pubbe tava mayi ``ayyo dhammacaarii samacaarii''tiaadinaa saddhaa ahosi, saa saddhaa te tava ajja idaani na upalabbhati. tasmaa ^b^ya.m tuyha.m tuyhameveta^eb^nti catupaccayadaana.m, tuyhameva eta.m hotu, na tena mayha.m attho, sammaa pasannacittena hi daana.m naama daatabbanti adhippaayo. atha vaa ^b^ya.m tuyha.m tuyhameveta^eb^nti ya.m tava mayi ajja agaarava.m pavatta.m, ta.m tuyhameva, tassa phala.m tayaa eva paccanubhavitabba.m, na mayaati attho. ^b^natthi duccarita.m mamaa^eb^ti mama pana duccarita.m naama natthi maggeneva duccaritahetuuna.m kilesaana.m samucchinnattaa.

[03] ^b^aniccaa hi calaa saddhaa^eb^ti yasmaa pothujjanikaa saddhaa aniccaa ekantikaa na hoti, tato eva calaa assapi.t.the .thapitakumbha.n.da.m viya, thusaraasimhi nikhaatakhaa.nuka.m viya ca anava.t.thitaa. ^b^eva.m di.t.thaa hi saa mayaa^eb^ti eva.m bhuutaa ca saa saddhaa mayaa tayi di.t.thaa paccakkhato viditaa. ^b^rajjantipi virajjantii^eb^ti eva.m tassaa anava.t.thitattaa eva ime sattaa kadaaci katthaci mittasanthavavasena rajjanti sinehampi karonti, kadaaci virajjanti virattacittaa honti. ^b^tattha ki.m jiyyate munii^eb^ti tasmi.m puthujjanaana.m rajjane virajjane ca muni pabbajito ki.m jiyyati, kaa tassa haaniiti attho.

[03] ``sace mama paccaye na ga.nhatha, katha.m tumhe yaapethaa''ti eva.m maa cintayiiti dassento ^b^``paccatii''^eb^ti gaathamaaha. tassattho ^b^munino^eb^ pabbajitassa ^b^bhatta.m^eb^ naama ^b^kule kule^eb^ anughara.m divase divase ^a^V1.0393^ea^ ^b^thoka.m thoka.m^eb^ paccate, na ca tuyha.m eva gehe. ^b^pi.n.dikaaya carissaami, atthi ja"nghabala.m mamaa^eb^ti atthi me ja"nghabala.m, naaha.m obhaggaja"ngho na kha~njo na ca paadarogii, tasmaa ^a^P2.0101^ea^ pi.n.dikaaya missakabhikkhaaya carissaami, ``yathaapi bhamaro puppha''ntiaadinaa (dha0 pa0 49; netti0 123) satthaaraa vuttanayena pi.n.daaya caritvaa yaapessaamiiti dasseti.

[03] ^b^saddhaaya^eb^ ^a^M1.0463^ea^ ^b^abhinikkhammaa^eb^ti aayasmato upaalittherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare kulaghare nibbatto ekadivasa.m satthu dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m vinayadharaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa adhikaarakamma.m katvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthesi. so yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kappakagehe pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi, ^b^upaalii^eb^tissa naama.m aka.msu. so vayappatto anuruddhaadiina.m channa.m khattiyaana.m pasaadako hutvaa tathaagate anupiyambavane viharante pabbajanatthaaya nikkhamantehi chahi khattiyehi saddhi.m nikkhamitvaa pabbaji. tassa pabbajjaavidhaana.m paa.liya.m aagatameva (cuu.lava0 330).

[03] so pabbajitvaa upasampanno satthu santike kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa ``mayha.m, bhante, ara~n~navaasa.m anujaanaathaa''ti aaha. bhikkhu tava ara~n~ne vasantassa ekameva dhura.m va.d.dhissati, amhaaka.m pana santike vasantassa ganthadhura~nca vipassanaadhura~nca paripuuressatiiti. thero satthu vacana.m sampa.ticchitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.1.441-595) --
[22] lakkha.ne itihaase ca, sadhamme paarami.m gato..
[22] carakaa taapasaa ceva, caranti mahiyaa tadaa..
[22] bahujjano ma.m puujeti, naaha.m puujemi ki~ncana.m..
[22] buddhoti vacana.m natthi, taava nuppajjate jino..
[22] sabba.m tama.m vinodetvaa, loke uppajji cakkhumaa..
[21] ``pitu atthaaya so buddho, dhamma.m desesi cakkhumaa.
[22] tena kaalena parisaa, samantaa yojana.m tadaa..
[22] a.t.thame divase patte, sunanda.m kittayii jino..
[22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
[22] haasayanto jana.m sabba.m, dassayanto saka.m bala.m..
[21] ``tattha me ahu sa"nkappo, sutvaana munino vaca.m.
[22] ahampi kaara.m kassaami, yathaa passaami gotama.m..
[22] tena bhogena buddhassa, aaraama.m maapaye aha.m..
[22] maa na.m koci vihe.thesi, santacittaana taadina.m..
[22] sobhano naama aaraamo, sampa.ticcha tuva.m muni..
[21] ``hatthii ^a^V1.0396^ea^ assaa rathaa pattii, senaa ca catura"nginii.
[22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
[22] upaali naama naamena, hessati satthu saavako..
[22] ta.m pivitvaa sukhii assa, visamhaa parimuttiyaa..
[22] tassa so vihane bhuuta.m, samuula~nca vinaasaye..
[22] so me tama.m vinodesi, bhuutavejjova bhuutaka.m..
[22] devaana.m saa piyaa eva.m, aasaavatii latuttamaa..
[22] saaya.m paata.m namassaami, devaa aasaavati.m yathaa..
[22] duuraagatampi ma.m santa.m, kha.noya.m na viraadhayi..
[22] meghesu gajjamaanesu, gabbha.m ga.nhanti taa sadaa..
[21] ``cirampi ^a^M1.0469^ea^ gabbha.m dhaarenti, yaava megho na gajjati.
[22] caturo ca phale sabbe, dhammeva.m vijanayi.m aha.m..
[22] na me samasamo atthi, dhaaremi saasana.m aha.m..
[22] ettha me vimati natthi, akkhare bya~njanepi vaa..
[22] ana~n~naata.m mayaa natthi, ekaggo satthu saasane..
[22] a.t.taalake ca vividhe, kaaraye nagare bahuu..
[22] maa me bha.n.da.m vinassiiti, bha.n.darakkha.m .thapeti so..
[21] ``mamatto hoti yo ra~n~no, vuddhi.m yassa ca icchati.
[22] saddhaa te esikaa viira, dvaarapaalo ca sa.mvaro..
[22] aane~nja~nca nirodho ca, esaa dhammaku.tii tava..
[22] kolito naama naamena, porohicco tava.m mune..
[22] aanando naama naamena, dhammaarakkho tava.m mune..
[22] tattha me cintanaa natthi, ta~n~nevattha.m kathemaha.m..
[22] vinaye maadiso natthi, kuto bhiyyo bhavissati..
[22] upaalissa samo natthi, vinaye khandhakesu ca..
[22] so me attho anuppatto, vinaye paarami.m gato..
[22] vijahitvaana ta.m jaati.m, putto jaato mahesino..
[21] ``tassa ra~n~no aha.m putto, candano naama khattiyo.
