[22] aaruyha sirika.m naaga.m, nagaraa nikkhami.m tadaa..
[22] devalo naama sambuddho, aagacchi purato mama..
[22] tato sa~njaatakopo so, naago nuddharate pada.m..
[21] ``saata.m tattha na vindaami, siro pajjalito yathaa.
[22] puraa sabbe vinassaama, khamaapessaama ta.m muni.m..
[22] pari.laaha.m vinodehi, maa no ra.t.tha.m vinaasaya..
[22] ayomayena kuu.tena, sira.m bhindeyyu me sadaa..
[21] ``dake aggi na sa.n.thaati, biija.m sele na ruuhati.
[22] agade kimi na sa.n.thaati, kopo buddhe na jaayati..
[21] ``yathaa ca bhuumi acalaa, appameyyo ca saagaro.
[22] anantako ca aakaaso, eva.m buddhaa akhobhiyaa..
[22] khantaana.m khamitaana~nca, gamana.m ta.m na vijjati..
[22] samatikkamma ta.m jaati.m, paavisi.m abhaya.m pura.m..
[22] attha.m tuyha.m pavakkhaami, yathaa di.t.tha.m pada.m mama..
[21] ``maa vo kha.na.m viraadhetha, kha.naatiitaa hi socare.
[22] aasiiviso di.t.thaviso, eva.m jhaapeti ta.m nara.m..
[22] sadevaka.m so taareti, tasmaa te aviraadhiyaa..
[22] pathaviisadisaa buddhaa, tasmaa te na viraadhiyaa..
[22] raahule dhanapaale ca, sabbesa.m samako muni..
[22] kappemi vinaye vaasa.m, vinayo mama gocaro..
[22] upaali ta.m mahaaviira, paade vandati satthuno..
[21] ``so aha.m vicarissaami, gaamaa gaama.m puraa pura.m.

[03] tattha hi na.m satthaa sayameva sakala.m vinayapi.taka.m ugga.nhaapesi. so aparabhaage bhaarukacchakavatthu.m (paaraa0 78) ajjukavatthu.m (paaraa0 158) kumaarakassapavatthunti imaani tii.ni vatthuuni vinicchayi. satthaa ekekasmi.m vinicchite saadhukaara.m datvaa tayopi vinicchaye a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa thera.m vinayadharaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesi. so aparabhaage ekasmi.m uposathadivase paatimokkhuddesasamaye bhikkhuu ovadanto --
[22] sa"nghasmi.m vihara.m bhikkhu, sikkhetha vinaya.m budho..
[22] kappaakappesu kusalo, careyya apurakkhato''ti.. -- tisso gaathaa abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^saddhaayaa^eb^ti saddhaanimitta.m, na jiivikatthanti attho. ^b^saddhaayaa^eb^ti vaa kammaphalaani ratanattayagu.na~nca saddahitvaa. ^b^abhinikkhammaa^eb^ti gharaavaasato nikkhamitvaa. ^b^navapabbajito^eb^ti navo hutvaa pabbajito, pa.thamavaye eva pabbajito. ^b^navo^eb^ti saasane sikkhaaya abhinavo daharo. ^b^mitte bhajeyya kalyaa.ne suddhaajiive atandite^eb^ti ``piyo garu bhaavaniiyo''tiaadinaa (a0 ni0 7.37) vuttalakkha.ne kalyaa.namitte, micchaajiivavivajjanena suddhaajiive ^a^M1.0476^ea^, aaraddhaviiriyataaya atandite ^a^V1.0404^ea^ bhajeyya upasa"nkameyya, tesa.m ovaadaanusaasaniipa.tiggaha.navasena seveyya. ^b^sa"nghasmi.m vihara^eb^nti sa"nghe bhikkhusamuuhe vattapa.tivattapuura.navasena viharanto. ^b^sikkhetha vinaya.m budho^eb^ti bodha~naa.nataasukusalo hutvaa vinayapariyatti.m sikkheyya. vinayo hi saasanassa aayu, tasmi.m .thite saasana.m .thita.m hoti. ``buddho''ti ca pa.thanti, so evattho. ^b^kappaakappesuu^eb^ti kappiyaakappiyesu kusalo suttavasena suttaanulomavasena ca nipu.no cheko. ^b^apurakkhato^eb^ti na purakkhato ta.nhaadiihi kutoci purekkhaara.m apaccaasiisanto hutvaa vihareyya.

[03] ^b^pa.n.dita.m vata ma.m santa^eb^nti aayasmato uttarapaalattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato gamanamagge setu.m kaaraapesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^uttarapaalo^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto yamakapaa.tihaariya.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa sama.nadhamma.m karoti. tassa ekadivasa.m ayonisomanasikaaravasena ^a^P2.0103^ea^ anubhuutaaramma.na.m anussarantassa kaamaraago uppajji. so taavadeva saho.d.dha.m cora.m ga.nhanto viya attano citta.m niggahetvaa sa.mvegajaato pa.tipakkhamanasikaarena kilese vikkhambhetvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto bhaavana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.47.16-20) --
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa attano pa.tipatti.m paccavekkhitvaa siihanaada.m nadanto --
[22] pa~nca kaamagu.naa loke, sammohaa paatayi.msu ma.m..
[21] ``sabbe kaamaa pahiinaa me, bhavaa sabbe padaalitaa.

[03] tattha ^b^pa.n.dita.m vata ma.m santa^eb^nti sutacintaamayaaya pa~n~naaya vasena pa~n~naasampannampi naama ma.m samaana.m. ^b^alamatthavicintaka^eb^nti attano ca paresa~nca attha.m hita.m vicintetu.m samattha.m, ala.m vaa pariyatta.m atthassa vicintaka.m, kilesaviddha.msanasamattha.m atthadassina.m vaa, sabbameta.m attano antimabhavikataaya thero vadati. ^b^pa~nca kaamagu.naa^eb^ti ruupaadayo pa~nca kaamako.t.thaasaa. ^b^loke^eb^ti tesa.m pavatti.t.thaanadassana.m. ^b^sammohaa^eb^ti sammohanimitta.m ayonisomanasikaarahetu. ^b^sammohaa^eb^ti vaa sammohanaa sammohakaraa. ^b^paatayi.msuu^eb^ti dhiirabhaavato paatesu.m, lokato vaa uttaritukaama.m ma.m loke paatayi.msuuti attho.

[03] ^b^pakkhando^eb^ti anupavi.t.tho. ^b^maaravisaye^eb^ti kilesavisaye kilesamaarassa pavatti.t.thaane, tassa vasa.m gatoti adhippaayo. devaputtamaarassa vaa issariya.t.thaane ta.m anupavisitvaa .thito. ^b^da.lhasallasamappito^eb^ti da.lha.m thira.m, da.lhena vaa sallena samappito, raagasallena hadaya.m aahacca viddho. ^b^asakkhi.m maccuraajassa, aha.m paasaa pamuccitu^eb^nti aggamaggasa.n.daasena raagaadisalla.m anavasesato uddharantoyeva raagabandhanasa"nkhaataa ^a^M1.0478^ea^ maccuraajassa paasaa aha.m parimuccitu.m asakkhi.m, tato attaana.m pamocesi.m.

[03] tato eva ca ^b^sabbe kaamaa pahiinaa me, bhavaa sabbe padaalitaa^eb^ti vatthaaramma.naadibhedena anekabhedabhinnaa ^a^P2.0104^ea^ sabbe kilesakaamaa ariyamaggena samucchedavasena mayaa pahiinaa. kilesakaamesu hi pahiinesu vatthukaamaapi pahiinaa eva honti. tathaa kaamabhavakammabhavaadayo bhavaa sabbe magga~naa.naasinaa padaalitaa viddha.msitaa. kammabhavesu hi padaalitesu upapattibhavaa padaalitaa eva honti. eva.m kammabhavaana.m padaalitattaa eva ^b^vikkhii.no jaatisa.msaaro, natthi daani punabbhavo^eb^ti. tassattho he.t.thaa vuttoyeva. idameva ca therassa a~n~naabyaakara.na.m ahosi.

[03] ^b^su.naatha^eb^ ^a^V1.0406^ea^ ^b^~naatayo sabbe^eb^ti aayasmato abhibhuutattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto vessabhussa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto taadisena kalyaa.namittasannissayena saasane abhippasanno ahosi. so satthari parinibbute tassa dhaatu.m gahetu.m mahaajane ussaaha.m karonte saya.m sabbapa.thama.m gandhodakena citaka.m nibbaapesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade ve.thapuranagare raajakule nibbattitvaa ^b^abhibhuuto^eb^ti laddhanaamo pitu accayena rajja.m kaareti. tasmi~nca samaye bhagavaa janapadacaarika.m caranto anupubbena ta.m nagara.m paapu.ni. tato so raajaa ``bhagavaa kira mama nagara.m anuppatto''ti sutvaa satthu santika.m gantvaa dhamma.m sutvaa dutiyadivase mahaadaana.m pavattesi. bhagavaa bhuttaavii tassa ra~n~no ajjhaasayaanuruupa.m anumodana.m karontoyeva vitthaarato dhamma.m desesi. so dhamma.m sutvaa laddhappasaado rajja.m pahaaya pabbajitvaa arahatta.m sacchaakaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.47.11-15) --

[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa vimuttisukhena viharante tasmi.m tassa ~naatakaa amaccaa paarisajjaa naagaraa jaanapadaati sabbe samaagantvaa, ``bhante, kasmaa tva.m amhe anaathe katvaa pabbajito''ti paridevi.msu. thero te ~naatipamukhe manusse paridevante disvaa tesa.m attano pabbajjakaara.navibhaavanamukhena dhamma.m kathento --
[22] dhamma.m vo desayissaami, dukkhaa jaati punappuna.m..
[22] pahaaya jaatisa.msaara.m, dukkhassanta.m karissatii''ti.. -- tisso gaathaa abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^su.naathaa^eb^ti nisaametha, idaani mayaa vuccamaana.m ohitasotaa sotadvaaraanusaarena upadhaarethaati attho. ^b^~naatayo^eb^ti ~naatii pamukhe katvaa tesa.m sabbesa.m aalapana.m, tenaaha ^b^``sabbe yaavantettha samaagataa''^eb^ti, yaavanto yattakaa ettha samaagame, etissa.m vaa mama pabbajjaaya samaagataati attho.

[01] idaani ya.m sandhaaya ``su.naathaa''ti savanaa.nattikavacana.m kata.m, ta.m ^b^``dhamma.m vo desayissaamii''^eb^ti pa.tijaanitvaa ^b^``dukkhaa jaati punappuna''^eb^ntiaadinaa desetu.m aarabhi. tattha ^b^dukkhaa jaati punappuna^eb^nti jaati naamesaa gabbhokkantimuulakaadibhedassa jaraadibhedassa ca anekavihitassa dukkhassa adhi.t.thaanabhaavato dukkhaa. saa punappuna.m pavattamaanaa ativiya dukkhaa.

[01] tassaa ^a^M1.0480^ea^ pana jaatiyaa samatikkamanattha.m ussaaho kara.niiyoti dassento aaha ^b^``aarambhathaa^eb^''tiaadi. tattha ^b^aarambhathaa^eb^ti aarambhadhaatusa"nkhaata.m viiriya.m karotha. ^b^nikkamathaa^eb^ti kosajjapakkhato nikkhantattaa nikkamadhaatusa"nkhaata.m taduttari.m viiriya.m karotha. ^b^yu~njatha buddhasaasane^eb^ti yasmaa siilasa.mvaro indriyesu guttadvaarataa bhojane matta~n~nutaa satisampaja~n~nanti imesu dhammesu pati.t.thitaana.m jaagariyaanuyogavasena aarambhanikkamadhaatuyo sampajjanti, tasmaa tathaabhuutaa samathavipassanaasa"nkhaate adhisiilasikkhaadisa"nkhaate vaa bhagavato saasane yuttappayuttaa hotha. ^b^dhunaatha maccuno sena.m, na.laagaara.mva ku~njaro^eb^ti eva.m pa.tipajjantaa ca tedhaatuissarassa maccuraajassa vasa.m satte netiiti tassa senaasa"nkhaata.m abala.m dubbala.m yathaa naama thaamabaluupapanno ku~njaro na.lehi kata.m agaara.m kha.neneva viddha.mseti, evameva kilesaga.na.m dhunaatha vidhamatha viddha.msethaati attho.
[03] eva.m pana buddhasaasane ussaaha.m karontassa eka.msiko jaatidukkhassa samatikkamoti dassento ^b^``yo imasmi''^eb^ntiaadinaa tatiya.m gaathamaaha. ta.m suvi~n~neyyameva.

[03] ^b^sa.msara^eb^nti ^a^V1.0408^ea^ ^a^P2.0106^ea^ aayasmato gotamattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani karonto sikhimhi bhagavati parinibbute tassa citaka.m devamanussesu puujentesu a.t.thahi campakapupphehi citaka.m puujesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade sakyaraajakule nibbattitvaa ^b^gotamo^eb^ti gottavaseneva abhilakkhitanaamo vayappatto satthu ~naatisamaagame pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.47.6-10) --

[03] cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa vimuttisukhena viharanto ekadivasa.m ~naatakehi ``kasmaa, bhante, amhe pahaaya pabbajito''ti pu.t.tho sa.msaare attanaa anubhuutadukkha~nceva idaani adhigata.m nibbaanasukha~nca pakaasento --
[22] dukkhamamhipi tiracchaanayoniya.m, nekadhaa hi vusita.m cira.m mayaa..
[22] ta.m viditvaa mahamahattasambhava.m, santimeva satimaa samajjhaga''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^sa.msara^eb^nti anaadimati sa.msaare sa.msaranto kammakilesehi pa~ncasu gatiisu cavanupapaatavasena aparaapara.m sa.msarantoti attho. ^b^hii^eb^ti nipaatamatta.m. ^b^niraya.m agacchissa^eb^nti sa~njiivaadika.m a.t.thavidha.m mahaaniraya.m, kukku.laadika.m so.lasavidha.m ussadaniraya~nca pa.tisandhivasena upagacchi.m ^a^V1.0409^ea^. ^b^``punappuna''^eb^nti ida.m idhaapi aanetabba.m ^a^P2.0107^ea^. ^b^petaloka^eb^nti pettivisaya.m, khuppipaasaadibheda.m petattabhaavanti ^a^M1.0482^ea^ attho. ^b^agama^eb^nti pa.tisandhivasena upagacchi.m upapajji.m. ^b^punappuna^eb^nti aparaapara.m. ^b^dukkhamamhipii^eb^ti a~n~nama~n~na.m tikhi.nakasaapatodaabhighaataadidukkhehi dussahaayapi. li"ngavipallaasena heta.m vutta.m ``dukkhamamhipii''ti. ^b^tiracchaanayoniya^eb^nti migapakkhiaadibhedaaya tiracchaanayoniya.m. ^b^nekadhaa hii^eb^ti o.t.thago.nagadrabhaadivasena ceva kaakabalaakakulalaadivasena ca anekappakaara.m anekavaara~nca ^b^cira.m^eb^ diighamaddhaana.m ^b^mayaa vusita.m^eb^ nicca.m utrastamaanasataadivasena dukkha.m anubhuuta.m. tiracchaanayoniya.m nibbattasatto mahaamuu.lhataaya ciratara.m tattheva aparaapara.m parivattatiiti dassanattha.m idha ``cira''nti vutta.m.

[03] ^b^maanusopi ca bhavobhiraadhito^eb^ti manussattabhaavopi mayaa taadisena kusalakammunaa samavaayena abhiraadhito saadhito adhigato. kaa.nakacchapopamasuttamettha (ma0 ni0 3.252; sa.m0 ni0 5.1117) udaaharitabba.m. ^b^saggakaayamagama.m saki.m saki^eb^nti saggagatisa"nkhaata.m kaamaavacaradevakaaya.m saki.m saki.m kadaaci kadaaci upapajjanavasena agacchi.m. ^b^ruupadhaatusuu^eb^ti puthujjanabhavaggapariyosaanesu ruupabhavesu ^b^aruupadhaatusuu^eb^ti aruupabhavesu. ^b^nevasa~n~nisu asa~n~nisu.t.thita^eb^nti ruupaaruupadhaatuusu ca na kevala.m sa~n~niisu eva, atha kho nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~niisu asa~n~niisu ca upapajja .thita.m mayaati aanetvaa yojetabba.m. nevasa~n~niggaha.nena hettha nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~niibhavo gahito. yadipime dve bhavaa ruupaaruupadhaatuggaha.neneva gayhanti, ye pana ito baahirakaa tattha niccasa~n~nino bhavavimokkhasa~n~nino ca, tesa.m tassaa sa~n~naaya micchaabhaavadassanattha.m visu.m gahitaati da.t.thabba.m.

[03] eva.m dviihi gaathaahi bhavamuulassa anupacchinnattaa anaadimati sa.msaare attano va.t.tadukkhaanubhava.m dassetvaa idaani tadupacchedena viva.t.tasukhaanubhava.m dassento ^b^``sambhavaa''^eb^tiaadinaa tatiya.m gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^sambhavaa^eb^ti bhavaa. kaamabhavaadayo eva hi hetupaccayasamavaayena bhavantiiti idha sambhavaati vuttaa. ^b^suviditaa^eb^ti vipassanaapa~n~naasahitaaya maggapa~n~naaya su.t.thu viditaa. ^b^asaarakaa^eb^tiaadi tesa.m viditaakaaradassana.m. tattha ^b^asaarakaa^eb^ti niccasaaraadisaararahitaa. ^b^sa"nkhataa^eb^ti samecca sambhuyya paccayehi ^a^M1.0483^ea^ kataa. ^b^pacalitaa^eb^ti sa"nkhatattaa eva uppaadajaraadiihi pakaarato calitaa anava.t.thitaa. ^b^saderitaa^eb^ti sadaa sabbakaala.m bha"ngena eritaa, ittaraa bha"ngagaamino pabha"ngunoti attho. ^b^ta.m viditvaa^eb^ ^a^P2.0108^ea^ ^b^mahamattasambhava^eb^nti ta.m yathaavutta.m sa"nkhatasabhaava.m attasambhava.m attani sambhuuta.m attaayatta.m issaraadivasena aparaayatta.m pari~n~naabhisamayavasena aha.m viditvaa tappa.tipakkhabhuuta.m ^b^santimeva^eb^ nibbaanameva maggapa~n~naasatiyaa ^b^satimaa^eb^ ^a^V1.0410^ea^ hutvaa ^b^samajjhaga.m^eb^ adhigacchi.m ariyamaggabhaavanaaya anuppattoti. eva.m thero ~naatakaana.m dhammadesanaamukhena a~n~na.m byaakaasi.

[03] ^b^yo pubbe kara.niiyaanii^eb^ti aayasmato haaritattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto satthari parinibbute tassa citakapuujaaya kayiramaanaaya gandhena puuja.m akaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^haarito^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto jaatimaana.m nissaaya a~n~ne vasalavaadena samudaacarati. so bhikkhuuna.m santika.m gantvaa dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitopi ciraparicitattaa vasalasamudaacaara.m na vissajji. athekadivasa.m satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa sa~njaatasa.mvego vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa attano cittappavatti.m upaparikkhanto maanuddhaccaviggahitata.m disvaa ta.m pahaaya vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.46.63-67) --

[03] arahaa ^a^M1.0484^ea^ pana hutvaa vimuttisukha.m anubhavanto ^b^``yo pubbe kara.niiyaanii''^eb^tiaadinaa tiihi gaathaahi bhikkhuuna.m ovaadadaanamukhena a~n~na.m byaakaasi. taasa.m attho he.t.thaa vuttoyeva.

[03] ^b^paapamitte^eb^ti ^a^V1.0411^ea^ ^a^P2.0109^ea^ aayasmato vimalattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m pu~n~na.m upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto satthari parinibbute saadhukii.lanadivasesu viitivattesu satthu sariira.m gahetvaa upaasakesu jhaapana.t.thaana.m gacchantesu satthu gu.ne aavajjitvaa pasannamaanaso sumanapupphehi puujamakaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade baaraa.nasiya.m braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^vimalo^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto somamittatthera.m nissaaya saasane pabbajitvaa teneva ussaahito vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.46.58-62) --
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa attano sahaayassa bhikkhussa ovaada.m dento --
[22] ovaade cassa ti.t.theyya, patthento acala.m sukha.m..

[03] tattha ^b^paapamitte^eb^ti akalyaa.namitte asappurise hiinaviiriye. ^b^vivajjetvaa^eb^ti ta.m abhajanavasena duurato vajjetvaa. ^b^bhajeyyuttamapuggala^eb^nti sappurisa.m pa.n.dita.m kalyaa.namitta.m ovaadaanusaasaniigaha.navasena ^a^V1.0412^ea^ seveyya. ^b^ovaade cassa ti.t.theyyaa^eb^ti assa kalyaa.namittassa ovaade anusi.t.thiya.m yathaanusi.t.tha.m pa.tipajjanavasena ti.t.theyya. ^b^patthento^eb^ti aaka"nkhanto. ^b^acala.m sukha^eb^nti nibbaanasukha.m phalasukha~nca. tampi hi akuppabhaavato ``acala''nti vuccati. sesa.m vuttatthameva.

[03] ^b^ala"nkataa^eb^tiaadikaa ^a^M2.0001^ea^ ^a^V2.0001^ea^ aayasmato naagasamaalattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto gimhasamaye suuriyaatapasantattaaya ^a^V2.0002^ea^ bhuumiyaa gacchanta.m satthaara.m ^a^P2.0110^ea^ disvaa pasannamaanaso chatta.m adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade sakyaraajakule nibbattitvaa ^b^naagasamaalo^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto ~naatisamaagame pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa ki~nci kaala.m bhagavato upa.t.thaako ahosi. so ekadivasa.m nagara.m pi.n.daaya pavi.t.tho ala"nkatapa.tiyatta.m a~n~natara.m naccaki.m mahaapathe tuuriyesu vajjantesu naccanti.m disvaa, ``aya.m cittakiriyavaayodhaatuvipphaaravasena karajakaayassa tathaa tathaa parivatti, aho aniccaa sa"nkhaaraa''ti khayavaya.m pa.t.thapetvaa vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.46.37-48) --
[22] tattha disvaana sambuddha.m, vitti me upapajjatha..
[21] ``aya.m me pacchimaa jaati, carimo vattate bhavo.
[22] majjhe mahaapathe naarii, tuuriye naccati na.t.takii..
[22] tisso vijjaa anuppattaa, kata.m buddhassa saasana''nti.. --
[25] catuuhi gaathaahi attano pa.tipattikittanamukhena a~n~na.m byaakaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^ala"nkataa^eb^ti hatthuupagaadiaabhara.nehi ala"nkatagattaa. ^b^suvasanaa^eb^ti sundaravasanaa sobhanavatthanivatthaa. ^b^maalinii^eb^ti maalaadhaarinii pi.landhitapupphamaalaa. ^b^candanussadaa^eb^ti candanaanulepalittasariiraa. ^b^majjhe mahaapathe naarii, tuuriye naccati na.t.takii^eb^ti yathaavutta.t.thaane ekaa naarii na.t.takii naa.takitthii nagaraviithiyaa majjhe pa~nca"ngike tuuriye vajjante naccati, yathaapa.t.thapita.m nacca.m karoti.

[03] ^b^pi.n.dikaayaa^eb^ti bhikkhaaya. ^b^pavi.t.thoha^eb^nti nagara.m pavi.t.tho aha.m. ^b^gacchanto na.m udikkhisa^eb^nti nagaraviithiya.m gacchanto parissayaparihara.nattha.m viithi.m olokento ta.m na.t.taki.m olokesi.m. ki.m viya? ^b^maccupaasa.mva o.d.dita^eb^nti yathaa maccussa maccuraajassa paasabhuuto ruupaadiko o.d.dito loke anuvicaritvaa .thito eka.msena sattaana.m anatthaavaho, eva.m ^a^P2.0111^ea^ saapi appa.tisa"nkhaane .thitaana.m andhaputhujjanaana.m eka.msato anatthaavahaati maccupaasasadisii vuttaa.

[03] ^b^tato^eb^ti tasmaa maccupaasasadisattaa. ^b^me^eb^ti mayha.m. ^b^manasiikaaro yoniso udapajjathaa^eb^ti ``aya.m a.t.thisa"nghaato nhaarusambandho ma.msena anupalitto chaviyaa pa.ticchanno asuciduggandhajegucchapa.tikkuulo aniccucchaadanaparimaddanabhedanaviddha.msanadhammo iidise vikaare dassetii''ti eva.m yoniso manasikaaro uppajji. ^b^aadiinavo paaturahuu^eb^ti eva.m kaayassa sabhaavuupadhaara.namukhena tassa ca ta.mnissitaana~nca cittacetasikaana.m udayabbaya.m sarasapabha"nguta~nca manasi karoto tesu ca yakkharakkhasaadiisu viya bhayato upa.t.thahantesu tattha me anekaakaaraaadiinavo doso paaturahosi. tappa.tipakkhato ca nibbaane aanisa.mso. ^b^nibbidaa samati.t.thathaa^eb^ti nibbindana.m aadiinavaanupassanaanubhaavasiddha.m nibbidaa~naa.na.m mama hadaye sa.n.thaasi, muhuttampi ^a^V2.0004^ea^ tesa.m ruupaaruupadhammaana.m gaha.ne citta.m naahosi, a~n~nadatthu mu~ncitukaamataadivasena tattha udaasiinameva jaatanti attho.

[03] ^b^tato^eb^ti ^a^M2.0004^ea^ vipassanaa~naa.nato para.m. ^b^citta.m vimucci me^eb^ti lokuttarabhaavanaaya vattamaanaaya maggapa.tipaa.tiyaa sabbakilesehi mama citta.m vimutta.m ahosi. etena phaluppatti.m dasseti. maggakkha.ne hi kilesaa vimuccanti naama, phalakkha.ne vimuttaati. sesa.m vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^aha.m middhenaa^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato bhaguttherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto satthari parinibbute tassa dhaatuyo pupphehi puujesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena nimmaanaratiisu nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade sakyaraajakule nibbattitvaa ^b^bhaguu^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto anuruddhakimilehi saddhi.m nikkhamitvaa pabbajitvaa baalakalo.nakagaame vasanto ekadivasa.m thinamiddhaabhibhava.m vinodetu.m vihaarato nikkhamma ca"nkama.m abhiruhanto papatitvaa ^a^P2.0112^ea^ tadeva a"nkusa.m katvaa thinamiddha.m vinodetvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.46.49-57) --
[22] sa.msaraami manusse ce, raajaa homi mahaayaso..

[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa phalasukhena nibbaanasukhena ca viitinaamento satthaaraa ekavihaara.m anumoditu.m upagatena -- ``kacci tva.m, bhikkhu, appamatto viharasii''ti pu.t.tho attano appamaadavihaara.m nivedento --
[22] tisso vijjaa anuppattaa, kata.m buddhassa saasana''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^middhena pakato^eb^ti kaayaalasiyasa"nkhaatena asattivighaatasabhaavena middhena abhibhuuto. ^b^vihaaraa^eb^ti senaasanato. ^b^upanikkhami^eb^nti ca"nkamitu.m nikkhami.m. ^b^tattheva papati.m chamaa^eb^ti tattheva ca"nkamasopaane niddaabhibhuutataaya bhuumiya.m nipati.m. ^b^gattaani parimajjitvaa^eb^ti bhuumiya.m patanena pa.msukitaani attano sariiraavayavaani anumajjitvaa. ^b^punapaaruyha ca"nkama^eb^nti ``patito daanaaha''nti sa"nkoca.m anaapajjitvaa punapi ca"nkama.t.thaana.m aaruhitvaa. ^b^ajjhatta.m susamaahito^eb^ti gocarajjhatte kamma.t.thaane niivara.navikkhambhanena su.t.thu samaahito ekaggacitto hutvaa ca"nkaminti yojanaa. sesa.m vuttanayameva. idameva ca therassa a~n~naabyaakara.na.m ahosi.

[03] ^b^pare^eb^ ^a^M2.0006^ea^ ^a^V2.0006^ea^ ^b^caa^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato sabhiyattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto kakusandhassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m divaavihaaraaya gacchanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso upaahana.m ^a^P2.0113^ea^ adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto kassape bhagavati parinibbute pati.t.thite suva.n.nacetiye chahi kulaputtehi saddhi.m attasattamo saasane pabbajitvaa kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa ara~n~ne viharanto visesa.m nibbattetu.m asakkonto itare aaha -- ``maya.m pi.n.dapaataaya gacchanto jiivite saapekkhaa homa, jiivite saapekkhena ca na sakkaa lokuttaradhamma.m adhigantu.m, puthujjanakaala"nkiriyaa ca dukkhaa. handa, maya.m nisse.ni.m bandhitvaa pabbata.m abhiruyha kaaye ca jiivite ca anapekkhaa sama.nadhamma.m karomaa''ti. te tathaa aka.msu.

[03] atha nesa.m mahaathero upanissayasampannattaa tadaheva cha.labhi~n~no hutvaa uttarakuruto pi.n.dapaata.m upanesi. itare -- ``tumhe, bhante, katakiccaa tumhehi saddhi.m sallaapamattampi papa~nco, sama.nadhammameva maya.m karissaama, tumhe attanaa di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaramanuyu~njathaa''ti vatvaa pi.n.dapaata.m pa.tikkhipi.msu. thero ne sampa.ticchaapetu.m asakkonto agamaasi.

[03] tato nesa.m eko dviihatiihaccayena abhi~n~naaparivaara.m anaagaamiphala.m sacchikatvaa tatheva vatvaa tehi pa.tikkhitto agamaasi. tesu khii.naasavatthero parinibbaayi, anaagaamii suddhaavaasesu uppajji. itare puthujjanakaala"nkiriyameva katvaa chasu kaamasaggesu anulomapa.tilomato dibbasampatti.m anubhavitvaa amhaaka.m bhagavato kaale devalokaa cavitvaa eko mallaraajakule pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi, eko gandhaararaajakule, eko baahirara.t.the, eko raajagahe ekissaa kuladaarikaaya kucchimhi pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi. itaro a~n~natarissaa paribbaajikaaya kucchimhi pa.tisandhi.m aggahesi. saa kira a~n~natarassa khattiyassa dhiitaa, na.m maataapitaro -- ``amhaaka.m dhiitaa samayantara.m jaanaatuu''ti ekassa paribbaajakassa niyyaadayi.msu. atheko paribbaajako taaya saddhi.m vippa.tipajji. saa tena gabbha.m ga.nhi. ta.m gabbhini.m disvaa paribbaajakaa nikka.d.dhi.msu. saa a~n~nattha ^a^M2.0007^ea^ gacchantii antaraamagge sabhaaya.m vijaayi. tenassa ^b^sabhiyo^eb^tveva naama.m akaasi. so va.d.dhitvaa paribbaajakapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa naanaasatthaani uggahetvaa ^a^V2.0007^ea^ mahaavaadii hutvaa vaadappasuto vicaranto attanaa sadisa.m adisvaa nagaradvaare assama.m kaaretvaa khattiyakumaaraadayo sippa.m sikkhaapento viharanto attano maatuyaa itthibhaava.m jigucchitvaa jhaana.m uppaadetvaa brahmaloke uppannaaya abhisa"nkharitvaa dinne viisatipa~nhe gahetvaa te te sama.nabraahma.ne pucchi. te cassa tesa.m pa~nhaana.m attha.m byaakaatu.m naasakkhi.msu. ^b^sabhiyasuttava.n.nanaaya.m^eb^ (su0 ni0 a.t.tha0 2. sabhiyasuttava.n.nanaa) pana ^a^P2.0114^ea^ ``suddhaavaasabrahmaa te pa~nhe abhisa"nkharitvaa adaasii''ti aagata.m.

[03] yadaa pana bhagavaa pavattavaradhammacakko anupubbena raajagaha.m aagantvaa ve.luvane vihaasi, tadaa sabhiyo tattha gantvaa satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa te pa~nhe pucchi. satthaa tassa te pa~nhe byaakaasiiti sabba.m ^b^sabhiyasutte^eb^ (su0 ni0 sabhiyasutta.m) aagatanayena veditabba.m. sabhiyo pana bhagavataa tesu pa~nhesu byaakatesu pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.46.27-31) --
[03] arahaa pana hutvaa devadatte sa"nghabhedaaya parakkamante devadattapakkhikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m ovaada.m dento --
[22] ye ca tattha vijaananti, tato sammanti medhagaa..
[22] vijaananti ca ye dhamma.m, aaturesu anaaturaa..
[21] ``ya.m ^a^M2.0008^ea^ ki~nci sithila.m kamma.m, sa.mkili.t.tha~nca ya.m vata.m.
[22] sa"nkassara.m brahmacariya.m, na ta.m hoti mahapphala.m..
[22] aarakaa hoti saddhammaa, nabha.m puthaviyaa yathaa''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^a^V2.0008^ea^ ^b^pare^eb^ti pa.n.dite .thapetvaa tato a~n~ne -- ``adhamma.m dhammo''ti ``dhamma.m adhammo''tiaadibhedakaravatthudiipanavasena vivaadappasutaa pare naama. te tattha vivaada.m karontaa ``maya.m yamaamase uparamaama nassaama satata.m samita.m maccusantika.m gacchaamaa''ti na jaananti. ^b^ye ca tattha vijaanantii^eb^ti ye tattha pa.n.ditaa -- ``maya.m maccusamiipa.m gacchaamaa''ti vijaananti. ^b^tato sammanti medhagaa^eb^ti eva~nhi te jaanantaa yonisomanasikaara.m uppaadetvaa medhagaana.m kalahaana.m vuupasamaaya pa.tipajjanti. atha nesa.m taaya pa.tipattiyaa te medhagaa sammanti. atha vaa ^b^pare caa^eb^ti ye satthu ovaadaanusaasaniyaa aggaha.nena saasanato baahirataaya pare, te yaava ``maya.m micchaagaaha.m gahetvaa ettha idha loke ^a^P2.0115^ea^ saasanassa pa.tiniggaahena yamaamase vaayamaamaa''ti na vijaananti, taava vivaadaa na vuupasammanti, yadaa pana tassa gaahassa vissajjanavasena ye ca tattha tesu vivaadappasutesu adhammadhammaadike adhammadhammaadito yathaabhuuta.m vijaananti, tato tesa.m santikaa te pa.n.ditapurise nissaaya vivaadasa"nkhaataa medhagaa sammantiiti evampettha attho veditabbo.

[03] ^b^yadaa^eb^ti yasmi.m kaale. ^b^avijaanantaa^eb^ti vivaadassa vuupasamuupaaya.m, dhammaadhamme vaa yaathaavato ajaanantaa. ^b^iriyantyamaraa viyaa^eb^ti amaraa viya jaraamara.na.m atikkantaa viya uddhataa unna.laa capalaa mukharaa vippaki.n.navaacaa hutvaa vattanti caranti vicaranti tadaa vivaado na vuupasammateva. ^b^vijaananti ca ye dhamma.m, aaturesu anaaturaa^eb^ti ye pana satthu saasanadhamma.m yathaabhuuta.m jaananti, te kilesarogena aaturesu sattesu anaaturaa nikkilesaa aniighaa viharanti, tesa.m vasena vivaado accantameva vuupasammatiiti adhippaayo.

[03] ^b^ya.m^eb^ ^a^M2.0009^ea^ ^b^ki~nci sithila.m kamma^eb^nti oliyitvaa kara.nena sithilagaaha.m katvaa saathalibhaavena kata.m ya.m ki~nci kusalakamma.m. ^b^sa.mkili.t.tha^eb^nti vesiiaadike agocare cara.nena, kuhanaadimicchaajiivena vaa sa.mkili.t.tha.m vatasamaadaana.m. ^b^sa"nkassara^eb^nti sa"nkaahi saritabba.m, vihaare ki~nci asaaruppa.m sutvaa -- ``nuuna asukena kata''nti parehi asa"nkitabba.m, uposathakiccaadiisu a~n~natarakiccavasena sannipatitampi sa"ngha.m disvaa, ``addhaa ime mama cariya.m ~natvaa ma.m ukkhipitukaamaa sannipatitaa''ti eva.m attano vaa aasa"nkaahi sarita.m usa"nkita.m parisa"nkita.m. ^b^na ta.m hotii^eb^ti ta.m evaruupa.m brahmacariya.m sama.nadhammakara.na.m tassa puggalassa mahapphala.m na hoti. tassa amahapphalabhaaveneva paccayadaayakaanampissa na mahapphala.m hoti. tasmaa sallekhavuttinaa bhavitabba.m. sallekhavuttino ca vivaadassa avasaro eva natthiiti adhippaayo.

[03] ^b^gaaravo^eb^ ^a^V2.0009^ea^ ^b^nuupalabbhatii^eb^ti anusaasaniyaa apadakkhi.naggaahibhaavena garukaatabbesu sabrahmacaariisu yassa puggalassa gaaravo garukara.na.m na vijjati. ^b^aarakaa hoti saddhammaa^eb^ti so evaruupo puggalo pa.tipattisaddhammatopi pa.tivedhasaddhammatopi duure hoti, na hi ta.m garuu sikkhaapenti, asikkhiyamaano anaadiyanto na pa.tipajjati, appa.tipajjanto kuto saccaani pa.tivijjhissatiiti. tenaaha -- ``aarakaa hoti saddhammaa''ti. yathaa ki.m? ^b^``nabha.m puthaviyaa yathaa''^eb^ti yathaa nabha.m aakaasa.m puthaviyaa pathaviidhaatuyaa sabhaavato duure. na kadaaci sammissabhaavo. tenevaaha --
[21] ``nabha~nca ^a^P2.0116^ea^ duure pathavii ca duure, paara.m samuddassa tadaahu duure.
[22] tato have duuratara.m vadanti, sata~nca dhammo asata~nca raajaa''ti..(jaa0 2.21.414).

[03] ^b^dhiratthuu^eb^tiaadikaa ^a^M2.0010^ea^ aayasmato nandakattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare mahaavibhavo se.t.thi hutvaa satthu santike dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m bhikkhunovaadakaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthetvaa satasahassagghanikena vatthena bhagavanta.m puujetvaa pa.nidhaanamakaasi, satthu bodhirukkhe padiipapuuja~nca pavatteti. so tato pa.t.thaaya devamanussesu sa.msaranto kakusandhassa bhagavato kaale karavikasaku.no hutvaa madhurakuujita.m kuujanto satthaara.m padakkhi.na.m akaasi. aparabhaage mayuuro hutvaa a~n~natarassa paccekabuddhassa vasanaguhaaya dvaare pasannamaanaso divase divase tikkhattu.m madhuravassita.m vassi, eva.m tattha tattha pu~n~naani katvaa amhaaka.m bhagavato kaale saavatthiya.m kulagehe nibbattitvaa ^b^nandako^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.46.22-26) --

[03] arahaa pana hutvaa vimuttisukhena viitinaamento satthaaraa bhikkhuniina.m ovaade aa.natto ekasmi.m uposathadivase pa~nca bhikkhunisataani ekovaadeneva arahatta.m paapesi. tena na.m bhagavaa bhikkhunovaadakaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesi. athekadivasa.m thera.m saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caranta.m a~n~nataraa puraa.nadutiyikaa itthii kilesavasena oloketvaa hasi. thero tassaa ta.m kiriya.m disvaa sariirassa pa.tikkuulavibhaavanamukhena dhamma.m kathento --
[22] navasotaani te kaaye, yaani sandanti sabbadaa..
[22] saggepi te na rajjanti, kima"nga.m pana maanuse..
[21] ``ye ca kho baalaa dummedhaa, dummantii mohapaarutaa.
[21] ``yesa.m raago ca doso ca, avijjaa ca viraajitaa.
[22] taadii tattha na rajjanti, chinnasuttaa abandhanaa''ti.. -- gaathaa abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^dhii^eb^ti jigucchanatthe nipaato, ^b^ratthuu^eb^ti ra-kaaro padasandhikaro, dhii atthu ta.m jigucchaami tava dhikkaaro hotuuti attho. ^b^puure^eb^tiaadiini tassaa dhikkaatabbabhaavadiipanaani aamantanavacanaani. ^b^puure^eb^ti ativiya jegucchehi naanaaku.napehi naanaavidhaasuciihi sampu.n.ne. ^b^duggandhe^eb^ti ku.napapuuritattaa eva sabhaavaduggandhe. ^b^maarapakkhe^eb^ti yasmaa visabhaagavatthu andhaputhujjanaana.m ayonisomanasikaaranimittataaya kilesamaara.m va.d.dheti, devaputtamaarassa ca otaara.m pavi.t.tha.m deti. tasmaa maarassa pakkho hoti. tena vutta.m ``maarapakkhe''ti. ^b^avassute^eb^ti sabbakaala.m kilesaavassavanena tahi.m tahi.m asucinissandanena ca avassute. idaanissaa ^b^navasotaani te kaaye, yaani sandanti sabbadaa^eb^ti ``akkhimhaa akkhiguuthako''tiaadinaa (su0 ni0 199) vutta.m asucino avassavana.t.thaana.m dasseti.

[03] eva.m ^a^V2.0011^ea^ pana navachidda.m dhuvassava.m asucibharita.m kaaya.m yathaabhuuta.m jaanantii ^b^maa puraa.na.m ama~n~nittho^eb^ti puraa.na.m ajaananakaale pavatta.m hasitalapita.m kii.lita.m maa ma~n~ni, ``idaanipi eva.m pa.tipajjissatii''ti maa cintehi. ^b^maasaadesi tathaagate^eb^ti yathaa upanissayasampattiyaa purimakaa buddhasaavakaa aagataa, yathaa vaa te sammaapa.tipattiyaa gataa pa.tipannaa, yathaa ca ruupaaruupadhammaana.m tathalakkha.na.m tathadhamme ca ariyasaccaani aagataa adhigataa avabuddhaa, tathaa imepiiti eva.m tathaa aagamanaadiatthena tathaagate ariyasaavake pakatisatte viya ava~n~naaya kilesavasena ca ^a^M2.0012^ea^ upasa"nkamamaanaa maasaadesi. anaasaadetabbataaya kaara.namaaha. ^b^saggepi te na rajjanti, kima"nga.m pana maanuse^eb^ti sabba~n~nubuddhenaapi akkhaanena pariyosaapetu.m asakku.neyyasukhe saggepi te saavakabuddhaa na rajjanti, sa"nkhaaresu aadiinavassa suparidi.t.thattaa raaga.m na janenti, kima"nga.m pana mii.lharaasisadise maanuse kaamagu.ne, tattha na rajjantiiti vattabbameva natthi.

[03] ^b^ye ca kho^eb^ti ye pana baalyappayogato ^b^baalaa,^eb^ dhammojapa~n~naaya abhaavato ^b^dummedhaa,^eb^ asubhe subhaanupassanena ducintitacintitaaya ^b^dummantii,^eb^ mohena a~n~naa.nena sabbaso pa.ticchaaditacittataaya ^b^mohapaarutaa^eb^ ^a^P2.0118^ea^ ^b^taadisaa^eb^ tathaaruupaa andhaputhujjanaa, ^b^tattha^eb^ tasmi.m itthisa~n~nite, ^b^maarakhittamhi bandhane^eb^ maarena o.d.dite maarapaase, ^b^rajjanti^eb^ rattaa giddhaa gadhitaa mucchitaa ajjhopannaa ti.t.thanti.

[03] ^b^viraajitaa^eb^ti ^b^yesa.m^eb^ pana khii.naasavaana.m tela~njanaraago viya dummocaniiyasabhaavo ^b^raago^eb^ sapatto viya laddhokaaso dussanasabhaavo ^b^doso^eb^ a~n~naa.nasabhaavaa ^b^avijjaa ca^eb^ ariyamaggaviraagena sabbaso ^b^viraajitaa^eb^ pahiinaa samucchinnaa, taadisaa aggamaggasatthena ^b^chinna^eb^bhavanetti^b^suttaa^eb^ tato eva katthacipi bandhanaabhaavato ^b^abandhanaa tattha^eb^ tasmi.m yathaavutte maarapaase ^b^na rajjanti^eb^. eva.m thero tassaa itthiyaa dhamma.m kathetvaa gato.

[03] ^b^pa~ncapa~n~naasaa^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato jambukattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto tissassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe ^a^V2.0012^ea^ nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto satthu sammaasambodhi.m saddahanto bodhirukkha.m vanditvaa biijanena puujesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto kassapassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto saasane pabbajitvaa a~n~natarena upaasakena kaarite aaraame aavaasiko hutvaa viharati tena ^a^M2.0013^ea^ upa.t.thiiyamaano. athekadivasa.m eko khii.naasavatthero luukhaciivaradharo kesohara.nattha.m ara~n~nato gaamaabhimukho aagacchati, ta.m disvaa so upaasako iriyaapathe pasiiditvaa kappakena kesamassuuni ohaaraapetvaa pa.niitabhojana.m bhojetvaa sundaraani ciivaraani datvaa ``idheva, bhante, vasathaa''ti vasaapeti. ta.m disvaa aavaasiko issaamaccherapakato khii.naasavatthera.m aaha -- ``vara.m te, bhikkhu, iminaa paapupaasakena upa.t.thiiyamaanassa eva.m idha vasanato a"nguliihi kese lu~ncitvaa acelassa sato guuthamuttaahaarajiivana''nti. eva~nca pana vatvaa taavadeva vaccaku.ti.m pavisitvaa paayaasa.m va.d.dhento viya hatthena guutha.m va.d.dhetvaa va.d.dhetvaa yaavadattha.m khaadi, mutta~nca pivi. iminaa niyaamena yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa kaala"nkatvaa niraye paccitvaa puna guuthamuttaahaaro vasitvaa tasseva kammassa vipaakaavasesena manussesu uppannopi pa~nca jaatisataani niga.n.tho hutvaa guuthabhakkho ahosi.

[03] puna ^a^P2.0119^ea^ imasmi.m buddhuppaade manussayoniya.m nibbattamaanopi ariyuupavaadabalena duggatakuule nibbattitvaa tha~n~na.m vaa khiira.m vaa sappi.m vaa paayamaano, ta.m cha.d.detvaa muttameva pivati, odana.m bhojiyamaano, ta.m cha.d.detvaa guuthameva khaadati, eva.m guuthamuttaparibhogena va.d.dhanto vayappattopi tadeva paribhu~njati. manussaa tato vaaretu.m asakkontaa pariccaji.msu. so ~naatakehi pariccatto naggapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa na nhaayati, rajojalladharo kesamassuuni lu~ncitvaa a~n~ne iriyaapathe pa.tikkhipitvaa ekapaadena ti.t.thati, nimantana.m na saadiyati, maasopavaasa.m adhi.t.thaaya pu~n~natthikehi dinna.m bhojana.m maase maase ekavaara.m kusaggena gahetvaa divaa jivhaggena lehati, rattiya.m pana ``allaguutha.m sappaa.naka''nti akhaaditvaa sukkhaguuthameva khaadati, eva.m karontassa pa~ncapa~n~naasavassaani viitivattaani mahaajano ``mahaatapo paramappiccho''ti ma~n~namaano tanninno tappo.no ahosi.

[03] atha bhagavaa tassa hadayabbhantare gha.te padiipa.m viya arahattuupanissaya.m pajjalanta.m disvaa sayameva tattha gantvaa dhamma.m desetvaa sotaapattiphale pati.t.thaapetvaa, ehibhikkhuupasampadaaya laddhuupasampada.m vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatte pati.t.thaapesi. ayamettha sa"nkhepo. vitthaaro pana ^b^dhammapade^eb^ ^a^M2.0014^ea^ ``maase maase kusaggenaa''ti gaathaava.n.nanaaya (dha0 pa0 a.t.tha0 1.jambukattheravatthu) vuttanayena ^a^V2.0013^ea^ veditabbo. arahatte pana pati.t.thito parinibbaanakaale ``aadito micchaa pa.tipajjitvaapi sammaasambuddha.m nissaaya saavakena adhigantabba.m mayaa adhigata''nti dassento --
[22] sukkhaguuthaani ca khaadi.m, uddesa~nca na saadiyi.m..
[22] tisso vijjaa anuppattaa, kata.m buddhassa saasana''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^pa~ncapa~n~naasavassaani, rajojallamadhaarayi^eb^nti naggapabbajjuupagamanena nhaanapa.tikkhepato pa~ncaadhikaani pa~n~naasavassaani sariire lagga.m aagantukare.nusa"nkhaata.m rajo, sariiramalasa"nkhaata.m jalla~nca kaayena dhaaresi.m. ^b^bhu~njanto maasika.m bhatta^eb^nti rattiya.m guutha.m khaadanto lokava~ncanattha.m maasopavaasiko naama hutvaa pu~n~natthikehi dinna.m bhojana.m maase maase ekavaara.m jivhagge pa.thanavasena bhu~njanto ^b^alocayi^eb^nti taadisacchaarikaapakkhepena sithilamuula.m kesamassu.m a"nguliihi lu~ncaapesi.m.

[03] ^b^ekapaadena^eb^ ^a^P2.0120^ea^ ^b^a.t.thaasi.m, aasana.m parivajjayi^eb^nti sabbena sabba.m aasana.m nisajja.m parivajjesi.m, ti.t.thanto ca ubho hatthe ukkhipitvaa ekeneva paadena a.t.thaasi.m. ^b^uddesa^eb^nti nimantana.m. udissakatanti keci. ^b^na saadiyi^eb^nti na sampa.ticchi.m pa.tikkhipinti attho.

[03] ^b^etaadisa.m karitvaana, bahu.m duggatigaamina^eb^nti etaadisa.m evaruupa.m vipaakanibbattanaka.m duggatigaamina.m bahu.m paapakamma.m purimajaatiisu idha ca katvaa uppaadetvaa. ^b^vuyhamaano^eb^ ^a^M2.0015^ea^ ^b^mahoghenaa^eb^ti kaamoghaadinaa mahataa oghena visesato di.t.thoghena apaayasamudda.m patiaaka.d.dhiyamaano, ^b^buddha.m sara.namaagama^eb^nti taadisena pu~n~nakammacchiddena kicchena manussattabhaava.m labhitvaa idaani pu~n~nabalena buddha.m ``sara.na''nti aagamaasi.m, ``sammaasambuddho bhagavaa''ti aveccapasaadena satthari pasiidi.m. ^b^sara.nagamana.m passa, passa dhammasudhammata^eb^nti aayatanagata.m mama sara.nagamana.m passa, passa saasanadhammassa ^a^V2.0014^ea^ ca sudhammata.m yoha.m tathaamicchaapa.tipannopi ekovaadeneva satthaaraa edisa.m sampatti.m sampaapito. ^b^``tisso vijjaa''^eb^tiaadinaa ta.m sampatti.m dasseti tenaaha (apa0 thera 2.46.17-21) --

[03] ^b^svaagata.m vataa^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato senakattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m disvaa pasannamaanaso morahatthena bhagavanta.m puujesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa uruvelakassapattherassa bhaginiyaa kucchimhi nibbatti, ^b^senako^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vayappatto braahma.naana.m vijjaasippesu nipphatti.m gato gharaavaasa.m vasati. tena ca samayena mahaajano sa.mvacchare sa.mvacchare phaggunamaase uttaraphaggunanakkhatte ussava.m anubhavanto gayaaya.m titthaabhiseka.m karoti. tena ta.m ussava.m ^a^M2.0016^ea^ ^b^``gayaaphagguu''^eb^ti vadanti. atha bhagavaa taadise ussavadivase veneyyaanukampaaya gayaatitthasamiipe viharati, mahaajanopi titthaabhisekaadhippaayena tato ^a^P2.0121^ea^ tato ta.m .thaana.m upagacchati. tasmi.m kha.ne senakopi titthaabhisekattha.m ta.m .thaana.m upagato satthaara.m dhamma.m desenta.m disvaa upasa"nkamitvaa dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.46.9-16) --
[22] nibbaayi.msu tayo aggii, labhaami vipula.m sukha.m..
[21] ``aho buddho aho dhammo, aho no satthusampadaa.
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa attano pa.tipatti.m paccavekkhitvaa sa~njaatasomanasso udaanavasena --

[01] tattha ^b^svaagata.m vata me aasii^eb^ti mayaa su.t.thu aagata.m vata aasi. mama vaa sundara.m vata aagamana.m aasi. ^b^gayaaya^eb^nti gayaatitthasamiipe. ^b^gayaphagguyaa^eb^ti ``gayaaphagguu''ti laddhavohaare phaggunamaasassa uttaraphagguniinakkhatte. ^b^``ya''^eb^ntiaadi svaagatabhaavassa kaara.nadassana.m. tattha ^b^ya^eb^nti yasmaa. ^b^addasaasi^eb^nti addakkhi.m. ^b^sambuddha^eb^nti sammaa saama.m sabbadhammaana.m buddhattaa sambuddha.m. ^b^desenta.m dhammamuttama^eb^nti uttama.m agga.m sabbase.t.tha.m ekantaniyyaanika.m dhamma.m veneyyajjhaasayaanuruupa.m bhaasanta.m.

[03] ^b^mahappabha^eb^nti mahatiyaa sariirappabhaaya ~naa.nappabhaaya ca samannaagata.m. ^b^ga.naacariya^eb^nti bhikkhuparisaadiina.m ga.naana.m uttamena damathena aacaarasikkhaapanena ga.naacariya.m. aggabhuutaana.m siilaadiina.m ^a^V2.0016^ea^ gu.naana.m adhigamena ^b^aggappatta.m^eb^. devamanussaadiina.m paramena vinayena vinayanato, saya.m naayakarahitattaa ca ^b^vinaayaka.m^eb^. kenaci anabhibhuuto hutvaa sakala.m loka.m abhibhavitvaa .thitattaa, pa~ncannampi maaraana.m jitattaa ca ^b^sadevakassa lokassa jina.m^eb^ sadevake loke aggajina.m, baatti.msavaramahaapurisalakkha.naasiitianubya~njanaadipa.tima.n.ditaruupakaayataaya dasabalacatuvesaarajjaadigu.napa.tima.n.ditadhammakaayataaya ca ^a^P2.0122^ea^ sadevakena lokena aparimeyyadassanataaya asadisadassanataaya ca ^b^atuladassana.m^eb^.

[03] gatibalaparakkamaadisampattiyaa mahaanaagasadisattaa, naagesupi khii.naasavesu mahaanubhaavataaya ca ^b^mahaanaaga.m^eb^. maarasenaavimathanato mahaavikkantataaya ca ^b^mahaaviira.m. mahaajuti^eb^nti mahaapataapa.m mahaatejanti attho. natthi etassa cattaaropi aasavaati ^b^anaasava.m^eb^. sabbe aasavaa savaasanaa parikkhii.naa etassaati ^b^sabbaasavaparikkhii.na.m^eb^. kaama.m saavakabuddhaa paccekabuddhaa ca khii.naasavaava, sabba~n~nubuddhaa eva pana savaasane aasave khepentiiti dassanattha.m ``anaasava''nti vatvaa puna ``sabbaasavaparikkhii.na''nti vutta.m. tena vutta.m -- ``sabbe aasavaa savaasanaa parikkhii.naa etassaati sabbaasavaparikkhii.na''nti. di.t.thadhammikasamparaayikaparamatthehi yathaaraha.m veneyyaana.m anusaasanato ^b^satthaara.m,^eb^ catuvesaarajjavisaaradataaya kutocipi ^a^M2.0018^ea^ bhayaabhaavato ^b^akutobhaya.m,^eb^ evaruupa.m sammaasambuddha.m ya.m yasmaa addasaasi.m, tasmaa svaagata.m vata me aasiiti yojanaa.

[03] idaani satthu dassanena attanaa laddhagu.na.m dassento catuttha.m gaathamaaha. tassattho -- ka~njiyapu.n.nalaabu viya takkabharitacaa.ti viya vasaapiitapilotikaa viya ca sa.mkilesavatthuuhi anamatagge sa.msaare cirakaala.m ^b^sa.mkili.t.tha.m^eb^. gaddulabandhita.m viya thambhe saarameya.m sakkaayathambhe ^b^di.t.thisandaanena,^eb^ di.t.thibandhanena ^b^bandhita.m^eb^ baddha.m, tato vimocento ca abhijjhaadiihi ^b^sabbaganthe hi ma.m senaka.m^eb^ ariyamaggahatthena, ^b^vimocayi vata so bhagavaa^eb^ mayha.m satthaati bhagavati abhippasaada.m pavedeti.

[03] ^b^yo dandhakaale^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato sambhuutattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani karonto buddhasu~n~ne loke candabhaagaaya nadiyaa ^a^V2.0017^ea^ tiire kinnarayoniya.m nibbatto. ekadivasa.m a~n~natara.m paccekabuddha.m disvaa pasannamaanaso vanditvaa kata~njalii ajjunapupphehi puuja.m akaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kulagehe nibbattitvaa ^b^sambhuuto^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto bhagavato parinibbaanassa pacchaa dhammabha.n.daagaarikassa santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa sama.nadhamma.m karonto ^a^P2.0123^ea^ vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.52.28-36) --
[22] sukhette vappita.m biija.m, sayambhumhi aho mama..

[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa vimuttisukhena viharanto vassasataparinibbute bhagavati vesaalikesu vajjiputtakesu dasa vatthuuni paggayha .thitesu kaaka.n.dakaputtena yasattherena ussaahitehi sattasatehi khii.naasavehi ta.m di.t.thi.m bhinditvaa saddhamma.m pagga.nhantehi dhammavinayasa"ngahe kate tesa.m vajjiputtakaana.m uddhammaubbinayadiipane dhammasa.mvegena thero --
[22] yaso kitti~nca pappoti, mittehi na virujjhatii''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^yo dandhakaale taratii^eb^ti kismi~nci kattabbavatthusmi.m -- ``kappati nu kho, na nu kho kappatii''ti vinayakukkucce uppanne yaava viyatta.m vinayadhara.m pucchitvaa ta.m kukkucca.m na vinodeti, taava dandhakaale tassa kiccassa dandhaayitabbasamaye tarati madditvaa viitikkama.m karoti. ^b^tara.niiye ca dandhaye^eb^ti gaha.t.thassa taava sara.nagamanasiilasamaadaanaadike, pabbajitassa vattapa.tivattakara.naadike ^a^M2.0020^ea^ samathavipassanaanuyoge ca taritabbe sampatte siigha.m ta.m kicca.m ananuyu~njitvaa -- ``aagamanamaase pakkhe vaa karissaamii''ti dandhaayeyya, ta.m kicca.m akarontova kaala.m viitinaameyya. ^b^ayonisa.mvidhaanenaa^eb^ti eva.m dandhaayitabbe taranto taritabbe ca dandhaayanto anupaayasa.mvidhaanena upaayasa.mvidhaanaabhaavena ^b^baalo,^eb^ mandabuddhiko puggalo, sampati aayati~nca ^b^dukkha.m^eb^ anattha.m paapu.naati.

[03] ^b^tassatthaa parihaayantii^eb^ti tassa tathaaruupassa puggalassa di.t.thadhammikaadibhedaa atthaa ^b^kaa.lapakkhe candimaa^eb^ viya, ^b^parihaayanti^eb^ divase ^a^P2.0124^ea^ divase parikkhaya.m pariyaadaana.m gacchanti. ``asuko puggalo assaddho appasanno kusiito hiinaviiriyo''tiaadinaa. ^b^aayasakya.m^eb^ vi~n~nuuhi garahitabbata.m ^b^pappoti^eb^ paapu.naati. ^b^mittehi ca virujjhatii^eb^ti ``eva.m pa.tipajja, maa eva.m pa.tipajjaa''ti ovaadadaayakehi kalyaa.namittehi ``avacaniiyaa maya''nti ovaadassa anaadaaneneva viruddho naama hoti.

[03] sesagaathaadvayassa vuttavipariyaayena attho veditabbo. keci panettha -- ``tarati dandhaye''tipadaana.m atthabhaavena bhaavanaacittassa paggahaniggahe uddharanti. ta.m pacchimagaathaasu yujjati. purimaa hi dve gaathaa pabbajitakaalato pa.t.thaaya caritabba.m sama.nadhamma.m akatvaa kukkuccapakatataaya dasa vatthuuni diipetvaa sa"nghena nikka.d.dhite vajjiputtake sandhaaya therena vuttaa. pacchimaa pana attasadise sammaa pa.tipanne sakattha.m nipphaadetvaa .thiteti.

[03] ^b^ubhayenaa^eb^tiaadikaa ^a^V2.0019^ea^ aayasmato raahulattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m sikkhaakaamaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa ^a^M2.0021^ea^ sayampi ta.m .thaanantara.m patthetvaa senaasanavisodhanavijjotanaadika.m u.laara.m pu~n~na.m katvaa pa.nidhaanamakaasi. so tato cavitvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade amhaaka.m bodhisatta.m pa.ticca yasodharaaya deviyaa kucchimhi nibbattitvaa ^b^raahulo^eb^ti laddhanaamo mahataa khattiyaparivaarena va.d.dhi, tassa pabbajjaavidhaana.m khandhake (mahaava0 105) aagatameva. so pabbajitvaa satthu santike anekehi suttapadehi suladdhovaado paripakka~naa.no vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.2.68-85) --
[22] nibbattissanti paasaadaa, ye keci manaso piyaa..
[22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
[22] raahulo naama naamena, arahaa so bhavissati..
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa attano pa.tipatti.m paccavekkhitvaa a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
[22] ya~ncamhi putto buddhassa, ya~nca dhammesu cakkhumaa..
[21] ``ya~nca me aasavaa khii.naa, ya~nca natthi punabbhavo.

[03] tattha ^b^ubhayeneva sampanno^eb^ti jaatisampadaa, pa.tipattisampadaati ubhayasampattiyaapi sampanno samannaagato. ^b^raahulabhaddoti ma.m viduu^eb^ti ``raahulabhaddo''ti ma.m sabrahmacaarino sa~njaananti. tassa hi ^a^V2.0021^ea^ jaatasaasana.m sutvaa bodhisattena ``raahu jaato, bandhana.m jaata''nti vuttavacana.m upaadaaya suddhodanamahaaraajaa ``raahulo''ti naama.m ga.nhi. tattha aadito pitaraa vuttapariyaayameva gahetvaa aaha -- ``raahulabhaddoti ma.m viduu''ti. ^b^bhaddo^eb^ti ca pasa.msaavacanameta.m.

[03] idaani ta.m ubhayasampatti.m dassetu.m ^b^``ya~ncamhii''^eb^tiaadi vutta.m. tattha ^b^ya^eb^nti yasmaa. ^b^ca^eb^-saddo samuccayattho. ^b^amhi putto buddhassaa^eb^ti sammaasambuddhassa orasaputto amhi. ^b^dhammesuu^eb^ti lokiyesu lokuttaresu ca dhammesu, catusaccadhammesuuti attho. ^b^cakkhumaa^eb^ti maggapa~n~naacakkhunaa cakkhumaa ca amhiiti yojetabba.m.

[03] puna aparaaparehipi pariyaayehi attani ubhayasampatti.m dassetu.m -- ^b^``ya~nca me aasavaa khii.naa''^eb^ti gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^dakkhi.neyyo^eb^ti dakkhi.naaraho. ^b^amataddaso^eb^ti nibbaanassa dassaavii. sesa.m suvi~n~neyyameva.

[03] idaani yaaya vijjaasampattiyaa ca vimuttisampattiyaa ca abhaavena sattakaayo kumine bandhamacchaa viya sa.msaare parivattati, ta.m ubhayasampatti.m attani dassetu.m ^b^``kaamandhaa''^eb^ti gaathaadvayamaaha. tattha kaamehi kaamesu vaa andhaati ^b^kaamandhaa^eb^. ``chando raago''tiaadivibhaagehi (cuu.lani0 ajitamaa.navapucchaaniddesa 8) kilesakaamehi ruupaadiisu vatthukaamesu anaadiinavadassitaaya andhiikataa. ^b^jaalapacchannaa^eb^ti sakala.m bhavattaya.m ajjhottharitvaa .thitena visattikaajaalena pakaarato channaa paligu.n.thitaa. ^b^ta.nhaachadanachaaditaa^eb^ti tato eva ta.nhaasa"nkhaatena chadanena chaaditaa nivutaa sabbaso pa.tikujjitaa. ^b^pamattabandhunaa baddhaa, macchaava kuminaamukhe^eb^ti kuminaamukhe macchabandhaana.m macchapasibbakamukhe baddhaa macchaa viya pamattabandhunaa maarena ^a^P2.0126^ea^ yena ^a^M2.0024^ea^ kaamabandhanena baddhaa ime sattaa tato na nigacchanti antobandhanagataava honti.

[03] ^b^ta.m^eb^ tathaaruupa.m ^b^kaama.m^eb^ bandhanabhuuta.m ^b^ujjhitvaa^eb^ pubbabhaagapa.tipattiyaa pahaaya kilesa^b^maarassa bandhana.m chetvaa,^eb^ puna ariyamaggasatthena anavasesato samucchinditvaa tato eva avijjaasa"nkhaatena muulena ^b^samuula.m,^eb^ kaamata.nhaadika.m ^b^ta.nha.m abbuyha^eb^ uddharitvaa sabbakilesadarathapari.laahaabhaavato, ^b^siitibhuuto^eb^ saupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa nibbuto, aha.m ^b^asmi^eb^ homiiti attho.

[03] ^b^jaataruupenaa^eb^tiaadikaa ^a^V2.0022^ea^ aayasmato candanattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto ito ekati.mse kappe buddhasu~n~ne loke rukkhadevataa hutvaa nibbatto sudassana.m naama paccekabuddha.m pabbatantare vasanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso ku.tajapupphehi puuja.m akaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m vibhavasampanne kule nibbattitvaa ^b^candano^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto gharaavaasa.m vasanto satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa sotaapanno ahosi. so eka.m putta.m labhitvaa gharaavaasa.m pahaaya pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa ara~n~ne viharanto satthaara.m vanditu.m saavatthi.m aagato susaane vasati. tassa aagatabhaava.m sutvaa puraa.nadutiyikaa ala"nkatapa.tiyattaa daaraka.m aadaaya mahataa parivaarena therassa santika.m gacchati -- ``itthikuttaadiihi na.m palobhetvaa uppabbaajessaamii''ti. thero ta.m aagacchanti.m duuratova disvaa ``idaanissaa avisayo bhavissaamii''ti yathaaraddha.m vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.52.37-43) --

[03] cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa aakaase .thatvaa tassaa dhamma.m desetvaa sara.nesu ca siilesu ca pati.t.thaapetvaa saya.m attanaa pubbe vasita.t.thaanameva gato. sahaayabhikkhuuhi -- ``vippasannaani kho te, aavuso, indriyaani, kacci tayaa saccaani pa.tividdhaanii''ti pu.t.tho --
[22] tisso vijjaa anuppattaa, kata.m buddhassa saasana''nti.. --
[25] imaahi gaathaahi attano pa.tipatti.m kathento a~n~na.m byaakaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^jaataruupena sa~nchannaa^eb^ti jaataruupamayena siisuupagaadiala"nkaarena ala"nkara.navasena pa.ticchaaditasariiraa, sabbaabhara.nabhuusitaati attho. ^b^daasiiga.napurakkhataa^eb^ti yathaaraha.m ala"nkatapa.tiyattena attano daasiga.nena ^a^M2.0026^ea^ purato kataa parivaaritaati attho. ^b^a"nkena puttamaadaayaa^eb^ti ``api naama puttampi disvaa gehassitasaato bhaveyyaa''ti putta.m attano a"nkena gahetvaa.

[03] ^b^aayanti^eb^nti aagacchanti.m. ^b^sakaputtassa maatara^eb^nti mama orasaputtassa janani.m, mayha.m puraa.nadutiyikanti attho. sabbamida.m thero attano kaamaraagasamuccheda.m bahuma~n~nanto vadati. ^b^yoniso udapajjathaa^eb^ti ``evaruupaapi naama sampatti jaraabyaadhimara.nehi abhibhuyyati, aho sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa adhuvaa anassaasikaa''ti eva.m yonisomanasikaaro uppajji. sesa.m he.t.thaa vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^dhammo have^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato dhammikattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kaale migaluddako hutvaa ekadivasa.m ara~n~naayatane devaparisaaya satthu dhamma.m desentassa ``dhammo eso vuccatii''ti desanaaya nimitta.m ga.nhi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kosalara.t.the braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^dhammiko^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto jetavanapa.tiggaha.ne laddhappasaado pabbajitvaa a~n~natarasmi.m gaamakaavaase aavaasiko hutvaa viharanto ^a^V2.0024^ea^ aagantukaana.m bhikkhuuna.m vattaavattesu ujjhaanabahulo akkhamo ahosi. tena bhikkhuu ta.m vihaara.m cha.d.detvaa pakkami.msu. so ekakova ahosi. vihaarasaamiko upaasako ta.m kaara.na.m sutvaa bhagavato ta.m pavatti.m aarocesi. satthaa ta.m bhikkhu.m pakkosetvaa tamattha.m pucchitvaa tena ``eva.m, bhante''ti vutte -- ``naaya.m idaaneva akkhamo, pubbepi akkhamo ahosii''ti vatvaa bhikkhuuhi yaacito rukkhadhamma.m (jaa0 1.1.74) kathetvaa upari tassa ovaada.m dento --
[21] ``dhammo ^a^M2.0027^ea^ ^a^P2.0128^ea^ have rakkhati dhammacaari.m, dhammo suci.n.no sukhamaavahaati.
[22] esaanisa.mso dhamme suci.n.ne, na duggati.m gacchati dhammacaarii..
[21] ``na hi dhammo adhammo ca, ubho samavipaakino.
[22] adhammo niraya.m neti, dhammo paapeti suggati.m..
[21] ``tasmaa hi dhammesu kareyya chanda.m, iti modamaano sugatena taadinaa.
[22] dhamme .thitaa sugatavarassa saavakaa, niiyanti dhiiraa sara.navaraggagaamino..
[22] cando yathaa dosinaa pu.n.namaasiya''nti.. -- catasso gaathaa abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^dhammo^eb^ti lokiyalokuttaro sucaritadhammo. ^b^rakkhatii^eb^ti apaayadukkhato rakkhati, sa.msaaradukkhato ca viva.t.tuupanissayabhuuto rakkhatiyeva. ^b^dhammacaari^eb^nti ta.m dhamma.m caranta.m pa.tipajjanta.m. ^b^suci.n.no^eb^ti su.t.thu ci.n.no kammaphalaani saddahitvaa sakkacca.m cittiikatvaa upacito. ^b^sukha^eb^nti lokiyalokuttarasukha.m. tattha lokiya.m taava kaamaavacaraadibhedo dhammo yathaasaka.m sukha.m di.t.the vaa dhamme upapajje vaa apare vaa pariyaaye ^b^aavahati^eb^ nipphaadeti, itara.m pana viva.t.tuupanissaye .thatvaa ci.n.no paramparaaya aavahatiiti vattu.m va.t.tati anupanissayassa tadabhaavato. ^b^esaanisa.mso dhamme suci.n.ne, na duggati.m gacchati dhammacaarii^eb^ti dhammacaarii puggalo dhamme suci.n.ne ta.mnimitta.m duggati.m na gacchatiiti eso dhamme suci.n.ne aanisa.mso udrayoti attho.

[03] yasmaa ^a^M2.0028^ea^ dhammeneva sugatigamana.m, adhammeneva ca duggatigamana.m, tasmaa ``dhammo adhammo''ti ime a~n~nama~n~na.m asa.mki.n.naphalaati dassetu.m ^b^``na hi dhammo''^eb^tiaadinaa dutiya.m gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^adhammo^eb^ti dhammapa.tipakkho duccarita.m. ^b^samavipaakino^eb^ti sadisavipaakaa samaanaphalaa.

[03] ^b^tasmaa^eb^ti ^a^V2.0025^ea^ yasmaa dhammaadhammaana.m aya.m yathaavutto vipaakabhedo, tasmaa. ^b^chanda^eb^nti kattukamyataachanda.m. ^b^iti modamaano sugatena taadinaa^eb^ti iti eva.m vuttappakaarena ovaadadaanena sugatena sammaggatena sammaapa.tipannena i.t.thaadiisu taadibhaavappattiyaa taadinaamavataa hetubhuutena modamaano ^a^P2.0129^ea^ tu.t.thi.m aapajjamaano dhammesu chanda.m kareyyaati yojanaa. ettaavataa va.t.ta.m dassetvaa idaani viva.t.ta.m dassento ^b^``dhamme .thitaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tassattho -- yasmaa sugatassa varassa sugatesu ca varassa sammaasambuddhassa ^b^saavakaa^eb^ tassa ^b^dhamme .thitaa dhiiraa^eb^ ativiya aggabhuutasara.nagaamino teneva sara.nagamanasa"nkhaate dhamme .thitabhaavena sakalava.t.tadukkhatopi ^b^niiyanti^eb^ nissaranti, tasmaa hi dhammesu kareyya chandanti.
[03] eva.m satthaaraa tiihi gaathaahi dhamme desite desanaanusaarena yathaanisinnova vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.52.44-50) --
[22] tattha citta.m pasaadetvaa, uttari.m duttara.m bhava.m..
[03] tathaa arahatte pati.t.thito. arahatta.m pana patvaa attanaa adhigata.m visesa.m satthu nivedento carimagaathaaya a~n~na.m byaakaasi.

[03] tattha ^a^M2.0029^ea^ ^b^vippho.tito^eb^ti vidhuto, magga~naa.nena pa.tinissa.t.thoti attho. ^b^ga.n.damuulo^eb^ti avijjaa. saa hi ga.n.dati savati. ``ga.n.doti kho, bhikkhu, pa~ncanneta.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m adhivacana''nti (sa.m0 ni0 4.103; a0 ni0 6.23; 8.56; 9.15; cuu.lani0 khaggavisaa.nasuttaniddesa 137) eva.m satthaaraa vuttassa dukkhamuulayogato, kilesaasucipagghara.nato, uppaadajaraabha"ngehi uddhumaatapakkapabhijjanato ca, ga.n.daabhidhaanassa upaadaanakkhandhapa~ncakassa ^a^V2.0026^ea^ muula.m kaara.na.m ^b^ta.nhaajaalo samuuhato^eb^ti ta.nhaasa"nkhaato jaalo maggena samugghaa.tito. ^b^so khii.nasa.msaaro na catthi ki~ncana^eb^nti so aha.m eva.m pahiinata.nhaavijjataaya parikkhii.nasa.msaaro pahiinabhavamuulattaa eva na catthi, na ca upalabbhati raagaadiki~ncana.m. ^b^cando yathaa dosinaa pu.n.namaasiya^eb^nti yathaa naama cando abbhamahikaadidosarahito pu.n.namaasiya.m paripu.n.nakaale eva.m ahampi arahattaadhigamena apetaraagaadiki~ncano paripu.n.nadhammako.t.thaaso ahosinti.

[03] ^b^yadaa^eb^ ^a^P2.0130^ea^ ^b^balaakaa^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato sappakattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto ito ekati.mse kappe mahaanubhaavo naagaraajaa hutvaa nibbatto sambhavassa naama paccekabuddhassa abbhokaase samaapattiyaa nisinnassa mahanta.m paduma.m gahetvaa uparimuddhani dhaarento puuja.m akaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^sappako^eb^ti laddhanaamo vi~n~nuta.m patto bhagavato santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa ajakara.niyaa ^a^M2.0030^ea^ naama nadiyaa tiire le.nagirivihaare vasanto nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.52.78-83) --
[22] buddhopi sambhavo naama, abbhokaase vasii tadaa..

[03] so arahatta.m patvaa satthaara.m vanditu.m saavatthi.m aagato ~naatiihi upa.t.thiiyamaano tattha katipaaha.m ^a^V2.0027^ea^ vasitvaa dhamma.m desetvaa ~naatake sara.nesu ca siilesu ca pati.t.thaapetvaa yathaavutta.t.thaanameva gantukaamo ahosi. ta.m ~naatakaa ``idheva, bhante, vasatha, maya.m pa.tijaggissaamaa''ti yaaci.msu. so gamanaakaara.m dassetvaa .thito attanaa vasita.t.thaanakittanaapadesena vivekaabhirati.m pakaasento --
[21] ``yadaa balaakaa sucipa.n.daracchadaa, kaa.lassa meghassa bhayena tajjitaa.
[22] palehiti aalayamaalayesinii, tadaa nadii ajakara.nii rameti ma.m..
[21] ``yadaa balaakaa suvisuddhapa.n.daraa, kaa.lassa meghassa bhayena tajjitaa.
[22] pariyesati le.namale.nadassinii, tadaa nadii ajakara.nii rameti ma.m..
[21] ``ka.m nu tattha na ramenti, jambuyo ubhato tahi.m.
[22] khemaa ajakara.nii sivaa surammaa''ti.. -- catasso gaathaa abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^yadaa^eb^ti yasmi.m kaale. ^b^balaakaa^eb^ti balaakaasaku.nikaa. ^b^sucipa.n.daracchadaa^eb^ti sucisuddhadhavalapakkhaa. ^b^kaa.lassa meghassa bhayena tajjitaa^eb^ti jalabhaarabharitataaya kaa.lassa a~njanagirisannikaasassa paavussakameghassa gajjato vu.t.thibhayena nibbijjitaa bhi.msaapitaa. ^b^palehitii^eb^ti gocarabhuumito uppatitvaa gamissati. ^b^aalaya^eb^nti nilaya.m attano kulaavaka.m. ^b^aalayesinii^eb^ti tattha aalayana.m niliiyanameva icchantii. ^b^tadaa nadii ajakara.nii rameti ma^eb^nti tasmi.m paavussakakaale ajakara.niinaamikaa nadii navodakassa puuraa haarahaarinii kula"nkasaa ma.m rameti mama citta.m aaraadhetiiti utupadesavisesakittanaapadesena vivekaabhirati.m pakaasesi.

[03] ^b^suvisuddhapa.n.daraa^eb^ti su.t.thu visuddhapa.n.darava.n.naa, asammissava.n.naa sabbasetaati attho. ^b^pariyesatii^eb^ti maggati. ^b^le.na^eb^nti vasana.t.thaana.m. ^b^ale.nadassinii^eb^ti vasana.t.thaana.m apassantii. pubbe nibaddhavasana.t.thaanassa abhaavena ale.nadassinii, idaani paavussakakaale meghagajjitena aahitagabbhaa ^b^pariyesati le.na^eb^nti nibaddhavasana.t.thaana.m kulaavaka.m karotiiti attho.

[03] ^b^ka.m nu tattha...pe0... pacchato^eb^ti ^b^mama^eb^ vasanakamahaale.nassa ^b^pacchato^eb^ pacchaabhaage ^b^aapagaakuula.m^eb^ ajakara.niinadiyaa ubhatotiira.m ^b^tahi.m tahi.m^eb^ ito cito ca sobhentiyo niccakaala.m phalabhaaranamitasaakhaa ^a^V2.0028^ea^ siniddhapa.n.nacchaayaa ^b^jambuyo tattha^eb^ tasmi.m .thaane ^b^ka.m^eb^ naama satta.m ^b^na ramenti nu,^eb^ sabba.m ramentiyeva.

[03] ^b^taamatamadasa"nghasuppahiinaa^eb^ti ^a^M2.0032^ea^ amata.m vuccati agada.m, tena majjantiiti amatamadaa, sappaa, tesa.m sa"ngho amatamadasa"ngho, tato su.t.thu pahiinaa apagataa. ^b^bhekaa^eb^ ma.n.duukiyo, ^b^mandavatii^eb^ saravatiyo, ^b^panaadayanti^eb^ ta.m .thaana.m madhurena vassitena ninnaadayanti. ^b^naajja^eb^ ^a^P2.0132^ea^ ^b^girinadiihi vippavaasasamayoti^eb^ ajja etarahi a~n~naahipi pabbateyyaahi nadiihi vippavaasasamayo na hoti, visesato pana vaa.lamacchasusumaaraadivirahitato ^b^khemaa ajakara.nii^eb^ nadii. sundaratalatitthapulinasampattiyaa ^b^sivaa^eb^. su.t.thu rammaa rama.niiyaa, tasmaa tattheva me mano ramatiiti adhippaayo.
[03] eva.m pana vatvaa ~naatake vissajjetvaa attano vasana.t.thaanameva gato. su~n~naagaaraabhiratidiipanena idameva ca therassa a~n~naabyaakara.na.m ahosiiti.

[03] ^b^pabbaji^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato muditattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m disvaa pasannamaanaso eka.m ma~ncamadaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kosalara.t.the gahapatikule nibbattitvaa ^b^mudito^eb^ti laddhanaamo vi~n~nuta.m paapu.ni. tena ca samayena ta.m kula.m ra~n~naa kenacideva kara.niiyena palibuddha.m ahosi. mudito raajabhayaabhiito palaayitvaa ara~n~na.m pavi.t.tho a~n~natarassa khii.naasavattherassa vasana.t.thaana.m upagacchi. thero tassa bhiitabhaava.m ~natvaa ``maa bhaayii''ti samassaasesi. so ``kittakena nu kho, bhante, kaalena ida.m me bhaya.m vuupasamessatii''ti pucchitvaa ``satta.t.thamaase atikkamitvaa''ti vutte -- ``ettaka.m kaala.m adhivaasetu.m na sakkomi, pabbajissaamaha.m, bhante, pabbaajetha ma''nti jiivitarakkha.nattha.m pabbajja.m yaaci. thero ta.m pabbaajesi. so pabbajitvaa saasane pa.tiladdhasaddho bhaye vuupasantepi sama.nadhamma.myeva ^a^M2.0033^ea^ ^a^V2.0029^ea^ rocento kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto -- ``arahatta.m appatvaa imasmaa vasanagabbhaa bahi na nikkhamissaamii''tiaadinaa pa.ti~n~na.m katvaa vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.36.30-33) --
[22] eka.m ma~nca.m mayaa dinna.m, pasannena sapaa.ninaa..
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa vimuttisukha.m pa.tisa.mvedento sahaayabhikkhuuhi adhigata.m pucchito attano pa.tipannaakaara.m kathento --
[21] ``naasissa.m na pivissaami, vihaaraa ca na nikkhame.
[22] tisso vijjaa anuppattaa, kata.m buddhassa saasana''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^jiivikattho^eb^ti jiivikaaya atthiko jiivikappayojano. ``ettha pabbajitvaa nibbhayo sukhena akilamanto jiivissaamii''ti eva.m jiivikatthaaya pabbajinti attho. ^b^laddhaana upasampada^eb^nti pa.thama.m saama.nerapabbajjaaya.m .thito ^a^M2.0034^ea^ ~natticatutthena kammena upasampada.m labhitvaa. ^b^tato saddha.m pa.tilabhi^eb^nti tato upasampannakaalato pa.t.thaaya kalyaa.namitte sevanto dve maatikaa, tisso anumodanaa, ekacca.m sutta.m, samathakamma.t.thaana.m, vipassanaavidhi~nca ugga.nhanto buddhaadiina.m mahaanubhaavata.m ^a^V2.0030^ea^ disvaa -- ``sammaasambuddho bhagavaa, svaakkhaato dhammo, suppa.tipanno sa"ngho''ti ratanattaye saddha.m pa.tilabhi.m. ^b^da.lhaviiriyo parakkami^eb^nti eva.m pa.tiladdhasaddho hutvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva saccapa.tivedhaaya da.lhaviiriyo thiraviiriyo hutvaa parakkami.m, akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya sammadeva padahi.m.

[03] yathaa pana parakkami.m, ta.m dassetu.m ^b^``kaama''^eb^ntiaadi vutta.m. tattha ^b^kaama^eb^nti yathaakaama.m eka.msato vaa ^b^bhijjatu. aya.m kaayo^eb^ti aya.m mama puutikaayo, iminaa viiriyapataapena bhijjati ce, bhijjatu chinnabhinna.m hotu. ^b^ma.msapesii visiiyaru^eb^nti iminaa da.lhaparakkamena imasmaa kaayaa ma.msapesiyo visiiyanti ce, visiiyantu ito cito viddha.msantu. ^b^ubho ja.n.nukasandhiihi, ja"nghaayo papatantu me^eb^ti ubhohi ja.n.nukasandhiihi saha mama ubho ja"nghaayo satthiyo uurubandhato bhijjitvaa bhuumiya.m papatantu. ``ma''ntipi paa.tho, so evattho. sesa.m he.t.thaa vuttanayameva.

[01] pa~ncakanipaate ^a^M2.0035^ea^ ^a^V2.0031^ea^ ^b^bhikkhu sivathika.m gantvaa^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato raajadattattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro, tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m pu~n~na.m upacinanto, ito catuddase kappe buddhasu~n~ne loke ^a^P2.0134^ea^ kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto, ekadivasa.m kenacideva kara.niiyena vananta.m upagato tattha a~n~natara.m paccekabuddha.m rukkhamuule nisinna.m disvaa pasannamaanaso suparisuddha.m ambaa.takaphala.m adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m satthavaahakule nibbatti. tassa mahaaraaja.m vessava.na.m aaraadhetvaa pa.tiladdhabhaavato maataapitaro ^b^raajadatto^eb^ti naama.m aka.msu. so vayappatto pa~ncahi saka.tasatehi bha.n.da.m aadaaya vaa.nijjavasena raajagaha.m agamaasi. tena ca samayena raajagahe a~n~nataraa ga.nikaa abhiruupaa dassaniiyaa paramasobhaggayogato divase divase sahassa.m labhati. atha so satthavaahaputto divase divase tassaa ga.nikaaya sahassa.m datvaa sa.mvaasa.m kappento nacirasseva sabba.m dhana.m khepetvaa duggato hutvaa ghaasacchaadanamattampi alabhanto ito cito ca paribbhamanto sa.mvegappatto ahosi. so ekadivasa.m upaasakehi saddhi.m ve.luvana.m agamaasi.

[01] tena ca samayena satthaa mahatiyaa parisaaya parivuto dhamma.m desento nisinno hoti. so parisapariyante nisiiditvaa satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa dhuta"ngaani samaadiyitvaa susaane vasati. tadaa a~n~nataropi satthavaahaputto sahassa.m datvaa taaya ga.nikaaya saha vasati. saa ca ga.nikaa tassa hatthe mahaggharatana.m disvaa lobha.m uppaadetvaa a~n~nehi dhuttapurisehi ta.m maaraapetvaa ta.m ratana.m ga.nhi. atha tassa satthavaahaputtassa manussaa ta.m pavatti.m sutvaa ocarakamanusse pesesu.m. te rattiya.m tassaa ga.nikaaya ghara.m pavisitvaa chaviaadiini anupahacceva ta.m maaretvaa sivathikaaya cha.d.desu.m. raajadattatthero asubhanimitta.m gahetu.m susaane vicaranto tassaa ga.nikaaya ka.levara.m ^a^M2.0036^ea^ pa.tikkulato manasi kaatu.m upagato katipayavaare yoniso manasi katvaa aciramatabhaavato so.nasi"ngaalaadiihi anupahatachavitaaya visabhaagavatthutaaya ca ayoniso ^a^V2.0032^ea^ manasikaronto, tattha kaamaraaga.m uppaadetvaa sa.mviggataramaanaso attano citta.m paribhaasitvaa muhutta.m ekamanta.m apasakkitvaa aadito upa.t.thita.m asubhanimittameva gahetvaa yoniso manasikaronto jhaana.m uppaadetvaa ta.m jhaana.m paadaka.m katvaa vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa taavadeva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.44.55-59) --
[01] arahatta.m pana patvaa attano pa.tipatti.m paccavekkhitvaa piitisomanassajaato --
[22] tisso vijjaa anuppattaa, kata.m buddhassa saasana''nti.. --

[01] tattha ^a^M2.0037^ea^ ^b^bhikkhu sivathika.m gantvaa^eb^ti sa.msaare bhayassa ikkhanato bhikkhu, asubhakamma.t.thaanattha.m aamakasusaana.m upagantvaa. ``bhikkhuu''ti ceta.m attaana.m sandhaaya thero saya.m vadati. ^b^itthi^eb^nti thiiyati ettha sukkaso.nita.m sattasantaanabhaavena sa.mha~n~natiiti thii, maatugaamo. eva~nca sabhaavaniruttivasena ``itthii''tipi vuccati. va~njhaadiisu pana ta.msadisataaya ta.msabhaavaanativattanato ca tabbohaaro. ``itthii''ti itthika.levara.m vadati. ^b^ujjhita^eb^nti pariccatta.m ujjhaniyattaa eva ^b^apaviddha.m^eb^ anapekkhabhaavena khitta.m. ^b^khajjanti.m kimihii phu.ta^eb^nti kimiihi puurita.m hutvaa khajjamaana.m.

[03] ^bya~nhi ^a^V2.0033^ea^ eke jigucchanti, mata.m disvaana paapakab^nti ya.m apagataayuusmaavi~n~naa.nataaya mata.m ka.levara.m paapaka.m nihiina.m laamaka.m eke cokkhajaatikaa jigucchanti, oloketumpi na icchanti. ^b^kaamaraago paaturahuu^eb^ti tasmi.m ku.nape ayonisomanasikaarassa balavataaya kaamaraago mayha.m paaturahosi uppajji. ^b^andhova savatii ahu^eb^nti tasmi.m ka.levare navahi dvaarehi asuci.m savati sandante asucibhaavassa adassanena andho viya ahosi.m. tenaaha --
[21] ``ratto attha.m na jaanaati, ratto dhamma.m na passati.
[22] andhatama.m tadaa hoti, ya.m raago sahate nara''nti ca..

[03] ``kaamacchando kho, braahma.na, andhakara.no acakkhukara.no''ti ca aadi. keci panettha takaaraagama.m katvaa ``kilesapariyu.t.thaanena avasavatti kilesassa vaa vasavattii''ti attha.m vadanti. apare ``andhova asati ahu''nti paa.li.m ^a^P2.0136^ea^ vatvaa ``kaamaraagena andho eva hutvaa satirahito ahosi''nti attha.m vadanti. tadubhaya.m pana paa.liya.m natthi.

[03] ^b^ora.m odanapaakamhaa^eb^ti odanapaakato ora.m, yaavataa kaalena suparidhotatintata.n.dulanaa.liyaa odana.m pacati, tato orameva kaala.m, tatopi lahukaalena raaga.m vinodento, ^b^tamhaa .thaanaa apakkami.m^eb^ yasmi.m .thaane .thitassa me raago uppajji, tamhaa .thaanaa apakkami.m apasakki.m. apakkantova ^b^satimaa sampajaanoha.m^eb^ sama.nasa~n~na.m upa.t.thapetvaa satipa.t.thaanamanasikaaravasena satimaa, sammadeva dhammasabhaavajaananena sampajaano ^a^M2.0038^ea^ ca hutvaa ekamanta.m upaavisi.m, palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa nisiidi.m. nisinnassa ca ^b^tato me manasiikaaro, yoniso udapajjathaa^eb^tiaadi sabba.m he.t.thaa vuttanayamevaati.

[03] ^b^ayoge^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato subhuutattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto kassapassa bhagavato kaale baaraa.nasiya.m gahapatimahaasaalakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa pasannamaanaso sara.nesu ca siilesu ca pati.t.thaaya maase maase a.t.thakkhattu.m catujjaatiyagandhena satthu gandhaku.ti.m ^a^V2.0034^ea^ opu~njaapesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena nibbattanibbatta.t.thaane sugandhasariiro hutvaa, imasmi.m buddhuppaade magadhara.t.the gahapatikule nibbattitvaa ^b^subhuuto^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto, nissara.najjhaasayataaya gharaavaasa.m pahaaya titthiyesu pabbajitvaa tattha saara.m alabhanto, satthu santike upatissakolitaselaadike bahuu sama.nabraahma.ne pabbajitvaa saama~n~nasukha.m anubhavante disvaa saasane pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa aacariyupajjhaaye aaraadhetvaa kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa vivekavaasa.m vasanto vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.55.272-308) --
[22] kassapo naama gottena, uppajji vadata.m varo..
[22] aakaaso viya pa~n~naaya, asa"ngo anilo yathaa..
[21] ``pacchime ca bhave daani, jaato vippakule aha.m.
[22] gabbha.m me vasato maataa, dehenaasi sugandhitaa..
[22] vaasayi.msu sugandhena, yasmi.m jaato aha.m ghare..
[22] tadaa buddhaanubhaava.m ta.m, disvaa pabbajito aha.m..
[21] ``yadaa pabbajito caaha.m, yadaa ca arahaa ahu.m.
[22] nibbaayissa.m yadaa caaha.m, gandhavasso tadaa ahu..
[22] tatheva gandhe itare ca sabbaso, pasayha vaayaami tato tahi.m tahi.m..

[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa titthiyesu pabbajitvaa attano patta.m attakilamathaanuyoga.m dukkha.m, saasane pabbajitvaa patta.m jhaanaadisukha~nca cintetvaa attano pa.tipattipaccavekkha.namukhena a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
[22] cara.m ce naadhigaccheyya, ta.m me dubbhagalakkha.na.m..
[21] ``abbuu.lha.m aghagata.m vijita.m, eka~nce ossajeyya kaliiva siyaa.
[22] sabbaanipi ce ossajeyya andhova siyaa, samavisamassa adassanato..
[21] ``ya~nhi kayiraa ta~nhi vade, ya.m na kayiraa na ta.m vade.
[22] eva.m subhaasitaa vaacaa, aphalaa hoti akubbato..
[22] eva.m subhaasitaa vaacaa, saphalaa hoti kubbato''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^ayoge^eb^ti ayu~njitabbe asevitabbe antadvaye. idha pana attakilamathaanuyogavasena attho veditabbo. ^b^yu~nja^eb^nti tasmi.m attaana.m yu~njanto yojento tathaa pa.tipajjanto. ^b^kiccamicchako^eb^ti ^a^V2.0037^ea^ ubhayahitaavaha.m kicca.m icchanto, tappa.tipakkhato ayoge ^b^cara.m^eb^ caranto ce bhaveyya. ^b^naadhigaccheyyaa^eb^ti yathaadhippeta.m hitasukha.m na paapu.neyyaati ~naayo. tasmaa ya.m aha.m titthiyamatava~ncito ayoge yu~nji.m, ^b^ta.m me dubbhagalakkha.na.m^eb^ apu~n~nasabhaavo. ``purimakammabyaamohito ayoge yu~nji''nti dasseti.

[03] ^b^abbuu.lha.m aghagata.m vijita^eb^nti vibaadhanasabhaavataaya aghaa naama raagaadayo, aghaani eva aghagata.m, aghagataana.m vijita.m sa.msaarappavatti, tesa.m vijayo kusaladhammaabhibhavo. ``aghagata.m vijita''nti anunaasikalopa.m akatvaa vutta.m. ta.m abbuu.lha.m anuddhata.m yena, ta.m abbuu.lhaaghagata.m vijita.m katvaa eva.mbhuuto hutvaa, kilese asamucchinditvaati attho. ^b^eka~nce ossajeyyaa^eb^ti adutiyataaya padhaanataaya ca eka.m appamaada.m sammaapayogameva vaa ossajeyya pariccajeyya ce. ^b^kaliiva^eb^ so puggalo kaa.laka.n.nii viya ^b^siyaa. sabbaanipi ce ossajeyyaa^eb^ti sabbaanipi vimuttiyaa paripaacakaani saddhaaviiriyasatisamaadhipa~n~nindriyaani ossajeyya ce, abhaavanaaya cha.d.deyya ce, ^b^andhova siyaa samavisamassa adassanato^eb^.

[03] ^b^yathaa^eb^ti opammasampa.tipaadanatthe nipaato. ^b^rucira^eb^nti sobhana.m. ^b^va.n.navanta^eb^nti va.n.nasa.n.thaanasampanna.m. ^b^agandhaka^eb^nti gandharahita.m paalibhaddakagirika.n.nikajayasumanaadibheda.m. ^b^eva.m subhaasitaa vaacaa^eb^ti subhaasitaa vaacaa naama tepi.taka.m buddhavacana.m va.n.nasa.n.thaanasampannapupphasadisa.m. yathaa hi agandhaka.m puppha.m ^a^P2.0138^ea^ dhaarentassa sariire gandho na pharati, eva.m etampi yo sakkaccasavanaadiihi ^a^M2.0043^ea^ ca samaacarati, tassa sakkacca.m asamaacarantassa ya.m tattha kattabba.m, ta.m akubbato sutagandha.m pa.tipattigandha~nca na aavahati aphalaa hoti. tena vutta.m ``eva.m subhaasitaa vaacaa, aphalaa hoti akubbato''ti.

[01] ^b^sugandhaka^eb^nti sumanacampakaniiluppalapupphaadibheda.m. ^b^eva^eb^nti yathaa ta.m puppha.m dhaarentassa sariire gandho pharati, eva.m tepi.takabuddhavacanasa"nkhaataa subhaasitaa vaacaapi yo sakkaccasavanaadiihi tattha kattabba.m karoti, assa puggalassa saphalaa hoti, sutagandhapa.tipattigandhaana.m aavahanato mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa. tasmaa yathovaada.m pa.tipajjeyya, yathaakaarii tathaavaadii ca bhaveyyaati. sesa.m vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^vassati^eb^ ^a^V2.0038^ea^ ^b^devo^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato girimaanandattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vayappatto gharaavaasa.m vasanto attano bhariyaaya putte ca kaala"nkate sokasallasamappito ara~n~na.m pavi.t.tho satthaaraa tattha gantvaa dhamma.m kathetvaa sokasalle abbuu.lhe pasannamaanaso sugandhapupphehi puujetvaa pa~ncapati.t.thitena vanditvaa sirasi a~njali.m katvaa abhitthavi.

[03] so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe bimbisaarara~n~no purohitassa putto hutvaa nibbatti, ^b^girimaanando^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vi~n~nuta.m patto satthu raajagahagamane buddhaanubhaava.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa sama.nadhamma.m karonto katipaya.m divasa.m gaamakaavaase vasitvaa satthaara.m vanditu.m raajagaha.m agamaasi. bimbisaaramahaaraajaa tassa aagamana.m sutvaa upasa"nkamitvaa ``idheva, bhante, vasatha, aha.m catuuhi paccayehi upa.t.thahaamii''ti sampavaaretvaa gato ^a^M2.0044^ea^ bahukiccataaya na sari. ``thero abbhokaase vasatii''ti devataa therassa temanabhayena vassa.m vaaresu.m. raajaa avassanakaara.na.m sallakkhetvaa therassa ku.tika.m kaaraapesi. thero ku.tikaaya.m vasanto senaasanasappaayalaabhena samaadhaana.m ^a^P2.0139^ea^ labhitvaa viiriyasamata.m yojetvaa vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.40.419-448) --
[22] cittakkhepo ca me aasi, tena sokena a.t.tito..
[22] yathaagataa tathaa gataa, tattha kaa paridevanaa..
[22] eva.m maataa pitaa tuyha.m, tattha kaa paridevanaa..
[22] eva.m maataa pitaa tuyha.m, tattha kaa paridevanaa..
[21] ``yathaapi urago ji.n.na.m, hitvaa gacchati sa.m taca.m.
[22] eva.m maataa pitaa tuyha.m, sa.m tanu.m idha hiiyare..
[21] ``pa.tipannaa ca sekhaa ca, phala.t.thaa santi saavakaa.
[03] atha therassa arahattappattiyaa ha.t.thatu.t.the viya deve vassante upari ta.m vassane niyojanamukhena a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
[21] ``vassati devo yathaasugiita.m, channaa me ku.tikaa sukhaa nivaataa.
[22] tassa.m viharaami vuupasanto, atha ce patthayasii pavassa deva..
[21] ``vassati devo yathaasugiita.m, channaa me ku.tikaa sukhaa nivaataa.
[22] tassa.m viharaami santacitto, atha ce patthayasii pavassa deva..
[22] atha ce patthayasii pavassa devaa''ti.. -- imaa pa~nca gaathaa abhaasi.

[01] tattha ^a^M2.0047^ea^ ^b^yathaasugiita^eb^nti sugiitaanuruupa.m, sundarassa attano meghagiitassa anuruupamevaati attho. valaahako hi yathaa agajjanto kevala.m vassanto na sobhati, eva.m satapa.talasahassapa.talena u.t.thahitvaa thanayanto gajjanto vijjullataa nicchaarentopi avassanto na sobhati, tathaabhuuto pana hutvaa vassanto sobhatiiti vutta.m ``vassati devo yathaasugiita''nti. tenaaha -- ``abhitthanaya, pajjunna'' ^a^V2.0041^ea^, (cariyaa0 3.89; jaa0 1.1.75) ``gajjitaa ceva vassitaa caa''ti (a0 ni0 4.101; pu0 pa0 157) ca. ^b^tassa.m viharaamii^eb^ti tassa.m ku.tikaaya.m ariyavihaaragabbhena iriyaapathavihaarena viharaami. ^b^vuupasantacitto^eb^ti aggaphalasamaadhinaa sammadeva upasantamaanaso.
[03] eva.m therassa anekavaara.m kata.m uyyojana.m sirasaa sampa.ticchanto valaahakadevaputto ninna~nca thala~nca puurento mahaavassa.m vassaapesi.

[03] ^b^ya.m patthayaano^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato sumanattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto ito pa~ncanavute kappe buddhasu~n~ne loke kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto eka.m paccekabuddha.m byaadhita.m disvaa hariitaka.m adaasi ^a^P2.0140^ea^. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kosalara.t.the gahapatikule nibbattitvaa ^b^sumano^eb^ti laddhanaamo sukhena va.d.dhi. tassa pana maatulo pabbajitvaa arahaa hutvaa ara~n~ne viharanto sumane vayappatte ta.m pabbaajetvaa caritaanukuula.m kamma.t.thaana.m adaasi. so tattha yogakamma.m karonto cattaari jhaanaani pa~nca ca abhi~n~naayo nibbattesi. athassa thero vipassanaavidhi.m aacikkhi. so ca nacireneva vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatte pati.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.44.60-71) --
[22] sabbattha sukhito hotu, maa ca te byaadhimaagamaa..
[22] ima.m jaati.m upaadaaya, byaadhi me nupapajjatha..
[22] tisso vijjaa sacchikataa, kata.m buddhassa saasana.m..
[03] arahatte pana pati.t.thito ekadivasa.m maatulattherassa upa.t.thaana.m agamaasi. ta.m thero adhigama.m pucchi, ta.m byaakaronto --
[22] sadattho me anuppatto, kata.m buddhassa saasana.m..
[22] sabbe me aasavaa khii.naa, natthi daani punabbhavo..
[25] imaahi pa~ncahi gaathaahi siihanaada.m nadanto a~n~na.m byaakaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^ya.m patthayaano dhammesu, upajjhaayo anuggahi. amata.m abhika"nkhanta^eb^nti samathavipassanaadiisu anavajjadhammesu ya.m dhamma.m mayha.m patthayanto aaka"nkhanto upajjhaayo amata.m nibbaana.m abhika"nkhanta.m ma.m ovaadadaanavasena anugga.nhi. ^b^kata.m kattabbaka.m mayaa^eb^ti tassa adhigamattha.m kattabba.m pari~n~naadiso.lasavidha.m kicca.m kata.m ni.t.thaapita.m mayaa.

[03] tato ^a^V2.0043^ea^ eva ^b^anuppatto^eb^ adhigato catubbidhopi maggadhammo ^b^sacchikato. saya.m dhammo aniitiho^eb^ti saya.m attanaayeva nibbaanadhammo phaladhammo ca aniitiho asandiddho attapaccakkho kato, ``itiha, iti kiraa''ti pavattiyaa itihasa"nkhaata.m sa.msaya.m samucchindantoyeva ariyamaggo pavattati. tenaaha ^b^``visuddha~naa.no nikka"nkho''^eb^tiaadi. tattha ^b^visuddha~naa.no^eb^ti sabbasa.mkilesavisuddhiyaa visuddha~naa.no. ^b^tavantike^eb^ti tava samiipe.
