[01] ^b^sadattho^eb^ti arahatta.m. ^b^sikkhaa^eb^ti ^a^P2.0141^ea^ adhisiilasikkhaadayo. ^b^sussutaa^eb^ti pariyattibaahusaccassa pa.tivedhabaahusaccassa ca paaripuurivasena su.t.thu sutaa. ^b^tava saasane^eb^ti tava ovaade anusi.t.thiya.m .thitassa.
[03] ^b^ariyavataa^eb^ti suvisuddhasiilaadivatasamaadaanena. ^b^antevaasimhi sikkhito^eb^ti tuyha.m samiipe ci.n.nabrahmacariyavaasataaya antevaasii sikkhitavaa sikkhitaadhisiilaadisikkho amhiiti.

[03] ^b^saadhuu^eb^ ^a^M2.0050^ea^ ^b^hii^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato va.d.dhattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto imasmi.m buddhuppaade bhaarukacchanagare gahapatikule nibbattitvaa ^b^va.d.dho^eb^ti laddhanaamo anupubbena va.d.dhati. athassa maataa sa.msaare sa~njaatasa.mvegaa putta.m ~naatiina.m niyyaadetvaa bhikkhuniina.m santike pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karontii arahatta.m paapu.nitvaa aparena samayena puttampi vi~n~nuta.m patta.m ve.ludantattherassa santike pabbaajesi. so pabbajito buddhavacana.m uggahetvaa bahussuto dhammakathiko hutvaa ganthadhura.m vahanto ekadivasa.m ``ekako santaruttarova maatara.m passissaamii''ti bhikkhunupassaya.m agamaasi. ta.m disvaa maataa ``kasmaa tva.m ekako santaruttarova idhaagato''ti codesi. so maataraa codiyamaano ``ayutta.m mayaa kata''nti uppannasa.mvego vihaara.m gantvaa divaa.t.thaane nisinno vipassitvaa arahatta.m patvaa maatu ovaadasampattipakaasanamukhena a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
[21] ``saadhuu ^a^V2.0044^ea^ hi kira me maataa, patoda.m upada.msayi.
[21] ``ajjhatta~nca bahiddhaa ca, ye me vijji.msu aasavaa.
[22] sabbe asesaa ucchinnaa, na ca uppajjare puna..
[22] apihaa nuuna mayipi, vanatho te na vijjati..
[22] jaatimara.nasa.msaaro, natthi daani punabbhavo''ti.. -- imaa gaathaa abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^a^M2.0051^ea^ ^a^P2.0142^ea^ ^b^saadhuu hi kira me maataa, patoda.m upada.msayii^eb^ti saadhu vata maataa mayha.m ovaadasa"nkhaata.m patoda.m dasseti, tena me viiriya.m uttejentii uttama"nge pa~n~naasiise vijjhi. ^b^yassaa^eb^ti yassaa me maatuyaa. ^b^sambodhi^eb^nti arahatta.m. aya~nhettha yojanaa -- janettiyaa me anusi.t.tho yassaa anusaasaniibhuuta.m vacana.m sutvaa aha.m aaraddhaviiriyo pahitatto viharanto uttama.m aggaphala.m sambodhi.m arahatta.m patto.

[03] tato eva aarakattaa kilesehi ^b^arahaa^eb^ pu~n~nakkhettataaya ^b^dakkhi.neyyo^eb^ dakkhi.naaraho amhi. pubbenivaasa~naa.naadivijjaattayassa adhigatattaa ^b^tevijjo^eb^ nibbaanassa sacchikatattaa ^b^amataddaso namucino^eb^ maarassa ^b^sena.m^eb^ kilesavaahini.m bodhipakkhiyasenaaya jinitvaa tassa jitattaayeva anaasavo sukha.m viharaamiiti.

[03] idaani ``anaasavo''ti vuttamattha.m paaka.tatara.m kaatu.m ^b^``ajjhatta~ncaa''^eb^ ti gaathamaaha. tassattho -- ^b^ajjhatta.m^eb^ ajjhattavatthukaa ca ^b^bahiddhaa^eb^ bahiddhavatthukaa ca ^b^aasavaa ye^eb^ mayha.m ariyamaggaadhigamato pubbe ^b^vijji.msu^eb^ upalabbhi.msu, te sabbe anavasesaa ^b^ucchinnaa^eb^ ariyamaggena samucchinnaa pahiinaa puna daani kadaacipi na ca uppajjeyyu.m na uppajjissantiyevaati.

[03] idaani maatu vacana.m a"nkusa.m katvaa attanaa arahattassa adhigatattaa maatara.m thomento ^b^``visaaradaa''^eb^ti gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^visaaradaa kho^eb^ti eka.msena vigatasaarajjaa. eva.m maatu attano ^a^V2.0045^ea^ ca arahattaadhigamena satthu orasaputtabhaava.m ullapento maatara.m ^b^``bhaginii''^eb^ti aaha. ^b^etamattha.m abhaasayii^eb^ti eta.m mama ovaadabhuuta.m attha.m abha.ni. eva.m pana ma.m ovadantii na kevala.m visaaradaa eva, atha kho ^b^apihaa nuuna mayipi^eb^ tava puttakepi apihaa asanthavaa ma~n~ne, ki.m vaa etena parikappanena? ^b^vanatho te na vijjati^eb^ avijjaadiko vanatho tava santaane nattheva, yaa ma.m bhavakkhaye niyojesiiti adhippaayo.
[03] idaani ``tayaa niyojitaakaareneva mayaa pa.tipanna''nti dassento ^b^``pariyantakata''^eb^nti osaanagaathamaaha, tassattho suvi~n~neyyova.

[03] ^b^atthaaya^eb^ ^a^M2.0052^ea^ ^b^vata me^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato nadiikassapattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ^a^P2.0143^ea^ kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m pi.n.daaya caranta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso attanaa ropitassa ambarukkhassa pa.thamuppanna.m manosilaava.n.na.m eka.m ambaphala.m adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade magadhara.t.the braahma.nakule uruvelakassapassa bhaataa hutvaa nibbatto. vayappatto nissara.najjhaasayataaya gharaavaasa.m anicchanto taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa tiihi taapasasatehi saddhi.m nera~njaraaya nadiyaa tiire assama.m maapetvaa viharati. nadiitiire vasanato hissa kassapagottataaya ca ^b^nadiikassapo^eb^ti sama~n~naa ahosi. tassa bhagavaa saparisassa ehibhikkhubhaavena upasampada.m adaasi. ta.m sabba.m khandhake (mahaava0 36-39) aagatameva. so bhagavato ^b^aadittapariyaayadesanaaya^eb^ (mahaava0 54; sa.m0 ni0 4.28) arahatte pati.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.44.81-87) --
[03] arahatte pana pati.t.thito aparabhaage attano pa.tipatti.m paccavekkhitvaa di.t.thisamugghaatakittanamukhena a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
[21] ``atthaaya ^a^M2.0053^ea^ vata me buddho, nadi.m nera~njara.m agaa.

[03] tattha ^b^atthaaya vata me^eb^ti mayha.m atthaaya vata hitaaya vata. ^b^buddho^eb^ti sabba~n~nubuddho. ^b^nadi.m nera~njara.m agaa^eb^ti nera~njaraasa"nkhaata.m nadi.m aga~nchi, tassaa nadiyaa tiire ca mama bhaatu uruvelakassapassa assama.m upagatoti adhippaayo.

[01] idaani yathaavuttamattha.m vivaritu.m ^b^``yassaaha''^eb^ntiaadi vutta.m. ^b^yassaa^eb^ti yassa buddhassa bhagavato. ^b^dhamma.m sutvaanaa^eb^ti catusaccapa.tisa.myutta.m dhamma.m sutvaa, sotadvaaraanusaarena upalabhitvaa. ^b^micchaadi.t.thi.m vivajjayi^eb^nti ^a^P2.0144^ea^ ``ya~n~naadiihi suddhi hotii''tiaadinayappavatta.m vipariitadassana.m pajahi.m.

[03] micchaadi.t.thi.m ^a^V2.0047^ea^ vivajjayinti vuttamevattha.m vitthaaretvaa dassetu.m ^b^``yaji''^eb^ntiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^yaji.m uccaavace ya~n~ne^eb^ti paaka.taya~n~ne somayaagavaajapeyyaadike naanaavidhe ya~n~ne yaji.m. ^b^aggihutta.m juhi.m aha^eb^nti tesa.m ya~n~naana.m yajanavasena aahuti.m pagga.nhanto aggi.m paricari.m. ^b^esaa suddhiiti ma~n~nanto^eb^ti esaa ya~n~nakiriyaa aggipaaricariyaa suddhihetubhaavato suddhi ``eva.m me sa.msaarasuddhi hotii''ti ma~n~namaano. ^b^andhabhuuto puthujjano^eb^ti pa~n~naacakkhuvekallena avijjandhataaya andhabhuuto puthujjano hutvaa vanagahanapabbatagahanaadiini viya duratikkamana.t.thena di.t.thiyeva gahana.m di.t.thigahana.m ^a^M2.0054^ea^, ta.m pakkhando anupavi.t.thoti ^b^di.t.thigahanapakkhando. paraamaasenaa^eb^ti dhammasabhaava.m atikkamitvaa ``idameva sacca''nti paraamasanato paraamaasasa"nkhaatena micchaabhinivesena. ^b^mohito^eb^ti muu.lhabhaava.m paapito. ^b^asuddhi.m ma~n~nisa.m suddhi^eb^nti asuddhi.m magga.m ``suddhi.m magga''nti ma~n~nisa.m ma~n~ni.m. tattha kaara.namaaha ^b^``andhabhuuto aviddasuu''^eb^ti. yasmaa avijjaaya andhabhuuto, tato eva dhammaadhamma.m yuttaayutta~nca avidvaa, tasmaa tathaa ma~n~ninti attho.

[03] ^b^micchaadi.t.thi pahiinaa me^eb^ti eva.mbhuutassa pana satthu sammukhaa catusaccagabbha.m dhammakatha.m sutvaa yoniso pa.tipajjantassa ariyamaggasammaadi.t.thiyaa sabbaapi micchaadi.t.thi samucchedappahaanavasena mayha.m pahiinaa. ^b^bhavaa^eb^ti kaamabhavaadayo sabbepi bhavaa ariyamaggasatthena ^b^vidaalitaa^eb^ viddha.msitaa. ^b^juhaami dakkhi.neyyaggi^eb^nti aahavaniiyaadike aggii cha.d.detvaa sadevakassa lokassa aggadakkhi.neyyataaya sabbassa ca paapassa dahanato dakkhi.neyyaggi.m sammaasambuddha.m juhaami paricaraami. tayida.m mayha.m dakkhi.neyyaggiparicara.na.m dadhinavaniitamathitasappiaadinirapekkha.m satthu namassanamevaati aaha ^b^``namassaami tathaagata''^eb^nti. atha vaa ^b^juhaami dakkhi.neyyaggi^eb^nti daayakaana.m dakkhi.naaya mahapphalabhaavakara.nena paapassa ca dahanena dakkhi.neyyaggibhuuta.m attaana.m juhaami paricaraami tathaa katvaa paricaraami, tathaa katvaa pariharaami. pubbe aggideva.m namassaami, idaani pana namassaami tathaagatanti.

[03] ^b^mohaa sabbe pahiinaa me^eb^ti dukkhe a~n~naa.naadibhedaa sabbe mohaa mayha.m pahiinaa samucchinnaa, tato eva ^b^``bhavata.nhaa padaalitaa. vikkhii.no jaatisa.msaaro, natthi daani punabbhavo''^eb^ti tiisu padesu me-saddo aanetvaa yojetabbo.

[01] ^b^paato^eb^ ^a^V2.0048^ea^ ^a^P2.0145^ea^ ^b^majjhanhika^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato gayaakassapattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinanto ito ekati.mse kappe sikhissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto nissara.najjhaasayataaya gharaavaasa.m pahaaya taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa ara~n~naayatane ^a^M2.0055^ea^ assama.m kaaretvaa vanamuulaphalaahaaro vasati. tena ca samayena bhagavaa eko adutiyo tassa assamasamiipena gacchati. so bhagavanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa ekamanta.m .thito vela.m oloketvaa manoharaani kolaphalaani satthu upanesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa vayappatto nissara.najjhaasayataaya gharaavaasa.m pahaaya taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa dviihi taapasasatehi saddhi.m gayaaya.m viharati. gayaaya.m vasanato hissa kassapagottataaya ca ^b^gayaakassapo^eb^ti sama~n~naa ahosi. so bhagavataa saddhi.m parisaaya ehibhikkhuupasampada.m datvaa ^b^aadittapariyaayadesanaaya^eb^ (mahaava0 54) ovadiyamaano arahatte pati.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.45.8-14) --
[21] ``tamhi kaale sikhii buddho, eko adutiyo ahu.
[03] arahatte pana pati.t.thito attano pa.tipatti.m paccavekkhitvaa paapapavaahanakittanamukhena a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
[21] ``ya.m ^a^V2.0049^ea^ mayaa pakata.m paapa.m, pubbe a~n~naasu jaatisu.
[22] ta.m daaniidha pavaahemi, eva.mdi.t.thi pure ahu.m..
[22] suddho suddhassa daayaado, putto buddhassa oraso..
[22] tisso vijjaa ajjhagami.m, kata.m buddhassa saasana''nti.. --

[03] tattha pa.thamagaathaaya taava aya.m sa"nkhepattho -- ^b^paato^eb^ suuriyuggamanavelaaya.m, ^b^majjhanhika.m^eb^ ^a^P2.0146^ea^ majjhanhavelaaya.m, ^b^saaya.m^eb^ saayanhavelaayanti divasassa ^b^tikkhattu.m^eb^ tayo vaare aha.m udaka.m ^b^otari.m^eb^ ogaahi.m. otaranto ca soha.m na yattha katthaci yadaa vaa tadaa vaa otari.m, atha kho ^b^gayaaya^eb^ mahaajanassa ``paapapavaahana''nti abhisammate gayaatitthe, ^b^gayaphagguyaa^eb^ gayaaphaggunaamake phagguniimaasassa uttaraphagguniinakkhatte anusa.mvacchara.m udakorohanamanuyutto ahosinti.

[01] idaani tadaa yenaadhippaayena udakorohanamanuyutta.m, ta.m dassetu.m ^b^``ya.m mayaa''^eb^ti gaathamaaha. tassattho -- ``ya.m mayaa pubbe ito a~n~naasu jaatiisu paapakamma.m upacita.m. ta.m idaani ^b^idha^eb^ gayaatitthe imissaa ca gayaaphagguyaa iminaa udakorohanena ^b^pavaahemi^eb^ apanemi vikkhaalemii''ti. ^b^pure^eb^ satthu saasanupagamanato pubbe ^b^eva.mdi.t.thi^eb^ evaruupavipariitadassano ^b^ahu.m^eb^ ahosi.m.

[03] ^b^dhammatthasahita.m pada^eb^nti vibhattialopena niddeso. dhammena ca atthena ca sahitako.t.thaasa.m, aadito majjhato pariyosaanato ca dhammuupasa.mhita.m atthuupasa.mhita.m su.t.thu ekantena niyyaanika.m katvaa bhaasita.m vaaca.m sammaasambuddhavacana.m sutvaa tena pakaasita.m paramatthabhaavena tacchabhaavato ^b^tatha.m^eb^ yathaaraha.m pavattinivattiupaayabhaave byabhicaaraabhaavato ^b^yaathaavaka.m^eb^ dukkhaadi^b^attha.m yoniso^eb^ upaayena pari~n~neyyaadibhaavena ^b^paccavekkhisa.m^eb^ ``dukkha.m pari~n~neyya.m, samudayo pahaatabbo, nirodho sacchikaatabbo ^a^M2.0057^ea^, maggo bhaavetabbo''ti patiavekkhi.m, ~naa.nacakkhunaa passi.m pa.tivijjhinti attho.

[03] ^b^ninhaatasabbapaapomhii^eb^ti eva.m pa.tividdhasaccattaa eva ariyamaggajalena vikkhaalitasabbapaapo amhi. tato eva raagamalaadiina.m abhaavena nimmalattaa ^b^nimmalo^eb^. tato eva ^a^V2.0050^ea^ parisuddhakaayasamaacaarataaya parisuddhavaciisamaacaarataaya parisuddhamanosamaacaarataaya ^b^payato suci^eb^ ^b^suddho^eb^. savaasanasabbakilesamalavisuddhiyaa ^b^suddhassa^eb^ buddhassa bhagavato lokuttaradhammadaayassa aadiyanato ^b^daayaado^eb^. tasseva desanaa~naa.nasamu.t.thaanaurovaayaamajanitaabhijaatitaaya ^b^oraso^eb^ putto amhiiti yojanaa.

[03] punapi attano paramatthato nhaatakabhaavameva vibhaavetu.m ^b^``ogayhaa''^eb^ti osaanagaathamaaha. tattha ^b^ogayhaa^eb^ti ogaahetvaa anupavisitvaa. ^b^a.t.tha"ngika.m sota^eb^nti sammaadi.t.thiaadiihi a.t.tha"ngasamodhaanabhuuta.m maggasota.m. ^b^sabbapaapa.m pavaahayi^eb^nti anavasesa.m paapamala.m pakkhaalesi.m, ariyamaggajalapavaahanena paramatthanhaatako ahosi.m. tato eva ^b^tisso vijjaa ajjhagami.m, kata.m buddhassa saasana^eb^nti vuttatthameva.

[03] ^b^vaatarogaabhiniito^eb^tiaadikaa ^a^P2.0147^ea^ aayasmato vakkalittherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto satthu santika.m gacchantehi upaasakehi saddhi.m vihaara.m gantvaa parisapariyante .thito dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m saddhaadhimuttaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa sayampi ta.m .thaana.m patthento sattaaha.m mahaadaana.m datvaa pa.nidhaana.m akaasi. satthaa tassa anantaraayata.m disvaa byaakari.

[03] sopi ^a^M2.0058^ea^ yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto amhaaka.m satthu kaale saavatthiya.m braahma.nakule nibbatti, ^b^vakkalii^eb^tissa naama.m aka.msu. so vuddhippatto tayo vede ugga.nhitvaa braahma.nasippesu nipphatti.m gato satthaara.m disvaa ruupakaayassa sampattidassanena atitto satthaaraa saddhi.myeva vicarati. ``agaaramajjhe vasanto niccakaala.m satthaara.m da.t.thu.m na labhissaamii''ti satthu santike pabbajitvaa .thapetvaa bhojanavela.m sariirakiccakaala~nca sesakaale yattha .thitena sakkaa dasabala.m passitu.m, tattha .thito a~n~na.m kicca.m pahaaya bhagavanta.m olokentova viharati. satthaa tassa ~naa.naparipaaka.m aagamento bahukaala.m tasmi.m ruupadassaneneva vicarante ki~nci avatvaa punekadivasa.m ^a^V2.0051^ea^ ``ki.m te, vakkali, iminaa puutikaayena di.t.thena? yo kho, vakkali, dhamma.m passati, so ma.m passati. yo ma.m passati, so dhamma.m passati. dhamma~nhi, vakkali, passanto ma.m passati, ma.m passanto dhamma.m passatii''ti (sa.m0 ni0 3.87) aaha.

[03] satthari eva.m vadantepi thero satthu dassana.m pahaaya a~n~nattha gantu.m na sakkoti. tato satthaa ``naaya.m bhikkhu sa.mvega.m alabhitvaa bujjhissatii''ti vassuupanaayikadivase ``apehi, vakkalii''ti thera.m pa.naamesi. so satthaaraa pa.naamito sammukhe .thaatu.m asakkonto ``ki.m mayha.m jiivitena, yoha.m satthaara.m da.t.thu.m na labhaamii''ti gijjhakuu.tapabbate papaata.t.thaana.m abhiruhi. satthaa tassa ta.m pavatti.m ~natvaa ``aya.m bhikkhu mama santikaa assaasa.m alabhanto maggaphalaana.m upanissaya.m naaseyyaa''ti attaana.m dassetu.m obhaasa.m vissajjento --
[22] adhigacche pada.m santa.m, sa"nkhaaruupasama.m sukha''nti.. (dha0 pa0 381) --

[25] gaatha.m vatvaa ``ehi, vakkalii''ti hattha.m pasaaresi. thero ``dasabalo me di.t.tho, `ehii'ti avhaanampi laddha''nti balavapiitisomanassa.m uppaadetvaa ^a^P2.0148^ea^ ``kuto aagacchaamii''ti attano gamanabhaava.m ajaanitvaa satthu sammukhe aakaase pakkhandanto pa.thamapaadena pabbate .thitoyeva satthaaraa vuttagaatha.m ^a^M2.0059^ea^ aavajjento aakaaseyeva piiti.m vikkhambhetvaa saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m paapu.niiti ^b^a"nguttara.t.thakathaaya.m^eb^ (a0 ni0 a.t.tha0 1.1.208) ^b^dhammapadava.n.nanaaya~nca^eb^ (dha0 pa0 a.t.tha0 2.381) aagata.m.

[03] idha pana eva.m vadanti -- ``ki.m te, vakkalii''tiaadinaa satthaaraa ovadito gijjhakuu.te viharanto vipassana.m pa.t.thapesi, tassa saddhaaya balavabhaavato eva vipassanaa viithi.m na otarati, bhagavaa ta.m ~natvaa kamma.t.thaana.m sodhetvaa adaasi. puna vipassana.m matthaka.m paapetu.m naasakkhiyeva, athassa aahaaravekallena vaataabaadho uppajji, ta.m vaataabaadhena pii.liyamaana.m ~natvaa bhagavaa tattha gantvaa pucchanto --

[03] tattha ^b^vaatarogaabhiniito^eb^ti vaataabaadhena aseribhaava.m upaniito, vaatabyaadhinaa abhibhuuto. ^b^tva^eb^nti thera.m aalapati. ^b^vihara^eb^nti tena iriyaapathavihaarena viharanto. ^b^kaanane vane^eb^ti kaananabhuute vane, mahaaara~n~neti attho. ^b^paviddhagocare^eb^ti vissa.t.thagocare dullabhapaccaye. vaatarogassa sappaayaana.m sappiaadibhesajjaana.m abhaavena pharusabhuumibhaagataaya ca ^b^luukhe^eb^ luukha.t.thaane. ^b^katha.m bhikkhu karissasii^eb^ti bhikkhu tva.m katha.m viharissasiiti bhagavaa pucchi.

[03] ta.m ^a^M2.0060^ea^ sutvaa thero niraamisapiitisomanassaadinaa attano sukhavihaara.m pakaasento ^b^``piitisukhenaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^piitisukhenaa^eb^ti ubbegalakkha.naaya phara.nalakkha.naaya ca ^a^P2.0149^ea^ piitiyaa ta.msampayuttasukhena ca. tenaaha ^b^``vipulenaa''^eb^ti u.laarenaati attho. ^b^pharamaano samussaya^eb^nti yathaavuttapiitisukhasamu.t.thitehi pa.niitehi ruupehi sakala.m kaaya.m pharaapento nirantara.m phu.ta.m karonto. ^b^luukhampi abhisambhonto^eb^ti ara~n~naavaasajanita.m sallekhavuttihetuka.m dussahampi paccayaluukha.m abhibhavanto adhivaasento. ^b^viharissaami kaanane^eb^ti jhaanasukhena vipassanaasukhena ca ara~n~naayatane viharissaamiiti attho. tenaaha -- ``sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedesi''nti (paaraa0 11).
[22] labhatii piitipaamojja.m, amata.m ta.m vijaanata''nti ca.. (dha0 pa0 374).

[03] ^b^bhaavento satipa.t.thaane^eb^ti maggapariyaapanne kaayaanupassanaadike cattaaro satipa.t.thaane uppaadento va.d.dhento ca. ^b^indriyaanii^eb^ti maggapariyaapannaani eva saddhaadiini pa~ncindriyaani. ^b^balaanii^eb^ti tathaa saddhaadiini ^a^V2.0053^ea^ pa~nca balaani. ^b^bojjha"ngaanii^eb^ti tathaa satisambojjha"ngaadiini satta bojjha"ngaani. ^b^ca^eb^-saddena sammappadhaanaiddhipaadamagga"ngaani sa"nga.nhaati. tadavinaabhaavato hi taggaha.neneva tesa.m gaha.na.m hoti. ^b^viharissaamii^eb^ti yathaavutte bodhipakkhiyadhamme bhaavento maggasukhena tadadhigamasiddhena phalasukhena nibbaanasukhena ca viharissaami.

[03] ^b^aaraddhaviiriye^eb^ti catubbidhasammappadhaanavasena paggahitaviiriye. ^b^pahitatte^eb^ti nibbaana.m patipesitacitte. ^b^nicca.m da.lhaparakkame^eb^ti sabbakaala.m asithilaviiriye. avivaadavasena kaayasaamaggidaanavasena ca ^b^samagge^eb^. di.t.thisiilasaama~n~nena ^b^sahite^eb^ sabrahmacaarii disvaa. etena kalyaa.namittasampatti.m dasseti.

[03] ^b^anussaranto sambuddha^eb^nti sammaa saama.m sabbadhammaana.m buddhattaa sammaasambuddha.m sabbasattuttamataaya, ^b^agga.m^eb^ uttamena damathena ^b^danta.m,^eb^ anuttarasamaadhinaa ^b^samaahita.m atandito^eb^ analaso hutvaa, ^b^rattindiva.m^eb^ sabbakaala.m ``itipi so bhagavaa araha''ntiaadinaa anussaranto viharissaami. etena buddhaanussatibhaavanaaya ^a^M2.0061^ea^ yuttaakaaradassanena sabbattha kamma.t.thaanaanuyogamaaha, purimena paarihaariyakamma.t.thaanaanuyoga.m.
[03] eva.m pana vatvaa thero vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.54.28-65) --
[22] ra~njaya.m parisa.m sabba.m, santhavii saavaka.m saka.m..
[22] natthi etaadiso a~n~no, yathaaya.m bhikkhu vakkali..
[22] hutvaa sutvaa ca ta.m vaakya.m, ta.m .thaanamabhirocayi.m..
[21] ``yo so tayaa santhavito, ito sattamake muni.
[22] bhikkhu saddhaavata.m aggo, taadiso homaha.m mune..
[22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
[22] vakkali naama naamena, hessati satthu saavako..
[22] saavatthiya.m pure jaato, kule a~n~natare aha.m..
[22] ima.m dadaama te naatha, sara.na.m hohi naayaka..
[21] ``tadaa pa.tiggahi so ma.m, bhiitaana.m sara.no muni.
[22] ala.m vakkali ki.m ruupe, ramase baalanandite..
[21] ``yo hi passati saddhamma.m, so ma.m passati pa.n.dito.
[22] apassamaano saddhamma.m, ma.m passampi na passati..
[22] vakkaliiti jino vaaca.m, ta.m sutvaa mudito aha.m..
[03] arahatta.m ^a^P2.0150^ea^ pana patvaa a~n~na.m byaakarontopi thero imaa eva gaathaa abhaasi. atha na.m satthaa bhikkhusa"nghamajjhe nisinno saddhaadhimuttaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.

[03] ^b^olaggessaamii^eb^tiaadikaa ^a^M2.0064^ea^ ^a^V2.0056^ea^ aayasmato vijitasenattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinanto atthadassissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto gharaavaasa.m pahaaya isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa ara~n~ne viharanto aakaasena gacchanta.m bhagavanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso pasannaakaara.m dassento a~njali.m paggayha a.t.thaasi. satthaa tassa ajjhaasaya.m ~natvaa aakaasato otari. so bhagavato manoharaani madhuraani phalaani upanesi, pa.tiggahesi bhagavaa anukampa.m upaadaaya. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kosalara.t.the hatthaacariyakule nibbattitvaa ^b^vijitaseno^eb^ti laddhanaamo vi~n~nuta.m paapu.ni. tassa maatulaa seno ca upaseno caati dve hatthaacariyaa satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddhaa pabbajitvaa vaasadhura.m puurentaa arahatta.m paapu.ni.msu. vijitasenopi hatthisippe nipphatti.m gato nissara.najjhaasayataaya gharaavaase alaggamaanaso satthu yamakapaa.tihaariya.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho maatulattheraana.m santike pabbajitvaa tesa.m ovaadaanusaasaniyaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto vipassanaaviithi.m la"nghitvaa bahiddhaa naanaaramma.ne vidhaavanta.m attano citta.m ovadanto --
[22] na ta.m paape niyojessa.m, kaamajaala.m sariiraja.m..
[21] ``tva.m olaggo na gacchasi, dvaaravivara.m gajova alabhanto.
[22] na ca cittakali punappuna.m, pasakka paaparato carissasi..
[22] balavaa aavatteti akaama.m, eva.m aavattayissa.m ta.m..
[22] eva.m damayissa.m ta.m, pati.t.thito pa~ncasu balesu..
[22] viiriyadhuraniggahito, na yito duura.m gamissase cittaa''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^olaggessaamii^eb^ti sa.mvarissaami nivaaressaami. ^b^te^eb^ti ta.m. upayogatthe hi ida.m saamivacana.m ^a^V2.0057^ea^. te gamananti vaa vacanaseso. ^b^hatthina^eb^nti ca hatthinti attho. ^b^cittaa^eb^ti attano citta.m aalapati. yathaa ta.m vaaretukaamo, ta.m dassento ^b^``aa.nidvaareva hatthina''^eb^nti aaha. aa.nidvaara.m naama paakaarabaddhassa nagarassa khuddakadvaara.m, ya.m gha.tikaachidde aa.nimhi pakkhitte yantena vinaa abbhantare .thitehipi vivaritu.m na sakkaa. yena manussagavassamahi.msaadayo na niggantu.m sakkaa. nagarato bahi niggantukaamampi hatthi.m yato palobhetvaa hatthaacariyo gamana.m nivaaresi. atha vaa aa.nidvaara.m naama palighadvaara.m. tattha hi tiriya.m paligha.m .thapetvaa rukkhasuucisa"nkhaata.m aa.ni.m palighasiise aavu.nanti. ^b^paape^eb^ti ruupaadiisu uppajjanakaabhijjhaadipaapadhamme ^b^ta.m na niyojessa.m^eb^ na niyojissaami. ^b^kaamajaalaa^eb^ti kaamassa jaalabhuuta.m. yathaa hi macchabandhamigaluddaana.m jaala.m naama macchaadiina.m tesa.m yathaakaamakaarasaadhana.m, eva.m ayonisomanasikaaraanupaatita.m citta.m maarassa kaamakaarasaadhana.m. tena hi so satte anatthesu paateti. ^b^sariirajaa^eb^ti sariiresu uppajjanaka. pa~ncavokaarabhave hi citta.m ruupapa.tibaddhavuttitaaya ``sariiraja''nti vuccati.

[03] ^b^tva.m olaggo na gacchasii^eb^ti tva.m, cittakali, mayaa satipa~n~naapatodaa"nkusehi vaarito na daani yathaaruci.m gamissasi, ayonisomanasikaaravasena yathaakaama.m vattitu.m na labhissasi. yathaa ki.m? ^b^dvaaravivara.m gajova alabhanto^eb^ nagarato gajanirodhato vaa niggamanaaya dvaaravivaraka.m alabhamaano hatthii viya. ^b^cittakalii^eb^ti cittakaa.laka.n.ni. ^b^punappuna^eb^nti aparaapara.m. ^b^pasakkaa^eb^ti sara.nasampassaasavasena. ^b^paaparato^eb^ti paapakammanirato pubbe viya idaani ^b^na carissasi^eb^ tathaa caritu.m na dassaamiiti attho.

[03] ^b^adanta^eb^nti ^a^M2.0066^ea^ adamita.m hatthisikkha.m asikkhita.m. ^b^navaggaha^eb^nti aciragahita.m. ^b^a"nkusaggaho^eb^ti hatthaacariyo. ^b^balavaa^eb^ti kaayabalena ~naa.nabalena ca balavaa. ^b^aavatteti akaama^eb^nti anicchantameva nisedhanato nivatteti. ^b^eva.m aavattayissa^eb^nti yathaa yathaavutta.m hatthi.m hatthaacariyo, eva.m ta.m citta.m cittakali.m duccaritanisedhanato nivattayissaami.

[03] ^b^varahayadamakusalo^eb^ti ^a^P2.0152^ea^ uttamaana.m assadammaana.m damane kusalo. tato eva ^b^saarathipavaro^eb^ assadammasaarathiisu visi.t.tho ^b^dameti aaja~n~na.m^eb^ aajaaniiya.m assadamma.m desakaalaanuruupa.m sa.nhapharusehi dameti vineti nibbisevana.m karoti. ^b^pati.t.thito pa~ncasu balesuu^eb^ti saddhaadiisu pa~ncasu balesu pati.t.thito hutvaa assaddhiyaadinisedhanato ^b^ta.m damayissa.m^eb^ damessaamiiti attho.

[03] ^b^satiyaa^eb^ ^a^V2.0058^ea^ ^b^ta.m nibandhissa^eb^nti gocarajjhattato bahi gantu.m adento satiyottena kamma.t.thaanathambhe, cittakali, ta.m nibandhissaami niyamessaami. ^b^payutto te damessaamii^eb^ti tattha nibandhanto eva yuttappayutto hutvaa te damessaami, sa.mkilesamalato ta.m visodhessaami. ^b^viiriyadhuraniggahito^eb^ti yathaavutto chekena susaarathinaa yuge yojito yuganiggahito yugantaragato ta.m naatikkamati, eva.m tvampi citta, mama viiriyadhure niggahito sakkaccakaaritaaya saataccakaaritaaya a~n~nathaa vattitu.m alabhanto ito gocarajjhattato duura.m bahi na gamissasi. bhaavanaanuyuttassa hi kamma.t.thaanato a~n~na.m aasannampi lakkha.nato duuramevaati eva.m thero imaahi gaathaahi attano citta.m nigga.nhantova vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.45.22-30) --
[22] anukampatu ma.m buddho, bhikkha.m icchaami daatave..
[22] tattha citta.m pasaadetvaa, abhivandi.m tadaa jina.m..
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa a~n~na.m byaakarontopi imaa gaathaa abhaasi.

[03] ^b^upaarambhacitto^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato yasadattattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacini. tathaa hesa padumuttarassa ^a^V2.0059^ea^ bhagavato kaale braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa braahma.naana.m vijjaasippesu nipphatti.m gato kaame pahaaya isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa ara~n~ne viharanto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m disvaa pasannamaanaso a~njali.m paggayha abhitthavi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade mallara.t.the mallaraajakule nibbattitvaa ^b^yasadatto^eb^ti laddhanaamo, vayappatto takkasila.m gantvaa sabbasippaani sikkhitvaa sabhiyena paribbaajakena saddhi.myeva caarika.m caramaano, anupubbena saavatthiya.m bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa sabhiyena pu.t.thapa~nhesu ^a^P2.0153^ea^ vissajjiyamaanesu saya.m otaaraapekkho su.nanto nisiidi ``sama.nassa gotamassa vaade dosa.m dassaamii''ti. athassa bhagavaa cittaacaara.m ~natvaa ^b^sabhiyasuttadesanaavasaane^eb^ (su0 ni0 sabhiyasutta) ovaada.m dento --
[22] aarakaa hoti saddhammaa, nabhaso pathavii yathaa..
[22] na viruuhati saddhamme, khette biija.mva puutika.m..

[03] tattha ^b^upaarambhacitto^eb^ti saarambhacitto, dosaaropanaadhippaayoti attho. ^b^dummedho^eb^ti nippa~n~no. ^b^aarakaa hoti saddhammaa^eb^ti so taadiso puggalo nabhaso viya pathavii pa.tipattisaddhammatopi duure hoti, pageva pa.tivedhasaddhammato. ``na tva.m ima.m dhammavinaya.m aajaanaasii''tiaadinaa (dii0 ni0 1.18) viggaahikakatha.m anuyuttassa kuto santanipu.no pa.tipattisaddhammo.

[03] ^b^parihaayati saddhammaa^eb^ti navavidhalokuttaradhammato pubbabhaagiyasaddhaadisaddhammatopi nihiiyati. ^b^parisussatii^eb^ti visussati kaayacittaana.m pii.nanarasassa piitipaamojjaadikusaladhammassaabhaavato. ^b^na viruuhatii^eb^ti ^a^V2.0060^ea^ viruu.lhi.m vuddhi.m na paapu.naati. ^b^puutika^eb^nti gomayalepadaanaadiabhaavena puutibhaava.m patta.m.

[03] ^b^tu.t.thena cittenaa^eb^ti itthambhuutalakkha.ne kara.navacana.m, attamano pamudito hutvaati attho. ^b^khepetvaa^eb^ti samucchinditvaa. ^b^akuppata^eb^nti arahatta.m. ^b^pappuyyaa^eb^ti paapu.nitvaa. ^b^parama.m santi^eb^nti anupaadisesa.m nibbaana.m. tadadhigamo ^a^M2.0069^ea^ cassa kevala.m kaalaagamanameva, na kocividhoti ta.m dassetu.m vutta.m ^b^``parinibbaatinaasavo''^eb^ti.
[03] eva.m satthaaraa ovadito sa.mvegajaato pabbajitvaa vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.44.35-43) --
[22] eka.msa.m ajina.m katvaa, buddhase.t.tha.m thavi.m aha.m..
[22] ~naa.ne te upamaa natthi, yaavataa jagato gati..
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa a~n~na.m byaakarontopi thero imaa eva gaathaa abhaasi.

[03] ^b^upasampadaa^eb^ ^a^V2.0061^ea^ ^b^ca me laddhaa^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato so.nassa ku.tika.n.nassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare vibhavasampanno se.t.thi hutvaa u.laaraaya issariyasampattiyaa .thito ekadivasa.m satthaara.m satasahassakhii.naasavaparivuta.m mahatiyaa ^a^M2.0070^ea^ buddhalii.laaya mahantena buddhaanubhaavena nagara.m pavisanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso vanditvaa a~njali.m katvaa a.t.thaasi. so pacchaabhatta.m upaasakehi saddhi.m vihaara.m gantvaa bhagavato santike dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m kalyaa.navaakkara.naana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa sayampi ta.m .thaana.m patthetvaa mahaadaana.m datvaa pa.nidhaana.m akaasi. satthaa tassa anantaraayata.m disvaa ``anaagate gotamassa naama sammaasambuddhassa saasane kalyaa.navaakkara.naana.m aggo bhavissatii''ti byaakaasi.

[03] so tattha yaavajiiva.m pu~n~naani katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto vipassissa bhagavato kaale saasane pabbajitvaa vattapa.tivattaani puurento ekassa bhikkhuno ciivara.m sibbitvaa adaasi. puna buddhasu~n~ne loke baaraa.nasiya.m tunnavaayo hutvaa ekassa paccekabuddhassa ciivarako.ti.m chinna.m gha.tetvaa adaasi. eva.m tattha tattha pu~n~naani katvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade avantira.t.the kuraraghare mahaavibhavassa se.t.thino putto hutvaa nibbatti. ^b^so.no^eb^tissa naama.m aka.msu. ko.tiagghanakassa ka.n.napi.landhanassa dhaara.nena ``ko.tika.n.no''ti vattabbe ^b^ku.tika.n.no^eb^ti pa~n~naayittha.

[03] so anukkamena va.d.dhitvaa ku.tumba.m sa.n.thapento aayasmante mahaakaccaane kulaghara.m nissaaya pavattapabbate viharante tassa santike dhamma.m sutvaa sara.nesu ca siilesu ca pati.t.thaaya ta.m catuuhi paccayehi upa.t.thahi. so aparabhaage sa.msaare sa~njaatasa.mvego therassa santike pabbajitvaa kicchena kasirena dasavagga.m sa"ngha.m sannipaatetvaa upasampajjitvaa katipayakaala.m therassa santike vasitvaa, thera.m aapucchitvaa satthaara.m vanditu.m saavatthi.m upagato, satthaaraa ekagandhaku.tiya.m vaasa.m labhitvaa paccuusasamaye ajjhi.t.tho so.lasaa.t.thakavaggiyaana.m ^a^P2.0155^ea^ ussaara.nena saadhukaara.m datvaa bhaasitaaya ``disvaa aadiinava.m loke''ti (udaa0 46; mahaava0 258) udaanagaathaaya pariyosaane vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.44.26-34) --
[22] saya.m vii.naa pavajjanti, buddhassa pavisato pura.m..
[21] ``aho buddho aho dhammo, aho no satthu sampadaa.

[03] arahatte pana pati.t.thito attano upajjhaayena aacikkhitaniyaamena paccantimesu janapadesu vinayadharapa~ncamena ga.nena upasampadaa, dhuvanhaana.m, cammatthara.na.m, gu.na"ngu.nuupaahana.m, ciivaravippavaasoti pa~nca vare yaacitvaa te satthu santikaa labhitvaa punadeva attano vasita.t.thaana.m gantvaa upajjhaayassa tamattha.m aarocesi. ayamettha sa"nkhepo. vitthaaro pana ^b^udaana.t.thakathaaya.m^eb^ aagatanayena veditabbo. ^b^a"nguttara.t.thakathaaya.m^eb^ (a0 ni0 a.t.tha0 1.1.206) pana ``upasampanno hutvaa attano upajjhaayassa santike kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.nii''ti vutta.m.
[03] so aparabhaage vimuttisukhena viharanto attano pa.tipatti.m paccavekkhitvaa somanassajaato udaanavasena --
[21] ``upasampadaa ca me laddhaa, vimutto camhi anaasavo.
[22] so ca me bhagavaa di.t.tho, vihaare ca sahaavasi.m..

[03] tattha ^b^upasampadaa ca me laddhaa^eb^ti yaa saa kicchena dasavagga.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaatetvaa attanaa laddhaa upasampadaa. yaa ca pana varadaanavasena sabbapaccantimesu janapadesu vinayadharapa~ncamena ga.nena satthaaraa anu~n~naataa upasampadaa, tadubhaya.m sandhaayaaha. ^b^ca^eb^-saddo ^a^P2.0156^ea^ samuccayattho, tena itarepi satthu santikaa laddhavare sa"nga.nhaati. ^b^vimutto camhi anaasavo^eb^ti aggamaggena sakalakilesavatthuvimuttiyaa vimutto ca amhi. tato eva kaamaasavaadiihi anaasavo amhiiti yojanaa. ^b^so ca me bhagavaa di.t.tho^eb^ti yadattha.m aha.m avantira.t.thato saavatthi.m gato, so ca bhagavaa mayaa adi.t.thapubbo di.t.tho. ^b^vihaare ca sahaavasi^eb^nti na kevala.m tassa bhagavato dassanameva mayaa laddha.m, atha kho vihaare satthu gandhaku.tiya.m satthaaraa kaara.na.m sallakkhetvaa vaasentena saha avasi.m. ^b^``vihaare^eb^ti vihaarasamiipe''ti keci.

[03] ^b^bahudeva ratti^eb^nti pa.thama.m yaama.m bhikkhuuna.m dhammadesanaavasena kamma.t.thaanasodhanavasena ca, majjhima.m yaama.m devaana.m brahmuuna~nca ka"nkhacchedanavasena bhagavaa bahudeva ratti.m abbhokaase ^b^atinaamayi^eb^ viitinaamesi. ^b^vihaarakusalo^eb^ti dibbabrahmaaane~njaariyavihaaresu kusalo. ^b^vihaara.m paavisii^eb^ti ativela.m nisajjaca"nkamehi uppannaparissamavinodanattha.m gandhaku.ti.m paavisi.

[03] ^b^santharitvaana sa"nghaa.ti.m, seyya.m kappesii^eb^ti catuggu.na.m sa"nghaa.ti.m pa~n~naapetvaa siihaseyya.m kappesi. tenaaha ``gotamo siiho selaguhaaya.mva pahiinabhayabheravo''ti. tattha ^b^gotamo^eb^ti bhagavanta.m gottena kitteti. ^b^siiho selaguhaaya.mvaa^eb^ti selassa pabbatassa guhaaya.m. yathaa siiho migaraajaa tejussadataaya pahiinabhayabheravo dakkhi.nena passena ^a^M2.0073^ea^ paade paada.m accaadhaaya seyya.m kappesi, eva.m cittutraasalomaha.msanachambhitattahetuuna.m kilesaana.m samucchinnattaa pahiinabhayabheravo gotamo bhagavaa seyya.m kappesiiti attho.

[03] ^b^tato^eb^ti pacchaa, siihaseyya.m kappetvaa tato vu.t.thahitvaa ``pa.tibhaatu ta.m bhikkhu dhammo bhaasitu''nti (udaa0 46) satthaaraa ajjhesitoti attho. ^b^kalyaa.navaakkara.no^eb^ti sundaravaciikara.no, lakkha.nasampannavacanakkamoti attho. ^b^so.no abhaasi saddhamma^eb^nti so.lasa a.t.thakavaggiyasuttaani ^a^V2.0064^ea^ so.no ku.tika.n.no, ^b^buddhase.t.thassa^eb^ sammaasambuddhassa ^b^sammukhaa,^eb^ paccakkhato abhaasiiti thero attaanameva para.m viya avoca.

[03] ^b^pa~ncakkhandhe pari~n~naayaa^eb^ti pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhe tiihipi pari~n~naahi parijaanitvaa te parijaanantoyeva, ^b^a~njasa.m^eb^ ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavayitvaa, ^b^parama.m santi.m^eb^ nibbaana.m ^b^pappuyya^eb^ paapu.nitvaa .thito ^b^anaasavo^eb^. tato eva idaani ^b^parinibbissati^eb^ anupaadisesanibbaanavasena nibbaayissatiiti.

[03] ^b^yo^eb^ ^a^P2.0157^ea^ ^b^eva garuuna^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato kosiyattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m disvaa pasannacitto ucchukha.n.dika.m adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade magadhara.t.the braahma.nakule nibbatti, ^b^kosiyo^eb^tissa gottavasena naama.m akaasi. so vi~n~nuta.m patto aayasmanta.m dhammasenaapati.m abhi.nha.m upasa"nkamati, tassa santike dhamma.m su.naati. so tena saasane pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa kamma.t.thaana.m anuyu~njanto nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.44.44-49) --
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa attano pa.tipatti.m paccavekkhitvaa garuvaasa.m sappurisuupanissaya~nca pasa.msanto --
[21] ``yo ve garuuna.m vacana~n~nu dhiiro, vase ca tamhi janayetha pema.m.
[22] so bhattimaa naama ca hoti pa.n.dito, ~natvaa ca dhammesu visesi assa..
[22] so thaamavaa naama ca hoti pa.n.dito, ~natvaa ca dhammesu visesi assa..
[22] asa.mhaariyo naama ca hoti pa.n.dito, ~natvaa ca dhammesu visesi assa..
[21] ``bahussuto dhammadharo ca hoti, dhammassa hoti anudhammacaarii.
[22] so taadiso naama ca hoti pa.n.dito, ~natvaa ca dhammesu visesi assa..

[03] tattha ^a^P2.0158^ea^ ^b^yo^eb^ti khattiyaadiisu catuusu parisaasu yo koci. ^b^ve^eb^ti byatta.m. ^b^garuuna^eb^nti siilaadigarugu.nayuttaana.m pa.n.ditaana.m. ^b^vacana~n~nuu^eb^ti tesa.m anusaasaniivacana.m jaananto, yathaanusi.t.tha.m pa.tipajjamaano pa.tipajjitvaa ca tassa phala.m jaanantoti attho. ^b^dhiiro^eb^ti dhitisampanno. ^b^vase ca tamhi janayetha pema^eb^nti tasmi.m garuuna.m vacane ovaade vaseyya yathaanusi.t.tha.m pa.tipajjeyya, pa.tipajjitvaa ``iminaa vataaha.m ovaadena ima.m jaatiaadidukkha.m viitivatto''ti tattha janayetha pema.m gaarava.m uppaadeyya. ida~nhi dvaya.m ``garuuna.m vacana~n~nu dhiiro''ti padadvayena vuttassevatthassa paaka.takara.na.m. ^b^so^eb^ti yo garuuna.m vacana~n~nuu dhiiro, so yathaanusi.t.tha.m pa.tipattiyaa tattha ^b^bhattimaa^eb^ ca naama hoti, jiivitahetupi tassa anatikkamanato ^b^pa.n.dito^eb^ ca naama hoti. ^b^~natvaa ca dhammesu visesi assaa^eb^ti tathaa pa.tipajjanto ca taaya eva pa.tipattiyaa catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m jaananahetu ^a^V2.0066^ea^ lokiyalokuttaradhammesu vijjaattayaadivasena ``tevijjo, cha.labhi~n~no, pa.tisambhidaapatto''ti visesi visesavaa siyaati attho.

[03] ^b^ya^eb^nti ya.m puggala.m pa.tipattiyaa antaraayakara.nato ^b^``aapadaa''^eb^ti laddhavohaaraa sotu.nhakhuppipaasaadipaaka.taparissayaa ceva raagaadipa.ticchannaparissayaa ca ^b^uppatitaa^eb^ uppannaa, ^b^u.laaraa^eb^ balavantopi ^b^nakkhambhayante^eb^ na ki~nci caalenti. kasmaa? ^b^pa.tisa"nkhayanta^eb^nti pa.tisa"nkhaayamaana.m pa.tisa"nkhaanabale .thitanti attho. ^b^so^eb^ti yo da.lhataraahi aapadaahipi akkhambhaniiyo, so ^b^thaamavaa^eb^ dhitimaa da.lhaparakkamo naama hoti. anavasesasa.mkilesapakkhassa abhibhavanakapa~n~naabalasama"ngitaaya ^b^pa.n.dito^eb^ ca naama hoti. tathaabhuuto ca ^b^~natvaa ca dhammesu visesi assaa^eb^ti ta.m vuttatthameva.

[03] ^b^samuddova^eb^ ^a^M2.0076^ea^ ^b^.thito^eb^ti samuddo viya .thitasabhaavo. yathaa hi caturaasiitiyojanasahassagambhiire sinerupaadasamiipe mahaasamuddo a.t.thahipi disaahi u.t.thitehi pakativaatehi ani~njanato ^b^.thito anejo^eb^ gambhiiro ca, eva.m kilesavaatehi titthiyavaadavaatehi ca akampaniiyato ^b^.thito anejo^eb^. gambhiirassa anupacita~naa.nasambhaarehi aladdhagaadhassa nipu.nassa sukhumassa pa.ticcasamuppaadaadiatthassa pa.tivijjhanena ^b^gambhiirapa~n~no nipu.natthadassii. asa.mhaariyo naama ca hoti pa.n.dito^eb^ so taadiso puggalo kilesehi devaputtamaaraadiisu vaa kenaci asa.mhaariyataaya asa.mhaariyo naama hoti, yathaavuttena atthena ^b^pa.n.dito^eb^ ca naama hoti. sesa.m vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^bahussuto^eb^ti pariyattibaahusaccavasena bahussuto, suttageyyaadi bahu.m suta.m etassaati bahussuto. tameva dhamma.m suva.n.nabhaajane pakkhittasiihavasa.m viya avinassantameva dhaaretiiti ^b^dhammadharo^eb^ ^a^P2.0159^ea^ ca hoti. ^b^dhammassa hoti anudhammacaarii^eb^ti yathaasutassa yathaapariyattassa dhammassa atthama~n~naaya dhammama~n~naaya navalokuttaradhammassa anuruupa.m dhamma.m pubbabhaagapa.tipadaasa"nkhaata.m catupaarisuddhisiiladhuta"ngaasubhakamma.t.thaanaadibheda.m carati pa.tipajjatiiti anudhammacaarii hoti, ``ajja ajjevaa''ti pa.tivedha.m aaka"nkhanto vicarati. ^b^so taadiso naama ca hoti pa.n.dito^eb^ti yo puggalo ya.m garu.m nissaaya bahussuto dhammadharo dhammassa ca anudhammacaarii hoti. so ca ^b^taadiso^eb^ tena garunaa sadiso pa.n.dito naama hoti pa.tipattiyaa sadisabhaavato. tathaabhuuto pana so ^b^~natvaa ca dhammesu visesi assa,^eb^ ta.m vuttattha.mva.

[03] ^b^attha~nca yo jaanaati bhaasitassaa^eb^ti yo puggalo sammaasambuddhena bhaasitassa pariyattidhammassa ^a^V2.0067^ea^ attha.m jaanaati. jaananto pana ``idha siila.m vutta.m, idha samaadhi, idha pa~n~naa''ti tattha tattha yathaavutta.m ^b^attha~nca ~natvaana tathaa karoti^eb^ yathaa satthaaraa anusi.t.tha.m, tathaa pa.tipajjati. ^b^atthantaro naama sa hoti pa.n.dito^eb^ti so evaruupo puggalo atthantaro atthakaara.naa siilaadiatthajaananamattameva upanissaya.m katvaa pa.n.dito hoti. sesa.m vuttanayameva.

[03] ettha ^a^M2.0077^ea^ ca pa.thamagaathaaya ``yo ve garuuna''ntiaadinaa saddhuupanissayo visesabhaavo vutto, dutiyagaathaaya ``ya.m aapadaa''ti aadinaa viiriyuupanissayo, tatiyagaathaaya ``yo ve samuddova .thito''tiaadinaa samaadhuupanissayo, catutthagaathaaya ``bahussuto''tiaadinaa satuupanissayo, pa~ncamagaathaaya ``attha~nca yo jaanaatii''tiaadinaa pa~n~nuupanissayo visesabhaavo vuttoti veditabbo.

[03] chakkanipaate ^a^M2.0078^ea^ ^a^V2.0068^ea^ ^b^disvaana paa.tihiiraanii^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato uruvelakassapattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa, vayappatto satthu santike dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m mahaaparisaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa, sayampi ta.m .thaanantara.m patthetvaa mahaadaana.m datvaa pa.nidhaanamakaasi. bhagavaa cassa anantaraayata.m disvaa, ``anaagate gotamabuddhassa saasane mahaaparisaana.m aggo bhavissatii''ti byaakaasi.

[03] so ^a^P2.0160^ea^ tattha yaavajiiva.m pu~n~naani katvaa tato cavitvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto ito dvaanavutikappamatthake phussassa bhagavato vemaatikakani.t.thabhaataa hutvaa nibbatti. a~n~nepissa dve kani.t.thabhaataro ahesu.m. te tayopi buddhappamukha.m sa"ngha.m paramaaya puujaaya puujetvaa yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto amhaaka.m bhagavato nibbattito puretarameva baaraa.nasiya.m braahma.nakule bhaataro hutvaa, anukkamena nibbattaa gottavasena tayopi kassapaa eva naama jaataa. te vayappattaa tayo vede ugga.nhi.msu. tesa.m je.t.thabhaatikassa pa~nca maa.navakasataani parivaaro, majjhimassa tii.ni, kani.t.thassa dve. te attano ganthe saara.m olokentaa di.t.thadhammikameva attha.m disvaa pabbajja.m rocesu.m. tesu je.t.thabhaataa attano parivaarena saddhi.m uruvela.m gantvaa isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa ^b^uruvelakassapo^eb^ naama jaato mahaaga"ngaanadiiva"nke pabbajito ^b^nadiikassapo^eb^ naama jaato, gayaasiise pabbajito ^b^gayaakassapo^eb^ naama jaato.

[03] eva.m tesu isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa tattha tattha vasantesu bahuuna.m divasaana.m accayena amhaaka.m bodhisatto mahaabhinikkhamana.m nikkhamitvaa, pa.tividdhasabba~n~nuta~n~naa.no anukkamena dhammacakka.m pavattetvaa, pa~ncavaggiyatthere arahatte pati.t.thaapetvaa yasappamukhe pa~ncapa~n~naasa sahaayake vinetvaa sa.t.thi arahante ``caratha, bhikkhave, caarika''nti vissajjetvaa, bhaddavaggiye vinetvaa uruvelakassapassa ^a^V2.0069^ea^ vasana.t.thaana.m gantvaa vasanatthaaya agyaagaara.m pavisitvaa ^a^M2.0079^ea^, tattha katanaagadamana.m aadi.m katvaa a.d.dhu.d.dhasahassehi paa.tihaariyehi uruvelakassapa.m saparisa.m vinetvaa pabbaajesi. tassa pabbajitabhaava.m ~natvaa itarepi dve bhaataro saparisaa aagantvaa satthu santike pabbaji.msu. sabbeva ehibhikkhuu iddhimayapattaciivaradharaa ahesu.m.

[03] satthaa ta.m sama.nasahassa.m aadaaya gayaasiisa.m gantvaa pi.t.thipaasaa.ne nisinno ^b^aadittapariyaayadesanaaya^eb^ sabbe arahatte pati.t.thaapesi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.54.251-295) --
[22] taavataa ti.t.thamaano so, taaresi janata.m bahu.m..
[22] parisaa mahatii hotu, nibbattassa tahi.m tahi.m..
[22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
[22] kassapo naama gottena, hessati satthu saavako..
[21] ``so ca sabba.m tama.m hantvaa, vija.tetvaa mahaaja.ta.m.
[22] khema.m vijirita.m katvaa, puna dethaati bhaasatha..
[22] nibbute tamhi lokagge, puuja.m katvaa yathaabala.m..
[22] bahudhaa sa.msito santo, di.t.thi.m hitvaana paapika.m..
[21] ``tadaa dve bhaataro mayha.m, pabbaji.msu mayaa saha.
[22] tato me aasi pa~n~natti, uruvelakassapo iti..
[22] mama pa~nca sataanuunaa, sissaa sabbe mamaanugaa..
[21] ``tadaa upecca ma.m buddho, katvaana vividhaani me.
[21] ``te ceva~n~ne ca bahavo, sissaa ma.m parivaarayu.m.
[22] aho buddhe kata.m kaara.m, saphala.m me ajaayatha..
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa attano pa.tipatti.m paccavekkhitvaa siihanaada.m nadanto --
[22] tato me aasi sa.mvego, abbhuto lomaha.msano..

[01] tattha ^b^disvaana paa.tihiiraanii^eb^ti naagaraajadamanaadiini a.d.dhu.d.dhasahassaani paa.tihaariyaani disvaa. ``paa.tihiira.m, paa.tihera.m, paa.tihaariya''nti hi atthato eka.m, bya~njanameva naana.m. ^b^yasassino''^eb^ti ``itipi so bhagavaa''tiaadinaa sadevake loke yathaabhucca.m pattha.takittisaddassa. ^b^na taavaaha.m pa.nipati^eb^nti yaava ma.m bhagavaa ``neva kho tva.m, kassapa, arahaa, naapi arahattamagga.m samaapanno, saapi te pa.tipadaa natthi, yaaya tva.m arahaa vaa assa, arahattamagga.m vaa samaapanno''ti na tajjesi, taava aha.m na pa.nipaatana.m akaasi.m. ki.mkaara.naa? ^b^issaamaanena va~ncito,^eb^ ``imassa mayi saavakatta.m upagate mama laabhasakkaaro parihaayissati, imassa eva va.d.dhissatii''ti eva.m parasampattiasahanalakkha.naaya issaaya ceva, ``aha.m ga.napaamokkho bahujanasammato''ti eva.m abbhunnatilakkha.nena maanena ca va~ncito, palambhito hutvaati attho.

[03] ^b^mama sa"nkappama~n~naayaa^eb^ti mayha.m micchaasa"nkappa.m jaanitvaa, ya.m ya.m bhagavaa uttari manussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m dasseti, ta.m ta.m disvaa ``mahiddhiko kho mahaasama.no mahaanubhaavo''ti cintetvaapi ``na tveva kho arahaa yathaa aha''nti eva.m pavatta.m micchaavitakka.m jaanantopi ~naa.naparipaaka.m aagamento ajjhupekkhitvaa pacchaa nera~njaraaya majjhe samantato udaka.m ussaaretvaa re.nuhataaya bhuumiyaa ca"nkamitvaa tena aabhatanaavaaya .thito tadaapi ``mahiddhiko''tiaadika.m cintetvaa puna ``na tveva kho arahaa yathaa aha''nti pavattita.m micchaasa"nkappa.m ~natvaati attho. ^b^codesi narasaarathii^eb^ti tadaa me ^a^V2.0073^ea^ ~naa.naparipaaka.m ~natvaa ``neva kho tva.m arahaa''tiaadinaa purisadammasaarathi satthaa ma.m codesi nigga.nhi. ^b^tato me aasi sa.mvego, abbhuto lomaha.msano^eb^ti tato yathaavuttacodanaahetu ettaka.m kaala.m abhuutapubbataaya ^b^abbhuto^eb^ lomaha.msanavasena pavattiyaa ^b^lomaha.msano^eb^ ``anarahaava samaano `arahaa'ti ^a^M2.0084^ea^ ma~n~ni''nti ^b^sa.mvego^eb^ sahottappo ~naa.nuppaado mayha.m ahosi.

[03] ^b^ja.tilabhuutassaa^eb^ti ^a^P2.0162^ea^ taapasabhuutassa. ^b^siddhii^eb^ti laabhasakkaarasamiddhi. ^b^parittikaa^eb^ti appamattikaa. ^b^taaha^eb^nti ta.m aha.m. ^b^tadaa^eb^ti bhagavato codanaaya sa.mveguppattikaale. ^b^niraakatvaa^eb^ti apanetvaa cha.d.detvaa, anapekkho hutvaati attho. ^b^``iddhii^eb^ti bhaavanaamayaiddhii''ti vadanti. tadayutta.m tadaa tassa ajhaanalaabhiibhaavato. tathaa hi vutta.m ``kaamadhaatupurakkhato''ti.

[03] ^b^ya~n~nena santu.t.tho^eb^ti ``ya~n~na.m yajitvaa saggasukha.m anubhavissaami, alamettaavataa''ti ya~n~nayajanena santu.t.tho ni.t.thitakiccasa~n~nii. ^b^kaamadhaatupurakkhato^eb^ti kaamasugati.m aarabbha uppannata.nho ya~n~nayajanena kaamaloka.m purakkhatvaa .thito. so ce ya~n~no paa.naatipaatapa.tisa.myutto hoti, na tena sugati.m sakkaa laddhu.m. na hi akusalassa i.t.tho kanto vipaako nibbattati. yaa pana tattha daanaadikusalacetanaa, taaya sati paccayasamavaaye sugati.m gaccheyya. ^b^pacchaa^eb^ti taapasapabbajjaato pacchaa satthu ovaadena taapasaladdhi.m pahaaya catusaccakamma.t.thaanaanuyogakaale. ^b^samuuhani^eb^nti vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa maggapa.tipaa.tiyaa raaga~nca dosa~nca moha~nca anavasesato samugghaatesi.m.

[03] yasmaa panaaya.m thero ariyamaggena raagaadayo samuuhanantoyeva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi, tasmaa ta.m attano cha.labhi~n~nabhaava.m dassento ^b^``pubbenivaasa.m jaanaamii''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^pubbenivaasa.m jaanaamii^eb^ti attano paresa~nca pubbenivaasa.m atiitaasu jaatiisu nibbattakkhandhe khandhapa.tibaddhe ca pubbenivaasa~naa.nena hatthatale aamalaka.m viya paccakkhato jaanaami bujjhaami. ^b^dibbacakkhu visodhita^eb^nti dibbacakkhu~naa.na.m visodhita.m, pakaticakkhunaa aapaathagata.m pakatiruupa.m viya dibba.m maanusampi duura.m tiro.t.thita.m atisukhuma~nca ruupa.m vibhaavetu.m samattha~naa.na.m bhaavanaaya mayaa visuddha.m katvaa pa.tiladdhanti attho. ^b^iddhimaa^eb^ti adhi.t.thaaniddhivikubbaniddhiaadiihi iddhiihi iddhimaa, iddhividha~naa.nalaabhiiti attho. saraagaadibhedassa paresa.m cittassa jaananato ^b^paracitta~n~nuu,^eb^ cetopariya~naa.nalaabhiiti vutta.m hoti. ^b^dibbasota~nca paapu.ni^eb^nti dibbasota~naa.na~nca pa.tilabhi.m.

[03] ^b^so^eb^ ^a^M2.0085^ea^ ^b^me attho anuppatto, sabbasa.myojanakkhayo^eb^ti yo sabbesa.m sa.myojanaana.m khayabhuuto khayena ^a^V2.0074^ea^ vaa laddhabbo, so sadattho paramattho ca mayaa ariyamaggaadhigamena adhigatoti. evametaaya gaathaaya therassa a~n~naabyaakara.na.m ahosiiti veditabbo.

[03] ^b^atihitaa^eb^ ^a^P2.0163^ea^ ^b^viihii^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato tekicchakaarittherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe vipassissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patvaa vejjasatthe nipphatti.m gato. vipassissa bhagavato upa.t.thaaka.m asoka.m naama thera.m byaadhita.m arogamakaasi, a~n~nesa~nca sattaana.m rogaabhibhuutaana.m anukampaaya bhesajja.m sa.mvidahi.

[03] so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade subuddhassa naama braahma.nassa putto hutvaa nibbatti. tassa tikicchakehi gabbhakaale parissaya.m apaharitvaa paripaalitataaya ^b^tekicchakaarii^eb^ti naama.m aka.msu. so attano kulaanuruupaani vijjaa.t.thaanaani sippaani ca sikkhanto va.d.dhati. tadaa caa.nakko subuddhassa pa~n~naaveyyattiya.m kiriyaasu upaayakosalla~nca disvaa, ``aya.m imasmi.m raajakule pati.t.tha.m labhanto ma.m abhibhaveyyaa''ti issaapakato ra~n~naa candaguttena ta.m bandhanaagaare khipaapesi. tekicchakaarii pitu bandhanaagaarappavesana.m sutvaa bhiito palaayitvaa saa.navaasittherassa santika.m gantvaa attano sa.mvegakaara.na.m therassa kathetvaa pabbajitvaa kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa abbhokaasiko nesajjiko ca hutvaa viharati, siitu.nha.m aga.nento ^a^M2.0086^ea^ sama.nadhammameva karoti, visesato brahmavihaarabhaavanamanuyu~njati. ta.m disvaa maaro paapimaa ``na imassa mama visaya.m atikkamitu.m dassaamii''ti vikkhepa.m kaatukaamo sassaana.m nipphattikaale khettagopakava.n.nena therassa santika.m gantvaa ta.m nippa.n.dento --
[22] na ca labhe pi.n.da.m, kathamaha.m kassa''nti.. -- aaha. ta.m sutvaa thero --
[21] ``buddhamappameyya.m ^a^V2.0075^ea^ anussara pasanno, piitiyaa phu.tasariiro hohisi satatamudaggo..
[22] maa siitena pareto viha~n~nittho, pavisa tva.m vihaara.m phusitagga.la''nti.. --
[21] ``phusissa.m catasso appama~n~naayo, taahi ca sukhito viharissa.m.
[22] naaha.m siitena viha~n~nissa.m, ani~njito viharanto''ti.. -- aaha.

[03] tattha ^b^atihitaa viihii^eb^ti viihayo ko.t.thaagaara.m atinetvaa .thapitaa, tattha pa.tisaamitaa khalato vaa ghara.m upaniitaati attho. viihiggaha.nena cettha itarampi dha~n~na.m sa"nga.nhaati. saalii pana yebhuyyena viihito ^a^M2.0087^ea^ pacchaa paccantiiti aaha. ^b^khalagataa saalii^eb^ti khala.m dha~n~nakara.na.t.thaana.m gataa, tattha raasivasena maddanacaavanaadivasena .thitaati attho. padhaanadha~n~nabhaavadassanattha~ncettha saaliina.m visu.m gaha.na.m, ubhayenapi gaame, gaamato bahi ca dha~n~na.m paripu.n.na.m .thitanti dasseti. ^b^na ca labhe pi.n.da^eb^nti eva.m sulabhadha~n~ne subhikkhakaale aha.m pi.n.damattampi na labhaami. idaani ^b^kathamaha.m kassa^eb^nti aha.m katha.m karissaami, katha.m jiivissaamiiti parihaasake.li.m akaasi.

[03] ta.m sutvaa thero ``aya.m varaako attanaa attano pavatti.m mayha.m pakaasesi, mayaa pana attanaava attaa ovaditabbo, na mayaa ki~nci kathetabba''nti vatthuttayaanussatiya.m attaana.m niyojento ^b^``buddhamappameyya''^eb^ntiaadinaa tisso gaathaa abhaasi. tattha ^b^buddhamappameyya.m anussara pasanno^eb^ti savaasanaaya avijjaaniddaaya accantavigamena, buddhiyaa ca vikasitabhaavena buddha.m bhagavanta.m pamaa.nakaraana.m raagaadikilesaana.m abhaavaa aparimaa.nagu.nasama"ngitaaya appameyyapu~n~nakkhettataaya ca appameyya.m. okappanalakkha.nena abhippasaadena pasanno, pasannamaanaso ``itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho''tiaadinaa (ma0 ni0 1.74; sa.m0 ni0 5.997) anussara anu anu buddhaaramma.na.m sati.m pavattehi, piitiyaa phu.tasariiro hohisi. ^b^satatamudaggo^eb^ti anussarantova phara.nalakkha.naaya piitiyaa satata.m sabbadaa phu.tasariiro piitisamu.t.thaanapa.niitaruupehi ajjhottha.tasariiro ubbegapiitiyaa ^a^P2.0165^ea^ udaggo kaaya.m udagga.m katvaa aakaasa.m la"nghitu.m samattho ca bhaveyyaasi, buddhaanussatiyaa buddhaaramma.na.m u.laara.m piitisomanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeyyaasi. yato siitu.nhehi viya jighacchaapipaasaahipi anabhibhuuto hohisiiti attho.

[03] ^b^dhamma^eb^nti ^a^V2.0076^ea^ ariya.m lokuttaradhamma.m. ^b^sa"ngha^eb^nti ariya.m paramatthasa"ngha.m. sesa.m vuttanayameva. ^b^anussaraa^eb^ti panettha ``svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo''tiaadinaa dhamma.m, ``suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho''tiaadinaa sa"ngha.m anussaraati yojetabba.m.

[03] eva.m therena ratanattayagu.naanussara.ne niyojanavasena attani ovadite puna maaro vivekavaasato na.m vivecetukaamo hitesiibhaava.m ^a^M2.0088^ea^ viya dassento ^b^``abbhokaase viharasii''^eb^ti pa~ncama.m gaathamaaha. tassattho -- tva.m, bhikkhu, ^b^abbhokaase^eb^ kenaci apa.ticchanne viva.ta"nga.ne ^b^viharasi^eb^ iriyaapathe kappesi. ^b^hemantikaa^eb^ himapaatasamaye pariyaapannaa imaa siitaa rattiyo vattanti. tasmaa siitena ^b^pareto^eb^ abhibhuuto hutvaa ^b^maa viha~n~nittho^eb^ vighaata.m maa aapajji maa kilami. ^b^phusitagga.la.m^eb^ pihitakavaa.ta.m senaasana.m pavisa, eva.m te sukhavihaaro bhavissatiiti.

[03] ta.m sutvaa thero ``na mayha.m senaasanapariyesanaaya payojana.m, etthevaaha.m sukhavihaarii''ti dassento ^b^``phusissa''^eb^ntiaadinaa cha.t.tha.m gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^phusissa.m catasso appama~n~naayo^eb^ti appamaa.nagocarataaya ``appama~n~naa''ti laddhavohaare cattaaro brahmavihaare phusissa.m phusissaami, kaalena kaala.m samaapajjissaami. ^b^taahi ca sukhito viharissa^eb^nti taahi appama~n~naahi sukhito sa~njaatasukho hutvaa viharissa.m cattaaropi iriyaapathe kappessaamiiti. tena mayha.m sabbakaale sukhameva, na dukkha.m. ^b^yato naaha.m siitena viha~n~nissa.m^eb^ antara.t.thakepi himapaatasamaye aha.m siitena na kilamissaami, tasmaa ^b^ani~njito viharanto^eb^ cittassa i~njitakaara.naana.m byaapaadaadiina.m suppahiinattaa paccayuppanni~njanaaya ca abhaavato samaapattisukheneva sukhito viharissaamiiti. eva.m thero ima.m gaatha.m vadantoyeva vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m sacchaakaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.18.39-44) --
[03] ettha ca bindusaarara~n~no kaale imassa therassa uppannattaa tatiyasa"ngiitiya.m imaa gaathaa sa"ngiitaati veditabbaa.

[01] ^b^yassa sabrahmacaariisuu^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato mahaanaagattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinanto kakusandhassa bhagavato kaale ^a^P2.0166^ea^ kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m kakusandha.m bhagavanta.m ara~n~na.m ajjhogaahetvaa a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule jhaanasukhena nisinna.m disvaa pasannamaanaso tassa daa.limaphala.m adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saakete madhuvaase.t.thassa naama braahma.nassa putto hutvaa nibbatti, ^b^mahaanaago^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vi~n~nuta.m patto bhagavati saakete a~njanavane viharante aayasmato gavampatittherassa paa.tihaariya.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho therasseva santike pabbajitvaa tassovaade .thatvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.45.1-7) --
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa vimuttisukhena viharanto thero chabbaggiye bhikkhuu sabrahmacaariisu gaarava.m akatvaa viharante disvaa tesa.m ovaadadaanavasena --
[22] na viruuhati saddhamme, khette biija.mva puutika.m..
[22] na vihaayati saddhammaa, maccho bavhodake yathaa..
[22] so viruuhati saddhamme, khette biija.mva bhaddaka.m..

[03] tattha ^b^sabrahmacaariisuu^eb^ti samaana.m brahma.m siilaadidhamma.m carantiiti sabrahmacaarino, siiladi.t.thisaama~n~nagataa sahadhammikaa, tesu. ^b^gaaravo^eb^ti garubhaavo siilaadigu.nanimitta.m garukara.na.m. ^b^nuupalabbhatii^eb^ti na vijjati na pavattati, na upati.t.thatiiti attho. ^b^nibbaanaa^eb^ti kilesaana.m nibbaapanato kilesakkhayaati attho. ^b^dhammaraajassaa^eb^ti satthuno. satthaa hi sadevaka.m loka.m yathaaraha.m lokiyalokuttarena dhammena ra~njeti tosetiiti ^b^dhammaraajaa^eb^. ettha ca ``dhammaraajassa saasane''ti iminaa nibbaana.m naama dhammaraajasseva saasane ^a^P2.0167^ea^, na a~n~nattha. tattha yo sabrahmacaariisu ^a^M2.0091^ea^ gaaravarahito, so yathaa nibbaanaa aarakaa hoti, tathaa dhammaraajassa saasanatopi aarakaa hotiiti dasseti. ^b^bavhodake^eb^ti bahuudake. ^b^santike hoti nibbaana^eb^nti nibbaana.m tassa santike samiipe eva hoti. sesa.m vuttanayameva. imaa eva ca therassa a~n~naabyaakara.nagaathaa ahesu.m.

[03] ^b^kullo sivathika^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato kullattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu ^a^V2.0079^ea^ kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m ku.tumbiyakule nibbattitvaa ^b^kullo^eb^ti laddhanaamo vi~n~nuta.m patto satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbaji. so ca raagacaritattaa tibbaraagajaatiko hoti. tenassa abhikkha.na.m kilesaa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti. athassa satthaa cittaacaara.m ~natvaa asubhakamma.t.thaana.m datvaa, ``kulla, tayaa abhi.nha.m susaane caarikaa caritabbaa''ti aaha. so susaana.m pavisitvaa uddhumaatakaadiini taani taani asubhaani disvaa ta.m muhutta.m asubhamanasikaara.m uppaadetvaa susaanato nikkhantamattova kaamaraagena abhibhuyyati. puna bhagavaa tassa ta.m pavatti.m ~natvaa ekadivasa.m tassa susaana.t.thaana.m gatakaale eka.m taru.nitthiruupa.m adhunaa mata.m avina.t.thacchavi.m nimminitvaa dasseti. tassa ta.m di.t.thamattassa jiivamaanavisabhaagavatthusmi.m viya sahasaa raago uppajjati. atha na.m satthaa tassa pekkhantasseva navahi va.namukhehi paggharamaanaasuci.m kimikulaakula.m ativiya biibhaccha.m duggandha.m jeguccha.m pa.tikkuula.m katvaa dassesi. so ta.m pekkhanto virattacitto hutvaa a.t.thaasi. athassa bhagavaa obhaasa.m pharitvaa sati.m janento --

[25] aaha ^a^M2.0092^ea^. ta.m sutvaa thero sammadeva sariirasabhaava.m upadhaarento asubhasa~n~na.m pa.tilabhitvaa tattha pa.thama.m jhaana.m nibbattetvaa ta.m paadaka.m katvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.nitvaa attano pa.tipatti.m paccavekkhitvaa --
[21] ``yathaa ida.m tathaa eta.m, yathaa eta.m tathaa ida.m.
[22] yathaa adho tathaa uddha.m, yathaa uddha.m tathaa adho..
[21] ``yathaa divaa tathaa ratti.m, yathaa ratti.m tathaa divaa.
[22] yathaa pure tathaa pacchaa, yathaa pacchaa tathaa pure..
[03] tattha ^a^V2.0080^ea^ ^b^kullo^eb^ti attaanameva thero para.m viya katvaa vadati.

[03] ^b^aatura^eb^nti naanappakaarehi dukkhehi abhi.nha.m pa.tipii.lita.m. ^b^asuci^eb^nti sucirahita.m jeguccha.m pa.tikkuula.m. ^b^puuti^eb^nti duggandha.m. ^b^passaa^eb^ti sabhaavato olokehi. ^b^kullaa^eb^ti ovaadakaale bhagavaa thera.m aalapati. udaanakaale pana thero sayameva attaana.m vadati. ^b^samussaya^eb^nti sariira.m. ^b^uggharanta^eb^nti uddha.m va.namukhehi asuci.m savanta.m. ^b^paggharanta^eb^nti adho va.namukhehi samantato ca asuci.m savanta.m. ^b^baalaana.m abhinandita^eb^nti baalehi andhaputhujjanehi di.t.thita.nhaabhinandanaahi ``aha.m mama''nti abhinivissa nandita.m.

[03] ^b^dhammaadaasa^eb^nti dhammamaya.m aadaasa.m. yathaa hi sattaa adaasena attano mukhe kaaye vaa gu.nadose passanti, eva.m yogaavacaro yena attabhaave ^a^M2.0093^ea^ sa.mkilesavodaanadhamme yaathaavato passati, ta.m vipassanaa~naa.na.m idha ``dhammaadaasa''nti vutta.m. ta.m ~naa.nadassanassa magga~naa.nasa"nkhaatassa dhammacakkhussa adhigamaaya attano santaane uppaadetvaa. ^b^paccavekkhi.m ima.m kaaya^eb^nti ima.m karajakaaya.m niccasaaraadivirahato ^b^tuccha.m^eb^ attaparasantaanaana.m vibhaagato ^b^santarabaahira.m^eb^ ~naa.nacakkhunaa patiavekkhi.m passi.m.

[03] yathaa pana paccavekkhi.m, ta.m dassetu.m ^b^``yathaa ida''^eb^ntiaadi vutta.m. tattha ^b^yathaa ida.m tathaa eta^eb^nti yathaa ida.m mayha.m sariirasa"nkhaata.m asubha.m aayuusmaavi~n~naa.naana.m anapagamaa naanaavidha.m maayopama.m kiriya.m dasseti, tathaava eta.m matasariira.m pubbe tesa.m dhammaana.m anapagamaa ahosi. yathaa eta.m etarahi matasariira.m tesa.m dhammaana.m apagamaa na ki~nci kiriya.m dasseti, tathaa ida.m mama sariirampi tesa.m dhammaana.m apagamaa nassatevaati. yathaa ca ida.m mama sariira.m etarahi susaane na mata.m na sayita.m, na uddhumaatakaadibhaava.m upagata.m, tathaa eta.m etarahi matasariirampi pubbe ^a^P2.0169^ea^ ahosi. yathaa paneta.m etarahi matasariira.m susaane sayita.m uddhumaatakaadibhaava.m upagata.m, tathaa ida.m mama sariirampi bhavissati. atha vaa yathaa ida.m mama sariira.m asuci duggandha.m jeguccha.m pa.tikkuula.m anicca.m dukkha.m anattaa, tathaa eta.m matasariirampi. yathaa vaa eta.m matasariira.m asuciaadisabhaava~nceva aniccaadisabhaava~nca, tathaa ida.m mama sariirampi. ^b^yathaa adho tathaa uddha^eb^nti yathaa naabhito adho he.t.thaa aya.m kaayo asuci duggandho jeguccho pa.tikkuulo anicco dukkho anattaa ca, tathaa uddha.m naabhito upari asuciaadisabhaavo ca. ^b^yathaa uddha.m tathaa adho^eb^ti yathaa ca naabhito, uddha.m asuciaadisabhaavo, tathaa adho naabhito he.t.thaapi.

[03] ^b^yathaa^eb^ ^a^V2.0081^ea^ ^b^divaa tathaa ratti^eb^nti yathaa aya.m kaayo divaa ``akkhimhaa akkhiguuthako''tiaadinaa (su0 ni0 199) asuci paggharati, tathaa rattimpi. ^b^yathaa ratti.m tathaa divaa^eb^ti yathaa ca ratti.m aya.m kaayo asuci paggharati, tathaa divaapi, nayimassa kaalavibhaagena a~n~nathaabhaavoti attho. ^b^yathaa pure tathaa pacchaa^eb^ti yathaa aya.m kaayo pure pubbe taru.nakaale asuci duggandho jeguccho pa.tikkuulo, tathaa ca pacchaa ji.n.nakaale. yathaa ca pacchaa ji.n.nakaale asuciaadisabhaavo, tathaa pure taru.nakaalepi ^a^M2.0094^ea^. yathaa vaa pure atiitakaale savi~n~naa.nakaale asuciaadisabhaavo ca aniccaadisabhaavo ca, tathaa pacchaa anaagatakaale avi~n~naa.nakaaleti evampettha attho veditabbo.

[03] ^b^pa~nca"ngikena turiyenaa^eb^ti ``aatata.m vitata.m aatatavitata.m ghana.m susiira''nti eva.m pa~nca"ngikena pa~ncahi a"ngehi samannaagatena turiyena paricariyamaanassa kaamasukhasama"ngino issarajanassa ^b^taadisii^eb^ tathaaruupaa ^b^rati^eb^ sukhassaado na hoti. ^b^yathaa ekaggacittassa, sammaa dhamma.m vipassato^eb^ti samathavipassana.m yuganaddha.m katvaa indriyaana.m ekarasabhaavena viithipa.tipannaaya vipassanaaya khandhaana.m udayabbaya.m passantassa yogaavacarassa yaadisaa dhammarati, tassaa kalampi kaamarati na upetiiti. vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa --
[22] labhatii piitipaamojja.m, amata.m ta.m vijaanata''nti.. (dha0 pa0 374).
[03] imaa eva ca therassa a~n~naabyaakara.nagaathaapi ahesu.m.

[03] ^b^manujassaa^eb^tiaadikaa ^a^P2.0170^ea^ aayasmato maalukyaputtattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinitvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m kosalara~n~no aggaasanikassa putto hutvaa nibbatti. tassa maataa maalukyaa naama, tassaa vasena ^b^maalukyaputto^eb^tveva pa~n~naayittha. so vayappatto nissara.najjhaasayataaya gharaavaasa.m pahaaya paribbaajakapabbajja.m ^a^V2.0082^ea^ pabbajitvaa vicaranto satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa saasane pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. so ~naatiisu anukampaaya ~naatikula.m agamaasi. ta.m ~naatakaa pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena parivisitvaa dhanena palobhetukaamaa mahanta.m dhanaraasi.m ^a^M2.0095^ea^ purato upa.t.thapetvaa ``ida.m dhana.m tava santaka.m, vibbhamitvaa iminaa dhanena puttadaara.m pa.tijagganto pu~n~naani karohii''ti yaaci.msu. thero tesa.m ajjhaasaya.m viparivattento aakaase .thatvaa --
[22] so plavatii huraa hura.m, phalamiccha.mva vanasmi vaanaro..
[21] ``ya.m esaa sahate jammii, ta.nhaa loke visattikaa.
[21] ``yo ceta.m sahate jammi.m, ta.nha.m loke duraccaya.m.
[21] ``ta.m vo vadaami bhadda.m vo, yaavantettha samaagataa.
[22] maa vo na.la.mva sotova, maaro bha~nji punappuna.m..

[03] tattha ^b^manujassaa^eb^ti sattassa. ^b^pamattacaarino^eb^ti sativossaggalakkha.nena pamaadena pamattacaarissa, neva jhaana.m, na vipassanaa ^a^P2.0171^ea^, na maggaphalaani va.d.dhanti. yathaa pana rukkha.m sa.msibbantii pariyonandhantii tassa vinaasaaya maaluvaa lataa va.d.dhati, evamassa cha dvaaraani nissaaya ruupaadiisu punappuna.m uppajjamaanaa ta.nhaa va.d.dhati. va.d.dhamaanaava yathaa maaluvaa lataa attano apassayabhuuta.m rukkha.m ajjhottharitvaa paateti, eva.m ta.nhaavasika.m puggala.m apaaye nipaateti. ^b^so plavatii^eb^ti so ta.nhaavasiko puggalo aparaapara.m bhavaabhave uplavati dhaavati. yathaa ki.m? ^b^phalamiccha.mva vanasmi vaanaro^eb^ yathaa rukkhaphala.m icchanto vaanaro vanasmi.m dhaavanto rukkhassa eka.m saakha.m ga.nhaati, ta.m mu~ncitvaa a~n~na.m ga.nhaati, ta.m mu~ncitvaa a~n~nanti ``saakha.m ^a^V2.0083^ea^ alabhitvaa nisinno''ti vattabbata.m ^a^M2.0096^ea^ naapajjati; evameva ta.nhaavasiko puggalo huraa hura.m dhaavanto ``aaramma.na.m alabhitvaa ta.nhaaya appavatti.m patto''ti vattabbata.m naapajjati.

[03] ^b^ya^eb^nti ya.m puggala.m. esaa laamakabhaavena ^b^jammii^eb^ visaahaarataaya visamuulataaya visaphalataaya visaparibhogataaya ruupaadiisu visattataaya aasattataaya ca ^b^visattikaa^eb^ti sa"nkha.m gataa chadvaarikaa ta.nhaa ^b^sahate^eb^ abhibhavati tassa puggalassa. yathaa naama vane punappuna.m vassante deve abhiva.t.tha.m ^b^biira.na.m^eb^ biira.nati.na.m va.d.dhati, eva.m va.t.tamuulakaa sokaa abhiva.d.dhanti vuddhi.m aapajjantiiti attho.

[03] ^b^yo ceta.m...pe0... duraccaya^eb^nti yo pana puggalo eva.m vuttappakaara.m atikkamitu.m pajahitu.m dukkarataaya duraccaya.m ta.nha.m ^b^sahate^eb^ abhibhavati, tamhaa puggalaa va.t.tamuulakaa sokaa papatanti. yathaa naama pokkhare padumapatte patita.m udabindu na pati.t.thaati, eva.m na pati.t.thahantiiti attho.

[01] ^b^ta.m vo vadaamii^eb^ti tena kaara.nena aha.m tumhe vadaami. ^b^bhadda.m vo^eb^ti bhadda.m tumhaaka.m hotu, maa ta.nha.m anuvattapuggalo viya vibhava.m anattha.m paapu.naathaati attho. ^b^yaavantettha samaagataa^eb^ti imasmi.m .thaane yattakaa sannipatitaa, tattakaa. ki.m vadasiiti ce? ^b^ta.nhaaya muula.m kha.natha^eb^ imissaa chadvaarikata.nhaaya muula.m kaara.na.m avijjaadikilesaggahana.m arahattamagga~naa.nakudaalena kha.natha samucchindatha. ki.m viyaati? ^b^usiiratthova biira.na.m^eb^ yathaa usiirena atthiko puriso mahantena kudaalena biira.naaparanaama.m usiira.m naama ti.na.m kha.nati, evamassa muula.m kha.nathaati attho. ^b^maa vo na.la.mva sotova, maaro bha~nji punappuna^eb^nti tumhe nadiitiire jaata.m na.la.m mahaavegena aagato nadiisoto viya kilesamaaro maccumaaro devaputtamaaro ca punappuna.m maa bha~njiiti attho.

[03] tasmaa ^b^karotha buddhavacana.m^eb^ ``jhaayatha, bhikkhave, maa pamaadatthaa''tiaadinaa (ma0 ni0 1.215) vutta.m buddhassa bhagavato vacana.m karotha, yathaanusi.t.tha.m pa.tipattiyaa sampaadetha. ^b^kha.no vo maa^eb^ ^a^P2.0172^ea^ ^b^upaccagaa^eb^ti yo hi buddhavacana.m na karoti, ta.m ^a^M2.0097^ea^ puggala.m aya.m buddhuppaadakkha.no patiruupadesavaase uppattikkha.no sammadi.t.thiyaa pa.tiladdhakkha.no channa.m aayatanaana.m avekallakkha.noti sabbopi kha.no atikkamati, so kha.no maa tumhe atikkamatu. ^b^kha.naatiitaa^eb^ti ye hi ta.m kha.na.m atiitaa, ye vaa puggale so kha.no atiito, te ^b^nirayamhi samappitaa^eb^ tattha nibbattaa cirakaala.m socanti.

[03] ^b^pamaado rajo^eb^ti ruupaadiisu aaramma.nesu sativossaggalakkha.no pamaado, sa.mkilesasabhaavattaa raagarajaadimissataaya ^a^V2.0084^ea^ ca rajo. ^b^pamaadaanupatito rajo^eb^ti yo hi koci rajo naama raagaadiko, so sabbo pamaadaanupatito pamaadavaseneva uppajjati. ^b^appamaadenaa^eb^ti appamajjanena appamaadapa.tipattiyaa. ^b^vijjaayaa^eb^ti aggamaggavijjaaya. ^b^abbahe sallamattano^eb^ti attano hadayanissita.m raagaadisalla.m uddhareyya samuuhaneyyaati.

[03] ^b^pa.n.naviisatii^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato sappadaasattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinitvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade kapilavatthusmi.m suddhodanamahaaraajassa purohitaputto hutvaa nibbatti, tassa ^b^sappadaaso^eb^ti naama.m ahosi. so vayappatto satthu ~naatisamaagame pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa kilesaabhibhavena cetosamaadhi.m alabhanto brahmacariya.m caritvaa sa.mvegajaato pacchaa sattha.m aaharanto yoniso manasikaara.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.nitvaa a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
[21] ``sattha.m ^a^M2.0098^ea^ vaa aaharissaami, ko attho jiivitena me.
[22] katha~nhi sikkha.m paccakkha.m, kaala.m kubbetha maadiso..
[22] tisso vijjaa anuppattaa, kata.m buddhassa saasana''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^a^V2.0085^ea^ ^b^pa.n.naviisativassaani, yato pabbajito aha^eb^nti yato pa.t.thaaya aha.m pabbajito taanimaani pa.n.naviisativassaani. ^b^accharaasa"nghaatamattampi, cetosantimanajjhaga^eb^nti soha.m ettaka.m kaala.m brahmacariya.m caranto accharaasa"nghaatamattampi a"ngulipho.tanamattampi kha.na.m cetosanti.m cetaso samaadhaana.m na labhi.m.

[03] eva.m pana aladdhaa cittassekaggata.m, tattha kaara.namaaha ^b^``kaamaraagena a.t.tito^eb^''ti. tattha ^b^a.t.tito^eb^ti pii.lito, abhibhuutoti attho. ^b^baahaa paggayha kandanto^eb^ti ``idamidha ativiya ayutta.m vattati, yadaaha.m niyyaanike saasane pabbajitvaa attaana.m kilesapa"nkato uddharitu.m na sakkomii''ti uddha.mmukho baahaa paggayha kandamaano. ^b^vihaaraa upanikkhami^eb^nti vasanakavihaarato bahi nikkhanto.

[03] yenaadhippaayena nikkhanto, ta.m dassetu.m ^b^``sattha.m vaa aaharissaamii''^eb^tiaadi vutta.m. tattha ^b^sattha.m vaa aaharissaamii^eb^ti ^b^vaa^eb^-saddo vikappanattho. tena ``rukkhaa vaa papatissaami, ubbandhitvaa vaa marissaamii''tiaadike mara.nappakaare sa"nga.nhaati. ^b^sikkha^eb^nti adhisiilasikkha.m. ^b^paccakkha^eb^nti paccaacikkhanto pariccajanto. ``paccakkhaa''tipi paa.li, paccakkhaayaati attho. ^b^kaala^eb^nti mara.na.m. katha~nhi naama maadiso sikkhaapaccakkhaanena kaala.m kareyyaati attho. sikkhaapaccakkhaana~nhi ariyassa vinaye mara.na.m naama. yathaaha bhagavaa -- ``mara.na~nheta.m ^a^M2.0099^ea^, bhikkhave, yo sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattatii''ti (ma0 ni0 3.63). ``sikkha.m paccakkhaa''ti pana paa.the katha~nhi naama maadiso sikkha.m paccakkhaaya kaala.m kareyya, sikkhaasama"ngii eva pana hutvaa kaala.m kareyya? tasmaa sattha.m vaa aaharissaami, ko attho jiivitena meti yojanaa.

[03] ^b^tadaaha^eb^nti yadaa kilesaabhibhavena sama.nadhamma.m kaatu.m asamatthataaya jiivite nibbindanto tadaa. ^b^khura^eb^nti nisitakhura.m, khurasadisa.m vaa satthaka.m. ^b^ma~ncakamhi upaavisi^eb^nti paresa.m nivaara.nabhayena ovaraka.m pavisitvaa ma~ncake nisiidi.m. ^b^pariniito^eb^ti upaniito, gale .thapitoti adhippaayo. ^b^dhamani^eb^nti ``ka.n.the dhamani.m, ka.n.thadhamani.m galavalaya''ntipi vadanti. ^b^chettu^eb^nti chinditu.m.

[03] ^b^tato me manasiikaaro, yoniso udapajjathaa^eb^ti ``yadaaha.m marissaamii''ti ka.n.the dhamani.m chinditu.m khura.m upanesi.m, tato para.m ``aroga.m nu kho me siila''nti paccavekkhantassa akkha.n.da.m acchidda.m suparisuddha.m ^a^V2.0086^ea^ siila.m disvaa piiti uppajji, piitimanassa kaayo passambhi, passaddhakaayassa niraamisa.m sukha.m anubhavantassa cittassa samaahitataaya vipassanaavasena ^a^P2.0174^ea^ yoniso manasikaaro uppajji. atha vaa tatoti ka.n.the khurassa upanayato va.ne jaate uppanna.m vedana.m vikkhambhento vipassanaaya vasena yonisomanasikaaro uppajji. idaani tato para.m maggaphalapaccavekkha.na~naa.na.m uppannabhaava.m dassetu.m ``aadiinavo paaturahuu''tiaadi vutta.m. ta.m he.t.thaa vuttatthameva.

[03] ^b^u.t.thehii^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato kaatiyaanattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinitvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m a~n~natarassa kosiyagottassa braahma.nassa ^a^M2.0100^ea^ putto hutvaa nibbatto, maatugottavasena pana ^b^kaatiyaano^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto saama~n~nakaanittherassa gihisahaayo thera.m disvaa pabbajito sama.nadhamma.m karonto ratti.m ``niddaabhibhava.m vinodessaamii''ti ca"nkama.m aaruhi. so ca"nkamanto niddaaya abhibhuuto pacalaayamaano paripatitvaa tattheva anantarahitaaya bhuumiyaa nipajji, satthaa tassa ta.m pavatti.m disvaa saya.m tattha gantvaa aakaase .thatvaa ^b^``kaatiyaanaa''^eb^ti sa~n~na.m adaasi. so satthaara.m disvaa u.t.thahitvaa vanditvaa sa.mvegajaato a.t.thaasi. athassa satthaa dhamma.m desento --
[21] ``u.t.thehi nisiida kaatiyaana, maa niddaabahulo ahu jaagarassu.
[22] maa ta.m alasa.m pamattabandhu, kuu.teneva jinaatu maccuraajaa..
[22] so karohi sudiipamattano tva.m, na hi taa.na.m tava vijjateva a~n~na.m..
[21] ``satthaa hi vijesi maggameta.m, sa"ngaa jaatijaraabhayaa atiita.m.
[22] maa ^a^P2.0175^ea^ khi.d.daarati~nca maa nidda.m, anuyu~njittha jhaaya kaatiyaana..
[22] pappuyya anuttara.m visuddhi.m, parinibbaahisi vaarinaava joti..
[27] evampi tuva.m anaadiyaano, maara.m indasagotta niddhunaahi.
[22] so vedayitaasu viitaraago, kaala.m ka"nkha idheva siitibhuuto''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^u.t.thehii^eb^ti nidduupagamanato u.t.thahanto u.t.thaanaviiriya.m karohi. yasmaa nipajjaa naama kosajjapakkhiyaa, tasmaa maa sayi. ^b^nisiidaa^eb^ti palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa nisiida. ^b^kaatiyaanaa^eb^ti ta.m naamena aalapati. ^b^maa niddaabahulo ahuu^eb^ti niddaabahulo niddaabhibhuuto maa ahu. ^b^jaagarassuu^eb^ti jaagara, jaagariyamanuyutto hohi. ^b^maa ta.m alasa^eb^nti jaagariya.m ananuyu~njanta.m ta.m alasa.m kusiita.m pamattabandhu maccuraajaa ^b^kuu.teneva^eb^ adduhanena viya nesaado miga.m vaa pakkhi.m vaa jaraarogehi maa jinaatu maa abhibhavatu, maa ajjhottharatuuti attho.

[03] ^b^seyyathaapii^eb^ti seyyathaa api. ^b^mahaasamuddavego^eb^ti mahaasamuddassa uumivego. ^b^eva^eb^nti yathaa naama mahaasamuddauumivego uparuupari u.t.thahanto ta.m abhikkamitu.m asakkonta.m purisa.m abhibhavati, eva.m jaati jaraa ca kosajjaabhibhuuta.m ta.m ^b^ativattate^eb^ uparuupari ajjhottharati. ^b^so karohii^eb^ti so tva.m, kaatiyaana, catuuhi oghehi anajjhotthara.niiya.m arahattaphalasa"nkhaata.m ^b^sudiipa.m attano karohi^eb^ attano santaane uppaadehi. ^b^na hi taa.na.m tava vijjateva a~n~na^eb^nti ^b^hii^eb^ti hetuatthe nipaato. yasmaa tato aggaphalato a~n~na.m tava taa.na.m naama idha vaa hura.m vaa na upalabbhati, tasmaa ta.m arahattasa"nkhaata.m sudiipa.m karohiiti.

[03] ^b^satthaa hi vijesi maggameta^eb^nti ya.m saadhetu.m avisahantaa yato paraajitaa puthuu a~n~natitthiyaa, tadeta.m tassa sudiipassa kaara.nabhuuta.m pa~ncavidhasa"ngato jaatiaadibhayato ca atiita.m ariyamagga.m devaputtamaaraadike abhibhavitvaa tuyha.m satthaa vijesi saadhesi. yasmaa satthu santaka.m ^a^M2.0102^ea^ naama saavakena adhigantabba.m na vissajjetabba.m, tasmaa tassa adhigamaaya pubbarattaapararatta.m purimayaama.m pacchimayaama~nca ^a^P2.0176^ea^, ^b^appamatto^eb^ sato sampajaano hutvaa ^b^anuyu~nja yoga.m^eb^ bhaavana.m da.lha~nca karohi.

[03] ^b^purimaani pamu~nca bandhanaanii^eb^ti purimakaani gihikaale aabaddhaani gihibandhanaani kaamagu.nabandhanaani pamu~nca vissajjehi, tattha anapekkho hohi. ^b^sa"nghaa.tikhuramu.n.dabhikkhabhojii^eb^ti sa"nghaa.tidhaarii ^a^V2.0088^ea^ khurena katasiramu.n.do bhikkhaahaarabhojii, tividhampeta.m purimabandhanapamokkhassa khi.d.daaratiniddaananuyogassa ca kaara.navacana.m. yasmaa tva.m sa"nghaa.tipaaruto mu.n.do bhikkhaahaaro jiivati, tasmaa te kaamasukhaanuyogo khi.d.daaratiniddaanuyogo ca na yuttoti tato purimaani pamu~nca bandhanaani khi.d.daarati.m nidda~nca maanuyu~njitthaati yojanaa. ^b^jhaayaa^eb^ti jhaayassu aaramma.nuupanijjhaana.m ^b^anuyu~nja^eb^.

[03] ta.m pana anuyu~njanto yena jhaanena jhaayato kilesaa sabbaso jitaa honti, ta.m lakkha.nuupanijjhaana.m anuyu~njaati dassento ^b^``jhaayaahi jinaahii''^eb^ti aaha. ^b^yogakkhemapathesu kovidosii^eb^ti catuuhi yogehi khemassa nibbaanassa pathabhuutesu bodhipakkhiyadhammesu kusalo cheko asi, tasmaa bhaavana.m ussukkaapento ^b^anuttara.m^eb^ uttararahita.m, ^b^visuddhi.m^eb^ nibbaana.m arahatta~nca ^b^pappuyya^eb^ paapu.nitvaa pana tva.m parinibbaahisi. ^b^vaarinaava jotii^eb^ti mahataa salilavu.t.thinipaatena aggikhandho viya ariyamaggavu.t.thinipaatena parinibbaayissati.

[03] ^b^pajjotakaro^eb^ti pajjoti.m karo padiipo. ^b^parittara.mso^eb^ti khuddakacciko. ^b^vinamyate^eb^ti vinamiiyati apaniyyati. ^b^lataavaa^eb^ti valli viya. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- yathaa va.t.tiaadipaccayavekallena parittara.mso mandapabho padiipo appikaa lataa vaa vaatena vidhamiyyati viddha.msiyyati, eva.m tuvampi. kosiyagottataaya, ^b^indasagotta,^eb^ indasamaanagotta.m. maara.m tassa vase anaavattanaa anupaadaanato ca ^b^anaadiyaano, niddhunaahi^eb^ vidhamehi viddha.msehi. eva.m pana viddha.msamaano so tva.m vedayitaasu sabbaasu vedanaasu vigatacchandaraago ^b^idheva^eb^ imasmi.myeva attabhaave sabbakilesadarathapari.laahaabhaavena ^b^siitibhuuto^eb^ nibbuto attano parinibbaanakaala.m ^b^ka"nkha^eb^ aagamehiiti ^a^M2.0103^ea^. eva.m satthaaraa anupaadisesa.m nibbaana.m paapetvaa desanaaya kataaya thero desanaavasaane vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. arahatta.m pana patvaa satthaaraa desitaniyaameneva imaa gaathaa abhaasi. taa eva imaa gaathaa therassa a~n~naabyaakara.na~nca jaataa.

[03] ^b^sudesito^eb^tiaadikaa ^a^P2.0177^ea^ aayasmato migajaalattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m visaakhaaya ^a^V2.0089^ea^ mahaaupaasikaaya putto hutvaa nibbatti, ^b^migajaalo^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vihaara.m gantvaa abhi.nhaso dhammassavanena pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m patvaa a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
[22] mahaakhema"ngamo santo, pariyosaanabhaddako''ti.. -- imaa gaathaa abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^a^M2.0104^ea^ ^b^sudesito^eb^ti su.t.thu desito, veneyyajjhaasayaanuruupa.m di.t.thadhammikasamparaayikaparamatthaana.m yaathaavato vibhaavanavasena desitoti attho. atha vaa ^b^sudesito^eb^ti sammaa desito, pavattinivattiina.m tadubhayahetuuna~nca avipariitato pakaasanavasena bhaasito svaakhyaatoti attho. ^b^cakkhumataa^eb^ti ma.msacakkhu, dibbacakkhu, pa~n~naacakkhu, buddhacakkhu, samantacakkhuuti imehi pa~ncahi cakkhuuhi cakkhumataa. ^b^buddhenaa^eb^ti sabba~n~nubuddhena. ^b^aadiccabandhunaa^eb^ti aadiccagottena. duvidho hi loke khattiyava.mso -- aadiccava.mso, somava.msoti. tattha aadiccava.mso, okkaakaraajava.msoti jaanitabba.m. tato sa~njaatataaya saakiyaa aadiccagottaati bhagavaa ``aadiccabandhuu''ti vuccati. atha vaa aadiccassa bandhuutipi bhagavaa aadiccabandhu, svaayamattho he.t.thaa vuttoyeva. kaamaraagasa.myojanaadiina.m sabbesa.m sa.myojanaana.m samatikkamanabhaavato ^b^sabbasa.myojanaatiito^eb^ tato eva kilesakammavipaakava.t.taana.m vinaasanato viddha.msanato ^b^sabbava.t.tavinaasano,^eb^ sa.msaaracaarakato ^a^P2.0178^ea^ niyyaanato ^b^niyyaaniko,^eb^ sa.msaaramahoghato samuttara.na.t.thena ^b^uttara.no,^eb^ kaamata.nhaadiina.m sabbata.nhaana.m muula.m avijja.m ayoniso manasikaara~nca visoseti sukkhaapetiiti ^b^ta.nhaamuulavisosano,^eb^ ti.n.nampi vedaana.m sampa.tivedhassa ^a^V2.0090^ea^ viddha.msanato visassa dukkhassa kaara.nattaa ^b^visamuula.m,^eb^ sattaana.m byasanuppatti.t.thaanataaya ^b^aaghaatana.m^eb^ kamma.m kilesa.m vaa ^b^chetvaa^eb^ samucchinditvaa ^b^nibbuti.m^eb^ nibbaana.m paapeti.

[03] a~n~naa.nassa muula.m ayoniso manasikaaro aasavaa ca ``aasavasamudayaa avijjaasamudayo''ti (ma0 ni0 1.103) hi vutta.m, tassa ^b^bhedaaya^eb^ vajiruupama~naa.nena bhindanatthaaya. atha vaa ``avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa''tiaadivacanato (vibha0 225-226; sa.m0 ni0 2.1) a~n~naa.na.m muula.m etassaati a~n~naa.namuula.m, bhavacakka.m, tassa magga~naa.navajirena padaalanattha.m desitoti sambandho. ^b^kammayantavighaa.tano^eb^ti kammagha.titassa attabhaavayantassa viddha.msano. ^b^vi~n~naa.naana.m pariggahe^eb^ti kaamabhavaadiisu yathaasakakammunaa vi~n~naa.naggaha.ne upa.t.thiteti vacanaseso. tattha tattha hi bhave pa.tisandhiyaa gahitaaya ta.mta.mbhavanissitavi~n~naa.naanipi gahitaaneva honti. ^b^~naa.navajiranipaatano^eb^ti ~naa.navajirassa ^a^M2.0105^ea^ nipaato, ~naa.navajira.m nipaatetvaa tesa.m padaaletaa. lokuttaradhammo hi uppajjamaano sattamabhavaadiisu uppajjanaarahaani vi~n~naa.naani bhindattameva uppajjatiiti.

[03] ^b^vedanaana.m vi~n~naapano^eb^ti sukhaadiina.m tissanna.m vedanaana.m yathaakkama.m dukkhasallaaniccavasena yaathaavato pavedako. ^b^upaadaanappamocano^eb^ti kaamupaadaanaadiihi catuuhipi upaadaanehi cittasantaanassa vimocako. ^b^bhava.m a"ngaarakaasu.mva, ~naa.nena anupassano^eb^ti kaamabhavaadinavavidhampi bhava.m ekaadasahi aggiihi aadittabhaavato saadhikaporisa.m a"ngaarakaasu.m viya magga~naa.nena anupaccakkhato dassetaa.
