[01] santapa.niitabhaavato atittikara.t.thena ^b^mahaaraso^eb^ pari~n~naadivasena vaa mahaakiccataaya saama~n~naphalavasena mahaasampattitaaya ca ^b^mahaaraso,^eb^ anupacitasambhaarehi duravagaahataaya alabbhaneyyapati.t.thataaya ca ^b^su.t.thu gambhiiro jaraamaccunivaara.no,^eb^ aayati.m bhavaabhinipphattiyaa nivattanena jaraaya maccuno ca pa.tisedhako. idaani yathaavuttagu.navisesayutta.m dhamma.m saruupato dassento ^b^``ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko''^eb^ti vatvaa punapi tassa katipaye gu.ne vibhaavetu.m ^b^``dukkhuupasamano sivo^eb^''tiaadimaaha. tassattho -- parisuddha.t.thena ^b^ariyo,^eb^ sammaadi.t.thiaadia.t.thadhammasamodhaanataaya ^b^a.t.tha"ngiko,^eb^ nibbaanagavesana.t.thena ^b^maggo^eb^ sakalava.t.tadukkhavuupasamana.t.thena ^a^P2.0179^ea^ ^b^dukkhavuupasamano,^eb^ khema.t.thena ^b^sivo^eb^.

[03] yathaa ito baahirakasamaye asammaasambuddhapaveditattaa kammavipaako vipallaaso siyaati eva.m avipallaasetvaa ^b^pa.ticcuppannadhammaana.m^eb^ pa.ticcasamuppannesu dhammesu kamma.m kammanti vipaaka~nca vipaakato ^a^V2.0091^ea^ ~natvaana pubbabhaaga~naa.nena jaananahetu sassatucchedaggaahaana.m vidhamanena yaathaavato aalokadassano takkarassa lokuttara~naa.naalokassa dassano. kenaci ka~nci kadaacipi anupaddutattaa mahaakhema.m nibbaana.m gacchati satte gameti caati ^b^mahaakhema"ngamo,^eb^ sabbakilesadarathapari.laahavuupasamanato ^b^santo,^eb^ akuppaaya cetovimuttiyaa anupaadisesaaya ca nibbaanadhaatuyaa paapanena ^b^pariyosaanabhaddako^eb^ sudesito cakkhumataati yojanaa.
[03] eva.m ^a^M2.0106^ea^ thero naanaanayehi ariyadhamma.m pasa.msanto tassa dhammassa attanaa adhigatabhaava.m a~n~naapadesena pakaasesi.

[03] ^b^jaatimadena mattoha^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato jentattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinitvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m kosalara~n~no purohitassa putto hutvaa nibbatti, tassa ^b^jento^eb^ti naama.m ahosi. so vayappatto jaatimadena bhogaissariyaruupamadena ca matto a~n~ne hii.lento garu.t.thaaniyaanampi apaciti.m akaronto maanathaddho vicarati. so ekadivasa.m satthaara.m mahatiyaa parisaaya parivuta.m dhamma.m desenta.m disvaa upasa"nkamanto ``sace ma.m sama.no gotamo pa.thama.m aalapissati, ahampi aalapissaami; no ce, naalapissaamii''ti citta.m uppaadetvaa upasa"nkamitvaa .thito bhagavati pa.thama.m anaalapante sayampi maanena anaalapitvaa gamanaakaara.m dassesi. ta.m bhagavaa --
[25] gaathaaya ^a^P2.0180^ea^ ajjhabhaasi. so ``citta.m me sama.no gotamo jaanaatii''ti abhippasanno bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa paramanipaccaakaara.m katvaa --
[21] ``kesu na maana.m kayiraatha, kesu cassa sagaaravo.
[22] kyassa apacitaa assu, kyassu saadhu supuujitaa''ti.. --
[21] ``tesu ^a^M2.0107^ea^ na maana.m kayiraatha, tesu assa sagaaravo.
[22] kyassa apacitaa assu, tyassu saadhu supuujitaa..
[22] nihacca maana.m atthaddho, te namasse anuttare''ti.. (sa.m0 ni0 1.201) --
[25] pa~nha.m vissajjento dhamma.m desesi. so taaya desanaaya sotaapanno hutvaa pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto arahatta.m patvaa attano pa.tipattikittanamukhena a~n~na.m byaakaronto --

[03] tattha ^b^jaatimadena mattoha^eb^nti aha.m udicce braahma.nakule nibbatto, ``na maadiso ubhato sujaato a~n~no atthii''ti kulamaanena matto maanathaddho acaarinti yojanaa. ^b^bhogaissariyena caa^eb^ti vibhavena aadhipaccena ca hetubhuutena bhogasampada~nca issariyasampada~nca pa.ticca uppannamadena matto aha.m acaarinti yojanaa. ^b^sa.n.thaanava.n.naruupenaa^eb^ti sa.n.thaana.m ^a^M2.0108^ea^ aarohapari.naahasampatti, va.n.no ^a^P2.0181^ea^ odaatasaamataadichavisampatti, ruupa.m a"ngapacca"ngasobhaa. idhaapi vuttanayena yojanaa veditabbaa. ^b^madamatto^eb^ti vuttappakaarato a~n~nenapi madena matto.

[03] ^b^naattano^eb^ ^a^V2.0093^ea^ ^b^samaka.m ka~ncii^eb^ti attano samaka.m sadisa.m jaatiaadiihi samaana.m atireka.m vaa ka~nci na ma~n~nisa.m na ma~n~ni.m, mayaa samaanampi na ma~n~ni.m, kuto adhikanti adhippaayo. ^b^atimaanahato baalo^eb^ti baalo aha.m tato baalabhaavato atimaanena khatuupahatakusalaacaaro, tato eva ^b^patthaddho ussitaddhajo^eb^ thambhavasena garuunampi nipaccakaarassa akara.nato bhusa.m thaddho anonamanathaddhajaato ussitamaanaddhajo.

[03] vuttamevattha.m paaka.tatara.m kaatu.m ^b^``maatara''^eb^ntiaadi vutta.m. tattha ^b^a~n~ne^eb^ti je.t.thabhaatuaadike, sama.nabraahma.ne ca. ^b^garusammate^eb^ti garuuti sammate garu.t.thaaniye. ^b^anaadaro^eb^ti aadararahito.

[03] ^b^disvaa vinaayaka.m agga^eb^nti eva.m maanathaddho hutvaa vicaranto di.t.thadhammikasamparaayikaparamatthehi veneyyaana.m vinayanato sayambhutaaya naayakabhaavato ca vinaayaka.m. sadevake loke siilaadigu.nehi se.t.thabhaavato agga.m. purisadammaana.m accantataaya damanato ^b^saarathiina.m varuttama.m,^eb^ ativiya uttama.m byaamappabhaadiobhaasena aadiccamiva ^b^tapanta.m,^eb^ obhaasanta.m bhikkhusa"nghapurakkhata.m dhamma.m desenta.m sabbasattaana.m uttama.m satthaara.m disvaa buddhaanubhaavena santajjito ``ahameva se.t.tho, a~n~ne hiinaa''ti pavattamaana.m bhogamadaadimada~nca ^b^cha.d.detvaa^eb^ pahaaya vippasannena cetasaa sirasaa abhivaadesinti yojanaa. katha.m panaaya.m maanathaddho samaano satthu dassanamattena maana.m pahaasiiti? na kho paneta.m eva.m da.t.thabba.m. satthu dassanamattena maana.m na pahaasi ``na maana.m, braahma.na, saadhuu''tiaadikaaya pana desanaaya maana.m pahaasi. ta.m sandhaaya vutta.m ``maana.m mada~nca cha.d.detvaa, vippasannena cetasaa. sirasaa abhivaadesi''nti. ^b^vippasannena cetasaa^eb^ti ca itthambhuutalakkha.ne kara.navacana.m da.t.thabba.m.

[01] ``ahameva ^a^M2.0109^ea^ se.t.tho''ti pavatto maano ^b^atimaano^eb^. ``ime pana nihiinaa''ti a~n~ne hiinato dahantassa maano ^b^``omaano''^eb^ti vadanti. ``seyyohamasmii''ti pana a~n~na.m atikkamitvaa attaana.m seyyato dahantassa pavatto seyyamaano ^b^atimaano^eb^. ``hiinohamasmii''ti pavatto hiinamaano ^b^omaano. pahiinaa susamuuhataa^eb^ti he.t.thimamaggehi pahiinaa hutvaa aggamaggena su.t.thu samugghaa.titaa. ^b^asmimaano^eb^ti ``esohamasmii''ti khandhe ``aha''nti ^a^P2.0182^ea^ gaha.navasena pavattamaano. ^b^sabbe^eb^ti na kevala.m atimaanaomaanaasmimaanaa eva, atha kho seyyassa seyyamaanaadayo navavidhaa antarabhedena anekavidhaa ca sabbe maanavidhaa maanako.t.thaasaa ^b^hataa^eb^ aggamaggena samugghaa.titaati.

[03] ^b^yadaa^eb^ ^a^V2.0094^ea^ ^b^navo pabbajito^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato sumanattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kaale maalaakaarakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m sikhi.m bhagavanta.m passitvaa pasannamaanaso sumanapupphehi puuja.m akaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade a~n~natarassa upaasakassa gehe pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi. so ca upaasako aayasmato anuruddhattherassa upa.t.thaako ahosi. tassa ca tato pubbe jaataajaataa daarakaa mari.msu. tena so ``sacaaha.m idaani eka.m putta.m labhissaami, ayyassa anuruddhattherassa santike pabbaajessaamii''ti citta.m uppaadesi. so ca dasamaasaccayena jaato arogoyeva hutvaa anukkamena va.d.dhento sattavassiko ahosi, ta.m pitaa therassa santike pabbaajesi. so pabbajitvaa tato paripakka~naa.nattaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no hutvaa thera.m upa.t.thahanto ``paaniiya.m aaharissaamii''ti gha.ta.m aadaaya iddhiyaa anotattadaha.m agamaasi. atheko micchaadi.t.thiko naagaraajaa anotattadaha.m pa.ticchaadento sattakkhattu.m bhogena parikkhipitvaa ^a^M2.0110^ea^ upari mahanta.m pha.na.m katvaa sumanassa paaniiya.m gahetu.m okaasa.m na deti. sumano garu.laruupa.m gahetvaa ta.m naagaraaja.m abhibhavitvaa paaniiya.m gahetvaa therassa vasana.t.thaana.m uddissa aakaasena gacchati. ta.m satthaa jetavane nisinno tathaa gacchanta.m disvaa dhammasenaapati.m aamantetvaa, ``saariputta, ima.m passaa''tiaadinaa catuuhi gaathaahi tassa gu.ne abhaasi. atha sumanatthero --
[22] aaharaami tato disvaa, ma.m satthaa etadabravi..
[22] saama.nero sa sumano, maa ma.m ja~n~naati icchatii''ti.. --

[03] tattha aadito dve gaathaa sumanatthereneva bhaasitaa, itaraa catasso ta.m pasa.msantena satthaaraa bhaasitaa. taa sabbaa ekajjha.m katvaa sumanatthero pacchaa a~n~naabyaakara.navasena abhaasi. tattha ^b^pannaginda^eb^nti naagaraaja.m. ^b^tato^eb^ti tattha, yadaa navo pabbajito jaatiyaa sattavassiko iddhibalena mahiddhika.m naagaraaja.m abhibhavitvaa anotattadahato upajjhaayassa paaniiya.m aaharaami, tasmi.m kaaleti attho.

[03] ma.m ^a^M2.0111^ea^ uddissa mayha.m satthaa etadabravi, ta.m dassento, ^b^``saariputta, ima.m passaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha. ^b^ajjhatta.m susamaahita^eb^nti visayajjhattabhuutena aggaphalasamaadhinaa su.t.thu samaahita.m.

[03] ^b^paasaadikena vattenaa^eb^ti passantaana.m pasaadaavahena aacaaravattena, kara.natthe ida.m kara.navacana.m. ^b^kalyaa.nairiyaapatho^eb^ti sampanniriyaapatho. paasaadikena vattenaati vaa itthambhuutalakkha.ne kara.navacana.m. sama.nassa bhaavo saama.nya.m, saama~n~nanti attho. tadattha.m iirati pavattatiiti saama.nero, sama.nuddeso. ^b^iddhiyaa ca visaarado^eb^ti iddhiyampi byatto sukusalo. ^b^aajaaniiyenaa^eb^ti purisaajaaniiyena. attahitaparahitaana.m saadhanato ^b^saadhunaa^eb^ katakiccena anuruddhena ^b^saadhu^eb^ ubhayahitasaadhako, su.t.thu vaa aaja~n~no ^b^kaarito^eb^ damito. aggavijjaaya ^b^viniito^eb^ asekkhabhaavaapaadanena ^b^sikkhito^eb^ sikkhaapitoti attho.

[03] so saama.nero sumano parama.m ^b^santi.m^eb^ nibbaana.m ^b^patvaa^eb^ aggamaggaadhigamena adhigantvaa ^b^sacchikatvaa^eb^ attapaccakkha.m katvaa ^b^akuppata.m^eb^ arahattaphala.m appicchabhaavassa paramukka.msagatattaa ^b^maa ma.m ja~n~naa^eb^ti ma.m ``aya.m khii.naasavo''ti vaa ``cha.labhi~n~no''ti vaa kocipi maa jaaneyyaati ^b^icchati^eb^ abhika"nkhatiiti.

[03] ^b^vaatarogaabhiniito^eb^tiaadikaa ^a^V2.0096^ea^ ^a^P2.0184^ea^ aayasmato nhaatakamunissa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinitvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa vayappatto vijjaa.t.thaanaadiisu nipphatti.m gato nhaatakalakkha.nayogena ^b^nhaatako^eb^ti pa~n~naayittha. so taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa raajagahassa tiyojanappamaa.ne .thaane ara~n~naayatane niivaarehi yaapento aggi.m paricaarayamaano vasati. tassa satthaa gha.te viya padiipa.m hadayabbhantare pajjalanta.m arahattuupanissaya.m disvaa assamapada.m agamaasi. so bhagavanta.m disvaa ha.t.thatu.t.tho attano ^a^M2.0112^ea^ upakappananiyaamena aahaara.m upanesi. ta.m bhagavaa paribhu~nji. eva.m tayo divase datvaa catutthadivase ``bhagavaa tumhe paramasukhumaalaa, katha.m iminaa aahaarena yaapethaa''ti aaha. tassa satthaa ariyasantosagu.na.m pakaasento dhamma.m desesi. taapaso ta.m sutvaa sotaapanno hutvaa pabbajitvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. bhagavaa ta.m arahatte pati.t.thapetvaa gato. so pana tattheva viharanto aparabhaage vaataabaadhena upadduto ahosi. satthaa tattha gantvaa pa.tisanthaaramukhena tassa vihaara.m pucchanto --
[22] paviddhagocare luukhe, katha.m bhikkhu karissasii''ti.. -- gaathamaaha. atha thero --
[21] ``ajjhatta~nca bahiddhaa ca, ye me vijji.msu aasavaa.
[22] sabbe asesaa ucchinnaa, na ca uppajjare puna..
[25] imaahi sesagaathaahi attano vihaara.m satthu pavedesi.

[03] tattha ^a^V2.0097^ea^ ^b^jhaanasokhummasampanno^eb^ti jhaanasukhumabhaavena samannaagato. jhaanasukhuma.m naama aruupajjhaana.m, tasmaa a.t.thasamaapattilaabhimhiiti vutta.m hoti. tena attano ubhatobhaagavimuttita.m dasseti. apare panaahu -- ``sokhummanti aggamaggaphalesu adhipa~n~naasikkhaa ^a^P2.0185^ea^ adhippetaa, tato jhaanaggaha.nena ^a^M2.0113^ea^ attano ubhatobhaagavimuttita.m vibhaavetii''ti. ^b^vippamutta.m kilesehii^eb^ti pa.tippassaddhivimuttiyaa sabbakilesehi vimutta.m, tato eva ^b^suddhacitta.m,^eb^ anaavilasa"nkappataaya ^b^anaavila.m,^eb^ tiihipi padehi arahattaphalacittameva vadati. sesa.m he.t.thaa vuttanayameva. imameva ca therassa a~n~naabyaakara.na.m ahosiiti.

[03] ^b^akkodhassaa^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato brahmadattattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinitvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m kosalara~n~no putto hutvaa nibbatti, ^b^brahmadatto^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vayappatto jetavanamahe buddhaanubhaava.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto saha pa.tisambhidaahi cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. ta.m ekadivasa.m nagare pi.n.daaya caranta.m a~n~nataro braahma.no akkosi. thero ta.m sutvaapi tu.nhiibhuuto pi.n.daaya caratiyeva, braahma.no punapi akkosiyeva. manussaa eva.m akkosantampi na.m ``aya.m thero na ki~nci bha.natii''ti aaha.msu. ta.m sutvaa thero tesa.m manussaana.m dhamma.m desento --
[21] ``ubhinna.m tikicchanta.m ta.m, attano ca parassa ca.
[22] janaa ma~n~nanti baaloti, ye dhammassa akovidaa.. (sa.m0 ni0 1.189).
[22] uppajje ce rase ta.nhaa, puttama.msuupama.m sara..
[21] ``sace dhaavati citta.m te, kaamesu ca bhavesu ca.
[22] khippa.m nigga.nha satiyaa, ki.t.thaada.m viya duppasu''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^akkodhassaa^eb^ti kodharahitassa maggena samucchinnakodhassa. ^b^kuto kodho^eb^ti kuto naama hetu kodho uppajjeyya, tassa uppattikaara.na.m natthiiti attho. ^b^dantassaa^eb^ti uttamena damena aggamaggadamathena dantassa. ^b^samajiivino^eb^ti kaayavisamaadiini sabbaso pahaaya kaayasamaadiina.m vasena sama.m jiivantassa satta.t.thaaniyena sampaja~n~nena sammadeva vattantassa. ^b^sammada~n~naa vimuttassaa^eb^ti sammaa a~n~naaya abhi~n~neyyaadike dhamme jaanitvaa sabbaasavehi vippamuttassa. tato eva sabbakilesadarathapari.laahavuupasamena ^b^upasantassa^eb^. i.t.thaadiisu taadilakkha.nappattiyaa ^b^taadino^eb^ khii.naasavassa kuto kodhoti a~n~naapadesena thero attano kodhaabhaava.m tassa ca kaara.naani vatvaa idaani kodhe akodhe ca aadiinavaanisa.msadassanena dhamma.m kathento ^b^``tassevaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^yo kuddha.m pa.tikujjhatii^eb^ti yo puggalo attano upari kuddha.m kupita.m puggala.m pa.tikujjhati, tasseva tena pa.tikujjhanapaccakkosanapa.tippahara.naadinaa ^b^paapiyo^eb^ idhaloke vi~n~nuugarahaadivasena paraloke nirayadukkhaadivasena abhaddakatara.m akalyaa.natara.m hoti. kujjhanena pana akuddhassa paapa.m hotiiti vattabbameva natthi. keci pana ``yo akuddha.m pa.tikuddha.m aarabbha kujjhatii''ti attha.m vadanti. ^b^kuddha.m appa.tikujjhanto^eb^ti yo pana kuddha.m puggala.m ``aya.m kuddho kodhapareto''ti ~natvaa na pa.tikujjhati khamati, so ^b^dujjaya.m^eb^ kilesasa"ngaama.m jeti naama. na kevala~ncassa kilesasa"ngaamajayo eva, atha kho ubhayahitapa.tipattimpiiti dassento aaha ^b^``ubhinnamattha.m...pe0... upasammatii''^eb^ti. yo ^b^para.m^eb^ puggala.m ^b^sa"nkupita.m^eb^ kuddha.m ``kodhapareto''ti ~natvaa ta.m mettaayanto ajjhupekkhanto vaa sato ^a^M2.0115^ea^ sampajaano hutvaa ^b^upasammati^eb^ khamati na pa.tippharati. so ^b^attano ca parassa caa^eb^ti ubhinna.m ubhayalokasukhaavaha.m ^b^attha.m^eb^ hita.m carati.

[03] ^b^ubhinna.m tikicchanta.m ta^eb^nti ta.m attano ca parassa caati ubhinna.m dvinna.m kodhabyaadhitikicchaaya tikicchanta.m khamanta.m puggala.m ye janaa ^b^dhammassa^eb^ ariyaacaaradhamme akusalaa, te baalaa ``aya.m aviddasu yo attaana.m akkosantassa paharantassa ki~nci na karotii''ti ma~n~nanti ^a^P2.0187^ea^, ta.m tesa.m ayoniso ma~n~nananti adhippaayo. ``tikicchana''ntipi pa.thanti, tikicchanasabhaavanti attho.

[03] eva.m ^a^V2.0099^ea^ therena vuccamaana.m dhamma.m sutvaa akkosakabraahma.no sa.mviggo pasannacitto ca hutvaa thera.m khamaapetvaa tasseva santike pabbaji. thero tassa kamma.t.thaana.m dento ``imassa mettaabhaavanaa yuttaa''ti mettaakamma.t.thaana.m datvaa kodhapariyu.t.thaanaadiisu paccavekkha.naadividhi.m dassento ^b^``uppajje te''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^uppajje te sace^eb^ti sace te kamma.t.thaana.m anuyu~njantassa ka~nci puggala.m nissaaya ciraparicayo kodho uppajjeyya, tassa vuupasamaaya --
[02] ``ubhatoda.n.dakena cepi, bhikkhave, kakacena coraa ocarakaa a"ngama"ngaani okanteyyu.m, tatraapi yo mano paduuseyya, na me so tena saasanakaro''ti (ma0 ni0 1.232) --
[25] satthaaraa vutta.m kakacuupama.m ovaada.m aavajjehi. ^b^uppajje ce rase ta.nhaa^eb^ti sace te madhuraadibhede rase ta.nhaa abhilaaso uppajjeyya, tassa vuupasamaaya --

[02] ``puttama.msa.m jaayampatikaa yathaa kantaaranitthara.natthameva khaadi.msu, na rasata.nhaaya eva.m kulaputtopi pabbajito pi.n.dapaata.m pa.tisevati...pe0... phaasuvihaaro caa''ti (sa.m0 ni0 2.63 atthato samaana.m) --

[03] ^b^sace dhaavati te citta^eb^nti ayoniso manasi karoto tava citta.m ^b^kaamesu^eb^ pa~ncakaamagu.nesu chandaraagavasena, kaamabhavaadiisu ^b^bhavesu^eb^ bhavapatthanaavasena sace dhaavati sarati javati. ^b^khippa.m nigga.nha satiyaa, ki.t.thaada.m^eb^ ^a^M2.0116^ea^ ^b^viya duppasu^eb^nti tathaa dhaavitu.m adento yathaa naama puriso ki.t.thaada.m sassakhaadaka.m duppasu.m du.t.thago.na.m yottena thambhe bandhitvaa attano vase vatteti, eva.m satiyaa satiyottena sammaadhithambhe bandhanto khippa.m siighameva nigga.nha, yathaa kilesavigamena nibbisevana.m hoti, tathaa damehiiti. keci pana ``thero puthujjanova hutvaa akkosa.m adhivaasento tesa.m manussaana.m ariyagu.ne pakaasento dhamma.m kathetvaa pacchaa dviihi gaathaahi attaana.m ovadanto vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m patvaa a~n~na.m byaakaronto imaayeva gaathaa abhaasii''ti vadanti.

[01] ^b^channamativassatii^eb^tiaadikaa ^a^V2.0100^ea^ aayasmato sirima.n.dattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinitvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade sa.msumaaragire braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^a^P2.0188^ea^ ^b^sirima.n.do^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto bhesakalaavane bhagavati viharante satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa laddhuupasampado sama.nadhamma.m karonto ekasmi.m uposathadivase paatimokkhuddesa.t.thaane nisinno nidaanuddesassa pariyosaane ``aavikataa hissa phaasu hotii''ti (mahaava0 134) paa.liyaa attha.m upadhaarento aapanna.m aapatti.m anaavikatvaa pa.ticchaadento uparuupari aapattiyo aapajjati, tenassa na phaasu hoti, aavikatvaa pana yathaadhamma.m pa.tikarontassa phaasu hotiiti imamattha.m manasi katvaa ``aho satthu saasana.m suvisuddha''nti laddhappasaado tathaa uppanna.m piiti.m vikkhambhetvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m patvaa attano pa.tipatti.m paccavekkhitvaa pasannamaanaso bhikkhuuna.m ovaada.m dento --
[22] tasmaa channa.m vivaretha, eva.m ta.m naativassati..
[22] paccuggantu.m bala.m natthi, javo natthi palaayitu.m..
[22] ya.m ya.m vijahate ratti.m, taduuna.m tassa jiivita.m..
[22] upeti carimaa ratti, na te kaalo pamajjitu''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^channa^eb^nti chaadita.m yathaabhuuta.m aviva.ta.m appakaasita.m duccarita.m. ^b^ativassatii^eb^ti aapattivassa~nceva kilesavassa~nca ativiya vassati. aapattiyaa hi chaadana.m alajjibhaavaadinaa ^a^V2.0101^ea^ taadisova, chaadanena tato a~n~nathaava punapi tathaaruupa.m tato vaa paapi.t.thatara.m aapatti.m aapajjeyyaati chaadana.m vassanassa kaara.na.m vutta.m. ^b^viva.ta^eb^nti pakaasita.m appa.ticchanna.m. ^b^naativassatii^eb^ti ettha ^b^atii^eb^ti upasaggamatta.m, na vassatiiti attho. avassana~ncettha vuttavipariyaayena veditabba.m cittasantaanassa visodhitattaa. ^b^tasmaa^eb^ti vuttamevattha.m kaara.nabhaavena paccaamasati, channassa duccaritassa aapattivassaadiina.m ativassanato viva.tassa ca avassanatoti attho. ^b^channa.m vivarethaa^eb^ti puthujjanabhaavena chaadanaadhippaaye uppannepi ta.m ^a^P2.0189^ea^ ananuvattitvaa vivaretha aavikareyya, yathaadhamma.m pa.tikareyya. ^b^eva^eb^nti vivara.nena yathaadhamma.m pa.tipattiyaa. ^b^ta^eb^nti ta.m channa.m duccarita.m. ^b^naativassati^eb^ aapattivassa.m kilesavassa~nca na vassati, suddhante puggala.m pati.t.thapetiiti attho.

[03] idaani ^a^M2.0118^ea^ ``eka.msena siigha.myeva ca attaa sodhetabbo, appamaado kaatabbo''ti tassa kaara.na.m sa.mvegavatthu.m dassento ^b^``maccunaabbhaahato loko''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^maccunaabbhaahato loko^eb^ti aya.m sabbopi sattaloko coro viya coraghaatakena, sabbava.t.tanipaatinaa maccunaa mara.nena abhihato, na tassa hatthato muccati. ^b^jaraaya parivaarito^eb^ti aya.m loko uppaadato uddha.m mara.nuupanayanarasaaya jaraaya parivaarito ajjhottha.to, jaraasa"nghaataparimukkoti attho. ^b^ta.nhaasallena oti.n.no^eb^ti sariirassa anto nimuggena visapiitakhurappena viya upaadaanalakkha.nena ta.nhaasa"nkhaatena sallena oti.n.no hadayabbhantare ogaa.lho. ta.nhaa hi pii.laajananato anto tudanato duruddhaarato ca ``sallo''ti vuccati. ^b^icchaadhuupaayito^eb^ti aaramma.naabhipatthanalakkha.naaya icchaaya santaapito. ta.m visaya.m icchanto hi puggalo yadicchita.m visaya.m labhanto vaa alabhanto vaa taaya eva anudahanalakkha.naaya icchaaya santatto pari.laahappatto hoti. ^b^sadaa^eb^ti sabbakaala.m, ida~nca pada.m sabbapadesu yojetabba.m.

[03] ^b^parikkhitto jaraaya caa^eb^ti na kevala.m maccunaa abbhaahatoyeva, atha kho jaraaya ca parikkhitto. jaraaya samavaruddho jaraapaakaaraparikkhitto, na ta.m samatikkamatiiti attho. ^b^ha~n~nati niccamattaa.no^eb^ti ataa.no asara.no hutvaa niccakaala.m jaraamara.nehi ha~n~nati vibaadhiiyati. yathaa ki.m? ^b^pattada.n.dova takkaro^eb^ yathaa takkaro coro kataaparaadho vajjhappatto ataa.no raajaa.naaya ha~n~nati, evamaya.m loko jaraamara.nehiiti dasseti.

[03] ^b^aagacchantaggikhandhaavaa^eb^ti mahaavane .dayhamaane ta.m abhibhavantaa mahantaa aggikkhandhaa viya maccu byaadhi jaraati ime tayo anudahana.t.thena aggikkhandhaa ima.m sattaloka.m abhibhavantaa aagacchanti ^a^V2.0102^ea^, tesa.m pana pa.tibalo hutvaa ^b^paccuggantu.m^eb^ abhibhavitu.m ^b^bala.m^eb^ ussaaho natthi, imassa lokassa, ^b^javo natthi palaayitu.m^eb^ javantesu, ajjhottharantesu. yattha te naabhibhavanti, pi.t.thi.m dassetvaa tato palaayitumpi imassa lokassa ja"nghaajavo natthi, eva.m ^a^M2.0119^ea^ attanaa asamattho maayaadiihi upaayehi appa.tikaare tividhe balavati paccaamitte niccupa.t.thite ki.m kaatabbanti ce? ^b^amogha.m^eb^ ^a^P2.0190^ea^ ^b^divasa.m kayiraa, appena bahukena vaa^eb^ti appena antamaso gadduuhanamattampi kaala.m pavattitena bahukena vaa sakala.m ahoratta.m pavattitena vipassanaamanasikaarena amogha.m ava~njha.m divasa.m kareyya, yasmaa ^b^ya.m ya.m vijahate ratti.m, taduuna.m tassa jiivita.m^eb^ aya.m satto ya.m ya.m ratti.m vijahati naaseti khepeti, taduuna.m tena uuna.m tassa sattassa jiivita.m hoti. etena rattikkhayo naama jiivitakkhayo tassa anivattanatoti dasseti. tenaaha --
[22] abbhu.t.thitova so yaati, sa gaccha.m na nivattatii''ti.. (jaa0 1.15.363).

[03] na kevala.m rattivaseneva, atha kho iriyaapathavasenaapi jiivitakkhayo upadhaaretabboti aaha ^b^``carato''^eb^tiaadi. ^b^carato^eb^ti gacchantassa. ^b^ti.t.thato^eb^ti .thita.m kappentassa. ^b^aasiinasayanassa vaa^eb^ti aasiinassa sayanassa vaa, nisinnassa nipajjantassa vaati attho. ``aasiidana''ntipi pa.thanti, tattha saamiatthe upayogavacana.m da.t.thabba.m. ^b^upeti carimaa rattii^eb^ti carimakacittasahitaa ratti upagacchati, rattiggaha.na~ncettha desanaasiisamatta.m. gamanaadiisu yena kenaci iriyaapathena sama"ngiibhuutassa carimakaaloyeva, tenevassa iriyaapathakkha.naa jiivita.m khepetvaa eva gacchanti, tasmaa ^b^na te kaalo pamajjitu.m^eb^ naaya.m tuyha.m pamaada.m aapajjitu.m kaalo ``imasmi.m naama kaale mara.na.m na hotii''ti aviditattaa. vutta.m hi --
[22] kasira~nca paritta~nca, ta~nca dukkhena sa.myuta''nti.. (su0 ni0 579).
[03] tasmaa eva.m attaana.m ovaditvaa appamattena tiisu sikkhaasu anuyogo kaatabboti adhippaayo.

[03] ^b^dvipaadako^eb^tiaadikaa ^a^M2.0120^ea^ ^a^V2.0103^ea^ aayasmato sabbakaamittherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarassa bhagavato saasane uppanna.m abbuda.m sodhetvaa pa.tipaakatika.m .thapenta.m eka.m thera.m disvaa, ``ahampi anaagate ekassa buddhassa saasane abbuda.m sodhetvaa pa.tipaakatika.m .thapetu.m samattho bhaveyya''nti patthana.m pa.t.thapetvaa tadanuruupaani pu~n~naani katvaa ^a^P2.0191^ea^ devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade aparinibbute eva bhagavati vesaaliya.m khattiyakule nibbattitvaa ^b^sabbakaamo^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto ~naatakehi daarapariggaha.m kaarito nissara.najjhaasayataaya gharaavaasa.m jigucchanto dhammabha.n.daagaarikassa santike pabbajitvaa sama.nadhamma.m karonto upajjhaayena saddhi.m vesaali.m upagato ~naatighara.m agamaasi. tattha na.m puraa.nadutiyikaa pativiyogadukkhitaa kisaa dubba.n.naa anala"nkataa kili.t.thavatthanivasanaa vanditvaa rodamaanaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ta.m disvaa therassa karu.naapurassara.m metta.m upa.t.thaapayato anubhuutaaramma.ne ayonisomanasikaaravasena sahasaa kileso uppajji.

[03] so tena kasaahi taa.lito aajaaniiyo viya sa~njaatasa.mvego taavadeva susaana.m gantvaa, asubhanimitta.m uggahetvaa, tattha pa.tiladdhajhaana.m paadaka.m katvaa, vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa, arahatta.m paapu.ni. athassa sasuro ala"nkatapa.tiyatta.m dhiitara.m aadaaya mahataa parivaarena na.m uppabbaajetukaamo vihaara.m agamaasi. thero tassaa adhippaaya.m ~natvaa attano kaamesu virattabhaava.m sabbattha ca anupalittata.m pakaasento --
[21] ``ruupaa saddaa rasaa gandhaa, pho.t.thabbaa ca manoramaa.

[03] tattha ^b^dvipaadako^eb^ti yadipi apaadakaadayopi kaayaa asuciiyeva, adhikaaravasena pana ukka.t.thaparicchedena vaa eva.m vutta.m. yasmaa vaa a~n~ne asucibhuutaapi kaayaa lo.nambilaadiihi abhisa"nkharitvaa manussaana.m bhojanepi upaniiyanti, na pana manussakaayo, tasmaa asucitarasabhaavamassa dassento ``dvipaadako''ti aaha. ^b^aya^eb^nti tadaa upa.t.thita.m itthiruupa.m ^a^P2.0192^ea^ sandhaayaaha. ^b^asucii^eb^ti asuci eva, na ettha ki~ncipi suciiti attho. ^b^duggandho parihiiratii^eb^ti duggandho samaano pupphagandhaadiihi sa"nkharitvaa parihariiyati. ^b^naanaaku.napaparipuuro^eb^ti kesaadianekappakaaraku.napabharito. ^b^vissavanto tato tato^eb^ti pupphagandhaadiihissa jegucchabhaava.m pa.ticchaadetu.m vaayamantaanampi ta.m vaayaama.m nipphala.m katvaa navahi dvaarehi khe.lasi"nghaa.nikaadiini lomakuupehi ca sedajallika.m `vissavantoyeva parihiiratii'ti sambandho.

[03] eva.m jegucchopi samaano caaya.m kaayo kuu.taadiihi viya migaadike attano ruupaadiihi andhaputhujjane va~ncetiyevaati dassento ^b^``miga''^eb^ntiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^miga.m niliina.m kuu.tenaa^eb^ti paasavaakaraadinaa kuu.tena niliina.m, pa.ticchanna.m katvaa miga.m viya nesaado. vakkhamaano hi ^b^iva^eb^-saddo idhaapi aanetvaa yojetabbo. ^b^ba.liseneva ambuja^eb^nti ambuja.m maccha.m aamisabaddhena ba.lisena viya baa.lisiko. ^b^vaanara.m viya lepenaa^eb^ti rukkhasilaadiisu pakkhittena makka.talepena makka.ta.m viya migaluddo andhaputhujjana.m va~ncento baadhentiiti.

[03] ke pana baadhentiiti aaha. ^b^``ruupaa saddaa''^eb^tiaadi. ruupaadayo hi pa~nca kaamako.t.thaasaa visesato visabhaagavatthusannissayaa vipallaasuupanissayena ayonisomanasikaarena parikkhittaana.m andhaputhujjanaana.m mano ramento kilesavatthutaaya anatthaavahabhaavato te baadhenti naama. tena vutta.m ^b^``ruupaa saddaa...pe0... itthiruupasmi dissare''^eb^ti.

[03] itthiggaha.na~ncettha ^a^M2.0122^ea^ adhikaaravasena katanti veditabba.m. tenevaaha ^b^``ye etaa upasevantii''^eb^tiaadi. tassattho -- ^b^ye^eb^ puthujjanaa ^b^etaa^eb^ itthiyo ^b^rattacittaa^eb^ raagaabhibhuutacittaa upabhogavatthusa~n~naaya ^a^V2.0105^ea^ upasevanti. ^b^va.d.dhenti ka.tasi.m ghora^eb^nti te jaatiaadiihi nirayaadiihi ca ghora.m, bhayaanaka.m, andhabaalehi abhiramitabbato ka.tasisa"nkhaata.m sa.msaara.m punappuna.m uppattimara.naadinaa va.d.dhenti. tenaaha ^b^``aacinanti punabbhava''^eb^nti.

[03] ^b^yo cetaa^eb^ti yo pana puggalo etaa itthiyo tattha chandaraagassa vikkhambhanena vaa samucchindanena vaa attano paadena sappassa sira.m viya parivajjeti, so sabba.m loka.m visajitvaa .thitattaa loke visattikaasa"nkhaata.m ta.nha.m sato hutvaa samativattati.

[03] ^b^kaamesvaadiinava.m disvaa^eb^ti ``a.t.thika"nkaluupamaa kaamaa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa''tiaadinaa (paaci0 417; cuu.lava0 65; ma0 ni0 1.234) vatthukaamesu kilesakaamesu anekaakaaravokaara.m aadiinava.m, dosa.m, disvaa. ^b^nekkhamma.m da.t.thu khemato^eb^ti kaamehi bhavehi ca nikkhantabhaavato nekkhamma.m, pabbajja.m ^a^P2.0193^ea^, nibbaana~nca, khemato, anupaddavato, da.t.thu, disvaa. ^b^sabbakaamehi^eb^pi tebhuumakadhammehi ^b^nissa.to^eb^ visa.myutto. sabbepi tebhuumakaa dhammaa kaamaniiya.t.thena kaamaa, tehi ca thero visa.myutto. tenaaha ^b^``patto me aasavakkhayo''^eb^ti.

[03] eva.m thero aadito pa~ncahi gaathaahi dhamma.m kathetvaa cha.t.thagaathaaya a~n~na.m byaakaasi. ta.m sutvaa sasuro ``aya.m sabbattha anupalitto, na sakkaa ima.m kaamesu pataaretu''nti yathaagatamaggeneva gato. theropi vassasataparinibbute bhagavati upasampadaaya viisavassasatiko pathabyaa thero hutvaa, vesaalikehi vajjiputtehi uppaadita.m saasanassa abbuda.m sodhetvaa, dutiya.m dhammasa"ngiiti.m sa"ngaayitvaa ``anaagate dhammaasokakaale uppajjanaka.m abbuda.m sodhehii''ti tissamahaabrahmaana.m aa.naapetvaa anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayi.

[03] sattakanipaate ^a^M2.0123^ea^ ^a^V2.0106^ea^ ^b^ala"nkataa^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato sundarasamuddattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinitvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe a~n~natarassa mahaavibhavassa se.t.thino putto hutvaa nibbatti. ^b^samuddo^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. ruupasampattiyaa pana ^b^sundarasamuddo^eb^ti pa~n~naayittha. so pa.thamavaye .thito bhagavato raajagahappavese buddhaanubhaava.m disvaa, pa.tiladdhasaddho nissara.najjhaasayataaya pabbajitvaa, laddhuupasampado samaadinnadhutadhammo raajagahato saavatthi.m gantvaa, kalyaa.namittassa santike vipassanaacaara.m uggahetvaa, kamma.t.thaana.m anuyu~njanto viharati. tassa maataa raajagahe ussavadivase a~n~ne se.t.thiputte sapajaapatike ala"nkatapa.tiyatte ussavakii.la.m kii.lante disvaa, putta.m anussaritvaa rodati. ta.m disvaa a~n~nataraa ga.nikaa rodanakaara.na.m pucchi. saa tassaa ta.m kaara.na.m kathesi. ta.m sutvaa ga.nikaa ``aha.m ta.m aanessaami, passa taava mama itthibhaava''nti vatvaa ``yadi eva.m ta.myeva tassa pajaapati.m katvaa imassa kulassa saamini.m karissaamii''ti taaya bahu.m dhana.m datvaa ^a^P2.0194^ea^, vissajjitaa mahataa parivaarena saavatthi.m gantvaa, therassa pi.n.daaya vicara.na.t.thaane ekasmi.m gehe vasamaanaa divase divase a~n~nehi therassa sakkacca.m pi.n.dapaata.m daapesi. ala"nkatapa.tiyattaa ca hutvaa suva.n.napaadukaa aaruyha attaana.m dassesi. athekadivasa.m gehadvaarena gacchanta.m thera.m disvaa, suva.n.napaadukaa omu~ncitvaa, a~njali.m paggayha purato gacchantii naanappakaara.m thera.m kaamanimantanaaya nimantesi. ta.m sutvaa thero ``puthujjanacitta.m naama ca~ncala.m, ya.mnuuna mayaa idaaneva ussaaho kara.niiyo''ti tattheva .thito bhaavana.m ussukkaapetvaa cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. ta.m sandhaaya vutta.m --
[22] saa ma.m sa.nhena mudunaa, mhitapubba.m abhaasatha..
[27] bhu~nja maanusake kaame, aha.m vitta.m dadaami te.
[22] sacca.m te pa.tijaanaami, aggi.m vaa te haraamaha.m..
[22] tisso vijjaa anuppattaa, kata.m buddhassa saasana''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^maaladhaarii^eb^ti maalaadhaarinii pi.landhapupphadaamaa. ^b^vibhuusitaa^eb^ti uuna.t.thaanassa puura.navasena pupphehi ceva gandhavilepanaadiihi ca vibhuusitagattaa. ^b^``ala"nkataa''^eb^ti iminaa hatthuupagagiivuupagaadiihi aabhara.nehi ala"nkara.na.m adhippeta.m. ^b^alattakakataapaadaa^eb^ti pari.natajayasumanapupphava.n.nena laakhaarasena ra~njitacara.nayuga.laa. samaasapada~nheta.m, ``alattakakatapaadaa''ti vattabbe gaathaasukhattha.m diigha.m katvaa vutta.m. asamaasabhaave pana ``tassaa''ti vacanaseso veditabbo. ^b^paadukaaruyha vesikaa^eb^ti ekaa ruupuupajiivikaa itthii yathaavuttavesaa suva.n.napaadukaa pa.timu~ncitvaa ``.thitaa''ti vacanaseso.

[03] ^b^paadukaa oruhitvaanaa^eb^ti paadukaahi otaritvaa, suva.n.napaadukaayo omu~ncitvaati attho. ^b^pa~njaliikataa^eb^ti paggahitaa~njalikaa ^b^saa^eb^ vesii ma.m. saama.m vaa vacanaparampara.m ^a^P2.0195^ea^ vinaa sayameva abhaasatha. ^b^sa.nhenaa^eb^ti ma.t.thena. ^b^mudunaa^eb^ti madhurena. ``vacanenaa''ti avuttampi vuttameva hoti, abhaasathaati, vuttattaa.

[03] ^b^yuvaasi^eb^ ^a^M2.0125^ea^ ^b^tva.m pabbajito^eb^ti tva.m pabbajanto yuvaa, daharoyeva hutvaa pabbajitosi, nanu pabbajantena sattame dasake sampatteva pabbajitabbanti dasseti. ^b^ti.t.thaahi mama saasane^eb^ti mama vacane ti.t.tha.

[03] ki.m ^a^V2.0108^ea^ pana tanti aaha ^b^``bhu~nja maanusake kaame''^eb^ti kaame paribhu~njitukaamassa ruupasampatti, vayasampatti, parivaarasampatti, bhogasampatti ca icchitabbaa. tattha ``kuto me bhogasampattii''ti vadeyyaati, aaha ^b^``aha.m vitta.m dadaami te''^eb^ti. ``tayida.m vacana.m katha.m saddahaatabba''nti ma~n~neyyaati ta.m saddahaapentii aaha ^b^``sacca.m te pa.tijaanaami, aggi.m vaa te haraamaha''^eb^nti. ``bhu~nja maanusake kaame, aha.m vitta.m dadaami te''ti yadida.m mayaa pa.ti~n~naata.m, ta.m eka.msena saccameva pa.tijaanaami, sace me na pattiyaayasi, aggi.m vaa te haraamaha.m aggi.m haritvaa aggipaccaya.m sapatha.m karomiiti attho. ^b^ubhayattha ka.taggaho^eb^ti amhaaka.m ubhinna.m ji.n.nakaale pabbajjana.m ubhayattha jayaggaaho. ya.m maya.m yaava da.n.daparaayanakaalaa bhoge bhu~njaama, eva.m idhalokepi bhogehi na jiiyaama, maya.m pacchaa pabbajissaama, eva.m paralokepi bhogehi na jiiyaamaati adhippaayo. ^b^tato^eb^ti ta.m nimitta.m, kaamehi nimantentiyaa ``yuvaasi tva''ntiaadinaa ``yadaa ji.n.naa bhavissaamaa''tiaadinaa ca tassaa vesiyaa vuttavacanahetu. ta~nhi vacana.m a"nkusa.m katvaa thero sama.nadhamma.m karonto sadattha.m paripuuresi. sesa.m he.t.thaa vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^pare ambaa.takaaraame^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato laku.n.dakabhaddiyattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare mahaabhoge kule nibbattitvaa, vayappatto satthu santike dhamma.m su.nanto nisinno tasmi.m kha.ne satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m ma~njussaraana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa, sayampi ta.m .thaana.m patthento buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa mahaadaana.m datvaa, ``aho vataahampi anaagate aya.m bhikkhu ^a^M2.0126^ea^ viya ekassa buddhassa saasane ma~njussaraana.m aggo bhaveyya''nti pa.nidhaana.m akaasi. bhagavaa ca tassa anantaraayata.m disvaa byaakaritvaa pakkaami.

[03] so ^a^P2.0196^ea^ tattha yaavajiiva.m pu~n~naani katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto phussassa bhagavato kaale cittapattakokilo hutvaa raajuyyaanato madhura.m ambaphala.m tu.n.denaadaaya gacchanto satthaara.m disvaa pasannamaanaso ``dassaamii''ti citta.m uppaadesi. satthaa tassa citta.m ~natvaa patta.m gahetvaa nisiidi. kokilo dasabalassa patte ambapakka.m pati.t.thaapesi. satthaa ta.m paribhu~nji. so kokilo ^a^V2.0109^ea^ pasannamaanaso teneva piitisukhena sattaaha.m viitinaamesi. tena ca pu~n~nakammena ma~njussaro ahosi. kassapasammaasambuddhakaale pana cetiye aaraddhe ki.m pamaa.na.m karoma? sattayojanappamaa.na.m. atimahantameta.m. chayojanappamaa.na.m. etampi atimahanta.m. pa~ncayojana.m, catuyojana.m, tiyojana.m, dviyojananti vutte aya.m tadaa je.t.thava.d.dhakii hutvaa ``etha, bho, anaagate sukhapa.tijaggiya.m kaatu.m va.t.tatii''ti vatvaa rajjuyaa parikkhipanto gaavutamattake .thatvaa ``ekeka.m mukha.m gaavuta.m gaavuta.m hotu, cetiya.m ekayojanaava.t.ta.m yojanubbedha.m bhavissatii''ti aaha. te tassa vacane a.t.tha.msu. iti appamaa.nassa buddhassa pamaa.na.m akaasiiti. tena pana kammena nibbattanibbatta.t.thaane a~n~nehi niicatarappamaa.no hoti.

[03] so amhaaka.m satthu kaale saavatthiya.m mahaabhogakule nibbatti, ^b^bhaddiyo^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. atirassataaya pana ^b^laku.n.dakabhaddiyo^eb^ti pa~n~naayittha. so satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa, pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa, bahussuto dhammakathiko hutvaa madhurena sarena paresa.m dhamma.m kathesi. athekasmi.m ussavadivase ekena braahma.nena saddhi.m rathena gacchantii a~n~nataraa ga.nikaa thera.m disvaa dantavida.msaka.m hasi. thero tassaa danta.t.thike nimitta.m gahetvaa jhaana.m uppaadetvaa, ta.m paadaka.m katvaa, vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa, anaagaamii ahosi. so abhi.nha.m kaayagataaya satiyaa viharanto ekadivasa.m aayasmataa dhammasenaapatinaa ovadiyamaano arahatte pati.t.thahi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.55.1-33) --
[21] ``ta.m sutvaa mudito hutvaa, kaara.m katvaa mahesino.
[22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
[22] bhaddiyo naama naamena, hessati satthu saavako..
[22] patte pakkhippa pakkhehi, pa~njali.m katvaana ma~njunaa..
[22] kassapo naama gottena, uppajji vadata.m varo..
[21] ``pacchime ca bhave daani, jaato se.t.thikule aha.m.
[21] ``buddho ce me vara.m dajjaa, so ca labbhetha me varo.

[03] tattha ^b^pare^eb^ti se.t.the adhike, visi.t.theti attho. adhikavaacii hi aya.m parasaddo ``para.m viya mattaayaa''tiaadiisu viya. ^b^ambaa.takaaraame^eb^ti eva.mnaamake aaraame. so kira chaayuudakasampanno vanasa.n.dama.n.dito rama.niiyo hoti tena ``pare''ti visesetvaa vutto. ``ambaa.takavane ambaa.takehi abhilakkhitavane''ti ca vadanti. ^b^vanasa.n.damhii^eb^ti vanagahane, ghananicitarukkhagacchalataasamuuhe vaneti attho. ^b^bhaddiyo^eb^ti eva.mnaamako, attaanameva thero a~n~na.m viya vadati. ^b^samuula.m ta.nhamabbuyhaa^eb^ti ta.nhaaya ^a^M2.0130^ea^ muula.m naama avijjaa. tasmaa saavijja.m ta.nha.m aggamaggena ^a^V2.0112^ea^ samugghaa.tetvaati attho. ^b^tattha bhaddova jhaayatii^eb^ti lokuttarehi siilaadiihi bhaddo sundaro tasmi.myeva vanasa.n.de katakiccataaya di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaravasena aggaphalajhaanena jhaayati.

[03] phalasukhena ca jhaanasamaapattiihi ca viitinaametiiti attano vivekarati.m dassetvaa ^b^``ramanteke''^eb^ti gaathaayapi byatirekamukhena tamevattha.m dasseti. tattha ^b^mudi"ngehii^eb^ti a"ngikaadiihi murajehi. ^b^vii.naahii^eb^ti nandiniiaadiihi vii.naahi. ^b^pa.navehii^eb^ti turiyehi ramanti eke kaamabhogino, saa pana tesa.m rati anariyaa anatthasa.mhitaa. ^b^aha~ncaa^eb^ ti aha.m pana, ekako ^b^buddhassa^eb^ bhagavato saasane rato, tato eva rukkhamuulasmi.m ^b^rato^eb^ abhirato viharaamiiti attho.

[03] eva.m attano vivekaabhirati.m kittetvaa idaani ya.m kaayagataasatikamma.t.thaana.m bhaavetvaa arahatta.m patto, tassa pasa.msanattha.m ^b^``buddho ce me''^eb^ti gaathamaaha. tassattho -- sace ^b^buddho^eb^ bhagavaa ``ekaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m vara.m yaacaamii''ti mayaa yaacito ``atikkantavaraa kho, bhikkhu, tathaagataa''ti apa.tikkhipitvaa mayha.m yathaayaacita.m vara.m dadeyya, so ca varo mamaadhippaayapuurako ^b^labbhetha^eb^ mayha.m manoratha.m matthaka.m paapeyyaati thero parikappavasena vadati. ``bhante, sabbo loko sabbakaala.m kaayagataasatikamma.t.thaana.m bhaavetuu''ti ``sabbalokassa nicca.m kaayagataasati bhaavetabbaa''ti katvaa vara.m ga.nhe ahanti dassento aaha ^b^``ga.nheha.m sabbalokassa, nicca.m kaayagata.m sati''^eb^nti. idaani aparikkha.nagarahaamukhena parikkha.na.m pasa.msanto --
[21] ``ye ^a^P2.0198^ea^ ma.m ruupena paami.msu, ye ca ghosena anvaguu.
[22] chandaraagavasuupetaa, na ma.m jaananti te janaa..
[21] ``ajjhatta~nca na jaanaati, bahiddhaa ca na passati.
[22] samantaavara.no baalo, sa ve ghosena vuyhati..

[03] tattha ^b^ye ma.m ruupena paami.msuu^eb^ti ye janaa aviddasuu mama ruupena apasaadikena nihiinena ``aakaarasadisii pa~n~naa''ti, dhammasariirena ca ma.m nihiina.m paami.msu, ``orako aya''nti hii.lentaa paricchindanavasena ^a^V2.0113^ea^ ma~n~ni.msuuti attho. ^b^ye ca ghosena anvaguu^eb^ti ye ca sattaa ghosena ma~njunaa ma.m sambhaavanaavasena anugataa bahu ma~n~ni.msu, ta.m tesa.m micchaa, na hi aha.m ruupamattena avamantabbo, ghosamattena vaa na bahu.m mantabbo, tasmaa ^b^chandaraagavasuupetaa, na ma.m jaananti te janaa^eb^ti te duvidhaapi janaa chandaraagassa vasa.m upetaa appahiinachandaraagaa sabbaso pahiinachandaraaga.m ma.m na jaananti.

[03] avisayo tesa.m maadiso ajjhatta.m bahiddhaa ca apari~n~naatavatthutaayaati dassetu.m ^b^``ajjhatta''^eb^ntiaadi vutta.m. ^b^ajjhatta^eb^nti attano santaane khandhaayatanaadidhamma.m. ^b^bahiddhaa^eb^ti parasantaane. atha vaa ajjhattanti, mama abbhantare asekkhasiilakkhandhaadi.m. bahiddhaati, mameva aakappasampattiyaadiyutta.m bahiddhaa ruupadhammappavatti.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.naadippavatti~nca. ^b^samantaavara.no^eb^ti eva.m ajjhatta~nca bahiddhaa ca ajaananena samantato aavara.nayutto aava.ta~naa.nagatiko. ^b^sa ve ghosena vuyhatii^eb^ti so paraneyyabuddhiko baalo ghosena paresa.m vacanena vuyhati niyyati aaka.d.dhiiyati.

[03] ^b^bahiddhaa ca vipassatii^eb^ti yo ca vuttanayena ajjhatta.m na jaanaati, bahiddhaa pana sutaanusaarena aakappasampattiaadiupadhaara.nena vaa visesato passati. ``gu.navisesayutto siyaa''ti ma~n~nati, sopi ^b^bahiddhaa phaladassaavii^eb^ nayaggaahena phalamatta.m ga.nhanto vuttanayena ghosena vuyhati, sopi maadise na jaanaatiiti attho.

[01] yo pana ^b^ajjhatta~nca^eb^ khii.naasavassa abbhantare asekkhasiilakkhandhaadigu.na.m jaanaati, bahiddhaa cassa pa.tipattisallakkha.nena visesato gu.navisesayoga.m passati. ^b^anaavara.nadassaavii^eb^ kenaci anaava.to hutvaa ariyaana.m gu.ne ^a^M2.0132^ea^ da.t.thu.m ~naatu.m samattho, na so ghosamattena vuyhati yaathaavato dassanatoti.

[03] ^b^ekaputto^eb^tiaadikaa ^a^P2.0199^ea^ aayasmato bhaddattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttara.m bhagavanta.m bhikkhusa"ngha~nca satasahassaparimaa.na.m ciivaraadiihi catuuhi paccayehi puujesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m se.t.thikule nibbatti. nibbattamaano ^a^V2.0114^ea^ ca aputtakesu maataapituusu devataayaacanaadiini katvaapi alabhantesu satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa ``sace, bhante, maya.m eka.m putta.m lacchaama, ta.m tumhaaka.m daasatthaaya dassaamaa''ti vatvaa aayaacitvaa gatesu satthu adhippaaya.m ~natvaa a~n~nataro devaputto khii.naayuko hutvaa .thito sakkena devara~n~naa ``amukasmi.m kule nibbattaahii''ti aa.natto tattha nibbatti, ^b^bhaddo^eb^tissa naama.m aka.msu. ta.m sattavassuddesika.m jaata.m maataapitaro ala"nkaritvaa bhagavato santika.m netvaa ``aya.m so, bhante, tumhe aayaacitvaa laddhadaarako, ima.m tumhaaka.m niyyaatemaa''ti aaha.msu. satthaa aanandatthera.m aa.naapesi -- ``ima.m pabbaajehii''ti. aa.naapetvaa ca gandhaku.ti.m paavisi. thero ta.m pabbaajetvaa sa"nkhepena vipassanaamukha.m aacikkhi. so upanissayasampannattaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto suuriye anoggateyeva bhaavana.m ussukkaapetvaa cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.5.54-69) --
[27] so ca pacchaa pabbajitvaa, sukkamuulena codito.
[22] bhaddiyo naama naamena, hessati satthu saavako..

[03] tassa ^a^M2.0134^ea^ bhagavaa cha.labhi~n~nuppatti.m ~natvaa ``ehi, bhaddaa''ti aaha. so taavadeva satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa pa~njaliko satthu samiipe a.t.thaasi, saa eva cassa upasampadaa ahosi. buddhuupasampadaa naama kiresaa. thero jaatito pa.t.thaaya attano pavattiyaa kathanamukhena a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
[21] ``ekaputto aha.m aasi.m, piyo maatu piyo pitu.
[22] ubho pitaa ca maataa ca, buddhassa upanaamayu.m..
[22] ima.m dadaama te naatha, jinassa paricaaraka.m..
[22] anoggatasmi.m suuriyasmi.m, tato citta.m vimucci me..
[22] ehi bhaddaati ma.m aaha, saa me aasuupasampadaa..

[03] tattha ^b^vatacariyaahii^eb^ti, ``eva.m katvaa putta.m labhissathaa''ti vutta.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m vacana.m sutvaa, khiira.m paayitvaa, anasanaadivatacara.nehi. ^b^aayaacanaahii^eb^ti devataayaacanaahi satthuaayaacanaaya ca, idameva cettha kaara.na.m, itara.m thero maataapituuna.m pa.tipattidassanattha~nceva kicchaladdhabhaavadassanattha~nca vadati.
[03] ^b^hessatyaajaaniyo aya^eb^nti aya.m daarako mama saasane aajaaniiyo bhavissati. tasmaa khippa.m ajjeva pabbaajehiiti eta.m ^b^abravi,^eb^ aaha.

[03] ^b^pabbaajetvaanaa^eb^ti aanandattherena pabbaajetvaa. ^b^vihaara^eb^nti gandhaku.ti.m. ^b^anoggatasmi.m suuriyasmi^eb^nti suuriye anattha"ngateyeva. ^b^tato citta.m vimucci me^eb^ti tato vipassanaarambhato para.m na cireneva kha.nena sabbaasavehi me citta.m vimucci, khii.naasavo ahosi.m.

[03] ^b^tato^eb^ti mama aasavakkhayato pacchaa. ^b^niraakatvaa^eb^ti attanaa samaapanna.m phalasamaapatti.m appetvaa tato vu.t.thaaya. tenaaha ^b^``pa.tisallaanavu.t.thito''^eb^ti. ^b^saa me aasuupasampadaa^eb^ti yaa ma.m uddissa ``ehi, bhaddaa''ti satthu vaacaa pavattaa, saa eva me mayha.m upasampadaa aasi. eva.m ^b^jaatiyaa sattavassena, laddhaa me upasampadaa^eb^ti saatisaya.m satthaaraa attano kata.m anuggaha.m saasanassa ca niyyaanikata.m dasseti. tenaaha ^b^``aho dhammasudhammataa''^eb^ti.

[03] ettha ca ``citta.m vimucci me''ti khii.naasavabhaava.m pakaasetvaapi puna ^b^``tisso vijjaa anuppattaa''^eb^ti lokiyaabhi~n~nekadesadassana.m cha.labhi~n~nabhaavavibhaavanattha.m. tenaaha apadaane ``cha.labhi~n~naa sacchikataa''ti.

[03] ^b^disvaa^eb^ ^a^V2.0117^ea^ ^a^P2.0201^ea^ ^b^paasaadachaayaaya^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato sopaakattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kaale braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto braahma.naana.m vijjaasippesu nipphatti.m gato kaamesu aadiinava.m disvaa gharaavaasa.m pahaaya taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa ekasmi.m ^a^M2.0136^ea^ pabbate viharati. satthaa aasannamara.na.m ta.m ~natvaa tassa santika.m agamaasi. so bhagavanta.m disvaa pasannacitto u.laara.m piitisomanassa.m pavedento pupphamaya.m aasana.m pa~n~napetvaa adaasi. satthaa tattha nisiiditvaa, aniccataapa.tisa.myutta.m dhammi.m katha.m kathetvaa tassa passantasseva aakaasena agamaasi. so pubbe gahita.m niccaggaaha.m pahaaya aniccasa~n~na.m hadaye .thapetvaa, kaala"nkatvaa, devaloke uppajitvaa, aparaapara.m devamanussesu sa.msaranto, imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe sopaakayoniya.m nibbatti. so jaatiaagatena ^b^sopaako^eb^ti naamena pa~n~naayi. keci pana ``vaa.nijakule nibbatto, `sopaako'ti pana naamamatta''nti vadanti. ta.m apadaanapaa.liyaa virujjhati ``pacchime bhave sampatte, sopaakayonupaagami''nti vacanato.

[03] tassa catumaasajaatassa pitaa kaalamakaasi, cuu.lapitaa posesi. anukkamena sattavassiko jaato. ekadivasa.m cuu.lapitaa ``attano puttena kalaha.m karotii''ti kujjhitvaa, ta.m susaana.m netvaa, dve hatthe rajjuyaa ekato bandhitvaa, taaya eva rajjuyaa matamanussassa sariire gaa.lha.m bandhitvaa gato ``si"ngaalaadayo khaadantuu''ti. pacchimabhavikataaya daarakassa pu~n~naphalena saya.m maaretu.m na visahi, si"ngaalaadayopi na abhibhavi.msu. daarako a.d.dharattasamaye eva.m vippalapati --
[21] ``kaa gati me agatissa, ko vaa bandhu abandhuno.
[03] satthaa taaya velaaya veneyyabandhave olokento daarakassa hadayabbhantare pajjalanta.m arahattuupanissaya.m disvaa obhaasa.m pharitvaa sati.m janetvaa evamaaha --

[03] daarako buddhaanubhaavena chinnabandhano gaathaapariyosaane sotaapanno hutvaa gandhaku.tisammukhe a.t.thaasi. tassa maataa putta.m apassantii cuu.lapitara.m pucchitvaa tenassa pavattiyaa akathitaaya tattha tattha ^a^P2.0202^ea^ gantvaa vicinantii ^a^M2.0137^ea^ ``buddhaa kira atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m jaananti, ya.mnuunaaha.m bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa mama puttassa pavatti.m jaaneyya''nti satthu santika.m agamaasi. satthaa, iddhiyaa ta.m pa.ticchaadetvaa, ``bhante, mama putta.m na passaami, apica bhagavaa tassa pavatti.m jaanaatii''ti taaya pu.t.tho --
[21] ``na santi puttaa taa.naaya, na pitaa naapi bandhavaa.
[25] dhamma.m kathesi. ta.m sutvaa saa sotaapannaa ahosi. daarako arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.2.112-123) --
[22] siddhattho naama bhagavaa, aagacchi mama santika.m..
[22] ekaaha.m bhaavayitvaana, tattha kaala.m kato aha.m..
[22] ta.m sa~n~na.m bhaavayantassa, patto me aasavakkhayo..

[03] atha bhagavaa iddhi.m pa.tisa.mhari. saapi putta.m disvaa ha.t.thatu.t.tho tassa khii.naasavabhaava.m sutvaa pabbaajetvaa gataa. so satthaara.m gandhaku.ticchaayaaya.m ca"nkamanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa, vanditvaa anuca"nkami. tassa bhagavaa upasampada.m anujaanitukaamo ``eka.m naama ki''ntiaadinaa dasa pa~nhe pucchi. sopi satthu adhippaaya.m ga.nhanto sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.nena sa.msandento ``sabbe sattaa aahaara.t.thitikaa''tiaadinaa (khu0 paa0 4.1) te pa~nhe vissajjesi. teneva te kumaarapa~nhaa naama jaataa. satthaa tassa pa~nhabyaakara.nena aaraadhitacitto upasampada.m anujaani. tena saa pa~nhabyaakara.nuupasampadaa naama jaataa. tassima.m attano pavatti.m pakaasetvaa thero a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
[21] ``tato pa~nhe apucchi ma.m, pa~nhaana.m kovido viduu.
[22] acchambhii ca abhiito ca, byaakaasi.m satthuno aha.m..
[22] esaa ceva te sopaaka, bhavatu upasampadaa'''..
[22] dhaaremi antima.m deha.m, aho dhammasudhammataa''ti.. -- imaa gaathaa abhaasi.

[03] ^b^sa.mharitvaana paa.nayo^eb^ti ubho hatthe kamalamaku.laakaarena sa"ngate katvaa, a~njali.m paggahetvaati attho. ^b^anuca"nkamissa^eb^nti ca"nkamantassa satthuno anupacchato anugamanavasena ca"nkami.m. ^b^viraja^eb^nti vigataraagaadiraja.m.

[03] ^b^pa~nhe^eb^ti kumaarapa~nhe. ^b^viduu^eb^ti veditabba.m viditavaa, sabba~n~nuuti attho. ``satthaa ma.m pucchatii''ti uppajjanakassa chambhitattassa bhayassa ca setughaatena pahiinattaa ^b^acchambhii^eb^ ca ^b^abhiito^eb^ ca byaakaasi.
[03] ^b^yesaaya^eb^nti yesa.m a"ngamagadhaana.m aya.m sopaako. ^b^paccaya^eb^nti gilaanapaccaya.m. ^b^saamiici^eb^nti maggadaanabiijanaadisaamiicikiriya.m.

[03] ^b^ajjadagge^eb^ti da-kaaro padasandhikaro, ajja agge aadi.m katvaa, ajja pa.t.thaaya. ``ajjatagge''tipi paa.li, ajjata.m aadi.m katvaati attho. ^b^dassanaayopasa"nkamaa^eb^ti ``hiinajacco, vayasaa taru.nataro''ti vaa acintetvaa dassanaaya ma.m upasa"nkama. ^b^esaa cevaa^eb^ti yaa tassa mama sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.nena saddhi.m sa.msandetvaa kataa pa~nhavissajjanaa. esaayeva te bhavatu upasampadaa iti ca abraviiti yojanaa. ``laddhaa me upasampadaa''tipi paa.li. ye pana ``laddhaana upasampada''ntipi pa.thanti, tesa.m ^b^sattavassenaa^eb^ti sattamena vassenaati attho, sattavassena vaa hutvaati vacanaseso. ya.m panettha avutta.m, ta.m suvi~n~neyyameva.

[03] ^b^sare^eb^ ^a^M2.0140^ea^ ^b^hatthehii^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato sarabha"ngattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinitvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe a~n~natarassa braahma.nassa putto hutvaa nibbatti, ^b^anabhilakkhito^eb^tissa kulava.msaagata.m naama.m ahosi. so vayappatto kaame pahaaya taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa sarati.naani ^a^V2.0121^ea^ sayameva bha~njitvaa pa.n.nasaala.m katvaa vasati. tato pa.t.thaaya ^b^sarabha"ngo^eb^tissa sama~n~naa ahosi. atha bhagavaa buddhacakkhunaa loka.m volokento tassa arahattuupanissaya.m disvaa, tattha gantvaa, dhamma.m desesi. so pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva arahatta.m patvaa tattheva vasati. athassa taapasakaale kataa pa.n.nasaalaa ji.n.naa paluggaa ahosi. ta.m disvaa ^a^P2.0204^ea^ manussaa ``kissa, bhante, ima.m ku.tika.m na pa.tisa"nkharothaa''ti aaha.msu. thero ``ku.tikaa yathaa taapasakaale kataa, idaani tathaa kaatu.m na sakkaa''ti ta.m sabba.m pakaasento --
[22] tena me sarabha"ngoti, naama.m sammutiyaa ahu..
[21] ``na mayha.m kappate ajja, sare hatthehi bha~njitu.m.
[22] sikkhaapadaa no pa~n~nattaa, gotamena yasassinaa''ti.. -- dve gaathaa abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^sare hatthehi bha~njitvaa^eb^ti, pubbe taapasakaale sarati.naani mama hatthehi chinditvaa ti.naku.ti.m katvaa ^b^acchisa.m^eb^ vasi.m, nisiidi~nceva nipajji~nca. ^b^tenaa^eb^ti ku.tikara.nattha.m saraana.m bha~njanena. ^b^sammutiyaa^eb^ti anvatthasammutiyaa sarabha"ngoti, naama.m ahu ahosi.

[03] ^b^na mayha.m kappate ajjaa^eb^ti ajja idaani upasampannassa mayha.m ^b^sare^eb^ sarati.ne hatthehi bha~njitu.m na kappate na va.t.tati. kasmaa? ^b^sikkhaapadaa no pa~n~nattaa, gotamena yasassinaa^eb^ti. tena ya.m amhaaka.m satthaaraa sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m, ta.m maya.m jiivitahetunaapi naatikkamaamaati dasseti.
[03] eva.m ^a^M2.0141^ea^ ekena pakaarena ti.naku.tikaaya apa.tisa"nkhara.ne kaara.na.m dassetvaa idaani aparenapi pariyaayena na.m dassento --
[22] soya.m rogo di.t.tho, vacanakarenaatidevassaa''ti.. -- ima.m gaathamaaha.

[03] tattha ^b^sakala^eb^nti sabba.m. ^b^samatta^eb^nti sampu.n.na.m, sabbabhaagato anavasesanti attho. ^b^roga^eb^nti dukkhadukkhataadivasena rujana.t.thena rogabhuuta.m upaadaanakkhandhapa~ncaka.m sandhaaya vadati. ^b^naaddasa.m pubbe^eb^ti ^a^V2.0122^ea^ satthu ovaadapa.tilaabhato pubbe na addakkhi.m. ^b^soya.m rogo di.t.tho, vacanakarenaatidevassaa^eb^ti sammutidevaa upapattidevaa visuddhidevaati sabbepi deve attano siilaadigu.nehi atikkamitvaa .thitattaa atidevassa sammaasambuddhassa ovaadapa.tikarena sarabha"ngena so aya.m khandhapa~ncakasa"nkhaato rogo vipassanaapa~n~naasahitaaya maggapa~n~naaya pa~ncakkhandhato di.t.tho, pari~n~naatoti attho. etena eva.m attabhaavaku.tikaayampi anapekkho baahira.m ti.naku.tika.m katha.m pa.tisa"nkharissatiiti dasseti.

[03] idaani ya.m magga.m pa.tipajjantena mayaa aya.m attabhaavarogo yaathaavato di.t.tho, svaaya.m maggo sabbabuddhasaadhaara.no. yena nesa.m ovaadadhammopi majjhe bhinnasuva.n.nasadiso yatthaaha.m pati.t.thaaya dukkhakkhaya.m pattoti ^a^P2.0205^ea^ eva.m attano arahattapa.tipatti.m byaakaronto --
[21] ``yeneva maggena gato vipassii, yeneva maggena sikhii ca vessabhuu.
[22] kakusandhako.naagamano ca kassapo, tena~njasena agamaasi gotamo..
[27] bhedaa imassa kaayassa, jiivitassa ca sa"nkhayaa.

[03] tattha ^b^yeneva maggenaa^eb^ti yeneva sapubbabhaagena ariyena a.t.tha"ngikena maggena. ^b^gato^eb^ti pa.tipanno nibbaana.m adhigato. ^b^vipassii^eb^ti vipassii sammaasambuddho. ^b^kakusandhaa^eb^ti avibhattiko niddeso. ``kakusandhako.naagamanaa''tipi paa.tho. ^b^tena~njasenaa^eb^ti teneva a~njasena ariyamaggena.

[03] ^b^anaadaanaa^eb^ti anupaadaanaa appa.tisandhikaa vaa. ^b^khayogadhaa^eb^ti nibbaanogadhaa nibbaanapati.t.thaa. ^b^yehaaya.m desito dhammo^eb^ti yehi sattahi sammaasambuddhehi aya.m saasanadhammo desito pavedito. ^b^dhammabhuutehii^eb^ti dhammakaayataaya dhammasabhaavehi, navalokuttaradhammato vaa bhuutehi jaatehi, dhamma.m vaa pattehi. ^b^taadibhii^eb^ti, i.t.thaadiisu taadibhaavappattehi.

[03] ^b^``cattaari^eb^ ^a^V2.0123^ea^ ^b^ariyasaccaanii''^eb^tiaadinaa tehi desita.m dhamma.m dasseti. tattha ^b^cattaarii^eb^ti ga.nanaparicchedo. ^b^ariyasaccaanii^eb^ti paricchinnadhammadassana.m. vacanatthato pana ariyaani ca avitatha.t.thena saccaani caati ariyasaccaani, ariyassa vaa bhagavato saccaani tena desitattaa, ariyabhaavakaraani vaa saccaaniiti ariyasaccaani. kucchitabhaavato tucchabhaavato ca ^b^dukkha.m,^eb^ upaadaanakkhandhapa~ncaka.m. ta.m dukkha.m samudeti etasmaati ^b^samudayo,^eb^ ta.nhaa. kilese maarento gacchati, nibbaanatthikehi maggiiyatiiti vaa ^b^maggo,^eb^ sammaadi.t.thiaadayo a.t.tha dhammaa. sa.msaaracaarakasa"nkhaato natthi ettha rodho, etasmi.m vaa adhigate puggalassa rodhaabhaavo hoti, nirujjhati dukkhametthaati vaa ^b^nirodho,^eb^ nibbaana.m. tenaaha ``dukkhasa"nkhayo''ti. ayamettha ^a^P2.0206^ea^ sa"nkhepo, vitthaaro pana ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ vuttanayeneva veditabbo.

[03] ^b^yasmi^eb^nti yasmi.m nirodhe nibbaane adhigate. ^b^nivattate^eb^ti ariyamaggabhaavanaaya sati ^b^anantaka.m^eb^ apariyanta.m imasmi.m sa.msaare jaatiaadidukkha.m na pavattati ucchijjati, so nirodhoti aya.m dhammabhuutehi sammaasambuddhehi desito ^a^M2.0143^ea^ dhammoti yojanaa. ^b^``bhedaa''^eb^tiaadinaa ``rogo di.t.tho''ti dukkhapari~n~naaya suucita.m attano arahattappatti.m saruupato dasseti. ``yasmi.m nibbattate dukkha''nti pana paa.the sakalagaathaaya tatthaaya.m yojanaa -- ^b^yasmi.m^eb^ khandhaadipa.tipaa.tisa~n~nite sa.msaare ida.m anantaka.m jaatiaadidukkha.m nibbatta.m, so ito dukkhappattito a~n~no punappuna.m bhavanabhaavato punabbhavo. imassa jiivitindriyassa sa"nkhayaa kaayasa"nkhaatassa khandhapa~ncakassa bhedaa vinaasaa uddha.m natthi, tasmaa sabbadhi sabbehi kilesehi sabbehi bhavehi su.t.thu vimutto visa.myutto amhiiti.

[03] a.t.thakanipaate ^a^M2.0144^ea^ ^a^V2.0124^ea^ ^b^kamma.m bahuka^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato mahaakaccaayanattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale gahapatimahaasaalakule nibbattitvaa vuddhippatto, ekadivasa.m satthu santike dhamma.m su.nanto satthaaraa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajantaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapiyamaana.m eka.m bhikkhu.m disvaa, sayampi ta.m .thaana.m patthento pa.nidhaana.m katvaa, daanaadiini pu~n~naani katvaa, devamanussesu sa.msaranto sumedhassa bhagavato kaale vijjaadharo hutvaa aakaasena gacchanto satthaara.m himavantapabbate ekasmi.m vanasa.n.de nisinna.m disvaa pasannamaanaso ka.nikaarapupphehi puuja.m akaasi.

[03] so tena pu~n~nakammena aparaapara.m sugatiisuyeva parivattento kassapadasabalassa kaale baaraa.nasiya.m kulaghare nibbattitvaa parinibbute bhagavati suva.n.nacetiyakara.na.t.thaane satasahassagghanikaaya suva.n.ni.t.thakaaya puuja.m katvaa, ``bhagavaa mayha.m nibbattanibbatta.t.thaane sariira.m suva.n.nava.n.na.m hotuu''ti patthana.m akaasi.

[03] tato yaavajiiva.m kusalakamma.m katvaa eka.m buddhantara.m devamanussesu sa.msaritvaa ^a^P2.0207^ea^ imasmi.m buddhuppaade ujjeniya.m ra~n~no ca.n.dapajjotassa purohitagehe nibbatti. tassa naamaggaha.nadivase maataa ``mayha.m putto suva.n.nava.n.no, attano naama.m gahetvaa aagato''ti ^b^ka~ncanamaa.navo^eb^ tveva naama.m akaasi. so vu.d.dhimanvaaya tayo vede uggahetvaa pitu accayena purohita.t.thaana.m labhi. so gottavasena ^b^kaccaayano^eb^ti pa~n~naayittha. ta.m raajaa ca.n.dapajjoto buddhuppaada.m sutvaa, ``aacariya, tva.m tattha gantvaa satthaara.m idhaanehii''ti pesesi. so atta.t.thamo satthu santika.m upagato. tassa satthaa dhamma.m deseti. desanaapariyosaane so sattahi janehi saddhi.m saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatte pati.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.54.1-27) --
[22] parisa.m ma~nca toseti, yathaa kaccaayano aya.m..
[22] kaccaano naama naamena, hessati satthu saavako..
[22] a~n~na.m gati.m na gacchaami, buddhapuujaayida.m phala.m..
[22] niice kule na jaayaami, buddhapuujaayida.m phala.m..
[21] ``pacchime ca bhave daani, jaato ujjeniya.m pure.
[22] maataa ca candimaa naama, kaccaanoha.m varattaco..
[22] paapu.ni.m amata.m santa.m, sesehi saha sattahi..

[03] atha satthaa ``etha, bhikkhavo''ti hattha.m pasaaresi. te taavadeva dva"ngulamattakesamassukaa iddhimayapattaciivaradharaa vassasa.t.thikattheraa viya ahesu.m. eva.m thero sadattha.m nipphaadetvaa, ``bhante, raajaa pajjoto tumhaaka.m ^a^M2.0147^ea^ paade vanditu.m dhamma~nca sotu.m icchatii''ti satthu aarocesi. satthaa, ``tva.myeva, bhikkhu, tattha gaccha, tayi gatepi raajaa pasiidissatii''ti aaha. thero satthu aa.naaya atta.t.thamo tattha gantvaa raajaana.m pasaadetvaa avantiisu saasana.m pati.t.thaapetvaa puna satthu santikameva gato. so ekadivasa.m sambahule bhikkhuu sama.nadhamma.m pahaaya kammaaraame sa"nga.nikaaraame rasata.nhaanugate ca pamaadavihaarino disvaa tesa.m ovaadavasena --
[21] ``kamma.m bahuka.m na kaaraye, parivajjeyya jana.m na uyyame.
[22] so ussukko rasaanugiddho, attha.m ri~ncati yo sukhaadhivaaho..
[21] ``pa"nkoti hi na.m avedayu.m, yaaya.m vandanapuujanaa kulesu.
[22] sukhuma.m salla.m durubbaha.m, sakkaaro kaapurisena dujjaho''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^a^V2.0127^ea^ ^a^P2.0208^ea^ ^b^kamma.m bahuka.m na kaaraye^eb^ti navaavaasakaaraapanaadi.m sama.nadhammakara.nassa paribandhabhuuta.m mahanta.m navakamma.m na pa.t.thapeyya, khuddaka.m appasamaarambha.m kha.n.daphullapa.tisa"nkhara.naadi.m satthu vacanapa.tipuujanattha.m kaatabbameva. ^b^parivajjeyya jana^eb^nti ga.nasa"nga.nikavasena jana.m vivajjeyya. jananti vaa yaadisa.m sa.msevato bhajato payirupaasato kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, taadisa.m akalyaa.namittabhuuta.m jana.m parivajjeyya. ^b^na uyyame^eb^ti, paccayuppaadanattha.m kulasa"nga.nhanavasena na vaayameyya, yasmaa ^b^so ussukko rasaanugiddho, attha.m ri~ncati yo sukhaadhivaaho^eb^ti yo rasaanugiddho rasata.nhaavasiko bhikkhu paccayuppaadanapasuto, so kulasa"nga.nhanattha.m ussukko, tesu sukhitesu sukhito, dukkhitesu dukkhito, uppannesu kiccakara.niiyesu attanaa yoga.m aapajjati, yo sukhaadhivaaho samathavipassanaamaggaphalanibbaanasukhaavaho siilaadiattho, ta.m ri~ncati pajahati eka.msena attaana.m tato vivecetiiti attho.

[03] eva.m pa.thamagaathaaya ``kammaaraamata.m sa"nga.nikaaraamata.m paccayagedha~nca vajjethaa''ti ovaditvaa idaani sakkaaraabhilaasa.m garahanto dutiya.m gaathamaaha. tassattho -- yaa aya.m bhikkhaaya upagataana.m pabbajitaana.m kulesu gehavaasiihi gu.nasambhaavanaaya kariiyamaanaa vandanaa puujanaa ca, yasmaa ta.m ^a^M2.0148^ea^ abhaavitattaana.m osiidaapana.t.thena malinabhaavakara.na.t.thena ca ^b^pa"nko^eb^ kaddamoti buddhaadayo ariyaa ^b^pavedayu.m^eb^ abbha~n~na.msu pavedesu.m vaa, yasmaa ca apari~n~naatakkhandhaana.m andhaputhujjanaana.m sakkaaraabhilaasa.m duvi~n~neyyasabhaavataaya pii.laajananato anto tudanato duruddhara.nato ca ^b^sukhuma.m salla.m durubbaha.m^eb^ pavedayu.m, tato eva sakkaaro kaapurisena ^b^dujjaho^eb^ duppajaheyyo tassa pahaanapa.tipattiyaa appa.tipajjanato. sakkaaraabhilaasappahaanena hi sakkaaro pahiino hoti, tasmaa tassa pahaanaaya aayogo kara.niiyoti dasseti --
[22] attanaa ta.m na seveyya, kammabandhuu hi maatiyaa..
[21] ``na pare vacanaa coro, na pare vacanaa muni.
[22] attaa ca na.m yathaa vedi, devaapi na.m tathaa viduu..
[22] ye ca tattha vijaananti, tato sammanti medhagaa..
[22] pa~n~naaya ca alaabhena, vittavaapi na jiivati..
[22] na ca di.t.tha.m suta.m dhiiro, sabba.m ujjhitumarahati..

[25] imaa cha gaathaa ra~n~no pajjotassa ovaadavasena abhaasi. so kira braahma.ne saddahitvaa pasughaataya~n~na.m kaareti, kamma.m asodhetvaava acore corasa~n~naaya da.n.desi, a.t.takara.ne ca assaamike saamike karoti, saamike ca assaamike. tato na.m thero vivecetu.m ^b^``na parassaa''^eb^tiaadinaa cha gaathaa abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^a^M2.0149^ea^ ^b^na parassupanidhaaya, kamma.m maccassa paapaka^eb^nti parassa maccassa sattassa upanidhaaya uddissa kaara.na.m katvaa paapaka.m vadhabandhaadikamma.m na seveyya, parena na kaaraapeyyaati attho. ^b^attanaa ta.m na seveyyaa^eb^ti attanaapi ta.m paapaka.m na kareyya. kasmaa? ^b^kammabandhuu hi maatiyaa^eb^ ime maatiyaa maccaa kammadaayaadaa, tasmaa attanaa ca ki~nci paapakamma.m na kareyya, parenapi na kaaraapeyyaati attho.

[03] ^b^na pare vacanaa coro^eb^ti attanaa coriya.m akatvaa paravacanaa parassa vacanamattena coro naama na hoti, tathaa ^b^na pare vacanaa muni^eb^ parassa vacanamattena muni suvisuddhakaayavaciimanosamaacaaro na hoti. ettha hi ^b^pare^eb^ti vibhattialopa.m katvaa niddeso. keci pana ``paresanti vattabbe pareti sa.m-kaaralopa.m katvaa niddi.t.tha''nti vadanti. ^b^attaa ca na.m yathaa vedii^eb^ti na.m satta.m tassa attaa citta.m yathaa ``aha.m parisuddho, aparisuddho vaa''ti yaathaavato avedi jaanaati. ^b^devaapi na.m tathaa viduu^eb^ti visuddhidevaa, upapattidevaa ca tathaa viduu vidanti jaananti, tasmaa saya.m taadisaa devaa ca pamaa.na.m suddhaasuddhaana.m suddhaasuddhabhaavajaanane, na ye keci icchaadosaparetaa sattaati adhippaayo.

[03] ^b^pare^eb^ti pa.n.dite .thapetvaa tato a~n~ne, kusalaakusalasaavajjaanavajja.m kamma.m kammaphala.m kaayassa asubhata.m sa"nkhaaraana.m aniccata.m ajaanantaa idha pare naama. te ^b^mayamettha^eb^ imasmi.m jiivaloke ^b^yamaama^eb^ uparamaama, ``satata.m samita.m maccu santika.m gacchaamaa''ti na jaananti. ^b^ye ca tattha vijaanantii^eb^ti ye ca tattha pa.n.ditaa ``maya.m maccu samiipa.m gacchaamaa''ti vijaananti. ^b^tato sammanti medhagaa^eb^ti eva~nhi te jaanantaa medhagaana.m paravihi.msanaana.m vuupasamaaya pa.tipajjanti, attanaa ^a^V2.0129^ea^ pare ca a~n~ne na medhanti na baadhentiiti attho. tva.m pana jiivitanimitta.m acore core karontopi da.n.danena saamike assaamike karontopi dhanajaaniyaa baadhasi pa~n~naavekallato. tathaa ^a^P2.0210^ea^ akarontopi ^b^jiivate vaapi sappa~n~no, api vittaparikkhayo^eb^ parikkhii.nadhanopi sappa~n~najaatiko itariitarasantosena santu.t.tho anavajjaaya jiivikaaya jiivatiyeva. tassa hi jiivita.m naama. tenaaha bhagavaa -- ``pa~n~naajiivi.m jiivitamaahu se.t.tha''nti (sa.m0 ni0 1.73, 246; su0 ni0 184). dummedhapuggalo pana pa~n~naaya ^a^M2.0150^ea^ ca alaabhena di.t.thadhammika.m samparaayika~nca attha.m viraadhento vittavaapi na jiivati garahaadipavattiyaa jiivanto naama na hoti, anupaaya~n~nutaaya yathaadhigata.m dhana.m naasento jiivitampi sandhaaretu.m na sakkotiyeva.

[03] imaa kira catassopi gaathaa thero supinantena ra~n~no kathesi. raajaa supina.m disvaa thera.m namassantoyeva pabujjhitvaa pabhaataaya rattiyaa thera.m upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa attanaa di.t.thaniyaamena supina.m kathesi. ta.m sutvaa thero taa gaathaa paccunubhaasitvaa ^b^``sabba.m su.naatii''^eb^tiaadinaa dviihi gaathaahi raajaana.m ovadi. tattha ^b^sabba.m su.naati sotenaa^eb^ti idha sotabba.m sadda.m aapaathagata.m sabba.m subhaasita.m dubbhaasita~nca abadhiro sotena su.naati. tathaa sabba.m ruupa.m sundara.m asundarampi cakkhunaa anandho passati, ayamindriyaana.m sabhaavo. tattha pana ^b^na ca di.t.tha.m suta.m dhiiro, sabba.m ujjhitu^eb^nti ca nidassanamattameta.m. ya~nhi ta.m di.t.tha.m suta.m vaa, na ta.m sabba.m dhiiro sappa~n~no ujjhitu.m pariccajitu.m gahetu.m vaa arahati. gu.naagu.na.m pana tattha upaparikkhitvaa ujjhitabbameva ujjhitu.m gahetabba~nca gahetu.m arahati, tasmaa ^b^cakkhumaassa yathaa andho^eb^ cakkhumaapi samaano ujjhitabbe di.t.the andho yathaa assa apassanto viya bhaveyya, tathaa ujjhitabbe sute sotavaapi badhiro yathaa assa asu.nanto viya bhaveyya. ^b^pa~n~navaassa yathaa muugo^eb^ti vicaara.napa~n~naaya pa~n~navaa vacanakusalopi avattabbe muugo viya bhaveyya. ^b^balavaa^eb^ thaamasampannopi akattabbe dubbaloriva, rakaaro padasandhikaro, asamattho viya bhaveyya. ^b^atha atthe samuppanne, sayetha matasaayika^eb^nti attanaa kaatabbakicce uppanne upa.t.thite matasaayika.m sayetha, matasaayika.m sayitvaapi ta.m kicca.m tiiretabbameva, na viraadhetabba.m. atha vaa ^b^atha atthe samuppanne^eb^ti attanaa akara.niiye atthe kicce uppanne upa.t.thite matasaayika.m sayetha, matasaayika.m sayitvaapi ta.m na kaatabbameva. na hi pa.n.dito ayutta.m kaatumarahatiiti eva.m therena ovadito raajaa akattabba.m pahaaya kaatabbeyeva yuttappayutto ahosiiti.

[03] ^b^akkodhano^eb^tiaadikaa ^a^M2.0151^ea^ ^a^V2.0130^ea^ ^a^P2.0211^ea^ aayasmato sirimittattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinitvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe mahaddhanaku.tumbikassa putto hutvaa nibbatti, ^b^sirimitto^eb^ti laddhanaamo. tassa kira maataa siriguttassa bhaginii. tassa vatthu ^b^dhammapadava.n.nanaaya.m^eb^ (dha0 pa0 a.t.tha0 1.garahadinnavatthu) aagatameva. so siriguttassa bhaagineyyo sirimitto vayappatto satthu dhanapaaladamane laddhappasaado pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva arahatta.m patto. ekadivasa.m paatimokkha.m uddisitu.m aasana.m abhiruhitvaa cittabiijani.m gahetvaa nisinno bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m kathesi. kathento ca u.laaratare gu.ne vibhajitvaa dassento --
[22] sa ve taadisako bhikkhu, eva.m pecca na socati..
[22] guttadvaaro sadaa bhikkhu, eva.m pecca na socati..
[22] kalyaa.nasiilo so bhikkhu, eva.m pecca na socati..
[22] kalyaa.namitto so bhikkhu, eva.m pecca na socati..
[22] kalyaa.napa~n~no so bhikkhu, eva.m pecca na socati..
[22] adaliddoti ta.m aahu, amogha.m tassa jiivita.m..
[22] anuyu~njetha medhaavii, sara.m buddhaana saasana''nti.. -- imaa gaathaa abhaasi.

[01] tattha ^b^akkodhano^eb^ti akujjhanasiilo. upa.t.thite hi kodhuppattinimitte adhivaasanakhantiya.m .thatvaa ^a^V2.0131^ea^ kopassa anuppaadako. ^b^anupanaahii^eb^ti na upanaahako, parehi kata.m aparaadha.m pa.ticca ``akkocchi ma.m avadhi ma.m, ajini ma.m ahaasi me''tiaadinaa (dha0 pa0 3; mahaava0 464; ma0 ni0 3.237) kodhassa anupanayhanasiilo. santadosapa.ticchaadanalakkha.naaya maayaaya abhaavato ^b^amaayo^eb^. pisu.navaacaavirahitato ^b^rittapesu.no, sa ve taadisako bhikkhuu^eb^ti so tathaaruupo tathaajaatiko yathaavuttagu.nasamannaagato bhikkhu ^a^P2.0212^ea^. eva.m yathaavuttapa.tipattiyaa ^b^pecca^eb^ paraloke na socati sokanimittassa abhaavato. cakkhudvaaraadayo kaayadvaaraadayo ca guttaa pihitaa sa.mvutaa etassaati ^b^guttadvaaro. kalyaa.nasiilo^eb^ti sundarasiilo suvisuddhasiilo. ^b^kalyaa.namitto^eb^ti --
[22] gambhiira~nca katha.m kattaa, no ca.t.thaane niyojaye''ti.. (a0 ni0 7.37) --

[25] eva.m vibhaavitalakkha.no kalyaa.namitto etassaati kalyaa.namitto. ^b^kalyaa.napa~n~no^eb^ti sundarapa~n~no. yadipi pa~n~naa naama asundaraa natthi, niyyaanikaaya pana pa~n~naaya vasena eva.m vutta.m

[03] evamettha kodhaadiina.m vikkhambhanavasena samucchedavasena ca akkodhanaadimukhena, puggalaadhi.t.thaanaaya gaathaaya sammaapa.tipatti.m dassetvaa idaani nipphattitalokuttarasaddhaadike uddharitvaa puggalaadhi.t.thaanaaya eva gaathaaya sammaapa.tipatti.m dassento ^b^``yassa saddhaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tassattho -- ^b^yassa^eb^ puggalassa ^b^tathaagate^eb^ sammaasambuddhe ``itipi so bhagavaa''tiaadinayappavattaa maggenaagatasaddhaa, tato eva ^b^acalaa^eb^ avikampaa su.t.thu pati.t.thitaa. ``atthii''ti, pada.m aanetvaa sambandhitabba.m. ^b^ariyakanta^eb^nti ariyaana.m kanta.m piyaayita.m bhavantarepi avijahanato. ^b^pasa.msita^eb^nti buddhaadiihi pasa.t.tha.m, va.n.nita.m thomita.m atthiiti yojanaa. ta.m paneta.m siila.m gaha.t.thasiila.m pabbajitasiilanti ^a^M2.0153^ea^ duvidha.m. tattha gaha.t.thasiila.m naama pa~ncasikkhaapadasiila.m, ya.m gaha.t.thena rakkhitu.m sakkaa. pabbajitasiila.m naama dasasikkhaapadasiila.m upaadaaya sabba.m catupaarisuddhisiila.m, tayida.m sabbampi akha.n.daadibhaavena aparaama.t.thataaya ``kalyaa.na''nti veditabba.m.

[03] ^b^sa"nghe pasaado yassatthii^eb^ti ``suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho''tiaadinaa ariyasa"nghe pasaado saddhaa yassa puggalassa atthi acalo suppati.t.thitoti aanetvaa yojetabba.m. ^b^ujubhuuta~nca dassana^eb^nti di.t.thiva"nkaabhaavato kilesava"nkaabhaavato ca ujubhuuta.m. aku.tila.m ajimha.m kammassakataadassana~nceva sappaccayanaamaruupadassana~ncaati duvidhampi dassana.m yassa atthi acala.m suppati.t.thitanti ^a^V2.0132^ea^ yojanaa. ^b^adaliddoti ta.m aahu^eb^ saddhaadhana.m, siiladhana.m, sutadhana.m, caagadhana.m, pa~n~naadhananti imesa.m suvisuddhaana.m dhanaana.m atthitaaya ``adaliddo''ti ta.m taadisa.m puggala.m buddhaadayo ariyaa aahu. ^b^amogha.m tassa jiivita.m^eb^ tassa tathaaruupassa jiivita.m di.t.thadhammikaadiatthaadhigamena amogha.m ava~njha.m saphalamevaati aahuuti attho.

[03] ^b^tasmaa^eb^ti ^a^P2.0213^ea^, yasmaa yathaavuttasaddhaadigu.nasamannaagato puggalo ``adaliddo amoghajiivito''ti vuccati, tasmaa ahampi tathaaruupo bhaveyyanti. ^b^saddha~nca...pe0... saasana^eb^nti ``sabbapaapassa akara.na''ntiaadinaa (dha0 pa0 183; dii0 ni0 2.90) vutta.m buddhaana.m saasana.m anussaranto kulaputto vuttappabheda.m saddha~nceva siila~nca dhammadassanahetuka.m dhamme sunicchayaa vimokkhabhuuta.m pasaada~nca anuyu~njeyya va.d.dheyyaati.
[03] eva.m thero bhikkhuuna.m dhammadesanaamukhena attani vijjamaane gu.ne pakaasento a~n~na.m byaakaasi.

[03] ^b^yadaa^eb^ ^a^M2.0154^ea^ ^b^pa.thamamaddakkhi^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato mahaapanthakattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare vibhavasampanno ku.tumbiyo hutvaa ekadivasa.m satthu santike dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m sa~n~naaviva.t.takusalaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa sayampi ta.m .thaanantara.m patthento buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa sattaaha.m mahaadaana.m pavattetvaa, ``bhante, ya.m bhikkhu.m tumhe ito sattadivasamatthake -- `sa~n~naaviva.t.takusalaana.m aya.m mama saasane aggo'ti etadagge .thapayittha, ahampi imassa adhikaarakammassa balena so bhikkhu viya anaagate ekassa buddhassa saasane aggo bhaveyya''nti patthana.m akaasi. kani.t.thabhaataa panassa tatheva bhagavati adhikaarakamma.m katvaa manomayassa kaayassaabhinimmaana.m cetoviva.t.takosallanti dvinna.m a"ngaana.m vasena vuttanayeneva pa.nidhaana.m akaasi. bhagavaa dvinnampi patthana.m anantaraayena samijjhanabhaava.m disvaa ``anaagate kappasatasahassamatthake gotamassa naama sammaasambuddhassa saasane tumhaaka.m patthanaa samijjhissatii''ti byaakaasi.

[03] te ^a^V2.0133^ea^ ubhopi janaa tattha yaavajiiva.m pu~n~naani katvaa tato cuto devaloke nibbatti.msu. tattha mahaapanthakassa antaraakata.m kalyaa.nadhamma.m na kathiiyati. cuu.lapanthako pana kassapassa bhagavato saasane pabbajitvaa viisati vassasahassaani odaatakasi.nakamma.m katvaa devapure nibbatti. apadaane pana ``cuu.lapanthako padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale taapaso hutvaa himavante vasanto tattha bhagavanta.m disvaa pupphacchattena puuja.m akaasii''ti aagata.m. tesa.m devamanussesu ^a^P2.0214^ea^ sa.msarantaana.myeva kappasatasahassa.m atikkanta.m. atha amhaaka.m satthaa abhisambodhi.m patvaa pavattitavaradhammacakko raajagaha.m upanissaaya ve.luvane mahaavihaare viharati.

[03] tena ca samayena raajagahe dhanase.t.thissa dhiitaa attano daasena saddhi.m santhava.m katvaa ~naatakehi bhiitaa hatthasaara.m gahetvaa tena saddhi.m palaayitvaa a~n~nattha vasantii ta.m pa.ticca gabbha.m labhitvaa paripakkagabbhaa ``~naatighara.m ^a^M2.0155^ea^ gantvaa vijaayissaamii''ti gacchantii antaraamaggeyeva putta.m vijaayitvaa saaminaa nivattitaa pubbe vasita.t.thaane vasantii puttassa panthe jaatattaa ^b^panthako^eb^ti, naama.m akaasi. tasmi.m aadhaavitvaa vidhaavitvaa vicara.nakaale tameva pa.ticca dutiya.m gabbha.m pa.tilabhitvaa paripakkagabbhaa pubbe vuttanayeneva antaraamagge putta.m vijaayitvaa saaminaa nivattitaa je.t.thaputtassa ^b^mahaapanthako^eb^ti kani.t.thassa ^b^cuu.lapanthako^eb^ti naama.m katvaa yathaavasita.t.thaaneyeva vasantii anukkamena daarakesu va.d.dhantesu tehi, ``amma, ayyakakula.m no dassehii''ti nibundhiyamaanaa daarake maataapituuna.m santika.m pesesi. tato pa.t.thaaya daarakaa dhanase.t.thino gehe va.d.dhanti. tesu cuu.lapanthako atidaharo. mahaapanthako pana ayyakena saddhi.m bhagavato santika.m gato satthaara.m disvaa saha dassanena pa.tiladdhasaddho dhamma.m sutvaa upanissayasampannataaya pabbajitukaamo hutvaa pitaamaha.m aapucchi. so satthu tamattha.m aarocetvaa ta.m pabbaajesi. so pabbajitvaa bahu.m buddhavacana.m ugga.nhitvaa paripu.n.navasso upasampajjitvaa yonisomanasikaare kamma.m karonto visesato catunna.m aruupajjhaanaana.m laabhii hutvaa tato vu.t.thaaya vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. iti so sa~n~naaviva.t.takusalaana.m aggo jaato. so jhaanasukhena phalasukhena viitinaamento ekadivasa.m attano pa.tipatti.m paccavekkhitvaa adhigatasampatti.m pa.ticca sa~njaatasomanasso siihanaada.m nadanto --
[22] tato me ahu sa.mvego, passitvaa purisuttama.m..
[22] tisso vijjaa anuppattaa, kata.m buddhassa saasana.m..
[22] sabba.m ta.nha.m visosetvaa, palla"nkena upaavisi''nti.. -- imaa gaathaa abhaasi.

[01] tattha ^b^yadaa^eb^ti yasmi.m kaale. ^b^pa.thama^eb^nti aadito. ^b^addakkhi^eb^nti passi.m, ^b^satthaara^eb^nti, bhagavanta.m. ^b^akutobhaya^eb^nti nibbhaya.m. aya~nhettha attho -- sabbesa.m bhayahetuuna.m bodhimuuleyeva pahiinattaa kutocipi bhayaabhaavato ^b^akutobhaya.m^eb^ nibbhaya.m, catuvesaarajjavisaarada.m di.t.thadhammikasamparaayikaparamatthehi veneyyaana.m yathaarahamanusaasanato ^b^satthaara.m^eb^ sammaasambuddha.m mayha.m pitaamahena saddhi.m gantvaa yaaya velaaya sabbapa.thama.m passi.m, ta.m ^b^purisuttama.m^eb^ sadevake loke aggapuggala.m passitvaa tato dassanahetu ^b^tato^eb^ dassanato pacchaa ``ettaka.m kaala.m satthaara.m da.t.thu.m dhamma~nca sotu.m naalattha''nti mayha.m ^b^sa.mvego ahu^eb^ sahottappa.m ~naa.na.m uppajji. uppannasa.mvego panaaha.m eva.m cintesinti dasseti ^b^siri.m hatthehii^eb^ti gaathaaya. tassattho -- ^b^yo^eb^ vibhavatthiko puriso ``upa.t.thaayiko hutvaa tava santike vasissaamii''ti saviggaha.m siri.m sayane upagata.m hatthehi ca paadehi ca ko.t.tento ^b^pa.naameyya^eb^ niihareyya, ^b^so^eb^ tathaaruupo alakkhikapuriso etaadisa.m ^b^satthaara.m^eb^ sammaasambuddha.m ^b^aaraadhetvaa^eb^ imasmi.m navame kha.ne pa.tilabhitvaa ^b^viraadhaye^eb^ tassa ovaadaakara.nena ta.m virajjheyya, aha.m paneva.m na karomiiti adhippaayo. tenaaha ^b^``tadaaha.m...pe0... anagaariya''^eb^nti. tattha ^b^cha.d.dayi^eb^nti, pajahi.m. ``cha.d.diya''ntipi paa.tho. nanu aya.m thero daarapariggaha.m akatvaava pabbajito, so kasmaa ``puttadaara~nca ^a^M2.0157^ea^ cha.d.dayi''nti avocaati? yathaa naama puriso anibbattaphalameva rukkha.m chindanto acchinne tato laddhaphalehi parihiino naama hoti. eva.msampadamida.m da.t.thabba.m.

[03] ^b^sikkhaasaajiivasamaapanno^eb^ti yaa adhisiilasikkhaa, taaya ca, yattha bhikkhuu saha jiivanti, ekajiivikaa ^a^V2.0135^ea^ sabhaagavuttino honti, tena bhagavataa pa~n~nattasikkhaapadasa"nkhaatena saajiivena ca samannaagato sikkhanabhaavena ^a^P2.0216^ea^ sama"ngiibhuuto, sikkha.m paripuurento saajiiva~nca aviitikkamanto hutvaa tadubhaya.m sampaadentoti attho. tena suvisuddhe paatimokkhe siile pati.t.thitabhaava.m dasseti. ^b^indriyesu susa.mvuto^eb^ti manaccha.t.thesu indriyesu su.t.thu sa.mvuto. ruupaadivisayesu uppajjanakaana.m abhijjhaadiina.m pavattinivaara.navasena satikavaa.tena supihitacakkhaadidvaaroti attho. eva.m paatimokkhasa.mvaraindriyasa.mvarasiilasampattidassanena itarasiilampi atthato dassitameva hotiiti thero attano catupaarisuddhisiilasampada.m dassetvaa ^b^``namassamaano sambuddha''^eb^nti iminaa buddhaanussatibhaavanaanuyogamaaha. ^b^vihaasi.m aparaajito^eb^ti kilesamaaraadiihi aparaajito eva hutvaa vihari.m, yaava arahattappatti, taava tehi anabhibhuuto, a~n~nadatthu te abhibhavanto eva vihaasinti attho.

[03] ^b^tato^eb^ti tasmaa, yasmaa suvisuddhasiilo satthari abhippasanno kilesaabhibhavanapa.tipattiya~nca .thito, tasmaa. ^b^pa.nidhii^eb^ti pa.nidhaana.m. ^b^tato^eb^ vaa cittaabhiniihaaro. ^b^aasii^eb^ti ahosi. ^b^cetaso abhipatthito^eb^ti, mama cittena icchito. kiidiso pana soti aaha ^b^``na nisiide muhuttampi, ta.nhaasalle anuuhate''^eb^ti. ``aggamaggasa.n.daasena mama hadayato ta.nhaasalle anuddha.te muhuttampi na nisiide, nisajja.m na kappeyya''nti eva.m me cittaabhiniihaaro ahosiiti attho.

[03] eva.m pana citta.m adhi.t.thaaya bhaavana.m bhaavayitvaa .thaanaca"nkameheva ratti.m viitinaamento aruupasamaapattito vu.t.thaaya jhaana"ngamukhena vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa arahatta.m sacchaakaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^``tassa me''^eb^tiaadi. ^b^niruupadhii^eb^ti kilesupadhiaadiina.m abhaavena nirupadhi. ^b^ratyaavivasaane^eb^ti rattibhaagassa vigamane ^a^M2.0158^ea^ vibhaataaya rattiyaa. ^b^suuriyuggamana.m patii^eb^ti suuriyuggamana.m lakkha.na.m katvaa. ^b^sabba.m ta.nha^eb^nti kaamata.nhaadibheda.m sabba.m ta.nhaasota.m aggamaggena ^b^visosetvaa^eb^ sukkhaapetvaa ``ta.nhaasalle anuuhate na nisiide''ti, pa.ti~n~naaya mocitattaa. ^b^palla"nkena upaavisi^eb^nti palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa nisiidinti. sesa.m uttaanatthameva.

[03] navakanipaate ^a^M2.0159^ea^ ^a^V2.0136^ea^ ^b^yadaa dukkha^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato bhuutattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m pu~n~na.m upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kaale braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^a^P2.0217^ea^ ^b^seno^eb^ti laddhanaamo vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m disvaa pasannamaanaso ``usabha.m pavara''ntiaadinaa catuuhi gaathaahi abhitthavi.

[03] so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saaketanagarassa dvaaragaame mahaavibhavassa se.t.thissa putto hutvaa nibbatti. tassa kira se.t.thino jaataa jaataa daarakaa baddhaaghaatena ekena yakkhena khaaditaa, imassa pana pacchimabhavikattaa bhuutaa aarakkha.m ga.nhi.msu. yakkho pana vessava.nassa upa.t.thaana.m gato, puna naagamaasi. naamakara.nadivase cassa ``eva.m kate amanussaa anukampantaa parihareyyu''nti ^b^bhuuto^eb^ti naama.m aka.msu. so pana attano pu~n~nabalena anantaraayo va.d.dhi, tassa ``tayo paasaadaa ahesu''ntiaadi sabba.m yasassa kulaputtassa vibhavakittane viya veditabba.m. so vi~n~nuta.m patto satthari saakete vasante upaasakehi saddhi.m vihaara.m gato. satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa ajakara.niyaa naama nadiyaa tiire le.ne vasanto vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.7.20-28) --
[22] tatheva jhaana.m buddhassa, ko disvaa nappasiidati..
[22] tatheva siila.m buddhassa, ko disvaa nappasiidati..

[01] arahatta.m pana patvaa aparena samayena ~naatiina.m anukampaaya saaketa.m gantvaa katipaaha.m tehi upa.t.thiyamaano a~njanavane vasitvaa puna attanaa vasita.t.thaanameva gantukaamo gamanaakaara.m dassesi. ~naatakaa ``idheva, bhante, vasatha, tumhepi na kilamissatha, mayampi pu~n~nena va.d.dhissaamaa''ti thera.m yaaci.msu. thero attano vivekaabhirati.m tattha ca phaasuvihaara.m pakaasento --
[21] ``yadaa dukkha.m jaraamara.nanti pa.n.dito, aviddasuu yattha sitaa puthujjanaa.
[22] dukkha.m pari~n~naaya satova jhaayati, tato rati.m paramatara.m na vindati..
[22] ta.nha.m pahantvaana satova jhaayati, tato rati.m paramatara.m na vindati..
[22] pa~n~naaya passitva satova jhaayati, tato rati.m paramatara.m na vindati..
[21] ``yadaa ^a^P2.0218^ea^ asoka.m viraja.m asa"nkhata.m, santa.m pada.m sabbakilesasodhana.m.
