[22] bhaaveti sa~n~nojanabandhanacchida.m, tato rati.m paramatara.m na vindati..
[21] ``yadaa nabhe gajjati meghadundubhi, dhaaraakulaa vihagapathe samantato.
[22] bhikkhuu ca pabbhaaragatova jhaayati, tato rati.m paramatara.m na vindati..
[22] tiire nisinno sumanova jhaayati, tato rati.m paramatara.m na vindati..
[21] ``yadaa nisiithe rahitamhi kaanane, deve ga.lantamhi nadanti daa.thino.
[22] bhikkhuu ca pabbhaaragatova jhaayati, tato rati.m paramatara.m na vindati..
[22] viitaddaro viitakhilova jhaayati, tato rati.m paramatara.m na vindati..
[22] tato rati.m paramatara.m na vindatii''ti.. -- imaa gaathaa abhaasi.

[03] tatthaaya.m ^a^M2.0162^ea^ padayojanaamukhena pa.thamagaathaaya atthava.n.nanaa -- khandhaana.m paripaako ^b^jaraa^eb^. bhedo ^b^mara.na.m^eb^. jaraamara.nasiisena cettha jaraamara.navanto dhammaa gahitaa. ``tayida.m jaraamara.na.m dukkha''nti ^b^aviddasuu^eb^ yathaabhuuta.m ajaanantaa ^b^puthujjanaa yattha^eb^ yasmi.m upaadaanakkhandhapa~ncake ^b^sitaa^eb^ pa.tibandhaa alliinaa, ta.m ``ida.m dukkha.m, ettaka.m dukkha.m, na ito bhiyyo''ti vipassanaapa~n~naasahitaaya maggapa~n~naaya parijaanitvaa, idha imasmi.m saasane ^b^sato^eb^ sampajaano, ^b^pa.n.dito^eb^ bhikkhu, ^b^yadaa^eb^ yasmi.m kaale lakkha.nuupanijjhaanena jhaayati. ^b^tato^eb^ vipassanaaratito maggaphalaratito ca ^b^paramatara.m^eb^ uttamatara.m rati.m ^b^na vindati^eb^ nappa.tilabhati. tenaaha bhagavaa --

[03] eva.m ^a^P2.0219^ea^ pari~n~naabhisamayamukhena vivekarati.m dassetvaa idaani pahaanaabhisamayaadimukhenapi ta.m dassetu.m dutiyaadikaa tisso gaathaa abhaasi. tattha ^b^dukkhassaavahani^eb^nti dukkhassa aayati.m pavatti.m, dukkhassa nipphattikanti attho. ^b^visattika^eb^nti ta.nha.m. saa hi visataati visattikaa, visaalaati visattikaa, visa.taati visattikaa, visakkatiiti visattikaa, visa.m haratiiti visattikaa, visa.mvaadikaati visattikaa, visamuulaati visattikaa, visaphalaati visattikaa, visaparibhogaati visattikaa, visaalaa vaa pana saa ta.nhaa ruupe sadde gandhe rase pho.t.thabbe dhamme kule ^a^V2.0139^ea^ ga.ne vittha.taati visattikaati vuccati. ^b^papa~ncasa"nghaatadukhaadhivaahini^eb^nti sattasantaana.m sa.msaare papa~ncenti vitthaarentiiti papa~ncaa, raagaadayo maanaadayo ca. te eva pavattidukkhassa sa"nghaata.t.thena sa"nghaataa, sadarathapari.laahasabhaavattaa dukkha~ncaati papa~ncasa"nghaatadukha.m, tassa adhivaahato nibbattanato papa~ncasa"nghaatadukhaadhivaahinii. ta.m ta.nha.m ^b^pahantvaanaa^eb^ti ariyamaggena samucchinditvaa.

[03] ^b^siva^eb^nti ^a^M2.0163^ea^ khema.m, akhemakaraana.m kilesaana.m samucchindanena tehi anupaddutanti attho. sammaadi.t.thiaadiina.m vasena dvicatura"ngo hutvaa ariye nibbaana.m gametiiti ^b^dvecatura"ngagaamina.m,^eb^ gaathaasukhattha~ncettha vibhattialopo katoti da.t.thabba.m. ruupuupapattimaggaadiisu sabbesu maggesu uttamattaa ^b^magguttama.m^eb^. tenaaha bhagavaa -- ``maggaana.t.tha"ngiko se.t.tho''tiaadi (dha0 pa0 273). sabbehi kilesamalehi sattaana.m sodhanato ^b^sabbakilesasodhana.m. pa~n~naaya passitvaa^eb^ti pa.tivedhapa~n~naaya bhaavanaabhisamayavasena abhisamecca.

[03] sokahetuuna.m abhaavato puggalassa ca sokaabhaavahetuto natthi ettha sokoti ^b^asoka.m^eb^. tathaa vigataraagaadirajattaa ^b^viraja.m^eb^. na kenaci paccayena sa"nkhatanti ^b^asa"nkhata.m^eb^. sabbesa.m kilesaana.m sabbassa ca dukkhassa vuupasamabhaavato, sa.msaaradukkhadditehi pajjitabbato adhigantabbato ca ^b^santa.m pada.m^eb^. sabbehi kilesamalehi sattasantaanassa sodhananimittato ^b^sabbakilesasodhana.m. bhaavetii^eb^ti sacchikiriyaabhisamayavasena abhisameti. bahukkhattu~nhi nibbaana.m aarabbha sacchikiriyaabhisamaya.m pavattentassa aalambake labbhamaanavisesaka.m aalambitabbe aaropetvaa eva.m vutta.m. sa.myojanasa"nkhaataana.m bandhanaana.m chedanato ^b^sa.myojanabandhanacchida.m^eb^. nimitta~nhettha kattubhaavena upacaarita.m, yathaa ariyabhaavakaraani saccaani ariyasaccaaniiti. yathaa purimagaathaasu yadaa jhaayati, tadaa ^a^P2.0220^ea^ tato rati.m paramatara.m na vindatiiti yojanaa. eva.m idha yadaa bhaaveti, tadaa tato rati.m paramatara.m na vindatiiti yojanaa.

[03] eva.m thero catuuhi gaathaahi attaana.m anupanetvaava catusaccapa.tivedhakittanena a~n~na.m byaakaritvaa idaani attanaa vasita.t.thaanassa vivittabhaavena phaasuta.m dassento ^b^``yadaa nabhe''^eb^tiaadikaa gaathaa abhaasi. tattha ^b^nabhe^eb^ti aakaase. siniddhagambhiiranigghosataaya meghoyeva dundubhi ^b^meghadundubhi^eb^. samantato paggharantiihi dhaaraahi aakulaati ^b^dhaaraakulaa^eb^. vihagaana.m pakkhiina.m gamanamaggattaa ^b^vihagapathe^eb^ nabheti yojanaa. ^b^tato^eb^ti jhaanaratito.

[03] ^b^kusumaakulaana^eb^nti ^a^M2.0164^ea^ taruuhi ga.litakusumehi samohitaana.m. ^b^vicittavaaneyyava.ta.msakaana^eb^nti vane jaatattaa ^a^V2.0140^ea^ vaaneyyaani vanapupphaani, vicittaani vaaneyyaani va.ta.msakaani etaasanti vicittavaaneyyava.ta.msakaa nadiyo, taasa.m naanaavidhavanapupphava.ta.msakaananti attho. uttarimanussadhammavasena sundaro mano etassaati ^b^sumano^eb^ jhaayati.

[01] ^b^nisiithe^eb^ti rattiya.m. ^b^rahitamhii^eb^ti, janasambaadhavirahite vivitte. ^b^deve^eb^ti meghe. ^b^ga.lantamhii^eb^ti vu.t.thidhaaraayo paggharante vassante. ^b^daa.thino^eb^ti siihabyagghaadayo pa.tipakkhasattaa. te hi daa.thaavudhaati ``daa.thino''ti vuccanti, ^b^nadanti daa.thino^eb^ti idampi janavivekadassanatthameva gahita.m.

[03] ^b^vitakke uparundhiyattano^eb^ti attasantaanapariyaapannataaya attano kaamavitakkaadike micchaavitakke pa.tipakkhabalena nisedhetvaa. attanoti vaa ida.m vindatiiti iminaa yojetabba.m ``tato rati.m paramatara.m attanaa na vindatii''ti. ^b^nagantare^eb^ti pabbatantare. ^b^nagavivara^eb^nti pabbataguha.m pabbhaara.m vaa. ^b^samassito^eb^ti nissito upagato. ^b^viitaddaro^eb^ti vigatakilesadaratho. ^b^viitakhilo^eb^ti pahiinacetokhilo.

[03] ^b^sukhii^eb^ti jhaanaadisukhena sukhito. ^b^malakhilasokanaasano^eb^ti raagaadiina.m malaana.m pa~ncanna~nca cetokhilaana.m ~naativiyogaadihetukassa sokassa ca pahaayako. ^b^niragga.lo^eb^ti, agga.la.m vuccati avijjaa nibbaanapurapavesanivaara.nato, tadabhaavato niragga.lo. ^b^nibbanatho^eb^ti nita.nho. ^b^visallo^eb^ti, vigataraagaadisallo. ^b^sabbaasave^eb^ti, kaamaasavaadike sabbepi aasave. ^b^byantikato^eb^ti byantikataavii ariyamaggena vigatante katvaa .thito di.t.thadhammasukhavihaarattha.m yadaa jhaayati, tato jhaanaratito paramatara.m rati.m na vindatiiti yojanaa. eva.m pana vatvaa thero ajakara.niitiirameva gato.

[03] dasakanipaate ^a^M2.0165^ea^ ^a^V2.0141^ea^ ^a^P2.0221^ea^ ^b^a"ngaarino^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato kaa.ludaayittherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi padumuttarabuddhassa kaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe nibbatto satthu dhammadesana.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m kulappasaadakaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa tajja.m abhiniihaarakamma.m katvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthesi.

[03] so yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto amhaaka.m bodhisattassa maatukucchiya.m pa.tisandhiggaha.nadivase kapilavatthusmi.myeva amaccagehe pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi. bodhisattena saddhi.m ekadivasa.myeva jaatoti ta.mdivasa.myeva na.m dukuulacumba.te nipajjaapetvaa bodhisattassa upa.t.thaana.m nayi.msu. bodhisattena hi saddhi.m bodhirukkho, raahulamaataa, cattaaro nidhii, aarohaniyahatthii, assaka.n.dako, channo kaa.ludaayiiti ime satta ekadivasa.myeva jaatattaa sahajaataa naama ahesu.m. athassa naamaggaha.nadivase sakalanagarassa udaggacittadivase jaatattaa ^b^udaayii^eb^tveva naama.m aka.msu, thoka.m kaa.ladhaatukattaa pana ^b^kaa.ludaayii^eb^ti pa~n~naayittha. so bodhisattena saddhi.m kumaarakii.la.m kii.lanto vuddhi.m agamaasi.

[03] aparabhaage lokanaathe mahaabhinikkhamana.m nikkhamitvaa anukkamena sabba~n~nuta.m patvaa pavattitavaradhammacakke raajagaha.m upanissaaya ve.luvane viharante suddhodanamahaaraajaa ta.m pavatti.m sutvaa purisasahassaparivaara.m eka.m amacca.m ``putta.m me idhaanehii''ti pesesi. so dhammadesanaavelaaya satthu santika.m gantvaa parisapariyante .thito dhamma.m sutvaa sapariso arahatta.m paapu.ni. atha ne satthaa ``etha, bhikkhavo''ti hattha.m pasaareti. sabbe ta"nkha.na.myeva iddhimayapattaciivaradharaa vassasa.t.thikattheraa viya ahesu.m. arahatta.m pattato pa.t.thaaya pana ariyaa majjhattaava honti, tasmaa ra~n~naa pahitasaasana.m dasabalassa na kathesi. raajaa ``neva gatabalako.t.thako aagacchati, na saasana.m suyyatii''ti aparampi amacca.m purisasahassena ^a^M2.0166^ea^ pesesi ^a^V2.0142^ea^. tasmimpi tathaa pa.tipanne aparanti eva.m navahi amaccehi saddhi.m nava purisasahassaani pesesi sabbe arahatta.m patvaa tu.nhii ahesu.m.

[03] atha raajaa cintesi -- ``ettakaa janaa mayi sinehaabhaavena dasabalassa idhaagamanatthaaya na ki~nci kathayi.msu, aya.m kho pana udaayii dasabalena samavayo sahapa.msukii.liko, mayi ca sinehavaa, ima.m pesessaamii''ti ta.m pakkosaapetvaa, ``taata, tva.m purisasahassaparivaaro raajagaha.m gantvaa dasabala.m aanehii''ti vatvaa pesesi. so pana gacchanto ``sacaaha.m, deva, pabbajitu.m labhissaami, evaaha.m bhagavanta.m idhaanessaamii''ti ^a^P2.0222^ea^ vatvaa ``ya.m ki~nci katvaa mama putta.m dassehii''ti vutto raajagaha.m gantvaa satthu dhammadesanaavelaaya parisapariyante .thito dhamma.m sutvaa saparivaaro arahatta.m patvaa ehibhikkhubhaave pati.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.4.48-63) --
[22] sudukkara.m kata.m tena, yo me puppha.m adaasida.m..
[22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
[22] udaayii naama naamena, hessati satthu saavako..
[21] ``raago doso ca moho ca, maano makkho ca dha.msito.

[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa ``na taavaaya.m dasabalassa kulanagara.m gantu.m kaalo, vasante pana upagate pupphitesu vanasa.n.desu haritati.nasa~nchannaaya bhuumiyaa gamanakaalo bhavissatii''ti kaala.m pa.timaanento vasante sampatte satthu kulanagara.m gantu.m gamanamaggava.n.na.m sa.mva.n.nento --
[21] ``a"ngaarino daani dumaa bhadante, phalesino chadana.m vippahaaya.
[22] te accimantova pabhaasayanti, samayo mahaaviira bhaagiirasaana.m..
[22] patta.m pahaaya phalamaasasaanaa, kaalo ito pakkamanaaya viira..
[21] ``nevaatisiita.m na panaatiu.nha.m, sukhaa utu addhaniyaa bhadante.
[22] passantu ta.m saakiyaa ko.liyaa ca, pacchaamukha.m rohiniya.m taranta.m..
[22] yaaya aasaaya ti.t.thaami, saa me aasaa samijjhatu..
[22] punappuna.m khetta.m kasanti kassakaa, punappuna.m dha~n~namupeti ra.t.tha.m..
[21] ``viiro ^a^V2.0144^ea^ ^a^P2.0223^ea^ have sattayuga.m puneti, yasmi.m kule jaayati bhuuripa~n~no.
[22] ma~n~naamaha.m sakkati devadevo, tayaa hi jaato muni saccanaamo..
[21] ``suddhodano naama pitaa mahesino, buddhassa maataa pana maayanaamaa.
[22] yaa bodhisatta.m parihariya kucchinaa, kaayassa bhedaa tidivamhi modati..
[21] ``saa gotamii kaalakataa ito cutaa, dibbehi kaamehi sama"ngibhuutaa.
[22] saa modati kaamagu.nehi pa~ncahi, parivaaritaa devaga.nehi tehi..
[22] pitupitaa mayha.m tuva.msi sakka, dhammena me gotama ayyakosii''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^a"ngaarino^eb^ti a"ngaaraani viyaati a"ngaaraani, rattapavaa.lava.n.naani rukkhaana.m pupphapallavaani, taani etesa.m santiiti a"ngaarino, atilohitakusumakisalayehi a"ngaaravu.t.thisa.mpariki.n.naa viyaati attho. ^b^idaanii^eb^ti imasmi.m kaale. ^b^dumaa^eb^ti rukkhaa. bhadanteti, bhadda.m ante etassaati bhadanteti ekassa dakaarassa lopa.m katvaa vuccati, gu.navisesayutto, gu.navisesayuttaana~nca aggabhuuto satthaa. tasmaa bhadanteti satthu aalapana.m. paccattavacana~nceta.m ekaaranta.m ``suka.te pa.tikamme sukhe dukkhepi ce''tiaadiisu viya. idha pana sambodhanatthe da.t.thabba.m. tena vutta.m ``bhadanteti aalapana''nti. ``bhaddasaddasamaanattha.m padantarameka''nti keci. phalaani esantiiti ^b^phalesino^eb^. acetanepi hi sacetanakiriyamaaropetvaa voharanti, yathaa kula.m patitukaamanti, phalaani gahetumaaraddhaa sampattiphalagaha.nakaalaati attho. ^b^chadana.m vippahaayaa^eb^ti puraa.napa.n.naani pajahitvaa sampannapa.n.dupalaasaati attho. ^b^te^eb^ti dumaa. ^b^accimantova pabhaasayantii^eb^ti diipasikhaavanto viya jalitaaggii viya vaa obhaasayanti sabbaa disaati adhippaayo. ^b^samayo^eb^ti kaalo, ``anuggahaayaa''ti vacanaseso. ^b^mahaaviiraa^eb^ti mahaavikkanta. ^b^bhaagii rasaana^eb^nti attharasaadiina.m bhaagii. vutta~nheta.m dhammasenaapatinaa -- ``bhaagii vaa bhagavaa attharasassa dhammarasassaa''tiaadi (cuu.lani0 ajitamaa.navapucchaaniddesa 2). mahaaviira, bhaagiiti ca idampi dvaya.m sambodhanavacana.m da.t.thabba.m. bhaagiirathaananti pana paa.the bhagiiratho naama ^a^P2.0224^ea^ aadiraajaa. tabba.msajaatataaya saakiyaa bhaagiirathaa, tesa.m bhaagiirathaana.m upakaaratthanti adhippaayo.

[03] ^b^dumaanii^eb^ti li"ngavipallaasena vutta.m, dumaa rukkhaati attho. ^b^samantato sabbadisaa pavantii^eb^ti, samantato sabbabhaagato sabbadisaasu ca phullaani, tathaa phullattaa eva sabbadisaa pavanti gandha.m vissajjenti. ^b^aasamaanaa^eb^ti aasiisantaa ^a^M2.0170^ea^ gahitukaamaa. eva.m rukkhasobhaaya gamanamaggassa ^a^V2.0145^ea^ raama.neyyata.m dassetvaa idaani ^b^``nevaatisiita''^eb^ntiaadinaa utusampatti.m dasseti. ^b^sukhaa^eb^ti naatisiitanaatiu.nhabhaaveneva sukhaa i.t.thaa. ^b^utu addhaniyaa^eb^ti addhaanagamanayoggaa utu. ^b^passantu ta.m saakiyaa ko.liyaa ca, pacchaamukha.m rohiniya.m taranta^eb^nti rohinii naama nadii saakiyako.liyajanapadaana.m antare uttaradisato dakkhi.namukhaa sandati, raajagaha.m cassaa puratthimadakkhi.naaya disaaya, tasmaa raajagahato kapilavatthu.m gantu.m ta.m nadi.m tarantaa pacchaamukhaa hutvaa taranti. tenaaha ``passantu ta.m...pe0... taranta''nti. ``bhagavanta.m pacchaamukha.m rohini.m naama nadi.m atikkamanta.m saakiyako.liyajanapadavaasino passantuu''ti kapilavatthugamanaaya bhagavanta.m aayaacanto ussaaheti.

[03] idaani attano patthana.m upamaahi pakaasento ^b^``aasaaya kasate''^eb^ti gaathamaaha. ^b^aasaaya kasate khetta^eb^nti kassako kasanto khetta.m phalaasaaya kasati. ^b^biija.m aasaaya vappatii^eb^ti kasitvaa ca vapantena phalaasaaya eva biija.m vappati nikkhipiiyati. ^b^aasaaya vaa.nijaa yantii^eb^ti dhanahaarakaa vaa.nijaa dhanaasaaya samudda.m taritu.m desa.m upagantu.m samudda.m naavaaya yanti gacchanti. ^b^yaaya aasaaya ti.t.thaamii^eb^ti eva.m ahampi yaaya aasaaya patthanaaya bhagavaa tumhaaka.m kapilapuragamanapatthanaaya idha ti.t.thaami. saa me aasaa samijjhatu, tumhehi ``kapilavatthu gantabba''nti vadati, aasaaya sadisataaya cettha kattukamyataachanda.m aasaati aaha.

[03] gamanamaggasa.mva.n.nanaadinaa anekavaara.m yaacanaaya kaara.na.m dassetu.m ^b^``punappuna''^eb^ntiaadi vutta.m. tassattho -- saki.m vuttamattena vappe asampajjamaane kassakaa ^b^punappuna.m^eb^ dutiyampi tatiyampi biija.m vapanti. pajjunno ^b^devaraajaa^eb^pi ekavaarameva avassitvaa ^b^punappuna.m^eb^ kaalena kaala.m vassati. kassakaapi ekavaarameva akasitvaa sassasampattiattha.m pa.msu.m kaddama.m vaa mudu.m kaatu.m khetta.m punappuna.m kasanti. ekavaarameva dha~n~na.m sa"ngaha.m katvaa ^a^P2.0225^ea^ ``alamettaavataa''ti aparitussanato ko.t.thaagaaraadiisu pa.tisaamanavasena manussehi upaniiyamaana.m punappuna.m saaliaadi^b^dha~n~na.m^eb^ ra.t.tha.m ^b^upeti^eb^ upagacchati.

[03] ^b^yaacanakaa^eb^pi ^a^M2.0171^ea^ yaacantaa punappuna.m kulaani ^b^caranti^eb^ upagacchanti, na ekavaarameva, yaacitaa pana tesa.m punappuna.m daanapatii dadanti, na saki.myeva. tathaa pana deyyadhamma.m punappuna.m daanapatii ^b^daditvaa^eb^ daanamaya.m pu~n~na.m upacinitvaa ^b^punappuna.m^eb^ aparaapara.m ^b^saggamupenti .thaana.m^eb^ pa.tisandhivasena devaloka.m upagacchanti. tasmaa ahampi punappuna.m yaacaami bhagavaa mayha.m manoratha.m matthaka.m paapehiiti adhippaayo.

[03] idaani ^a^V2.0146^ea^ yadattha.m satthaara.m kapilavatthugamana.m yaacati, ta.m dassetu.m ^b^``viiro have''^eb^tigaathamaaha. tassattho -- ^b^viiro^eb^ viiriyavaa mahaavikkanto ^b^bhuuripa~n~no^eb^ mahaapa~n~no puriso ^b^yasmi.m^eb^ kule ^b^jaayati^eb^ nibbattati, tattha ^b^have^eb^ eka.msena ^b^sattayuga.m^eb^ sattapurisayuga.m yaavasattama.m pitaamahayuga.m sammaapa.tipattiyaa ^b^puneti^eb^ sodhetiiti lokavaado ativaado a~n~nesu. bhagavaa pana sabbesa.m devaana.m uttamadevataaya ^b^devadevo^eb^ paapanivaara.nena kalyaa.napati.t.thaapanena tato parampi sodhetu.m ^b^sakkati^eb^ sakkotiiti ma~n~naami aha.m. kasmaa? ^b^tayaa hi jaato muni saccanaamo^eb^ yasmaa tayaa satthaaraa ariyaaya jaatiyaa jaato munibhaavo, muni vaa samaano attahitaparahitaana.m idhalokaparalokaana~nca munana.t.thena ``munii''ti avitathanaamo, monavaa vaa muni, ``sama.no pabbajito isii''ti avitathanaamo tayaa jaato. tasmaa sattaana.m ekantahitapa.tilaabhahetubhaavato bhagavaa tava tattha gamana.m yaacaamaati attho.

[03] idaani ``sattayuga''nti vutte pituyuga.m dassetu.m ^b^``suddhodano naamaa''^eb^tiaadi vutta.m. suddha.m odana.m jiivana.m etassaati ^b^suddhodano^eb^. buddhapitaa hi eka.msato suvisuddhakaayavaciimanosamaacaaro suvisuddhaajiivo hoti tathaa abhiniihaarasampannattaa. ^b^maayanaamaa^eb^ti kularuupasiilaacaaraadisampattiyaa ~naatimittaadiihi ``maa yaahii''ti vattabbagu.nataaya ``maayaa''ti laddhanaamaa. ^b^parihariyaa^eb^ti dhaaretvaa. ^b^kaayassa bhedaa^eb^ti sadevakassa lokassa cetiyasadisassa attano kaayassa vinaasato uddha.m. ^b^tidivamhii^eb^ti tusitadevaloke.

[03] ^b^saa^eb^ti maayaadevii. ^b^gotamii^eb^ti gottena ta.m kitteti. ^b^dibbehi kaamehii^eb^ti, tusitabhavanapariyaapannehi dibbehi vatthukaamehi. ^b^sama"ngibhuutaa^eb^ti samannaagataa. ^b^kaamagu.nehii^eb^ti kaamako.t.thaasehi, ``kaamehii''ti vatvaa ^a^M2.0172^ea^ puna ``kaamagu.nehii''ti vacanena anekabhaagehi vatthukaamehi paricaariyatiiti diipeti. ^b^tehii^eb^ti yasmi.m devanikaaye nibbatti, tehi tusitadevaga.nehi, tehi vaa kaamagu.nehi. ``sama"ngibhuutaa parivaaritaa''ti ca ^a^P2.0226^ea^ itthili"nganiddeso purimattabhaavasiddha.m itthibhaava.m, devataabhaava.m vaa sandhaaya kato, devuupapatti pana purisabhaaveneva jaataa.

[03] eva.m therena yaacito bhagavaa tattha gamane bahuuna.m visesaadhigama.m disvaa viisatisahassa khii.naasavaparivuto raajagahato aturitacaarikaavasena kapilavatthugaamimagga.m pa.tipajji. thero iddhiyaa kapilavatthu.m gantvaa ra~n~no purato aakaase .thito adi.t.thapubba.m vesa.m disvaa ra~n~naa ``kosi ^a^V2.0147^ea^ tva''nti pucchito, ``sace amaccaputta.m tayaa bhagavato santika.m pesita.m ma.m na jaanaasi, eva.m pana jaanaahii''ti dassento --
[22] pitupitaa mayha.m tuva.msi sakka, dhammena me gotama ayyakosii''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^buddhassa puttomhii^eb^ti, sabba~n~nubuddhassa ure jaatataaya orasaputto amhi. ^b^asayhasaahino^eb^ti, abhisambodhito pubbe .thapetvaa mahaabodhisatta.m a~n~nehi sahitu.m vahitu.m asakku.neyyattaa asayhassa sakalassa bodhisambhaarassa mahaakaaru.nikaadhikaarassa ca sahanato vahanato, tato parampi a~n~nehi sahitu.m abhibhavitu.m asakku.neyyattaa asayhaana.m pa~ncanna.m maaraana.m sahanato abhibhavanato, aasayaanusayacaritaadhimuttiaadivibhaagaavabodhanena yathaaraha.m veneyyaana.m di.t.thadhammikasamparaayikaparamatthehi anusaasaniisa"nkhaatassa a~n~nehi asayhassa buddhakiccassa ca sahanato, tattha vaa saadhukaariibhaavato asayhasaahino. ^b^a"ngiirasassaa^eb^ti a"ngiikatasiilaadisampattikassa. ``a"ngama"ngehi nicchara.nakaobhaasassaa''ti apare. keci pana ``a"ngiiraso, siddhatthoti dve ^a^M2.0173^ea^ naamaani pitaraayeva gahitaanii''ti vadanti. ^b^appa.timassaa^eb^ti anuupamassa. i.t.thaani.t.thesu taadilakkha.nappattiyaa ^b^taadino. pitupitaa mayha.m tuva.msii^eb^ti ariyajaativasena mayha.m pitu sammaasambuddhassa lokavohaarena tva.m pitaa asi. ^b^sakkaa^eb^ti jaativasena raajaana.m aalapati. ^b^dhammenaa^eb^ti sabhaavena ariyajaati lokiyajaatiiti dvinna.m jaatiina.m sabhaavasamodhaanena ^b^gotamaa^eb^ti raajaana.m gottena aalapati. ^b^ayyakosii^eb^ti pitaamaho asi. ettha ca ``buddhassa puttomhii''tiaadi.m vadanto thero a~n~na.m byaakaasi.

[03] eva.m ^a^P2.0227^ea^ pana attaana.m jaanaapetvaa ha.t.thatu.t.thena ra~n~naa mahaarahe palla"nke nisiidaapetvaa attano pa.tiyaaditassa naanaggarasassa bhojanassa patta.m puuretvaa dinne gamanaakaara.m dasseti. ``kasmaa gantukaamattha, bhu~njathaa''ti ca vutte, ``satthu santika.m gantvaa bhu~njissaamii''ti. ``kaha.m pana satthaa''ti? ``viisatisahassabhikkhuparivaaro tumhaaka.m dassanatthaaya magga.m pa.tipanno''ti. ``tumhe ima.m pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njitvaa yaava mama putto ima.m nagara.m sampaapu.naati, taavassa itova pi.n.dapaata.m harathaa''ti. thero bhattakicca.m katvaa ra~n~no parisaaya ca dhamma.m kathetvaa satthu aagamanato puretarameva sakala.m raajanivesana.m ratanattaye abhippasanna.m karonto sabbesa.m passantaana.myeva satthu aaharitabbabhattapu.n.na.m patta.m aakaase vissajjetvaa sayampi vehaasa.m abbhuggantvaa ^a^V2.0148^ea^ pi.n.dapaata.m upanetvaa satthu hatthe .thapesi. satthaa ta.m pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~nji. eva.m sa.t.thiyojana.m magga.m divase divase yojana.m gacchantassa satthu raajagehatova bhatta.m aaharitvaa adaasi. atha na.m bhagavaa ``mayha.m pitu mahaaraajassa sakalanivesana.m pasaadesii''ti kulappasaadakaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.

[03] ^b^purato^eb^ ^a^M2.0174^ea^ ^b^pacchato vaa^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato ekavihaariyattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto kassapadasabalassa kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa vivekavaasa.m vasi.

[03] so tena pu~n~nakammena eka.m buddhantara.m devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade bhagavati parinibbute dhammaasokara~n~no kani.t.thabhaataa hutvaa nibbatti. asokamahaaraajaa kira satthu parinibbaanato dvinna.m vassasataana.m upari a.t.thaarasame vasse sakalajambudiipe ekarajjaabhiseka.m patvaa attano kani.t.tha.m tissakumaara.m oparajje .thapetvaa ekena upaayena ta.m saasane abhippasanna.m akaasi. so ekadivasa.m migava.m gato ara~n~ne yonakamahaadhammarakkhitatthera.m hatthinaagena saalasaakha.m gahetvaa biijiyamaana.m nisinna.m disvaa sa~njaatapasaado ``aho vataahampi aya.m mahaathero viya pabbajitvaa ara~n~ne vihareyya''nti cintesi. thero ^a^P2.0228^ea^ tassa cittaacaara.m ~natvaa tassa passantasseva aakaasa.m abbhuggantvaa asokaaraame pokkhara.niyaa abhijjamaane udake .thatvaa ciivara~nca uttaraasa"nga~nca aakaase olaggetvaa nhaayitu.m aarabhi. kumaaro therassa aanubhaava.m disvaa abhippasanno ara~n~nato nivattitvaa raajageha.m gantvaa ``pabbajissaamii''ti ra~n~no aarocesi. raajaa ta.m anekappakaara.m yaacitvaa pabbajjaadhippaaya.m nivattetu.m naasakkhi. so upaasako hutvaa pabbajjaasukha.m patthento --
[21] ``purato pacchato vaapi, aparo ce na vijjati.
[22] atiiva phaasu bhavati, ekassa vasato vane..

[03] tattha ^b^purato pacchato vaa^eb^ti attano purato vaa pacchato vaa, ^b^vaa^eb^-saddassa vikappatthattaa passato vaa ^b^aparo^eb^ a~n~no jano na vijjati ce, ^b^atiiva^eb^ ativiya ^b^phaasu^eb^ cittasukha.m bhavati. ekavihaariibhaavena ^b^ekassa^eb^ asahaayassa. ^b^vane vasato^eb^ti ciraparicitena vivekajjhaasayena aaka.d.dhiyamaanahadayo so rattindiva.m mahaajanaparivutassa vasato sa"nga.nikavihaara.m nibbindanto vivekasukha~nca bahu.m ma~n~nanto vadati.

[03] ^b^handaa^eb^ti vossaggatthe nipaato, tena idaani kariiyamaanassa ara~n~nagamanassa nicchitabhaavamaaha. ^b^eko gamissaamii^eb^ti ``su~n~naagaare kho, gahapati, tathaagataa abhiramantii''tiaadivacanato (cuu.lava0 306) buddhehi va.n.nita.m pasa.t.tha.m ara~n~na.m eko asahaayo gamissaami vaasaadhippaayena upagacchaami. yasmaa ^b^ekavihaarissa^eb^ .thaanaadiisu asahaayabhaavena ekavihaarissa nibbaana.m pa.tipesitacittataaya ^b^pahitattassa^eb^ adhisiilasikkhaadikaa tisso sikkhaa sikkhato bhikkhuno ara~n~na.m ^b^phaasu^eb^ i.t.tha.m sukhaavahanti attho.

[03] ^b^yogii-piitikara^eb^nti yogiina.m bhaavanaaya yuttappayuttaana.m appasaddaadibhaavena jhaanavipassanaadipiiti.m aavahanato yogii-piitikara.m. visabhaagaaramma.naabhaavena pa.tisallaanasaaruppataaya ^b^ramma.m. mattaku~njarasevita^eb^nti ^a^P2.0229^ea^ mattavaravaara.navicarita.m, iminaapi brahaara~n~nabhaavena janaviveka.myeva dasseti. ^b^atthavasii^eb^ti idha atthoti sama.nadhammo adhippeto. ``katha.m nu kho so me bhaveyyaa''ti tassa vasa.m gato.

[03] ^b^supupphite^eb^ti ^a^M2.0176^ea^ ^a^V2.0150^ea^ su.t.thu pupphite. ^b^siitavane^eb^ti chaayuudakasampattiyaa siite vane. ubhayenapi tassa rama.niiyata.myeva vibhaaveti. ^b^girikandare^eb^ti giriina.m abbhantare kandare. kanti hi udaka.m, tena daarita.m ninna.t.thaana.m kandara.m naama. taadise siitale girikandare ghammaparitaapa.m vinodetvaa attano gattaani parisi~ncitvaa nhaayitvaa ca"nkamissaami ekakoti katthaci anaayattavuttita.m dasseti.

[03] ^b^ekaakiyo^eb^ti ekaakii asahaayo. ^b^adutiyo^eb^ti ta.nhaasa"nkhaatadutiyaabhaavena adutiyo. ta.nhaa hi purisassa sabbadaa avijahana.t.thena dutiyaa naama. tenaaha bhagavaa -- ``ta.nhaadutiyo puriso, diighamaddhaana sa.msara''nti (itivu0 15, 105).

[03] ^b^eva.m me kattukaamassaa^eb^ti ``handa eko gamissaamii''tiaadinaa vuttavidhinaa ara~n~na.m gantvaa bhaavanaabhiyoga.m kattukaamassa me. ^b^adhippaayo samijjhatuu^eb^ti ``kadaaha.m viharissaami, katakicco anaasavo''ti eva.m pavatto manoratho ijjhatu siddhi.m paapu.naatu. arahattappatti ca yasmaa na aayaacanamattena sijjhati, naapi a~n~nena saadhetabbaa, tasmaa aaha ^b^``saadhayissaamaha.myeva, naa~n~no a~n~nassa kaarako''^eb^ti.

[03] eva.m uparaajassa pabbajjaaya da.lhanicchayata.m ~natvaa raajaa asokaaraamagamaniiya.m magga.m ala"nkaaraapetvaa kumaara.m sabbaala"nkaaravibhuusita.m mahatiyaa senaaya mahaccaraajaanubhaavena vihaara.m nesi. kumaaro padhaanaghara.m gantvaa mahaadhammarakkhitattherassa santike pabbaji, anekasataa manussaa ta.m anupabbaji.msu. ra~n~no bhaagineyyo sa"nghamittaaya saamiko aggibrahmaapi tameva anupabbaji. so pabbajitvaa ha.t.thatu.t.tho attanaa kaatabba.m pakaasento --

[03] tattha ^b^esa bandhaami sannaaha^eb^nti esaaha.m viiriyasa"nkhaata.m sannaaha.m bandhaami, kaaye ca ^a^V2.0151^ea^ jiivite ca nirapekkho viiriyasannaahena sannayhaami. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- yathaa naama suuro puriso paccatthike paccupa.t.thite ^a^P2.0230^ea^ ta.m jetukaamo a~n~na.m kicca.m pahaaya kavacapa.timuccanaadinaa yuddhaaya sannayhati, yuddhabhuumi~nca gantvaa paccatthike ajetvaa tato na nivattati, evamahampi kilesapaccatthike jetu.m aadittampi siisa.m cela~nca ajjhupekkhitvaa catubbidhasammappadhaanaviiriyasannaaha.m sannayhaami, kilese ajetvaa kilesavijayayogga.m viveka.t.thaana.m na vissajjemiiti. tena vutta.m ^b^``pavisissaami kaanana.m na tato nikkhamissaami, appatto aasavakkhaya''^eb^nti.

[03] ^b^``maalute upavaayante''^eb^tiaadinaa ara~n~na.t.thaanassa kamma.t.thaanabhaavanaayogyata.m vadati, ramissaami nuuna giribbajeti yojanaa. pabbataparikkhepe abhiramissaami ma~n~neti anaagatattha.m parikappento vadati. sesa.m suvi~n~neyyameva.

[03] eva.m vatvaa thero ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa sama.nadhamma.m karonto upajjhaayena saddhi.m kali"ngara.t.tha.m agamaasi. tatthassa paade cammikaabaadho uppajji, ta.m disvaa eko vejjo ``sappi.m, bhante, pariyesatha, tikicchissaami na''nti aaha. thero sappipariyesana.m akatvaa vipassanaaya eva kamma.m karoti, rogo va.d.dhati, vejjo therassa tattha appossukkata.m disvaa sayameva sappi.m pariyesitvaa thera.m aroga.m akaasi. so arogo hutvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.44.1-12) --
[22] kassapo naama gottena, uppajji vadata.m varo..
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa there tattha viharante raajaa ko.tidhanapariccaagena bhojakagirivihaara.m naama kaaretvaa thera.m tattha vaasesi. so tattha viharanto parinibbaanakaale --
[25] osaanagaathamaaha. saa uttaanatthaava. tadeva ca therassa a~n~naabyaakara.na.m ahosiiti.

[03] ^b^anaagata.m^eb^ ^a^M2.0179^ea^ ^b^yo pa.tikacca passatii^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato mahaakappinattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiinagare kulaghare nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto satthu santike dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m bhikkhuovaadakaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m ^a^P2.0231^ea^ disvaa tajja.m adhikaarakamma.m katvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthesi.

[03] so tattha yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto kassapasammaasambuddhakaale baaraa.nasiya.m kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto purisasahassaga.naje.t.thako hutvaa gabbhasahassapa.tima.n.dita.m mahanta.m parive.na.m kaaraapesi. te sabbepi janaa yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa ta.m ^a^V2.0153^ea^ upaasaka.m je.t.thaka.m katvaa saputtadaaraa devaloke nibbattitvaa eka.m buddhantara.m devamanussesu sa.msari.msu. tesu ga.naje.t.thako amhaaka.m satthu nibbattito puretarameva paccantadese kukku.tanaamake nagare raajagehe nibbatti, tassa ^b^kappino^eb^ti naama.m ahosi. sesapurisaa tasmi.myeva nagare amaccakule nibbatti.msu. kappinakumaaro pitu accayena chatta.m ussaapetvaa mahaakappinaraajaa naama jaato. so sutavittakataaya paatova catuuhi dvaarehi siigha.m duute pesesi -- ``yattha bahussute passatha, tato nivattitvaa mayha.m aarocethaa''ti.

[03] tena ca samayena amhaaka.m satthaa loke uppajjitvaa saavatthi.m upanissaaya viharati. tasmi.m kaale saavatthivaasino vaa.nijaa saavatthiya.m u.t.thaanakabha.n.da.m gahetvaa ta.m nagara.m gantvaa bha.n.da.m pa.tisaametvaa ``raajaana.m passissaamaa''ti pa.n.naakaarahatthaa ra~n~no aarocaapesu.m. te raajaa pakkosaapetvaa niyyaaditapa.n.naakaare vanditvaa .thite ``kuto aagatatthaa''ti pucchi. ``saavatthito, devaa''ti. ``kacci vo ra.t.tha.m subhikkha.m, dhammiko raajaa''ti? ``aama, devaa''ti. ``kiidiso dhammo tumhaaka.m dese idaani pavattatii''ti? ``ta.m, deva, na sakkaa ucchi.t.thamukhehi kathetu''nti. raajaa suva.n.nabhi"ngaarena udaka.m daapesi. te mukha.m vikkhaaletvaa dasabalaabhimukhaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa, ``deva, amhaaka.m dese buddharatana.m naama uppanna''nti ^a^M2.0180^ea^ aaha.msu. ra~n~no ``buddho''ti vacane sutamatteyeva sakalasariira.m pharamaanaa piiti uppajji. tato ``buddhoti, taataa, vadethaa''ti aaha. ``buddhoti, deva, vadaamaa''ti. eva.m tikkhattu.m vadaapetvaa ``buddhoti pada.m aparimaa.na''nti tasmi.myeva pade pasanno satasahassa.m datvaa ``apara.m vadethaa''ti pucchi. ``deva, loke dhammaratana.m naama uppanna''nti. tampi ^a^P2.0232^ea^ sutvaa tatheva satasahassa.m datvaa ``apara.m vadethaa''ti pucchi. ``deva, sa"ngharatana.m naama uppanna''nti. tampi sutvaa tatheva satasahassa.m datvaa ``buddhassa bhagavato santike pabbajissaamii''ti tatova nikkhami. amaccaapi tatheva nikkhami.msu. so amaccasahassena saddhi.m ga"ngaatiira.m patvaa ``sace satthaa sammaasambuddho, imesa.m assaana.m khuramattampi maa temetuu''ti saccaadhi.t.thaana.m katvaa udakapi.t.theneva puura.m ga"ngaanadi.m atikkamitvaa aparampi a.d.dhayojanavitthaara.m nadi.m tatheva atikkamitvaa tatiya.m candabhaaga.m naama mahaanadi.m patvaa tampi taaya eva saccakiriyaaya atikkami.

[03] satthaapi ta.mdivasa.m paccuusasamaya.myeva mahaakaru.naasamaapattito vu.t.thaaya loka.m volokento ``ajja mahaakappino tiyojanasatika.m rajja.m pahaaya amaccasahassaparivaaro mama santike pabbajitu.m aagamissatii''ti disvaa ``mayaa tesa.m paccuggamana.m kaatu.m yutta''nti paatova sariirapa.tijaggana.m katvaa bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto ^a^V2.0154^ea^ sayameva aakaasena gantvaa candabhaagaaya nadiyaa tiire tesa.m uttara.natitthassaabhimukha.t.thaane mahaanigrodhamuule palla"nkena nisinno chabba.n.nabuddharasmiyo vissajjesi. te tena titthena uttarantaa buddharasmiyo ito cito ca vidhaavantiyo olokento bhagavanta.m disvaa ``ya.m satthaara.m uddissa maya.m aagataa, addhaa so eso''ti dassaneneva ni.t.tha.m gantvaa di.t.tha.t.thaanato pa.t.thaaya onamitvaa paramanipaccaakaara.m karontaa bhagavanta.m upasa"nkami.msu. raajaa bhagavato gopphakesu gahetvaa satthaara.m vanditvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi saddhi.m amaccasahassena. satthaa tesa.m dhamma.m desesi. desanaapariyosaane saddhi.m parisaaya arahatte pati.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.54.66-107) --
[22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
[22] kappino naama naamena, hessati satthu saavako..
[22] tato cutaa maya.m sabbe, ahumha tidasuupagaa..
[21] ``suyuttaa tassa sissaa ca, sumuttaa ca anaasavaa.
[21] ``satasahasse kata.m kamma.m, phala.m dassesi me idha.

[03] arahatta.m ^a^M2.0184^ea^ patvaa pana te sabbeva satthaara.m pabbajja.m yaaci.msu. satthaa te ``etha, bhikkhavo''ti aaha. saa eva tesa.m pabbajjaa upasampadaa ca ahosi. satthaa ta.m bhikkhusahassa.m aadaaya aakaasena jetavana.m agamaasi. athekadivasa.m bhagavaa tassantevaasike bhikkhuu aaha -- ``kacci, bhikkhave, kappino bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m desetii''ti? ``na, bhagavaa, deseti ^a^V2.0157^ea^. appossukko di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaramanuyutto viharati, ovaadamattampi na detii''ti. satthaa ^a^P2.0233^ea^ thera.m pakkosaapetvaa -- ``sacca.m kira tva.m, kappina, antevaasikaana.m ovaadamattampi na desii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. ``braahma.na, maa eva.m kari, ajja pa.t.thaaya upagataana.m dhamma.m desehii''ti. ``saadhu, bhante''ti thero satthu vacana.m sirasaa sampa.ticchitvaa ekovaadeneva sama.nasahassa.m arahatte pati.t.thaapesi. tena na.m satthaa pa.tipaa.tiyaa attano saavake there .thaanantare .thapento bhikkhuovaadakaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesi. athekadivasa.m thero bhikkhuniyo ovadanto --
[21] ``anaagata.m yo pa.tikacca passati, hita~nca attha.m ahita~nca ta.m dvaya.m.
[22] viddesino tassa hitesino vaa, randha.m na passanti samekkhamaanaa..
[22] soma.m loka.m pabhaaseti, abbhaa muttova candimaa..
[22] pa~n~naaya ca alaabhena, vittavaapi na jiivati..
[22] pa~n~naasahito naro idha, api dukkhesu sukhaani vindati..
[22] yattha jaayetha miiyetha, tattha ki.m viya abbhuta.m..
[22] jaataa jaataa marantiidha, eva.m dhammaa hi paa.nino..
[21] ``na hetadatthaaya matassa hoti, ya.m jiivitattha.m paraporisaana.m.
[22] matamhi ru.n.na.m na yaso na lokya.m, na va.n.nita.m sama.nabraahma.nehi..
[21] ``cakkhu.m sariira.m upahanti tena, nihiiyati va.n.nabala.m matii ca.
[22] aanandino tassa disaa bhavanti, hitesino naassa sukhii bhavanti..
[21] ``tasmaa hi iccheyya kule vasante, medhaavino ceva bahussute ca.
[22] yesa~nhi pa~n~naavibhavena kicca.m, taranti naavaaya nadi.mva pu.n.na''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^a^V2.0158^ea^ ^a^P2.0234^ea^ ^b^anaagata^eb^nti na aagata.m, avindanti, attho. ^b^pa.tikaccaa^eb^ti putetara.myeva. ^b^passatii^eb^ti oloketi. ^b^attha^eb^nti kicca.m. ^b^ta.m dvaya^eb^nti hitaahita.m. ^b^viddesino^eb^ti amittaa. ^b^hitesino^eb^ti mittaa. ^b^randha^eb^nti chidda.m. ^b^samekkhamaanaa^eb^ti gavesantaa. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- yo puggalo attano hitaavaha.m ahitaavaha.m tadubhaya~nca attha.m kicca.m anaagata.m asampatta.m puretara.myeva pa~n~naacakkhunaa aha.m viya passati viima.msati vicaareti, tassa amittaa vaa ahitajjhaasayena mittaa vaa hitajjhaasayena randha.m gavesantaa na passanti, taadiso pa~n~navaa puggalo acchiddavutti, tasmaa tumhehi tathaaruupehi bhavitabbanti.

[03] idaani aanaapaanasatibhaavanaaya gu.na.m dassento tattha taani yojetu.m ^b^``aanaapaanasatii yassaa''^eb^ti dutiya.m gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^aana^eb^nti ^a^M2.0186^ea^ assaaso. ^b^apaana^eb^nti passaaso. assaasapassaasanimittaaramma.naa sati aanaapaanasati. satisiisena cettha ta.msampayuttasamaadhibhaavanaa adhippetaa. ^b^yassaa^eb^ti, yassa yogino. ^b^paripu.n.naa subhaavitaa^eb^ti catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m so.lasanna~nca aakaaraana.m paaripuuriyaa sabbaso pu.n.naa sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m vijjaavimuttiina~nca paaripuuriyaa su.t.thu bhaavitaa va.d.dhitaa. ^b^anupubba.m paricitaa, yathaa buddhena desitaa^eb^ti ``so satova assasatii''tiaadinaa (dii0 ni0 2.374; ma0 ni0 1.107) yathaa bhagavataa desitaa, tathaa anupubba.m anukkamena paricitaa aasevitaa bhaavitaa. ^b^soma.m loka.m pabhaaseti, abbhaa muttova candimaa^eb^ti so yogaavacaro yathaa abbhaadiupakkilesaa vimutto cando candaalokena ima.m okaasaloka.m pabhaaseti, eva.m avijjaadiupakkilesavimutto ~naa.naalokena attasantaanapatita.m parasantaanapatita~nca sa"nkhaaraloka.m pabhaaseti pakaaseti. tasmaa tumhehi aanaapaanasatibhaavanaa bhaavetabbaati adhippaayo.

[03] idaani attaana.m nidassana.m katvaa bhaavanaabhiyogassa saphalata.m dassento ^b^``odaata.m vata me citta''^eb^nti tatiya.m gaathamaaha. tassattho -- niivara.namalavigamato ^b^odaata.m^eb^ suddha.m vata mama citta.m. yathaa pamaa.nakaraa raagaadayo pahiinaa, appamaa.na~nca nibbaana.m paccakkha.m kata.m ahosi, tathaa bhaavitattaa ^b^appamaa.na.m subhaavita.m,^eb^ tato eva catusacca.m ^b^nibbiddha.m^eb^ pa.tivijjhita.m, sakalasa.mkilesapakkhato ^b^paggahita~nca^eb^ hutvaa dukkhaadikaa pubbantaadikaa ca disaa obhaasate tattha viti.n.naka"nkhattaa sabbadhammesu vigatasammohattaa ca. tasmaa tumhehipi eva.m citta.m bhaavetabbanti dasseti.

[03] yathaa bhaavanaamayaa pa~n~naa cittamalavisodhanaadinaa purisassa bahupakaaraa, eva.m itaraapiiti dassento ^a^V2.0159^ea^ ^b^``jiivate vaapi sappa~n~no''^eb^ti catutthagaathamaaha. tassattho -- parikkhii.nadhanopi sappa~n~najaatiko itariitarasantosena santu.t.tho anavajjaaya jiivikaaya jiivatiyeva. tassa hi jiivita.m jiivita.m naama. tenaaha bhagavaa -- ``pa~n~naajiivi.m jiivitamaahu se.t.tha''nti (sa.m0 ni0 1.73, 246; su0 ni0 184). dummedhapuggalo pana pa~n~naaya alaabhena ^a^P2.0235^ea^ di.t.thadhammika.m samparaayika~nca attha.m ^a^M2.0187^ea^ viraadhento vittavaapi na jiivati, garahaadippattiyaa jiivanto naama na tassa hoti, anupaaya~n~nutaaya vaa yathaadhigata.m dhana.m naasento jiivitampi sandhaaretu.m na sakkotiyeva, tasmaa paarihaariyapa~n~naapi tumhehi appamattehi sampaadetabbaati adhippaayo.

[03] idaani pa~n~naaya aanisa.mse dassetu.m ^b^``pa~n~naa sutavinicchinii''^eb^ti pa~ncama.m gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^pa~n~naa sutavinicchinii^eb^ti pa~n~naa naamesaa sutassa vinicchayinii, yathaasute sotapathamaagate atthe ``aya.m akusalo, aya.m kusalo, aya.m saavajjo, aya.m anavajjo''tiaadinaa vinicchayajananii. ^b^kittisilokavaddhanii^eb^ti kittiyaa sammukhaa pasa.msaaya silokassa pattha.tayasabhaavassa vaddhanii, pa~n~navatoyeva hi kittiaadayo vi~n~nuuna.m paasa.msabhaavato. ^b^pa~n~naasahito^eb^ti paarihaariyapa~n~naaya, vipassanaapa~n~naaya ca yutto. ^b^api dukkhesu sukhaani vindatii^eb^ti ekantadukkhasabhaavesu khandhaayatanaadiisu sammaapa.tipattiyaa yathaabhuutasabhaavaavabodhena niraamisaanipi sukhaani pa.tilabhati.

[03] idaani taasa.m bhikkhuniina.m aniccataapa.tisa.myutta.m dhiirabhaavaavaha.m dhamma.m kathento ^b^``naaya.m ajjatano dhammo''^eb^tiaadinaa sesagaathaa abhaasi. tatraaya.m sa"nkhepattho -- yvaaya.m sattaana.m jaayanamiiyanasabhaavo, aya.m dhammo ^b^ajjatano^eb^ adhunaagato na hoti, abhi.nhapavattikataaya na acchariyo, abbhutapubbataabhaavato naapi ^b^abbhuto^eb^. tasmaa ^b^yattha jaayetha miiyetha^eb^, yasmi.m loke satto jaayeyya, so eka.msena miiyetha, tattha ^b^ki.m viya?^eb^ ki.m naama abbhuta.m siyaa? sabhaavikattaa mara.nassa -- na hi kha.nikamara.nassa ki~nci kaara.na.m atthi. yato ^b^anantara~nhi jaatassa, jiivitaa mara.na.m dhuva.m^eb^ jaatassa jaatisamanantara.m jiivitato mara.na.m ekantika.m uppannaana.m khandhaana.m eka.msena bhijjanato. yo panettha jiivatiiti lokavohaaro, so tadupaadaanassa anekapaccayaayattataaya anekantiko, yasmaa etadeva.m, tasmaa ^b^jaataa marantiidha, eva.mdhammaa hi paa.nino^eb^ti aya.m sattaana.m pakati, yadida.m jaataana.m mara.nanti jaatiyaa mara.naanubandhanata.m aaha.

[03] idaani ^a^M2.0188^ea^ yasmaa taasu bhikkhuniisu kaaci sokabandhitacittaapi atthi, tasmaa taasa.m sokavinodana.m kaatu.m ^b^``na hetadatthaayaa^eb^tiaadi vutta.m. tattha ^b^na hetadatthaaya matassa hotii^eb^ti ya.m matassa ^a^V2.0160^ea^ ^b^jiivitattha.m^eb^ jiivitanimitta.m ^b^paraporisaana.m^eb^ parapuggalaana.m ru.n.na.m, eta.m tassa matassa sattassa jiivitattha.m taava ti.t.thatu, kassacipi atthaaya na hoti, ye pana rudanti, tesampi ^b^matamhi^eb^ matapuggalanimitta.m ru.n.na.m, ^b^na yaso na lokya.m^eb^ yasaavaha.m visuddhaavaha~nca na hoti ^a^P2.0236^ea^. ^b^na va.n.nita.m sama.nabraahma.nehii^eb^ti vi~n~nuppasa.t.thampi na hoti, atha kho vi~n~nugarahitamevaati attho.

[03] na kevalameteva ye rudato aadiinavaa, atha kho imepiiti dassento ^b^``cakkhu.m sariira.m upahantii''^eb^ti gaatha.m vatvaa tato para.m sokaadianatthapa.tibaahanattha.m kalyaa.namittapayirupaasanaaya.m taa niyojento ^b^``tasmaa''^eb^tiaadinaa osaanagaathamaaha. tattha ^b^tasmaa^eb^ti yasmaa ru.n.na.m rudantassa puggalassa cakkhu.m sariira~nca ^b^upahanti^eb^ vibaadhati, tena ru.n.nena va.n.no bala.m mati ca ^b^nihiiyati^eb^ parihaayati, ^b^tassa^eb^ rudantassa puggalassa ^b^disaa^eb^ sapattaa ^b^aanandino^eb^ pamodavanto piitivanto bhavanti. hitesino mittaa dukkhii dukkhitaa bhavanti tasmaa dhammojapa~n~naaya samannaagatattaa ^b^medhaavino^eb^ di.t.thadhammikaadiatthasannissitassa baahusaccassa paaripuuriyaa ^b^bahussute,^eb^ attano kule vasante ^b^iccheyya^eb^ paa.tika"nkheyya kuluupake kareyya. ^b^yesa^eb^nti yesa.m medhaaviina.m bahussutaana.m pa.n.ditaana.m ^b^pa~n~naavibhavena^eb^ pa~n~naabalena yathaa mahoghassa pu.n.na.m nadi.m naavaaya taranti, eva.m kulaputtaa attano atthakicca.m ^b^taranti^eb^ paara.m paapu.nanti. te iccheyya kule vasanteti yojanaa.
[03] eva.m thero taasa.m bhikkhuniina.m dhamma.m kathetvaa vissajjesi. taa therassa ovaade .thatvaa soka.m vinodetvaa yoniso pa.tipajjantiyo sadattha.m paripuuresu.m.

[03] ^b^dandhaa^eb^ ^a^M2.0189^ea^ ^b^mayha.m gatii^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato cuu.lapanthakattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? yadettha a.t.thuppattivasena vattabba.m, ta.m a.t.thakanipaate mahaapanthakavatthusmi.m (theragaa0 a.t.tha0 2.mahaapanthakattheragaathaava.n.nanaa) vuttameva. aya.m pana viseso -- mahaapanthakatthero arahatta.m patvaa aggaphalasukhena viitinaamento cintesi -- ``katha.m nu kho sakkaa cuu.lapanthakampi imasmi.m sukhe pati.t.thapetu''nti? so attano ayyaka.m dhanase.t.thi.m upasa"nkamitvaa aaha -- ``sace, mahaase.t.thi, anujaanaatha ^a^V2.0161^ea^, aha.m cuu.lapanthaka.m pabbaajeyya''nti. ``pabbaajetha, bhante''ti. thero ta.m pabbaajesi. so dasasu siilesu pati.t.thito bhaatu santike --
[21] ``paduma.m yathaa kokanada.m sugandha.m, paato siyaa phullamaviitagandha.m.
[22] a"ngiirasa.m passa virocamaana.m, tapantamaadiccamivantalikkhe''ti.. (sa.m0 ni0 1.123; a0 ni0 5.195) --

[25] gaatha.m ^a^P2.0237^ea^ ugga.nhanto catuuhi maasehi gahetu.m naasakkhi, gahitagahita.m pada.m hadaye na ti.t.thati. atha na.m mahaapanthako aaha -- ``panthaka, tva.m imasmi.m saasane abhabbo, catuuhi maasehi ekagaathampi gahetu.m na sakkosi. pabbajitakicca.m pana tva.m katha.m matthaka.m paapessasi? nikkhama ito''ti. so therena pa.naamito dvaarako.t.thakasamiipe rodamaano a.t.thaasi.

[03] tena ca samayena satthaa jiivakambavane viharati. atha jiivako purisa.m pesesi, ``pa~ncahi bhikkhusatehi saddhi.m satthaara.m nimantehii''ti. tena ca samayena aayasmaa mahaapanthako bhattuddesako hoti. so ``pa~ncanna.m bhikkhusataana.m bhikkha.m pa.ticchatha, bhante''ti vutto ``cuu.lapanthaka.m .thapetvaa sesaana.m pa.ticchaamii''ti aaha. ta.m sutvaa cuu.lapanthako bhiyyosomattaaya domanassappatto ahosi. satthaa tassa cittakkheda.m ~natvaa, ``cuu.lapanthako mayaa katena upaayena bujjhissatii''ti tassa aviduure .thaane attaana.m dassetvaa ``ki.m, panthaka, rodasii''ti pucchi. ``bhaataa ma.m, bhante, pa.naametii''ti aaha. ``panthaka, maa cintayi, mama saasane tuyha.m pabbajjaa, ehi, ima.m gahetvaa `rajohara.na.m, rajohara.na'nti manasi karohii''ti iddhiyaa suddha.m co.lakkha.n.da.m abhisa"nkharitvaa adaasi. so satthaaraa ^a^M2.0190^ea^ dinna.m co.lakkha.n.da.m ``rajohara.na.m, rajohara.na''nti hatthena parimajjanto nisiidi. tassa ta.m parimajjantassa kili.t.thadhaatuka.m jaata.m, puna parimajjantassa ukkhaliparipu~nchanasadisa.m jaata.m. so ~naa.nassa paripakkattaa eva.m cintesi -- ``ida.m co.lakkha.n.da.m pakatiyaa parisuddha.m, ima.m upaadi.n.nakasariira.m nissaaya kili.t.tha.m a~n~nathaa jaata.m, tasmaa anicca.m yathaapeta.m, eva.m cittampii''ti khayavaya.m pa.t.thapetvaa tasmi.myeva nimitte jhaanaani nibbattetvaa jhaanapaadaka.m vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.2.35-54) --
[22] ga.namhaa vuupaka.t.tho so, himavante vasii tadaa..
[21] ``ya.m ya.m yoni.m sa.msarati, devatta.m atha maanusa.m.
[22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
[21] ``dandhaa mayha.m gatii aasi, paribhuuto pure ahu.m.
[22] bhaataa ca ma.m pa.naamesi, gaccha daani saka.m ghara.m..
[22] tattha citta.m vimucci me, arahatta.m apaapu.ni.m..

[03] arahattamaggenevassa tepi.taka.m pa~ncaabhi~n~naa ca aagami.msu. satthaa ekena uunehi pa~ncahi bhikkhusatehi saddhi.m gantvaa jiivakassa nivesane pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. cuu.lapanthako pana attano bhikkhaaya appa.ticchitattaa eva na gato. jiivako yaagu.m daatu.m aarabhi, satthaa patta.m hatthena pidahi. ``kasmaa, bhante, na ga.nhathaa''ti vutte -- ``vihaare eko bhikkhu atthi, jiivakaa''ti. so purisa.m pahi.ni, ``gaccha, bha.ne, vihaare nisinna.m ayya.m gahetvaa ^a^M2.0192^ea^ ehii''ti. cuu.lapanthakattheropi ruupena kiriyaaya ca ekampi ekena asadisa.m bhikkhusahassa.m nimminitvaa nisiidi. so puriso vihaare bhikkhuuna.m bahubhaava.m disvaa gantvaa jiivakassa kathesi -- ``imasmaa bhikkhusa"nghaa vihaare bhikkhusa"ngho bahutaro, pakkositabba.m ayya.m na jaanaamii''ti. jiivako satthaara.m pa.tipucchi -- ``konaamo, bhante, vihaare nisinno bhikkhuu''ti? ``cuu.lapanthako naama, jiivakaa''ti. ``gaccha ^a^P2.0238^ea^, bha.ne, `cuu.lapanthako naama kataro'ti pucchitvaa ta.m aanehii''ti. so vihaara.m gantvaa ``cuu.lapanthako naama kataro, bhante''ti pucchi. ``aha.m cuu.lapanthako'',``aha.m cuu.lapanthako''ti ekapahaareneva bhikkhusahassampi kathesi. so punaagantvaa ta.m pavatti.m jiivakassa aarocesi. jiivako pa.tividdhasaccattaa ``iddhimaa ma~n~ne, ayyo''ti nayato ~natvaa ``gaccha, bha.ne, pa.thama.m kathanakamayyameva `tumhe satthaa pakkosatii'ti vatvaa ciivaraka.n.ne ga.nhaa''ti aaha. so vihaara.m gantvaa tathaa akaasi, taavadeva nimmitabhikkhuu antaradhaayi.msu. so thera.m gahetvaa agamaasi.

[03] satthaa tasmi.m kha.ne yaagu~nca khajjakaadibheda~nca pa.tigga.nhi. dasabale bhattakicca.m katvaa vihaara.m gate dhammasabhaaya.m kathaa udapaadi -- ``aho buddhaana.m aanubhaavo, yatra hi naama cattaaro maase ekagaatha.m gahetu.m asakkontampi lahukena kha.neneva eva.m mahiddhika.m aka.msuu''ti. satthaa tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m kathaasallaapa.m sutvaa aagantvaa buddhaasane nisajja, ``ki.m vadetha, bhikkhave''ti pucchitvaa, ``ima.m naama, bhante''ti vutte, ``bhikkhave, cuu.lapanthakena idaani mayha.m ovaade .thatvaa lokuttaradaayajja.m laddha.m, pubbe pana lokiyadaayajja''nti vatvaa tehi yaacito cuu.lase.t.thijaataka.m (jaa0 1.1.4) kathesi. aparabhaage ta.m satthaa ariyaga.naparivuto dhammaasane nisinno manomaya.m kaaya.m ^a^V2.0164^ea^ abhinimminantaana.m bhikkhuuna.m cetoviva.t.takusalaana~nca agga.t.thaane .thapesi. so aparena samayena bhikkhuuhi ``tathaa dandhadhaatukena katha.m tayaa saccaani pa.tividdhaanii''ti pu.t.tho bhaatu pa.naamanato pa.t.thaaya attano pa.tipatti.m pakaasento --
[21] ``dandhaa mayha.m gatii aasi, paribhuuto pure aha.m.
[22] bhaataa ca ma.m pa.naamesi, gaccha daani tuva.m ghara.m..
[22] tisso vijjaa anuppattaa, kata.m buddhassa saasana.m..
[22] nisinna.m ma.m viditvaana, attha satthaa pa.tiggahi..

[03] tattha ^b^dandhaa^eb^ti, mandaa, catuppadika.m gaatha.m catuuhi maasehi gahetu.m asamatthabhaavena dubbalaa. ^b^gatii^eb^ti ~naa.nagati. ^b^aasii^eb^ti, ahosi. ^b^paribhuuto^eb^ti, tato eva ``mu.t.thassati asampajaano''ti hii.lito. ^b^pure^eb^ti, pubbe puthujjanakaale. ^b^bhaataa caa^eb^ti samuccayattho ca-saddo, na kevala.m paribhuutova, atha kho bhaataapi ma.m ^b^pa.naamesi,^eb^ ``panthaka, tva.m duppa~n~no ahetuko ma~n~ne, tasmaa pabbajitakicca.m ^a^V2.0165^ea^ matthaka.m paapetu.m asamattho ^a^M2.0194^ea^, na imassa saasanassa anucchaviko, gaccha daani tuyha.m ayyakaghara''nti nikka.d.dhesi. ^b^bhaataa^eb^ti, bhaataraa.
[03] ^b^ko.t.thake^eb^ti, dvaarako.t.thakasamiipe. ^b^dummano^eb^ti, domanassito. ^b^saasanasmi.m apekkhavaa^eb^ti, sammaasambuddhassa saasane saapekkho avibbhamitukaamo.

[03] ^b^bhagavaa tattha aagacchii^eb^ti, mahaakaru.naasa~ncoditamaanaso ma.m anugga.nhanto bhagavaa yatthaaha.m .thito, tattha aagacchi. aagantvaa ca, ``panthaka, aha.m te satthaa, na mahaapanthako, ma.m uddissa tava pabbajjaa''ti samassaasento ^b^siisa.m mayha.m paraamasi^eb^ jaalaabandhanamudutalunapii.navaraayata"ngulisamupasobhitena vikasitapadumasassiriikena cakka"nkitena hatthatalena ``idaaniyeva mama putto bhavissatii''ti diipento mayha.m siisa.m paraamasi. ^b^baahaaya ma.m gahetvaanaa^eb^ti, ``kasmaa tva.m, idha ti.t.thasii''ti candanagandhagandhinaa attano hatthena ma.m bhuje gahetvaa antosa"nghaaraama.m pavesesi. ^b^paadaasi^eb^ ^a^P2.0240^ea^ ^b^paadapu~nchani^eb^nti paadapu~nchani.m katvaa paadaasi ``rajohara.nanti manasi karohii''ti adaasiiti attho. ``adaasii''ti ``paadapu~nchani''nti ca pa.thanti. keci pana ^b^``paadapu~nchani''^eb^nti paadapu~nchanaco.lakkha.n.da.m paadaasii''ti vadanti. tadayutta.m iddhiyaa abhisa"nkharitvaa co.lakkha.n.dassa dinnattaa. ^b^eta.m suddha.m adhi.t.thehi, ekamanta.m svadhi.t.thita^eb^nti, eta.m suddha.m co.lakkha.n.da.m ``rajohara.na.m, rajohara.na''nti manasikaarena svadhi.t.thita.m katvaa ekamanta.m ekamante vivitte gandhaku.tipamukhe nisinno adhi.t.thehi tathaa citta.m samaahita.m katvaa pavattehi.

[03] ^b^tassaaha.m vacana.m sutvaa^eb^ti, tassa bhagavato vacana.m ovaada.m aha.m sutvaa tasmi.m ^b^saasane^eb^ ovaade ^b^rato^eb^ abhirato hutvaa ^b^vihaasi.m^eb^ yathaanusi.t.tha.m pa.tipajji.m. pa.tipajjanto ca ^b^samaadhi.m pa.tipaadesi.m, uttamatthassa pattiyaa^eb^ti, uttamattho naama arahatta.m, tassa adhigamaaya kasi.naparikammavasena ruupajjhaanaani nibbattetvaa jhaanapaadaka.m vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa maggapa.tipaa.tiyaa aggamaggasamaadhi.m sampaadesinti attho. ettha hi samaadhiiti upacaarasamaadhito pa.t.thaaya yaava catutthamaggasamaadhi, taava samaadhisaama~n~nena gahito, aggaphalasamaadhi pana uttamatthaggaha.nena, saatisaya.m cevaaya.m samaadhikusalo, tasmaa ``samaadhi.m pa.tipaadesi''nti aaha. samaadhikusalataaya ^a^M2.0195^ea^ hi ayamaayasmaa cetoviva.t.takusalo naama jaato, mahaapanthakatthero pana vipassanaakusalataaya sa~n~naaviva.t.takusalo naama. eko cettha samaadhilakkha.ne cheko, eko vipassanaalakkha.ne, eko samaadhigaa.lho, eko vipassanaagaa.lho eko a"ngasa.mkhitte cheko, eko aaramma.nasa.mkhitte, eko a"ngavavatthaane, eko aaramma.navavatthaaneti va.n.nenti. apica cuu.lapanthakatthero ^a^V2.0166^ea^ saatisaya.m catunna.m ruupaavacarajjhaanaana.m laabhitaaya cetoviva.t.takusalo vutto, mahaapanthakatthero saatisaya.m catunna.m aruupaavacarajjhaanaana.m laabhitaaya sa~n~naaviva.t.takusalo. pa.thamo vaa ruupaavacarajjhaanalaabhii hutvaa jhaana"ngehi vu.t.thaaya arahatta.m pattoti cetoviva.t.takusalo, itaro aruupaavacarajjhaanalaabhii hutvaa jhaana"ngehi vu.t.thaaya arahatta.m pattoti sa~n~naaviva.t.takusalo. manomaya.m pana kaaya.m nibbattento a~n~ne tayo vaa cattaaro vaa nibbattanti, na bahuke, ekasadiseyeva ca katvaa nibbattenti, ekavidhameva kamma.m kurumaane. aya.m pana thero ekaavajjanena sama.nasahassa.m maapesi, dvepi na kaayena ekasadise akaasi, na ekavidha.m kamma.m kurumaane. tasmaa manomaya.m kaaya.m abhinimminantaana.m aggo naama jaato.

[03] idaani ^a^P2.0241^ea^ attano adhigatavisesa.m dassetu.m ^b^``pubbenivaasa.m jaanaamii''^eb^tiaadimaaha. kaama~ncaaya.m thero cha.labhi~n~no, yaa pana abhi~n~naa aasavakkhaya~naa.naadhigamassa bahuupakaaraa, ta.m dassanattha.m ^b^``pubbenivaasa.m jaanaami, dibbacakkhu visodhita''^eb^nti vatvaa ^b^``tisso vijjaa anuppattaa''^eb^ti vutta.m. pubbenivaasayathaakammupagaanaagata.msa~naa.naani hi vipassanaacaarassa bahuupakaaraani, na tathaa itara~naa.naani.

[03] ^b^sahassakkhattu^eb^nti sahassa.m. ``sahassavaara''nti keci vadanti. ekaavajjanena pana thero sahasse manomaye kaaye nimmini, na vaarena. te ca kho a~n~nama~n~namasadise vividha~nca kamma.m karonte. ``ki.m pana saavakaanampi evaruupa.m iddhinimmaana.m sambhavatii''ti? na sambhavati sabbesa.m, abhiniihaarasampattiyaa pana ayameva thero evamakaasi, tathaa hesa iminaa a"ngena etadagge .thapito. ^b^panthako nisiidii^eb^ti attaanameva para.m viya vadati. ^b^ambavane^eb^ti, ambavane jiivakena ^a^M2.0196^ea^ katavihaare. ^b^vehaasaadupasa"nkami^eb^nti ^b^vehaasaa^eb^ti kara.ne nissakkavacana.m, vehaasenaati attho, ^b^da^eb^-kaaro padasandhikaro. ^b^athaa^eb^ti, mama nisajjaaya pacchaa. ^b^pa.tiggahii^eb^ti dakkhi.nodaka.m pa.tigga.nhi. ^b^aayaago sabbalokassaa^eb^ti, sabbassa sadevakassa lokassa aggadakkhi.neyyataaya deyyadhamma.m aanetvaa yajitabba.t.thaanabhuuto. ^b^aahutiina.m pa.tiggaho^eb^ti, mahaaphalabhaavakara.nena dakkhi.naahutiina.m pa.tigga.nhako. ^b^pa.tigga.nhittha dakkhi.na^eb^nti jiivakena upaniita.m yaagukhajjaadibheda.m dakkhi.na.m pa.tiggahesi.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa katabhattakicco aayasmanta.m cuu.lapanthaka.m aa.naapesi -- ``anumodana.m karohii''ti. so sineru.m gahetvaa mahaasamudda.m manthento viya pabhinnapa.tisambhidaappattataaya tepi.taka.m buddhavacana.m sa"nkhobhento satthu ajjhaasaya.m ga.nhanto anumodana.m akaasi. tathaa upanissayasampannopi ^a^V2.0167^ea^ caayamaayasmaa tathaaruupaaya kammapilotikaaya paribaadhito catuppadika.m gaatha.m catuuhipi maasehi gahetu.m naasakkhi. ta.m panassa upanissayasampatti.m oloketvaa satthaa pubbacariyaanuruupa.m yonisomanasikaare niyojesi. tathaa hi bhagavaa tadaa jiivakassa nivesane nisinno eva ``cuu.lapanthakassa citta.m samaahita.m, viithipa.tipannaa vipassanaa''ti ~natvaa yathaanisinnova attaana.m dassetvaa, ``panthaka, yadipaaya.m pilotikaa sa.mkili.t.thaa rajaanuki.n.naa, ito pana a~n~no eva ariyassa vinaye sa.mkileso rajo caati dassento --
[21] ``raago rajo na ca pana re.nu vuccati, raagasseta.m adhivacana.m rajoti.
[22] eta.m ^a^P2.0242^ea^ raja.m vippajahitvaa bhikkhavo, viharanti te viitarajassa saasane..
[25] imaa tisso obhaasagaathaa abhaasi. gaathaapariyosaane cuu.lapanthako abhi~n~naapa.tisambhidaaparivaara.m arahatta.m paapu.niiti.

[03] ^b^naanaakulamalasampu.n.no^eb^tiaadikaa ^a^M2.0197^ea^ aayasmato kappattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kaale vibhavasampanne kule nibbattitvaa pitu accayena vi~n~nuta.m patto naanaaviraagava.n.navicittehi vatthehi anekavidhehi aabhara.nehi naanaavidhehi ma.niratanehi bahuvidhehi pupphadaamamaalaadiihi ca kapparukkha.m naama ala"nkaritvaa tena satthu thuupa.m puujesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade magadhara.t.the ma.n.dalikaraajakule nibbattitvaa pitu accayena rajje pati.t.thito kaamesu ativiya ratto giddho hutvaa viharati. ta.m satthaa mahaakaru.naasamaapattito vu.t.thaaya loka.m volokento ~naa.najaale pa~n~naayamaana.m disvaa, ``ki.m nu kho bhavissatii''ti aavajjento, ``esa mama santike asubhakatha.m sutvaa kaamesu virattacitto hutvaa pabbajitvaa arahatta.m paapu.nissatii''ti ~natvaa aakaasena tattha gantvaa --

[25] imaahi gaathaahi tassa asubhakatha.m kathesi. so satthu sammukhaa anekaakaaravokaara.m yaathaavato sariirasabhaavavibhaavana.m asubhakatha.m sutvaa sakena kaayena a.t.tiiyamaano haraayamaano jigucchamaano sa.mviggahadayo satthaara.m vanditvaa, ``labheyyaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja''nti pabbajja.m yaaci. satthaa samiipe .thitama~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m aa.naapesi -- ``gaccha, bhikkhu, ima.m pabbaajetvaa upasampaadetvaa aanehii''ti. so ta.m tacapa~ncakakamma.t.thaana.m datvaa pabbaajesi. so khuraggeyeva saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 tera 1.4.102-107) --
[22] tamhaa dussa.m gahetvaana, nivaasema maya.m sadaa..
[21] ``ito ca sattame kappe, suce.laa a.t.tha khattiyaa.

[03] arahatta.m ^a^M2.0199^ea^ pana patvaa laddhuupasampado satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa ekamanta.m nisinno a~n~na.m byaakaronto taa eva gaathaa abhaasi. teneva taa theragaathaa naama jaataa.

[03] tattha ^b^naanaakulamalasampu.n.no^eb^ti, naanaakulehi naanaabhaagehi malehi sampu.n.no, kesalomaadinaanaavidhaasuciko.t.thaasabharitoti attho. ^b^mahaaukkaarasambhavo^eb^ti, ukkaaro vuccati vaccakuupa.m. yattakavayaa maataa, tattaka.m kaala.m kaarapariseditavaccakuupasadisataaya maatu kucchi idha ``mahaaukkaaro''ti adhippeto. so kucchi sambhavo uppatti.t.thaana.m etassaati mahaaukkaarasambhavo. ^b^candanika.mvaa^eb^ti candanika.m naama ucchi.t.thodakagabbhamalaadiina.m cha.d.dana.t.thaana.m, ya.m ja.n.numatta.m asucibharitampi hoti, taadisanti attho. ^b^paripakka^eb^nti, pari.nata.m puraa.na.m. tena yathaa ca.n.daalagaamadvaare nidaaghasamaye thullaphusitake deve vassante udakena samupabyuu.lhamuttakariisaa.t.thicammanhaarukha.n.dakhe.lasi"nghaa.nikaadinaanaaku.napabharita.m kaddamodakaalu.lita.m ^a^P2.0244^ea^ katipayadivasaatikkamena sa.mjaata kimikulaakula.m suuriyaatapasantaapakuthita.m upari phe.napubbu.lakaani mu~ncanta.m abhiniilava.n.na.m paramaduggandha.m jeguccha.m candanikaavaa.ta.m neva upagantu.m, na da.t.thu.m araharuupa.m hutvaa ti.t.thati, tathaaruupoya.m kaayoti dasseti. sadaa dukkhataamuulayogato asucipagghara.nato uppaadajaraamara.nehi uddhumaayanaparipaccanabhijjanasabhaavattaa ca mahanto ga.n.do viyaati ^b^mahaaga.n.do^eb^. sabbatthakameva dukkhavedanaanubaddhattaa ga.n.daana.m sahanato asucivissandanato ca mahanto va.no viyaati ^b^mahaava.no guuthakuupena gaa.lito^eb^ti, vaccakuupena vacceneva vaa bharito. ``guuthakuupanigaa.lhito''tipi paa.li, vaccakuupato nikkhantoti attho. ^b^aapopagghara.no kaayo, sadaa sandati puutika^eb^nti, aya.m kaayo aapodhaatuyaa sadaa pagghara.nasiilo, ta~nca kho pittasemhasedamuttaadika.m puutika.m asuci.myeva sandati, na kadaaci sucinti attho.

[03] ^b^sa.t.thika.n.darasambandho^eb^ti ^a^V2.0170^ea^, giivaaya uparimabhaagato pa.t.thaaya sariira.m vinaddhamaanaa sariirassa purimapacchimadakkhi.navaamapassesu pacceka.m pa~nca pa~nca katvaa viisati, hatthapaade vinaddhamaanaa tesa.m purimapacchimapassesu pa~nca pa~nca katvaa cattaaliisaati ^a^M2.0200^ea^ sa.t.thiyaa ka.n.darehi mahaanhaaruuhi sabbaso baddho vinaddhoti sa.t.thika.n.darasambandho. ^b^ma.msalepanalepito^eb^ti, ma.msasa"nkhaatena lepanena litto, navama.msapesisataanulittoti attho. ^b^cammaka~ncukasannaddho^eb^ti, cammasa"nkhaatena ka~ncukena sabbaso onaddho pariyonaddho paricchinno. ^b^puutikaayo^eb^ti, sabbaso puutigandhiko kaayo. ^b^niratthako^eb^ti, nippayojano. a~n~nesa~nhi paa.niina.m kaayo cammaadiviniyogena siyaa sappayojano, na tathaa manussakaayoti. ^b^a.t.thisa"nghaatagha.tito^eb^ti, atirekatisataana.m a.t.thiina.m sa"nghaatena gha.tito sambandho. ^b^nhaarusuttanibandhano^eb^ti, suttasadisehi navahi nhaarusatehi nibandhito. ^b^nekesa.m sa.mgatiibhaavaa^eb^ti, catumahaabhuutajiivitindriyaassaasapassaasavi~n~naa.naadiina.m samavaayasambandhena suttamerakasamavaayena yanta.m viya .thaanaadiiriyaapatha.m kappeti.

[03] ^b^dhuvappayaato mara.naayaa^eb^ti, mara.nassa atthaaya ekantagamano, nibbattito pa.t.thaaya mara.na.m pati pavatto. tato eva maccuraajassa mara.nassa ^a^P2.0245^ea^ santike .thito. ^b^idheva cha.d.dayitvaanaa^eb^ti, imasmi.myeva loke kaaya.m cha.d.detvaa, yathaarucita.t.thaanagaamii aya.m satto, tasmaa ``pahaaya gamaniiyo aya.m kaayo''ti evampi sa"ngo na kaatabboti dasseti.

[03] ^b^avijjaaya nivuto^eb^ti, avijjaaniivara.nena nivuto pa.ticchaaditaadiinavo, a~n~nathaa ko ettha sa"nga.m janeyyaati adhippaayo. ^b^catuganthenaa^eb^ti, abhijjhaakaayaganthaadinaa catubbidhena ganthena ganthito, ganthaniyabhaavena vinaddhito. ^b^oghasa.msiidano^eb^ti, oghaniyabhaavena kaamoghaadiisu catuusu oghesu sa.msiidanako. appahiinabhaavena santaane anu anu sentiiti anusayaa, kaamaraagaadayo anusayaa. tesa.m jaalena otthato abhibhuutoti ^b^anusayaajaalamotthato^eb^. makaaro padasandhikaro, gaathaasukhattha.m diigha.m katvaa vutta.m. kaamacchandaadinaa pa~ncavidhena niivara.nena yutto adhimuttoti ^b^pa~ncaniivara.ne yutto,^eb^ kara.natthe bhummavacana.m.

[03] kaamavitakkaadinaa ^a^M2.0201^ea^ micchaavitakkena samappito samassitoti ^b^vitakkena samappito. ta.nhaamuulenaanugato^eb^ti, ta.nhaasa"nkhaatena bhavamuulena anubaddho. ^b^mohacchaadanachaadito^eb^ti, sammohasa"nkhaatena aavara.nena paligu.n.thito. sabbameta.m savi~n~naa.naka.m karajakaaya.m sandhaaya vadati. savi~n~naa.nako hi attabhaavo ``ucchinnabhavanettiko, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa kaayo ti.t.thati, aya~nceva kaayo bahiddhaa ca naamaruupa''ntiaadiisu (dii0 ni0 1.1.147) kaayoti vuccati, ^b^evaaya.m vattate kaayo^eb^ti ^a^V2.0171^ea^ eva.m ``naanaakulamalasampu.n.no''tiaadinaa ``avijjaaya nivuto''tiaadinaa ca vuttappakaarena aya.m kaayo vattati, vattanto ca ^b^kammayantena^eb^ sukatadukka.tena kammasa"nkhaatena yantena ^b^yantito^eb^ sa"ngha.tito. yathaa vaa khemanta.m gantu.m na sakkoti, tathaa sa"nkhobhito sugatiduggatiisu vattati paribbhamati. ^b^sampatti ca vipatyantaa^eb^ti yaa ettha sampatti, saa vipattipariyosaanaa. sabba~nhi yobbana.m jaraapariyosaana.m, sabba.m aarogya.m byaadhipariyosaana.m, sabba.m jiivita.m mara.napariyosaana.m, sabbo samaagamo viyogapariyosaano. tenaaha ^b^``naanaabhaavo vipajjatii''^eb^ti. ^b^naanaabhaavo^eb^ti, vinaabhaavo vippayogo, so kadaaci vippayu~njakassa vasena, kadaaci vippayu~njitabbassa vasenaati vividha.m pajjati paapu.niiyati.

[03] ^b^yema.m kaaya.m mamaayantii^eb^ti ye andhabaalaa puthujjanaa eva.m asubha.m anicca.m adhuva.m dukkha.m asaara.m ima.m kaaya.m ``mama ida''nti ga.nhantaa mamaayanti chandaraaga.m uppaadenti, te jaatiaadiihi nirayaadiihi ca ^b^ghora.m^eb^ bhayaanaka.m apa.n.ditehi abhiramitabbato ka.tasisa"nkhaata.m sa.msaara.m punappuna.m jananamara.naadiihi va.d.dhenti, tenaaha ^b^``aadiyanti punabbhava''^eb^nti.

[03] ^b^yema.m kaaya.m vivajjenti, guuthalitta.mva pannaga^eb^nti yathaa naama ^a^P2.0246^ea^ puriso sukhakaamo jiivitukaamo guuthagata.m aasiivisa.m disvaa jigucchaniyataaya vaa sappa.tibhayataaya vaa vivajjeti na alliiyati, evameva.m ye pa.n.ditaa kulaputtaa asucibhaavena jeguccha.m aniccaadibhaavena sappa.tibhaya.m ima.m kaaya.m vivajjenti chandaraagappahaanena pajahanti. te bhavamuula.m avijja.m bhavata.nha~nca vamitvaa cha.d.detvaa accantameva pahaaya tato eva sabbaso anaasavaa saupaadisesaaya anupaadisesaaya ca nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayissantiiti.

[03] ^b^vivitta.m^eb^ ^a^M2.0202^ea^ ^b^appanigghosa^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato upasenattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe nibbattitvaa vayappatto satthu santika.m gantvaa dhamma.m su.namaano satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m samantapaasaadikaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa satthu adhikaarakamma.m katvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthetvaa yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m ^a^V2.0172^ea^ buddhuppaade naalakagaame ruupasaariibraahma.niyaa kucchimhi nibbatti, ^b^upaseno^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvaa satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa upasampadaaya ekavassiko ``ariyagabbha.m va.d.dhemii''ti eka.m kulaputta.m attano santike upasampaadetvaa tena saddhi.m satthu santika.m gato. satthaaraa cassa tassa avassikassa bhikkhuno saddhivihaarikabhaava.m sutvaa, ``atilahu.m kho tva.m, moghapurisa, baahullaaya aavatto''ti (mahaava0 75) garahito. ``idaanaaha.m yadipi parisa.m nissaaya satthaaraa garahito, parisa.myeva pana nissaaya satthu paasa.msopi bhavissaamii''ti vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.2.86-96) --
[22] buddhena navame tattha, sama.ne a.t.tha bhojayi.m..
[22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
[22] dhaaremi antima.m deha.m, jetvaa maara.m savaahana.m..

[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa sayampi sabbe dhuta"ngadhamme samaadaaya vattati, a~n~nepi tadatthaaya samaadapeti ^a^V2.0173^ea^, tena na.m bhagavaa samantapaasaadikaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesi. so aparena samayena kosambiya.m kalahe ^a^P2.0247^ea^ uppanne bhikkhusa"nghe ca dvidhaabhuute ekena bhikkhunaa ta.m kalaha.m parivajjitukaamena ``etarahi kho kalaho uppanno, sa"ngho dvidhaabhuuto, katha.m nu kho mayaa pa.tipajjitabba''nti pu.t.tho vivekavaasato pa.t.thaaya tassa pa.tipatti.m kathento --
[22] tato sa"nghaa.tika.m katvaa, luukha.m dhaareyya ciivara.m..
[21] ``luukhenapi vaa santusse, naa~n~na.m patthe rasa.m bahu.m.
[22] rasesu anugiddhassa, jhaane na ramatii mano..
[21] ``yathaa ^a^M2.0204^ea^ ja.lo va muugo va, attaana.m dassaye tathaa.
[22] na ca appatvaa dukkhanta.m, vissaasa.m eyya pa.n.dito..

[03] tattha ^b^vivitta^eb^nti, janavivitta.m su~n~na.m ara~n~naadi.m. ^b^appanigghosa^eb^nti, nissadda.m saddasa"ngha.t.tanarahita.m. ^b^vaa.lamiganisevita^eb^nti, siihabyagghadiipivaa.lamigehi carita.m. iminaapi janaviveka.myeva dasseti pantasenaasanabhaavadiipanato. ^b^senaasana^eb^nti, sayitu.m aasayitu~nca yuttabhaavena ^a^V2.0174^ea^ vasana.t.thaana.m idha senaasananti adhippeta.m. ^b^pa.tisallaanakaara.naa^eb^ti, pa.tisallaananimitta.m, naanaaramma.nato nivattetvaa kamma.t.thaaneyeva cittassa pa.ti pa.ti sammadeva alliiyanattha.m.

[03] eva.m bhaavanaanuruupa.m senaasana.m niddisanto senaasane santosa.m dassetvaa idaani ciivaraadiisupi ta.m dassetu.m ^b^``sa.mkaarapu~njaa''^eb^tiaadi vutta.m. tattha ^a^P2.0248^ea^ ^b^sa.mkaarapu~njaa^eb^ti sa.mkaaraana.m pu~nja.m sa.mkaarapu~nja.m, tato kacavara.t.thaanaa. ^b^aahatvaa^eb^ti aaharitvaa. ^b^tato^eb^ti tathaa aaha.taco.lakkha.n.dehi. kara.ne hi ida.m nissakkavacana.m ^b^luukha^eb^nti satthaluukharajanaluukhaadinaa luukha.m ava.n.naama.t.tha.m. ^b^dhaareyyaa^eb^ti nivaasanaadivasena parihareyya, etena ciivarasantosa.m vadati.

[03] ^b^niica mana.m karitvaanaa^eb^ti ``antamida.m, bhikkhave, jiivikaana''ntiaadika.m (itivu0 91; sa.m0 ni0 3.80) sugatovaada.m anussaritvaa nihatamaanadappa.m citta.m katvaa. ^b^sapadaana^eb^nti gharesu ^a^M2.0205^ea^ avakha.n.darahita.m; anugharanti attho. tenaaha ^b^``kulaa kula''^eb^nti. ^b^kulaa kula^eb^nti kulato kula.m, kulaanupubbiyaa gharapa.tipaa.tiyaati attho. ^b^pi.n.dikaayaa^eb^ti missakabhikkhaaya, iminaa pi.n.dapaatasantosa.m vadati. ^b^guttadvaaro^eb^ti supihitacakkhaadidvaaro. ^b^susa.mvuto^eb^ti hatthakukkuccaadiina.m abhaavena su.t.thu sa.mvuto.

[03] ^b^luukhenapi vaa^eb^ti apisaddo samuccaye, vaa-saddo vikappe. ubhayenapi luukhenapi appenapi yena kenaci sulabhena itariitarena ^b^santusse^eb^ sama.m sammaa tusseyya. tenaaha ^b^``naa~n~na.m patthe rasa.m bahu''^eb^nti. ^b^naa~n~na.m patthe rasa.m bahu^eb^nti attanaa yathaaladdhato a~n~na.m madhuraadirasa.m bahu.m pa.niita~nca na pattheyya na piheyya, iminaa gilaanapaccayepi santoso dassito hoti. rasesu gedhavaara.nattha.m pana kaara.na.m vadanto ^b^rasesu anugiddhassa, jhaane na ramatii mano''^eb^ti aaha. indriyasa.mvarampi aparipuurentassa kuto vikkhittacittasamaadhaananti adhippaayo.

[03] eva.m catuusu paccayesu sallekhapa.tipatti.m dassetvaa idaani avasi.t.thakathaavatthuuni dassetu.m ^b^``appiccho cevaa''^eb^tiaadi vutta.m. tattha ^b^appiccho^eb^ti, aniccho catuusu paccayesu icchaarahito, tena catubbidhapaccayesu ta.nhuppaadavikkhambhanamaaha. ^b^santu.t.tho^eb^ti, catuusu paccayesu yathaalaabhasantosaadinaa santu.t.tho. yo hi --

[03] ^b^pavivitto^eb^ti ^a^V2.0175^ea^ ga.nasa"nga.nika.m pahaaya kaayena pavivitto vuupaka.t.tho. cittavivekaadike hi parato vakkhati. ^b^vase^eb^ti sabbattha yojetabba.m. moneyyadhammasamannaagamena ^b^muni. asa.msa.t.tho^eb^ti dassanasavanasamullapanasambhogakaayasa.msaggaana.m abhaavena ^a^P2.0249^ea^ asa.msa.t.tho yathaavuttasa.msaggarahito. ^b^ubhaya^eb^nti, gaha.t.thehi anaagaarehi caati ubhayehipi asa.msa.t.tho. kara.ne hi ida.m paccattavacana.m.

[03] ^b^attaana.m dassaye tathaa^eb^ti aja.lo amuugopi samaano yathaa ja.lo vaa muugo vaa, tathaa attaana.m dasseyya, etena paagabbiyappahaanamaaha. ^b^ja.lo va muugo vaa^eb^ti ca gaathaasukhattha.m rassatta.m kata.m, samuccayattho ca ^a^M2.0206^ea^ vaasaddo. ^b^naativela.m sambhaaseyyaa^eb^ti ativela.m atikkantapamaa.na.m na bhaaseyya, mattabhaa.nii assaati attho. ^b^sa"nghamajjhamhii^eb^ti bhikkhusa"nghe, janasamuuhe vaa.

[03] ^b^na so upavade ka~ncii^eb^ti so yathaavuttapa.tipattiko bhikkhu hiina.m vaa majjhima.m vaa ukka.t.tha.m vaa ya.mki~nci na vaacaaya upavadeyya. ^b^upaghaata.m vivajjaye^eb^ti kaayena upaghaata.m parivihe.thana.m vajjeyya. ^b^sa.mvuto paatimokkhasmi^eb^nti paatimokkhamhi paatimokkhasa.mvarasiile sa.mvuto assa, paatimokkhasa.mvarena pihitakaayavaaco siyaati attho. ^b^matta~n~nuu cassa bhojane^eb^ti pariyesanapa.tiggaha.naparibhogavissajjanesu bhojane pamaa.na~n~nuu siyaa.

[03] ^b^suggahiitanimittassaa^eb^ti ``eva.m me manasi karoto citta.m samaahita.m ahosii''ti tadaakaara.m sallakkhento su.t.thu gahitasamaadhinimitto assa. ``suggahiitanimitto so''tipi paa.tho, so yogiiti attho. ^b^cittassuppaadakovido^eb^ti eva.m bhaavayato citta.m liina.m hoti, ``eva.m uddhata''nti liinassa uddhatassa ca cittassa uppattikaara.ne kusalo assa. liine hi citte dhammavicayaviiriyapiitisambojjha"ngaa bhaavetabbaa, uddhate passaddhisamaadhiupekkhaasambojjha"ngaa. satisambojjha"ngo pana sabbattha icchitabbo. tenaaha bhagavaa -- ``yasmi~nca kho, bhikkhave, samaye liina.m citta.m hoti, kaalo tasmi.m samaye dhammavicayasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaayaa''tiaadi (sa.m0 ni0 5.234). ^b^samatha.m anuyu~njeyyaa^eb^ti samathabhaavana.m bhaaveyya, anuppanna.m samaadhi.m uppaadeyya, uppanna~nca yaava vasiibhaavappatti, taava va.d.dheyya byuuheyyaati attho. ^b^kaalena ca vipassana^eb^nti yathaaladdha.m samaadhi.m nikantiyaa apariyaadaanena haanabhaagiya.m .thitibhaagiya.m vaa akatvaa nibbedhabhaagiya.mva katvaa kaalena vipassana~nca anuyu~njeyya. atha vaa ^b^kaalena ca vipassana^eb^nti samatha.m anuyu~njanto tassa thiriibhuutakaale sa"nkoca.m anaapajjitvaa ariyamaggaadhigamaaya vipassana.m anuyu~njeyya. yathaaha --

[03] tena ^a^M2.0207^ea^ ^a^P2.0250^ea^ vutta.m -- ^b^``viiriyasaataccasampanno''^eb^tiaadi. satatabhaavo ^b^saatacca.m,^eb^ viiriyassa saatacca.m, tena sampanno samannaagato, satatapavattaviiriyo, niccapaggahitaviiriyoti attho. ^b^yuttayogo sadaa siyaa^eb^ti sabbakaala.m bhaavanaanuyutto siyaa. ^b^dukkhanta^eb^nti va.t.tadukkhassa anta.m pariyosaana.m nirodha.m nibbaana.m appatvaa vissaasa.m ^b^na eyya^eb^ na gaccheyya. ``aha.m parisuddhasiilo jhaanalaabhii abhi~n~naalaabhii vipassana.m matthaka.m paapetvaa .thito''ti vaa vissa.t.tho na bhaveyyaati attho.

[03] ^b^eva.m viharamaanassaa^eb^ti, eva.m vivittasenaasanasevanaadinaa vipassanaavasena yuttayogataapariyosaanena vidhinaa viharantassa. ^b^suddhikaamassaa^eb^ti, ~naa.nadassanavisuddhi.m accantavisuddhi.m nibbaana.m arahatta~nca icchantassa. sa.msaare bhayassa ikkhato ^b^bhikkhuno,^eb^ kaamaasavaadayo sabbe ^b^aasavaa khiiyanti^eb^ khaya.m abbhattha.m gacchanti, tesa.m khayagamaneneva saupaadisesaanupaadisesapabheda.m duvidhampi nibbaana.m ^b^adhigacchati^eb^ paapu.naati.
[03] eva.m thero tassa bhikkhuno ovaadadaanaapadesena attanaa tathaapa.tipannabhaava.m diipento a~n~na.m byaakaasi.

[03] ^b^vijaaneyya saka.m attha^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato aparassa gotamattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinitvaa amhaaka.m bhagavato uppattito puretarameva saavatthiya.m udiccabraahma.nakule nibbattitvaa vayappatto ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu hutvaa, vaadamagga.m uggahetvaa attano vaadassa upari uttari.m vadanta.m alabhanto tehi tehi viggaahikakatha.m anuyutto vicarati. atha amhaaka.m bhagavaa loke uppajjitvaa ^a^V2.0177^ea^ pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena yasaadike veneyye vinetvaa anaathapi.n.dikassa abhiyaacanaaya saavatthi.m upagacchi. tadaa satthu jetavanapa.tiggahe pa.tiladdhasaddho satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa dhamma.m sutvaa pabbajja.m yaaci. satthaa ^a^M2.0208^ea^ a~n~natara.m pi.n.dacaarika.m bhikkhu.m aa.naapesi -- ``bhikkhu, ima.m pabbaajehii''ti. so tena pabbaajiyamaano khuraggeyeva arahatta.m paapu.nitvaa kosalajanapada.m gantvaa tattha cira.m vasitvaa puna saavatthi.m paccaagami. ta.m bahuu ~naatakaa braahma.namahaasaalaa upasa"nkamitvaa payirupaasitvaa nisinnaa ``imasmi.m loke ^a^P2.0251^ea^ bahuu sama.nabraahma.naa sa.msaare suddhivaadaa, tesu katamesa.m nu kho vaado niyyaaniko, katha.m pa.tipajjanto sa.msaarato sujjhatii''ti pucchi.msu. thero tesa.m tamattha.m pakaasento --
[21] ``mitta.m idha ca kalyaa.na.m, sikkhaa vipula.m samaadaana.m.
[22] sussuusaa ca garuuna.m, eta.m sama.nassa patiruupa.m..
[22] sa"nghe ca cittiikaaro, eta.m sama.nassa patiruupa.m..
[22] cittassa ca sa.n.thapana.m, eta.m sama.nassa patiruupa.m..
[22] adhicitte ca aayogo, eta.m sama.nassa patiruupa.m..
[22] lokamhi ca anabhirati.m, eta.m sama.nassa patiruupa.m..

[03] tattha ^a^V2.0178^ea^ ^b^vijaaneyya saka.m attha^eb^nti, vi~n~nuujaatiko puriso attano attha.m yaathaavato vicaaretvaa jaaneyya. vicaarento ca ^b^avalokeyyaatha paavacana.m^eb^ idha loke puthusama.nabraahma.nehi sammaasambuddhena ca pavutta.m paavacana.m, samayo. tattha ya.m niyyaanika.m, ta.m olokeyya pa~n~naacakkhunaa passeyya. ime hi naanaatitthiyaa sama.nabraahma.naa anicce ``nicca''nti, anattani ``attaa''ti, asuddhimagga~nca ``suddhimaggo''ti micchaabhinivesino a~n~nama~n~na~nca viruddhavaadaa, tasmaa nesa.m vaado aniyyaaniko. sammaasambuddho pana ``sabbe sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa, sabbe dhammaa anattaa, santa.m nibbaana''nti sayambhuu~naa.nena yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naaya pavedeti, tasmaa ``tassa ^a^P2.0252^ea^ vaado niyyaaniko''ti satthu saasanamahantata.m olokeyyaati attho. ^b^ya~ncettha assa patiruupa.m, saama~n~na.m ajjhuupagatassaa^eb^ti, saama~n~na.m sama.nabhaava.m pabbajja.m upagatassa kulaputtassa ya.m ettha saasane pabbajitabhaave vaa patiruupa.m yuttaruupa.m saaruppa.m assa siyaa, tampi apalokeyya.

[03] ki.m pana tanti aaha ^b^``mitta.m idha ca kalyaa.na''^eb^ntiaadi. imasmi.m saasane kalyaa.namitta.m seviyamaana.m sama.nassa patiruupanti yojanaa. esa nayo itaresupi. kalyaa.namitta~nhi nissaaya akusala.m pajahati, kusala.m bhaaveti, suddhamattaana.m pariharati. ^b^sikkhaa vipula.m samaadaana^eb^nti vipula.m sikkhaasamaadaana.m, mahatiyaa nibbaanaavahaaya adhisiilaadisikkhaaya anu.t.thaananti attho. ^b^sussuusaa ca garuuna^eb^nti garuuna.m aacariyupajjhaayaadiina.m kalyaa.namittaana.m ovaadassa sotukamyataa paaricariyaa ca. ^b^eta^eb^nti kalyaa.namittasevanaadi.

[03] ^b^buddhesu sagaaravataa^eb^ti sabba~n~nubuddhesu ``sammaasambuddho bhagavaa''ti gaaravayogo garucittiikaaro. ^b^dhamme apaciti yathaabhuuta^eb^nti ariyadhamme yaathaavato ^a^M2.0210^ea^ apacaayana.m aadarena abhipuujana.m. ^b^sa"nghe^eb^ti ariyasa"nghe. ^b^cittiikaaro^eb^ti sakkaaro sammaanana.m. ^b^eta^eb^nti ratanattayagarukara.na.m.

[03] ^b^aacaaragocare yutto^eb^ti kaayikavaacasikaviitikkamanasa"nkhaata.m anaacaara.m, pi.n.dapaataadiina.m atthaaya upasa"nkamitu.m ayutta.t.thaanabhuuta.m vesiyaadiagocara~nca pahaaya kaayikavaacasikaaviitikkamanasa"nkhaatena aacaarena pi.n.dapaataadiina.m atthaaya upasa"nkamitu.m yutta.t.thaanabhuutena gocarena ca yutto sampanno, sampannaaacaaragocaroti attho. ^b^aajiivo sodhito^eb^ti ve.ludaanaadi.m buddhapa.tiku.t.tha.m anesana.m pahaaya anavajjuppaade paccaye sevantassa aajiivo sodhito hoti suvisuddho, sodhitattaa eva ^b^agaarayho^eb^ vi~n~nuuhi. ^b^cittassa ca sa.n.thapana^eb^nti yathaa cakkhaadidvaarehi ruupaadiaaramma.nesu abhijjhaadayo nappavattanti, eva.m di.t.the di.t.thamattaadivasena cittassa ^a^V2.0179^ea^ sammaa .thapana.m. ^b^eta^eb^nti aacaaragocarasampatti aajiivapaarisuddhi indriyesu guttadvaarataati eta.m taya.m.

[03] ^b^caaritta^eb^nti caritvaa paripuuretabbasiila.m. ^b^vaaritta^eb^nti viratiyaa akara.nena paripuuretabbasiila.m. ^b^iriyaapathiya.m pasaadaniya^eb^nti paresa.m pasaadaavaha.m aakappasampattinimitta.m iriyaapathanissita.m sampaja~n~na.m. ^b^adhicitte ca aayogo^eb^ti samathavipassanaasu anuyogo bhaavanaa.

[03] ^b^siila^eb^nti catupaarisuddhisiila.m. he.t.thaa hi bhinditvaa vutta.m, idha abhinditvaa ^a^P2.0253^ea^ vadati. ^b^baahusacca^eb^nti bahussutabhaavo. so hi bhaavanaanuyogassa bahukaaro, bojjha"ngakosallaanuttarasiitibhaavaadhicittayuttataadiisu sammaa pavicayabahulassa samathavipassanaanuyogo sampajjati. ^b^dhammaana.m pavicayo yathaabhuuta^eb^nti ruupaaruupadhammaana.m avipariitasalakkha.nato saama~n~nalakkha.nato ca pariviima.msaa. iminaa adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanamaaha. ^b^saccaana.m abhisamayo^eb^ti dukkhaadiina.m ariyasaccaana.m pari~n~naabhisamayaadivasena pa.tivedho.

[03] svaaya.m saccaabhisamayo yathaa hoti, ta.m dassetu.m ^b^``bhaaveyyaa''^eb^tiaadi vutta.m. tattha ^b^bhaaveyya ca anicca^eb^nti ``sabbe sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa''tiaadinaa (dha0 pa0 277) avibhaagato ^a^M2.0211^ea^ ``ya.m ki~nci ruupa.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna''ntiaadinaa (vibha0 2; sa.m0 ni0 3.49) vibhaagato vaa sabbasa"nkhaaresu aniccasa~n~na.m bhaaveyya uppaadeyya ceva va.d.dheyya caati attho. ^b^anattasa~n~na^eb^nti, ``sabbe dhammaa anattaa''ti pavatta.m anattasa~n~na~nca bhaaveyyaati yojanaa. eva.m sesesupi. ^b^asubhasa~n~na^eb^nti, karajakaaye sabbasmimpi vaa tebhuumakasa"nkhaare kilesaasucipagghara.nato ``asubhaa''ti pavattasa~n~na.m. dukkhasa~n~naaparivaaraa hi aya.m, eteneva cettha dukkhasa~n~naapi gahitaati veditabba.m. ^b^lokamhi ca anabhirati^eb^nti sabbaloke tebhuumakesu sa"nkhaaresu anaabhiratisa~n~na.m. etena aadiinavaanupassana.m nibbidaanupassana~nca vadati.

[03] eva.m pana vipassanaabhaavana.m anuyutto ta.m ussukkaapento ime dhamme va.d.dheyyaati dassento ^b^``bhaaveyya ca bojjha"nge''^eb^ti gaathamaaha. tassattho -- bodhiyaa satiaadisattavidhadhammasaamaggiyaa, bodhissa vaa ta.msama"ngino puggalassa a"ngaati bojjha"ngaa, satiaadayo dhammaa. te satiaadike sattabojjha"nge, chandaaadiini cattaari iddhipaadaani, saddhaadiini pa~ncindriyaani, saddhaadiiniyeva pa~nca ^a^V2.0180^ea^ balaani, sammaadi.t.thiaadiina.m vasena a.t.tha"ngaariyamagga~nca. ca-saddena satipa.t.thaanaani sammappadhaanaani ca gahitaaniiti sabbepi sattati.msappabhede bodhipakkhiyadhamme bhaaveyya uppaadeyya ceva va.d.dheyya ca. tattha yadetesa.m pa.thamamaggakkha.ne uppaadana.m, uparimaggakkha.ne ca va.d.dhana.m, eta.m ^b^sama.nassa^eb^ bhikkhuno saaruppanti.

[03] eva.m bodhipakkhiyasattati.msadhamme bhaavento yathaa maggasacca.m bhaavanaabhisamayavasena abhisameti, eva.m samudayasacca.m pahaanaabhisamayavasena, nirodhasacca.m sacchikiriyaabhisamayavasena abhisametiiti dassento ^b^``ta.nha.m pajaheyyaa''^eb^ti osaanagaathamaaha. tattha ^b^ta.nha.m pajaheyyaa^eb^ti, kaamata.nhaadipabheda.m sabba.m ta.nha.m ariyamaggena anavasesato samucchindeyya, mona.m vuccati ~naa.na.m, tena ^a^P2.0254^ea^ samannaagatattaa ^b^muni. samuulake aasave padaaleyyaa^eb^ti kaamaraagaanusayaadisamuulake kaamaasavaadike sabbepi aasave bhindeyya samucchindeyya. ^b^vihareyya vippamutto^eb^ti eva.m sabbaso kilesaana.m pahiinattaa sabbadhi vimutto sabbuupadhipa.tinissagga.m ^a^M2.0212^ea^ nirodha.m nibbaana.m sacchikatvaa vihareyya. ^b^eta^eb^nti yadeta.m vihara.na.m, eta.m sama.nassa samitapaapassa bhikkhuno patiruupa.m saaruppanti attho.

[03] eva.m thero sama.nasaaruppapa.tipattikittanamukhena saasanassa niyyaanikabhaava.m tabbilomato baahirakasamayassa aniyyaanikata~nca vibhaavesi. ta.m sutvaa te braahma.namahaasaalaa saasane abhippasannaa sara.naadiisu pati.t.thahi.msu.

[03] ekaadasanipaate ^a^M2.0213^ea^ ^a^V2.0181^ea^ ^b^ki.m tavattho vane taataa^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato sa.mkiccattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinitvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m braahma.namahaasaalakule pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi. tasmi.m kucchigateyeva maataa byaadhitaa hutvaa kaalamakaasi. tassaa susaana.m netvaa jhaapiyamaanaaya gabbhaasayo na jhaayi. manussaa suulehi kucchi.m vijjhantaa daarakassa akkhiko.ti.m pahari.msu. te ta.m vijjhitvaa a"ngaarehi pa.ticchaadetvaa pakkami.msu. kucchipadesopi jhaayi, a"ngaaramatthake pana suva.n.nabimbasadiso daarako padumagabbhe nipanno viya ahosi. pacchimabhavikasattassa hi sinerunaa otthariyamaanassapi arahatta.m appatvaa jiivitakkhayo naama natthi.
