[21] ``ya.m ^a^P3.0014^ea^ vo kicca.m sariirena, ta.m karotha yadicchatha.
[22] na me tappaccayaa tattha, doso pema~nca hehitii''ti.. --
[25] aya.m sa"ngiitikaarehi vuttagaathaa. ito aparaa tisso coraana.m, therassa ca vacanapa.tivacanagaathaa --
[21] ``ki.m ^a^M2.0267^ea^ bhadante karitvaana, ko vaa aacariyo tava.
[21] ``sutvaana coraa isino subhaasita.m, nikkhippa satthaani ca aavudhaani ca.
[22] tamhaa ca kammaa virami.msu eke, eke ca pabbajjamarocayi.msu..
[21] ``te pabbajitvaa sugatassa saasane, bhaavetva bojjha"ngabalaani pa.n.ditaa.
[22] udaggacittaa sumanaa katindriyaa, phusi.msu nibbaanapada.m asa"nkhata''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^natthi cetasika.m dukkha.m, anapekkhassa, gaama.nii^eb^ti gaama.ni, apekkhaaya, ta.nhaaya, abhaavena anapekkhassa maadisassa, lohitasabhaavo pubbo viya, cetasika.m dukkha.m domanassa.m natthi, domanassaabhaavaapadesena bhayaabhaava.m vadati. tenaaha ^b^``atikkantaa bhayaa sabbe''^eb^ti. ^b^atikkantaa bhayaa sabbe^eb^ti khii.nasa.myojanassa arahato pa~ncaviisati mahaabhayaa, a~n~ne ca sabbepi bhayaa eka.msena atikkantaa atiitaa, apagataati attho.

[03] ^b^di.t.the dhamme yathaatathe^eb^ti catusaccadhamme pari~n~naapahaanasacchikiriyabhaavanaavasena maggapa~n~naaya yathaabhuuta.m di.t.the. ^b^mara.ne^eb^ti mara.nahetu. ^b^bhaaranikkhepane yathaa^eb^ti yathaa koci puriso siise .thitena mahataa garubhaarena sa.msiidanto tassa nikkhepane, apanayane na bhaayati, eva.m sampadamidanti attho. vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa --
[22] bhaaraadaana.m dukha.m loke, bhaaranikkhepana.m sukha''nti.. (sa.m0 ni0 3.22).

[03] ^b^suci.n.na^eb^nti su.t.thu carita.m. ^b^brahmacariya^eb^nti, sikkhattayasa"ngaha.m saasanabrahmacariya.m. tato eva ^b^maggo caapi subhaavito^eb^ a.t.tha"ngiko ariyamaggopi sammadeva bhaavito. ^b^rogaanamiva sa"nkhaye^eb^ti yathaa bahuuhi rogehi abhibhuutassa aaturassa rogaana.m sa"nkhaye piitisomanassameva hoti, eva.m khandharogasa"nkhaye mara.ne maadisassa bhaya.m natthi.

[03] ^b^nirassaadaa bhavaa di.t.thaa^eb^ti tiihi dukkhataahi abhibhuutaa, ekaadasahi aggiihi aadittaa, tayo bhavaa nirassaadaa, assaadarahitaa, mayaa di.t.thaa. ^b^visa.m pitvaava cha.d.dita^eb^nti pamaadavasena visa.m pivitvaa taadisena payogena cha.d.dita.m viya mara.ne me bhaya.m natthiiti attho.

[03] ^b^mutto^eb^ ^a^V2.0228^ea^ ^b^aaghaatanaa yathaa^eb^ti yathaa corehi maara.nattha.m aaghaatana.m niito kenaci upaayena tato mutto ha.t.thatu.t.tho hoti, eva.m sa.msaarapaara.m, nibbaana.m, gatattaa ^b^paaraguu,^eb^ catuuhipi upaadaanehi ^b^anupaadaano,^eb^ pari~n~naadiina.m so.lasanna.m kiccaana.m katattaa ^b^katakicco^eb^ kaamaasavaadiihi ^b^anaasavo, aayukkhayaa^eb^ aayukkhayahetu ^b^tu.t.tho^eb^ somanassiko hoti.

[03] ^b^uttama^eb^nti se.t.tha.m. ^b^dhammata^eb^nti, dhammasabhaava.m. arahatte siddhe sijjhanahetu i.t.thaadiisu taadibhaava.m. ^b^sabbaloke^eb^ti sabbalokasmimpi, diighaayukasukhabahulataadivasena sa.myuttepi loke. ^b^anatthiko^eb^ti, anapekkho. ^b^aadittaava gharaa mutto^eb^ti yathaa koci puriso samantato aadittato pajjalitato gehato nissa.to, tato nissara.nanimitta.m na socati, eva.m khii.naasavo mara.nanimitta.m na socati.

[03] ^b^yadatthi sa"ngata.m ki~ncii^eb^ti ya.mki~nci imasmi.m loke atthi, vijjati, upalabbhati sa"ngata.m, sattehi sa"nkhaarehi vaa samaagamo, samodhaana.m. ``sa"nkhata''ntipi paa.tho, tassa ya.mki~nci paccayehi samacca sambhuyya kata.m, pa.ticcasamuppannanti attho. ^b^bhavo vaa yattha labbhatii^eb^ti yasmi.m sattanikaaye yo upapattibhavo labbhati. ^b^sabba.m anissara.m eta^eb^nti sabbameta.m issararahita.m, na ettha kenaci ``eva.m hotuu''ti issariya.m vattetu.m sakkaa. ^b^iti vutta.m mahesinaa^eb^ti ^a^M2.0269^ea^ ``sabbe dhammaa anattaa''ti eva.m vutta.m mahesinaa sammaasambuddhena. tasmaa ``anissara.m eta''nti pajaananto mara.nasmi.m na socatiiti yojanaa.

[03] ^b^na^eb^ ^a^P3.0016^ea^ ^b^ga.nhaati bhava.m ki~ncii^eb^ti yo ariyasaavako ``sabbe sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa''tiaadinaa (dha0 pa0 277) yathaa buddhena bhagavataa desita.m, tathaa ta.m bhavattaya.m vipassanaapa~n~naasahitaaya maggapa~n~naaya pajaanaati. so yathaa koci puriso sukhakaamo divasa.m santatta.m ayogu.la.m hatthena na ga.nhaati, eva.m ki~nci khuddaka.m vaa mahanta.m vaa bhava.m na ga.nhaati, na tattha ta.nha.m karotiiti attho.

[03] ^b^na me hoti ``ahosi''^eb^nti ``atiitamaddhaana.m aha.m iidiso ahosi''nti attadi.t.thivasena na me cittappavatti atthi di.t.thiyaa sammadeva ugghaa.titattaa, dhammasabhaavassa ca sudi.t.thattaa. ^b^``bhavissa''nti na hoti me^eb^ti tato eva ``anaagatamaddhaana.m aha.m ediso katha.m nu kho bhavissa.m bhaveyya''nti evampi me na hoti. ^b^sa"nkhaaraa vigamissantii^eb^ti eva.m pana hoti ``yathaapaccaya.m pavattamaanaa sa"nkhaaraava, na ettha koci attaa vaa attaniya.m vaa, te ca kho vigamissanti ^a^V2.0229^ea^, vinassissanti, kha.ne kha.ne bhijjissantii''ti. ^b^tattha kaa paridevanaa^eb^ti eva.m passantassa maadisassa tattha sa"nkhaaragate kaa naama paridevanaa.

[03] ^b^suddha^eb^nti kevala.m, attasaarena asammissa.m. ^b^dhammasamuppaada^eb^nti paccayapaccayuppannadhammasamuppatti.m avijjaadipaccayehi sa"nkhaaraadidhammamattappavatti.m. ^b^sa"nkhaarasantati^eb^nti kilesakammavipaakappabhedasa"nkhaarapabandha.m. ^b^passantassa yathaabhuuta^eb^nti saha vipassanaaya maggapa~n~naaya yaathaavato jaanantassa.

[03] ^b^ti.naka.t.thasama.m loka^eb^nti yathaa ara~n~ne apariggahe ti.naka.t.the kenaci gayhamaane aparassa ``mayha.m santaka.m aya.m ga.nhatii''ti na hoti, eva.m so asaamikataaya ti.naka.t.thasama.m sa"nkhaaraloka.m yadaa pa~n~naaya passati, so tattha mamatta.m ^b^asa.mvinda.m^eb^ asa.mvindanto alabhanto akaronto. ^b^natthi me^eb^ti ``ahu vata soha.m, ta.m me natthii''ti na socati.

[03] ^b^ukka.n.thaami sariirenaa^eb^ti asaarakena abhinudena dukkhena akata~n~nunaa asuciduggandhajegucchapa.tikkuulasabhaavena iminaa kaayena ukka.n.thaami ima.m kaaya.m ^a^M2.0270^ea^ nibbindanto eva.m ti.t.thaami. ^b^bhavenamhi anatthiko^eb^ti sabbenapi bhavena anatthiko amhi, na ki~nci bhava.m patthemi. ^b^soya.m bhijjissati kaayo^eb^ti aya.m mama kaayo idaani tumhaaka.m payogena a~n~nathaa vaa a~n~nattha bhijjissati. ^b^a~n~no ca na bhavissatii^eb^ti a~n~no kaayo mayha.m aayati.m na bhavissati, punabbhavaabhaavato.

[03] ^b^ya.m vo kicca.m sariirenaa^eb^ti ya.m tumhaaka.m iminaa sariirena payojana.m, ^b^ta.m karotha yadicchatha,^eb^ icchatha ce. ^b^na me tappaccayaa^eb^ti, ta.m nimitta.m ^a^P3.0017^ea^ imassa sariirassa tumhehi yathicchitakiccassa kara.nahetu. ^b^tatthaa^eb^ti tesu karontesu ca akarontesu ca. ^b^doso pema~nca hehitii^eb^ti yathaakkama.m pa.tigho anunayo na bhavissati, attano bhave apekkhaaya sabbaso pahiinattaati adhippaayo. a~n~napaccayaa a~n~nattha ca pa.tighaanunayesu asantesupi tappaccayaa, ``tatthaa''ti vacana.m yathaadhigatavasena vutta.m.

[03] ^b^tassaa^eb^ti adhimuttattherassa. ^b^ta.m vacana^eb^nti ``natthi cetasika.m dukkha''ntiaadika.m mara.ne bhayaabhaavaadidiipaka.m, tato eva abbhuta.m lomaha.msana.m vacana.m sutvaa. ^b^maa.navaa^eb^ti coraa. coraa hi ``maa.navaa''ti vuccanti ``maa.navehi saha gacchanti katakammehi akatakammehipii''tiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 2.149) viya.

[03] ^b^ki.m^eb^ ^a^V2.0230^ea^ ^b^bhadante karitvaanaa^eb^ti, bhante, ki.m naama tapokamma.m katvaa. ko vaa tava aacariyo kassa ^b^saasana.m,^eb^ ovaada.m nissaaya aya.m ^b^asokataa^eb^ mara.nakaale sokaabhaavo labbhatiiti ^b^eta.m^eb^ attha.m ^b^abravu.m,^eb^ pucchaavasena kathesu.m, bhaasi.msu.

[03] ta.m sutvaa thero tesa.m pa.tivacana.m dento ^b^``sabba~n~nuu''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^sabba~n~nuu^eb^ti paropadesena vinaa sabbapakaarena sabbadhammaavabodhanasamatthassa aaka"nkhaapa.tibaddhavuttino anaavara.na~naa.nassa adhigamena atiitaadibheda.m sabba.m jaanaatiiti, sabba~n~nuu. teneva samantacakkhunaa sabbassa dassanato ^b^sabbadassaavii^eb^. yamhi anaavara.na~naa.na.m, tadeva sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.na.m, nattheva asaadhaara.na~naa.napaa.liyaa virodho visayuppattimukhena a~n~nehi asaadhaara.nabhaavadassanattha.m ekasseva ~naa.nassa dvidhaa vuttattaa. ya.m panettha vattabba.m, ta.m ^b^itivuttakava.n.nanaaya.m^eb^ (itivu0 a.t.tha0 38) vitthaarato vuttamevaati tattha vuttanayeneva ^a^M2.0271^ea^ veditabba.m. pa~ncannampi maaraana.m vijayato ^b^jino,^eb^ hiinaadivibhaagabhinne sabbasmi.m sattanikaaye adhimuttavuttitaaya mahatiyaa karu.naaya samannaagatattaa ^b^mahaakaaru.niko,^eb^ di.t.thadhammikasamparaayikaparamatthehi yathaaraha.m veneyyaana.m anusaasanato ^b^satthaa,^eb^ tato eva sabbalokassa kilesarogatikicchanato ^b^sabbalokatikicchako,^eb^ sammaasambuddho aacariyo mamaati yojanaa. ^b^khayagaamii^eb^ti nibbaanagaamii.

[03] eva.m therena satthu saasanassa ca gu.ne pakaasite pa.tiladdhasaddhaa ekacce coraa pabbaji.msu, ekacce upaasakatta.m pavedesu.m. tamattha.m diipento dhammasa"ngaahakaa ^b^``sutvaana coraa''^eb^tiaadinaa dve gaathaa abhaasi.msu. tattha ^a^P3.0018^ea^ ^b^isino^eb^ti adhisiilasikkhaadiina.m esana.t.thena isino, adhimuttattherassa. ^b^nikkhippaa^eb^ti pahaaya. ^b^satthaani ca aavudhaani caa^eb^ti asiaadisatthaani ceva dhanukalaapaadiaavudhaani ca. ^b^tamhaa ca kammaa^eb^ti tato corakammato.

[03] ^b^te pabbajitvaa sugatassa saasane^eb^ti te coraa sobhanagamanataadiihi sugatassa bhagavato saasane pabbajja.m upagantvaa. bhaavanaavisesaadhigataaya odagyalakkha.naaya piitiyaa samannaagamena ^b^udaggacittaa. sumanaa^eb^ti somanassappattaa. ^b^katindriyaa^eb^ti bhaavitindriyaa. ^b^phusi.msuu^eb^ti aggamaggaadhigamena asa"nkhata.m nibbaana.m adhigacchi.msu. adhimutto kira core nibbisevane katvaa, te tattheva .thapetvaa, maatu santika.m gantvaa, maatara.m aapucchitvaa, paccaagantvaa tehi saddhi.m upajjhaayassa santika.m gantvaa, pabbaajetvaa upasampada.m akaasi. atha tesa.m kamma.t.thaana.m aacikkhi ^a^V2.0231^ea^, te nacirasseva arahatte pati.t.thahi.msu. tena vutta.m ``pabbajitvaa...pe0... asa"nkhata''nti.

[03] ^b^sama.nassa ahu cintaa^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato paaraapariyattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinitvaa sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m a~n~natarassa braahma.namahaasaalassa putto hutvaa ^a^M2.0272^ea^ nibbatti. tassa vayappattassa gottavasena ^b^paaraapariyo^eb^tveva sama~n~naa ahosi. so tayo vede uggahetvaa braahma.nasippesu nipphatti.m gato. ekadivasa.m satthu dhammadesanaakaale jetavanavihaara.m gantvaa parisapariyante nisiidi. satthaa tassa ajjhaasaya.m oloketvaa ^b^indriyabhaavanaasutta.m^eb^ (ma0 ni0 3.453) desesi. so ta.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbaji. ta.m sutta.m uggahetvaa tadatthamanucintesi. yathaa pana anucintesi, svaayamattho gaathaasu eva aavi bhavissati. so tathaa anuvicintento aayatanamukhena vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m patto. aparabhaage attanaa cintitaakaara.m pakaasento --
[22] attano kiccakaariissa, na ca ka~nci vihe.thaye..
[22] attano kiccakaariissa, na ca ka~nci vihe.thaye..
[22] anaadiinavadassaavii, so dukkhaa na hi muccati..
[22] anaadiinavadassaavii, so dukkhaa na hi muccati..
[22] na so muccati dukkhamhaa, gandhesu adhimucchito..
[21] ``mana.m cetehi dhammehi, yo na sakkoti rakkhitu.m.
[21] ``so atthavaa so dhamma.t.tho, so dakkho so vicakkha.no.
[22] na ta.m kiccanti ma~n~nitvaa, appamatto vicakkha.no..
[21] ``ya~nca atthena sa~n~nutta.m, yaa ca dhammagataa rati.
[22] ta.m samaadaaya vattetha, saa hi ve uttamaa rati..
[22] hantvaa vadhitvaa atha socayitvaa, aalopati saahasaa yo paresa.m..
[22] pa~nca pa~ncahi hantvaana, aniigho yaati braahma.no..
[22] sabbena sabba.m buddhassa, so naro sukhamedhatii''ti.. -- imaa gaathaa abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^sama.nassaa^eb^ti pabbajitassa. ^b^ahuu^eb^ti ahosi. ^b^cintaa^eb^ti dhammacintaa dhammavicaara.naa. ^b^paaraapariyassaa^eb^ti paaraaparagottassa. ``paaraacariyassaa''tipi pa.thanti. ^b^bhikkhuno^eb^ti sa.msaare bhaya.m ikkhanasiilassa. ^b^ekakassaa^eb^ti asahaayassa, etena kaayaviveka.m dasseti. ^b^pavivittassaa^eb^ti pavivekahetunaa kilesaana.m vikkhambhanena viveka.m aaraddhassa, etena cittaviveka.m dasseti. tenaaha ^b^``jhaayino''^eb^ti. ^b^jhaayino^eb^ti jhaayanasiilassa, yonisomanasikaaresu yuttassaati attho. sabbameta.m thero attaana.m para.m viya katvaa vadati.

[03] ^b^``kimaanupubba''^eb^ntiaadinaa ta.m cintana.m dasseti. tattha pa.thamagaathaaya.m taava ^b^kimaanupubba^eb^nti anupubba.m anukkamo, anupubbameva vakkhamaanesu vatasamaacaaresu ko anukkamo, kena anukkamena te pa.tipajjitabbaati attho. ^b^puriso ki.m vata.m ki.m samaacaara^eb^nti atthakaamo puriso samaadiyitabba.t.thena ``vata''nti laddhanaama.m, kiidisa.m siila.m samaacaara.m, samaacaranto, attano ^b^kiccakaarii^eb^ kattabbakaarii assa, ^b^ka~nci^eb^ satta.m na ca ^b^vihe.thaye,^eb^ na baadheyyaati attho. attano kicca.m naama sama.nadhammo, sa"nkhepato siilasamaadhipa~n~naa, ta.m sampaadentassa paravihe.thanaaya lesopi natthi taaya sati sama.nabhaavasseva abhaavato.

[03] yathaaha bhagavaa -- ``na hi pabbajito paruupaghaatii, na sama.no hoti para.m vihe.thayanto''ti (dha0 pa0 184). ettha ca vataggaha.nena vaarittasiila.m gahita.m, samaacaaraggaha.nena samaacaritabbato caarittasiilena saddhi.m jhaanavipassanaadi, tasmaa vaarittasiila.m padhaana.m. tatthaapi ca yasmaa indriyasa.mvare siddhe sabba.m siila.m surakkhita.m, sugopitameva hoti, tasmaa indriyasa.mvarasiila.m taava dassetukaamo indriyaana.m arakkha.ne rakkha.ne ca aadiinavaanisa.mse vibhaavento ^a^M2.0275^ea^ ^b^``indriyaani manussaana''^eb^ntiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^indriyaanii^eb^ti rakkhitabbadhammanidassana.m, tasmaa cakkhaadiini cha indriyaaniiti vutta.m hoti. ^b^manussaana^eb^nti rakkha.nayogyapuggalanidassana.m. ^b^hitaayaa^eb^ti atthaaya. ^b^ahitaayaa^eb^ti anatthaaya. hontiiti ^a^P3.0021^ea^ vacanaseso. katha.m pana taaniyeva hitaaya ca ahitaaya hontiiti aaha ``rakkhitaanii''tiaadi. tassattho -- yassa cakkhaadiini indriyaani satikavaa.tena apihitaani, tassa ruupaadiisu abhijjhaadipaapadhammapavattiyaa dvaarabhaavato anatthaaya pihitaani, tadabhaavato atthaaya sa.mvattantiiti.

[03] ^b^indriyaaneva^eb^ ^a^V2.0234^ea^ ^b^saarakkha^eb^nti yasmaa indriyasa.mvaro paripu.n.no siilasampada.m paripuureti, siilasampadaa paripu.n.naa samaadhisampada.m paripuureti, samaadhisampadaa paripu.n.naa pa~n~naasampada.m paripuureti, tasmaa indriyaarakkhaa attahitapa.tipattiyaava muulanti dassento aaha ``indriyaaneva saarakkha''nti. satipubba"ngamena aarakkhena sa.mrakkhanto yonisomanasikaarena indriyaani eva taava sammadeva rakkhanto, yathaa akusalacoraa tehi tehi dvaarehi pavisitvaa cittasantaane kusala.m bha.n.da.m na vilumpanti, tathaa taani pidahantoti attho. saarakkhanti ca sa.m-saddassa saabhaava.m katvaa vutta.m, ``saaraago''tiaadiisu viya. ``sa.mrakkha''nti ca paa.tho. ^b^indriyaani ca gopaya^eb^nti tasseva pariyaayavacana.m, pariyaayavacane payojana.m ^b^nettia.t.thakathaaya.m^eb^ vuttanayeneva veditabba.m. ^b^``attano kiccakaariissaa''^eb^ti iminaa attahitapa.tipatti.m dasseti, ^b^``na ca ka~nci vihe.thaye''^eb^ti iminaa parahitapa.tipatti.m, ubhayenaapi vaa attahitapa.tipattimeva dasseti paraavihe.thanassaapi attahitapa.tipattibhaavato. atha vaa padadvayenapi attahitapa.tipatti.m dasseti puthujjanassa sekkhassa ca parahitapa.tipattiyaapi attahitapa.tipattibhaavato.

[03] eva.m rakkhitaani indriyaani hitaaya hontiiti vodaanapakkha.m sa"nkhepeneva dassetvaa, arakkhitaani ahitaaya hontiiti sa.mkilesapakkha.m pana vibhajitvaa dassento ^b^``cakkhundriya.m ce''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^cakkhundriya.m ce ruupesu, gacchanta.m anivaaraya.m. anaadiinavadassaavii^eb^ti yo niilapiitaadibhedesu i.t.thaani.t.thesu ruupaayatanesu gacchanta.m yathaaruci pavattanta.m cakkhundriya.m anivaaraya.m, anivaarayanto appa.tibaahanto tathaapavattiya.m aadiinavadassaavii na hoti ce, di.t.thadhammika.m samparaayika~nca aadiinava.m dosa.m na passati ce ^a^M2.0276^ea^. ``gacchanta.m nivaaraye anissara.nadassaavii''ti ca paa.tho. tattha yo ``di.t.the di.t.thamatta.m bhavissatii''ti (sa.m0 ni0 4.95) vuttavidhinaa di.t.thamatteyeva .thatvaa satisampaja~n~navasena ruupaayatane pavattamaano tattha nissara.nadassaavii naama. vuttavipariyaayena anissara.nadassaavii da.t.thabbo. ^b^so dukkhaa na hi muccatii^eb^ti so evaruupo puggalo va.t.tadukkhato na muccateva. ettha ca cakkhundriyassa anivaara.na.m ^a^P3.0022^ea^ naama yathaa tena dvaarena abhijjhaadayo paapadhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tathaa pavattana.m, ta.m pana atthato satisampaja~n~nassa anu.t.thaapana.m da.t.thabba.m. sesindriyesupi eseva nayo. ^b^adhimucchito^eb^ti adhimuttata.nhaaya muccha.m aapanno. ^b^ambila^eb^nti ambilarasa.m. ^b^madhuragga^eb^nti madhurarasako.t.thaasa.m. tathaa ^b^tittakagga.m. anussara^eb^nti assaadavasena ta.m ta.m rasa.m anuvicintento. ^b^ganthito^eb^ti rasata.nhaaya tasmi.m tasmi.m rase ganthito bandho. ``gadhito''ti ca pa.thanti, gedha.m aapannoti attho. ^b^hadaya.m naavabujjhatii^eb^ti ``dukkhassanta.m karissaamii''ti pabbajjaadikkha.ne uppanna.m citta.m na jaanaati na sallakkheti ^a^V2.0235^ea^, saasanassa hadaya.m abbhantara.m anavajjadhammaana.m sammaddanarasata.nhaaya gadhito naavabujjhati na jaanaati, na pa.tipajjatiiti attho.

[03] ^b^subhaanii^eb^ti sundaraani. ^b^appa.tikuulaanii^eb^ti manoramaani, i.t.thaani. ^b^pho.t.thabbaanii^eb^ti upaadi.n.naanupaadi.n.nappabhede phasse. ^b^ratto^eb^ti rajjanasabhaavena raagena ratto. ^b^raagaadhikara.na^eb^nti raagahetu. ^b^vividha.m vindate dukha^eb^nti raagapari.laahaadivasena di.t.thadhammika~nca nirayasantaapaadivasena abhisamparaaya~nca naanappakaara.m dukkha.m pa.tilabhati.

[03] ^b^mana.m cetehii^eb^ti mana~nca etehi ruupaaramma.naadiihi dhammaaramma.nappabhedehi ca. ^b^na^eb^nti puggala.m. ^b^sabbehii^eb^ti sabbehi pa~ncahipi. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- yo puggalo mana.m, manodvaara.m, ^b^etehi^eb^ yathaavuttehi ruupaadiihi pa~ncahi dhammehi dhammaaramma.nappabhedato ca. tattha pavattanakapaapakammanivaara.nena ^b^rakkhitu.m,^eb^ gopitu.m na sakkoti, ^b^tato^eb^ tassa arakkha.nato na.m puggala.m ta.mnimitta.m dukkha.m ^b^anveti,^eb^ anugacchati, anugacchanta~nca etehi pa~ncahipi ruupaaramma.naadiihi cha.t.thaaramma.nena saddhi.m sabbehipi aaramma.nappaccayabhuutehi anugacchatiiti. ettha cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya~nca asampattaggaahibhaavato ``gacchanta.m ^a^M2.0277^ea^ anivaaraya''nti vutta.m itara.m sampattaggaahiiti ``gandhe ce pa.tisevatii''tiaadinaa vutta.m. tatthaapi ca rasata.nhaa ca pho.t.thabbata.nhaa ca sattaana.m visesato balavatiiti ``rasata.nhaaya gadhito, pho.t.thabbaani anussarantoti'' vuttanti da.t.thabba.m.

[03] eva.m aguttadvaarassa puggalassa chahi dvaarehi chasupi aaramma.nesu asa.mvaranimitta.m uppajjanakadukkha.m dassetvaa svaayamasa.mvaro yasmaa sariirasabhaavaanavabodhena hoti, tasmaa sariirasabhaava.m vicinanto ^b^``pubbalohitasampu.n.na''^eb^ntiaadinaa gaathaadvayamaaha. tassattho ^a^P3.0023^ea^ -- sariira.m naameta.m pubbena lohitena ca ^b^sampu.n.na.m^eb^ bharita.m a~n~nena ca pittasemhaadinaa bahunaa ku.napena, tayida.m naraviirena naresu chekena sippaacariyena kata.m vaggu ma.t.tha.m laakhaaparikammaadinaa cittita.m, anto pana guuthaadiasucibharita.m samugga.m viya chavimattamanohara.m baalajanasammoha.m dukkhasabhaavataaya nirayaadidukkhataapanato ca ^b^ka.tuka.m,^eb^ parikappasambhavena amuulakena assaadamattena madhurataaya ^b^madhurassaada.m,^eb^ tato eva piyabhaavanibandhanena ^b^piyanibandhana.m,^eb^ dussahataaya appatiitataaya ca ^b^dukha.m,^eb^ iidise sariire assaadalobhena mahaadukkha.m paccanubhuyyamaana.m anavabujjhanto loko madhuragiddho khuradhaaraalehakapuriso viya da.t.thabboti.

[03] idaani ^a^V2.0236^ea^ ete cakkhaadiina.m gocarabhuutaa ruupaadayo vuttaa, te visesato purisassa itthipa.tibaddhaa kamaniiyaati tattha sa.mvaro kaatabboti dassento ^b^``itthiruupe''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^itthiruupe^eb^ti itthiyaa catusamu.t.thaanikaruupaayatanasa"nkhaate va.n.ne. api ca yo koci itthiyaa nivatthassa ala"nkaarassa vaa gandhava.n.nakaadiina.m vaa pi.landhanamaalaana.m vaa kaayapa.tibaddho va.n.no purisassa cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.nabhaavaaya upakappati, sabbameta.m ``itthiruupa''ntveva veditabba.m. ^b^itthisare^eb^ti itthiyaa giitalapitahasitaruditasadde. api ca itthiyaa nivatthavatthassapi ala"nkataala"nkaarassapi itthipayoganipphaaditaa ve.nuvii.naasa"nkhapa.navaadiinampi saddaa idha itthisaraggaha.nena gahitaati veditabbaa. sabbopeso purisassa citta.m aaka.d.dhatiiti. ``itthirase''ti pana paa.liyaa catusamu.t.thaanikarasaayatanavasena vutta.m. itthiyaa ki.mkaarapa.tissaavitaadivasena assavaraso ceva paribhogaraso ^a^M2.0278^ea^ ca itthirasoti eke. yo pana itthiyaa o.t.thama.msasammakkhitakhe.laadiraso, yo ca taaya purisassa dinnayaagubhattaadiina.m raso, sabbopeso ``itthiraso''tveva veditabbo. pho.t.thabbepi ca itthiyaa kaayasamphasso, itthisariiraaruu.lhaana.m vatthaala"nkaaramaalaadiina.m phasso ``itthipho.t.thabbo''tveva veditabbo. ettha ca yesa.m itthiruupe itthisareti paa.li, tesa.m api-saddena itthirasasa"ngaho da.t.thabbo. ^b^itthigandhesuu^eb^ti itthiyaa catusamu.t.thaanikagandhaayatanesu. itthiyaa sariiragandho naama duggandho. ekaccaa hi itthii assagandhinii hoti, ekaccaa me.n.dagandhinii, ekaccaa sedagandhinii, ekaccaa so.nitagandhinii, tathaapi taasu andhabaalo rajjateva. cakkavattino pana itthiratanassa kaayato candanagandho vaayati, mukhato ^a^P3.0024^ea^ uppalagandho, aya.m na sabbaasa.m hotiiti, itthiyaa sariire aaruu.lho aagantuko anulimpanaadigandho ``itthigandho''ti veditabbo. ^b^saaratto^eb^ti su.t.thu ratto gadhito mucchito, ida.m pana pada.m ``itthiruupe''tiaadiisupi yojetabba.m. ^b^vividha.m vindate dukha^eb^nti itthiruupaadiisu saraaganimitta.m di.t.thadhammika.m vadhabandhanaadivasena samparaayika.m pa~ncavidhabandhanaadivasena naanappakaara.m dukkha.m pa.tilabhati.

[03] ^b^itthisotaani sabbaanii^eb^ti itthiyaa ruupaadiaaramma.naani sabbaani anavasesaani pa~nca ta.nhaasotaani sandanti. ^b^pa~ncasuu^eb^ti purisassa pa~ncasu dvaaresu. ^b^tesa^eb^nti tesa.m pa~ncanna.m sotaana.m. ^b^aavara.na^eb^nti sa.mvara.na.m, yathaa asa.mvaro na uppajjati, eva.m satisampaja~n~na.m paccupa.t.thapetvaa sa.mvara.m pavattetu.m yo sakkoti, so ^b^viiriyavaa^eb^ aaraddhaviiriyo akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaayaati attho.

[03] eva.m ruupaadigocare pabbajitassa pa.tipatti.m dassetvaa idaani gaha.t.thassa dassetu.m ^b^``so atthavaa''^eb^tiaadi ^a^V2.0237^ea^ vutta.m. tattha ^b^so atthavaa so dhamma.t.tho, so dakkho so vicakkha.no^eb^ti so puggalo imasmi.m loke atthavaa, buddhimaa, dhamme .thito, dhamme dakkho, dhamme cheko, analaso vaa vicakkha.no iti kattabbataasu kusalo naama. ^b^kareyya ramamaanopi, kicca.m dhammatthasa.mhita^eb^nti geharatiyaa ramamaanopi dhammatthasa.mhita.m dhammato atthato ca anapetameva ta.m ta.m kattabba.m. anuppannaana.m bhogaana.m uppaadana.m, uppannaana.m paripaalana.m, paribhoga~nca kareyya, a~n~nama~n~na.m, avirodhena, a~n~nama~n~na.m, abaadhanena, tivaggattha.m anuyu~njeyyaati adhippaayo ^a^M2.0279^ea^. aya~nca nayo yesa.m sammaapa.tipattiavirodhena tivaggatthassa vasena vattati bimbisaaramahaaraajaadiina.m viya, tesa.m vasena vutto. na yesa.m kesa~nci vasenaati da.t.thabba.m.

[03] ^b^atho siidati sa~n~nutta^eb^nti yadi idhaloke supasa.mhita.m di.t.thadhammika.m attha.m pariggahetvaa .thita.m. ^b^vajje kicca.m niratthaka^eb^nti samparaayikattharahita.m anatthupasa.mhita.m kicca.m sacepi vissajjeyya pariccajeyya. ^b^na ta.m kiccanti ma~n~nitvaa, appamatto vicakkha.no^eb^ti satiavippavaasena appamatto vicaara.napa~n~naasambhavena vicakkha.no anatthupasa.mhita.m, ta.m kicca.m mayaa na kaatabbanti ma~n~nitvaa vivajjeyya.

[03] vivajjetvaa pana ^b^ya~nca atthena sa~n~nutta.m, yaa ca dhammagataa rati. ta.m samaadaaya vattethaa^eb^ti ya.mki~nci di.t.thadhammikasamparaayikappabhedena atthena ^a^P3.0025^ea^ hitena sa.myutta.m tadubhayahitaavaha.m, yaa ca adhikusaladhammagataa samathavipassanaasahitaa rati, tadubhaya.m sammaa aadiyitvaa pariggaha.m katvaa vatteyya. ``sabba.m rati.m dhammarati jinaatii''ti (dha0 pa0 354) vacanato saa hi eka.msena uttamatthassa paapanato uttamaa rati naama.

[03] ya.m pana kaamaratisa.myutta.m kicca.m niratthakanti vutta.m, tassaa anatthupasa.mhitabhaava.m dassetu.m ^b^``uccaavacehii''^eb^tiaadi vutta.m. tattha ^b^uccaavacehii^eb^ti mahantehi ceva khuddakehi ca. ^b^upaayehii^eb^ti nayehi. ^b^paresamabhijigiisatii^eb^ti paresa.m santaka.m aaharitu.m icchati, pare vaa sabbathaa haapeti, jinaapeti para.m hantvaa, vadhitvaa atha socayitvaa, aalopati saahasaa yo paresa.m. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- yo puggalo kaamahetu pare hananto, ghaatento, socento sandhicchedasandhiruhanapasayhaavahaaraadiihi naanupaayehi paresa.m santaka.m haritu.m vaayamanto saahasaakaara.m karoti, aalopati, jigiisati saapateyyavasena pare haapeti, tassa ta.m kicca.m kaamaratisannissita.m anatthupasa.mhita.m ekantanihiinanti. etena tappa.tipakkhato dhammagataaya ratiyaa eka.msato uttamabhaava.myeva vibhaaveti.

[03] idaani ^a^V2.0238^ea^ ya.m ``tesamaavara.na.m kaatu.m yo sakkotii''ti indriyaana.m aavara.na.m vutta.m, ta.m upaayena saha vibhaavento ^b^``tacchanto aa.niyaa aa.ni.m^eb^ ^a^M2.0280^ea^, ^b^nihanti balavaa yathaa''^eb^ti aaha. yathaa ^b^balavaa^eb^ kaayabalena, ~naa.nabalena ca samannaagato tacchako rukkhada.n.dagata.m aa.ni.m niiharitukaamo tato balavati.m aa.ni.m ko.tento tato niiharati, tathaa kusalo bhikkhu cakkhaadiini indriyaani vipassanaabalena nihantukaamo indriyehi eva nihanti.

[03] katamehi panaati aaha ^b^``saddha''^eb^ntiaadi. tassattho -- adhimokkhalakkha.na.m saddha.m, paggahalakkha.na.m viiriya.m, avikkhepalakkha.na.m samaadhi.m, upa.t.thaanalakkha.na.m sati.m, dassanalakkha.na.m pa~n~nanti imaanipi vimuttiparipaacakaani pa~ncindriyaani bhaavento va.d.dhento etehi pa~ncahi indriyehi cakkhaadiini pa~ncindriyaani anunayapa.tighaadikilesuppattiyaa dvaarabhaavavihanena hantvaa, ariyamaggena tadupanissaye kilese samucchinditvaa, tato eva aniigho niddukkho braahma.no anupaadisesaparinibbaanameva yaati upagacchatiiti.

[03] ^b^so atthavaa^eb^ti so yathaavutto braahma.no uttamatthena samannaagatattaa atthavaa, ta.m sampaapake dhamme .thitattaa ^b^dhamma.t.tho. sabbena sabba.m^eb^ anavasesena vidhinaa anavasesa.m ^b^buddhassa^eb^ bhagavato vaakyabhuuta.m anusaasani.m katvaa yathaanusi.t.tha.m pa.tipajjitvaa .thito. tato eva ^b^so naro^eb^ uttamapuriso nibbaanasukha~nca ^b^edhati,^eb^ bruuheti, va.d.dhetiiti.
[03] eva.m ^a^P3.0026^ea^ therena attano cintitaakaaravibhaavanaavasena pa.tipattiyaa pakaasitattaa idameva cassa a~n~naabyaakara.na.m da.t.thabba.m.

[03] ^b^ciraratta.m vataataapii^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato telakaanittherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinitvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade satthu abhijaatito puretara.myeva saavatthiya.m a~n~natarasmi.m braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^telakaanii^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto hetusampannataaya kaame jigucchanto gharaavaasa.m pahaaya paribbaajakapabbajja.m ^a^V2.0239^ea^ pabbajitvaa viva.t.tajjhaasayo ``ko so paara"ngato loke''tiaadinaa vimokkhapariyesana.m ^a^M2.0281^ea^ caramaano te te sama.nabraahma.ne upasa"nkamitvaa pa~nha.m pucchati, te na sampaayanti. so tena anaaraadhitacitto vicarati. atha amhaaka.m bhagavati loke uppajjitvaa pavattitavaradhammacakke lokahita.m karonte ekadivasa.m satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva arahatte pati.t.thaati. so ekadivasa.m bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m nisinno attanaa adhigatavisesa.m paccavekkhitvaa tadanusaarena attano pa.tipatti.m anussaritvaa ta.m sabba.m bhikkhuuna.m aacikkhanto --
[21] ``ko so paara"ngato loke, ko patto amatogadha.m.
[22] ko me bandha.m mu~nca.m loke, sambodhi.m vedayissati..
[22] passa orasika.m baa.lha.m, bhetvaana yadi ti.t.thati..
[21] ``ta.m ^a^M2.0282^ea^ na passaami tekiccha.m, yo meta.m sallamuddhare.
[22] gambhiire patitassa me, thala.m paa.ni~nca dassaye..
[22] te sote ko nivaareyya, ta.m lata.m ko hi checchati..
[22] maa te manomayo sotaa, rukkha.mva sahasaa luve..
[22] paadaasi vuyhamaanassa, maa bhaayiiti ca mabravi..
[22] ya.m ta.m pubbe ama~n~nissa.m, sakkaayaabhirata.m paja.m..
[22] buddho mepaanudii gantha.m, visadosappavaahano''ti.. -- imaa gaathaa abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^a^P3.0028^ea^ ^b^ciraratta.m vataa^eb^ti cirakaala.m vata. ^b^aataapii^eb^ti viiriyavaa vimokkhadhammapariyesane aaraddhaviiriyo. ^b^dhamma.m anuvicintaya^eb^nti ``kiidiso nu kho vimokkhadhammo, katha.m vaa adhigantabbo''ti vimuttidhamma.m anuvicinanto gavesanto. ^b^sama.m cittassa naalattha.m, puccha.m sama.nabraahma.ne^eb^ti te te naanaatitthiye sama.nabraahma.ne vimuttidhamma.m pucchanto pakatiyaa anupasantasabhaavassa cittassa sama.m vuupasamabhuuta.m va.t.tadukkhavissara.na.m ariyadhamma.m naalattha.m naadhigacchanti attho.

[03] ^b^ko^eb^ ^a^V2.0241^ea^ ^b^so paara"ngato^eb^tiaadi pucchitaakaaradassana.m. tattha ^b^ko so paara"ngato loke^eb^ti imasmi.m loke titthakaarapa.ti~n~nesu sama.nabraahma.nesu ko nu kho so sa.msaarassa paara.m nibbaana.m upagato. ^b^ko patto amatogadha^eb^nti nibbaanapati.t.tha.m vimokkhamagga.m ko patto adhigatoti attho. ^b^kassa dhamma.m pa.ticchaamii^eb^ti kassa sama.nassa vaa braahma.nassa vaa ovaadadhamma.m pa.tigga.nhaami pa.tipajjaami. ^b^paramatthavijaanana^eb^nti paramatthassa vijaanana.m, avipariitappavattinivattiyo pavedentanti attho.

[03] ^b^antova"nkagato aasii^eb^ti va"nka.m vuccati di.t.thigata.m manova"nkabhaavato, sabbepi vaa kilesaa, antoti pana hadayava"nkassa anto, hadayabbhantaragatakilesava"nko vaa ahosiiti attho. ^b^macchova ghasamaamisa^eb^nti aamisa.m ghasanto khaadanto maccho viya, gilaba.liso maccho viyaati adhippaayo. ^b^baddho mahindapaasena, vepacityasuro yathaa^eb^ti mahindassa sakkassa paasena baddho yathaa vepacitti asurindo aserivihaarii mahaadukkhappatto, evamaha.m pubbe kilesapaasena baddho aasi.m, aserivihaarii mahaadukkhappattoti adhippaayo.

[03] ^b^a~nchaamii^eb^ti aaka.d.dhaami. ^b^na^eb^nti kilesapaasa.m. ^b^na mu~ncaamii^eb^ti na mocemi. ^b^asmaa sokapariddavaa^eb^ti imasmaa sokaparidevava.t.tato. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- yathaapaasena baddho migo suukaro vaa mocanupaaya.m ajaananto paripphandamaano ta.m aavi~nchanto bandhana.m da.lha.m karoti, eva.m aha.m pubbe ^a^M2.0284^ea^ kilesapaasena pa.timukko mocanupaaya.m ajaananto kaayasa~ncetanaadivasena paripphandamaano ta.m na mocesi.m, a~n~nadatthu ta.m da.lha.m karonto sokaadinaa para.m kilesa.m eva paapu.ninti. ^b^ko me bandha.m mu~nca.m loke, sambodhi.m vedayissatii^eb^ti imasmi.m loke eta.m kilesabandhanena bandha.m mu~ncanto sambujjhati etenaati ``sambodhii''ti laddhanaama.m vimokkhamagga.m ko me vedayissati aacikkhissatiiti attho. ``bandhamu~nca''ntipi pa.thanti, bandhaa, bandhassa vaa mocaka.m sambodhinti yojanaa.

[03] ^b^aadisanta^eb^nti desenta.m. ^b^pabha"nguna^eb^nti pabha~njana.m kilesaana.m viddha.msana.m ^a^P3.0029^ea^, pabha"nguna.m vaa dhammappavatti.m aadisanta.m kathenta.m jaraaya maccuno ca pavaahana.m kassa dhamma.m pa.ticchaami. ``pa.tipajjaamii''ti vaa paa.tho, so evattho. ^b^vicikicchaaka"nkhaaganthita^eb^nti ``ahosi.m nu kho ahamatiitamaddhaana''ntiaadinayappavattaaya (ma0 ni0 1.18; sa.m0 ni0 2.20) vicikicchaaya aasappanaparisappanaakaaravuttiyaa ka"nkhaaya ca ganthita.m. ^b^saarambhabalasa~n~nuta^eb^nti kara.nuttariyakara.nalakkha.nena balappattena saarambhena yutta.m. ^b^kodhappattamanatthaddha^eb^nti sabbattha kodhena yuttamanasaa ^a^V2.0242^ea^ thaddhabhaava.m gata.m abhijappappadaara.na.m. icchitaalaabhaadivasena hi ta.nhaa sattaana.m citta.m padaalentii viya pavattati. duure .thitassaapi vijjhanupaayataaya ta.nhaava dhanu samupati.t.thati uppajjati etasmaati ^b^ta.nhaadhanusamu.t.thaana.m,^eb^ di.t.thisalla.m. ta.m pana yasmaa viisativatthukaa sakkaayadi.t.thi, dasavatthukaa micchaadi.t.thiiti ti.msappabheda.m, tasmaa vutta.m ^b^``dve ca pannarasaayuta''^eb^nti, dvikkhattu.m pannarasabhedavantanti attho. ^b^passa orasika.m baa.lha.m, bhetvaana yadi ti.t.thatii^eb^ti ya.m urasambandhaniiyataaya orasika.m baa.lha.m balavatara.m bhetvaana hadaya.m vinivijjhitvaa tasmi.myeva hadaye ti.t.thati, ta.m passaati attaanameva aalapati.

[03] ^b^anudi.t.thiina.m appahaana^eb^nti anudi.t.thibhuutaana.m sesadi.t.thiina.m appahaanakaara.na.m. yaava hi sakkaayadi.t.thi santaanato na vigacchati, taava sassatadi.t.thiaadiina.m appahaanamevaati. ^b^sa"nkappaparatejita^eb^nti sa"nkappena micchaavitakkena pare parajane nissayalakkha.na.m patipatite tejita.m ussaahita.m. ^b^tena viddho pavedhaamii^eb^ti tena di.t.thisallena yathaa hadaya.m aahacca ti.t.thati, eva.m viddho pavedhaami sa"nkappaami sassatucchedaadivasena ito cito ca pariva.t.taami. ^b^patta.mva^eb^ ^a^M2.0285^ea^b^maaluteritab^nti maalutena vaayunaa erita.m va.n.tato mutta.m dumapatta.m viya.

[03] ^b^ajjhatta.m me samu.t.thaayaa^eb^ti yathaa loke salla.m naama baahirato u.t.thaaya ajjhatta.m nimmathetvaa baadhati, na evamida.m. ida.m pana ajjhatta.m me mama attabhaave samu.t.thaaya so attabhaavasa~n~nito chaphassaayatanakaayo yathaa ^b^khippa.m^eb^ siigha.m ^b^paccati,^eb^ .dayhati. yathaa ki.m? aggi viya sanissaya.daahako ta.myeva ^b^maamaka.m^eb^ mama santaka.m attabhaava.m .dahanto yattha uppanno, tattheva ^b^sarati^eb^ pavattati.

[03] ^b^ta.m na passaami tekiccha^eb^nti taadisaaya tikicchaaya niyuttataaya tekiccha.m ^a^P3.0030^ea^ sallakatta.m bhisakka.m ta.m na passaami. ^b^yo meta.m sallamuddhare^eb^ti yo bhisakko eta.m di.t.thisalla.m kilesasalla~nca uddhareyya, uddharanto ca ^b^naanaarajjena^eb^ rajjusadisasa"nkhaataaya esanisalaakaaya pavesetvaana ^b^satthena^eb^ kantitvaa ^b^naa~n~nena^eb^ mantaagadappayogena ^b^vicikicchita.m^eb^ salla.m tikicchitu.m sakkaati aaharitvaa yojetabba.m. vicikicchitanti, ca nidassanamattameta.m. sabbassapi kilesasallassa vasena attho veditabbo.

[03] ^b^asattho^eb^ti sattharahito. ^b^ava.no^eb^ti va.nena vinaa. ^b^abbhantarapassaya^eb^nti abbhantarasa"nkhaata.m hadaya.m nissaaya .thita.m. ^b^ahi.msa^eb^nti apii.lento. ``ahi.msaa''ti ca paa.tho, ahi.msaaya apii.lanenaati ^a^V2.0243^ea^ attho. aya~nhettha sa"nkhepattho -- ko nu kho ki~nci sattha.m aggahetvaa va.na~nca akaronto tato eva sabbagattaani abaadhento mama hadayabbhantaragata.m pii.laajananato anto tudanato anto ruddhanato ca paramattheneva sallabhuuta.m kilesasalla.m uddharissatiiti.

[03] eva.m dasahi gaathaahi pubbe attanaa cintitaakaara.m dassetvaa punapi ta.m pakaarantarena dassetu.m ^b^``dhammappati hi so se.t.tho''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^dhammappatii^eb^ti dhammanimitta.m dhammahetu. ^b^hii^eb^ti nipaatamatta.m. ^b^so se.t.tho^eb^ti so puggalo uttamo. ^b^visadosappavaahako^eb^ti ^b^yo mayha.m^eb^ raagaadikilesassa pavaahako ucchinnako. ^b^gambhiire patitassa me, thala.m paa.ni~nca dassaye^eb^ti ko nu kho atigambhiire sa.msaaramahoghe patitassa mayha.m ``maa bhaayii''ti assaasento nibbaanathala.m ta.msampaapaka.m ariyamaggahattha~nca dasseyya.

[03] ^b^rahadehamasmi^eb^ ^a^M2.0286^ea^ ^b^ogaa.lho^eb^ti mahati sa.msaararahade ahamasmi sasiisa.m nimujjanavasena oti.n.no anupavi.t.tho. ^b^ahaariyarajamattike^eb^ti apanetu.m asakku.neyyo raagaadirajo mattikaa kaddamo etassaati ahaariyarajamattiko, rahado. tasmi.m rahadasmi.m. ``ahaariyarajamantike''ti vaa paa.tho, antike .thitaraagaadiisu dunniihara.niiyaraagaadirajeti attho. santadosapa.ticchaadanalakkha.naa ^b^maayaa,^eb^ parasampattiasahanalakkha.naa ^b^usuuyaa,^eb^ kara.nuttariyakara.nalakkha.no ^b^saarambho,^eb^ cittaalasiyalakkha.na.m ^b^thina.m,^eb^ kaayaalasiyalakkha.na.m ^b^middha^eb^nti ime paapadhammaa pattha.taa ya.m rahada.m, tasmi.m maayaausuuyasaarambhathinamiddhamapattha.te, makaaro cettha padasandhikaro vutto. yathaavuttehi imehi paapadhammehi pattha.teti attho.

[03] ^b^uddhaccameghathanita.m, sa.myojanavalaahaka^eb^nti vacanavipallaasena vutta.m, bhantasabhaava.m uddhacca.m meghathanita.m meghagajjita.m etesanti uddhaccameghathanitaa. dasavidhaa sa.myojanaa ^a^P3.0031^ea^ eva valaahakaa etesanti sa.myojanavalaahakaa. ^b^vaahaa^eb^ mahaaudakavaahasadisaa raaganissitaa micchaasa"nkappaa asubhaadiisu .thitaa ^b^kuddi.t.thi.m^eb^ ma.m ^b^vahanti^eb^ apaayasamuddameva uddissa ka.d.dhantiiti attho.

[03] ^b^savanti sabbadhi sotaa^eb^ti ta.nhaasoto, di.t.thisoto, maanasoto, avijjaasoto, kilesasototi ime pa~ncapisotaa cakkhudvaaraadiina.m vasena sabbesu ruupaadiisu aaramma.nesu savanato ``ruupata.nhaa...pe0... dhammata.nhaa''tiaadinaa (vibha0 204, 232) sabbabhaagehi vaa savanato sabbadhi savanti. ^b^lataa^eb^ti palive.thana.t.thena sa.msibbana.t.thena lataa viyaati lataa, ta.nhaa. ^b^ubbhijja ti.t.thatii^eb^ti chahi dvaarehi ubbhijjitvaa ruupaadiisu aaramma.nesu ti.t.thati. ^b^te sote^eb^ti ta.nhaadike ^a^V2.0244^ea^ sote mama santaane sandante maggasetubandhanena ko purisaviseso nivaareyya, ^b^ta.m lata^eb^nti ta.nhaalata.m, maggasatthena ko ^b^checchati^eb^ chindissati.

[03] ^b^vela.m karothaa^eb^ti tesa.m sotaana.m vela.m setu.m karotha sannivaara.na.m. ^b^bhaddante^eb^ti aalapanaakaaradassana.m. ^b^maa te manomayo soto^eb^ti udakasoto o.laariko, tassa baalamahaajanenapi setu.m ^a^M2.0287^ea^ katvaa nivaara.na.m sakkaa. aya.m pana manomayo soto sukhumo dunnivaara.no. so yathaa udakasoto va.d.dhanto kuule .thita.m rukkha.m paatetvaava naaseti, eva.m tumhe apaayatiire .thite tattha sahasaa paatetvaa apaayasamudda.m paapento ^b^maa luve^eb^ maa vinaaseyya maa anayabyasana.m paapeyyaati attho.

[03] eva.m aya.m thero purimattabhaave parimadditasa"nkhaarattaa ~naa.naparipaaka.m gatattaa pavattidukkha.m upadhaarento yathaa vicikicchaadike sa.mkilesadhamme parigga.nhi, tamaakaara.m dassetvaa idaani jaatasa.mvego ki.mkusalagavesii satthu santika.m gato ya.m visesa.m adhimucci, ta.m dassento ^b^``eva.m me bhayajaatassaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^eva.m me bhayajaatassaa^eb^ti eva.m vuttappakaarena sa.msaare jaatabhayassa ^b^apaaraa^eb^ orimatiirato sappa.tibhayato sa.msaarava.t.tato ``katha.m nu kho mu~nceyya''nti ^b^paara.m^eb^ nibbaana.m, ^b^esato^eb^ gavesato, ^b^taa.no^eb^ sadevakassa lokassa taa.nabhuuto kilesasamucchedanii pa~n~naa aavudho etassaati ^b^pa~n~naavudho^eb^. di.t.thadhammikaadiatthena sattaana.m yathaaraha.m anusaasanato ^b^satthaa,^eb^ isisa"nghena aggasaavakaadiariyapuggalasamuuhena nisevito payirupaasito ^b^isisa"nghanisevito, sopaana^eb^nti desanaa~naa.nena su.t.thu katattaa abhisa"nkhatattaa ^b^sukata.m,^eb^ upakkilesavirahitato ^b^suddha.m,^eb^ saddhaapa~n~naadisaarabhuuta.m ^b^dhammasaaramaya.m^eb^ ^a^P3.0032^ea^ pa.tipakkhehi acalaniiyato ^b^da.lha.m,^eb^ vipassanaasa"nkhaata.m sopaana.m mahoghena vuyhamaanassa mayha.m satthaa paadaasi, dadanto ca ``iminaa te sotthi bhavissatii''ti samassaasento ^b^maa bhaayiiti ca abravi,^eb^ kathesi.

[03] ^b^satipa.t.thaanapaasaada^eb^nti tena vipassanaasopaanena kaayaanupassanaadinaa laddhabbacatubbidhasaama~n~naphalavisesena catubhuumisampanna.m satipa.t.thaanapaasaada.m aaruhitvaa ^b^paccavekkhisa.m^eb^ catusaccadhamma.m magga~naa.nena patiavekkhi.m pa.tivijjhi.m. ^b^ya.m ta.m pubbe ama~n~nissa.m, sakkaayaabhirata.m paja^eb^nti eva.m pa.tividdhasacco ya.m sakkaaye ``aha.m mamaa''ti abhirata.m paja.m titthiyajana.m tena parikappitaattaana~nca pubbe saarato ama~n~nissa.m. ^b^yadaa ca maggamaddakkhi.m, naavaaya abhiruuhana^eb^nti ariyamagganaavaaya abhiruhanuupaayabhuuta.m yadaa vipassanaamagga.m yaathaavato addakkhi.m. tato pa.t.thaaya ta.m titthiyajana.m attaana~nca ^b^anadhi.t.thaaya^eb^ citte a.t.thapetvaa aggahetvaa ^b^tittha.m^eb^ nibbaanasa"nkhaatassa amatamahaapaarassa ^a^M2.0288^ea^ ^a^V2.0245^ea^ titthabhuuta.m ariyamaggadassana.m sabbehi maggehi sabbehi kusaladhammehi ukka.t.tha.m addakkhi.m, yaathaavato apassinti attho.

[03] eva.m attano anuttara.m maggaadhigama.m pakaasetvaa idaani tassa desaka.m sammaasambuddha.m thomento ^b^``salla.m attasamu.t.thaana''^eb^ntiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^salla^eb^nti di.t.thimaanaadikilesasalla.m. ^b^attasamu.t.thaana^eb^nti ``aha''nti maana.t.thaanataaya ``attaa''ti ca laddhanaame attabhaave sambhuuta.m. ^b^bhavanettippabhaavita^eb^nti bhavata.nhaasamu.t.thita.m bhavata.nhaasannissaya.m. saa hi di.t.thimaanaadiina.m sambhavo. ^b^etesa.m appavattaayaa^eb^ti yathaavuttaana.m paapadhammaana.m appavattiyaa anuppaadaaya. ^b^desesi maggamuttama^eb^nti uttama.m se.t.tha.m ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m, tadupaaya~nca vipassanaamagga.m kathesi.

[03] ^b^diigharattaanusayita^eb^nti anamatagge sa.msaare cirakaala.m santaane anu anu sayita.m kaara.nalaabhena uppajjanaarahabhaavena thaamagata.m, tato ca ciraratta.m ^b^adhi.t.thita.m^eb^ santaana.m ajjhaaruyha .thita.m. ^b^gantha^eb^nti abhijjhaakaayaganthaadi.m mama santaane ganthabhuuta.m kilesavisadosa.m pavaahano ^b^buddho^eb^ bhagavaa attano desanaanubhaavena ^b^apaanudii^eb^ parijahaapesi, ganthesu hi anavasesato pahiinesu appahiino naama kileso natthiiti.

[03] ^b^passa^eb^ ^a^P3.0033^ea^ ^b^cittakata^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato ra.t.thapaalattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarassa bhagavato uppattito puretarameva ha.msavatiinagare gahapatimahaasaalakule nibbattitvaa vayappatto pitu accayena gharaavaase pati.t.thito ratanako.t.thaagaarakammikena dassita.m aparimaa.na.m kulava.msaanugata.m dhana.m disvaa ``ima.m ettaka.m dhanaraasi.m mayha.m pituayyakapayyakaadayo attanaa saddhi.m gahetvaa gantu.m naasakkhi.msu, mayaa pana gahetvaa gantu.m va.t.tatii''ti cintetvaa kapa.naddhikaadiina.m mahaadaana.m adaasi. so abhi~n~naalaabhi.m eka.m taapasa.m upa.t.thahanto tena devalokaadhipacce niyojito yaavajiiva.m pu~n~naani katvaa tato cuto ^a^M2.0289^ea^ devaloke nibbattitvaa dibbasampatti.m anubhavanto tattha yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa tato cuto manussaloke bhinna.m ra.t.tha.m sandhaaretu.m samatthassa kulassa ekaputtako hutvaa nibbatti.

[03] tena ^a^V2.0246^ea^ ca samayena padumuttaro bhagavaa loke uppajjitvaa pavattitavaradhammacakko veneyyasatte nibbaanamahaanagarasa"nkhaata.m khemantabhuumi.m sampaapesi. atha so kulaputto anukkamena vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m upaasakehi saddhi.m vihaara.m gantvaa satthaara.m dhamma.m desenta.m disvaa pasannacitto parisapariyante nisiidi. tena kho pana samayena satthaa eka.m bhikkhu.m saddhaapabbajitaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesi. ta.m disvaa so pasannamaanaso tadatthaaya citta.m .thapetvaa satasahassabhikkhuparivutassa bhagavato mahataa sakkaarena sattaaha.m mahaadaana.m pavattetvaa pa.nidhaana.m akaasi. satthaa tassa anantaraayena ijjhanabhaava.m disvaa ``anaagate gotamassa naama sammaasambuddhassa saasane saddhaapabbajitaana.m aggo bhavissatii''ti byaakaasi. so satthaara.m bhikkhusa"ngha~nca vanditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami. so tattha yaavataayuka.m pu~n~naani katvaa tato cavitvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto ito dvenavute kappe phussassa bhagavato kaale satthu vemaatikabhaatikesu tiisu raajaputtesu satthaara.m upa.t.thahantesu tesa.m pu~n~nakiriyaaya kicca.m akaasi.

[03] eva.m tattha tattha bhave ta.m ta.m bahu.m kusala.m upacinitvaa sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kurura.t.the thullako.t.thikanigame ra.t.thapaalase.t.thino gehe nibbatti, tassa bhinna.m ra.t.tha.m sandhaaretu.m samatthe kule nibbattattaa ^b^ra.t.thapaalo^eb^ti ^a^P3.0034^ea^ va.msaanugatameva naama.m ahosi. so mahataa parivaarena va.d.dhanto anukkamena yobbanapatto maataapituuhi patiruupena daarena sa.myojito mahante ca yase pati.t.thaapito dibbasampattisadisa.m sampatti.m paccanubhoti. atha bhagavaa kurura.t.the janapadacaarika.m caranto thullako.t.thika.m anupaapu.ni. ta.m sutvaa ra.t.thapaalo kulaputto satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitukaamo sattaaha.m bhattaccheda.m katvaa kicchena kasirena maataapitaro anujaanaapetvaa satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa pabbajja.m yaacitvaa satthu aa.nattiyaa a~n~natarassa therassa santike pabbajitvaa yonisomanasikaarena kamma.m karonto vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.2.97-111) --
[22] sabbe jane haasayanto, desesi amata.m pada.m..
[22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
[22] khe.lapi.n.deva bhogamhi, pema.m mayha.m na vijjati..

[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa satthaara.m anujaanaapetvaa maataapitaro passitu.m thullako.t.thika.m gantvaa, tattha sapadaana.m pi.n.daaya caranto pitu nivesane aabhidosika.m kummaasa.m labhitvaa ta.m amata.m viya paribhu~njanto, pitaraa nimantito svaatanaaya adhivaasetvaa, dutiyadivase pitu nivesane pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njitvaa ala"nkatapa.tiyatte itthaagaarajane upagantvaa ``kiidisaa naama taa, ayyaputta, accharaayo, yaasa.m tva.m hetu brahmacariya.m carasii''tiaadiini (ma0 ni0 2.301) vatvaa, palobhanakamma.m kaatu.m aaraddhe tassa adhippaaya.m parivattetvaa aniccataadipa.tisa.myutta.m dhamma.m kathento --
[22] a.t.thi.m tacena onaddha.m, saha vatthehi sobhati..
[22] ala.m baalassa mohaaya, no ca paaragavesino..
[22] ala.m baalassa mohaaya, no ca paaragavesino..
[22] ala.m baalassa mohaaya, no ca paaragavesino..
[22] bhutvaa nivaapa.m gacchaama, socante migaluddake''ti.. -- imaa gaathaa abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^cittakata^eb^nti citta.m kata.m cittakata.m, vatthaabhara.namaalaadiihi vicitta.m katanti attho. ^b^bimba^eb^nti diighaadibhaavena yutta.t.thaanesu diighaadiihi a"ngapacca"ngehi ma.n.dita.m attabhaava.m. ^b^arukaaya^eb^nti navanna.m va.namukhaana.m lomakuupaana~nca vasena vissandamaanaasuci.m, sabbaso ca arubhuuta.m va.nabhuuta.m aruuna.m vaa kaaya.m. ^b^samussita^eb^nti tiihi a.t.thisatehi samussita.m. ^b^aatura^eb^nti sabbakaala.m iriyaapathantaraadiihi pariharitabbataaya nicca.m gilaana.m. ^b^bahusa"nkappa^eb^nti baalajanena abhuuta.m aaropetvaa bahudhaa sa"nkappitabba.m. ^b^yassa natthi dhuva.m .thitii^eb^ti yassa kaayassa dhuvabhaavo .thitisabhaavo natthi, eka.msato bhedanavikira.naviddha.msanadhammoyeva. ta.m ^b^passaa^eb^ti samiipe .thita.m jana.m, attaanameva vaa sandhaaya vadati.

[03] ^b^ruupa^eb^nti sariira.m. sariirampi hi ``a.t.thi~nca pa.ticca, nhaaru~nca pa.ticca, ma.msa~nca pa.ticca, camma~nca pa.ticca, aakaaso parivaarito `ruupantveva sa"nkha.m gacchatii''tiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 1.306) ruupanti vuccati. ^b^ma.ninaa ku.n.dalena caa^eb^ti siisuupagaadiaabhara.nagatena ma.ninaa ku.n.dalena cittakata.m. ^b^a.t.thi.m tacena onaddha^eb^nti allacammena pariyonaddha.m atirekatisatapabheda.m a.t.thi.m passaati yojanaa. ku.n.dalena caati ^b^ca^eb^-saddena sesaabhara.naala"nkaare sa"nga.nhaati. ^b^saha vatthehi sobhatii^eb^ti tayida.m ruupa.m ma.ninaa cittakatampi vatthehi pa.ticchaaditameva sobhati, na apa.ticchaaditanti ^a^V2.0249^ea^ attho. ye pana ``a.t.thitacenaa''ti pa.thanti, tesa.m a.t.thitacena.m onaddha.m sobhati, onaddhattaa a.t.thitacenaati attho.

[03] ^b^alattakakataa^eb^ti alattakena katara~njanaa laakhaaya sa.mra~njitaa. ^b^paadaa^eb^ti cara.naa. ^b^mukha.m cu.n.nakamakkhita^eb^nti mukha.m cu.n.nakena makkhita.m, ya.m ma.n.danamanuyuttaa saasapakakkena mukhapii.lakaadiini haritvaa lo.namattikaaya du.t.thalohita.m haritvaa mukhacu.n.nakavilepana.m karonti, ta.m sandhaaya vutta.m. ^b^ala^eb^nti ^b^baalassa^eb^ andhaputhujjanassa ^b^no^eb^ ^a^P3.0036^ea^ ^b^ca paaragavesino^eb^ va.t.taabhiratassa ^b^mohaaya^eb^ sammohanaaya samattha.m tassa citta.m mohetu.m pariyatta.m, paaragavesino pana viva.t.taabhiratassa no ala.m na pariyatta.m.

[03] ^b^a.t.thaapadakataa^eb^ti ^a^M2.0293^ea^ a.t.thapadaakaarena kataa sa~ncitaa purimabhaage kese kappetvaa nalaa.tassa pa.ticchaadanavasena kataa kesaracanaa a.t.thapada.m naama, ya.m ``alaka''ntipi vuccati. ^b^nettaa a~njanamakkhitaa^eb^ti ubhopi nayanaani anto dviisu antesu ca yathaa a~njanacchaayaa dissati, eva.m a~njita~njanaani.

[03] ^b^a~njaniiva navaa cittaa, puutikaayo ala"nkato^eb^ti yathaa a~njanii a~njananaa.likaa navaa abhinavaa maalaakammamakaradantaadivasena cittaa bahi ma.t.thaa ujjalaa dassaniiyaa, anto pana na dassaniiyaa hoti, evameva taasa.m kaayo nhaanabbha~njanavatthaala"nkaarehi ala"nkato bahi ujjalo, anto pana puuti naanappakaaraasuciihi bharito ti.t.thatiiti attho.

[03] ^b^odahii^eb^ti o.d.desi. ^b^migavo^eb^ti, migaluddako. ^b^paasa^eb^nti, da.n.davaagura.m. ^b^naasadaa^eb^ti na sa"ngha.t.tesi. ^b^vaagura^eb^nti paasa.m. ^b^nivaapa^eb^nti migaana.m khaadanatthaaya khitta.m ti.naadighaasa.m. upamaa kho aya.m therena kataa atthassa vi~n~naapanaaya. aya~nhettha attho -- yathaa migaana.m maara.natthaaya da.n.davaagura.m o.d.detvaa tattha nivaapa.m vikiriya migaluddake niliine .thite tattheko javaparakkamasampanno cheko migo paasa.m aphusanto eva yathaasukha.m nivaapa.m khaaditvaa, ``va~ncesi vata migo''ti migaluddake viravante eva gacchati. aparo migo balavaa cheko javasampannova tattha gantvaa nivaapa.m khaaditvaa tattha tattha paasa.m chinditvaa, ``va~ncesi vata migo, paaso chinno''ti migaluddake socante eva gacchati, eva.m mayampi pubbe puthujjanakaale maataapituuhi aasajjanatthaaya niyyaadite bhoge bhu~njitvaa tattha tattha asajjamaanaa nikkhantaa. idaani pana sabbaso ^a^V2.0250^ea^ chinnakilesaa apaasaa hutvaa .thitaa, tehi dinnabhojana.m bhu~njitvaa tesu socantesu eva gacchaamaati.

[03] eva.m thero migaluddaka.m viya maataapitaro, hira~n~nasuva.n.na.m itthaagaara~nca vaagurajaala.m viya, attanaa pubbe bhuttabhoge ca idaani bhuttabhojana~nca nivaapati.na.m viya, attaana.m mahaamiga.m viya ca katvaa dasseti. imaa gaathaa vatvaa vehaasa.m abbhuggantvaa ra~n~no korabyassa migaajinauyyaane ma"ngalasilaapa.t.te nisiidi. therassa kira pitaa sattasu dvaarako.t.thakesu agga.la.m daapetvaa ^a^M2.0294^ea^ malle aa.naapesi ``nikkhamitu.m maa detha, kaasaayaani apanetvaa setakaani nivaasethaa''ti, tasmaa thero aakaasena ^a^P3.0037^ea^ agamaasi. atha raajaa korabyo therassa tattha nisinnabhaava.m sutvaa ta.m upasa"nkamitvaa sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ``idha, bho ra.t.thapaala, pabbajanto byaadhipaariju~n~na.m vaa jaraabhoga~naatipaariju~n~na.m vaa patto pabbajati. tva.m pana ki~ncipi paariju~n~na.m anupagato eva kasmaa pabbajito''ti pucchi. athassa thero, ``upaniyyati loko addhuvo, ataa.no loko anabhissaro, assako loko sabba.m pahaaya gamaniiya.m, uuno loko atitto ta.nhaadaaso''ti (ma0 ni0 2.305) imesa.m catunna.m dhammuddesaana.m attaana.m vivittabhaava.m kathetvaa tassaa desanaaya anugiiti.m kathento --
[21] ``passaami loke sadhane manusse, laddhaana vitta.m na dadanti mohaa.
[22] luddhaa dhana.m sannicaya.m karonti, bhiyyova kaame abhipatthayanti..
[22] ora.m samuddassa atittaruupo, paara.m samuddassapi patthayetha..
[21] ``raajaa ca a~n~ne ca bahuu manussaa, aviitata.nhaa mara.na.m upenti.
[22] uunaava hutvaana jahanti deha.m, kaamehi lokamhi na hatthi titti..
[21] ``kandanti na.m ~naatii pakiriya kese, `aho vataa no amaraa'ti caahu.
[22] vatthena na.m paaruta.m niiharitvaa, cita.m samodhaaya tato .dahanti..
[21] ``so ^a^M2.0295^ea^ .dayhati suulehi tujjamaano, ekena vatthena pahaaya bhoge.
[22] na miiyamaanassa bhavanti taa.naa, ~naatii ca mittaa atha vaa sahaayaa..
[21] ``daayaadakaa tassa dhana.m haranti, satto pana gacchati yenakamma.m.
[22] na miiyamaana.m dhanamanveti ki~nci, puttaa ca daaraa ca dhana~nca ra.t.tha.m..
[21] ``na ^a^P3.0038^ea^ diighamaayu.m labhate dhanena, na caapi vittena jara.m vihanti.
[22] appa.m hida.m jiivitamaahu dhiiraa, asassata.m vippari.naamadhamma.m..
[21] ``a.d.dhaa ^a^V2.0251^ea^ daliddaa ca phusanti phassa.m, baalo ca dhiiro ca tatheva phu.t.tho.
[22] baalo hi baalyaa vadhitova seti, dhiiro ca no vedhati phassaphu.t.tho..
[21] ``tasmaa hi pa~n~naava dhanena seyyaa, yaaya vosaanamidhaadhigacchati.
[22] abyositattaa hi bhavaabhavesu, paapaani kammaani karoti mohaa..
[22] tassappapa~n~no abhisaddahanto, upeti gabbha~nca para~nca loka.m..
[21] ``coro yathaa sandhimukhe gahiito, sakammunaa ha~n~nati paapadhammo.
[22] eva.m pajaa pecca paramhi loke, sakammunaa ha~n~nati paapadhammo..
[21] ``kaamaa ^a^M2.0296^ea^ hi citraa madhuraa manoramaa, viruuparuupena mathenti citta.m.
[22] aadiinava.m kaamagu.nesu disvaa, tasmaa aha.m pabbajitomhi raaja..
[21] ``dumapphalaaniiva patanti maa.navaa, daharaa ca vu.d.dhaa ca sariirabhedaa.
[22] etampi disvaa pabbajitomhi raaja, apa.n.naka.m saama~n~nameva seyyo..
[22] ava~njhaa mayha.m pabbajjaa, ana.no bhu~njaami bhojana.m..
[22] soha.m viddho tadaa santo, sampatto aasavakkhaya.m..
[22] so me attho anuppatto, sabbasa.myojanakkhayo''ti.. -- imaa gaathaa avoca.

[03] tattha ^b^passaami loke^eb^ti aha.m, mahaaraaja, imasmi.m loke ^b^sadhane^eb^ dhanasampanne a.d.dhe manusse passaami, te pana ^b^laddhaana vitta.m^eb^ dhana.m labhitvaa bhogasampattiya.m .thitaa sama.nabraahma.naadiisu kassaci ki~ncipi na dadanti. kasmaa? ^b^mohaa^eb^ kammassakataapa~n~naaya abhaavato. ^b^luddhaa^eb^ lobhaabhibhuutaa yathaaladdha.m dhana.m ^b^sannicaya.m^eb^ sabbaso nicetabba.m nidhetabba.m karonti. ^b^bhiyyova^eb^ yathaadhigatakaamato upari ^b^kaame^eb^ kaamagu.ne ``tathaaha.m edise ca bhoge pa.tilabheyya''nti ^b^abhipatthayanti^eb^ paccaasiisanti tajja~nca vaayaama.m karonti.

[03] bhiyyo ^a^M2.0297^ea^ ^a^V2.0252^ea^ kaamapatthanaaya udaahara.na.m dassento ^b^``raajaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^pasayhappathavi.m vijetvaa^eb^ti attano va.msaanugata.m pathavi.m balakkaarena abhivijiya. ^b^aavasanto^eb^ti pasaasento. ^b^ora.m samuddassaa^eb^ti anavasesa.m samuddassa orabhaaga.m labhitvaapi tena atittaruupo ^b^paara.m samuddassa^eb^ diipantarampi patthayeyya.
[03] ^b^aviitata.nhaa^eb^ti avigatata.nhaa. ^b^uunaavaa^eb^ti aparipu.n.namanorathaava. ^b^kaamehi lokamhi na hatthi tittii^eb^ti ta.nhaavipannaana.m imasmi.m loke vatthukaamehi titti naama natthi.

[03] ^b^kandanti na^eb^nti matapurisa.m uddissa tassa gu.ne kittentaa kandana.m karonti. ^b^aho vataa no amaraati caahuu^eb^ti aho vata amhaaka.m ~naatii amaraa siyunti ca kathenti, gaathaasukhattha~nhettha vataa-iti diigha.m katvaa vutta.m.
[03] ^b^so .dayhati suulehi tujjamaano^eb^ti so matasatto chava.daahakehi sammaa jhaapetu.m suulehi tujjamaano. ^b^taa.naa^eb^ti parittaa.nakaraa.
[03] ^b^yenakamma^eb^nti yathaakamma.m. ^b^dhana^eb^nti dhanaayitabba.m ya.mki~nci vatthu. puna ^b^dhana^eb^nti hira~n~nasuva.n.na.m sandhaaya vadati.

[03] ^b^``na diighamaayu''^eb^ntiaadinaa kaamagu.nassa jaraaya ca pa.tikaaraabhaava.m vatvaa puna tassa ekantikabhaava.m dassetu.m ^b^``appa.m hii''^eb^tiaadi vutta.m. ^b^phusantii^eb^ti ^a^P3.0040^ea^ ani.t.thaphassa.m phusanti paapu.nanti, tattha a.d.dhadaliddataa akaara.nanti dasseti. ^b^phassa.m baalo ca dhiiro ca tatheva phu.t.tho^eb^ti yathaa baalo i.t.thaani.t.thasamphassa.m phu.t.tho, tatheva dhiiro i.t.thaani.t.thaphassa.m phu.t.tho hoti, na ettha baalapa.n.ditaana.m koci viseso. aya.m pana viseso, ^b^baalo hi baalyaa vadhitova setii^eb^ti baalapuggalo kenaci dukkhadhammena phu.t.tho socanto kilamanto urattaa.li.m kandanto baalabhaavena vadhito pii.litova hutvaa seti sayati. ito cito ca aava.t.tanto viva.t.tanto virodhento ^b^vedhati phassaphu.t.tho^eb^ti ^b^dhiiro^eb^ pana pa.n.dito dukkhasamphassena samphu.t.tho na vedhati kampanamattampi tassa na hotiiti.

[03] ^b^tasmaa^eb^ti ^a^M2.0298^ea^ yasmaa baalapa.n.ditaana.m lokadhamme edisii pavatti, ^b^tasmaa hi pa~n~naava dhanena seyyaa, yaaya vosaanamidhaadhigacchatii^eb^ti pa~n~naava dhanato paasa.msataraa, yaaya pa~n~naaya vosaana.m bhavassa ^a^V2.0253^ea^ pariyosaanabhuuta.m nibbaana.m adhigacchati. ^b^abyositattaa hii^eb^ti anadhigatani.t.thattaa. ^b^bhavaabhavesuu^eb^ti mahantaamahantesu bhavesu.

[03] ^b^upeti gabbha~nca para~nca loka.m, sa.msaaramaapajja paramparaayaa^eb^ti yo paapaani katvaa aparaapara.m sa.msara.namaapajjitvaa upeti gabbha~nca para~nca loka.m gabbhaseyyaaya paralokuppattiyaa ca na muccati, ^b^tassa^eb^ paapakammakaarino puggalassa kiriya.m ^b^abhisaddahanto^eb^ ``attaa ca me hotii''ti pattiyaayanto a~n~nopi ^b^appapa~n~no^eb^ baalo yathaa pa.tipajjitvaa upeti gabbha~nca para~nca loka.m, na tato parimuccati.

[03] ^b^coro yathaa^eb^ti yathaa coro paapadhammo gharasandhi.m chindanto sandhimukhe aarakkhakapurisehi gahito ^b^sakammunaa^eb^ tena attano sandhicchedakammunaa kaara.nabhuutena kasaadiihi taa.lanaadivasena ^b^ha~n~nati^eb^ raajapurisehi baadhiyyati bajjhati ca. ^b^eva.m pajaa^eb^ti evamaya.m sattaloko idha paapaani karitvaa ^b^pecca^eb^ patvaa tena kammunaa ^b^paramhi loke^eb^ nirayaadiisu ha~n~nati, pa~ncavidhabandhanakammakaara.naadivasena baadhiyyati.

[03] evametaahi ekaadasahi gaathaahi yathaaraha.m cattaaro dhammuddese pakaasetvaa idaani kaamesu sa.msaare ca aadiinava.m disvaa saddhaaya attano pabbajitabhaava.m pabbajitakiccassa ca matthakappatti.m vibhaavento ^b^``kaamaa hii''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^kaamaa^eb^ti vatthukaamaa manaapiyaa ruupaadayo dhammaa, kilesakaamaa sabbepi raagappabhedaa. idha pana vatthukaamaa veditabbaa. te hi ruupaadivasena anekappakaarataaya ^b^citraa^eb^. lokassaadavasena i.t.thaakaarataaya ^b^madhuraa^eb^. baalaputhujjanaana.m mana.m ^a^P3.0041^ea^ ramentiiti ^b^manoramaa. viruuparuupenaa^eb^ti vividharuupena, anekavidhasabhaavenaati attho. te hi ruupaadivasena citraa, niilaadivasena vividharuupaa. eva.m tena viruuparuupena tathaa tathaa assaada.m dassetvaa ^b^mathenti citta.m^eb^ pabbajjaaya abhiramitu.m na dentiiti iminaa appassaadabahudukkhataadinaa ^b^aadiinava.m kaamagu.nesu disvaa tasmaa^eb^ ta.mnimitta.m aha.m pabbajito amhi. dumapphalaani ^a^M2.0299^ea^ pakkakaale aparipakkakaale ca yattha katthaci paruupakkamato sarasato vaa patanti, eva.m sattaa daharaa ca vu.d.dhaa ca sariirassa bhedaa patantiyeva. ^b^etampi disvaa^eb^ti eva.m aniccatampi pa~n~naacakkhunaa disvaa, na kevala.m appassaadataaditaaya aadiinavamevaati adhippaayo. ^b^apa.n.naka^eb^nti aviraddhanaka.m ^b^saama~n~nameva^eb^ sama.nabhaavova ^b^seyyo^eb^ uttaritaro.

[03] ^b^saddhaayaa^eb^ti kamma.m kammaphala.m buddhasubuddhata.m dhammasudhammata.m sa"nghasuppa.tipatti~nca saddahitvaa. ^b^upeto^eb^ ^a^V2.0254^ea^ ^b^jinasaasane^eb^ti satthu saasane sammaapa.tipatti.m upagato. ^b^ava~njhaa mayha.m pabbajjaa^eb^ arahattassa adhigatattaa. tato eva ^b^ana.no bhu~njaami bhojana.m^eb^ nikkilesavasena saamibhaavato saamiparibhogena paribhu~njanato.

[03] ^b^kaame aadittato disvaa^eb^ti vatthukaame kilesakaame ca ekaadasahi aggiihi aadittabhaavato disvaa. ^b^jaataruupaani satthato^eb^ti kataakatappabhedaa sabbasuva.n.navikatiyo anatthaavahataaya nisitasatthato. ^b^gabbhavokkantito dukkha^eb^nti gabbhavokkantito pa.t.thaaya sabbasa.msaarapavattidukkha.m. ^b^nirayesu mahabbhaya^eb^nti saussadesu a.t.thasu mahaanirayesu labbhamaana.m mahaabhaya~nca sabbattha disvaati yojanaa.

[03] ^b^etamaadiinava.m ~natvaa^eb^ti eta.m kaamaana.m aadittataadi.m sa.msaare aadiinava.m dosa.m ~natvaa. ^b^sa.mvega.m alabhi.m tadaa^eb^ti tasmi.m satthu santike dhammassa sutakaale bhavaadike sa.mvega.m alattha.m. ^b^viddho tadaa santo^eb^ti tasmi.m gaha.t.thakaale raagasallaadiihi viddho samaano idaani satthu saasana.m aagamma sampatto aasavakkhaya.m, viddho vaa cattaari saccaani, pa.tividdhoti attho. sesa.m antarantaraadiisu vuttattaa suvi~n~neyyameva.
[03] eva.m thero ra~n~no korabyassa dhamma.m desetvaa satthu santikameva gato. satthaa ca aparabhaage ariyaga.namajjhe nisinno thera.m saddhaapabbajitaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.

[01] ^b^ruupa.m^eb^ ^a^M2.0300^ea^ ^a^P3.0042^ea^ ^b^disvaa sati mu.t.thaa^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato maalukyaputtassa gaathaa. imassa aayasmato vatthu he.t.thaa chakkanipaate (theragaa0 399 aadayo) vuttameva. taa pana gaathaa therena arahatte pati.t.thitena ~naatiina.m dhammadesanaavasena bhaasitaa. idha pana puthujjanakaale ``saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena dhamma.m desetuu''ti yaacitena satthaaraa ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, maalukyaputta, ye te cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa adi.t.thaa adi.t.thapubbaa, na ca passasi, na ca te hoti passeyyanti, atthi te tattha chando vaa raago vaa pema.m vaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ye te sotavi~n~neyyaa saddaa...pe0... ^a^V2.0255^ea^ ghaana...jivhaa...kaaya...manovi~n~neyyaa dhammaa avi~n~naataa avi~n~naatapubbaa, na ca vijaanaasi, na ca te hoti vijaaneyyanti, atthi te tattha chando vaa raago vaa pema.m vaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ettha ca te, maalukyaputta, di.t.thasutamutavi~n~naatabbesu dhammesu di.t.the di.t.thamatta.m bhavissati, sute sutamatta.m, mute mutamatta.m, vi~n~naate vi~n~naatamatta.m bhavissati. yato kho te, maalukyaputta, di.t.thasutamutavi~n~naatabbesu dhammesu di.t.the di.t.thamatta.m, sute sutamatta.m, mute mutamatta.m, vi~n~naate vi~n~naatamatta.m bhavissati, tato tva.m, maalukyaputta, na tena. yato tva.m, maalukyaputta, na tena, tato tva.m, maalukyaputta, na tattha. yato tva.m, maalukyaputta, na tattha, tato tva.m, maalukyaputta, nevidha na hura.m na ubhayamantarena, esevanto dukkhassaa''ti (sa.m0 ni0 4.95). sa.mkhittena dhamme desite tassa dhammassa saadhuka.m uggahitabhaava.m pakaasentena --
[21] ``ruupa.m disvaa sati mu.t.thaa, piya.m nimitta.m manasi karoto.
[21] ``sadda.m sutvaa sati mu.t.thaa, piya.m nimitta.m manasi karoto.
[21] ``gandha.m ^a^P3.0043^ea^ ghatvaa sati mu.t.thaa, piya.m nimitta.m manasi karoto.
[21] ``rasa.m bhotvaa sati mu.t.thaa, piya.m nimitta.m manasi karoto.
[21] ``phassa.m ^a^V2.0256^ea^ phussa sati mu.t.thaa, piya.m nimitta.m manasi karoto.
[21] ``dhamma.m ~natvaa sati mu.t.thaa, piya.m nimitta.m manasi karoto.
[21] ``na so rajjati ruupesu, ruupa.m disvaa pa.tissato.
[27] khiiyati nopaciiyati, eva.m so caratii sato.
[22] eva.m apacinato dukkha.m, santike nibbaana vuccati..
[21] ``na so rajjati saddesu, sadda.m sutvaa pa.tissato.
[27] khiiyati nopaciiyati, eva.m so caratii sato.
[22] eva.m apacinato dukkha.m, santike nibbaana vuccati..
[21] ``na so rajjati gandhesu, gandha.m ghatvaa pa.tissato.
[27] khiiyati nopaciiyati, eva.m so caratii sato.
[22] eva.m apacinato dukkha.m, santike nibbaana vuccati..
[21] ``na so rajjati rasesu, rasa.m bhotvaa pa.tissato.
[27] khiiyati nopaciiyati, eva.m so caratii sato.
[22] eva.m apacinato dukkha.m, santike nibbaana vuccati..
[21] ``na so rajjati phassesu, phassa.m phussa pa.tissato.
[27] khiiyati nopaciiyati, eva.m so caratii sato.
[22] eva.m apacinato dukkha.m, santike nibbaana vuccati..
[27] khiiyati nopaciiyati, eva.m so caratii sato.
[22] eva.m apacinato dukkha.m, santike nibbaana vuccatii''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^ruupa.m disvaa^eb^ti cakkhuvi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m cakkhudvaarena upalabhitvaa. ^b^sati mu.t.thaa, piya.m nimitta.m manasi karoto^eb^ti tasmi.m ruupe di.t.thamatte eva a.t.thatvaa subhanimitta.m manasi karoto subhaakaaraggaha.navasena ayoniso manasi karoto sati mu.t.thaa hoti. tathaa ca sati ^b^saarattacitto vedeti^eb^ ta.m ruupaaramma.na.m ratto, giddho, gadhito hutvaa anubhavati, assaadeti, abhinandati. tathaabhuuto ca ^b^ta~nca ajjhosa ti.t.thatii^eb^ti ta~nca ruupaaramma.na.m ajjhosaaya ``sukha.m sukha''nti abhinivissa gilitvaa parini.t.thaapetvaa ti.t.thati.

[03] ^b^tassa va.d.dhanti vedanaa, anekaa ruupasambhavaa^eb^ti tassa evaruupassa puggalassa ^a^P3.0044^ea^ ruupasambhavaa ruupaaramma.naa sukhaadibhedena anekaa vedanaa kilesuppattihetubhuutaa va.d.dhanti. ^b^abhijjhaa ca vihesaa ca, cittamassuupaha~n~natii^eb^ti piyaruupe saarajjanavasena uppajjamaanaaya abhijjhaaya, apiyaruupe byaapajjanavasena piyaruupasseva vipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaaya uppajjamaanaaya sokaadilakkha.naaya vihesaaya ca assa puggalassa citta.m upaha~n~nati baadhiiyati. ^b^evamaacinato dukkha^eb^nti vuttaakaarena ta.m ta.m vedanassaadavasena bhavaabhisa"nkhaara.m aacinato va.t.tadukkha.m pavattati. tenaaha bhagavaa -- ``vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa...pe0... dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotii''ti (vibha0 225; sa.m0 ni0 2.1). tathaabhuutassa ^b^aaraa^eb^ aarakaa duure nibbaana.m vuccati, tassa ta.m dullabhanti attho. ^b^sadda.m sutvaa^eb^tiaadigaathaasupi vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. tattha ^b^ghatvaa^eb^ti ghaayitvaa. ^b^bhotvaa^eb^ti saayitvaa. ^b^phussaa^eb^ti phusitvaa. ^b^dhamma.m ~natvaa^eb^ti dhammaaramma.na.m vijaanitvaa.

[03] eva.m chadvaaragocare saarajjantassa va.t.ta.m dassetvaa idaani tattha virajjantassa viva.t.ta.m dassento ^b^``na so rajjati ruupesuu''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^na so rajjati ruupesu, ruupa.m disvaa pa.tissato^eb^ti ^a^V2.0258^ea^ yo puggalo ruupa.m disvaa aapaathagata.m ^a^M2.0304^ea^ ruupaaramma.na.m cakkhudvaarikena vi~n~naa.nasantaanena gahetvaa catusampaja~n~navasena sampajaanakaaritaaya pa.tissato hoti, so ruupaaramma.nesu na rajjati raaga.m na janeti, a~n~nadatthu virattacitto vedeti, ruupaaramma.namhi samudayaadito yathaabhuuta.m pajaananto nibbindati, nibbindanto ta.m tatthuppannavedana~nca virattacitto vedeti, tathaabhuuto ca ^b^ta~nca najjhosa ti.t.thatii^eb^ti ta.m ruupaaramma.na.m sammadeva virattacittataaya ajjhosaaya na ti.t.thati ``eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa''ti ta.nhaamaanadi.t.thivasena naabhinivisati.

[03] ^b^yathaassa passato ruupa^eb^nti assa yogino yathaa tattha abhijjhaadayo nappavattanti, eva.m aniccaadito ruupa.m passantassa. ^b^sevato caapi vedana^eb^nti ta.m aarabbha uppanna.m vedana.m ta.msampayuttadhamme ca gocarasevanaaya sevato caapi. ^b^khiiyatii^eb^ti sabba.m kilesava.t.ta.m parikkhaya.m pariyaadaana.m gacchati. ^b^nopaciiyatii^eb^ti na upaciyati na aacaya.m gacchati. ^b^eva.m so caratii sato^eb^ti eva.m kilesaapanayanapa.tipattiyaa sato sampajaano hutvaa carati, viharati. ^b^eva.m apacinato dukkha^eb^nti vuttanayena apacayagaaminiyaa maggapa~n~naaya sakala.m va.t.tadukkha.m apacinantassa. ^b^santike nibbaana vuccatii^eb^ti saupaadisesaanupaadisesanibbaanadhaatusamiipe evaati vuccati asa"nkhataaya dhaatuyaa sacchikatattaa. ^b^na so rajjati saddesuu^eb^tiaadiisupi iminaava nayena attho veditabbo.

[03] eva.m ^a^P3.0045^ea^ thero imaahi gaathaahi satthu ovaadassa attanaa upadhaaritabhaava.m pavedetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa satthaara.m vanditvaa gato nacirasseva vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.niiti.

[03] ^b^paripu.n.nakaayo^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato selattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarabhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ga.napaamokkho hutvaa tii.ni purisasataani samaadapetvaa tehi saddhi.m satthu gandhaku.ti.m kaaretvaa katapariyositaaya gandhaku.tiyaa ^a^M2.0305^ea^ sabhikkhusa"nghassa bhagavato mahaadaana.m pavattetvaa satthaara.m bhikkhuu ca ticiivarena acchaadesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena eka.m buddhantara.m devaloke eva vasitvaa tato cuto devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m ^a^V2.0259^ea^ buddhuppaade a"nguttaraapesu aapa.ne naama braahma.nagaame braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^selo^eb^ti laddhanaamo ahosi. so vayappatto tiisu vedesu, braahma.nasippesu ca nipphatti.m gantvaa tii.ni maa.navakasataani mante vaacento aapa.ne pa.tivasati. tena ca samayena satthaa saavatthito nikkhamitvaa a.d.dhate.lasahi bhikkhusatehi saddhi.m a"nguttaraapesu caarika.m caranto selassa, antevaasikaana~nca ~naa.naparipaaka.m disvaa a~n~natarasmi.m vanasa.n.de viharati. atha ke.niyo naama ja.tilo satthu aagamana.m sutvaa tattha gantvaa saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena satthaara.m svaatanaaya nimantetvaa sake assame pahuuta.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadeti. tasmi~nca samaye selo braahma.no saddhi.m tiihi maa.navakasatehi ja"nghaavihaara.m anuvicaranto ke.niyassa assama.m pavisitvaa ja.tile ka.t.thaphaalanuddhanasampaadanaadinaa daanuupakara.na.m sajjente disvaa, ``ki.m nu kho te, ke.niya, mahaaya~n~no paccupa.t.thito''tiaadi.m pucchitvaa tena ``buddho bhagavaa mayaa svaatanaaya nimantito''ti vutte ``buddho''ti vacana.m sutvaava ha.t.tho udaggo piitisomanassajaato taavadeva maa.navakehi saddhi.m satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa katapa.tisanthaaro ekamanta.m nisinno bhagavato kaaye baatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naani disvaa ``imehi lakkha.nehi samannaagato raajaa vaa hoti cakkavattii, buddho vaa loke viva.t.tacchado, aya.m pana pabbajito, no ca kho na.m jaanaami `buddho vaa, no vaa', suta.m kho pana meta.m braahma.naana.m vuddhaana.m mahallakaana.m aacariyapaacariyaana.m bhaasamaanaana.m `ye te bhavanti arahanto sammaasambuddhaa ^a^P3.0046^ea^, te sake va.n.ne bha~n~namaane attaana.m paatukarontii'ti asammaasambuddho hi sammukhe .thatvaa buddhagu.nehi abhitthaviiyamaano saarajjati ma"nkubhaava.m aapajjati avesaarajjappattataaya ananuyogakkhamattaa, ya.mnuunaaha.m sama.na.m gotama.m sammukhaa saaruppaahi gaathaahi abhitthaveyya''nti eva.m pana cintetvaa --

[03] tattha ^b^paripu.n.nakaayo^eb^ti abhibyattaruupaana.m dvatti.msaaya mahaapurisalakkha.naana.m paripu.n.nataaya ahiina"ngapacca"ngataaya ca paripu.n.nasariiro. ^b^surucii^eb^ti sundarasariirappabho. ^b^sujaato^eb^ti aarohapari.naahasampattiyaa, sa.n.thaanasampattiyaa ca sunibbatto. ^b^caarudassano^eb^ti sucirampi passantaana.m atittijanaka.m appa.tikkuula.m rama.niiya.m caaru eva dassana.m assaati caarudassano. keci panaahu ``caarudassanoti sundaranetto''ti. ^b^suva.n.nava.n.no^eb^ti suva.n.nasadisava.n.no. ^b^asii^eb^ti bhavasi, ida.m pada.m ``paripu.n.nakaayo asii''tiaadinaa sabbapadehi yojetabba.m. ^b^susukkadaa.tho^eb^ti su.t.thu sukkadaa.tho. bhagavato hi daa.thaahi candakira.naa viya dhavalarasmiyo niccharanti. ^b^viiriyavaa^eb^ti viiriyapaaramiipaaripuuriyaa catura"ngasamannaagataviiriyaadhi.t.thaanato catubbidhassa sammappadhaanassa sampattiyaa ca atisayayutto.

[03] ^b^narassa hi sujaatassaa^eb^ti samati.msaaya paaramiina.m, ariyassa vaa cakkavattiivattassa paripuuritattaa su.t.thu sammadeva jaatassa narassa, mahaapurisassaati attho. ^b^sabbe te^eb^ti ye mahaapurisabhaava.m loke aggapuggalabhaava.m ^a^M2.0307^ea^ bya~njayantiiti ^b^bya~njanaa^eb^ti laddhavohaarasuppati.t.thitapaadataadibaatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.nasa"nkhaataa tambanakhatu"nganakhataadiasiitianubya~njanasa"nkhaataa ^a^P3.0047^ea^ ca ruupagu.naa, te anavasesaa, tava kaayasmi.m santiiti vacanaseso.

[03] idaani tesu lakkha.nesu attanaa abhirucitehi lakkha.nehi bhagavanta.m thomento ^b^``pasannanetto''^eb^tiaadimaaha. bhagavaa hi pa~nca va.n.napasaadasampattiyaa ^b^pasannanetto^eb^. paripu.n.nacandama.n.dalasadisamukhataaya ^b^sumukho^eb^. aarohapari.naahasampattiyaa ^b^brahaa^eb^. brahmujugattataaya ^b^uju^eb^. jutimantataaya ^b^pataapavaa^eb^.

[03] idaani tameva pataapavantata.m aadiccuupamaaya vibhaavento ^b^``majjhe sama.nasa"nghassaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^aadiccova virocasii^eb^ti yathaa aadicco uggacchanto sabba.m tamagata.m ^a^V2.0261^ea^ vidhametvaa aaloka.m karonto virocati, eva.m tvampi anto ceva bahi ca sabba.m avijjaatama.m viddha.msetvaa ~naa.naaloka.m karonto virocasi.
[03] dassaniiyaruupataaya a"ngiigataana.m dassanasampattiina.m aavahanato, kalyaa.nehi pa~ncahi dassanehi samannaagatattaa ca ^b^kalyaa.nadassano. uttamava.n.nino^eb^ti uttamava.n.nasampannassa.

[03] ^b^cakkavattii^eb^ti cakkaratana.m vatteti, catuuhi sampatticakkehi vatteti, tehi ca pare vatteti. parahitaaya iriyaapathacakkaana.m vatto etasmi.m atthiiti cakkavattii. atha vaa catuuhi acchariyadhammehi ca sa"ngahavatthuuhi ca samannaagamena parehi anabhibhavaniiyassa aa.naacakkassa vatto etasmi.m atthiitipi cakkavattii. ^b^rathesabho^eb^ti rathikesu aajaaniiyausabhapuriso, mahaarathikoti attho. ^b^caaturanto^eb^ti catusamuddantaaya pathaviyaa issaro. ^b^vijitaavii^eb^ti vijitavijayo. ^b^jambusa.n.dassaa^eb^ti jambudiipassa, paaka.tena hi issariyaani dassento evamaaha. cakkavattii pana saparittadiipaana.m catunnampi mahaadiipaana.m issarova.

[03] ^b^khattiyaa^eb^ti ^a^M2.0308^ea^ jaatikhattiyaa. ^b^bhogii^eb^ti bhogiyaa. ^b^raajaano^eb^ti ye keci rajja.m kaarentaa. ^b^anuyantaa^eb^ti anugaamino sevakaa. ^b^raajaabhiraajaa^eb^ti raajuuna.m puujaniiyo raajaa hutvaa, cakkavattiiti adhippaayo. ^b^manujindo^eb^ti manussaadhipati, manussaana.m paramissaroti attho.
[03] eva.m selena vutte bhagavaa ``ye te bhavanti arahanto sammaasambuddhaa, te sake va.n.ne bha~n~namaane attaana.m paatukarontii''ti ima.m selassa manoratha.m puurento --
[22] dhammena cakka.m vattemi, cakka.m appa.tivattiya''nti.. -- ima.m gaathamaaha.

[03] tatraaya.m ^a^P3.0048^ea^ adhippaayo -- ya.m ma.m tva.m, sela, yaacasi, ``raajaa arahasi bhavitu.m cakkavattii''ti, ettha appossukko hohi, ^b^raajaahamasmi,^eb^ sati ca raajatte yathaa a~n~no raajaa samaanopi yojanasata.m vaa anusaasati, dve tii.ni cattaari pa~nca yojanasataani vaa yojanasahassa.m vaa cakkavattii hutvaapi catudiipapariyantamatta.m vaa, naahameva.m paricchinnavisayo. aha~nhi ^b^dhammaraajaa anuttaro^eb^ bhavaggato aviicipariyanta.m katvaa tiriya.m aparimeyyalokadhaatuyo anusaasaami. yaavataa hi apadaadibhedaa sattaa, aha.m tesa.m aggo. na hi me koci siilena vaa...pe0... ^a^V2.0262^ea^ vimutti~naa.nadassanena vaa sadiso natthi, kuto bhiyyo. svaaha.m eva.m dhammaraajaa anuttaro, anuttareneva catusatipa.t.thaanaadibhedabodhipakkhiyasa"nkhaatena ^b^dhammena cakka.m vattemi,^eb^ ``ida.m pajahatha, ida.m upasampajja viharathaa''tiaadinaa aa.naacakka.m. ``ida.m kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkha.m ariyasacca''ntiaadinaa (mahaava0 14; sa.m0 ni0 5.1081) pariyattidhammena dhammacakkameva vaa. ^b^cakka.m appa.tivattiya^eb^nti ya.m cakka.m appa.tivattiya.m hoti sama.nena vaa...pe0... kenaci vaa lokasminti.
[03] eva.m attaanamaavikaronta.m bhagavanta.m disvaa piitisomanassajaato selo puna da.lhiikara.nattha.m --
[22] dhammena cakka.m vattemi, iti bhaasatha gotama..
[03] tattha ^b^ko nu senaapatii^eb^ti dhammara~n~no bhoto dhammena pavattitassa cakkassa anupavattanako senaapati ko nuuti pucchi.
[03] tena ca samayena bhagavato dakkhi.napasse aayasmaa saariputto nisinno hoti, suva.n.napu~njo viya siriyaa sobhamaano. ta.m dassento bhagavaa --
[03] tattha ^b^anujaato tathaagata^eb^nti, tathaagata.m anujaato, tathaa gatena hetunaa ariyaaya jaatiyaa jaatoti attho.

[03] eva.m ``ko nu senaapati bhoto''ti selena vuttapa~nha.m byaakaritvaa ya.m selo aaha ``sambuddho pa.tijaanaasii''ti tattha na.m nikka"nkha.m kaatukaamo ``naaha.m pa.ti~n~naamatteneva pa.tijaanaami, api caaha.m iminaa kaara.nena buddho''ti ~naapetu.m --
[22] pahaatabba.m pahiina.m me, tasmaa buddhosmi braahma.naa''ti.. -- gaathamaaha.

[03] tattha ^b^abhi~n~neyya^eb^nti cattaari saccaani cattaari ariyasaccaani. catunna~nhi saccaana.m ariyasaccaana~nca saama~n~naggaha.nameta.m yadida.m abhi~n~neyyanti. tattha ariyasaccesu ya.m bhaavetabba.m maggasacca.m, ya~nca pahaatabba.m samudayasacca.m, tadubhayaggaha.nena ^a^M2.0310^ea^ tesa.m phalabhuutaani nirodhasaccadukkhasaccaanipi gahitaaneva honti hetuggaha.neneva phalasiddhito. tena tattha ``sacchikaatabba.m sacchikata.m, pari~n~neyya.m pari~n~naata''nti idampi vuttameva hoti. ``abhi~n~neyya.m abhi~n~naata''nti vaa iminaa ca sabbassapi ~neyyassa abhi~n~naatasambuddhabhaava.m uddesavasena pakaasetvaa tadekadesa.m niddesavasena dassento ^b^``bhaavetabba~nca bhaavita''^eb^ntiaadimaaha. atha vaa ^b^``bhaavetabba.m bhaavita.m, pahaatabba.m pahiina''^eb^nti iminaa attano ~naa.napahaanasampadaakittanamukhena ta.mmuulakattaa sabbepi buddhagu.naa kittitaa hontiiti aaha ^b^``tasmaa buddhosmi, braahma.naa''^eb^ti. abhi~n~neyyaabhi~n~naataggaha.nena hi sabbaso vijjaavimuttiina.m gahitattaa saphala.m catusaccabhaava.m saddhi.m hetusampattiyaa dassento bujjhitabba.m sabba.m bujjhitvaa buddho jaatosmiiti ~naayena hetunaa attano buddhabhaava.m vibhaaveti.
[03] eva.m nippariyaayena attaana.m paatukaritvaa attani ka"nkhaavitara.nattha.m braahma.na.m ussaahento --
[22] sabbaamitte vase katvaa, modaami akutobhayo''ti.. -- gaathattayamaaha.

[03] tattha ^b^vinayassuu^eb^ti vinehi chinda. ^b^ka"nkha^eb^nti vicikiccha.m. ^b^adhimuccassuu^eb^ti adhimokkha.m kara ``sammaasambuddho''ti saddaha. ^b^dullabha.m dassana.m hoti, sambuddhaana^eb^nti yato kappaana.m asa"nkhyeyyampi buddhasu~n~no loko hoti. ^b^sallakatto^eb^ti, raagaadisallakattano. ^b^brahmabhuuto^eb^ti se.t.thabhuuto. ^b^atitulo^eb^ti tula.m atiito, nirupamoti attho. ^b^maarasenappamaddano^eb^ti ``kaamaa te pa.thamaa senaa''ti (su0 ni0 438; mahaani0 28; cuu.lani0 nandamaa.navapucchaaniddesa 47) eva.m aagataaya maarasenaaya pamaddano. ^b^sabbaamitte^eb^ti khandhakilesaabhisa"nkhaaramaccudevaputtamaarasa"nkhaate sabbapaccatthike ^a^M2.0311^ea^. ^b^vase katvaa^eb^ti attano ^a^P3.0050^ea^ vase katvaa. ^b^modaami akutobhayo^eb^ti kutoci nibbhayo samaadhisukhena, phalanibbaanasukhena ca modaami.
[03] eva.m ^a^V2.0264^ea^ vutte selo braahma.no taavadeva bhagavati sa~njaatapasaado pabbajjaapekkho hutvaa --
[21] ``yo ma.m icchati anvetu, yo vaa nicchati gacchatu.
[25] gaathattayamaaha. yathaa ta.m paripaakagataaya upanissayasampattiyaa codiyamaano.
[03] tato tepi maa.navakaa hetusampannataaya tattheva pabbajjaapekkhaa hutvaa --
[25] gaathamaaha.msu, yathaa ta.m tena saddhi.m kataadhikaaraa kulaputtaa.
[03] atha selo tesu maa.navakesu tu.t.thacitto te dassento pabbajja~nca yaacamaano --
[22] brahmacariya.m carissaama, bhagavaa tava santike''ti.. -- gaathamaaha.

[03] tato ^a^M2.0312^ea^ bhagavaa yasmaa selo he.t.thaa vuttanayena padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale tesa.myeva ti.n.na.m purisasataana.m ga.naje.t.tho hutvaa ropitakusalamuulo, idaani pacchimabhavepi tesa.myeva aacariyo hutvaa ^a^V2.0265^ea^ nibbatto, ~naa.na~ncassa tesa~nca paripakka.m, ehibhikkhubhaavassa ca upanissayo atthi, tasmaa te sabbeva ehibhikkhubhaavena pabbajjaaya pabbaajento --
[22] yattha amoghaa pabbajjaa, appamattassa sikkhato''ti.. -- gaathamaaha.

[03] tattha ^b^sandi.t.thika^eb^nti paccakkha.m. ^b^akaalika^eb^nti maggaanantaraphaluppattito na kaalantare pattabbaphala.m. ^b^yatthaa^eb^ti ya.mnimittaa ^a^P3.0051^ea^. maggabrahmacariyanimittaa hi pabbajjaa amoghaa anipphalaa, yatthaati vaa yasmi.m saasane ^b^appamattassa^eb^ sativippavaasarahitassa tiisu sikkhaasu ^b^sikkhato^eb^.

[03] eva~nca vatvaa ``etha, bhikkhavo''ti bhagavaa avoca. taavadeva te sabbe iddhimayapattaciivaradharaa hutvaa sa.t.thivassikattheraa viya bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa parivaaresu.m. so eva.m pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto sattame divase sapariso arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.40.208-303) --
[21] ``uggaa ^a^M2.0313^ea^ ca raajaputtaa ca, vesiyaanaa ca braahma.naa.
[21] ``te me sutvaana vacana.m, ga.na.m bandhi.msu taavade.
[21] ``ime ^a^M2.0314^ea^ tii.ni sataa viira, purisaa ekato ga.naa.
[22] ti.n.na.m sataana.m purato, imaa gaathaa abhaasatha..
[22] pacchime bhave sampatte, vaase.t.tho naama braahma.no..
[22] selo iti mama.m naama.m, cha.la"nge paarami.m gato..
[22] aavaaho vaa vivaaho vaa, raajaa vaa te nimantito..
[22] na nimantemi raajaana.m, aahutii me na vijjati..
[21] ``na catthi mayhamaavaaho, vivaaho me na vijjati.
[22] so me nimantito ajja, tasseta.m pa.tiyaadana.m..
[22] vijjuupamo mahaaviiro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] siihuupamo mahaaviiro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] naaguupamo mahaaviiro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] usabhuupamo mahaaviiro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] sakkuupamo mahaaviiro, so me buddho nimantito..
[21] ``vasii ga.nii pataapii ca, tejassii ca duraasado.
[22] brahmuupamo mahaaviiro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] dhara.nuupamo mahaaviiro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] udadhuupamo mahaaviiro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] neruupamo mahaaviiro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] gaganuupamo mahaaviiro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] assaasako mahaaviiro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] ratanaakaro mahaaviiro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] meghuupamo mahaaviiro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] suuriyuupamo mahaaviiro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] canduupamo mahaaviiro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] appameyyo mahaaviiro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] vimutti asadisaa yassa, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] yassa parakkamo je.t.tho, so me buddho nimantito..
[21] ``raago doso ca moho ca, visaa sabbe samuuhataa.
[22] agaduupamo mahaaviiro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] vejjuupamo mahaaviiro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] buddho buddhoti sutvaana, piiti me udapajjatha..
[21] ``kaha.m ^a^V2.0269^ea^ nu kho so bhagavaa, lokaje.t.tho naraasabho.
[22] gaavii yathaa vacchagiddhaa, evaaha.m vicini.m jina.m..
[22] mattova ku~njaro dantii, eva.m buddhaa duraasadaa..
[22] buddhoti ni.t.tha.m gantvaana, saha sissehi pabbaji.m..
[22] tena kammena sukatena, a.t.tha hetuu labhaamaha.m..
[21] ``disaasu puujito homi, bhogaa ca amitaa mama.
[22] pati.t.thaa homi sabbesa.m, taaso mama na vijjati..
[21] ``byaadhayo me na vijjanti, diighaayu.m paalayaami ca.
[22] a.t.tha gopaanasii naama, tava putto mahaamuni..
[22] tena kammena sukatena, pa~nca hetuu labhaamaha.m..
[22] aadeyyavacano homi, na dha.msemi yathaa aha.m..
[21] ``abhanta.m hoti me citta.m, akhilo homi kassaci.
[22] tena kammena sukatena, vimalo homi saasane..
[22] saavako te mahaaviira, bhikkhu ta.m vandate muni..
[22] tena kammena sukatena, pa~nca hetuu labhaamaha.m..
[22] sabbasampattiko homi, macchera.m me na vijjati..
[22] tena kammena sukatena, paavisi.m abhaya.m pura.m..
[21] ``ye keci damakaa loke, hatthiasse damenti ye.
[22] karitvaa kaara.naa naanaa, daaru.nena damenti te..
[03] arahatta.m pana patvaa satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa a~n~na.m byaakaronto --

[25] gaathamaaha ^a^M2.0320^ea^. tassattho -- pa~ncahi cakkhuuhi ^b^cakkhuma^eb^ bhagavaa yasmaa maya.m ito atiite ^b^a.t.thame^eb^ divase ta.m sara.na.m ^b^agamimha^eb^. tasmaa sattarattena tava saasane damakena ^b^dantaa amha,^eb^ aho ^b^te^eb^ sara.nagamanassa aanubhaavoti. tato para.m --
