[03] upaasako pakatiyaapi jalamaanapadiipo telena aasitto viya su.t.thutara.m pasanno hutvaa cintesi -- ``ki.m mayha.m a~n~naaya sampattiyaa, anaagate ekassa buddhassa santike dhutavaadaana.m aggabhaavatthaaya patthana.m karissaamii''ti. so punapi satthaara.m nimantetvaa teneva niyaamena satta divase mahaadaana.m datvaa sattame divase buddhappamukhassa mahaabhikkhusa"nghassa ticiivaraani datvaa satthu paadamuule nipajjitvaa evamaaha -- ``ya.m me, bhante, satta divase daana.m dentassa metta.m kaayakamma.m, metta.m vaciikamma.m, metta.m manokamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m, iminaaha.m na a~n~na.m devasampatti.m vaa sakkamaarabrahmasampatti.m vaa patthemi, ida.m pana me kamma.m anaagate ekassa buddhassa santike mahaanisabhattherena patta.t.thaanantara.m paapu.nanatthaaya terasadhuta"ngadharaana.m aggabhaavassa adhikaaro hotuu''ti. satthaa ``mahanta.m .thaana.m iminaa patthita.m, samijjhissati nu kho, no''ti olokento samijjhanabhaava.m disvaa aaha -- ``manaapa.m te .thaana.m patthita.m, anaagate satasahassakappaavasaane gotamo naama buddho uppajjissati ^a^P3.0123^ea^, tassa tva.m tatiyasaavako mahaakassapatthero naama bhavissasii''ti byaakaasi. ta.m sutvaa upaasako ``buddhaana.m dve kathaa naama natthii''ti punadivase pattabba.m viya ta.m sampatti.m ama~n~nittha. so yaavataayuka.m daana.m datvaa, siila.m samaadaaya rakkhitvaa, naanappakaara.m kalyaa.nakamma.m katvaa, kaala.m katvaa, sagge nibbatti.

[03] tato pa.t.thaaya devamanussesu sampatti.m anubhavanto ito ekanavute kappe vipassisammaasambuddhe bandhumatiinagara.m upanissaaya kheme migadaaye viharante devalokaa cavitvaa a~n~natarasmi.m pariji.n.nabraahma.nakule nibbatti. tasmi~nca kaale vipassii bhagavaa sattame sattame sa.mvacchare dhamma.m kathesi, mahanta.m kolaahala.m hoti. sakalajambudiipe devataa ``satthaa dhamma.m kathessatii''ti aarocesu.m. braahma.no ta.m saasana.m assosi ^a^M2.0431^ea^. tassa ca nivaasanasaa.tako ekoyeva hoti, tathaa braahma.niyaa. paarupana.m pana dvinnampi ekameva. so sakalanagare ``ekasaa.takabraahma.no''ti pa~n~naayi. so braahma.naana.m kenacideva kiccena sannipaate sati braahma.ni.m gehe .thapetvaa saya.m ta.m vattha.m paarupitvaa gacchati. braahma.niina.m sannipaate sati saya.m gehe acchati, braahma.nii ta.m vattha.m paarupitvaa gacchati. tasmi.m pana divase braahma.no braahma.ni.m aaha -- ``bhoti, ki.m ratti.m dhamma.m su.nissasi, divaa''ti? ``maya.m maatugaamajaatikaa naama ratti.m ^a^V2.0366^ea^ sotu.m na sakkoma, divaa sossaamaa''ti braahma.na.m gehe .thapetvaa ta.m vattha.m paarupitvaa upaasikaahi saddhi.m divaa gantvaa satthaara.m vanditvaa ekamante nisinnaa dhamma.m sutvaa upaasikaahiyeva saddhi.m aagamaasi. atha braahma.no braahma.ni.m gehe .thapetvaa ta.m vattha.m paarupitvaa vihaara.m gato.

[03] tasmi.m samaye satthaa parisamajjhe ala"nkatadhammaasane nisinno cittabiijani.m aadaaya aakaasaga"nga.m otaarento viya, sineru.m mantha.m katvaa saagara.m nimmathento viya, dhammakatha.m kathesi. braahma.nassa parisapariyante nisinnassa dhamma.m su.nantassa pa.thamayaamasmi.myeva sakalasariira.m puurayamaanaa pa~ncava.n.naa piiti uppajji. so paarutavattha.m sa"ngharitvaa ``dasabalassa dassaamii''ti cintesi. athassa aadiinavasahassa.m dassayamaana.m macchera.m uppajji. so ``braahma.niyaa mayha~nca ekameva vattha.m, a~n~na.m ki~nci paarupana.m natthi, apaarupitvaa ca naama bahi vicaritu.m na sakkaa''ti sabbathaapi adaatukaamo ahosi, athassa nikkhante pa.thamayaame majjhimayaamepi tatheva piiti uppajji. tatheva cintetvaa tatheva adaatukaamo ahosi. athassa majjhimayaame nikkhante pacchimayaamepi tatheva piiti uppajji. tadaa so ``ya.m vaa hotu ta.m vaa pacchaapi jaanissaamii''ti vattha.m sa"ngharitvaa ^a^P3.0124^ea^ satthu paadamuule .thapesi. tato vaamahattha.m aabhujitvaa dakkhi.nena hatthena tikkhattu.m appho.tetvaa ``jita.m me, jita.m me''ti tayo vaare nadi.

[03] tasmi~nca samaye bandhumaraajaa dhammaasanassa pacchato antosaa.niya.m nisinno dhamma.m su.naati. ra~n~no ca naama ``jita.m me''ti saddo amanaapo hoti ^a^M2.0432^ea^. so purisa.m pesesi -- ``gaccha, eta.m puccha ki.m vadasii''ti. so tena gantvaa pucchito ``avasesaa hatthiyaanaadiini aaruyha asicammaadiini gahetvaa parasena.m jinanti, na ta.m acchariya.m. aha.m pana pacchato aagacchantassa kuu.tago.nassa muggarena siisa.m bhinditvaa ta.m palaapento viya maccheracitta.m madditvaa paarutavattha.m dasabalassa adaasi.m, ta.m me macchariya.m jita''nti aaha. so puriso aagantvaa ta.m pavatti.m ra~n~no aarocesi. raajaa aaha -- ``amhe, bha.ne, dasabalassa anuruupa.m na jaanimha, braahma.no jaanii''ti vatthayuga.m pesesi. ta.m disvaa braahma.no cintesi -- ``aya.m mayha.m tu.nhiinisinnassa pa.thama.m ki~nci adatvaa satthu gu.ne kathentassa adaasi. satthu gu.ne pa.ticca uppannena pana mayha.m ko attho''ti tampi vatthayuga.m dasabalasseva adaasi. raajaapi ``ki.m braahma.nena kata''nti pucchitvaa ``tampi tena vatthayuga.m tathaagatasseva dinna''nti sutvaa a~n~naanipi dve vatthayugaani pesesi, so taanipi adaasi. raajaa a~n~naanipi cattaariiti eva.m yaava dvatti.msavatthayugaani pesesi. atha braahma.no ``ida.m va.d.dhetvaa va.d.dhetvaa gaha.na.m viya hotii''ti ^a^V2.0367^ea^ attano atthaaya eka.m, braahma.niyaa ekanti dve vatthayugaani gahetvaa ti.msayugaani tathaagatasseva adaasi. tato pa.t.thaaya ca so satthu vissaasiko jaato.

[03] atha na.m raajaa ekadivasa.m siitasamaye satthu santike dhamma.m su.nanta.m disvaa satasahassagghanaka.m attanaa paarutarattakambala.m datvaa aaha -- ``ito pa.t.thaaya ima.m paarupitvaa dhamma.m su.naahii''ti. so ``ki.m me iminaa kambalena imasmi.m puutikaaye upaniitenaa''ti cintetvaa antogandhaku.tiya.m tathaagatassa ma~ncassa upari vitaana.m katvaa agamaasi. athekadivasa.m raajaa paatova vihaara.m gantvaa antogandhaku.tiya.m satthu santike nisiidi. tasmi~nca samaye chabba.n.naa buddharasmiyo kambale pa.tiha~n~nanti, kambalo ativiya virocati. raajaa ullokento sa~njaanitvaa aaha -- ``amhaaka.m, bhante, esa kambalo, amhehi ekasaa.takabraahma.nassa dinno''ti. ``tumhehi, mahaaraaja, braahma.no puujito, braahma.nena maya.m puujitaa''ti. raajaa ``braahma.no yutta.m a~n~naasi, na maya''nti pasiiditvaa ya.m manussaana.m upakaarabhuuta.m, ta.m sabba.m a.t.tha.t.thaka.m katvaa sabba.t.thaka.m naama daana.m datvaa purohita.t.thaane .thapesi. sopi ``a.t.tha.t.thaka.m naala catusa.t.thi hotii''ti ^a^P3.0125^ea^ catusa.t.thi ^a^M2.0433^ea^ salaakabhattaani upanibandhaapetvaa yaavajiiva.m daana.m datvaa siila.m rakkhitvaa tato cuto sagge nibbatti.

[03] puna tato cuto imasmi.m kappe ko.naagamanassa ca bhagavato kassapadasabalassa caati dvinna.m buddhaana.m antare baaraa.nasiya.m ku.tumbiyaghare nibbatto. so vuddhimanvaaya gharaavaasa.m vasanto ekadivasa.m ara~n~ne ja"nghavihaara.m carati. tasmi~nca samaye paccekabuddho nadiitiire ciivarakamma.m karonto anuvaate appahonte sa"ngharitvaa .thapetu.m aaraddho. so disvaa ``kasmaa, bhante, sa"ngharitvaa .thapethaa''ti aaha. ``anuvaato nappahotii''ti. ``iminaa, bhante, karothaa''ti uttarasaa.taka.m datvaa ``nibbattanibbatta.t.thaane me kenaci parihaani maa hotuu''ti patthana.m pa.t.thapesi.

[03] gharepissa bhaginiyaa saddhi.m bhariyaaya kalaha.m karontiyaa paccekabuddho pi.n.daaya paavisi. athassa bhaginii paccekabuddhassa pi.n.dapaata.m datvaa tassa bhariya.m sandhaaya ``evaruupa.m baala.m yojanasatena parivajjeyya''nti patthana.m pa.t.thapesi. saa geha"nga.ne .thitaa sutvaa ``imaaya dinnabhatta.m maa esa bhu~njatuu''ti patta.m gahetvaa pi.n.dapaata.m cha.d.detvaa kalalassa puuretvaa adaasi. itaraa disvaa ``baale, tva.m ma.m taava akkosa vaa pahara vaa, evaruupassa pana dve asa"nkhyeyyaani puuritapaaramissa pattato bhatta.m cha.d.detvaa kalala.m daatu.m na yutta''nti aaha. athassa bhariyaaya pa.tisa"nkhaana.m uppajji. saa ``ti.t.thatha, bhante''ti kalala.m cha.d.detvaa patta.m dhovitvaa gandhacu.n.nena ^a^V2.0368^ea^. ubba.t.tetvaa pa.niitabhattassa catumadhurassa ca puuretvaa upari aasittena padumagabbhava.n.nena sappinaa vijjotamaana.m paccekabuddhassa hatthe .thapetvaa ``yathaa aya.m pi.n.dapaato obhaasajaato, eva.m obhaasajaata.m me sariira.m hotuu''ti patthana.m pa.t.thapesi. paccekabuddho anumoditvaa aakaasa.m pakkhandi.

[03] tepi jaayampatikaa yaavataayuka.m kusala.m katvaa sagge nibbattitvaa puna tato cavitvaa upaasako kassapasammaasambuddhakaale baaraa.nasiya.m asiitiko.tivibhavassa se.t.thino putto hutvaa nibbatti, itaraapi taadisasseva se.t.thino dhiitaa hutvaa nibbatti. tassa vuddhippattassa tameva se.t.thidhiitara.m aanayi.msu. tassaa pubbe ani.t.thavipaakassa paapakammassa aanubhaavena ^a^M2.0434^ea^ patikula.m pavi.t.thamattaaya ummaarabbhantare sakalasariira.m ugghaa.titavaccaku.ti viya duggandha.m jaata.m. se.t.thikumaaro ``kassaaya.m gandho''ti pucchitvaa, ``se.t.thika~n~naayaa''ti sutvaa, ``niiharatha, niiharathaa''ti aabhataniyaameneva kulaghara.m pesesi. saa eteneva niihaarena sattasu .thaanesu pa.tinivattitaa.

[03] tena ca samayena kassapadasabalo parinibbaayi. tassa ghanako.t.timaahi satasahassagghanikaahi ^a^P3.0126^ea^ rattasuva.n.ni.t.thakaahi yojanubbedha.m cetiya.m aarabhi.msu. tasmi.m cetiye kariiyamaane saa se.t.thidhiitaa cintesi -- ``aha.m sattasu .thaanesu pa.tinivattitaa, ki.m me jiivitenaa''ti attano aabhara.nabha.n.da.m bha~njaapetvaa suva.n.ni.t.thaka.m kaaresi ratanaayata.m vidatthivitthinna.m catura"ngulubbedha.m. tato haritaalamanosilaapi.n.da.m gahetvaa a.t.tha uppalahatthake aadaaya cetiyakara.na.t.thaana.m gataa. tasmi~nca kha.ne ekaa i.t.thakaapanti parikkhipitvaa aagacchamaanaa gha.tani.t.thakaaya uunaa hoti, se.t.thidhiitaa va.d.dhaki.m aaha -- ``ima.m i.t.thaka.m ettha .thapethaa''ti. ``amma, bhaddake kaale aagataasi, sayameva .thapehii''ti. saa aaruyha telena haritaalamanosilaapi.n.da.m yojetvaa tena bandhanena i.t.thaka.m pati.t.thapetvaa upari a.t.thahi uppalahatthakehi puuja.m katvaa vanditvaa ``nibbattanibbatta.t.thaane me kaayato candanagandho vaayatu, mukhato uppalagandho''ti patthana.m katvaa cetiya.m vanditvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa agamaasi.

[03] atha tasmi.myeva kha.ne yassa se.t.thiputtassa pa.thama.m geha.m niitaa, tassa ta.m aarabbha sati udapaadi. nagarepi nakkhatta.m sa"nghu.t.tha.m hoti. so upa.t.thaake aaha -- ``tadaa idha aaniitaa se.t.thidhiitaa atthi, kaha.m saa''ti? ``kulagehe saamii''ti. ``aanetha na.m, nakkhatta.m kii.lissaamaa''ti. te gantvaa ta.m vanditvaa .thitaa ``ki.m, taataa, aagatatthaa''ti taaya pu.t.thaa ta.m pavatti.m aacikkhi.msu. ``taataa, mayaa aabhara.nabha.n.dena cetiya.m puujita.m, aabhara.na.m me natthii''ti ^a^V2.0369^ea^. te gantvaa se.t.thiputtassa aarocesu.m. aanetha na.m, pi.landhana.m labhissatiiti. te aanayi.msu. tassaa saha gharapavesanena sakalageha.m candanagandho ceva niiluppalagandho ca vaayi. se.t.thiputto ta.m pucchi -- ``pa.thama.m tava sariirato duggandho vaayi, idaani pana te sariirato candanagandho, mukhato ^a^M2.0435^ea^ uppalagandho vaayati. ki.m eta''nti? saa aadito pa.t.thaaya attanaa katakamma.m aarocesi. se.t.thiputto ``niyyaanika.m vata buddhasaasana''nti pasiiditvaa yojanika.m suva.n.nacetiya.m kambalaka~ncukena parikkhipitvaa tattha tattha rathacakkappamaa.nehi suva.n.napadumehi ala"nkari. tesa.m dvaadasahatthaa olambakaa honti.

[03] so tattha yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa sagge nibbattitvaa tato cuto baaraa.nasito yojanamatte .thaane a~n~natarasmi.m amaccakule nibbatti, se.t.thika~n~naapi devalokato cavitvaa raajakule je.t.thadhiitaa hutvaa nibbatti. tesu vayappattesu kumaarassa vasanagaame nakkhatta.m sa"nghu.t.tha.m. so maatara.m aaha -- ``saa.taka.m me, amma, dehi, nakkhatta.m kii.lissaamii''ti ^a^P3.0127^ea^. saa dhotavattha.m niiharitvaa adaasi. ``amma, thuula.m ida''nti aaha. saa a~n~na.m niiharitvaa adaasi, tampi pa.tikkhipi. atha na.m maataa aaha -- ``taata, yaadise gehe maya.m jaataa, natthi no ito sukhumatarassa pa.tilaabhaaya pu~n~na''nti. ``tena hi labhana.t.thaana.m gacchaami ammaa''ti. ``putta, aha.m ajjeva tuyha.m baaraa.nasinagare rajjapa.tilaabhampi icchaamii''ti. so maatara.m vanditvaa aaha -- ``gacchaami, ammaa''ti. ``gaccha, taataa''ti. eva.m kirassaa citta.m ahosi -- ``kaha.m gamissati? idha vaa ettha vaa gehe nisiidissatii''ti. so pana pu~n~naniyaamena nikkhamitvaa baaraa.nasi.m gantvaa uyyaane ma"ngalasilaapa.t.te sasiisa.m paarupitvaa nipajji. so ca baaraa.nasira~n~no kaala"nkatassa sattamo divaso hoti.

[03] amaccaa ra~n~no sariirakicca.m katvaa raaja"nga.ne nisiiditvaa mantayi.msu -- ``ra~n~no ekaa dhiitaava atthi, putto natthi, araajaka.m rajja.m nassati, ko raajaa hotii''ti? ``tva.m hohi, tva.m hohii''ti aaha.msu. purohito aaha -- ``bahu.m oloketu.m na va.t.tati, phussaratha.m vissajjemaa''ti. te kumudava.n.ne cattaaro sindhave yojetvaa pa~ncavidha.m raajakakudhabha.n.da.m setacchatta~nca rathasmi.myeva .thapetvaa ratha.m vissajjetvaa pacchato tuuriyaani pagga.nhaapesu.m. ratho paaciinadvaarena nikkhamitvaa uyyaanaabhimukho ahosi. ``paricayena uyyaanaabhimukho gacchati, nivattemaa''ti keci aaha.msu. purohito ``maa nivattayitthaa''ti aaha. ratho kumaara.m padakkhi.na.m katvaa aarohanasajjo hutvaa a.t.thaasi, purohito ^a^M2.0436^ea^ paarupanaka.n.na.m apanetvaa paadatalaani olokento, ``ti.t.thatu aya.m diipo, dvisahassadiipaparivaaresu catuusu mahaadiipesu esa rajja.m kaaretu.m ^a^V2.0370^ea^ yutto''ti vatvaa ``punapi tuuriyaani pagga.nhatha, punapi pagga.nhathaa''ti tikkhattu.m tuuriyaani pagga.nhaapesi.

[03] atha kumaaro mukha.m vivaritvaa oloketvaa, ``kena kammena aagatatthaa''ti aaha. ``deva, tumhaaka.m rajja.m paapu.naatii''ti. ``raajaa kaha''nti? ``devatta.m gato, saamii''ti. ``kati divasaa atikkantaa''ti? ``ajja sattamo divaso''ti. ``putto vaa dhiitaa vaa natthii''ti? ``dhiitaa atthi deva, putto natthii''ti. ``karissaami rajja''nti. te taavadeva abhisekama.n.dapa.m kaaretvaa raajadhiitara.m sabbaala"nkaarehi ala"nkaritvaa, uyyaana.m aanetvaa kumaarassa abhiseka.m aka.msu. athassa kataabhisekassa satasahassagghanaka.m vattha.m upahari.msu. so ``kimida.m, taataa''ti aaha. ``nivaasanavattha.m devaa''ti. ``nanu, taataa, thuula''nti? ``manussaana.m paribhogavatthesu ito sukhumatara.m natthi, ^a^P3.0128^ea^ devaa''ti. ``tumhaaka.m raajaa evaruupa.m nivaasesii''ti? ``aama, devaa''ti. ``na ma~n~ne pu~n~navaa tumhaaka.m raajaa, suva.n.nabhi"ngaara.m aaharatha, labhissaama vattha''nti. suva.n.nabhi"ngaara.m aahari.msu. so u.t.thaaya hatthe dhovitvaa mukha.m vikkhaaletvaa hatthena udaka.m aadaaya puratthimadisaaya.m abbhukkiri. taavadeva ghanapathavi.m bhinditvaa a.t.tha kapparukkhaa u.t.thahi.msu. puna udaka.m gahetvaa dakkhi.naaya.m pacchimaaya.m uttaraayanti eva.m catuusu disaasu abbhukkiri. sabbadisaasu a.t.tha.t.thaka.m katvaa dvatti.msa kapparukkhaa u.t.thahi.msu. so eka.m dibbadussa.m nivaasetvaa eka.m paarupitvaa ``nandara~n~no vijite suttakantikaa itthiyo maa sutta.m kanti.msuuti eva.m bheri.m caraapethaa''ti vatvaa chatta.m ussaapetvaa ala"nkatapa.tiyatto hatthikkhandhavaragato nagara.m pavisitvaa paasaada.m aaruyha mahaasampatti.m anubhavi.

[03] eva.m kaale gacchante ekadivasa.m devii ra~n~no mahaasampatti.m disvaa, ``aho tapassii''ti kaaru~n~naakaara.m dasseti. ``kimida.m, devii''ti ca pu.t.thaa ``atimahatii te, deva, sampatti. atiite buddhaana.m saddahitvaa kalyaa.na.m akattha, idaani anaagatassa paccaya.m kusala.m na karothaa''ti aaha. ``kassa dassaama, siilavanto natthii''ti? ``asu~n~no, deva, jambudiipo arahantehi, tumhe daanameva sajjetha, aha.m arahante lacchaamii''ti aaha. raajaa punadivase ^a^M2.0437^ea^ paaciinadvaare daana.m sajjaapesi. devii paatova uposatha"ngaani adhi.t.thaaya uparipaasaade puratthaabhimukhaa urena nipajjitvaa ``sace etissa.m disaaya.m arahanto atthi, sveva aagantvaa amhaaka.m bhikkha.m ga.nhantuu''ti aaha. tassa.m disaaya.m arahanto naahesu.m, ta.m sakkaara.m kapa.nayaacakaana.m ada.msu. punadivase dakkhi.nadvaare daana.m sajjetvaa tatheva akaasi, punadivase pacchimadvaare. uttaradvaare sajjitadivase pana deviyaa tatheva nimantentiyaa himavante vasantaana.m padumavatiyaa ^a^V2.0371^ea^ puttaana.m pa~ncasataana.m paccekabuddhaana.m je.t.thako mahaapadumapaccekabuddho bhaatike aamantesi, ``maarisaa, nandaraajaa, tumhe nimanteti, adhivaasetha tassaa''ti. te adhivaasetvaa punadivase anotattadahe mukha.m dhovitvaa, aakaasena aagantvaa uttaradvaare otari.msu. manussaa disvaa gantvaa ``pa~ncasataa, deva, paccekabuddhaa aagataa''ti ra~njo aarocesu.m. raajaa saddhi.m deviyaa gantvaa, vanditvaa, patta.m gahetvaa paccekabuddhe paasaada.m aaropetvaa, tatra nesa.m daana.m datvaa, bhattakiccaavasaane raajaa ^a^P3.0129^ea^ sa"nghattherassa, devii, sa"nghanavakassa paadamuule nipajjitvaa ``ayyaa paccayehi na kilamissanti, maya.m pu~n~nena na haayissaama. amhaaka.m yaavajiiva.m idha nivaasaaya pa.ti~n~na.m dethaa''ti pa.ti~n~na.m kaaretvaa uyyaane pa~ncapa.n.nasaalaasataani pa~ncaca"nkamanasataaniiti sabbaakaarena nivaasana.t.thaanaani sampaadetvaa tattha vasaapesu.m.

[03] eva.m kaale gacchante ra~n~no paccanto kupito. so ``aha.m paccanta.m vuupasametu.m gacchaami, tva.m paccekabuddhesu maa pamajjii''ti devi.m ovaditvaa gato. tasmi.m anaagateyeva paccekabuddhaana.m aayusa"nkhaaraa khii.naa. mahaapadumapaccekabuddho tiyaamaratti.m jhaanakii.la.m kii.litvaa aru.nuggamane aalambanaphalaka.m aalambitvaa .thitakova anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayi. etenupaayena sesaapiiti sabbeva parinibbutaa. punadivase devii paccekabuddhaana.m nisiidana.t.thaana.m harituupalitta.m kaaretvaa pupphaani vikiritvaa, dhuupa.m datvaa tesa.m aagamana.m olokayantii nisinnaa aagamana.m apassantii purisa.m pesesi -- ``gaccha, taata, jaanaahi, ki.m ayyaana.m ki~nci aphaasuka''nti? so gantvaa mahaapadumassa pa.n.nasaalaaya dvaara.m vivaritvaa tattha apassanto ca"nkamana.m gantvaa aalambanaphalaka.m nissaaya .thita.m disvaa vanditvaa ``kaalo, bhante''ti ^a^M2.0438^ea^ aaha. ``parinibbutasariira.m ki.m kathessati? so niddaayati ma~n~ne''ti gantvaa pi.t.thipaade hatthena paraamasitvaa paadaana.m siitalataaya ceva thaddhataaya ca parinibbutabhaava.m ~natvaa, dutiyassa santika.m agamaasi. eva.m tatiyassaati sabbesa.m parinibbutabhaava.m ~natvaa raajakula.m gato. ``kaha.m, taata, paccekabuddhaa''ti pu.t.tho ``parinibbutaa, devii''ti aaha. devii kandantii rodantii nikkhamitvaa naagarehi saddhi.m tattha gantvaa saadhukii.lita.m kaaretvaa paccekabuddhaana.m sariirakicca.m kaaretvaa dhaatuyo gahetvaa cetiya.m pati.t.thaapesi.

[03] raajaa paccanta.m vuupasametvaa aagato paccuggamana.m aagata.m devi.m pucchi -- ``ki.m, bhadde, paccekabuddhesu nappamajji, nirogaa ayyaa''ti? ``parinibbutaa devaa''ti. raajaa cinteti ``evaruupaanampi pa.n.ditaana.m mara.na.m uppajjati, amhaaka.m kuto mokkho''ti. so nagara.m agantvaa, uyyaanameva pavisitvaa je.t.thaputta.m pakkosaapetvaa, tassa rajja.m niyyaatetvaa, saya.m sama.napabbajja.m ^a^V2.0372^ea^ pabbaji. deviipi ``imasmi.m pabbajite aha.m ki.m karissaamii''ti tattheva uyyaane pabbajitvaa dvepi jhaana.m bhaavetvaa tato cutaa brahmaloke nibbatti.msu.

[03] tesu tattheva vasantesu amhaaka.m satthaa loke uppajjitvaa pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena raajagaha.m paavisi. satthari tattha pa.tivasante ^a^P3.0130^ea^ aya.m pippalimaa.navo magadhara.t.the mahaatitthabraahma.nagaame kapilabraahma.nassa aggamahesiyaa kucchimhi nibbatto. aya.m bhaddaa kaapilaanii maddara.t.the saagalanagare kosiyagottabraahma.nassa aggamahesiyaa kucchismi.m nibbattaa. tesa.m anukkamena va.d.dhamaanaana.m pippalimaa.navassa viisatime, bhaddaaya so.lasame vasse sampatte maataapitaro putta.m oloketvaa ``taata, tva.m vayappatto, kulava.mso naama pati.t.thapetabbo''ti ativiya nippii.layi.msu. maa.navo aaha ``mayha.m sotapathe evaruupa.m katha.m maa kathetha. aha.m yaava tumhe dharatha, taava pa.tijaggissaami, tumhaaka.m accayena nikkhamitvaa pabbajissaamii''ti. te katipaaha.m atikkamitvaa puna kathayi.msu. sopi tatheva pa.tikkhipi. tato pa.t.thaaya nirantara.m kathetiyeva.

[03] maa.navo ^a^M2.0439^ea^ ``mama maatara.m sa~n~naapessaamii''ti rattasuva.n.nassa nikkhasahassa.m datvaa sabbakaamehi santappetvaa suva.n.nakaarehi eka.m itthiruupa.m kaaraapetvaa tassa majjanagha.t.tanaadikammapariyosaane ta.m rattavattha.m nivaasaapetvaa va.n.nasampannehi pupphehi ceva naanaaala"nkaarehi ca ala"nkaaraapetvaa maatara.m pakkosaapetvaa aaha ``amma, evaruupa.m aaramma.na.m labhanto gehe vasissaami alabhanto na vasissaamii''ti. pa.n.ditaa braahma.nii cintesi -- ``mayha.m putto pu~n~navaa dinnadaano kataabhiniihaaro, pu~n~na.m karonto na ekakova akaasi, addhaa etena sahakatapu~n~naa suva.n.naruupapa.tibhaagaava bhavissatii''ti a.t.tha braahma.ne pakkosaapetvaa sabbakaamehi santappetvaa suva.n.naruupaka.m ratha.m aaropetvaa ``gacchatha, taataa, yattha amhaaka.m jaatigottabhogehi samaane kule evaruupa.m daarika.m passatha, imameva suva.n.naruupaka.m pa.n.naakaara.m katvaa ethaa''ti uyyojesi.

[03] te ``amhaaka.m naama eta.m kamma''nti nikkhamitvaa ``kattha gamissaamaa''ti cintetvaa ``maddara.t.tha.m naama itthaakaro, maddara.t.tha.m gamissaamaa''ti maddara.t.the saagalanagara.m agama.msu. tattha ta.m suva.n.naruupaka.m nhaanatitthe .thapetvaa ekamante nisiidi.msu. atha bhaddaaya dhaatii bhadda.m nhaapetvaa, ala"nkaritvaa, sirigabbhe nisiidaapetvaa saya.m nhaayitu.m udakatittha.m gataa tattha ta.m suva.n.naruupaka.m disvaa ``kissaaya.m aviniitaa idhaagantvaa .thitaa''ti pi.t.thipasse paharitvaa ``suva.n.naruupaka''nti ~natvaa ^a^V2.0373^ea^ ``ayyadhiitaa me''ti sa~n~na.m uppaadesi.m, ``aya.m pana me ayyadhiitaaya nivaasanapa.tiggaahikaayaapi asadisaa''ti aaha. atha na.m te manussaa parivaaretvaa ``evaruupaa te saamidhiitaa''ti pucchi.msu. ``ki.m esaa, imaaya suva.n.napa.timaaya satagu.nena sahassagu.nena mayha.m ayyadhiitaa abhiruupataraa, dvaadasahatthe gabbhe ^a^P3.0131^ea^ nisinnaaya padiipakicca.m natthi, sariirobhaaseneva tama.m vidhamatii''ti. ``tena hi aagacchaa''ti ta.m khujja.m gahetvaa suva.n.naruupaka.m rathe aaropetvaa kosiyagottassa braahma.nassa gharadvaare .thatvaa aagamana.m nivedayi.msu.

[03] braahma.no pa.tisanthaara.m katvaa ``kuto aagatatthaa''ti pucchi. ``magadhara.t.the mahaatitthagaame kapilabraahma.nassa gharato''ti. ``ki.m kaara.naa aagataa''ti? ``iminaa naama kaara.nenaa''ti. ``kalyaa.na.m, taataa, samajaatigottavibhavo amhaaka.m braahma.no, dassaami daarika''nti pa.n.naakaara.m ga.nhi. te kapilabraahma.nassa saasana.m pahi.ni.msu ``laddhaa daarikaa ^a^M2.0440^ea^, kattabba.m karothaa''ti. ta.m saasana.m sutvaa pippalimaa.navassa aarocayi.msu ``laddhaa kira daarikaa''ti. maa.navo ``aha.m `na labhissantii'ti cintesi.m, ime `laddhaa'ti vadanti, anatthiko hutvaa pa.n.na.m pesessaamii''ti rahogato pa.n.na.m likhi ``bhaddaa, attano jaatigottabhogaanuruupa.m gharaavaasa.m labhatu, aha.m nikkhamitvaa pabbajissaami, maa pacchaa vippa.tisaarinii ahosii''ti. bhaddaapi ``asukassa kira ma.m daatukaamo''ti sutvaa ``pa.n.na.m pesessaamii''ti rahogataa pa.n.na.m likhi ``ayyaputto attano jaatigottabhogaanuruupa.m gharaavaasa.m labhatu, aha.m pabbajissaami, maa pacchaa vippa.tisaarii ahosii''ti. dvepi pa.n.naani antaraamagge samaagacchi.msu. ``ida.m kassa pa.n.na''nti? ``pippalimaa.navena bhaddaaya pahita''nti. ``ida.m kassaa''ti? ``bhaddaaya pippalimaa.navassa pahita''nti ca vutte te dvepi vaacetvaa ``passatha daarakaana.m kamma''nti phaaletvaa ara~n~ne cha.d.detvaa a~n~na.m ta.msamaana.m pa.n.na.m likhitvaa ito etto ca pesesu.m. iti kumaarassa kumaarikaaya ca sadisa.m pa.n.na.m lokassaadarahitamevaati anicchamaanaana.myeva dvinna.m samaagamo ahosi.

[03] ta.m divasa.myeva pippalimaa.navo eka.m pupphadaama.m ganthaapesi bhaddaapi. taani sayanamajjhe .thapesu.m bhuttasaayamaasaa ubhopi ``sayana.m aaruhissaamaa''ti maa.navo dakkhi.napassena sayana.m aaruhi. bhaddaa vaamapassena abhiruhitvaa aaha -- ``yassa passe pupphaani milaayanti, tassa raagacitta.m uppannanti vijaanissaama, ima.m pupphadaama.m na alliyitabba''nti. te pana a~n~nama~n~na.m sariirasamphassabhayena tiyaamaratti.m nidda.m anokkamantaava viitinaamenti, divaa pana hasitamattampi naahosi. te lokaamisena asa.msa.t.thaa yaava maataapitaro dharanti, taava ku.tumba.m avicaaretvaa tesu kaala"nkatesu vicaarayi.msu. mahatii maa.navassa sampatti -- ekadivasa.m sariira.m ubba.t.tetvaa ^a^V2.0374^ea^ cha.d.detabba.m suva.n.nacu.n.na.m eva magadhanaa.liyaa dvaadasanaa.limatta.m laddhu.m ^a^P3.0132^ea^ va.t.tati. yantabaddhaani sa.t.thimahaata.laakaani, kammanto dvaadasayojaniko, anuraadhapurapamaa.naa cuddasa gaamaa, cuddasa hatthaaniikaani, cuddasa assaaniikaani, cuddasa rathaaniikaani.

[03] so ekadivasa.m ala"nkataassa.m aaruyha mahaajanaparivuto kammanta.m gantvaa khettako.tiya.m .thito na"ngalehi bhinna.t.thaanato kaakaadayo saku.ne ^a^M2.0441^ea^ ga.n.duppaadaadipaa.nake uddharitvaa khaadante disvaa, ``taataa, ime ki.m khaadantii''ti pucchi. ``ga.n.duppaade, ayyaa''ti. ``etehi kata.m paapa.m kassa hotii''ti? ``tumhaaka.m, ayyaa''ti. so cintesi -- ``sace etehi kata.m paapa.m mayha.m hoti, ki.m me karissati sattaasiitiko.tidhana.m, ki.m dvaadasayojano kammanto, ki.m yantabaddhaani ta.laakaani, ki.m cuddasa gaamaa, sabbameta.m bhaddaaya kaapilaaniyaa niyyaatetvaa nikkhamma pabbajissaamii''ti.

[03] bhaddaapi kaapilaanii tasmi.m kha.ne antaravatthumhi tayo tilakumbhe pattharaapetvaa dhaatiihi parivutaa nisinnaa kaake tilapaa.nake khaadamaane disvaa, ``ammaa, ki.m ime khaadantii''ti pucchi. ``paa.nake ayye''ti. ``akusala.m kassa hotii''ti? ``tumhaaka.m, ayye''ti. saa cintesi -- ``mayha.m catuhatthavattha.m naa.likodanamatta~nca laddhu.m va.t.tati, yadi paneta.m ettakena janena kata.m akusala.m mayha.m hoti, bhavasahassenapi va.t.tato siisa.m ukkhipitu.m na sakkaa. ayyaputte aagatamatteyeva sabba.m tassa niyyaatetvaa nikkhamma pabbajissaamii''ti.

[03] maa.navo aagantvaa, nhatvaa paasaada.m aaruyha mahaarahe palla"nke nisiidi. athassa cakkavattino anucchavika.m bhojana.m sajjayi.msu. dvepi bhu~njitvaa parijane nikkhante rahogataa phaasuka.t.thaane nisiidi.msu. tato maa.navo bhadda.m aaha -- ``bhadde, ima.m ghara.m aagacchantii tva.m kittaka.m dhana.m aaharasii''ti? ``pa~ncapa.n.naasa saka.tasahassaani, ayyaa''ti. ``ta.m sabba.m, yaa ca imasmi.m ghare sattaasiitiko.tiyo yantabaddhasa.t.thita.laakaadibhedaa ca sampatti atthi, ta.m sabba~nca tuyha.myeva niyyaademii''ti. ``tumhe pana kaha.m gacchatha, ayyaa''ti? ``aha.m pabbajissaamii''ti. ``ayya, ahampi tumhaaka.myeva aagamana.m olokayamaanaa nisinnaa. ahampi pabbajissaamii''ti. tesa.m aadittapa.n.naku.ti viya tayo bhavaa upa.t.thahi.msu. te antaraapa.nato kasaayarasapiitaani vatthaani mattikaapatte ca aaharaapetvaa a~n~nama~n~na.m kese oropetvaa ``ye loke arahanto, te uddissa amhaaka.m pabbajjaa''ti pabbajitvaa, thavikaasu patte pakkhipitvaa a.mse ^a^P3.0133^ea^ laggetvaa paasaadato otari.msu. gehe daasesu vaa kammakaresu vaa na koci sa~njaani.

[03] atha ^a^M2.0442^ea^ ^a^V2.0375^ea^ ne braahma.nagaamato nikkhamma daasagaamadvaarena gacchante aakappakuttavasena daasagaamavaasino sa~njaani.msu. te rodantaa paadesu nipatitvaa ``ki.m, amhe, anaathe karotha ayyaa''ti aaha.msu. ``maya.m, `bha.ne, aadittapa.n.nasaalaa viya tayo bhavaa'ti pabbajimhaa. sace tumhesu ekeka.m bhujissa.m karoma, vassasatampi nappahoti. tumheva tumhaaka.m siisa.m dhovitvaa bhujissaa hutvaa jiivathaa''ti vatvaa tesa.m rodantaana.myeva pakkami.msu.

[03] thero purato gacchanto nivattitvaa olokento cintesi -- ``aya.m, bhaddaa kaapilaanii, sakalajambudiipagghanikaa itthii mayha.m pacchato aagacchati, .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati, ya.m kocideva eva.m cinteyya `ime pabbajitaapi vinaa bhavitu.m na sakkonti, ananucchavika.m karontii'ti, koci paapena mana.m paduusetvaa apaayapuurako bhaveyya, ima.m pahaaya mayha.m gantu.m va.t.tatii''ti citta.m uppaadesi. so purato gacchanto dvedhaapatha.m disvaa tassa matthake a.t.thaasi. bhaddaapi aagantvaa, vanditvaa a.t.thaasi. atha na.m aaha -- ``bhadde, taadisi.m itthi.m mama pacchato aagacchanti.m disvaa `ime pabbajitaapi vinaa bhavitu.m na sakkontii'ti cintetvaa amhesu padu.t.thacitto mahaajano apaayapuurako bhaveyya. imasmi.m dvedhaapathe tva.m eka.m ga.nha, ahamekena gamissaamii''ti. ``aama, ayya, pabbajitaana.m maatugaamo palibodho, `pabbajitvaapi vinaa na bhavantii'ti amhaaka.m dosa.m dassessanti, tumhe eka.m magga.m ga.nhatha, vinaa bhavissaamaa''ti tikkhattu.m padakkhi.na.m katvaa catuusu .thaanesu pa~ncapati.t.thitena vanditvaa dasanakhasamodhaanasamujjala.m a~njali.m paggayha ``satasahassakappaparimaa.ne addhaane kato mittasanthavo ajja bhijjatii''ti vatvaa ``tumhe dakkhi.najaatikaa naama, tumhaaka.m dakkhi.namaggo va.t.tati, maya.m maatugaamaa naama vaamajaatikaa, amhaaka.m vaamamaggo va.t.tatii''ti vanditvaa magga.m pa.tipannaa. tesa.m dvedhaabhuutakaale aya.m mahaapathavii ``aha.m cakkavaa.lasinerupabbate dhaaretu.m sakkontiipi tumhaaka.m gu.ne dhaaretu.m na sakkomii''ti vadantii viya viravamaanaa kampi, aakaase asanisaddo viya pavatti, cakkavaa.lasinerupabbato unnadi.

[03] sammaasambuddho ve.luvanamahaavihaare gandhaku.tiya.m nisinno pathaviikampanasadda.m sutvaa ``kissa nu kho pathavii kampatii''ti aavajjento ``pippalimaa.navo ca bhaddaa ca kaapilaanii ma.m uddissa appameyya.m ^a^P3.0134^ea^ sampatti.m pahaaya pabbajitaa. tesa.m ^a^M2.0443^ea^ viyoga.t.thaane ubhinna.m gu.nabalena aya.m pathaviikampo jaato. mayaapi etesa.m sa"ngaha.m kaatu.m va.t.tatii''ti gandhaku.tito nikkhamma sayameva pattaciivaramaadaaya asiitimahaatheresu ka~ncipi anaamantetvaa tigaavuta.m magga.m paccuggamana.m katvaa raajagahassa ca naalandaaya ca antare bahuputtakanigrodharukkhamuule palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa nisiidi. nisiidanto ^a^V2.0376^ea^ pana a~n~natarapa.msukuuliko viya anisiiditvaa buddhavesa.m gahetvaa asiitihatthaghanabuddharasmiyo vissajjento nisiidi. iti tasmi.m kha.ne pa.n.nacchattasaka.tacakkakuu.taagaaraadippamaa.naa buddharasmiyo ito cito ca vippharantiyo vidhaavantiyo candasahassasuuriyasahassauggamanakaalo viya kurumaanaa ta.m vananta.m ekobhaasa.m aka.msu. dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.nasiriyaa samujjalataaraaga.nena viya gagana.m, supupphitakamalakuvalayena viya salila.m, vananta.m virocittha. nigrodharukkhassa naama khandho seto hoti, pattaani niilaani, pakkaani rattaani. tasmi.m pana divase satasaakho nigrodho suva.n.nava.n.nova ahosi.

[03] mahaakassapatthero ``aya.m amhaaka.m satthaa bhavissati, ima.m aha.m uddissa pabbajito''ti di.t.tha.t.thaanato pa.t.thaaya o.nato.natova gantvaa tiisu .thaanesu vanditvaa ``satthaa me, bhante, bhagavaa, saavakohamasmi, satthaa me, bhante, bhagavaa saavakohamasmii''ti (sa.m0 ni0 2.154) aaha. atha na.m bhagavaa aaha ``kassapa, sace tva.m ima.m nipaccakaara.m mahaapathaviyaa kareyyaasi, saapi dhaaretu.m na sakku.neyya. tathaagatassa eva.m gu.namahantata.m jaanataa tayaa kato nipaccakaaro mayha.m, lomampi caaletu.m na sakkoti. nisiida, kassapa, daayajja.m te dassaamii''ti. athassa bhagavaa tiihi ovaadehi upasampadamadaasi. datvaa bahuputtakanigrodhamuulato nikkhamitvaa thera.m pacchaasama.na.m katvaa magga.m pa.tipajji. satthu sariira.m dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.navicitta.m, mahaakassapassa sariira.m sattamahaapurisalakkha.napa.tima.n.dita.m, so ka~ncanamahaanaavaaya pacchaabaddho viya satthu padaanupadika.m anugacchi. satthaa thoka.m magga.m gantvaa maggaa okkamma a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisajjaakaara.m dassesi. thero ``nisiiditukaamo satthaa''ti ~natvaa attano paarupitapa.tapilotikasa"nghaa.ti.m catuggu.na.m katvaa pa~n~napesi.

[03] satthaa ^a^M2.0444^ea^ tattha nisiiditvaa hatthena ciivara.m parimajjanto ``mudukaa kho tyaaya.m, kassapa, pa.tapilotikasa"nghaa.tii''ti (sa.m0 ni0 2.154) aaha. thero ``satthaa mama sa"nghaa.tiyaa mudubhaava.m katheti, paarupitukaamo bhavissatii''ti ~natvaa ``paarupatu, bhante, bhagavaa sa"nghaa.ti''nti aaha. ``tva.m ^a^P3.0135^ea^ ki.m paarupissasi, kassapaa''ti? ``tumhaaka.m nivaasana.m labhanto paarupissaami, bhante''ti. ``ki.m pana tva.m, kassapa, ima.m paribhogaji.n.na.m pa.msukuula.m dhaaretu.m sakkhissasi? mayaa hi imassa pa.msukuulassa gahitadivase udakapariyanta.m katvaa mahaapathavii kampi, ima.m buddhaana.m paribhogaji.n.naciivara.m naama na sakkaa parittagu.nena dhaaretu.m, pa.tibalenevida.m pa.tipattipuura.nasamatthena jaatipa.msukuulikena dhaaretu.m va.t.tatii''ti vatvaa therena saddhi.m ciivara.m parivattesi.

[03] eva.m ^a^V2.0377^ea^ pana ciivaraparivattana.m katvaa therassa paarutaciivara.m bhagavaa paarupi, satthu ciivara.m thero. tasmi.m samaye acetanaapi aya.m mahaapathavii ``dukkara.m, bhante, akattha, attanaa paarutaciivara.m saavakassa dinnapubbo naama natthi, aha.m tumhaaka.m gu.na.m dhaaretu.m na sakkomii''ti vadantii viya udakapariyanta.m katvaa kampi. theropi ``laddha.m daani mayaa buddhaana.m paribhogaciivara.m, ki.m me idaani uttari kattabba.m atthii''ti unnati.m akatvaa buddhaana.m santikeyeva terasa dhutagu.ne samaadaaya sattadivasamatta.m puthujjano ahosi, a.t.thame divase saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.1.398-420) --
[21] ``saadhuuti te pa.tissutvaa, bhiyyo haasa.m jani.msu me.
[22] tepi jotanti aabhaaya, samantaa caturo disaa..
[21] ``tattha bhutvaa pivitvaa ca, puna devattana.m gato.

[03] atha na.m satthaa ``kassapo, bhikkhave, canduupamo kulaani upasa"nkamati apakasseva kaaya.m, apakassa citta.m, niccanavako kulesu appagabbho''ti evamaadinaa (sa.m0 ni0 2.146) pasa.msitvaa aparabhaage ariyaga.namajjhe nisinno ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m dhutavaadaana.m yadida.m mahaakassapo''ti (a0 ni0 1.188, 191) dhuta"ngadharaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesi. so vivekaabhiratikittanamukhena bhikkhuuna.m ovaada.m dento attano pa.tipatti.m pakaasento --
[21] ``na ga.nena purakkhato care, vimano hoti samaadhi dullabho.
[22] naanaajanasa"ngaho dukho, iti disvaana ga.na.m na rocaye..
[21] ``na ^a^V2.0379^ea^ kulaani upabbaje muni, vimano hoti samaadhi dullabho.
[22] so ussukko rasaanugiddho, attha.m ri~ncati yo sukhaavaho..
[21] ``pa"nkoti ^a^P3.0136^ea^ hi na.m avedayu.m, yaaya.m vandanapuujanaa kulesu.
[22] sukhuma.m salla.m durubbaha.m, sakkaaro kaapurisena dujjaho..
[22] bhu~njanta.m purisa.m ku.t.thi.m, sakkacca.m ta.m upa.t.thahi.m..
[22] bhu~njamaane vaa bhutte vaa, jeguccha.m me na vijjati..
[22] yassete abhisambhutvaa, sa ve caatuddiso naro..
[22] ku~njaraabhirudaa rammaa, te selaa ramayanti ma.m..
[22] vaara.naabhirudaa rammaa, te selaa ramayanti ma.m..
[22] abbhunnaditaa sikhiihi, te selaa ramayanti ma.m..
[21] ``na pa~nca"ngikena tuuriyena, rati me hoti taadisii.
[21] ``kamma.m bahuka.m na kaaraye, parivajjeyya jana.m na uyyame.
[22] ussukko so rasaanugiddho, attha.m ri~ncati yo sukhaavaho..
[22] kicchati kaayo kilamati, dukkhito so samatha.m na vindati..
[22] na ta.m vi~n~nuu pasa.msanti, patthaddhamaanasa.m nara.m..
[21] ``yo ca seyyohamasmiiti, naaha.m seyyoti vaa pana.
[22] hiino ta.msadiso vaati, vidhaasu na vikampati..
[22] aarakaa hoti saddhammaa, nabhato puthavii yathaa..
[22] yassa te naabhijaanaama, yampi nissaaya jhaayati..
[22] saariputta.m tadaa disvaa, kappinassa sita.m ahu..
[22] dhutagu.ne visi.t.thoha.m, sadiso me na vijjati..
[22] ohito garuko bhaaro, natthi daani punabbhavo..
[25] imaa gaathaa abhaasi. tattha aadito tisso gaathaa ga.nesu kulesu ca sa.msa.t.the bhikkhuu disvaa tesa.m ovaadadaanavasena vuttaa.

[03] tattha ^b^na ga.nena purakkhato care^eb^ti bhikkhuga.nehi purakkhato parivaarito hutvaa na careyya na vihareyya. kasmaa? ^b^vimano hoti samaadhi dullabho^eb^ ga.na.m pariharantassa dukkhuppattiyaa byaakulamanataaya, uddesena ovaadena anusaasaniyaa anuggaha.m karonto yathaanusi.t.tha.m appa.tipattiyaa ca vimano vikaaribhuutacitto hoti, tato sa.msaggena ekaggata.m alabhantassa samaadhi dullabho hoti. tathaaruupassa hi upacaarasamaadhimattampi na ijjhati, pageva itaro. ^b^naanaajanasa"ngaho^eb^ti naanajjhaasayassa naanaarucikassa janassa peyyakhajjaadinaa sa"ngaho. ^b^dukho^eb^ti kiccho ^a^V2.0382^ea^ kasiro. ^b^iti disvaanaa^eb^ti eva.m ga.nasa"ngahe bahuvidha.m aadiinava.m disvaa ~naa.nacakkhunaa oloketvaa. ^b^ga.na.m^eb^ ga.navaasa.m ^b^na rocaye^eb^ na roceyya na iccheyya.

[03] ^b^na kulaani upabbaje munii^eb^ti imasmi.m saasane pabbajito khattiyaadikuluupako hutvaa na upagaccheyya. ki.mkaara.naa? ^b^vimano hoti samaadhi dullabho. so ussukko^eb^ kuluupasa"nkamane ussukka.m aapanno kulesu laddhabbesu madhuraadirasesu ^b^anugiddho^eb^ gedha.m aapanno tattha uppannesu kiccakara.niiyesu attanaava yoga.m aapajjanto. ^b^attha.m ri~ncati yo sukhaavaho^eb^ti yo attano maggaphalanibbaanasukhaavaho ta.m siilavisuddhiaadisa"nkhaata.m attha.m ri~ncati jahati, naanuyu~njatiiti attho.

[03] ^b^senaasanamhaa oruyhaa^eb^tiaadikaa catasso gaathaa paccayesu attano santosadassanamukhena ``bhikkhunaa naama eva.m pa.tipajjitabba''nti bhikkhuuna.m ovaadadaanavasena vuttaa. tattha ^b^senaasanamhaa oruyhaa^eb^ti pabbatasenaasanattaa ^a^M2.0451^ea^ vutta.m. ^b^sakkacca.m ta.m upa.t.thahi^eb^nti ta.m ku.t.thipurisa.m u.laarasampatti.m paapetukaamataaya bhikkhaaya atthiko hutvaa pa.niitabhikkhadaayaka.m kula.m mahicchapuggalo viya aadarena upagantvaa a.t.thaasi.m.
[03] ^b^pakkenaa^eb^ti a.t.thigataku.t.tharogataaya upakkena kuthitena. ^b^a"nguli cettha chijjathaa^eb^ti ettha patte tassa a"nguli chijjitvaa aahaarena saddhi.m patatiiti attho.

[03] ^b^ku.t.tamuula.m nissaayaa^eb^ti tassa purisassa pasaadajananattha.m taadise gharabhittisamiipe nisiiditvaa aalopa.m ta.m ^b^abhu~njisa.m^eb^ paribhu~nji.m. aya.m pana therassa pa.tipatti sikkhaapade apa~n~natteti da.t.thabba.m. pa.tikkuule ca appa.tikkuule iva appa.tikkuulasa~n~nitaaya ariyiddhiyaa ukka.msagatattaa therassa ta.m ajjhoharantassa jigucchaa na uppajji, puthujjanassa pana taadisa.m bhu~njantassa antaani nikkhameyyu.m. tenaaha ^b^``bhu~njamaane vaa bhutte vaa, jeguccha.m me na vijjatii''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^utti.t.thapi.n.do^eb^ti utti.t.thitvaa paresa.m gharadvaare .thatvaa gahetabbapi.n.do, ja"nghabala.m nissaaya anughara.m gantvaa laddhabbamissakabhikkhaati attho. ^b^puutimutta^eb^nti gomuttaparibhaavitaharii.takaadi ca. ^b^yassete abhisambhutvaa^eb^ti, yo bhikkhu ete utti.t.thapi.n.daadayo cattaaro paccaye antimantena abhiramitvaa ^a^V2.0383^ea^ paribhu~njati. ^b^sa ve caatuddiso naro^eb^ti so puggalo eka.msena caatuddiso puratthimaadicatudisaayogyo, katthaci appa.tigho yaaya kaayaci disaaya viharitu.m sakkotiiti attho.

[03] atha thero attano mahallakakaale manussehi ``katha.m, bhante, tumhe evaruupaaya jaraaya vattamaanaaya dine dine pabbata.m abhiruhathaa''ti vutte ^b^``yattha eke''^eb^tiaadikaa catasso gaathaa abhaasi. tattha ^b^yatthaa^eb^ti yasmi.m pacchimavaye. ^b^eke^eb^ti ekacce. ^b^viha~n~nantii^eb^ti sariirakilamathena cittena vighaata.m aapajjanti. ^b^siluccaya^eb^nti pabbata.m. ^b^tatthaa^eb^ti tasmi.m jaraaji.n.nakaalepi. ^b^sampajaano pa.tissato^eb^ti iminaa cittakhedaabhaava.m dasseti, ^b^iddhibalenupatthaddho^eb^ti iminaa sariirakhedaabhaava.m.
[03] ^b^.dayhamaanesuu^eb^ti raagaggiaadiihi ekaadasahi aggiihi sattesu .dayhamaanesu. sa.mkilesapari.laahaabhaavena ^b^nibbuto^eb^ siitibhuuto.

[03] puna ^a^M2.0452^ea^ ^a^P3.0140^ea^ manussehi ``ki.m, bhante, ji.n.nakaalepi ara~n~napabbateyeva viharatha, nanu ime ve.luvanaadayo vihaaraa manoramaa''ti vutte ara~n~napabbataa eva mayha.m manoramaati dassento ^b^``karerimaalaavitataa''^eb^tiaadikaa dvaadasa gaathaa abhaasi. tattha ^b^karerimaalaavitataa^eb^ti varu.narukkhapantiihi samaagataa. ``kaalava.n.napupphehi ottha.taa''tipi vadanti. ^b^ku~njaraabhirudaa^eb^ti pa.tighosaadigu.niibhuutehi hatthiina.m gocaresiina.m gajjitehi abhitthanitaa.

[03] ^b^abhivu.t.thaa^eb^ti mahaameghena abhippavu.t.thaa. ^b^rammatalaa^eb^ti teneva rajojallapa.n.neyyaadiina.m apagamena rama.niiyatalaa. ^b^nagaa^eb^ti desantara.m agamanato ``nagaa''ti selamayataaya ``selaa''ti ca laddhanaamaa pabbataa. ^b^abbhunnaditaa sikhiihii^eb^ti madhurassarena unnaditaa.
[03] ^b^ala^eb^nti yutta.m samattha.m vaa. ^b^jhaayitukaamassa atthakaamassaa^eb^tiaadiisupi iminaa nayena yojetabba.m. ^b^bhikkhuno^eb^ti bhinnakilesabhikkhuno, meti sambandho.

[03] ^b^umaapupphena^eb^ ^a^V2.0384^ea^ ^b^samaanaa^eb^ti mecakanibhataaya umaakusumasadisaa. ^b^gaganaavabbha chaaditaa^eb^ti tato eva saradassa gaganaabbhaa viya kaa.lameghasa~nchaaditaa, niilava.n.naati attho.

[03] ^b^anaaki.n.naa^eb^ti asa.mki.n.naa asambaadhaa. ^b^pa~nca"ngikenaa^eb^ti aatataadiihi pa~ncahi a"ngehi yuttena tuuriyena parivaariyamaanassa taadisiipi na hoti, yathaa yaadisii ekaggacittassa samaahitacittassa sammadeva ruupaaruupadhamma.m aniccaadivasena vipassantassa rati hoti. tenaaha bhagavaa --
[22] labhatii piitipaamojja.m, amata.m ta.m vijaanata''nti.. (dha0 pa0 374)

[03] ^b^kamma.m bahuka^eb^ntiaadinaa dve gaathaa kammaaraamaana.m paccayagiddhaana.m bhikkhuuna.m ovaadadaanavasena vuttaa. tattha ^b^kamma.m bahuka.m na kaaraye^eb^ti kammaaraamo hutvaa bahu.m naama kamma.m na kaaraye na adhi.t.thahe, kha.n.daphullapa.tisa"nkhara.na.m pana satthaaraa anu~n~naatameva. ^b^parivajjeyya jana^eb^nti akalyaa.namittabhuuta.m jana.m vajjeyya. ^b^na uyyame^eb^ti paccayuppaadanaga.nabandhaadivasena vaayaama.m na kareyya.

[03] ^b^anattaneyyameta^eb^nti ^a^M2.0453^ea^ eta.m navakammaadhi.t.thaanaadika.m attano atthaavaha.m na hotiiti attho. tattha kaara.namaaha ^b^``kicchati kaayo kilamatii''^eb^ti. navakammaadipasutassa hi taha.m taha.m vicarato kaayasukhaadialaabhena kicchappatto hoti ^b^kilamati^eb^ kheda.m aapajjati, tena ^a^P3.0141^ea^ ca kaayakilamathena ^b^dukkhito^eb^. vatthuvisadaattaneyyakiriyaadiina.m abhaavena ^b^so^eb^ puggalo ^b^samatha.m na vindati^eb^ cittasamaadhaana.m na labhatiiti.

[03] ^b^o.t.thappahatamattenaa^eb^tiaadinaa dve gaathaa sutaparamassa pa.n.ditamaanino garahavasena, tato paraa dve pa.n.ditassa pasa.msaavasena vuttaa. tattha ^b^o.t.thappahatamattenaa^eb^ti sajjhaayasiisena o.t.thaparivattanamattena, buddhavacana.m sajjhaayakara.namattenaati attho. ^b^attaanampi na passatii^eb^ti anattha~n~nutaaya attano paccakkhabhuutampi attha.m na jaanaati, yaathaavato attano pamaa.na.m na paricchindatiiti attho. ^b^patthaddhagiivo caratii^eb^ti ``aha.m bahussuto, satimaa, pa~n~navaa, na mayaa sadiso a~n~no atthii''ti maanatthaddho hutvaa garu.t.thaaniyaanampi apaciti.m adassento ayosalaaka.m ^a^V2.0385^ea^ gilitvaa .thito viya thaddhagiivo carati. ^b^aha.m seyyoti ma~n~natii^eb^ti ahameva seyyo uttamoti ma~n~nati.

[03] ^b^aseyyo seyyasamaana.m, baalo ma~n~nati attaana^eb^nti aya.m aseyyo hiino samaano a~n~nena seyyena uttamena samaana.m sadisa.m katvaa attaana.m baalo mandabuddhi baalabhaaveneva ma~n~natiiti. ^b^na ta.m vi~n~nuu pasa.msantii^eb^ti ta.m taadisa.m baala.m paggahitacittataaya patthaddhamaanasa.m thambhitatta.m nara.m vi~n~nuu pa.n.ditaa na pasa.msanti, a~n~nadatthu garahantiyeva.

[03] ^b^seyyohamasmii^eb^ti yo pana pa.n.dito puggalo ``seyyohamasmii''ti vaa hiinasadisamaanavasena ``naaha.m seyyo''ti vaa ka~ncipi maana.m ajappento ^b^vidhaasu^eb^ navasu maanako.t.thaasesu kassacipi vasena na vikampati.

[03] ^b^pa~n~navanta^eb^nti aggaphalapa~n~naavasena pa~n~navanta.m i.t.thaadiisu taadibhaavappattiyaa ^b^taadi.m,^eb^ asekkhaphalasiilesu su.t.thu pati.t.thitattaa ^b^siilesu susamaahita.m,^eb^ arahattaphalasamaapattisamaapajjanena ^b^cetosamathamanuyutta^eb^nti taadisa.m sabbaso ^a^M2.0454^ea^ pahiinamaana.m khii.naasava.m ^b^vi~n~nuu^eb^ buddhaadayo pa.n.ditaa ^b^pasa.msare^eb^ va.n.nenti thomentiiti attho.

[03] puna a~n~natara.m dubbaca.m bhikkhu.m disvaa dovacassataaya aadiinava.m, sovacassataaya aanisa.msa~nca pakaasento ^b^``yassa sabrahmacaariisuu''^eb^tiaadikaa dve gaathaa abhaasi. taa vuttatthaa eva.

[03] puna uddhata.m unna.la.m eka.m bhikkhu.m disvaa uddhataadibhaave dosa.m, anuddhataadibhaave ca gu.na.m vibhaavento ^b^``uddhato capalo bhikkhuu''^eb^tiaadikaa dve gaathaa abhaasi. tattha ^b^kapiiva siihacammenaa^eb^ti siihacammena paaruto makka.to viya. ^b^so^eb^ uddhataadidosasa.myutto bhikkhu ^a^P3.0142^ea^ tena pa.msukuulena ariyaddhajena ^b^na upasobhati^eb^ ariyagu.naana.m abhaavato.
[22] yo pana upasobhati, ta.m dassetu.m ^b^``anuddhato''^eb^tiaadi vutta.m.

[03] ^b^ete sambahulaa^eb^tiaadikaa pa~nca gaathaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m namassante brahmakaayike deve disvaa aayasmato kappinassa sitapaatukammanimitta.m vuttaa. tattha ^b^ete^eb^ti tesa.m paccakkhataaya vutta.m ^a^V2.0386^ea^. ^b^sambahulaa^eb^ti bahubhaavato, ta.m pana bahubhaava.m ^b^``dasadevasahassaanii''^eb^ti paricchinditvaa aaha. ^b^devaa^eb^ti upapattidevaa. ta.m tesa.m devabhaava.m a~n~nehi visesetvaa dassento ^b^``sabbe te brahmakaayikaa''^eb^ti aaha. yasmaa te attano upapattiddhiyaa mahatiyaa deviddhiyaa samannaagataa parivaarasampannaa ca, tasmaa aaha ^b^``iddhimanto yasassino''^eb^ti.

[03] ``ko nu senaapati bhoto''ti pucchaaya vissajjanavasena ``mayaa pavattita.m dhammacakka.m anuttara.m saariputto anuvattetii''ti (ma0 ni0 2.399) vadantena bhagavataa aayasmato saariputtattherassa dhammasenaapatibhaavo anu~n~naatoti aaha -- ^b^``dhammasenaapati.m viira.m mahaajhaayi.m samaahita.m saariputta''^eb^nti. tattha ^b^viira^eb^nti kilesamaaraadiina.m nimmathanena viiriyavanta.m mahaavikkanta.m. ^b^mahaajhaayi^eb^nti dibbavihaaraadiina.m ukka.msagamanena mahanta.m jhaayi.m. tato eva sabbaso vikkhepaviddha.msanavasena ^b^samaahita.m. namassantaa^eb^ti sirasi a~njali.m paggayha namassamaanaa ti.t.thanti.
[03] ^b^yampi^eb^ ^a^M2.0455^ea^ ^b^nissaayaa^eb^ti ya.m nu kho aaramma.na.m nissaaya aarabbha jhaayatiiti naabhijaanaamaati puthujjanabhaavena brahmaano eva.m aaha.msu.

[03] ^b^acchera.m vataa^eb^ti acchariya.m vata. ^b^buddhaana^eb^nti catusaccabuddhaana.m. ^b^gambhiiro gocaro sako^eb^ti paramagambhiiro atiduddaso duranubodho puthujjanehi asaadhaara.no avisayo. idaani tassa gambhiirabhaave kaara.na.m dassetu.m ^b^``ye maya''^eb^ntiaadi vutta.m. tattha ^b^vaalavedhisamaagataa^eb^ti ye maya.m vaalavedhidhanuggahasadisaa atisukhumampi visaya.m pa.tivijjhitu.m samatthaa aagataa upaparikkhantaa naabhijaanaama, gambhiiro vata buddhaana.m visayoti attho. ^b^ta.m tathaa devakaayehii^eb^ti ta.m tathaaruupa.m saariputta.m sadevakassa lokassa puujanaaraha.m tehi brahmakaayikehi tadaa tathaa puujita.m disvaa aayasmato mahaakappinassa sita.m ahosi. imesa.m lokasammataana.m brahmuunampi avisayo, yattha saavakaana.m visayoti.

[03] ^b^yaavataa buddhakhettamhii^eb^ti gaathaa therena attaana.m aarabbha siihanaada.m nadantena bhaasitaa. tattha ^b^buddhakhettamhii^eb^ti aa.naakhetta.m sandhaaya vadati. ^b^.thapayitvaa mahaamuni^eb^nti sammaasambuddha.m .thapetvaa ^a^P3.0143^ea^. buddhaa hi bhagavanto dhutagu.nehipi sabbasattehi paramukka.msagataa eva, kevala.m pana mahaakaru.naasa~ncoditamaanasaa sattaana.m taadisa.m mahanta.m upakaara.m oloketvaa gaamantasenaasanavaasaadi.m anuvattantiiti ta.m ta.m dhutadhammavirodhii hoti. ^b^dhutagu.ne^eb^ti kilesaana.m dhutena gu.nena ^a^V2.0387^ea^ aara~n~nakaadibhaavena apekkhitagu.ne. kara.natthe vaa eta.m bhummavacana.m. sadiso me na vijjati, kuto pana uttariiti adhippaayo. tathaa hesa thero tattha agga.t.thaane .thapito.

[03] ^b^na ciivare^eb^ti gaathaaya ``.thapayitvaa mahaamuni''nti vuttamevattha.m paaka.tatara.m karoti, ciivaraadiisu ta.nhaaya anupalepo dhuta"ngaphala.m. tattha na ciivare sampatte ta.nhaalepenaati yojanaa. ^b^sayane^eb^ti senaasane. ^b^gotamo^eb^ti bhagavanta.m gottena kitteti. ^b^anappameyyo^eb^ti pamaa.nakarakilesaabhaavato aparimaa.nagu.nataaya ca anappameyyo. ^b^mu.laalapuppha.m vimala.mva ambunaa^eb^ti yathaa nimmala.m viraja.m na.lina.m udakena na limpati, eva.m ^a^M2.0456^ea^ gotamo bhagavaa ta.nhaalepaadinaa na limpatiiti attho. ^b^nekkhammaninno^eb^ abhinikkhammaninno tato eva ^b^tibhavaabhinissa.to^eb^ bhavattayato vinissa.to visa.myutto.

[03] yesa.m satipa.t.thaanagiivaadiina.m bhaavanaapaaripuuriyaa yattha katthaci anupalitto nekkhammaninnova ahosi, te a"ngabhuute dassento ^b^``satipa.t.thaanagiivo''^eb^ti osaanagaathamaaha. tattha gu.naraasito uttama"ngabhuutaaya pa~n~naaya adhi.t.thaanabhaavato satipa.t.thaana.m giivaa etassaati satipa.t.thaanagiivo, anavajjadhammaana.m aadaane saddhaa hattho etassaati ^b^saddhaahattho^eb^. gu.nasariirassa uttama"ngabhaavato pa~n~naa siisa.m etassaati ^b^pa~n~naasiiso^eb^. mahaasamudaagamanataaya mahaavisayataaya mahaanubhaavataaya mahaabalataaya ca mahanta.m sabba~n~nutasa"nkhaata.m ~naa.na.m etassa atthiiti ^b^mahaa~naa.nii. sadaa^eb^ sabbakaala.m ^b^nibbuto^eb^ siitibhuuto carati. ``susamaahito...pe0... naago''ti (a0 ni0 6.43) suttapada~ncettha nidassetabba.m. ya.m panettha atthato avibhatta.m, ta.m he.t.thaa vuttanayameva.

[03] pa~n~naasanipaate ^a^M2.0457^ea^ ^a^V2.0388^ea^ ^b^kadaa nuha^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato taalapu.tattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinitvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe a~n~natarasmi.m na.takule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ^a^P3.0144^ea^ kulaanuruupesu nacca.t.thaanesu nipphatti.m gantvaa sakalajambudiipe paaka.to na.tagaama.ni ahosi. so pa~ncasatamaatugaamaparivaaro mahataa na.tavibhavena gaamanigamaraajadhaaniisu samajja.m dassetvaa, mahanta.m puujaasakkaara.m labhitvaa, vicaranto raajagaha.m aagantvaa, nagaravaasiina.m samajja.m dassetvaa, laddhasammaanasakkaaro ~naa.nassa paripaaka.m gatattaa satthu santika.m gantvaa, vanditvaa ekamanta.m nisinno bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``sutameta.m, bhante, pubbakaana.m aacariyapaacariyaana.m na.taana.m bhaasamaanaana.m `yo so na.to ra"ngamajjhe samajjamajjhe saccaalikena jana.m haaseti rameti, so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa pahaasaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjatii'ti, idha bhagavaa kimaahaa''ti. atha na.m bhagavaa tikkhattu.m pa.tikkhipi ``maa ma.m eta.m pucchii''ti. catutthavaara.m pu.t.tho aaha -- ``gaama.ni, ime sattaa pakatiyaapi raagabandhanabaddhaa dosabandhanabaddhaa mohabandhanabaddhaa tesa.m bhiyyopi rajaniiye dosaniiye mohaniiye dhamme upasa.mharanto pamaadetvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa niraye upapajjati. sace panassa eva.mdi.t.thi hoti `yo so na.to ra"ngamajjhe samajjamajjhe saccaalikena jana.m haaseti rameti, so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa pahaasaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjatii'''ti saassa hoti micchaadi.t.thi. micchaadi.t.thissa ca dvinna.m gatiina.m a~n~nataraa gati icchitabbaa, nirayassa vaa tiracchaanayoniyaa vaati. ta.m sutvaa taalapu.to gaama.ni parodi. nanu gaama.ni pageva mayaa pa.tikkhitto ``maa ma.m eta.m pucchii''ti (sa.m0 ni0 4.354)? ``naaha.m, bhante, eta.m rodaami, ya.m ma.m bhagavaa na.taana.m abhisamparaaya.m evamaahaa''ti. api caaha.m, bhante, pubbakehi aacariyapaacariyehi na.tehi va~ncito ``na.to mahaajanassa na.tasamajja.m dassetvaa sugati.m upapajjatii''ti. so satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa laddhuupasampanno vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva ^a^M2.0458^ea^ arahatta.m ^a^V2.0389^ea^ paapu.ni, adhigataarahatto pana arahattappattito pubbe yenaakaarena attano citta.m nigga.nhanavasena yonisomanasikaaro udapaadi, ta.m anekadhaa vibhajitvaa dassetu.m --
[22] aniccato sabbabhava.m vipassa.m, ta.m me ida.m ta.m nu kadaa bhavissati..
[21] ``kadaa ^a^P3.0145^ea^ nuha.m bhinnapa.tandharo muni, kaasaavavattho amamo niraaso.
[22] raaga~nca dosa~nca tatheva moha.m, hantvaa sukhii pavanagato vihassa.m..
[22] vipassamaano viitabhayo vihassa.m, eko vane ta.m nu kadaa bhavissati..
[22] pa~n~naamaya.m tikhi.namasi.m gahetvaa, chetvaa vase tampi kadaa bhavissati..
[22] maara.m sasena.m sahasaa bha~njissa.m, siihaasane ta.m nu kadaa bhavissati..
[21] ``kadaa nuha.m sabbhi samaagamesu, di.t.tho bhave dhammagaruuhi taadibhi.
[22] yaathaavadassiihi jitindriyehi, padhaaniyo ta.m nu kadaa bhavissati..
[21] ``kadaa ^a^M2.0459^ea^ nu ma.m tandi khudaa pipaasaa, vaataatapaa kii.tasariisapaa vaa.
[22] na baadhayissanti na ta.m giribbaje, atthatthiya.m ta.m nu kadaa bhavissati..
[21] ``kadaa nu kho ya.m vidita.m mahesinaa, cattaari saccaani sududdasaani.
[22] samaahitatto satimaa agaccha.m, pa~n~naaya ta.m ta.m nu kadaa bhavissati..
[21] ``kadaa nu ruupe amite ca sadde, gandhe rase phusitabbe ca dhamme.
[22] aadittatoha.m samathehi yutto, pa~n~naaya daccha.m tadida.m kadaa me..
[21] ``kadaa nuha.m dubbacanena vutto, tato nimitta.m vimano na hessa.m.
[22] atho pasatthopi tato nimitta.m, tu.t.tho na hessa.m tadida.m kadaa me..
[21] ``kadaa ^a^P3.0146^ea^ nu ka.t.the ca ti.ne lataa ca, khandhe imeha.m amite ca dhamme.
[22] ajjhattikaaneva ca baahiraani ca, sama.m tuleyya.m tadida.m kadaa me..
[21] ``kadaa nu ma.m paavusakaalamegho, navena toyena saciivara.m vane.
[22] isippayaatamhi pathe vajanta.m, ovassate ta.m nu kadaa bhavissati..
[21] ``kadaa mayuurassa sikha.n.dino vane, dijassa sutvaa girigabbhare ruta.m.
[22] paccu.t.thahitvaa amatassa pattiyaa, sa.mcintaye ta.m nu kadaa bhavissati..
[21] ``kadaa ^a^M2.0460^ea^ ^a^V2.0390^ea^ nu ga"nga.m yamuna.m sarassati.m, paataalakhitta.m va.lavaamukha~nca.
[22] asajjamaano patareyyamiddhiyaa, vibhi.msana.m ta.m nu kadaa bhavissati..
[21] ``kadaa nu naagova asa"ngacaarii, padaalaye kaamagu.nesu chanda.m.
[22] nibbajjaya.m sabbasubha.m nimitta.m, jhaane yuto ta.m nu kadaa bhavissati..
[21] ``kadaa i.na.t.tova daliddako nidhi.m, aaraadhayitvaa dhanikehi pii.lito.
[22] tu.t.tho bhavissa.m adhigamma saasana.m, mahesino ta.m nu kadaa bhavissati..
[21] ``bahuuni vassaani tayaamhi yaacito, agaaravaasena ala.m nu te ida.m.
[22] ta.m daani ma.m pabbajita.m samaana.m, ki.mkaara.naa citta tuva.m na yu~njasi..
[21] ``nanu aha.m citta tayaamhi yaacito, giribbaje citrachadaa viha"ngamaa.
[22] mahindaghosatthanitaabhigajjino, te ta.m ramessanti vanamhi jhaayina.m..
[21] ``kulamhi mitte ca piye ca ~naatake, khi.d.daarati.m kaamagu.na~nca loke.
[22] sabba.m pahaaya imamajjhupaagato, athopi tva.m citta na mayha tussasi..
[21] ``mameva ^a^P3.0147^ea^ eta.m na hi tva.m paresa.m, sannaahakaale paridevitena ki.m.
[22] sabba.m ida.m calamiti pekkhamaano, abhinikkhami.m amatapada.m jigiisa.m..
[22] citta.m cala.m makka.tasannibha.m iti, aviitaraagena sudunnivaaraya.m..
[21] ``kaamaa hi citraa madhuraa manoramaa, aviddasuu yattha sitaa puthujjanaa.
[22] te dukkhamicchanti punabbhavesino, cittena niitaa niraye niraakataa..
[22] kaaye apekkha.m jaha maa viraadhaya, itissu ma.m citta pure niyu~njasi..
[21] ``bhaavehi jhaanaani ca indriyaani ca, balaani bojjha"ngasamaadhibhaavanaa.
[22] tisso ca vijjaa phusa buddhasaasane, itissu ma.m citta pure niyu~njasi..
[22] a.t.tha"ngika.m sabbakilesasodhana.m, itissu ma.m citta pure niyu~njasi..
[21] ``dukkhanti khandhe pa.tipassa yoniso, yato ca dukkha.m samudeti ta.m jaha.
[22] idheva dukkhassa karohi anta.m, itissu ma.m citta pure niyu~njasi..
[21] ``anicca.m dukkhanti vipassa yoniso, su~n~na.m anattaati agha.m vadhanti ca.
[22] manovicaare uparundha cetaso, itissu ma.m citta pure niyu~njasi..
[22] yu~njassu satthuvacane mahesino, itissu ma.m citta pure niyu~njasi..
[22] cando yathaa dosinapu.n.namaasiyaa, itissu ma.m citta pure niyu~njasi..
[21] ``aara~n~niko hohi ca pi.n.dapaatiko, sosaaniko hohi ca pa.msukuuliko.
[22] nesajjiko hohi sadaa dhute rato, itissu ma.m citta pure niyu~njasi..
[21] ``ropetva rukkhaani yathaa phalesii, muule taru.m chettu tameva icchasi.
[22] tathuupama.m cittamida.m karosi, ya.m ma.m aniccamhi cale niyu~njasi..
[21] ``aruupa duura"ngama ekacaari, na te karissa.m vacana.m idaaniha.m.
[22] dukkhaa hi kaamaa ka.tukaa mahabbhayaa, nibbaanamevaabhimano carissa.m..
[22] kato ca te citta pa.tissavo mayaa..
[22] itissu ma.m citta tadaa niyu~njasi, idaani tva.m gacchasi pubbaci.n.na.m..
[21] ``ta.nhaa ^a^M2.0463^ea^ avijjaa ca piyaapiya~nca, subhaani ruupaani sukhaa ca vedanaa.
[22] manaapiyaa kaamagu.naa ca vantaa, vante aha.m aavamitu.m na ussahe..
[21] ``sabbattha te citta vaco kata.m mayaa, bahuusu jaatiisu namesi kopito.
[22] ajjhattasambhavo kata~n~nutaaya te, dukkhe cira.m sa.msarita.m tayaa kate..
[21] ``tva~n~neva no citta karosi braahma.no, tva.m khattiyo raajadasii karosi.
[22] vessaa ca suddaa ca bhavaama ekadaa, devattana.m vaapi taveva vaahasaa..
[21] ``taveva ^a^P3.0149^ea^ hetuu asuraa bhavaamase, tva.mmuulaka.m nerayikaa bhavaamase.
[22] atho tiracchaanagataapi ekadaa, petattana.m vaapi taveva vaahasaa..
[21] ``nanu dubbhissasi ma.m punappuna.m, muhu.m muhu.m caara.nika.mva dassaya.m.
[22] ummattakeneva mayaa palobhasi, ki~ncaapi te citta viraadhita.m mayaa..
[21] ``ida.m pure cittamacaari caarika.m, yenicchaka.m yatthakaama.m yathaasukha.m.
[22] tadajjaha.m niggahessaami yoniso, hatthippabhinna.m viya a"ngusaggaho..
[21] ``satthaa ca me lokamima.m adhi.t.thahi, aniccato addhuvato asaarato.
[22] pakkhanda ma.m citta jinassa saasane, taarehi oghaa mahataa suduttaraa..
[21] ``na ^a^M2.0464^ea^ te ida.m citta yathaa puraa.naka.m, naaha.m ala.m tuyha vase nivattitu.m.
[22] mahesino pabbajitomhi saasane, na maadisaa honti vinaasadhaarino..
[21] ``nagaa ^a^V2.0392^ea^ samuddaa saritaa vasundharaa, disaa catasso vidisaa adho divaa.
[22] sabbe aniccaa tibhavaa upaddutaa, kuhi.m gato citta sukha.m ramissasi..
[21] ``dhitippara.m ki.m mama citta kaahisi, na te ala.m citta vasaanuvattako.
[22] na jaatu bhasta.m ubhatomukha.m chupe, dhiratthu puura.m navasotasandani.m..
[22] suma~njughosatthanitaabhigajjino, te ta.m ramessanti vanamhi jhaayina.m..
[21] ``vu.t.thamhi ^a^P3.0150^ea^ deve catura"ngule ti.ne, sa.mpupphite meghanibhamhi kaanane.
[22] nagantare vi.tapisamo sayissa.m, ta.m me muduu hehiti tuulasannibha.m..
[21] ``tathaa tu kassaami yathaapi issaro, ya.m labbhati tenapi hotu me ala.m.
[22] na taaha.m kassaami yathaa atandito, bi.laarabhasta.mva yathaa sumaddita.m..
[21] ``tathaa ^a^M2.0465^ea^ tu kassaami yathaapi issaro, ya.m labbhati tenapi hotu me ala.m.
[22] viriyena ta.m mayha vasaanayissa.m, gaja.mva matta.m kusala"nkusaggaho..
[21] ``tayaa sudantena ava.t.thitena hi, hayena yoggaacariyova ujjunaa.
[22] pahomi magga.m pa.tipajjitu.m siva.m, cittaanurakkhiihi sadaa nisevita.m..
[21] ``aaramma.ne ta.m balasaa nibandhisa.m, naaga.mva thambhamhi da.lhaaya rajjuyaa.
[22] ta.m me sugutta.m satiyaa subhaavita.m, anissita.m sabbabhavesu hehisi..
[21] ``pa~n~naaya chetvaa vipathaanusaarina.m, yogena niggayha pathe nivesiya.
[22] disvaa samudaya.m vibhava~nca sambhava.m, daayaadako hehisi aggavaadino..
[21] ``migo yathaa seri sucittakaanane, ramma.m giri.m paavusaabbhamaalini.m.
[22] anaakule tattha nage ramissa.m, asa.msaya.m citta paraa bhavissasi..
[27] naraa ca naarii ca anubhonti ya.m sukha.m.

[03] tattha ^a^M2.0466^ea^ ^b^kadaa nuha^eb^nti kadaa nu aha.m. ^b^pabbatakandaraasuu^eb^ti pabbatesu ca kandaresu ca, pabbatassa ^a^V2.0393^ea^ vaa kandaraasu. ^b^ekaakiyo^eb^ti ^a^P3.0151^ea^ ekako. ^b^addutiyo^eb^ti nitta.nho. ta.nhaa hi purisassa dutiyaa naama. ^b^vihassa^eb^nti viharissaami. ^b^aniccato sabbabhava.m vipassa^eb^nti kaamabhavaadibheda.m sabbampi bhava.m ``hutvaa abhaava.t.thena anicca''nti vipassanto kadaa nu viharissanti yojanaa. nidassanamatta~nceta.m, ``yadanicca.m ta.m dukkha.m, ya.m dukkha.m tadanattaa''ti vacanato (sa.m0 ni0 3.15) itarampi lakkha.nadvaya.m vuttamevaati da.t.thabba.m. ^b^ta.m me ida.m ta.m nu kadaa bhavissatii^eb^ti ta.m ida.m me parivitakkita.m kadaa nu bhavissati, kadaa nu kho matthaka.m paapu.nissatiiti attho. ^b^ta.m nuu^eb^ti cettha ^b^ta^eb^nti nipaatamatta.m. aya~nhettha sa"nkhepattho -- kadaa nu kho aha.m mahaagajo viya sa"nkhalikabandhana.m, gihibandhana.m chinditvaa pabbajitvaa kaayaviveka.m paribruuhayanto ekaakii pabbatakandaraasu adutiyo sabbattha nirapekkho sabbasa"nkhaaragata.m aniccaadito vipassanto viharissaamiiti.

[03] ^b^bhinnapa.tandharo^eb^ti bhinnavatthadharo, gaathaasukhattha.m nakaaraagama.m katvaa vutta.m. satthakacchinnaagghaphassava.n.nabhinna.m pa.taciivara.m dhaarentoti attho. ^b^munii^eb^ti pabbajito. ^b^amamo^eb^ti kule vaa ga.ne vaa mamattaabhaavena amamo. katthacipi aaramma.ne aasiisanaaya abhaavena ^b^niraaso. hantvaa sukhii pavanagato vihassa^eb^nti raagaadike kilese ariyamaggena samucchinditvaa maggasukhena phalasukhena sukhii mahaavanagato kadaa nu kho aha.m viharissaami.

[03] ^b^vadharoganii.la^eb^nti mara.nassa ca rogassa ca kulaavakabhuuta.m. ^b^kaaya.m ima^eb^nti ima.m khandhapa~ncakasa"nkhaata.m kaaya.m. khandhapa~ncakopi hi ``avijjaagatassa, bhikkhave, purisapuggalassa ta.nhaanugatassa ayameva kaayo bahiddhaa naamaruupa''ntiaadiisu kaayo vuccati. ^b^maccujaraayupadduta^eb^nti mara.nena ceva jaraaya ca pii.lita.m, vipassamaano aha.m bhayahetupahaanena ^b^viitabhayo,^eb^ ta.m nu kadaa bhavissatiiti attho.

[03] ^b^bhayajanani^eb^nti pa~ncaviisatiyaa mahaabhayaana.m uppaadakaara.nabhuuta.m kaayikassa ca cetasikassa ca sakalassapi va.t.tadukkhassa aavahanato ^b^dukhaavaha.m. ta.nhaalata.m bahuvidhaanuvattani^eb^nti bahuvidha~nca aaramma.na.m bhavameva vaa anuvattati ^a^M2.0467^ea^ santanotiiti bahuvidhaanuvattani.m, ta.nhaasa"nkhaatalata.m. ^b^pa~n~naamaya^eb^nti maggapa~n~naamaya.m sunisita.m asikhagga.m viiriyapaggahitena saddhaahatthena gahetvaa samucchinditvaa ``kadaa nuha.m vase''ti ya.m parivitakkita.m, tampi kadaa bhavissatiiti yojanaa.

[03] ^b^uggateja^eb^nti samathavipassanaavasena nisitataaya tikkhateja.m. ^b^sattha.m isiina^eb^nti buddhapaccekabuddhaariyasaavakaisiina.m ^a^V2.0394^ea^ satthabhuuta.m ^a^P3.0152^ea^. ^b^maara.m sasena.m sahasaa bha~njissa^eb^nti kilesasenaaya sasena.m abhisa"nkhaaraadimaara.m sahasaa siighameva bha~njissaami. ^b^siihaasane^eb^ti thiraasane, aparaajitapalla"nketi attho.

[03] ^b^sabbhi samaagamesu di.t.tho bhave^eb^ti dhammagaaravayuttataaya ^b^dhammagaruuhi^eb^ taadilakkha.nappattiyaa ^b^taadiihi^eb^ avipariitadassitaaya ^b^yaathaavadassiihi^eb^ ariyamaggeneva paapajitindriyataaya ^b^jitindriyehi^eb^ buddhaadiihi saadhuuhi samaagamesu ``kadaa nu aha.m padhaaniyoti di.t.tho bhaveyya''nti ya.m me parivitakkita.m, ta.m nu kadaa bhavissatiiti yojanaa. iminaa nayena sabbattha padayojanaa veditabbaa, padatthamattameva va.n.nayissaama.

[03] ^b^tandii^eb^ti aalasiya.m. ^b^khudaa^eb^ti jighacchaa. ^b^kii.tasariisapaa^eb^ti kii.ta~nceva sariisapaa ca. ^b^na baadhayissantii^eb^ti ma.m na byaadhayissanti sukhadukkhasomanassadomanassaana.m jhaanehi pa.tibaahitattaati adhippaayo. ^b^giribbaje^eb^ti pabbatakandaraaya. ^b^atthatthiya^eb^nti sadatthasa"nkhaatena atthena atthika.m.

[03] ^b^ya.m vidita.m mahesinaa^eb^ti ya.m catusacca.m mahesinaa sammaasambuddhena sayambhuu~naa.nena ~naata.m pa.tividdha.m, taani cattaari saccaani anupacitakusalasambhaarehi su.t.thu duddasaani maggasamaadhinaa ^b^samaahitatto,^eb^ sammaasatiyaa ^b^satimaa,^eb^ ariyamaggapa~n~naaya aha.m ^b^agaccha.m^eb^ pa.tivijjhissa.m adhigamissanti attho.

[03] ^b^ruupe^eb^ti cakkhuvi~n~neyyaruupe. ^b^amite^eb^ti ~naa.nena amite, aparicchinne apari~n~naateti attho. ^b^phusitabbe^eb^ti, pho.t.thabbe. ^b^dhamme^eb^ti manovi~n~neyyadhamme. ^b^amite^eb^ti vaa aparimaa.ne niilaadivasena anekabhedabhinne ruupe bherisaddaadivasena, muularasaadivasena, kakkha.lamudutaadivasena, sukhadukkhaadivasena ca, anekabhedasaddaadike caati attho. ^b^aadittato^eb^ti ekaadasahi aggiihi aadittabhaavato. ^b^samathehi yutto^eb^ti jhaanavipassanaamaggasamaadhiihi ^a^M2.0468^ea^ samannaagato. ^b^pa~n~naaya daccha^eb^nti vipassanaapa~n~naasahitaaya maggapa~n~naaya dakkhissa.m.

[03] ^b^dubbacanena vutto^eb^ti duruttavacanena gha.t.tito. ^b^tato nimitta^eb^nti pharusavaacaahetu. ^b^vimano na hessa^eb^nti domanassito na bhaveyya.m. ^b^atho^eb^ti atha. ^b^pasattho^eb^ti kenaci pasa.msito.

[03] ^b^ka.t.the^eb^ti daarukkhandhe. ^b^ti.ne^eb^ti ti.naana.m khandhe. ^b^ime^eb^ti ime mama santatipariyaapanne pa~nca khandhe ^a^V2.0395^ea^. ^b^amite ca dhamme^eb^ti tato a~n~nena indriyakkhandhena amite ruupadhamme. tenaaha -- ``ajjhattikaaneva ca baahiraani caa''ti. ^b^sama.m tuleyya^eb^nti aniccaadivasena ceva asaaraadiupamaavasena ca sabba.m samameva katvaa tiireyya.m.

[03] ^b^isippayaatamhi^eb^ ^a^P3.0153^ea^ ^b^pathe vajanta^eb^nti buddhaadiihi mahesiihi sammadeva payaate samathavipassanaamagge vajanta.m pa.tipajjanta.m. paavusasamaye kaalamegho ^b^navena toyena^eb^ vassodakena saciivara.m pavane kadaa nu ovassati, temetiiti attano abbhokaasikabhaavaparivitakkita.m dasseti.

[03] ^b^mayuurassa sikha.n.dino vane dijassaa^eb^ti maatukucchito a.n.dakosato caati dvikkhattu.m jaayanavasena dijassa, sikhaasambhavena sikha.n.dino ca mayuurassa vane kadaa pana girigabbhare ^b^ruta.m^eb^ kekaarava.m sutvaa vela.m sallakkhitvaa sayanato vu.t.thahitvaa ^b^amatassa pattiyaa^eb^ nibbaanaadhigamaaya. ^b^sa.mcintaye^eb^ti vuccamaane bhave aniccaadito manasi kareyya.m vipasseyyanti attho.

[03] ^b^ga"nga.m yamuna.m sarassati^eb^nti etaa mahaanadiyo asajjamaano bhaavanaamayaaya ^b^iddhiyaa^eb^ kadaa nu patareyyanti yojanaa. ^b^paataalakhitta.m ba.lavaamukha~ncaa^eb^ti paataaya ala.m pariyattanti paataala.m, tadeva khitta.m, pathaviyaa sa.n.thahanakaale tathaa .thitanti paataalakhitta.m. yojanasatikaadibhedaani samuddassa antopathaviyaa tiira.t.thaanaani, yesu kaanici naagaadiina.m vasana.t.thaanaani honti, kaanici su~n~naaniyeva hutvaa ti.t.thanti. ba.lavaamukhanti mahaasamudde mahanta.m aava.t.tamukha.m. mahaanirayadvaarassa hi viva.takaale mahaaaggikkhandho tato nikkhanto tadabhimukha.m anekayojanasataayaamavitthaara.m he.t.thaa samuddapadesa.m .dahati, tasmi.m da.d.dhe upari udaka.m aava.t.taakaarena ^a^M2.0469^ea^ paribbhamanta.m mahataa saddena he.t.thaa nipatati. tattha ba.lavaamukhasama~n~naa, iti ta~nca paataalakhitta.m ba.lavaamukha~nca ^b^vibhi.msana.m^eb^ bhayaanaka.m asajjamaano iddhiyaa kadaa nu patareyyanti ya.m parivitakkita.m, ta.m kadaa nu bhavissati, bhaavanaamaya.m iddhi.m nibbattetvaa kadaa nu eva.m iddhi.m va.la~njissaamiiti attho.

[03] ^b^naagova asa"ngacaarii padaalaye^eb^ti yathaa mattavaara.no da.lhathambha.m bhinditvaa ayasa"nkhalika.m viddha.msetvaa asa"ngacaarii vana.m pavisitvaa eko adutiyo hutvaa attano rucivasena carati, evamaha.m kadaa nu sabbasubha.m nimitta.m ^b^nibbajjaya.m^eb^ niravasesato vajjayanto kaamacchandavaso ahutvaa jhaane ^b^yuto^eb^ payutto kaamagu.nesu chanda.m sammadeva padaaleyya.m chindeyya.m pajaheyyanti ya.m parivitakkita.m, ta.m nu kadaa bhavissati.

[03] ^b^i.na.t.tova^eb^ ^a^V2.0396^ea^ ^b^daliddako nidhi.m aaraadhayitvaa^eb^ti yathaa koci daliddo jiivikapakato i.na.m gahetvaa ta.m sodhetu.m asakkonto i.na.t.to i.nena a.t.tito dhanikehi pii.lito nidhi.m aaraadhayitvaa adhigantvaa i.na~nca sodhetvaa sukhena ca jiivanto tu.t.tho bhaveyya, eva.m ahampi kadaa nu i.nasadisa.m kaamacchanda.m pahaaya ^b^mahesino^eb^ ariyadhanasampu.n.nataaya ma.nikanakaadiratanasampu.n.nanidhisadisa.m ^a^P3.0154^ea^ buddhassa ^b^saasana.m^eb^ adhigantvaa tu.t.tho bhaveyyanti ya.m parivitakkita.m, ta.m kadaa nu bhavissatiiti.

[03] eva.m pabbajjato pubbe nekkhammavitakkavasena pavatta.m attano vitakkapavatti.m dassetvaa idaani pabbajitvaa yehaakaarehi attaana.m ovaditvaa adhigacchi, te dassento ^b^``bahuuni vassaanii''^eb^tiaadikaa gaathaa abhaasi. tattha ^b^bahuuni vassaani tayaamhi yaacito, agaaravaasena ala.m nu te ida^eb^nti anekasa.mvaccharaani vividhadukkhaanubandhena agaaramajjhe vaasena ala.m pariyattameva teti, ambho citta, ida.m tayaa anekaani sa.mvaccharaani aha.m amhi nanu yaacito. ^b^ta.m daani ma.m pabbajita.m samaana^eb^nti ta.m ma.m tayaa tathaa ussaahanena pabbajita.m samaana.m kena kaara.nena citta tuva.m na yu~njasi, samathavipassana.m cha.d.detvaa nihiine aalasiye niyojesiiti attho.

[03] ^b^nanu^eb^ ^a^M2.0470^ea^ aha.m, citta, tayaamhi yaacitob^ti, ambho citta, aha.m tayaa nanu yaacito amhi aayaacito ma~n~ne. yadi yaacito, kasmaa idaani tadanuruupa.m na pa.tipajjasiiti adhippaayo. ^b^``giribbaje''^eb^tiaadinaa yaacitaakaara.m dasseti. ^b^citrachadaa viha"ngamaa^eb^ vicitrapekhu.napakkhino, mayuuraati attho. ^b^mahindaghosatthanitaabhigajjino^eb^ti jalaghosatthanitena hetunaa su.t.thu gajjanasiilaa. ^b^te ta.m ramessanti vanamhi jhaayina^eb^nti te mayuuraa ta.m vane jhaanapasuta.m ramessantiiti nanu tayaa yaacitoti dasseti.

[03] ^b^kulamhii^eb^ti kulapariva.t.te. ^b^imamajjhupaagato^eb^ti ima.m ara~n~na.t.thaana.m pabbajja.m vaa ajjhupaagato. ^b^athopi tva.m, citta, na mayha tussasii^eb^ti tva.m anuvattitvaa .thitampi ma.m naaraadhessasiiti attho.

[03] ^b^mameva eta.m na hi tva.m paresa^eb^nti eta.m, citta, mameva tasmaa tva.m paresa.m na hosi. tva.m pana a~n~nesa.m viya katvaa ^b^sannaahakaale^eb^ kilesamaare yujjhitu.m bhaavanaasannaahakaale nati vatvaa paridevitena ^b^ki.m^eb^ payojana.m, idaani ta.m a~n~nathaa vattitu.m na dassaamiiti adhippaayo. ^b^sabba.m ida.m calamiti pekkhamaano^eb^ti yasmaa ``ida.m citta.m a~n~na~nca sabba.m tebhuumakasa"nkhaara.m cala.m anava.t.thita''nti pa~n~naacakkhunaa ^a^V2.0397^ea^ olokento gehato kaamehi ca abhinikkhami.m ^b^amatapada.m^eb^ nibbaana.m ^b^jigiisa.m^eb^ pariyesanto, tasmaa, citta, ananuvattanto nibbaana.m pariyesanameva karomiiti adhippaayo.

[03] aviitaraagena sudunnivaaraya.m citta.m cala.m ^b^makka.tasannibha.m^eb^ vanamakka.tasadisa.m iti ^b^suyuttavaadii^eb^ subhaasitavaadii dvipadaanamuttamo mahaabhisakko naradammasaarathiiti yojanaa.

[03] ^b^aviddasuu yattha sitaa puthujjanaa^eb^ti yattha yesu vatthukaamesu kilesakaamesu ca sitaa pa.tibaddhaa te andhaputhujjanaa tena ^a^P3.0155^ea^ kaamaraagena punabbhavesino ekanteneva dukkhamicchanti. icchantaa ca ^b^cittena niitaa niraye niraakataa^eb^ti cittavasikaa nirayasa.mvattanika.m kamma.m karontaa hitasukhato niraakataa hutvaa attano citteneva niraye niitaa na a~n~nathaati cittasseva niggahetabbata.m dasseti.

[03] punapi ^a^M2.0471^ea^ citta.myeva niggahetu.m mantento ^b^``mayuurako~ncaabhirutamhii''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^mayuurako~ncaabhirutamhii^eb^ti sikhiihi saarasehi ca abhikuujite. ^b^diipiihi byagghehi purakkhato vasa^eb^nti mettaavihaaritaaya evaruupehi tiracchaanagatehi purakkhato parivaarito hutvaa vane vasanto, etena su~n~nabhaavaparibruuhanamaaha. ^b^kaaye apekkha.m jahaa^eb^ti sabbaso kaaye nirapekkho jaha, etena pahitattata.m vadati. ^b^maa viraadhayaa^eb^ti ima.m sudullabha.m navama.m kha.na.m maa viraadhehi. ^b^itissu ma.m, citta, pure niyu~njasii^eb^ti eva~nhi tva.m, citta, ma.m pabbajjato pubbe sammaapa.tipattiya.m uyyojesiiti attho.

[03] ^b^bhaavehii^eb^ti uppaadehi va.d.dhehi ca. ^b^jhaanaanii^eb^ti pa.thamaadiini cattaari jhaanaani. ^b^indriyaanii^eb^ti saddhaadiini pa~ncindriyaani. ^b^balaanii^eb^ti taaniyeva pa~nca balaani. ^b^bojjha"ngasamaadhibhaavanaa^eb^ti satta bojjha"nge catasso samaadhibhaavanaa ca. ^b^tisso ca vijjaa^eb^ti pubbenivaasa~naa.naadikaa tisso vijjaa ca. ^b^phusa^eb^ paapu.naahi ^b^buddhasaasane^eb^ sammaasambuddhaovaade .thito.

[03] ^b^niyyaanika^eb^nti va.t.tadukkhato niyhaanavaha.m. ^b^sabbadukkhakkhayogadha^eb^nti amatogadha.m nibbaanapati.t.tha.m nibbaanaaramma.na.m. ^b^sabbakilesasodhana^eb^nti anavasesakilesamalavisodhana.m.

[03] ^b^khandhe^eb^ti upaadaanakkhandhe. ^b^pa.tipassa yoniso^eb^ti rogato ga.n.dato sallato aghato aabaadhatoti ^a^V2.0398^ea^ evamaadiihi vividhehi pakaarehi vipassanaa~naa.nena sammaa upaayena nayena passa. ^b^ta.m jahaa^eb^ti ta.m dukkhassa samudaya.m ta.nha.m pajaha, samucchinda. ^b^idhevaa^eb^ti imasmi.myeva attabhaave.

[03] ^b^anicca^eb^ntiaadi antavantato aniccantikato taavakaalikato niccapa.tikkhepato ca aniccanti vaa passa. ^b^dukkha^eb^nti te udayabbayapa.tipii.lanato sappa.tibhayato dukkhamato sukhapa.tikkhepato dukkhanti vaa passa. ^b^su~n~na^eb^nti avasavattanato asaamikato asaarato attapa.tikkhepato ca su~n~na.m, tato eva ^b^anattaa^eb^ti. vigarahitabbato ava.d.dhiaabaadhanato ca ^b^agha^eb^nti ca ^b^vadha^eb^nti ca vipassa yonisoti yojanaa. ^b^manovicaare^eb^ ^a^M2.0472^ea^ ^b^uparundha cetaso^eb^ti manovicaarasa~n~nino gehasitasomanassupavicaaraadike a.t.thaarasa cetaso uparundha vaarehi nirodhehi.

[03] ^b^mu.n.do^eb^ti mu.n.dabhaava.m upagato, ohaaritakesamassuko. ^b^viruupo^eb^ti tena mu.n.dabhaavena paruu.lhalomataaya chinnabhinnakaasaaya vatthataaya viruupo ^a^P3.0156^ea^ veva.n.niya.m upagato. ^b^abhisaapamaagato^eb^ti ``pi.n.dolo vicarati pattapaa.nii''ti ariyehi kaatabba.m abhisaapa.m upagato. vutta~nheta.m -- ``abhisaapoya.m, bhikkhave, lokasmi.m pi.n.dolo vicarasi pattapaa.nii''ti (sa.m0 ni0 3.80). tenaaha ^b^``kapaalahatthova kulesu bhikkhasuu''^eb^ti. ^b^yu~njassu satthuvacane^eb^ti sammaasambuddhassa ovaade yoga.m karohi anuyu~njassu.

[03] ^b^susa.mvutatto^eb^ti su.t.thu kaayavaacaacittehi sammadeva sa.mvuto. ^b^visikhantare cara^eb^nti bhikkhaacariyaaya icchaavisesesu caranto. ^b^cando yathaa dosinapu.n.namaasiyaa^eb^ti vigatadosaaya pu.n.namaaya kulesu niccanavasaaya paasaadikataaya candimaa viya caraati yojanaa.

[03] ^b^sadaa dhute rato^eb^ti sabbakaala~nca dhutagu.ne abhirato. ^b^tathuupama.m cittamida.m karosii^eb^ti yathaa koci puriso phalaani icchanto phalarukkhe ropetvaa tato aladdhaphalova te muulato chinditu.m icchati, citta, tva.m tathuupama.m tappa.tibhaaga.m ida.m karosi. ^b^ya.m ma.m aniccamhi cale niyu~njasii^eb^ti ya.m ma.m pabbajjaaya niyojetvaa pabbajitvaa addhaagata.m pabbajjaaphala.m aniccamhi cale sa.msaaramukhe niyu~njasi niyojanavasena pavattesi.

[03] ruupaabhaavato ^b^aruupaa^eb^. cittassa hi taadisa.m sa.n.thaana.m niilaadiva.n.nabhedo vaa natthi, tasmaa vutta.m aruupaati. duura.t.thaanappavattiyaa ^b^duura"ngama^eb^. yadipi cittassa makka.tasuttamattampi puratthimaadidisaabhaagena ^a^V2.0399^ea^ gamana.m naama natthi, duure santa.m pana aaramma.na.m sampa.ticchatiiti duura"ngama. ekoyeva hutvaa cara.navasena pavattanato ^b^ekacaari,^eb^ antamaso dve tii.nipi cittaani ekato uppajjitu.m samatthaani naama natthi, ekameva pana citta.m ekasmi.m santaane uppajjati. tasmi.m niruddhe aparampi ekameva uppajjati, tasmaa ekacaari. ^b^na te karissa.m vacana.m idaaniha^eb^nti yadipi pubbe tava vase anuvatti.m, idaani pana satthu ovaada.m laddhakaalato ^a^M2.0473^ea^ pa.t.thaaya cittavasiko na bhavissaami. kasmaati ce? ^b^dukkhaa hi kaamaa ka.tukaa mahabbhayaa^eb^ kaamaa naamete atiitepi dukkhaa, aayatimpi ka.tukaphalaa, attaanuvaadaadibhedena mahataa bhayena anubandhantaa mahabbhayaa. ^b^nibbaanamevaabhimano carissa.m^eb^ tasmaa nibbaanameva uddissa abhimukhacitto viharissa.m.
[03] tameva nibbaanaabhimukhabhaava.m dassento ^b^``naaha.m alakkhyaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^naaha.m alakkhyaa^eb^ti alakkhikataaya nissiriikataaya naaha.m gehato nikkhaminti yojanaa.

[03] ^b^ahirikkataayaa^eb^ti yathaavajja.m ke.li.m karonto viya nillajjataaya. ^b^cittahetuu^eb^ti ekadaa ^a^P3.0157^ea^ niga.n.tho, ekadaa paribbaajakaadiko honto anava.t.thitacitto puriso viya cittavasiko hutvaa. ^b^duurakantanaa^eb^ti raajaadiihi metta.m katvaa tesu dubbhitvaa dubbhibhaavena. ^b^aajiivahetuu^eb^ti aajiivakaara.naa jiivikaapakato hutvaa aajiivikaabhayena aha.m ^b^na nikkhami.m^eb^ na pabbaji.m. ^b^kato ca te, citta, pa.tissavo mayaa^eb^ti, ``pabbajitakaalato pa.t.thaaya na tava vase vattaami, mameva pana vase vattaamii''ti, citta, mayaa nanu pa.ti~n~naa kataati dasseti.

[03] ^b^appicchataa sappurisehi va.n.nitaa^eb^ti ``paccayesu sabbaso appicchaa naama saadhuu''ti buddhaadiihi pasa.t.thaa, tathaa ^b^makkhappahaana.m^eb^ paresa.m gu.ne makkhanassa pahaana.m vuupasamo sabbassa dukkhassa ^b^vuupasamo^eb^ nibbaapana.m sappurisehi va.n.nita.m. ^b^itissu ma.m, citta, tadaa niyu~njasi,^eb^ ``samma, tayaa tesu gu.nesu pati.t.thaatabba''nti, citta, tva.m eva.m tadaa niyu~njasi. ^b^idaani tva.m gacchasi pubbaci.n.na.m^eb^ idaani ma.m tva.m pahaaya attano purimaaci.n.na.m mahicchataadi.m pa.tipajjasi, ki.m naametanti adhippaayo.

[03] yamattha.m sandhaaya ``gacchasi pubbaci.n.na''nti vutta.m. ta.m dassetu.m ^b^``ta.nhaa avijjaa caa''^eb^tiaadi vutta.m. tattha ^b^ta.nhaa^eb^ti paccayesu ta.nhaa, ^b^avijjaa^eb^ti tattheva aadiinavapa.ticchaadikaa avijjaa. ^b^piyaapiya^eb^nti puttadaaraadiisu pemasa"nkhaato piyabhaavo ceva pantasenaasanesu adhikusaladhammesu ^a^V2.0400^ea^ anabhiratisa"nkhaato appiyabhaavo ca ubhayattha anurodhapa.tivirodho. ^b^subhaani ruupaanii^eb^ti ajjhatta.m bahiddhaa ca subharuupaani. ^b^sukhaa vedanaa^eb^ti i.t.thaaramma.ne pa.ticca uppajjanasukhavedanaa. ^b^manaapiyaa kaamagu.naa^eb^ti vuttaavasesaa manoramaa ^a^M2.0474^ea^ kaamako.t.thaasaa. ^b^vantaa^eb^ti niruupato ta.mnissitassa chandaraagassa vikkhambhanapahaanena cha.d.ditataaya pariccattataaya ca vantaa. ^b^vante aha.m aavamitu.m na ussahe^eb^ti eva.m te cha.d.dite puna paccaavamitu.m aha.m na sakkomi, pariccattaa eva hontiiti vadati.

[03] ^b^sabbatthaa^eb^ti sabbesu bhavesu sabbaasu yoniisu sabbaasu gatiisu vi~n~naa.na.t.thitiisu ca. ^b^vaco kata.m mayaa^eb^ti, ambho citta, tava vacana.m mayaa kata.m. karonto ca ^b^bahuusu jaatiisu na mesi kopito^eb^ti anekaasu jaatiisu pana mayaa na kopito asi. mayaa neva paribhavito. tathaapi ^b^ajjhattasambhavo^eb^ attani sambhuuto hutvaapi tava akata~n~nutaaya ^b^dukkhe ciira.m sa.msarita.m tayaa kate^eb^ti tayaa nibbattite anaadimati sa.msaaradukkhe sucirakaala.m mayaa sa.msarita.m paribbhamita.m.

[03] idaani ``dukkhe cira.m sa.msarita.m tayaa kate''ti sa"nkhepato vuttamattha.m uppattibhedena gatibhedena ca vitthaarato dassento ^b^``tva~n~nevaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^raajadasii^eb^ti raajaa asi, dakaaro padasandhikaro, vessaa ca suddaa ca bhavaama ekadaa taveva vaahasaati yojanaa ^a^P3.0158^ea^. ^b^devattana.m vaapii^eb^ti devabhaava.m vaapi tva.myeva ^b^no^eb^ amhaaka.m, citta, karosiiti yojanaa. ^b^vaahasaa^eb^ti kaara.nabhaavena.

[03] ^b^nanu dubbhissasi ma.m punappuna^eb^nti punappuna.m dubbhissasi nuna, yathaa pubbe tva.m anantaasu jaatiisu, citta, mittapa.tiruupako sapatto hutvaa mayha.m punappuna.m dubbhi, idaani tathaa dubbhissasi ma~n~ne, pubbe viya caaretu.m na dassaamiiti adhippaayo. ^b^muhu.m muhu.m caara.nika.mva dassaya^eb^nti abhi.nhato cara.naaraha.m viya mano dassento cara.naaraha.m purisa.m va~ncetvaa caragopaka.m nipphaadento viya punappuna.m ta.m ta.m bhava.m dassento. ^b^ummattakeneva mayaa palobhasii^eb^ti ummattakapurisena viya mayaa saddhi.m kii.lanto ta.m ta.m palobhaniiya.m dassetvaa palobhasi. ^b^ki~ncaapi te, citta, viraadhita.m mayaa^eb^ti, ambho citta, ki.m naama te mayaa viraddha.m, ta.m kathehiiti adhippaayo.

[03] ^b^ida.m pure citta^eb^nti ida.m citta.m naama ito pubbe ruupaadiisu aaramma.nesu rajjanaadinaa, yena aakaarena icchati, yattheva cassa kaamo uppajjati, tassa ^a^M2.0475^ea^ vasena yatthakaama.m yathaa vicarantassa sukha.m ^a^V2.0401^ea^ hoti, tatheva ca caranto yathaasukha.m diigharatta.m caarika.m acari. ajjaaha.m pabhinnamada.m mattahatthi.m hatthaacariyasa"nkhaato cheko a"nkusaggaho a"nkusena viya yonisomanasikaarena na.m niggahessaami, nassa viitikkamitu.m dassaamiiti.

[03] ^b^satthaa ca me lokamima.m adhi.t.thahii^eb^ti mama satthaa sammaasambuddho ima.m anavasesakhandhaloka.m ~naa.nena adhi.t.thahi. kinti? hutvaa abhaava.t.thena ^b^aniccato,^eb^ kassacipi dhuvassa thaavarassa abhaavato ^b^addhuvato^eb^ sukhasaaraadiina.m abhaavato ^b^asaarato^eb^. ^b^pakkhanda ma.m, citta, jinassa saasane^eb^ti tasmaa yaathaavato pa.tipajjitu.m, citta, ma.m jinassa bhagavato saasane pakkhandehi anuppavesehi. ``pakkhandima''ntipi paa.li, jinassa saasane ima.m loka.m ~naa.nena pakkhanda, yaathaavato taarehi, pakkhandanto ca vipassanaa~naa.namaggena yaapento suduttarato mahantato sa.msaaramahoghato ma.m taarehi.

[03] ^b^na te ida.m, citta, yathaa puraa.naka^eb^nti, ambho citta, ida.m attabhaavageha.m poraa.naka.m viya tava na hotiiti attho. kasmaa? ^b^naaha.m ala.m tuyha vase nivattitu^eb^nti idaanaaha.m tava vase nivattitu.m na yutto. yasmaa ^b^mahesino^eb^ bhagavato ^b^pabbajitomhi^eb^ saasane. pabbajitakaalato ca pa.t.thaaya ^a^P3.0159^ea^ sama.naa naama maadisaava na honti vinaasadhaarino, eka.msato sama.naayeva hontiiti attho.

[03] ^b^nagaa^eb^ti sineruhimavantaadayo sabbe pabbataa. ^b^samuddaa^eb^ti puratthimasamuddaadayo siitasamuddaadayo, na sabbe samuddaa. ^b^saritaa^eb^ti ga"ngaadayo sabbaa nadiyo ca. ^b^vasundharaa^eb^ti pathavii. ^b^disaa catasso^eb^ti puratthimaadibhedaa catasso disaa. ^b^vidisaa^eb^ti puratthimadakkhi.naadayo catasso anudisaa. ^b^adho^eb^ti he.t.thaa yaava udakasandhaarakavaayukhandhaa. ^b^divaa^eb^ti devalokaa. divaaggaha.nena cettha tattha gate sattasa"nkhaare vadati. ^b^sabbe aniccaa tibhavaa upaddutaa^eb^ti sabbe kaamabhavaadayo tayo bhavaa aniccaa ceva jaatiaadiihi raagaadiihi kilesehi upaddutaa pii.litaa ca, na ettha ki~nci khema.t.thaana.m naama atthi, tadabhaavato kuhi.m gato, citta, sukha.m ramissasi, tasmaa tato nissara.na~ncettha pariyesaahiiti adhippaayo.
