[03] ^b^dhitippara^eb^nti ^a^M2.0476^ea^ dhitiparaaya.na.m parama.m thirabhaave .thita.m mama.m, citta, ki.m kaahisi, tato iisakampi ma.m caaletu.m naasakkhissasiiti attho. tenaaha ^b^``na te ala.m, citta, vasaanuvattako''^eb^ti. idaani tamevattha.m paaka.tatara.m katvaa dassento ^b``na jaatu bhasta.m ubhatomukha.m chupe ^a^V2.0402^ea^, dhiratthu puura.m navasotasandani''b^nti aaha. tattha ^b^bhasta^eb^nti rutti.m. ^b^ubhatomukha^eb^nti puto.liyaa ubhatomukha.m. ^b^na jaatu chupe^eb^ti eka.mseneva paadenaapi na chupeyya, tathaa ^b^dhiratthu puura.m navasotasandani^eb^nti naanappakaarassa asucino puura.m navahi sotehi va.namukhehi asucisandani.m savati.m. taaya vaccaku.tiyaa dhii atthu, tassaa garahaa hotu.

[03] eva.m a.t.thaviisatiyaa gaathaahi nigga.nhanavasena citta.m ovaditvaa idaani viveka.t.thaanaacikkha.naadinaa sampaha.msento ^b^``varaahae.neyyavigaa.lhasevite''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^varaahae.neyyavigaa.lhasevite^eb^ti varaahehi ceva e.neyyehi ca ogaahetvaa sevite. ^b^pabbhaaraku.t.te^eb^ti pabbhaara.t.thaane ceva pabbatasikhare ca. ^b^pakateva sundare^eb^ti pakatiyaa eva sundare atittimanohare. ``pakativasundhare''ti vaa paa.tho, paakatike bhuumipadeseti attho. ^b^navambunaa paavusasittakaanane^eb^ti paavusavasena vu.t.thena meghodakena upasittavasse sutheve vane. ^b^tahi.m guhaagehagato ramissasii^eb^ti tasmi.m pabbatakaanane guhaasa"nkhaata.m geha.m upagato bhaavanaaratiyaa abhiramissasi.
[03] ^b^te ta.m ramessantii^eb^ti te mayuuraadayo vanasa~n~na.m uppaadentaa ta.m ramessantiiti attho.

[03] ^b^vu.t.thamhi deve^eb^ti meghe adhippavu.t.the. ^b^catura"ngule ti.ne^eb^ti teneva gassodakapaatena tattha tattha ti.ne surattava.n.nakambalasadise catura"ngule ^a^P3.0160^ea^ jaate. ^b^sa.mpupphite meghanibhamhi kaanane^eb^ti paavusameghasa"nkaase kaanane sammadeva pupphite. ^b^nagantare^eb^ti pabbatantare. ^b^vi.tapisamo sayissa^eb^nti tarusadiso apariggaho hutvaa nipajjissa.m. ^b^ta.m me muduu hehiti tuulasannibha^eb^nti ta.m ti.napaccatthara.na.m mudu sukhasamphassa.m tuulasannibha.m tuulikasadisa.m sayana.m me bhavissati.

[03] ^b^tathaa^eb^ ^a^M2.0477^ea^ ^b^tu kassaami yathaapi issaro^eb^ti yathaa koci issarapuriso attano vacanakaradaasaadi.m vase vatteti, ahampi, citta, ta.m tathaa karissaami, mayha.m vase vattemiyeva. katha.m? ^b^ya.m labbhati tenapi hotu me ala^eb^nti catuusu paccayesu ya.m yaadisa.m vaa taadisa.m vaa labbhati, tena ca mayha.m ala.m pariyatta.m hotu. etena ida.m dasseti -- yasmaa idhekacce sattaa ta.nhuppaadahetu cittassa vase anuvattanti, aha.m pana ta.nhuppaada.m duurato vajjento citta.m daasa.m viya karonto attano vase vattemiiti. ^b^na taaha.m kassaami yathaa atandito, bi.laarabhasta.mva yathaa sumaddita^eb^nti citta ta.nhuppaadaparivajjanahetu, puna tanti citta.m aamasati, yathaa a~n~nopi koci sammappadhaanayogena bhaavanaaya atandito attano citta.m kammakkhama.m, kammayogga.m karoti, tathaa ahampi, citta, ta.m kammakkhama.m, kammayogga.m mayha.m vase vatta.m karissaami ^a^V2.0403^ea^. yathaa ki.m? ^b^bi.laarabhasta.mva yathaa sumaddita.m, na^eb^iti nipaatamatta.m. yathaa su.t.thu maddita.m bi.laarabhasta.m kammakkhama.m, kammayogga.m sukhena parihara.niiya~nca hoti, tathaaha.m ta.m karissaami.

[03] ^b^viiriyena ta.m mayha vasaanayissa^eb^nti, ambho citta, ta.m attano viiriyena bhaavanaabala.m uppaadetvaa tena mayha.m vasa.m aanayissa.m. ^b^gaja.mva matta.m kusala"nkusaggaho^eb^ti yathaa kusalo cheko a"nkusaggaho hatthaacariyo attano sikkhaabalena mattahatthi.m attano vasa.m aaneti, tathevaati attho.

[03] ^b^tayaa sudantena ava.t.thitena hii^eb^ti ^b^hii^eb^ti nipaatamatta.m, citta, samathavipassanaabhaavanaahi su.t.thu dantena tato eva sammadeva vipassanaaviithi.m pa.tipannattaa ava.t.thitena tayaa. ^b^hayena yoggaacariyova ujjunaa^eb^ti yathaa sudantena sudantattaa eva ujunaa ava"nkagatinaa assaajaaniiyena yoggaacariyo assadammasaarathi akhema.t.thaanato khemantabhuumi.m pa.tipajjitu.m sakkoti, eva.m ^b^pahomi magga.m pa.tipajjitu.m siva^eb^nti asivabhaavakaraana.m kilesaana.m abhaavena siva.m. ^b^cittaanurakkhiihii^eb^ti attano citta.m anurakkha.nasiilehi buddhaadiihi sabbakaala.m sevita.m ariyamagga.m aha.m pa.tipajjitu.m adhigantu.m pahomi sakkomiiti.

[03] ^b^aaramma.ne^eb^ ^a^M2.0478^ea^ ^b^ta.m balasaa nibandhisa.m, naaga.mva thambhamhi da.lhaaya^eb^ ^a^P3.0161^ea^ ^b^rajjuyaa^eb^ti yathaa hatthaacariyo mahaahatthi.m aa.laanathambhe da.lhaaya thiraaya rajjuyaa nibandhati, evamaha.m, citta, kamma.t.thaanaaramma.ne bhaavanaabalena nibandhissa.m. ^b^ta.m me sugutta.m satiyaa subhaavita^eb^nti ta.m tva.m, citta, mama satiyaa sugutta.m subhaavita~nca hutvaa. ^b^anissita.m sabbabhavesu hehisii^eb^ti ariyamaggabhaavanaadibalena kaamabhavaadiisu sabbesupi bhavesu ta.nhaadinissayehi anissita.m bhavissasi.

[03] ^b^pa~n~naaya chetvaa vipathaanusaarina^eb^nti uppathagaamina.m aayatanasamudaya.m yaathaavato disvaa yena samudayena uppathagaamii, tassa kilesavissandana.m kilesavipphandita.m indriyasa.mvaruupanissayaaya pa.tisa"nkhaanapa~n~naaya chinditvaa sotavicchedanavasena aavara.na.m katvaa. ^b^yogena niggayhaa^eb^ti vipassanaabhaavanaasa"nkhaatena yogena saamatthiyavidhamanena niggahetvaa. ^b^pathe nivesiyaa^eb^ti vipassanaaviithiya.m nivesetvaa, pati.t.thapetvaa. yadaa pana vipassanaa ussukkaapitaa maggena gha.t.teti, tadaa maggapa~n~naaya ``ya.mki~nci samudayadhamma.m, sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhamma''nti (mahaava0 16; sa.m0 ni0 5.1081) nidassanena sabbaso aayatanasamudayassa vibhava.m sambhava~nca asammohato disvaa sadevake loke ^b^aggavaadino^eb^ sammaasambuddhassa ^b^daayaado^eb^ orasaputto ^b^hehisi^eb^ bhavissasiiti attho.

[03] ^b^catubbipallaasavasa.m^eb^ ^a^V2.0404^ea^ ^b^adhi.t.thita^eb^nti anicce niccanti, asubhe subhanti, dukkhe sukhanti, anattani attaati imesa.m catunna.m vipallaasaana.m vasa.m adhi.t.thita.m anuvattanta.m. ^b^gaama.n.dala.mva parinesi, citta, ma^eb^nti, ambho citta, ma.m gaamadaaraka.m viya parika.d.dhasi, ito cito parika.d.dhasi. ^b^nanu sa.myojanabandhanacchida^eb^nti sa.myojanasa"nkhaataana.m dasanna.m bandhanaana.m chedaka.m ^b^kaaru.nika.m mahaamuni.m^eb^ sammaasambuddha.m sa.msevasi nanu, ``tathaaruupe mahaanubhaave duuratova vajjesi, maadise pana tapassine yathaaruci parinesii''ti appasaadalesena satthaara.m pasa.msati.

[03] ^b^migo yathaa^eb^ti yathaa migo rukkhagacchalataadiihi su.t.thu cittavicitte anaakule kaanane ^b^seri^eb^ saya.mvasii ramati. ^b^ramma.m giri.m paavusaabbhamaalini^eb^nti eva.m paavusakaale samantato sumaaliniihi thalajajalajamaalaahi samannaagatattaa ^a^M2.0479^ea^ abbhamaalini.m janavivittataaya manoramataaya ca ramma.m pabbata.m labhitvaa tattha nage ramissa.m, ^b^asa.msaya.m^eb^ eka.mseneva tva.m, citta, paraabhavissasi, sa.msaarabyasanehi .thassasiiti attho.

[03] ^b^ye tuyha chandena vasena vattino^eb^ti sabbe puthujjane cittasaama~n~nena gahetvaa vadati. tassattho -- ^b^ye^eb^ naranaariyo, ambho ^a^P3.0162^ea^ citta, tuyha.m ^b^chandena vasena^eb^ ruciyaa .thitaa ^b^ya.m^eb^ gehanissita.m ^b^sukha.m anubhonti^eb^ anubhavissanti, te ^b^aviddasuu^eb^ andhabaalaa, ^b^maaravasaanuvattino^eb^ kilesamaaraadiina.m vase anuvattanasiilaa, ^b^bhavaabhinandii^eb^ kaamaadibhavameva abhinandanato, tava saavakaa anusi.t.thikaraa. maya.m pana sammaasambuddhassa saavakaa, na tuyha.m vase anuvattaamaati.

[03] eva.m thero pubbe attano uppanna.m yonisomanasikaara.m cittassa nigga.nhanavasena pavatta.m naanappakaarato vibhajitvaa samiipe .thitaana.m bhikkhuuna.m ovaadadaanavasena dhamma.m kathesi. ya.m panettha antarantaraa atthato na vibhatta.m, ta.m he.t.thaa vuttanayattaa uttaanatthamevaati.

[03] sa.t.thinipaate ^a^M2.0480^ea^ ^a^V2.0405^ea^ ^b^aara~n~nikaa^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato mahaamoggallaanattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? tassa vatthu dhammasenaapativatthumhi vuttameva. thero hi pabbajitadivasato sattame divase magadhara.t.the kallavaalagaamaka.m upanissaaya sama.nadhamma.m karonto thinamiddhe okkante satthaaraa -- ``moggallaana, moggallaana, maa, braahma.na, ariya.m tu.nhiibhaava.m pamaado''tiaadinaa (sa.m0 ni0 2.235) sa.mvejito thinamiddha.m vinodetvaa bhagavataa vuccamaana.m dhaatukamma.t.thaana.m su.nanto eva vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa pa.tipaa.tiyaa uparimaggattaya.m upagantvaa aggaphalakkha.ne saavakapaaramii~naa.nassa matthaka.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.1.375-397) --
[22] obhaasento disaa sabbaa, bhavana.m me upaagami..
[22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
[21] ``asmimaana.m ^a^M2.0482^ea^ na passaami, maano mayha.m na vijjati.

[03] atha na.m satthaa aparabhaage jetavanamahaavihaare ariyaga.namajjhe nisinno tena tena gu.nena attano saavake etadagge .thapento ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m iddhimantaana.m yadida.m mahaamoggallaano''ti (a0 ni0 1.188, 190) iddhimantataaya etadagge .thapesi. tena eva.m satthaaraa etadagge .thapitena saavakapaaramiyaa matthaka.m pattena mahaatherena ta.m ta.m nimitta.m aagamma tattha tattha bhaasitaa gaathaa, taa sa"ngiitikaale dhammasa"ngaahakehi --
[22] bhikkhu parivajjayate ta.m, mii.lha~nca yathaa sucikaamo..
[21] ``eva~nce ^a^M2.0483^ea^ ta.m jano ja~n~naa, yathaa jaanaami ta.m aha.m.
[22] a.t.thi.m tacena onaddha.m, saha vatthehi sobhati..
[22] ala.m baalassa mohaaya, no ca paaragavesino..
[22] ala.m baalassa mohaaya, no ca paaragavesino..
[22] ala.m baalassa mohaaya, no ca paaragavesino..
[22] ye pa~ncakkhandhe passanti, parato no ca attato..
[21] ``ye ca passanti sa"nkhaare, parato no ca attato.
[22] dhaareti antima.m deha.m, jetvaa maara.m savaahana.m..
[22] khippa.m pa~njaliko vanda, maa te vija.ti matthaka.m..
[22] yassa te aasavaa khii.naa, dakkhi.neyyosi maarisa..
[21] ``yassa muhuttena sahassadhaa loko, sa.mvidito sabrahmakappo vasi.
[22] iddhigu.ne cutupapaate kaale, passati devataa sa bhikkhu..
[22] dhiiro samucchindi samaahitindriyo, naago yathaa puutilata.mva bandhana.m..
[27] iidiso nirayo aasi, yattha dussii apaccatha.
[22] tassa sakko viyaakaasi, pa~nha.m pu.t.tho yathaatatha.m..
[27] ajjaapi tyaavuso saa di.t.thi, yaa te di.t.thi pure ahu.
[22] na me maarisa saa di.t.thi, yaa me di.t.thi pure ahu..
[22] soha.m ajja katha.m vajja.m, aha.m niccomhi sassato..
[22] vana.m pubbavidehaana.m, ye ca bhuumisayaa naraa..
[22] baalova jalita.m aggi.m, aasajja na.m pa.dayhati..
[22] kinnu ma~n~nasi paapima, na me paapa.m vipaccati..
[22] maara nibbinda buddhamhaa, aasa.m maakaasi bhikkhusu..
[25] ittha.m suda.m aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano thero gaathaayo abhaasitthaati.

[03] tattha ^b^``aara~n~nikaa''^eb^tiaadikaa catasso gaathaa bhikkhuuna.m ovaadadaanavasena bhaasitaa. ^b^aara~n~nikaa^eb^ti gaamantasenaasana.m pa.tikkhipitvaa aara~n~nakadhuta"ngasamaadaanena aara~n~nikaa. sa"nghabhatta.m pa.tikkhipitvaa pi.n.dapaatika"ngasamaadaanena ^a^P3.0167^ea^ ^b^pi.n.dapaatikaa,^eb^ ghare ghare laddhapi.n.dapaatena yaapanakaa. ^b^u~nchaapattaagate^eb^ ^a^V2.0412^ea^ ^b^rataa^eb^ti u~nchaacariyaaya patte aagate pattapariyaapanne rataa, teneva abhirataa santu.t.thaa. ^b^daalemu maccuno sena^eb^nti attaana.m anatthajanane sahaayabhaavuupagamanato maccuraajassa senaabhuuta.m kilesavaahini.m samucchindema. ^b^ajjhatta.m susamaahitaa^eb^ti gocarajjhattesu su.t.thu samaahitaa hutvaa, etenassa padaalanupaayamaaha.

[03] ^b^``a.t.thika"nkalaku.tike''^eb^tiaadikaa catasso gaathaa attaana.m palobhetu.m upagataaya ga.nikaaya ovaadavasena abhaasi. tattha ^b^a.t.thika"nkalaku.tike^eb^ti a.t.thisa"nkhalikaamayaku.tike. ^b^nhaarupasibbite^eb^ti navahi nhaarusatehi samantato sibbite. ara~n~ne ku.tiyo daaruda.n.de ussaapetvaa ^a^M2.0489^ea^ valliaadiihi bandhitvaa kariyanti, tva.m pana paramajegucchena a.t.thika"nkalena paramajeguccheheva nhaaruuhi bandhitvaa kataa, ativiya jegucchaa pa.tikkuulaa caati dasseti. ^b^dhiratthu puure duggandhe^eb^ti kesalomaadino naanappakaarassa asucino puure paripu.n.ne, tato eva duggandhe dhiratthu tava dhiikaaro hotu. ^b^paragatte mamaayase^eb^ti ida~nca te duggandhassa upari pho.tasamu.t.thaana.m parissaya.m eva.m asuciduggandha.m jeguccha.m pa.tikkuulasamaadaana.m taadise eva a~n~nasmi.m padese so.nasi"ngaalakimikulaadiina.m gattabhuute ka.levare mamatta.m karosi.

[03] ^b^guuthabhaste^eb^ti guuthabharitabhastasadise. ^b^taconaddhe^eb^ti tacena onaddhe chavimattapa.ticchaaditakibbise. ^b^uraga.n.dipisaacinii^eb^ti ure .thitaga.n.dadvayavatii bhayaanakabhaavato anatthaavahato ca pisaacasadisii. ^b^yaani sandanti sabbadaa^eb^ti yaani nava sotaani, nava va.namukhaani sabbadaa rattindiva.m sandanti, savanti, asuci.m paggharanti.

[03] ^b^paribandha^eb^nti sammaapa.tipattiparibandhabhuuta.m. ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti sa.msaare bhaya.m ikkhanto bhinnakileso vaa duurato ^b^parivajjayate^eb^ti mamatta.m na karoti. ^b^mii.lha~nca yathaa sucikaamo^eb^ti ^b^ca^eb^-iti nipaatamatta.m. yathaa sucijaatiko sucimeva icchanto sasiisa.m nhaato mii.lha.m disvaa duuratova parivajjesi, evameva.m bhikkhuuti attho.

[03] ^b^eva~nce ta.m jano ja~n~naa, yathaa jaanaami ta.m aha^eb^nti eva.m sariirasa~n~nita.m asucipu~nja.m yathaa aha.m yathaabhuuta.m jaanaami, evameva mahaajano jaaneyya, ta.m aarakaa duuratova parivajjeyya. ^b^guutha.t.thaana.mva^eb^ ^a^V2.0413^ea^ ^b^paavuse^eb^ti paavusakaale kilinnaasuci.m nirantara.m guutha.t.thaana.m viya sucijaatiko. yasmaa pana ta.m yathaabhuuta.m na jaanaati, tasmaa tattha nimuggo siisa.m na ukkhipatiiti adhippaayo.

[03] eva.m ^a^P3.0168^ea^ therena sariire dose vibhaavite saa ga.nikaa lajjaavanatamukhaa there gaarava.m paccupa.t.thapetvaa ^b^``evameta.m mahaaviiraa''^eb^ti gaatha.m vatvaa thera.m vanditvaa a.t.thaasi. tattha ^b^ettha ceke^eb^ti eva.m paaka.tapa.tikkuulasabhaavepi etasmi.m kaaye ekacce sattaa aasattibalavataaya ^b^visiidanti^eb^ visaada.m ^a^M2.0490^ea^ aapajjanti. ^b^pa"nkamhiva jaraggavo^eb^ mahaakaddamakucchiya.m sampatitadubbalabalibaddo viya byasanameva paapu.nantiiti attho.

[03] puna ta.m thero maadise evaruupaa pa.tipatti niratthakaa vighaataavahaa evaati dassento ^b^``aakaasamhii''^eb^tiaadinaa gaathaadvayamaaha. tassattho -- yo puggalo haliddiyaa a~n~nena vaa ra"ngajaatena aakaasa.m ra~njitu.m ma~n~neyya, tassa ta.m kamma.m ^b^vighaatudaya.m^eb^ cittavighaataavahameva siyaa, yathaa ta.m avisaye yogo.

[03] ^b^tadaakaasasama.m citta^eb^nti tayida.m mama citta.m aakaasasama.m katthaci alaggabhaavena ajjhatta.m su.t.thu samaahita.m, tasmaa ^b^maa paapacitte aasaadii^eb^ti kaamesu nimuggataaya laamakacitte nihiinacitte maadise maa aasaadehi. ^b^aggikhandha.mva pakkhimaa^eb^ti pakkhimaa salabho aggikkhandha.m aasaadento anatthameva paapu.naati, eva.m sampadamida.m tuyhanti dasseti.

[03] ^b^passa cittakata^eb^ntiaadikaa satta gaathaa tameva ga.nika.m disvaa vipallattacittaana.m bhikkhuuna.m ovaadadaanavasena vuttaa. ta.m sutvaa saa ga.nikaa ma"nkubhuutaa aagatamaggeneva palaataa.
[03] ^b^tadaasii^eb^tiaadikaa catasso gaathaa aayasmato saariputtattherassa parinibbaana.m aarabbha vuttaa. tattha ^b^anekaakaarasampanne^eb^ti anekehi siilasa.mvaraadippakaarehi paripu.n.ne.

[03] ^b^sukhuma.m te pa.tivijjhantii^eb^ti te yogino atisukhuma.m pa.tivijjhanti naama. yathaa ki.m? ^b^vaalagga.m usunaa yathaa^eb^ yathaa satadhaabhinnassa vaalassa eka.m a.msu agga.m rattandhakaaratimisaaya vijjullatobhaasena vijjhantaa viyaati attho. ke pana teti aaha ^b^``ye pa~ncakkhandhe passanti, parato no ca attato''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^parato^eb^ti anattato. tassa attaggaahapa.tikkhepadassana~nheta.m. tenaaha ^b^``no ca attato''^eb^ti. etena anattato abhivu.t.thitassa ariyamaggassa vasena dukkhasacce ^a^V2.0414^ea^ pari~n~naabhisamaya.m aaha, tadavinaabhaavato pana itaresampi abhisamayaana.m suppa.tivijjhataa vuttaa eva hotiiti da.t.thabba.m. keci pana ``anatthakaarakato pare naama pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaati `parato passantii'ti iminaa visesato sabbopi sammadeva vutto''ti vadanti. ^b^paccabyaadhi.msuu^eb^ti pa.tivijjhi.msu.
[03] ^b^sattiyaa^eb^ ^a^M2.0491^ea^ ^b^viya oma.t.tho^eb^ti pa.thamagaathaa tissatthera.m aarabbha vuttaa, dutiyaa va.d.dhamaanatthera.m. taa he.t.thaa vuttatthaava.
[03] ^b^codito^eb^ ^a^P3.0169^ea^ ^b^bhaavitattenaa^eb^ti gaathaa paasaadakampanasuttanta.m aarabbha vuttaa. tattha ^b^bhaavitattena sariirantimadhaarinaa^eb^ti bhagavanta.m sandhaaya vadati.

[03] ^b^nayida.m sithilamaarabbhaa^eb^tiaadikaa dve gaathaa hiinaviiriya.m ^b^veda^eb^naamaka.m daharabhikkhu.m aarabbha vuttaa. tattha ^b^sithilamaarabbhaa^eb^ti sithila.m katvaa viiriya.m akatvaa. ^b^appena thaamasaa^eb^ti appakena viiriyabalena nayida.m nibbaana.m adhigantabba.m, mahanteneva pana catubbidhasammappadhaanaviiriyena pattabbanti attho.

[03] ^b^vivaramanupabhantii^eb^tiaadikaa dve gaathaa attano vivekabhaava.m aarabbha vuttaa. tattha ^b^brahmunaa abhivandito^eb^ti mahaabrahmunaa sadevakena lokena ca abhimukhena hutvaa thomito namassito ca.

[03] ^b^upasanta.m uparata^eb^ntiaadikaa pa~nca gaathaa raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya pavisanta.m mahaakassapatthera.m disvaa ``kaa.laka.n.nii mayaa di.t.thaa''ti oloketvaa .thita.m saariputtattherassa bhaagineyya.m micchaadi.t.thibraahma.na.m disvaa tassa anukampaaya ``aya.m braahma.no maa nassii''ti ariyuupavaadapa.tighaatattha.m ``thera.m vandaahii''ti ta.m uyyojentena vuttaa. tattha ^b^jaatisata.m gacche^eb^ti jaatiina.m sata.m upagaccheyya. ^b^sottiyo^eb^ti sottiyajaatiko. ^b^vedasampanno^eb^ti ~naa.nasampanno. ^b^etassaa^eb^ti therassa. aya~nhettha sa"nkhepattho -- ^b^yo^eb^ puggalo uditoditaa asambhinnaa satabraahma.najaatiyo anupa.tipaa.tiyaa uppajjanavasena upagaccheyya, tattha ca braahma.naana.m vijjaasu nipphatti.m gato ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu siyaa braahma.navatta~nca puurento, tasseta.m vijjaadianu.t.thaana.m etassa mahaakassapattherassa vandanaaya vandanaamayapu~n~nassa so.lasi.m kala.m naagghati, vandanaamayapu~n~nameva tato mahantataranti.

[03] ^b^a.t.tha^eb^ ^a^V2.0415^ea^ ^b^vimokkhaanii^eb^ti ruupajjhaanaadike a.t.tha vimokkhe. bhaavanaavasena hi laddhaani ruupajjhaanaani paccaniikadhammehi su.t.thu vimuttata.m abhirativasena aaramma.ne niraasa"nga~nca pavatti.m upaadaaya ``vimokkhaanii''ti vuccanti. nirodhasamaapatti pana paccaniikadhammehi vimuttattaa eva. idha pana jhaanameva veditabba.m. ^b^anuloma.m^eb^ ^a^M2.0492^ea^ ^b^pa.tiloma^eb^nti pa.thamajjhaanato pa.t.thaaya yaava nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanaa anuloma.m, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanato pa.t.thaaya yaava pa.thamajjhaanaa pa.tiloma.m. ^b^purebhatta^eb^nti bhattakiccato pureyeva. ^b^aphassayii^eb^ti anekaakaaravokaaraa samaapattiyo samaapajji. ^b^tato pi.n.daaya gacchatii^eb^ti tato samaapattito vu.t.thaaya, tato vaa samaapattisamaapajjitato pacchaa idaani pi.n.daaya gacchatiiti tadahu pavatta.m therassa pa.tipatti.m sandhaaya vadati. thero pana divase divase tatheva pa.tipajjati.

[03] ^b^taadisa.m^eb^ ^a^P3.0170^ea^ ^b^bhikkhu.m maasaadii^eb^ti yaadisassa gu.naa ekadesena vuttaa, taadisa.m tathaaruupa.m buddhaanubuddha.m mahaakhii.naasava.m bhikkhu.m maa aasaadehi. ^b^maattaana.m kha.ni braahma.naa^eb^ti aasaadanena ca, braahma.na, maa attaana.m kha.ni, ariyuupavaadena attano kusaladhamma.m vaa ummulehi. ^b^abhippasaadehi mana^eb^nti ``saadhuruupo vata aya.m sama.no''ti attano citta.m pasaadehi. ^b^maa te vija.ti matthaka^eb^nti tava matthaka.m tasmi.m katena aparaadhena sattadhaa maa phali. tasmaa tassa pa.tikaarattha.m khippameva pa~njaliko vandaati. braahma.no ta.m sutvaa bhiito sa.mviggo lomaha.t.thajaato taavadeva thera.m khamaapesi.

[03] ^b^neso passatii^eb^tiaadikaa dve gaathaa po.t.thila.m naama bhikkhu.m sammaa apa.tipajjanta.m micchaajiivakata.m disvaa codanaavasena vuttaa. tattha ^b^neso passati saddhamma^eb^nti eso po.t.thilo bhikkhu sata.m buddhaadiina.m dhamma.m maggaphalanibbaana.m na passati. kasmaa? ^b^sa.msaarena purakkhato^eb^ sa.msaarabandhanaavijjaadinaa purakkhato apaayesu nibbattanato ^b^adhogama.m^eb^ he.t.thaagaami.m maayaasaa.theyyaanugatattaa ^b^jimhapatha.m^eb^ micchaamaggabhaavato ^b^kummagga^eb^bhuuta.m micchaajiiva.m ^b^anudhaavati^eb^ anuparivattati.

[03] ^b^kimiiva mii.lhasallitto^eb^ti guuthakimii viya mii.lhena samantato litto kilesaasucivimissite ^b^sa"nkhaare adhimucchito^eb^ ajjhaapanno. ^b^pagaa.lho laabhasakkaare^eb^ti laabhe ca sakkaare ca ta.nhaavasena pakaarato gaa.lho ogaa.lho. ^b^tuccho gacchati po.t.thilo^eb^ti adhisiilasikkhaabhaavato tuccho asaaro hutvaa po.t.thilo bhikkhu gacchati pavattati.

[03] ^b^ima~nca^eb^ ^a^M2.0493^ea^ ^a^V2.0416^ea^ ^b^passaa^eb^tiaadikaa dve gaathaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m pasa.msantena vuttaa. tattha ^b^ima~nca passaa^eb^ti aayasmanta.m saariputtatthera.m disvaa pasannamaanaso attano citta.m aalapati. ^b^sudassana^eb^nti asekkhaana.m siilakkhandhaana~nceva paaripuuriyaa saavakapaaramii~naa.nassa ca paaripuuriyaa sundaradassana.m. ^b^vimutta.m ubhatobhaage^eb^ti ubhatobhaagato vimuttattaa ubhatobhaagavimutta.m ubhatobhaageti aruupasamaapattiyaa ruupakaayato, maggena naamakaayato, yathaaraha.m tehiyeva vikkhambhanasamucchedabhaagehi vimuttanti attho. sabbaso raagasallaadiina.m abhaavena ^b^visalla.m^eb^ kaamaadiyogaana.m sammadeva khii.nattaa ^b^khii.nasa.myoga.m^eb^ suparisuddhassa vijjaattayassa adhigatattaa ^b^tevijja.m^eb^ maccuraajassa bha~njitattaa ^b^maccuhaayina.m^eb^ passaati yojanaa.

[03] ^b^ete sambahulaa^eb^tiaadikaa gaathaa aayasmataa saariputtattherena mahaamoggallaanatthera.m pasa.msantena vuttaa. tattha ^b^puujito naradevenaa^eb^ti narehi ca devehi ca paramaaya puujaaya ^a^P3.0171^ea^ puujito. ^b^uppanno mara.naabhibhuu^eb^ti loke uppanno hutvaa mara.na.m abhibhavitvaa .thito. atha vaa ^b^puujito naradevena^eb^ sammaasambuddhena kaara.nabhuutena ariyaaya jaatiyaa uppanno. sammaasambuddho hi pa.thama.m kammunaa naro manusso hutvaa pacchaapi ariyaaya jaatiyaa uttamo devo devaatidevo ahosi, tasmaa ``naradevo''ti vuccati. puujito naradevena bhagavataa pasa.msaavasena uppanno mara.naabhibhuute loke uppanno hutvaa mara.naabhibhuu maccuhaayii. ^b^pu.n.dariika.mva toyena^eb^ udakena pu.n.dariika.m viya sa"nkhaaragate ta.nhaadi.t.thilepena na upalimpati, katthacipi anissitoti attho.

[03] ^b^yassaa^eb^ti yena. ^b^muhutte^eb^ti kha.namatte kaale. ^b^sahassadhaa^eb^ti sahassapakaaro. ^b^loko^eb^ti okaasaloko. aya~nhettha attho -- yena mahiddhikena aayasmataa mahaamoggallaanena sahassilokadhaatu kha.neneva sammadeva vidito, paccakkhato ~naato ^b^sabrahmakappo^eb^ mahaabrahmasadiso aavajjanaadivasiibhaavappattiyaa iddhisampadaaya cutuupapaate ca vasii. ^b^kaale passatii^eb^ti tadanuruupe kaale dibbena cakkhunaa devataa passatiiti.

[03] ^b^saariputtovaa^eb^tiaadikaa gaathaa aayasmataa mahaamoggallaanena attano gu.ne pakaasentena vuttaa. tattha ^b^saariputtovaa^eb^ti gaathaaya ^a^M2.0494^ea^ aya.m sa"nkhepattho -- ^b^pa~n~naaya^eb^ pa~n~naasampadaaya, ^b^siilena^eb^ siilasampattiyaa, ^b^upasamena^eb^ kilesavuupasamena, yo bhikkhu ^b^paara"ngato^eb^ paara.m pariyanta.m ukka.msa.m gato so saariputto saavakehi pa~n~naadiihi gu.nehi paramukka.msagato. pa~n~naaya siilena hi paramukka.msagato. ^b^etaavaparamo siyaa^eb^ etaparamo eva, natthi tato uttariiti. ima.m pana thero yathaa saariputto pa~n~naaya uttamo, tathaa aha.m samaadhinaa uttamoti diipetu.m avoca. tenevaaha ^b^``ko.tisatasahassassaa^eb^''tiaadi.

[03] tattha ^a^V2.0417^ea^ ^b^kha.nena nimmine^eb^ti kha.neneva ko.tisatasahassaattabhaava.m nimmineyya nimmitu.m samattho. tassa nimminane na mayha.m bhaaro atthi. ^b^vikubbanaasu kusalo, vasiibhuutomhi iddhiyaa^eb^ti na kevala.m manomayavikubbanaasu eva, sabbaayapi iddhiyaa vasiibhaavappatto amhi.

[03] ^b^samaadhivijjaavasipaaramiigato^eb^ti savitakkasavicaaraadisamaadhiisu ceva pubbenivaasa~naa.naadivijjaasu ca vasiibhaavena paarami.m ko.ti.m patto asi. tassa ta.nhaanissayaadirahitassa satthu saasane yathaavuttehi gu.nehi ukka.msagato. dhitisampannataaya ^b^dhiiro, moggallaanagotto^eb^ moggallaano, su.t.thu .thapitaindriyataaya ^b^samaahitindriyo,^eb^ yathaa hatthinaago puutilataabandhana.m sukheneva chindati, eva.m sakala.m kilesabandhana.m samucchindi evaati.

[03] ^b^kiidiso^eb^ ^a^P3.0172^ea^ ^b^nirayo aasii^eb^tiaadayo gaathaa ko.t.tha.m anupavisitvaa nikkhamitvaa .thitamaara.m tajjentena therena vuttaa. tattha ^b^kiidiso^eb^ti ki.mpakaaro. ^b^yattha dussii^eb^ti yasmi.m niraye ``dussii''ti eva.mnaamo maaro. ^b^apaccathaa^eb^ti nirayagginaa apacci. ^b^vidhura.m saavaka^eb^nti vidhura.m naama kakusandhassa bhagavato aggasaavaka.m. ^b^aasajjaa^eb^ti gha.t.tayitvaa baadhitvaa. ^b^kakusandha~nca braahma.na^eb^nti kakusandha~nca sammaasambuddha.m aasajjaati attho. bhagavanta.m uddissa kumaara.m aavisitvaa maarena khittaa sakkharaa therassa siise pati.

[03] ^b^sata.m aasi ayosa"nkuu^eb^ti tasmi.m kira niraye upapannaana.m tigaavuto attabhaavo hoti, dussiimaarassaapi taadisova ahosi. atha nirayapaalaa taalakkhandhappamaa.naana.m ayosuulaana.m aadittaana.m sampajjalitaana.m sajotibhuutaana.m satameva gahetvaa ``imasmi.mva te .thaane .thitena ^a^M2.0495^ea^ hadayena cintetvaa paapa.m kata''nti sudhaado.niya.m sudha.m ko.t.tentaa viya hadayamajjha.m ko.t.tetvaa pa.n.naasa janaa paadaabhimukhaa, pa.n.naasa janaa siisaabhimukhaa ko.t.tentaa gacchanti, eva.m gacchantaa ca pa~ncahi vassasatehi ubho ante patvaa puna nivattamaanaa pa~ncahi vassasatehi hadayamajjha.m upagacchanti, ta.m sandhaaya vutta.m ``sata.m aasi ayosa"nkuu''ti. ^b^sabbe paccattavedanaa^eb^ti sayameva paa.tiyekkavedanaajanakaa. saa kira vedanaa mahaanirayavedanaato dukkhataraa hoti, yathaa hi sinehapaanasattaahato parihaarasattaaha.m dukkhatara.m, eva.m mahaanirayadukkhato ussade vu.t.thaanavedanaa dukkhataraa. ^b^iidiso nirayo aasii^eb^ti imasmi.m .thaane devaduutasuttena (a0 ni0 3.36; ma0 ni0 3.261) nirayo diipetabbo.

[03] ^b^yo etamabhijaanaatii^eb^ti yo mahaabhi~n~no eta.m kammaphala~nca hatthatale .thapitaaamalaka.m viya abhimukha.m ^a^V2.0418^ea^ katvaa paccakkhato jaanaati. ^b^bhikkhu buddhassa saavako^eb^ti bhinnakileso bhikkhu sammaasambuddhassa saavako. ^b^ka.nha, dukkha.m nigacchasii^eb^ti ekantakaa.lakehi paapadhammehi samannaagatattaa, ka.nha maara, dukkha.m vindissasi.

[03] ^b^majjhesarasmi^eb^nti mahaasamuddassa majjhe kira udaka.m vatthu.m katvaa nibbattavimaanaani kappa.t.thitikaani honti. tenaaha ^b^``vimaanaa kappa.thaayino''^eb^ti. tesa.m ve.luriyassa viya va.n.no hoti, pabbatamatthake jalitana.laggikhandho viya ca etesa.m acciyo jotanti, tena te ativiya pabhassaraa pabhaasampannaa honti. tenaaha ^b^``ve.luriyava.n.naa ruciraa, accimanto pabhassaraa''^eb^ti. ^b^puthu^eb^ ^a^P3.0173^ea^ ^b^naanattava.n.niyo^eb^ti niilaadivasena naanattava.n.naa bahuu accharaa ^b^tattha^eb^ tesu vimaanesu naccanti.
[03] ^b^yo etamabhijaanaatii^eb^ti yo eta.m vimaana.m vatthu.m paccakkha.m katvaa jaanaati. aya~nhi attho vimaanapetavatthuuhi diipetabbo.

[03] ^b^buddhena codito^eb^ti sammaasambuddhena codito uyyojito. ^b^bhikkhusa"nghassa pekkhato^eb^ti mahato bhikkhusa"nghassa passantassa. ^b^migaaramaatupaasaada.m paada"ngu.t.thena kampayii^eb^ti (ma0 ni0 1.513) pubbaaraame visaakhaaya mahaaupaasikaaya kaarita.m sahassagabbhapa.tima.n.dita.m mahaapaasaada.m attano paada"ngu.t.thena kampesi.m. ekasmi~nhi samaye pubbaaraame yathaavuttapaasaade bhagavati ^a^M2.0496^ea^ viharante sambahulaa navakataraa bhikkhuu uparipaasaade nisinnaa satthaarampi acintetvaa tiracchaanakatha.m kathetumaaraddhaa, ta.m sutvaa bhagavaa te sa.mvejetvaa attano dhammadesanaaya bhaajanabhuute kaatukaamo aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaanatthera.m aamantesi -- ``passasi tva.m, moggallaana, nave bhikkhuu tiracchaanakathamanuyutte''ti. ta.m sutvaa thero satthu ajjhaasaya.m ~natvaa abhi~n~naapaadaka.m aapokasi.naaramma.na.m catutthajjhaana.m samaapajjitvaa vu.t.thaaya ``paasaadassa pati.t.thitokaasa.m udaka.m hotuu''ti adhi.t.thaaya paasaadamatthake thuupika.m paada"ngu.t.thena pahari, paasaado onamitvaa ekena passena a.t.thaasi. punapi pahari, aparena passena a.t.thaasi. te bhikkhuu bhiitaa sa.mviggaa paasaadassa patanabhayena tato nikkhamitvaa bhagavato samiipe a.t.tha.msu. satthaa tesa.m ajjhaasaya.m oloketvaa dhamma.m deseti. ta.m sutvaa tesu keci sotaapattiphale pati.t.thahi.msu, keci sakadaagaamiphale, keci anaagaamiphale, keci arahattaphale pati.t.thahi.msu. svaayamattho paasaadakampanasuttena diipetabbo.

[03] ^b^vejayantapaasaada^eb^nti so vejayantapaasaado taavati.msabhavane yojanasahassubbedho anekasahassaniyyuuhakuu.taagaarapa.tima.n.dito devaasurasa"ngaame asure jinitvaa sakke devaanaminde nagaramajjhe ^a^V2.0419^ea^ .thite u.t.thito vijayantena nibbattattaa ``vejayanto''ti laddhanaamo paasaado, ta.m sandhaayaaha ``vejayantapaasaada''nti. tampi hi aya.m thero paada"ngu.t.thena kampesi. ekasmi~nhi samaye bhagavanta.m pubbaaraame viharanta.m sakko devaraajaa upasa"nkamitvaa ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimutti.m pucchi. tassa bhagavaa vissajjeti. so ta.m sutvaa attamano pamudito abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa attano devalokameva gato. athaayasmaa mahaamoggallaano eva.m cintesi -- ``aya.m sakko bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa evaruupa.m gambhiira.m nibbaanapa.tisa.myutta.m pa~nha.m pucchi, bhagavataa ca pa~nho vissajjito, kinnu kho jaanitvaa gato, udaahu ajaanitvaa? ya.mnuunaaha.m ^a^P3.0174^ea^ devaloka.m gantvaa tamattha.m jaaneyya''nti. so taavadeva taavati.msabhavana.m gantvaa sakka.m devaanaminda.m tamattha.m pucchi. sakko dibbasampattiyaa pamatto hutvaa vikkhepa.m akaasi. thero tassa sa.mvegajananattha.m vejayantapaasaada.m paada"ngu.t.thena kampesi. tena vutta.m --
[03] aya.m panattho cuu.lata.nhaasa"nkhayavimuttisuttena (ma0 ni0 1.390 aadayo) diipetabbo. kampitaakaaro he.t.thaa vuttoyeva.

[03] ^b^sakka.m so paripucchatii^eb^ti yathaavuttameva therassa ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimuttipuccha.m sandhaaya vutta.m. tenaaha ^b^``api, aavuso, jaanaasi, ta.nhakkhayavimuttiyo^eb^''ti. ^b^tassa sakko viyaakaasii^eb^ti ida.m therena paasaadakampane kate sa.mviggahadayena pamaada.m pahaaya yoniso manasi karitvaa pa~nhassa byaakatabhaava.m sandhaaya vutta.m. satthaaraa desitaniyaameneva hi so tadaa kathesi. tenaaha ``pa~nha.m pu.t.tho yathaatatha''nti. tattha ^b^sakka.m so paripucchatii^eb^ti sakka.m devaraaja.m so moggallaanatthero satthaaraa desitaaya ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimuttiyaa sammadeva gahitabhaava.m pucchi. atiitatthe hi ida.m vattamaanavacana.m. ^b^api, aavuso, jaanaasii^eb^ti, aavuso, api jaanaasi, ki.m jaanaasi? ^b^ta.nhakkhayavimuttiyo^eb^ti yathaa ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimuttiyo satthaaraa tuyha.m desitaa, tathaa ki.m jaanaasiiti pucchi. ^b^ta.nhakkhayavimuttiyo^eb^ti vaa ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimuttisuttassa desana.m pucchati.

[03] ^b^brahmaana^eb^nti mahaabrahmaana.m. ^b^sudhammaaya.m .thito sabha^eb^nti sudhammaaya sabhaaya. aya.m pana brahmaloke sudhammasabhaava, na taavati.msabhavane, sudhammasabhaavirahito devaloko naama natthi. ^b^ajjaapi tyaavuso, saa di.t.thi, yaa te di.t.thi pure ahuu^eb^ti ima.m brahmaloka.m upagantu.m samattho natthi koci ^a^V2.0420^ea^ sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa, satthu idhaagamanato pubbe yaa tuyha.m di.t.thi ahosi, ki.m ajjaapi idaanipi saa di.t.thi na vigataati? ^b^passasi viitivattanta.m, brahmaloke pabhassara^eb^nti brahmaloke viitipatanta.m mahaakappinamahaakassapaadiihi saavakehi parivaaritassa tejodhaatu.m samaapajjitvaa nisinnassa sasaavakassa bhagavato obhaasa.m passasiiti attho. ekasmi~nhi samaye bhagavaa brahmaloke sudhammaaya sabhaaya sannipatitvaa sannisinnassa -- ``atthi nu kho koci sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa eva.mmahiddhiko, yo idha aagantu.m sakku.neyyaa''ti cintentassa brahmuno ^a^M2.0498^ea^ cittama~n~naaya tattha gantvaa brahmuno matthake aakaase nisinno tejodhaatu.m samaapajjitvaa obhaasa.m mu~ncanto mahaamoggallaanaadiina.m aagamana.m cintesi. saha cintanena tepi tattha gantvaa satthaara.m vanditvaa satthu ajjhaasaya.m ~natvaa tejodhaatu.m ^a^P3.0175^ea^ samaapajjitvaa paccekadisaasu nisiiditvaa obhaasa.m vissajjitvaa sakalabrahmaloko ekobhaaso ahosi. satthaa brahmuno kallacittata.m ~natvaa catusaccapakaasana.m dhamma.m desesi. desanaapariyosaane anekaani brahmasahassaani maggaphalesu pati.t.thahi.msu, ta.m sandhaaya codento ^b^``ajjaapi tyaavuso, saa di.t.thii''^eb^ti gaathamaaha. aya.m panattho bakabrahmasuttena diipetabbo. vutta~nheta.m (sa.m0 ni0 1.176) --

[02] ``eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa brahmuno evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m hoti -- `natthi so sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa, yo idha aagaccheyyaa'ti. atha kho bhagavaa tassa brahmuno cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva jetavane antarahito tasmi.m brahmaloke paaturahosi. atha kho bhagavaa tassa brahmuno upari vehaasa.m palla"nkena nisiidi tejodhaatu.m samaapajjitvaa.

[02] ``atha kho aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa etadahosi -- `kaha.m nu kho bhagavaa etarahi viharatii'ti? addasaa kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhagavanta.m dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena tassa brahmuno uparivehaasa.m palla"nkena nisinna.m tejodhaatu.m samaapanna.m. disvaana seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva jetavane antarahito tasmi.m brahmaloke paaturahosi. atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano puratthima.m disa.m nissaaya tassa brahmuno ^a^M2.0499^ea^ uparivehaasa.m palla"nkena nisiidi tejodhaatu.m samaapajjitvaa niicatara.m bhagavato.

[02] ``atha ^a^V2.0421^ea^ kho aayasmato mahaakassapassa etadahosi -- `kaha.m nu kho bhagavaa etarahi viharatii'ti? addasaa kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo bhagavanta.m dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena tassa brahmuno uparivehaasa.m palla"nkena nisinna.m tejodhaatu.m samaapanna.m. disvaana seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso...pe0... evameva jetavane antarahito tasmi.m brahmaloke paaturahosi. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo dakkhi.na.m disa.m nissaaya tassa brahmuno uparivehaasa.m palla"nkena nisiidi tejodhaatu.m samaapajjitvaa niicatara.m bhagavato.

[02] ``atha kho aayasmato mahaakappinassa etadahosi -- `kaha.m nu kho bhagavaa etarahi viharatii'ti? addasaa kho aayasmaa mahaakappino bhagavanta.m dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena tassa brahmuno uparivehaasa.m palla"nkena nisinna.m tejodhaatu.m samaapanna.m. disvaana seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso...pe0... evameva jetavane antarahito tasmi.m brahmaloke paaturahosi. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakappino pacchima.m disa.m nissaaya tassa brahmuno. uparivehaasa.m palla"nkena nisiidi tejodhaatu.m samaapajjitvaa niicatara.m bhagavato.

[02] ``atha kho aayasmato anuruddhassa etadahosi -- `kaha.m nu kho bhagavaa etarahi viharatii'ti? addasaa kho aayasmaa anuruddho bhagavanta.m dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena tassa brahmuno uparivehaasa.m palla"nkena nisinna.m tejodhaatu.m samaapanna.m. disvaana seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso...pe0... evameva jetavane antarahito tasmi.m brahmaloke paaturahosi ^a^P3.0176^ea^. atha kho aayasmaa anuruddho uttara.m disa.m nissaaya tassa brahmuno uparivehaasa.m palla"nkena nisiidi tejodhaatu.m samaapajjitvaa niicatara.m bhagavato. atha ^a^M2.0500^ea^ kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ta.m brahmaana.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``ajjaapi te aavuso saa di.t.thi, yaa te di.t.thi pure ahu.
[21] ``na me maarisa saa di.t.thi, yaa me di.t.thi pure ahu.
[22] svaaha.m ajja katha.m vajja.m, aha.m niccomhi sassato''ti..

[02] ``atha kho bhagavaa ta.m brahmaana.m sa.mvejetvaa seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso...pe0... ^a^V2.0422^ea^ evameva tasmi.m brahmaloke antarahito jetavane paaturahosi. atha kho so brahmaa a~n~natara.m brahmapaarisajja.m aamantesi -- `ehi tva.m, maarisa, yenaayasmaa mahaamoggallaano tenupasa"nkama, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m eva.m vadehi `atthi nu kho maarisa moggallaana, a~n~nepi tassa bhagavato saavakaa eva.mmahiddhikaa eva.mmahaanubhaavaa seyyathaapi bhava.m moggallaano, kassapo, kappino, anuruddho'''ti. ``eva.m, maarisaa''ti kho so brahmapaarisajjo tassa brahmuno pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa mahaamoggallaano tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m etadavoca -- ``atthi nu kho, maarisa moggallaana, a~n~nepi tassa bhagavato saavakaa eva.mmahiddhikaa eva.mmahaanubhaavaa seyyathaapi bhava.m moggallaano, kassapo, kappino, anuruddho''ti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ta.m brahmapaarisajja.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --

[02] ``atha kho so brahmapaarisajjo aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa yena so brahmaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m brahmaana.m etadavoca -- aayasmaa, maarisa mahaamoggallaano evamaaha --
[02] ``idamavoca so brahmapaarisajjo. attamano ca so brahmaa tassa brahmapaarisajjassa bhaasita.m abhinandii''ti.
[03] ida.m sandhaaya vutta.m ``aya.m panattho bakabrahmasuttena diipetabbo''ti.

[03] ^b^mahaaneruno kuu.ta^eb^nti kuu.tasiisena sakalameva sinerupabbataraaja.m vadati. ^b^vimokkhena aphassayii^eb^ti jhaanavimokkhanissayena abhi~n~naa.nena phassayiiti adhippaayo. ^b^vana^eb^nti jambudiipa.m. so hi vanabahulataaya ``vana''nti vutto. tenaaha ``jambusa.n.dassa issaro''ti. ^b^pubbavidehaana^eb^nti pubbavideha.t.thaana.m, pubbavidehanti attho. ^b^ye ca bhuumisayaa naraa^eb^ti bhuumisayaa naraa naama ^a^P3.0177^ea^ aparagoyaanakaa ca uttarakurukaa ca manussaa. te hi gehaabhaavato ``bhuumisayaa''ti vuttaa. tepi sabbe aphassayiiti sambandho. aya.m panattho nandopanandadamanena (visuddhi0 2.396 nandopanandanaagadamanakathaa) diipetabbo --

[03] ``ekasmi.m ^a^V2.0423^ea^ kira samaye anaathapi.n.diko gahapati bhagavato dhammadesana.m sutvaa `sve, bhante, pa~ncahi bhikkhusatehi saddhi.m mayha.m gehe bhikkha.m ga.nhathaa'ti nimantetvaa pakkaami. ta.mdivasa~nca bhagavato paccuusasamaye dasasahassilokadhaatu.m olokentassa ^b^nandopanando^eb^ naama naagaraajaa ~naa.namukhe aapaatha.m aagacchi. bhagavaa `aya.m naagaraajaa mayha.m ~naa.namukhe aapaatha.m aagacchati, ki.m nu kho bhavissatii'ti aavajjento sara.nagamanassa upanissaya.m disvaa `aya.m micchaadi.t.thiko tiisu ratanesu appasanno, ko nu kho ima.m micchaadi.t.thito vimoceyyaa'ti aavajjento mahaamoggallaanatthera.m addasa.

[03] ``tato pabhaataaya rattiyaa sariirapa.tijaggana.m katvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- `aananda, pa~ncanna.m bhikkhusataana.m aarocehi tathaagato devacaarika.m gacchatii'ti. ta.mdivasa~nca nandopanandassa aapaanabhuumi.m sajjayi.msu. so dibbaratanapalla"nke dibbena setacchattena dhaariyamaano tividhanaa.takehi ceva naagaparisaaya ca parivuto dibbabhaajanesu upa.t.thaapita.m annapaanavidhi.m ^a^M2.0502^ea^ olokayamaano nisinno hoti. atha kho bhagavaa yathaa naagaraajaa passati, tathaa katvaa tassa vimaanamatthakeneva pa~ncahi bhikkhusatehi saddhi.m taavati.msadevalokaabhimukho paayaasi.

[03] ``tena kho pana samayena nandopanandassa naagaraajassa evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m hoti -- `ime hi naama mu.n.dakaa sama.nakaa amhaaka.m uparibhavanena devaana.m taavati.msaana.m bhavana.m pavisantipi nikkhamantipi, na idaani ito pa.t.thaaya imesa.m amhaaka.m matthake paadapa.msu.m okirantaana.m gantu.m dassaamii'ti u.t.thaaya sinerupaada.m gantvaa ta.m attabhaava.m vijahitvaa sineru.m sattakkhattu.m bhogehi parikkhipitvaa upari pha.na.m katvaa taavati.msabhavana.m avakujjena pha.nena pa.tiggahetvaa adassana.m gamesi.

[03] ``atha kho aayasmaa ra.t.thapaalo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- `pubbe, bhante, imasmi.m padese .thito sineru.m passaami, sineruparibha.n.da.m passaami, taavati.msa.m passaami, vejayanta.m passaami, vejayantassa paasaadassa upari dhaja.m passaami. ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, ya.m etarahi neva sineru.m passaami...pe0... na vejayantassa paasaadassa upari dhaja.m passaamii'ti? aya.m, ra.t.thapaala, nandopanando naama naagaraajaa tumhaaka.m kupito sineru.m sattakkhattu.m bhogehi parikkhipitvaa upari pha.nena pa.ticchaadetvaa andhakaara.m katvaa .thitoti. `damemi ^a^P3.0178^ea^ na.m, bhante'ti. na bhagavaa na.m anujaani. atha kho aayasmaa bhaddiyo aayasmaa raahuloti anukkamena sabbepi bhikkhuu u.t.thahi.msu. na bhagavaa anujaani.

[03] ``avasaane ^a^V2.0424^ea^ mahaamoggallaanatthero `aha.m, bhante, damemi na'nti aaha. `damehi, moggallaanaa'ti bhagavaa anujaani. thero attabhaava.m vijahitvaa mahanta.m naagaraajava.n.na.m abhinimminitvaa nandopananda.m cuddasakkhattu.m bhogehi parikkhipitvaa tassa pha.nassa matthake attano pha.na.m .thapetvaa sinerunaa saddhi.m abhinippii.lesi. naagaraajaa dhuumaayi. thero `na tuyha.myeva sariire dhuumo atthi, mayhampi atthii'ti dhuumaayi. naagaraajassa dhuumo thera.m na baadhati. therassa pana dhuumo naagaraaja.m baadhati. tato naagaraajaa pajjali. theropi `na tuyha.myeva sariire aggi atthi, mayhampi atthii'ti pajjali. naagaraajassa tejo thera.m na baadhati, therassa pana tejo naagaraaja.m baadhati. naagaraajaa `aya.m ma.m sinerunaa abhinippii.letvaa dhuumaayati ceva ^a^M2.0503^ea^ pajjalati caa'ti cintetvaa, `bho, tuva.m kosii'ti pa.tipucchi. aha.m kho, nanda, moggallaanoti. bhante, attano bhikkhubhaavena ti.t.thaahii''ti.

[03] ``thero ta.m attabhaava.m vijahitvaa tassa dakkhi.naka.n.nasotena pavisitvaa vaamaka.n.nasotena nikkhami, vaamaka.n.nasotena pavisitvaa dakkhi.naka.n.nasotena nikkhami. tathaa dakkhi.nanaasasotena pavisitvaa vaamanaasasotena nikkhami, vaamanaasasotena pavisitvaa dakkhi.nanaasasotena nikkhami. tato naagaraajaa mukha.m vivari. thero mukhena pavisitvaa antokucchiya.m paaciinena ca pacchimena ca ca"nkamati. bhagavaa `moggallaana, manasi karohi mahiddhiko naago'ti aaha. thero `mayha.m kho, bhante, cattaaro iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa, ti.t.thatu, bhante, nandopanando, aha.m nandopanandasadisaana.m naagaraajaana.m satampi sahassampi satasahassampi dameyya'nti aaha.

[03] ``naagaraajaa cintesi -- `pavisanto taava me na di.t.tho, nikkhamanakaale daani na.m daa.thaantare pakkhipitvaa sa"nkhaadissaamii'ti cintetvaa `nikkhamatha, bhante, maa ma.m antokucchiya.m aparaapara.m ca"nkamanto baadhayitthaa'ti aaha. thero nikkhamitvaa bahi a.t.thaasi. naagaraajaa `aya.m so'ti disvaa naasavaata.m vissajji. thero catutthajjhaana.m samaapajji, lomakuupampissa vaato caaletu.m naasakkhi. `avasesaa bhikkhuu kira aadito pa.t.thaaya sabbapaa.tihaariyaani kaatu.m sakku.neyyu.m, ima.m pana .thaana.m patvaa eva.m khippanisantino hutvaa samaapajjitu.m naasakkhissantii'ti nesa.m bhagavaa naagaraajadamana.m naanujaani.

[03] ``naagaraajaa ^a^P3.0179^ea^ `aha.m imassa sama.nassa naasavaatena lomakuupampi caaletu.m naasakkhi.m, mahiddhiko so sama.no'ti cintesi. thero attabhaava.m vijahitvaa supa.n.naruupa.m nimminitvaa supa.n.navaata.m ^a^V2.0425^ea^ dassento naagaraajaana.m anubandhi, naagaraajaa ta.m attabhaava.m vijahitvaa maa.navakava.n.na.m abhinimminitvaa, `bhante, tumhaaka.m sara.na.m gacchaamii'ti vadanto therassa paade vandi. thero `satthaa, nando aagato, ehi tva.m, gamissaamaa'ti naagaraajaana.m dametvaa nibbisa.m katvaa, gahetvaa bhagavato ^a^M2.0504^ea^ santika.m agamaasi. naagaraajaa bhagavanta.m vanditvaa `bhante, tumhaaka.m sara.na.m gacchaamii'ti aaha. bhagavaa `sukhii hohi, naagaraajaa'ti vatvaa bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto anaathapi.n.dikassa nivesana.m agamaasi.

[03] ``anaathapi.n.diko `ki.m, bhante, atidivaa aagatatthaa'ti aaha. moggallaanassa ca nandopanandassa ca sa"ngaamo ahosiiti. kassa pana, bhante, jayo, kassa paraajayoti? moggallaanassa jayo, nandassa paraajayoti. anaathapi.n.diko `adhivaasetu me, bhante, bhagavaa sattaaha.m ekapa.tipaa.tiyaa bhatta.m, sattaaha.m therassa sakkaara.m karissaamii'ti vatvaa sattaaha.m buddhappamukhaana.m pa~ncanna.m bhikkhusataana.m mahaasakkaara.m akaasi. tena vutta.m -- `nandopanandadamanena diipetabbo'''ti.
[03] ^b^yo etamabhijaanaatii^eb^ti eta.m yathaavutta.m vimokkha.m phusanakara.navasena jaanaati.

[03] ^b^na ve aggi cetayati, aha.m baala.m .dahaamii^eb^ti eva.m na aggi abhisa.mceteti, naapi .dahanaaya payoga.m parakkama.m karoti, baalo eva pana ``aya.m mandaagatii''ti anijalanta.m viya jalita.m aggi.m aasajja na.m pa.dayhati, evameva, maara, na maya.m .dahitukaamaa, baadhetukaamaa, tva~n~neva pana tathaa aagamanaadiatthena tathaagata.m aggikhandhasadisa.m ariyasaavaka.m aasajja attaana.m .dahissasi, .dahadukkhato na mu~ncissasi.
[03] ^b^apu~n~na.m pasavii^eb^ti apu~n~na.m pa.tilabhati. ^b^na me paapa.m vipaccatii^eb^ti mama paapa.m na vipaccati, ki.m nu, maara, eva.m ma~n~nasi nayidamatthi.

[03] ^b^karoto te ciiyate paapa^eb^nti eka.msena karontassa te paapa.m cirarattaaya cirakaala.m anatthaaya dukkhaaya upaciiyati. ^b^maara, nibbinda buddhamhaa^eb^ti catusaccabuddhato buddhasaavakato nibbinda nibbijja parato kamma.m. ^b^aasa.m maakaasi bhikkhusuu^eb^ti ``bhikkhuu virodhemi vihesemii''ti eta.m aasa.m maakaasi.

[03] ^b^itii^eb^ti eva.m. ^b^maara.m atajjesii^eb^ti, ``maara, nibbinda...pe0... bhikkhusuu''ti aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano. ^b^bhesaka.laavane^eb^ti ^a^P3.0180^ea^ eva.mnaamake ara~n~ne. ^b^tato^eb^ti ^a^M2.0505^ea^ tajjanahetu. ^b^so dummano yakkho^eb^ti ^a^V2.0426^ea^ so maaro domanassiko hutvaa tattheva tasmi.myeva .thaane antaradhaayi, adassana.m agamaasi. aya~nca gaathaa dhammasa"ngaayanakaale .thapitaa. ya.m panettha antarantaraa atthato na vibhatta.m, ta.m he.t.thaa vuttanayattaa uttaanameva.

[03] evamaya.m mahaathero maara.m tajjetvaa devacaarikaanarakacaarikaadivasena a~n~nehi saavakehi asaadhaara.na.m sattuupakaara.m katvaa aayupariyosaane parinibbaayi. parinibbaayanto ca anomadassissa bhagavato paadamuule pa.nidhaana.m katvaa tato pa.t.thaaya tattha tattha bhave u.laaraani pu~n~naani katvaa saavakapaaramiyaa matthake .thitopi antaraa katassa paapakammassa vasena u.t.thitaaya kammapilotikaaya titthiyehi uyyojitehi corehi baadhito anappaka.m sariirakheda.m katvaa parinibbaayi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.1.375, 380-397) --
[22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
[21] ``asmimaana.m ^a^M2.0507^ea^ na passaami, maano mayha.m na vijjati.

[03] sattatinipaate ^a^M2.0508^ea^ ^a^V2.0428^ea^ ^b^nikkhanta.m vata ma.m santa^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato va"ngiisattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiinagare mahaabhogakule nibbatto, purimanayeneva vihaara.m gantvaa dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m pa.tibhaanavantaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa satthu adhikaarakamma.m katvaa -- ``ahampi anaagate pa.tibhaanavantaana.m aggo bhaveyya''nti patthana.m katvaa, satthaaraa byaakato yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^va"ngiiso^eb^ti laddhanaamo tayo bede ugga.nhanto aacariya.m aaraadhetvaa, chavasiisamanta.m naama sikkhitvaa chavasiisa.m nakhena aako.tetvaa ``aya.m satto asukayoniya.m nibbatto''ti jaanaati.

[03] braahma.naa ``aya.m amhaaka.m jiivitamaggo''ti ~natvaa va"ngiisa.m gahetvaa pa.ticchannayaane nisiidaapetvaa gaamanigamaraajadhaaniyo vicaranti. va"ngiisopi tivassamatthake mataanampi siisa.m aaharaapetvaa nakhena aako.tetvaa ``aya.m ^a^P3.0181^ea^ satto asukayoniya.m nibbatto''ti vatvaa mahaajanassa ka"nkhacchedanattha.m te te jane aavaahetvaa attano attano gati.m kathaapeti. tena tasmi.m mahaajano abhippasiidati. so ta.m nissaaya mahaajanassa hatthato satampi sahassampi labhatiiti. braahma.naa va"ngiisamaadaaya yathaaruci.m vicaritvaa puna saavatthi.m agama.msu. va"ngiiso satthu gu.ne sutvaa satthaara.m upasa"nkamitukaamo ahosi. braahma.naa ``sama.no gotamo maayaaya ta.m aava.t.tessatii''ti pa.tikkhipi.msu. va"ngiiso tesa.m vacana.m anaadiyitvaa satthu santika.m gantvaa madhurapa.tisanthaara.m katvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.

[03] ta.m satthaa pucchi -- ``va"ngiisa, ki~nci sippa.m jaanaasii''ti? ``aama, bho gotama, chavasiisamanta.m naama jaanaami. tena tivassamatthake mataanampi siisa.m nakhena aako.tetvaa nibbatta.t.thaana.m jaanaamii''ti. satthaa tassa eka.m niraye nibbattassa ^a^M2.0509^ea^ siisa.m dassesi, eka.m manussesu ^a^V2.0429^ea^, eka.m devesu, eka.m parinibbutassa siisa.m dassesi. so pa.thama.m siisa.m aako.tetvaa, ``bho gotama, aya.m satto niraye nibbatto''ti aaha. ``saadhu, va"ngiisa, su.t.thu tayaa di.t.tha.m. aya.m satto kuhi.m nibbatto''ti pucchi. ``manussaloke''ti. ``aya.m kuhi''nti? ``devaloke''ti ti.n.nannampi nibbatta.t.thaana.m kathesi. parinibbutassa pana siisa.m nakhena aako.tento neva anta.m na ko.ti.m passi. atha na.m satthaa ``na sakkosi va"ngiisaa''ti pucchi. ``upaparikkhaami taavaa''ti punappuna.m parivattetvaa aako.tentopi baahirakamantena khii.naasavassa gati.m katha.m jaanissati, athassa matthakato sedo mucci. so lajjitvaa tu.nhiibhuuto a.t.thaasi. atha na.m satthaa -- ``kilamasi, va"ngiisaa''ti aaha. ``aama, bho gotama, imassa uppanna.t.thaana.m jaanitu.m na sakkomi, sace tumhe jaanaatha, kathethaa''ti. ``va"ngiisa, aha.m etampi jaanaami, ito uttaritarampi jaanaamii''ti vatvaa --
[22] asatta.m sugata.m buddha.m, tamaha.m bruumi braahma.na.m..
[22] khii.naasava.m arahanta.m, tamaha.m bruumi braahma.na''nti.. (dha0 pa0 419-420; su0 ni0 648-649) --

[25] imaa dve gaathaa abhaasi. va"ngiiso ``tena hi, bho gotama, ta.m vijja.m me dethaa''ti apaciti.m dassetvaa satthu santike nisiidi. satthaa ``amhehi samaanali"ngassa demaa''ti aaha. va"ngiiso ``ya.mki~nci katvaa mayaa ima.m manta.m gahetu.m va.t.tatii''ti braahma.ne aaha -- ``tumhe mayi pabbajante maa cintayittha, aha.m manta.m ugga.nhitvaa sakalajambudiipe je.t.thako bhavissaami, tumhaakampi ^a^P3.0182^ea^ tena bhaddakameva bhavissatii''ti mantatthaaya satthusantika.m upasa"nkamitvaa pabbajja.m yaaci. tadaa ca thero nigrodhakappo bhagavato santike .thito hoti, ta.m bhagavaa aa.naapesi -- ``nigrodhakappa, ima.m pabbaajehii''ti. so satthu aa.naaya ta.m pabbaajesi. athassa satthaa ``mantaparivaara.m taava ugga.nhaahii''ti dvatti.msaakaarakamma.t.thaana.m vipassanaakamma.t.thaana~nca aacikkhi. so dvatti.msaakaara.m sajjhaayantova vipassana.m pa.t.thapesi. braahma.naa va"ngiisa.m upasa"nkamitvaa ``ki.m, bho va"ngiisa, sama.nasma gotamassa santike sippa.m sikkhita''nti ^a^M2.0510^ea^ pucchi.msu. ``ki.m sippasikkhanena, gacchatha tumhe, na mayha.m tumhehi kattabbakicca''nti. braahma.naa ``tvampi daani sama.nassa gotamassa vasa.m aapanno, maayaaya aava.t.tito, ki.m maya.m tava santike karissaamaa''ti aagatamaggeneva pakkami.msu. va"ngiisatthero vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m sacchaakaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.55.96-142) --
[22] devaa naro vaa brahmaa vaa, pa.tivattaa na vijjati..
[22] namo te sabbalokagga, namo te abhaya.m kara..
[22] namo te santisukhada, namo te sara.na.m kara..
[22] yo so buddha.m abhojesi, sattaaha.m sahasaavaka.m..
[22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
[22] va"ngiiso naama naamena, hessati satthu saavako..
[21] ``ta.m sutvaa mudito hutvaa, yaavajiiva.m tadaa jina.m.
[21] ``pacchime ^a^M2.0512^ea^ ca bhave daani, jaato vippakule aha.m.
[22] va"ngiiso iti me naama.m, abhavii lokasammata.m..
[22] tadaa so pa.n.dito viiro, uttari.m samavoca me..
[22] mamaaha vadata.m se.t.tho, kacci va"ngiisa jaanaasi..
[22] tena hi daani va"ngiisa, .thaanaso santhavaahi ma.m..
[22] .thaanaso me tadaa tu.t.tho, jino agge .thapesi ma.m..
[22] yathaaya.m bhikkhu va"ngiiso, eva.m dhaaretha bhikkhavo..
[21] ``satasahasse kata.m kamma.m, phala.m dassesi me idha.
[22] tisso vijjaa anuppattaa, kata.m buddhassa saasana.m..

[03] arahaa ^a^V2.0433^ea^ pana hutvaa thero satthu santika.m gacchanto cakkhupathato pa.t.thaaya candena, suuriyena, aakaasena, mahaasamuddena, sinerunaa pabbataraajena, siihena migara~n~naa, hatthinaagenaati tena tena saddhi.m upamento anekehi padasatehi satthaara.m va.n.nentova upagacchati. tena ta.m satthaa sa"nghamajjhe nisinno pa.tibhaanavantaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesi. atha therena arahattappattito pubbe ca pacchaa ca ta.m ta.m citta.m aagamma bhaasitaa. thera.m uddissa aanandattheraadiihi bhaasitaa ca --
[22] neva ma.m byaadhayissanti, dhamme samhi pati.t.thito..
[22] nibbaanagamana.m magga.m, tattha me nirato mano..
[22] tathaa maccu karissaami, na me maggampi dakkhasi..
[22] vanatha.m na kareyya kuhi~nci, nibbanatho avanatho sa bhikkhu..
[22] parijiiyati sabbamanicca.m, eva.m samecca caranti mutattaa..
[21] ``upadhiisu janaa gadhitaase, di.t.thasute pa.tighe ca mute ca.
[22] ettha vinodaya chandamanejo, yo hettha na limpati muni tamaahu..
[22] na ca vaggagatassa kuhi~nci, no pana du.t.thullagaahii sa bhikkhu..
[22] santa.m pada.m ajjhagamaa muni, pa.ticca parinibbuto ka"nkhati kaala.m..
[22] socanti janaa ciraratta.m, maanahataa niraya.m upapannaa..
[21] ``na ^a^V2.0434^ea^ hi socati bhikkhu kadaaci, maggajino sammaa pa.tipanno.
[21] ``tasmaa ^a^P3.0184^ea^ akhilo idha padhaanavaa, niivara.naani pahaaya visuddho.
[22] pare ca na vihi.mseyya, saa ve vaacaa subhaasitaa..
[22] ya.m anaadaaya paapaani, paresa.m bhaasate piya.m..
[21] ``sacca.m ve amataa vaacaa, esa dhammo sanantano.
[22] sacce atthe ca dhamme ca, aahu santo pati.t.thitaa..
[22] saavako te mahaaviira, paade vandati va"ngiso..
[22] ta.m passatha bandhapamu~nca kara.m, asita.mva bhaagaso pavibhajja..
[22] ~natvaa ca sacchikatvaa ca, agga.m so desayi dasaddhaana.m..
[21] ``eva.m sudesite dhamme, ko pamaado vijaanata.m dhamma.m.
[22] tasmaa hi tassa bhagavato saasane, appamatto sadaa namassamanusikkhe..
[21] ``cando yathaa vigatavalaahake nabhe, virocati viitamalova bhaa.numaa.
[22] evampi a"ngiirasa tva.m mahaamuni, atirocasi yasasaa sabbaloka.m..
[21] ``kaaveyyamattaa vicarimha pubbe, gaamaa gaama.m puraa pura.m.
[22] dhamma.m sutvaa pasiidimha, saddhaa no udapajjatha..
[21] ``evamete ^a^M2.0519^ea^ tathaa vuttaa, di.t.thaa me te yathaa tathaa.
[22] sadattho me anuppatto, kata.m buddhassa saasana.m..
[21] ``svaagata.m vata me aasi, mama buddhassa santike.
[21] ``pucchaami ^a^P3.0187^ea^ satthaaramanomapa~n~na.m, di.t.theva dhamme yo vicikicchaana.m chettaa.
[21] ``nigrodhakappo iti tassa naama.m, tayaa kata.m bhagavaa braahma.nassa.
[22] so ta.m namassa.m acari mutyapekho, aaraddhaviiriyo da.lhadhammadassii..
[21] ``ta.m ^a^V2.0437^ea^ saavaka.m sakka mayampi sabbe, a~n~naatumicchaama samantacakkhu.
[22] samava.t.thitaa no savanaaya sotaa, tuva.m no satthaa tvamanuttarosi..
[21] ``chinda no vicikiccha.m bruuhi meta.m, parinibbuta.m vedaya bhuuripa~n~na.
[22] majjheva no bhaasa samantacakkhu, sakkova devaana sahassanetto..
[21] ``ye keci ganthaa idha mohamaggaa, a~n~naa.napakkhaa vicikiccha.thaanaa.
[22] tathaagata.m patvaa na te bhavanti, cakkhu~nhi eta.m parama.m naraana.m..
[21] ``no ^a^M2.0520^ea^ ce hi jaatu puriso kilese, vaato yathaa abbhaghana.m vihaane.
[22] tamovassa nivuto sabbaloko, jotimantopi na pabhaaseyyu.m..
[21] ``dhiiraa ca pajjotakaraa bhavanti, ta.m ta.m aha.m viira tatheva ma~n~ne.
[22] vipassina.m jaanamupaagamimha, parisaasu no aavikarohi kappa.m..
[21] ``khippa.m gira.m eraya vaggu vaggu.m, ha.msova paggayha sa.nika.m nikuuja.
[22] bindussarena suvikappitena, sabbeva te ujjugataa su.noma..
[22] na kaamakaaro hi puthujjanaana.m, sa"nkheyyakaaro ca tathaagataana.m..
[22] ayama~njali pacchimo suppa.naamito, maa mohayii jaanamanomapa~n~na..
[22] vaari.m yathaa ghammani ghammatatto, vaacaabhika"nkhaami suta.m pavassa..
[22] nibbaayi so aadu saupaadiseso, yathaa vimutto ahu ta.m su.noma..
[22] ataari jaati.m mara.na.m asesa.m, iccabravi bhagavaa pa~ncase.t.tho..
[22] amogha.m kira me pu.t.tha.m, na ma.m va~ncesi braahma.no..
[21] ``yathaa vaadii tathaa kaarii, ahu buddhassa saavako.
[22] acchecchi maccuno jaala.m, tata.m maayaavino da.lha.m..

[25] imaa gaathaa sa"ngiitikaale ekajjha.m katvaa sa"ngaha.m aaropitaa. tattha ``nikkhanta.m vata ma.m santa''ntiaadayo pa~nca gaathaa aayasmaa va"ngiiso navo acirapabbajito hutvaa vihaara.m upagataa ala"nkatapa.tiyattaa sambahulaa itthiyo disvaa uppannaraago ta.m vinodento abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^nikkhanta.m vata ma.m santa.m, agaarasmaanagaariya^eb^nti agaarato nikkhanta.m anagaariya.m pabbajita.m ma.m samaana.m. ^b^vitakkaa^eb^ti kaamavitakkaadayo paapavitakkaa. ^b^upadhaavantii^eb^ti mama citta.m upagacchanti. ^b^pagabbhaa^eb^ti paagabbhiyayuttaa vasino. ``aya.m gehato nikkhamitvaa pabbajito, nayima.m anuddha.msitu.m yutta''nti eva.m aparihaarato nillajjaa. ^b^ka.nhato^eb^ti ^a^P3.0189^ea^ kaa.lato, laamakabhaavatoti attho. ^b^ime^eb^ti tesa.m attano paccakkhataa vuttaa.

[03] asuddhajiivino parivaarayuttaa manussaa uggakiccataaya ``uggaa''ti vuccanti, tesa.m puttaa ^b^uggaputtaa. mahissaasaa^eb^ti mahaaissaasaa. ^b^sikkhitaa^eb^ti dvaadasa vassaani aacariyakule uggahitasippaa. ^b^da.lhadhammino^eb^ti, da.lhadhanuno ^a^M2.0522^ea^. da.lhadhanu naama dvisahassathaama.m vuccati. dvisahassathaamanti, ca yassa aaropitassa jiyaaya bandho lohasiisaadiina.m bhaaro da.n.de gahetvaa yaava ka.n.dapamaa.naa nabha.m ukkhittassa pathavito muccati. ^b^samantaa parikireyyu^eb^nti samantato ka.n.de khipeyyu.m. kittakaati ce aaha ^b^``sahassa.m apalaayina''^eb^nti. yuddhe apara.m mukhaana.m sahassamattaana.m. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- sikkhitaa katahatthaa uggaa da.lhadhanuno mahissaasaa uggaputtaa sahassamattaa kadaacipi yuddhe paraajaya.m apattaa appamattaa samantato .thatvaa thambha.m upanissaaya sacepi vasseyyu.m. taadisehipi issaasasahassehi samantaa sare parikiriiyante susikkhito puriso da.n.da.m gahetvaa sabbe sare attano sariire apatamaane katvaa paadamuule paateyya. tattha ekopi issaaso dve sare ekato khipanto naama natthi. itthiyo pana ruupaaramma.naadivasena pa~nca pa~nca sare ekato khipanti, eva.m khipantiyo. ^b^ettakaa bhiyyo^eb^ti imaahi itthiihi bhiyyopi bahuu itthiyo attano itthikuttahaasabhaavaadito vidha.msenti.

[03] ^b^sakkhii hi me suta.m eta^eb^nti sammukhaa mayaa eta.m suta.m. ^b^nibbaanagamana.m magga^eb^nti li"ngavipallaasena vutta.m, nibbaanagaamimaggoti attho, vipassana.m sandhaayaaha. ^b^tattha me nirato mano^eb^ti tasmi.m vipassanaamagge mayha.m citta.m nirata.m.

[03] ^b^eva~nce^eb^ ^a^V2.0439^ea^ ^b^ma.m viharanta^eb^nti eva.m aniccaasubhajjhaanabhaavanaaya ca vipassanaabhaavanaaya ca viharanta.m ma.m. ^b^paapimaa^eb^ti kilesamaara.m aalapati. ^b^tathaa maccu karissaami, na me maggampi dakkhasii^eb^ti mayaa kata.m maggampi yathaa na passasi, tathaa maccu anta.m karissaamiiti yojanaa.

[03] ^b^arati~ncaa^eb^tiaadikaa pa~nca gaathaa attano santaane uppanne aratiaadike vinodentena vuttaa. tattha ^b^arati^eb^nti adhikusalesu dhammesu pantasenaasanesu ca ukka.n.thana.m. ^b^rati^eb^nti pa~ncakaamagu.narati.m. ^b^pahaayaa^eb^ti pajahitvaa. ^b^sabbaso gehasita~nca vitakka^eb^nti, gehanissita.m puttadaaraadipa.tisa.myutta.m ~naativitakkaadi~nca micchaavitakka.m anavasesato pahaaya. ^b^vanatha.m na kareyya kuhi~ncii^eb^ti ajjhattikabaahirappabhede sabbasmi.m vatthusmi.m ta.nha.m na kareyya.m. ^b^nibbanatho avanatho sa bhikkhuu^eb^ti yo hi sabbena sabba.m ^a^M2.0523^ea^ nitta.nho ^a^P3.0190^ea^, tato eva katthacipi nandiyaa abhaavato avanatho, so bhikkhu naama sa.msaare bhayassa sammadeva ikkha.nataaya bhinnakilesataaya caati attho.

[03] ^b^yamidha pathavi~nca vehaasa.m, ruupagata.m jagatogadha.m ki~ncii^eb^ti ya.mki~nci idha pathaviigata.m bhuuminissita.m vehaasa.m vehaasa.t.tha.m devalokanissita.m ruupagata.m ruupajaata.m ruppanasabhaava.m jagatogadha.m lokika.m bhavattayapariyaapanna.m sa"nkhata.m. ^b^parijiiyati sabbamanicca^eb^nti sabba.m ta.m jaraabhibhuuta.m, tato eva anicca.m tato eva dukkha.m anattaati eva.m tilakkha.naaropana.m aaha. aya.m therassa mahaavipassanaati vadanti. ^b^eva.m samecca caranti mutattaa^eb^ti eva.m samecca abhisamecca vipassanaapa~n~naasahitaaya maggapa~n~naaya pa.tivijjhitvaa mutattaa pari~n~naatattabhaavaa pa.n.ditaa caranti viharanti.

[03] ^b^upadhiisuu^eb^ti khandhuupadhiaadiisu. ^b^janaa^eb^ti andhaputhujjanaa. ^b^gadhitaase^eb^ti pa.tibaddhacittaa. ettha hi visesato kaamagu.nuupadhiisu chando apanetabboti dassento aaha ^b^di.t.thasute pa.tighe ca mute caa^eb^ti. ^b^di.t.thasute^eb^ti di.t.the ceva sute ca, ruupasaddesuuti attho. ^b^pa.tighe^eb^ti gha.t.taniiye pho.t.thabbe. ^b^mute^eb^ti vuttaavasese mute, gandharasesuuti vutta.m hoti. ^b^saaratthapakaasaniya.m^eb^ (sa.m0 ni0 a.t.tha0 1.1.210) ``pa.tighapadena gandharasaa gahitaa, mutapadena pho.t.thabbaaramma.na''nti vutta.m. ^b^ettha vinodaya chandamanejo^eb^ti etasmi.m di.t.thaadibhede pa~ncakaamagu.ne kaamacchanda.m vinodehi, tathaa sati sabbattha anejo avikappo bhavasi. ^b^yo hettha na limpati muni tamaahuu^eb^ti yo hi ettha kaamagu.ne ta.nhaalepena na limpati, ta.m moneyyadhamma.t.thato ``munii''ti pa.n.ditaa vadanti. ``atha sa.t.thisitaa''ti paa.liiti adhippaayena keci ``sa.t.thidhammaaramma.nanissitaa''ti attha.m vadanti. ``a.t.thasa.t.thisitaa ^a^V2.0440^ea^ savitakkaa''ti pana paa.li, appaka~nhi uuna.m adhika.m vaa na ga.nanuupaga.m hotiiti. ^b^a.t.thasa.t.thisitaa^eb^ti dvaasa.t.thidi.t.thigatasannissitaa micchaavitakkaati atthoti keci vadanti. di.t.thigatikaa ca sattaavaasaabhaavaladdhi.m ajjhuupagataati adhiccasamuppannavaada.m .thapetvaa itaresa.m vasena ``atha sa.t.thisitaa savitakkaa''ti vutta.m. yathaa hi ta.nhaalepaabhaavena bhikkhuuti vuccati, eva.m di.t.thilepaabhaavenapiiti dassetu.m ``atha sa.t.thisitaa''tiaadi vutta.m. ^b^puthujjanataaya adhammaa^eb^ ^a^P3.0191^ea^ ^b^nivi.t.thaa^eb^ti ^a^M2.0524^ea^ te pana micchaavitakkaa niccaadigaahavasena adhammaa dhammato apetaa puthujjanataaya.m andhabaale nivi.t.thaa abhinivi.t.thaa. ^b^na ca vaggagatassa kuhi~ncii^eb^ti yattha katthaci vatthusmi.m sassatavaadaadimicchaadi.t.thivaggagato, ta.mladdhiko na ca assa bhaveyya. a.t.thakathaaya.m (sa.m0 ni0 a.t.tha0 1.1.210) pana ``atha sa.t.thisitaa savitakkaa, puthuu janataaya adhammaa nivi.t.thaa''ti pada.m uddharitvaa atha cha aaramma.nanissitaa puthuu adhammavitakkaa janataaya nivi.t.thaati vutta.m. tathaa na ca vaggagatassa kuhi~nciiti tesa.m vasena na katthaci kilesavaggagato bhaveyyaati ca vutta.m. ^b^no pana du.t.thullagaahii sa bhikkhuu^eb^ti yo kilesehi duusitattaa ativiya du.t.thullataa ca du.t.thullaana.m micchaavaadaana.m ga.nhanasiilo ca no assa no bhaveyya, so bhikkhu naama hotiiti.

[01] ^b^dabbo^eb^ti dabbajaatiko pa.n.dito. ^b^cirarattasamaahito^eb^ti cirakaalato pa.t.thaaya samaahito. ^b^akuhako^eb^ti koha~n~narahito asa.tho amaayaavii. ^b^nipako^eb^ti nipu.no cheko. ^b^apihaaluu^eb^ti nitta.nho. ^b^santa.m pada.m ajjhagamaa^eb^ti, nibbaana.m adhigato. moneyyadhammasamannaagatato ^b^muni. parinibbuto^eb^ti aaramma.nakara.navasena nibbaana.m pa.ticca saupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbuto. ^b^ka"nkhati kaala^eb^nti idaani anupaadisesanibbaanatthaaya kaala.m aagameti. na tassa ki~nci kara.niiya.m atthi, yathaa ediso bhavissati, tathaa attaana.m sampaadetiiti adhippaayo.

[01] ^b^maana.m pajahassuu^eb^tiaadayo catasso gaathaa pa.tibhaanasampatti.m nissaaya attano pavattamaana.m maana.m vinodentena vuttaa. tattha ^b^maana.m pajahassuu^eb^ti seyyamaanaadinavavidha.m maana.m pariccaja. ^b^gotamaa^eb^ti gotamagottassa bhagavato saavakattaa attaana.m gotamagotta.m katvaa aalapati. ^b^maanapatha^eb^nti maanassa pavatti.t.thaanabhuuta.m ayonisomanasikaaraparikkhitta.m jaatiaadi.m tappa.tibaddhakilesappahaanena ^b^jahassu^eb^ pajaha. ^b^asesa^eb^nti sabbameva. ^b^maanapathamhi sa mucchito^eb^ti maanavatthunimitta.m muccha.m aapanno. ^b^vippa.tisaariihuvaa ciraratta^eb^nti imasmi.m maanapathaanuyogakkha.ne viitivatte pubbeva arahatta.m paapu.nissa, ``na.t.thohamasmii''ti vippa.tisaarii ahuvaa ahosi.

[03] ^b^makkhena^eb^ ^a^M2.0525^ea^ ^a^V2.0441^ea^ ^b^makkhitaa pajaa^eb^ti suuraadinaa attaana.m ukka.msetvaa pare vambhetvaa paragu.namakkhanalakkha.nena makkhena pisitattaa makkhii. puggalo hi yathaa yathaa paresa.m gu.ne makkheti, tathaa tathaa attano gu.ne pu~njati niraakaroti naama. ^b^maanahataa^eb^ti maanena hatagu.naa. ^b^niraya.m papatantii^eb^ti niraya.m upapajjanti.

[03] ^b^maggajino^eb^ti maggena vijitakileso. ^b^kitti~nca sukha~ncaa^eb^ti vi~n~nuuhi pasa.msita~nca kaayikacetasikasukha~nca ^b^anubhotii^eb^ti pa.tilabhati. ^b^dhammadasoti tamaahu tathatta^eb^nti ta.m tathabhaava.m sammaapa.tipanna.m yaathaavato dhammadassiiti pa.n.ditaa aahu.

[03] ^b^akhilo^eb^ti pa~ncacetokhilarahito. ^b^padhaanavaa^eb^ti sammappadhaanaviiriyasampanno. ^b^visuddho^eb^ti niivara.nasa"nkhaatavalaahakaapagamena visuddhamaanaso ^a^P3.0192^ea^. ^b^asesa^eb^nti navavidhampi maana.m aggamaggena pajahitvaa. ^b^vijjaayantakaro samitaavii^eb^ti sabbaso samitakileso tividhaaya vijjaaya pariyosaanappatto hotiiti attaana.m ovadati.

[03] athekadivasa.m aayasmaa aanando a~n~natarena raajamahaamattena nimantito pubba.nhasamaya.m tassa geha.m gantvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi aayasmataa va"ngiisena pacchaasama.nena. atha tasmi.m gehe itthiyo sabbaala"nkaarapa.tima.n.ditaa thera.m upasa"nkamitvaa, vanditvaa pa~nha.m pucchanti, dhamma.m su.nanti. athaayasmato va"ngiisassa navapabbajitassa aaramma.na.m pariggahetu.m asakkontassa visabhaagaaramma.ne raago uppajji. so saddho ujujaatiko kulaputto ``aya.m me raago va.d.dhitvaa di.t.thadhammika.m samparaayikampi attha.m naaseyyaa''ti cintetvaa yathaanisinnova therassa attano pavatti.m aavikaronto ^b^``kaamaraagenaa''^eb^ti gaathamaaha. tattha yadipi kilesarajjanapari.laaho kaayampi baadhati, citta.m pana baadhento ciratara.m baadhetiiti dassetu.m ``kaamaraagena .dayhaamii''ti vatvaa ``citta.m me pari.dayhatii''ti vutta.m. ^b^nibbaapana^eb^nti raaganibbaapanakaara.na.m raagapari.laahassa nibbaapanasamattha.m ovaada.m karohiiti attho.

[03] ^b^sa~n~naaya vipariyesaa^eb^tiaadikaa gaathaa tena yaacitena aayasmataa aanandena vuttaa. ^b^vipariyesaa^eb^ti vipallaasena asubhe subhanti ^a^M2.0526^ea^ pavattena vipariitaggaahena. ^b^nimitta^eb^nti kilesajanakanimitta.m. ^b^parivajjehii^eb^ti paribbaja. ^b^subha.m raaguupasa.mhita^eb^nti raagava.d.dhanaaramma.na.m subha.m parivajjento asubhasa~n~naaya parivajjeyya, sabbattha anabhiratisa~n~naaya. tasmaa tadubhayampi dassento ^b^``asubhaayaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha.

[03] tattha ^a^V2.0442^ea^ ^b^asubhaayaa^eb^ti asubhaanupassanaaya. ^b^citta.m bhaavehi ekagga.m susamaahita^eb^nti attano cittavikkhepaabhaavena ekagga.m aaramma.nesu susamaahita.m appita.m katvaa bhaavehi tava asubhaanupassana.m sukara.m akkhaamiiti. ^b^sati kaayagataa tyatthuu^eb^ti vuttakaayagataasatibhaavanaa tayaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa hotuuti attho. ^b^nibbidaabahulo bhavaa^eb^ti attabhaave sabbasmi~nca nibbedabahulo hohi.

[03] ^b^animitta~nca bhaavehii^eb^ti niccanimittaadiina.m ugghaa.tanena visesato aniccaanupassanaa animittaa naama, tato ^b^maanaanusayamujjahaa^eb^ti ta.m bhaavento maggapa.tipaa.tiyaa aggamaggaadhigamena maanaanusaya.m samucchinda. ^b^maanaabhisamayaa^eb^ti maanassa dassanaabhisamayaa ceva pahaanaabhisamayaa ca. ^b^upasanto^eb^ti sabbaso raagaadiina.m santataaya upasanto ^b^carissasi^eb^ viharissasiiti attho.

[03] ^b^tameva vaaca^eb^ntiaadikaa catasso gaathaa bhagavataa subhaasitasutte (sa.m0 ni0 1.213) desite somanassajaatena therena bhagavanta.m sammukhaa ^a^P3.0193^ea^ abhitthavantena vuttaa. ^b^yaayattaana.m na taapaye^eb^ti yaaya vaacaaya hetubhuutaaya attaana.m vippa.tisaarena na taapeyya na vihe.theyya. ^b^pare ca na vihi.mseyyaa^eb^ti pare ca parehi bhindanto na baadheyya. ^b^saa ve vaacaa subhaasitaa^eb^ti saa vaacaa eka.msena subhaasitaa naama, tasmaa tameva vaaca.m bhaaseyyaati yojanaa. imaaya gaathaaya apisu.navaacaavasena bhagavanta.m thometi.

[03] ^b^pa.tinanditaa^eb^ti pa.timukhabhaavena nanditaa piyaayitaa sampati aayati~nca su.nantehi sampa.ticchitaa. ^b^ya.m anaadaayaa^eb^ti ya.m vaaca.m bhaasanto paapaani paresa.m appiyaani ani.t.thaani pharusavacanaani anaadaaya aggahetvaa atthabya~njanamadhura.m piyameva diipeti. ^b^tameva piyavaaca.m bhaaseyyaa^eb^ti piyavaacaavasena abhitthavi.

[03] ^b^amataa^eb^ti ^a^M2.0527^ea^ saadhubhaavena amatasadisaa. vutta~nheta.m -- ``sacca.m have saadhutara.m rasaana''nti (sa.m0 ni0 1.73). nibbaanaamatapaccayattaa vaa amataa. ^b^esa dhammo sanantano^eb^ti yaa aya.m saccavaacaa naama, esa poraa.no dhammo cariyaa pave.ni. idameva hi poraa.naana.m aaci.n.na.m ya.m te na alika.m bhaasi.msu. tenaaha -- ^b^``sacce atthe ca dhamme ca, aahu santo pati.t.thitaa''^eb^ti. tattha sacce pati.t.thitattaa eva attano ca paresa~nca atthe pati.t.thitaa, atthe pati.t.thitattaa eva dhamme pati.t.thitaa hontiiti veditabbaa. saccavisesanameva vaa eta.m. ida~nhi vutta.m hoti -- sacce pati.t.thitaa. kiidise? atthe ca dhamme ca, ya.m paresa.m atthato anapetattaa attha.m anuparodhakara.m, dhammato anapetattaa dhamma.m dhammikameva attha.m saadhetiiti. imaaya gaathaaya saccavaacaavasena ^a^V2.0443^ea^ abhitthavi. ^b^khema^eb^nti abhaya.m nirupaddava.m. kena kaara.nenaati ce? ^b^nibbaanapattiyaa dukkhassantakiriyaaya,^eb^ yasmaa kilesanibbaana.m paapeti, va.t.tadukkhassa ca antakiriyaaya sa.mva.t.tati, tasmaa khemanti attho. atha vaa ya.m buddho nibbaanapattiyaa vaa dukkhassantakiriyaaya vaati dvinna.m nibbaanadhaatuuna.m atthaaya khemamaggappakaasanato ^b^khema.m^eb^ vaaca.m bhaasati. ^b^saa ve vaacaanamuttamaa^eb^ti saa vaacaa sabbavaacaana.m se.t.thaati evamettha attho da.t.thabbo. imaaya gaathaaya mantaavacanavasena bhagavanta.m abhitthavanto arahattanikuu.tena thomana.m pariyosaapeti.

[03] ^b^gambhiirapa~n~no^eb^ti tisso gaathaa aayasmato saariputtattherassa pasa.msanavasena vuttaa. tattha ^b^gambhiirapa~n~no^eb^ti gambhiiresu khandhaayatanaadiisu pavattaaya nipu.naaya pa~n~naaya samannaagatattaa gambhiirapa~n~no. medhaasa"nkhaataaya dhammojapa~n~naaya samannaagatattaa ^b^medhaavii^eb^. ``aya.m duggatiyaa maggo, aya.m sugatiyaa maggo, aya.m nibbaanassa ^a^P3.0194^ea^ maggo''ti eva.m magge ca amagge ca kovidataaya ^b^maggaamaggassa kovido^eb^. mahatiyaa saavakapaaramii~naa.nassa matthaka.m pattaaya pa~n~naaya vasena ^b^mahaapa~n~no^eb^. ^b^dhamma.m deseti bhikkhuna^eb^nti sammadeva pavatti.m nivatti.m vibhaavento bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m deseti. tassaa pana desanaaya pavattiaakaara.m dassetu.m ^b^``sa.mkhittenapii''^eb^tiaadi vutta.m.

[03] tattha ^b^sa.mkhittenapii^eb^ti ``cattaarimaani, aavuso, ariyasaccaani. katamaani cattaari? dukkha.m ariyasacca.m...pe0... imaani kho, aavuso, cattaari ariyasaccaani, tasmaa ^a^M2.0528^ea^ tihaavuso, ida.m dukkhanti yogo kara.niiyo''ti eva.m sa.mkhittenapi deseti. ``katama~ncaavuso, dukkha.m ariyasacca.m? jaatipi dukkhaa''tiaadinaa (ma0 ni0 3.372-373) nayena taaneva vibhajanto vitthaarenapi bhaasati. khandhaadidesanaasupi eseva nayo. ^b^saalikaayiva nigghoso^eb^ti yathaa madhura.m ambapakka.m saayitvaa pakkhehi vaata.m datvaa madhurarava.m nicchaarentiyaa saalikaaya nigghoso, eva.m therassa dhamma.m kathentassa madhuro nigghoso hoti. dhammasenaapatissa hi pittaadiina.m vasena apalibuddhavacana.m hoti, ayada.n.dena paha.taka.msathaalako viya saddo niccharati. ^b^pa.tibhaana.m udiyyatii^eb^ti kathetukamyataaya sati samuddato viiciyo viya uparuupari ananta.m pa.tibhaana.m u.t.thahati.

[03] ^b^tassaa^eb^ti dhammasenaapatissa. ^b^ta^eb^nti dhamma.m desentassa. ^b^su.nantii^eb^ti ya.m no thero katheti, ta.m no sossaamaati aadarajaataa su.nanti. ^b^madhura^eb^nti i.t.tha.m. ^b^rajaniiyenaa^eb^ti kantena. ^b^savaniiyenaa^eb^ti ka.n.nasukhena. ^b^vaggunaa^eb^ti ma.t.thena manoharena. ^b^udaggacittaa^eb^ti odagyapiitiyaa vasena udaggacittaa aliinacittaa. ^b^muditaa^eb^ti aamoditaa paamojjena samannaagataa. ^b^odhentii^eb^ti avadahanti a~n~naaya citta.m upa.t.thapentaa sota.m upanenti.

[03] ^b^ajja^eb^ ^a^V2.0444^ea^ ^b^pannarase^eb^tiaadikaa catasso gaathaa pavaara.naasuttantadesanaaya (sa.m0 ni0 1.215) satthaara.m mahaabhikkhusa"nghaparivuta.m nisinna.m disvaa thomentena vuttaa. tattha ^b^pannarase^eb^ti yasmi~nhi samaye bhagavaa pubbaaraame nisiidanto saayanhasamaye sampattaparisaaya kaalayutta.m samayayutta.m dhamma.m desetvaa, udakako.t.thake gattaani parisi~ncitvaa, vatthanivasano eka.msa.m sugatamahaaciivara.m katvaa, migaaramaatupaasaade majjhimathambha.m nissaaya pa~n~nattavarabuddhaasane nisiiditvaa, samantato nisinna.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m anuviloketvaa tadahuposathe pavaara.naadivase nisinno hoti, imasmi.m pannarasiiuposatheti attho. ^b^visuddhiyaa^eb^ti visuddhatthaaya visuddhipavaara.naaya. ^b^bhikkhuu pa~ncasataa samaagataa^eb^ti ^a^P3.0195^ea^, pa~ncasatamattaa bhikkhuu satthaara.m parivaaretvaa nisajjavasena ceva ajjhaasayavasena ca samaagataa. te ca ^b^sa.myojanabandhanacchidaa^eb^ti sa.myojanasa"nkhaate santaanassa bandhanabhuute kilese ^a^M2.0529^ea^ chinditvaa .thitaa. tato eva ^b^aniighaa khii.napunabbhavaa isii^eb^ti kilesadukkhaabhaavena nidukkhaa khii.napunabbhavaa, asekkhaana.m siilakkhandhaadiina.m esitabhaavena isiiti.

[03] ^b^vijitasa"ngaama^eb^nti vijitakilesasa"ngaamattaa vijitamaarabalattaa vijitasa"ngaama.m. ^b^satthavaaha^eb^nti a.t.tha"ngike ariyamaggarathe aaropetvaa veneyyasatte vaaheti sa.msaarakantaarato uttaaretiiti bhagavaa satthavaaho. tenaaha brahmaa sahampati ``u.t.thehi, viira, vijitasa"ngaama, satthavaahaa''ti (mahaava0 8; ma0 ni0 1.282), ta.m satthavaaha.m anuttara.m satthaara.m saavakaa payirupaasanti. ^b^tevijjaa maccuhaayino^eb^ti evaruupehi saavakehi parivaarito cakkavatti viya raajaa amaccaparivaarito janapadacaarikavasena samantaa anupariyetiiti yojanaa.
[03] ^b^palaapo^eb^ti tuccho antosaararahito, siilarahitoti attho. ^b^vande aadiccabandhuna^eb^nti aadiccabandhu.m satthaara.m dasabala.m vandaamiiti vadati.

[03] ^b^parosahassa^eb^ntiaadikaa catasso gaathaa nibbaanapa.tisa.myuttaaya dhammiyaa kathaaya bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m desenta.m bhagavanta.m thomentena vuttaa. tattha ^b^parosahassa^eb^nti atirekasahassa.m, a.d.dhate.lasaani bhikkhusahassaani sandhaaya vutta.m. ^b^akutobhaya^eb^nti nibbaane kutocipi bhaya.m natthi. nibbaana.m pattassa ca kutocipi bhaya.m natthiiti nibbaana.m akutobhaya.m naama.

[03] ``aagu.m na karotii''tiaadinaa (su0 ni0 527) vuttakaara.nehi bhagavaa naagoti vuccatiiti ^b^naaganaamosi bhagavaa^eb^ti. ^b^isiina.m isisattamo^eb^ti saavakapaccekabuddhaisiina.m uttamo isi, vipassiisammaasambuddhato ^a^V2.0445^ea^ pa.t.thaaya isiina.m vaa sattamako isi. ^b^mahaameghovaa^eb^ti caatuddiipikamahaamegho viya hutvaa.
[03] ^b^divaa vihaaraa^eb^ti pa.tisallaana.t.thaanato. ^b^saavako te, mahaaviira, paade vandati va"ngiiso^eb^ti ida.m thero arahatta.m patvaa attano visesaadhigama.m pakaasento vadati.

[03] ^b^ummaggapatha^eb^ntiaadikaa ^a^M2.0530^ea^ catasso gaathaa bhagavataa ``ki.m nu te, va"ngiisa, imaa gaathaayo pubbe parivitakkitaa, udaahu .thaanaso cetaa pa.tibhantii''ti pucchitena .thaanaso pa.tibhantiiti dassentena vuttaa. kasmaa paneva.m ta.m bhagavaa avoca? sa"nghamajjhe kira kathaa udapaadi -- ``va"ngiisatthero vissa.t.thagantho neva uddesena, na paripucchaaya, na yonisomanasikaarena kamma.m karoti. gaatha.m ^a^P3.0196^ea^ bandhanto va.n.napadaani karonto vicaratii''ti. atha bhagavaa ``ime bhikkhuu va"ngiisassa pa.tibhaanasampatti.m na jaananti, ahamassa pa.tibhaanasampatti.m jaanaapessaamii''ti cintetvaa ``ki.m nu kho, va"ngiisaa''tiaadinaa pucchati. ^b^ummaggapatha^eb^nti anekaani kilesuppajjanapathaani. va.t.tappasutapathataaya hi pathanti vutta.m. ^b^pabhijja khiilaanii^eb^ti raagaadikhiilaani pa~nca bhinditvaa carasi. ^b^ta.m passathaa^eb^ti eva.m abhibhuyya ca chinditvaa ca caranta.m buddha.m passatha. ^b^bandhapamu~ncakara^eb^nti bandhanamocanakara.m. ^b^asita^eb^nti anissita.m. ^b^bhaagaso pa.tibhajjaa^eb^ti satipa.t.thaanaadiko.t.thaasato dhamma.m pa.tibhajjaniiya.m katvaa. ^b^pavibhajjaa^eb^tipi paa.tho. uddesaadiko.t.thaasato pakaarena vibhajitvaa vibhajitvaa dhamma.m desetiiti attho.

[03] ^b^oghassaa^eb^ti kaamaadicaturoghassa. ^b^anekavihita^eb^nti satipa.t.thaanaadivasena anekavidha.m a.t.thati.msaaya vaa kamma.t.thaanaana.m vasena anekappakaara.m amataavaha.m magga.m ^b^akkhaasi^eb^ abhaasi. ^b^tasmi~nca amate akkhaate^eb^ti tasmi.m tena akkhaate amate amataavahe. ^b^dhammadasaa^eb^ti dhammassa passitaaro. ^b^.thitaa asa.mhiiraa^eb^ti kenaci asa.mhaariyaa hutvaa pati.t.thitaa. ^b^ativijjhaa^eb^ti ativijjhitvaa. ^b^sabba.t.thitiina^eb^nti sabbesa.m di.t.thi.t.thaanaana.m vi~n~naa.na.t.thitiina.m vaa. ^b^atikkamamaddasaa^eb^ti atikkamabhuuta.m nibbaana.m addasa. ^b^agga^eb^nti uttama.m dhamma.m. aggeti vaa paa.tho, pa.thamataranti attho. ^b^dasaddhaana^eb^nti pa~ncavaggiyaana.m ^b^agga.m^eb^ dhamma.m, ^b^agge^eb^ vaa aadito desayiiti attho.
[03] ^b^tasmaa^eb^ti yasmaa ``esa dhammo sudesito''ti jaanantena pamaado na kaatabbo, tasmaa ^b^anusikkhe^eb^ti tisso sikkhaa vipassanaapa.tipaa.tiyaa maggapa.tipaa.tiyaa ca sikkheyya.

[03] ^b^buddhaanubuddho^eb^tiaadikaa ^a^V2.0446^ea^ tisso gaathaa aayasmato a~n~naatako.n.da~n~nattherassa thomanavasena vuttaa. tattha ^b^buddhaanubuddho^eb^ti buddhaana.m anubuddho ^a^M2.0531^ea^. buddhaa hi pa.thama.m cattaari saccaani bujjhi.msu, pacchaa thero sabbapa.thama.m, tasmaa buddhaanubuddhoti. thirehi siilakkhandhaadiihi samannaagatattaa ^b^thero,^eb^ akuppadhammoti attho. ^b^tibbanikkamo^eb^ti da.lhaviiriyo. ^b^sukhavihaaraana^eb^nti di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m. ^b^vivekaana^eb^nti ti.n.nampi vivekaana.m. ^b^sabbassa ta^eb^nti ya.m sabbasaavakena pattabba.m, assa anena ta.m anuppatta.m. ^b^appamattassa sikkhato^eb^ti appamattena hutvaa sikkhantena.

[03] ^b^tevijjo^eb^ ^a^P3.0197^ea^ ^b^cetopariyakovido^eb^ti chasu abhi~n~naasu catasso vadati, itaraa dve yadipi na vuttaa, thero pana cha.labhi~n~nova. yasmaa thera.m himavante chaddantadahato aagantvaa bhagavati paramanipaccakaara.m dassetvaa, vandanta.m disvaa pasannamaanasena bhagavato sammukhaa thera.m abhitthavantena imaa gaathaa vuttaa, tasmaa ``ko.n.da~n~no buddhadaayaado, paade vandati satthuno''ti vutta.m.

[03] ^b^nagassa passe^eb^tiaadikaa tisso gaathaa pa~ncahi bhikkhusatehi saddhi.m sabbeheva arahantehi bhagavati kaa.lasilaaya.m viharante aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m citta.m samanvesanto arahattaphalavimutti.m passittha. ta.m disvaa aayasmaa va"ngiiso bhagavanta.m there ca abhitthavanto abhaasi. tattha ^b^nagassa passe^eb^ti isigilipabbatassa passe kaa.lasilaaya.m. ^b^aasiina^eb^nti nisinna.m.
[03] ^b^cetasaa^eb^ti attano cetopariya~naa.nena. ^b^citta.m nesa.m samanvesa^eb^nti tesa.m khii.naasavabhikkhuuna.m citta.m samanvesanto. ^b^anupariyetii^eb^ti anukkamena paricchindati.

[03] ^b^eva.m sabba"ngasampanna.m^eb^ ``muni.m dukkhassa paaragu''nti vuttaaya satthusampattiyaa ceva ``tevijjaa maccuhaayino''ti vuttaaya saavakasampattiyaa caati sabbehi a"ngehi sampanna.m samannaagata.m. ^b^muni^eb^nti hi iminaa padena monasa"nkhaatena ~naa.nena satthu anavasesa~neyyaavabodho vuttoti anaavara.na~naa.nena dasabala~naa.naadiina.m sa"ngaho kato hoti, tenassa ~naa.nasampada.m dasseti. ^b^dukkhassa paaragu^eb^nti iminaa pahaanasampada.m. tadubhayena ca satthu aanubhaavasampadaadayo dassitaa honti. ^b^tevijjaa maccuhaayino^eb^ti iminaa saavakaana.m ~naa.nasampattidiipanena ca nibbaanadhaatuyaa adhigamadiipanena ca padadvayena ^a^M2.0532^ea^ satthusaavakasampatti dassitaa hoti. tathaa hi yathaavuttamattha.m paaka.tatara.m kaatu.m ^b^``muni.m dukkhassa paaragu.m. anekaakaarasampanna.m, payirupaasanti gotama''^eb^nti vutta.m. tattha ^b^anekaakaarasampanna^eb^nti anekehi aakaarehi sampanna.m, anekaakaaragu.nasamannaagatanti attho.

[03] ^b^cando^eb^ ^a^V2.0447^ea^ ^b^yathaa^eb^ti gaathaa bhagavanta.m campaanagare gaggaraaya pokkhara.niyaa tiire mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena anekehi ca devanaagasahassehi parivuta.m attano va.n.nena ca yasasaa ca virocamaana.m disvaa somanassajaatena abhitthavantena vuttaa. tattha ^b^cando yathaa vigatavalaahake nabhe^eb^ti yathaa saradasamaye apagatavalaahake valaahakasadisena a~n~nena ca mahikaadinaa upakkilesena vimutte aakaase pu.n.nacando virocati, ^b^viitamalova bhaa.numaa^eb^ti teneva valaahakaadiupakkilesavigamena vigatamalo bhaa.numaa suuriyo yathaa virocati. ^b^evampi, a"ngiirasa, tva^eb^nti eva.m a"ngehi nicchara.najutiihi jutimanta tvampi ^b^mahaamuni^eb^ bhagavaa, ^b^atirocasi^eb^ attano yasasaa sadevaka.m loka.m atikkamitvaa virocasiiti.

[03] ^b^kaaveyyamattaa^eb^tiaadikaa ^a^P3.0198^ea^ dasa gaathaa arahatta.m patvaa attano pa.tipatti.m paccavekkhitvaa satthu attano ca gu.ne vibhaaventena vuttaa. tattha ^b^kaaveyyamattaa^eb^ti kaaveyyena kabbakara.nena mattaa maanitaa sambhaavitaa gu.nodaya.m aapannaa. ^b^addasaamaa^eb^ti addasimhaa.
[03] ^b^addhaa no udapajjathaa^eb^ti ratanattaya.m addhaa amhaaka.m upakaaratthaaya uppajji.

[03] ^b^vacana^eb^nti saccapa.tisa.myutta.m dhammakatha.m. ^b^khandhe aayatanaani ca dhaatuyo caa^eb^ti pa~ncakkhandhe dvaadasaayatanaani, a.t.thaarasa dhaatuyo ca. imasmi.m .thaane khandhaadikathaa vattabbaa. saa ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi0 2.421 aadayo) vitthaaritaa evaati tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbaa. ^b^viditvaanaa^eb^ti ruupaadivibhaagaadito aniccataadito ca pubbabhaaga~naa.nena jaanitvaa.
[03] ^b^ye te saasanakaarakaa^eb^ti ye te sattaa tathaagataana.m saasanakaarakaa, tesa.m bahuuna.m atthaaya vata uppajjanti tathaagataa.

[03] ^b^ye^eb^ ^a^M2.0533^ea^ ^b^niyaamagataddasaa^eb^ti niyaamo eva niyaamagata.m, ye bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo ca sammattaniyaama.m addasa.msu adhigacchi.msu. tesa.m atthaaya vata ^b^bodhi.m^eb^ sammaasambodhi.m ajjhagamaa, ^b^muni^eb^ bhagavaati yojanaa.
